40001001	Jesu Krist lagŋɛl Abraham ɛm, lele David ɛm ab e mew.
40001002	Abraham ec’alaw Isak e l’ew ab ɛm ec’en ec’es ɔsŋm: Jakɔb,
40001003	Juda lele lisijimɛl ab; Perɛs lele Zera ab (Tamar el ɛl lis), Ɛsrɔm, Aram,
40001004	Aminadab, Nasɔn, Salmɔ,
40001005	Boas (Rahab el lis), Obɛd (Rut el lis)
40001006	Jese, lele jim ɛb ebu David ab. Salomɔ (lis el Uri e yɔw a);
40001007	Roboam, Abia, Asaf,
40001008	Josafat, Joram, Osias,
40001009	Joatam, Akas, Esekias,
40001010	Manase, Amɔ, Josias,
40001011	Yekonia lele lisijimɛl ab. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm anake wɛl ot Israɛl ec’ey im madu ɔkr ɛm Babilɔn wus af a.
40001012	Ca eke wɛl ot Israɛl ec’ey im Babilɔn a, ow e jam a, ow el Salatiɛl, Sorobabɛl,
40001013	Abiud, Eliakim, Asɔr,
40001014	Sadɔk, Akim, Eliud,
40001015	Eleasar, Matan, Jakɔb,
40001016	ɛtŋ Jakɔb ew Josɛf, Mari ɛc; Mari anake ew Jesu eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mesi a.
40001017	Sica k’igŋ Abraham toŋ David a, ow ij alaw sakp lɛw yar; David toŋ ke k’ok lɛgŋ ab ɛm a eke wɛl ot Israɛl ec’ey im Babilɔn wus af a, ow ij alaw sakp lɛw yar; sica aŋa toŋ ke ok Mesi e mew e lɛgŋ a, ow ij ɛmɛny alaw sakp lɛw yar.
40001018	Kin Jesu Krist eci mew owi ec’elel eke ɛcr. Josɛf ɛsu Jesu lis Mari; gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke -l’uwarir any a, Abŋ Lala ec’abusu ɛm, Mari anŋ nimamn.
40001019	Ɛc Josɛf el ɛgŋ eke b’ɛlum Nyam ɛtŋ l’erurm eke li k’ɛlu ow ɔkm dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af; ow sosiɛm l’ɛgŋ l’eb eke ew ew ɛm, li k’ɛlu ow es.
40001020	Sica eke n’am tutr low na a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow mɛmn ɛm ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Josɛf, David eci lilaw, ɛrmij k’ók’ŋ eke k’oc Mari ɛsɛ ŋ e yɔw af, aŋke Abŋ Lala ec’abusu ɛm anake n’anŋ nimamn a.
40001021	Li b’ow l’ew iy, ŋ b’ow ɛsŋ iy a Jesu, aŋke in anake li b’ow l’eb in ec’agŋ a nimum l’ɛlu es ɛl e sikpl ɛm a."
40001022	Low na ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke odad a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad kokoba ɔb ɛs ab ɛm a íy nɛny.
40001023	Kin odad a: Dedyɔwli a eke anm igŋ ab a b’ow anŋ lokab ɛtŋ b’ow ew iy igŋ eke wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ Emanuɛl. (Nin a e nyandrɛ el: 'Nyam anŋ ɛy ab.')
40001024	Eke Josɛf ufŋm es a, li kok ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ɛrm ɛs a dad’r ab af, ɛtŋ l’oc Mari ɛsɛ in e yɔw af.
40001025	Gbɛkɔ n’anm ow ab toŋ batŋ Mari ew iy igŋ eke Josɛf ɛw nin Jesu.
40002001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke Erɔd el ɛb ebu a anake wɛl ew Jesu Bɛtlehɛm baŋn, Jude wus af a. Sica eke wɛl ew Jesu a, nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ek’el mílɛ́l ɛm ɛkn ec’a, anŋ yogŋ a eke ligbn b’igb a ow toŋ ok Jerusalɛm.
40002002	-L’ibrm ninɛ: "Bogŋ iy a eke wɛl ew ke el Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu ab a ee? S’ɛkn in eci lɛ́l a yogŋ a eke ligbn b’anŋ igb a, ow sosiɛm anake s’ow eke si k’usr’r sos a."
40002003	Eke ɛb ebu Erɔd amani na ok ɔru ɛm a, ɛrmni ɛdŋ’n es, Jerusalɛm nimum ec’agŋ a yɛji.
40002004	Erɔd as egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a fɛŋ lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab fɛŋ luku ɛtŋ am ibrm ɛl yogŋ eke wɛl k’ew Mesi a.
40002005	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Bɛtlehɛm baŋn, Jude wus af, aŋke kin low yec’eke Nyam dad ke kokoba ɔb ɛs a nɔn:
40002006	Ɛtŋ ŋ, Bɛtlehɛm, elm Jude wus af ec’ɛb ewi a fɛŋ eci jam ɛs. Kɔ ŋ ɛm ɛb ebu a b’ow anŋ ɛy ɔkm, ke nyímn ɛm ec’agŋ Israɛl."
40002007	Ow sosiɛm ew ew ɛm Erɔd ɛsŋ nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl a ek’ɛl ɛm, li k’uw lɛgŋ tasi yec’af eke lɛ́l a k’ɛy ɔkm ab any.
40002008	Ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl Bɛtlehɛm. Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn otarir iy a e lís e low akr sɛnyn sɛnyn toŋ ɛ́ŋan in; eke b’ɛŋan in a òwr dadr’m yec’ɛtŋ k’ɛm yɛji m’ím m’usr’r sos."
40002009	Eke -l’irir ɛb ebu a e sodad a, -l’ɛlu lakr -n’im. Eke -n’aam a, kin lɛ́l a eke -l’ikŋn anym -l’ɛkan yogŋ a eke ligbn b’anŋ igb a, ek’ikŋ ɛl anym. Ɛtŋ wanci ab af a eke lɛ́l a im ok yogŋ a eke iy a anŋ a, n’inym es.
40002010	Eke -l’ɛkan lɛ́l a inym es a, -n’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm.
40002011	-L’ok akŋ a ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn iy a lele lis Mari ab. -L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ -n’am usr iy a sos. -Li kpakpab ɛl eci sekpr ab es ɛtŋ -l’ap ow sika, ogŋ lele kpey ab.
40002012	Ow e jam a, Nyam ɛwar ɛl mɛmn ɛm, eke -li k’ɛwlmn mɛny -n’iimn Erɔd ogŋ a ij; ɛtŋ -l’eb ejagb ɛjeci -n’im ɛl eci wus ab af.
40002013	Sica eke nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl a im a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow ɛŋn Josɛf mɛmn ɛm ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc iy a lele lis ab urur es imn Ejipt toŋ bake Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dád ɔny e mɛny ɛwl ow ec’odad, aŋke Erɔd b’ow ɔl iy a eci ibi es."
40002014	Kpɛkŋ Josɛf igb ncok ɛm, oc iy a lele Mari ab ɛtŋ -n’im Ejipt.
40002015	-N’anŋ yogŋ toŋ Erɔd uw. Low na ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad na eke dad kokoba ɔb ɛs ab ɛm a, íy nɛny: Ejipt wus af ɛtŋ m’ɛsŋ ɛm ec’iy a.
40002016	Eke Erɔd b’uw any eke nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl a ɛju’r a, ɛrm ebl’l afŋn in es. Na sosiɛm n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ibi Bɛtlehɛm lele in e saw saw ab ec’ey mɛny nɛnym, toŋ k’igŋ akpo yony ɛsɛl a fɛŋ. Nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ec’amani a ek’ɔŋ’n lɛgŋ ab af eke lɛ́l a ɛy ɔkm a, af yogŋ anake li kok low na a.
40002017	Ɛbɛn eke kokoba ɔb ɛs Jeremi ec’odad na eke dad a iy nɛny ana:
40002018	Rama ɛb ɛm, wɛl iri lebl ek’ikŋ, ɔŋn ikŋ lele luw eci likekr ab. Rashɛl anake am ikŋ in ec’ey a ec’ɔŋn a. L’ibram ŋɔŋn aŋke in ec’ey a anm ij.
40002019	Eke Erɔd uw a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam mɛmn ɛm ow ɛŋn Josɛf Ejipt wus af
40002020	ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc iy a lele lis ab ke ɛ́wal mɛny imn Israɛl wus af, aŋke agŋ a eke am ɔl iy ab es eke k’ibi a -l’uw."
40002021	Ow ɔŋ Josɛf igb oc iy a lele lis ab ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl -n’im Israɛl wus af.
40002022	Gbɛkɔ Josɛf iri eke Arkelaɔs usr ɛs Erɔd usu ɛsɛ Jude eci es ɛw ɛs af; na sosiɛm erŋn ow’r sos eke li k’im l’ir Jude. Eke wɛl yɛgm’n ow ec’ów mɛmn ɛm a, n’im Galile wus af,
40002023	ɛtŋ n’im l’ir Nasarɛt baŋn. Ow el ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad na eke dad a íy nɛny: Wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ’n Nasarɛt iy.
40003001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ɛy ɔkm Jude eci loj a ɛtŋ am dad Nyam odad ɛsɛ:
40003002	"Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm aŋke Afr ec’ es ɛw a ow titm."
40003003	Jan el ɛgŋ a eke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi dad in e ec’odad, ow a eke n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ loj am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: "Kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ejagb a, kòkr in e sebr a ínym nyim nyim!"
40003004	Jan sus mob eke wɛl kok gbaŋkɔ kedebnam e suw ɛm ɛtŋ l’ɛgŋ ndey lɛl e meb er ɛm; li b’ij tɛtɛ gbaŋgban lele mow mun ab.
40003005	Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ, Jude wus af ec’agŋ fɛŋ, lele mij ewl mij Jurdɛn wus ab af ec’agŋ a am ow Jan ogŋ.
40003006	-N’am ɛgŋ ɛl e sikpl a -l’eb agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ Jan am ok ɛl mij nuŋ Jurdɛn erŋ.
40003007	Eke Jan am ɛkn eke Farisiɛl nɔnɔ lele Sadusiɛl ab am ow in ogŋ mij ok nuŋ ec’a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny morŋn amua! Kɔ bwo dad ɔny eke, ek’okr mij nuŋ ke ɔtur eke k’ŋgbroŋn Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ek’am ow ab ɛm ee?
40003008	Sica yɛ̀gmn ɔny ec’es an ab ɛm eke itŋnin ɛrm ɛm!
40003009	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny kì tutar ɔny ɛm ki dadr k’ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛy lagŋ el Abraham.' Kɔ m’am dad ɔny eke Nyam ɔtu eke ki kok mebn amua él Abraham ec’alaw!
40003010	Sica ɔs anŋ eke b’ow bubr ekŋ es min ɛm. Likŋ fɛŋ ek’ɔ́sum ey amamn a, wɛl b’ow ubr’r es oc ɔwl’l alm.
40003011	Ɛm ec’a, m’am m’ok ɔny mij nuŋ mij ɛm ɛsɛ ɛrm ɛm itŋn eci mɛny ɛwr af, gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ ek’anŋ’m jam am ow a b’ow ok ɔny mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala lele al ɛm ab. N’ɔny abusu nɔnɔ l’akm im. M’itm bɔbɔ yɛji eke mi k’ɔny in e cɔkrukpɔ meb a m’ot’r es.
40003012	N’ɔnym waw ab ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ egb a lɛf, l’éb ey a, ke l’ígŋ suw a l’ok es. Li b’ow l’eb egb a l’ok egbel ɛm, ke l’ófŋ suw a al ek’iram es ab ɛm."
40003013	Sica Jesu anŋ Galile ow Jurdɛn eke Jan k’ok’r mij nuŋ;
40003014	kɔ Jan ɛgŋm, ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm anake k’ok’m mij nuŋ a, ɛtŋ ow el ŋ eke am ow ɛm ogŋ!"
40003015	Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Caca ɛm a, ɛ̀gŋ ke ow él ɛbɛn, aŋke ɛbɛn eke si b’ow si kok ów fɛŋ eke Nyam am ibrm ɛy ab ana." Ow sosiɛm Jan ɛgŋ eb ok’r mij nuŋ.
40003016	Eke Jesu ok mij nuŋ ke am ɛy ɔkm erŋ a, kpɛkŋ afr agbr ɛm. L’ɛkn Nyam ec’Abŋ ek’am us’r es nuŋ af ɛsɛ kel af.
40003017	Ɛtŋ lebl nyam anŋ afr am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na el ɛm ec’Iy eke m’erur tasi; m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ m’ɛlu’l ɛm."
40004001	Sica Nyam ec’Abŋ oc Jesu im loj eke agn k’ɛju’r.
40004002	Eke n’ɛnŋ nɛny sɛgŋ ekŋ yony, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab a, ca namn ow’r sos.
40004003	Agn ek’el ɛju ɛs a, ɛri ow titm’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ek’el Nyam ec’Iy, ke dàd mebn amua ítŋn el ob ij."
40004004	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: Ow elm ob ij sɔny cɛ ɔ́ɔm ɛgŋ sel, kɔ Nyam ec’odad ebl fɛŋ eke b’anŋ’n nɛnym ɛy ɔkm a."
40004005	Ɛmɛny agn oc’r im uyum’n Jerusalɛm ɛb lala ab ɛm e Nyamel gbɛl a e luw af ec’usu gege a,
40004006	ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Eke el Nyam ec’Iy, ke ànŋ aŋa igb us es wus; aŋke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: Nyam b’ow ɔŋ in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow ŋ sosiɛm, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’oc’ŋ abu ɛm abu ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke lebn kaka kí kokm’ŋ ob lakr."
40004007	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Nyam Lɛl yɛji dad eke: K’ɛ́bam Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam."
40004008	Ɛmɛny agn oc’r im lafɛny gege nyam af, yɛgm’n wus na ec’es ɛw es ɛw a fɛŋ lele ɛl eci sakpl ab ab,
40004009	ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Mob amua fɛŋ m’ow m’ɔŋ eke ok ɔwrɔkp wus igŋ’m nuŋ."
40004010	Ca Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ Satan, kpab’m es lís! Aŋke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: B’ow igŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam sɔny nuŋ, ke kók in sɔny coco e juma."
40004011	Sica agn ɛgb’r es; ɛtŋ kin afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ow’r saw am kok in e lís e low.
40004012	Eke Jesu iri eke wɛl ɛlu Jan sobel ɛm a, n’im Galile wus af.
40004013	L’irm Nasarɛt ij, ɛtŋ n’im n’anŋ Kapɛrnayum, ɛb eke anŋ Galile eci mij lekpl a saw, Zabulɔn lele Nɛftali ab eci wus ab af.
40004014	Ow el ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi eci sodad amua eke dad a íy nɛny:
40004015	Zabulɔn eci wus a, Nɛftali eci wus a ek’anŋ okij saw ec’ejagb ab af, Jurdɛn jam a, Galile ek’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ir af!
40004016	Agŋ a ek’ir ncebn ɛm a ɛkn usuayl ligbɛl! Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’anŋ luw eci lɔw ew a, usuayl ɛjn ok ɛl af.
40004017	Lɛgŋ na af anake Jesu ɔb nuŋ am dad Nyam odad ɛsɛ: "Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm aŋke Afr ec’ es ɛw a ow titm."
40004018	Jesu am ɛcr Galile eci mij lekpl a e saw saw ɛtŋ l’ɛkn agŋ lisijimɛl yony ek’el ɔcn ibi ɛsɛl: Simɔ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Piɛr lele lisijim Andre ab. -N’am ok muw mij lekpl ab ɛm.
40004019	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Usr’m jam, m’ow mi kok ɔny eel agŋ eb ɛsɛl."
40004020	Kpɛkŋ -li digŋ ɛl eci muw a -l’ok es ɛtŋ -l’us ow jam.
40004021	Eke li b’im akpoj tɛl a, l’ɛkn agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjeci yony Jak lele Jan ab, Sebede ec’ey. Ɛl ɛs ab -n’anŋ ɛl eci mijɛtŋ ab ɛm -n’am kok ɛl eci muw a ɛtŋ Jesu ɛsŋ ɛl.
40004022	Kpɛkŋ -li digŋ ɛl ɛs lele mijɛtŋ ab ab -l’ɛlu es, ɛtŋ -l’us ow jam.
40004023	Jesu am ɛc Galile eci wus ab af; wus ab af yogŋ, n’am yɛgm agŋ low Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a ɛtŋ n’am ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba. N’am ewlm ɔ́lu a ɛl ec’ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛl eci dudu fɛŋ ab.
40004024	Siri wus af nimum, Jesu e lís ec’odad eke wɛl am dad a ec’amani am ok agŋ ɔru ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl am is’r agŋ fɛŋ ek’am ij ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ e gbre ɛsɛ agŋ ek’ɔny abŋ eŋuŋ, krokro ɛsɛl lele sos ɛ́yru ab; ɛtŋ Jesu am ewlm ɛl.
40004025	Agŋ nɔnɔ ek’anŋ Galile ow, Ɛb Lɛw a eci wus ab af ec’agŋ, Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ, Jude wus af ec’agŋ lele Jurdɛn ogog eci wus ab af ec’agŋ ab, am us Jesu jam.
40005001	Eke Jesu ɛkn bieku a, l’uyu lafɛny af ɛtŋ li sig es. In e jam ɛsɛl a ow titm’n
40005002	ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm wɛl low li dad l’ɛsɛ:
40005003	"Agŋ ek’ij abŋ ɛm e gbɔr, ehe él ɛl eci aŋke Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, ɛl eci!
40005004	Agŋ a ek’anŋ sɔrŋ ɛm a, ehe él ɛl eci aŋke Nyam b’ow ɛyr ɛl ɛrm es!
40005005	Agŋ ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛsɛl, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke -li b’ow -l’ij wus eke Nyam ɛwar a ec’aja.
40005006	Agŋ eke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’amn am ɔny a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke Nyam b’ow iyr ɛl lok.
40005007	Agŋ a eke b’ikŋ agŋ sɔrŋ a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke Nyam b’ow ikŋ ɛl sɔrŋ!
40005008	Agŋ ek’ɛrm ɛm ayl a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke -li b’ow -l’ɛkn Nyam.
40005009	Agŋ a eke b’is ɛrm es ɛy a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ ɛl Nyam ec’ey.
40005010	Agŋ a eke b’an es ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam b’erur ab af, ke ow sosiɛm wɛl b’ijr gbre a, ehe él ɛl eci, aŋke Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, ɛl eci.
40005011	Ànŋn ehe ɛm eke ɛm sosiɛm agŋ bi wɛwr ɔny, b’ijr ɔny gbre, bi dad ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ ok ɔny af yadŋ ɛm.
40005012	Kòkr yaya, ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, aŋke afr ob ap ligbɛl nyam am eku ɔny. Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ek’ikŋ anym ow a yɛji, ɛbɛn eke wɛl ijr ɛl gbre ana."
40005013	"Ɔny anake eel wus na e mok a. Kɔ eke mok irmn in e ded a, ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke ki kokr’r ke l’ɛwl li ded ee? L’akplm ij, gbeŋ cɛ l’it eke wɛl k’oc ɔwl’l ke agŋ uyu’r af.
40005014	Ɔny anake eel wus na ec’usuayl a. Baŋn ek’anŋ lafɛny af a ɔnym es lɔl.
40005015	Wɛl ígŋm kɛniɛ ɛwm es ob ew; kɔ wɛl b’itm’n es ob gege af, ke l’áyal agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ akŋ a.
40005016	Ɛbɛn ek’ɔny ec’usuayl a ki jɛjn agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af ana, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɛkn ɔny ec’ów amamn a eke bi kokr a, ke -li kɔklm ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a."
40005017	"Kì tutar eke m’ow e mi k’ɔny Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e low yɛgm ab ab m’ot es. M’owm eke mi k’ɔny m’ot ɛl es, kɔ eke mi k’ɛlu liy ɛm.
40005018	M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm eke afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛc, kɔ ol a eke wɛl nɔn a e mɔni kaka, ow e logli kaka k’ow tɛtŋm es toŋ ke fɛŋ íy nɛny.
40005019	Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ eke b’ow igŋ sol amua ɛm e likekli nyam ɛlu es, ke b’ow yɛgm agŋ kok ɛbɛn a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, li b’ow l’el likekli; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɔsu ol a, ke b’ow yɛgm agŋ kok ɛbɛn a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, li b’ow l’el ligbɛl.
40005020	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny: eke kokmn low yec’a eke Nyam am ibrm ɔny a akamn ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab a, k’ow ɛymn Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a."
40005021	"Irir eke wɛl dad ɛy lagŋɛl: 'K’íbim ɛgŋ, ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’ibi ɛgŋ a, wɛl b’ow oc’r im jɛj ok ec’any af.'
40005022	Kɔ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny m’ɛsɛ: ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ebl ɛrm ok lisijim af a, wɛl b’ow oc’r im jɛj ok ec’any af; ɛgŋ eke b’ow wɛwr lisijim ɛsɛ: 'Ŋ nyamb ɛgŋ a,' wɛl b’ow oc’r im Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ow dad lisijim ɛsɛ 'Nuŋ ɛm akplm ŋ a,' it eke wɛl k’oc’r im gbre ij usu ec’al ab ɛm.
40005023	Eke am oc ob ap im egb waw usu ɔŋ Nyam, ɛtŋ yogŋ ɔkn ek’esŋ jim ɛw low ŋ ab a,
40005024	egb waw usu yogŋ, ɛ̀w ŋ ec’ob ap ab es, ke íkŋ anym im okar ɛm esŋ jim ab ke sica ɛ́wl ow ke áp Nyam ob a.
40005025	Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɛw low ŋ ab, ɛtŋ usr ejagb aamn jɛj ok ɛm a, ògŋ es fafa okar ɛm eke anŋn ejagb af a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ócm’ŋ n’ɔɔm jɛj ok ɛs, jɛj ok ɛs a ocm’ŋ ɔɔm usu ɔsu ɛs ɛlum’ŋ sobel ɛm.
40005026	M’am dad’ŋ nawrɛ ɛm: k’ow ɛym ɔkm yogŋ eke sɔgm ŋ e labm a fɛŋ ek’ɔny a uwarm."
40005027	"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ab ee? K’íjm nfaci.
40005028	Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bi lɛr lawl e yɔw ke b’ɔny erur in ec’ɛrm ɛm a, ow ab l’ij nfaci ŋ̂.
40005029	Eke batŋ ow el ŋ e lidr e nyamn a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ɔ̀kr ɔny oc’r es ɔwl’l usu kpekpe: ow akpl ŋ eci eke k’irmn ŋ e sos ikpr nyam cɛ, ow a eke ŋ e sos a fɛŋ k’anŋ ke wɛl ɔny ɔwl’ŋ gbre ij usu a.
40005030	Eke batŋ ow el ŋ e lidr abu a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ùbr’r es oc ɔwl’l kpekpe: ow akpl ŋ eci eke k’irmn sos ogog nyam, ow a eke k’im gbre ij usu ab ɛm ŋ e sos a fɛŋ ab a."
40005031	"Wɛl dad yɛji: 'Eke am ogŋ ŋ e yɔw eke ɔl mar ɛbi a, ɔ́ŋ’n igŋnin e lɛl.'
40005032	Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’ɛlu in e yɔw e l’ɔl mar l’ɛbi es, ke ow elm egŋ ot owi ɛm a, n’ɔŋ yɔw a b’ow ɛy nfaci ij owi ɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’ɛbi yɔw eke wɛl ɔwr a, in yɛji l’ij nfaci."
40005033	"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ɛy lagŋɛl ab ee? K’ítŋnm ŋ e nɛny ij a, kɔ ke kók Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af, yec’a eke dad nɛny ij ɛm a.
40005034	Kɔ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny eke k’íjmn nɛny kaka: k’íjmn nɛny afr e nin ɛm aŋke ow el Nyam eci es sig usu;
40005035	k’íjmn nɛny wus e nin ɛm aŋke ow el in ec’akr es ok usu, k’íjmn nɛny Jerusalɛm e nin ɛm, aŋke ow el Ɛb Ebu gbɛl a ec’ɛb.
40005036	K’íjm nɛny okm ŋ e nuŋ ab af aŋke k’ɔtum kokm ŋ e sin nuŋ nyam ibrm oglog ufum.
40005037	Dàdr cɛ ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛɛ' oglog 'Njaŋ.' Yec’a eke wɛl bi dad igŋ af a, low ŋuŋn ɛs eci."
40005038	"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ab ee? Nyamn lele nyamn ab ɛtŋ nɛn lele nɛn ab.
40005039	Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny eke k’átarmn ɔny ec’ifnu ab. Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɛdŋ’ŋ any af lidr ogog e láwl a, ɔ̀kŋ’n nɛmn ogog ec’a yɛji l’ɛ́dŋ’ŋ.
40005040	Eke ɛgŋ oc im’ŋ jɛj ok ec’any af eke k’eb ŋ eci mob sus ɛm a, yɛ̀b’r l’éb ŋ e mob af ɛw a yɛji.
40005041	Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny’ŋ lɛc ɛm eke k’an es in ab sɔfu kaka fɛŋ a, àn ow eci sakp yony.
40005042	Ɛgŋ ek’am ibrm’ŋ ob a, ɔ̀ŋ’n; k’ùŋan ɛgŋ ɛrm suŋ."
40005043	"Irir low yec’a eke wɛl dad ab ee? B’ow erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ke ífn ŋ ec’ifnu.
40005044	Kɔ ɛm m’am dad ɔny: èrurir ɔny ec’efnu, ke ŋɔ́ŋan Nyam ɔŋn agŋ a eke b’ijr ɔny gbre a;
40005045	ow ɛm a b’ow eel ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a ec’ey, aŋke in e ligbn a b’afŋn ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl lele ów amamn kok ɛsɛl ab, ɛtŋ in ec’afr e mij a b’aan ów amamn kok ɛsɛl lele ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl ab.
40005046	Eke batŋ ow el agŋ a cɛ eke b’erur ɔny a b’erurir, ke bla k’ɔŋ ekur Nyam ogŋ ec’ob ap ee? Wus labm eb ɛsɛl yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ -li bi kok.
40005047	Ek’ow el ɔny lisijimɛl cɛ b’ɛsŋnin, ke low ligbɛl kokr ab ee? Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl yɛji, ɛbɛn cɛ -li bi kok.
40005048	Éel sɔbɔ ɛsɛ elel ek’ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a yɛji el sɔbɔ ab af."
40006001	"Ɛ̀wr ɛrm, kì kokr Nyam e lís e low fɛŋ agŋ ec’any af any ij sosiɛm eci. Eke b’ow kokr ɛbɛn, k’ow ɛŋnmn ɔny Ɛs Nyam ek’anŋ afr ec’ob ap a.
40006002	Ow sosiɛm, eke am ɔŋ ɔgbɔru os, k’ɛ̀w fuw ɛm agŋ k’ɛ́kn’ŋ; Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu lele ɛbɛrŋ ɛm ab, ɛbɛn eke ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl bi kok ana. -Li bi kok ɛbɛn ek’agŋ k’usr ɛl sos. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny ek’ɛl ec’ob ap a -n’ɛŋn ŋ̂.
40006003	Kɔ ŋ ec’a, ek’am ap ɔgbɔru ob ŋ e lidr abu ab ɛm, ŋ e nɛmn abu a k’ɛ́kn,
40006004	yec’ɛtŋ ke ob ap a él es lɔl ɛm, ke asŋ Nyam eke b’ɛkn es lɔl ɛm e low a, b’ow ap’ŋ ob.
40006005	Ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, kì kokr ɛsɛ ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl af; -li b’erur eke -li k’inym es Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a lele ɛbɛrŋ saw saw ab -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ fɛŋ ɛ́kn ɛl. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny, ɛl ec’ob ap a, -n’ɛŋn ŋ̂.
40006006	Kɔ ŋ, eke am erur e ki ŋɔŋn Nyam, ɛ̀y ŋ ec’akŋ abl êl ke yogŋ, ŋɔ́ŋn asŋ Nyam es lɔl ɛm, ke Asŋ Nyam eke b’ɛkn es lɔl ɛm e low a, b’ow ɔŋ’ŋ ŋ ec’ob ap a.
40006007	Eke bi ŋɔŋan Nyam, odad ebl nyam coco a cɛ k’ánŋ ɔny nɛnym k’ibn ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ec’ab af; -li bi tutr eke odad a b’ɔfu ɛl nɛnym a ke Nyam b’ow iri ɛl e ŋɔŋn e lebl a.
40006008	K’èbr ɛl e lakr a, aŋke ɔny Ɛs Nyam, gbuŋ ke íbrmn in low a, li b’ikŋ anym l’uw low yec’a ek’am erurir ab any.
40006009	Ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, dàdr ɛsrɛ: Ɛy Ɛs ek’anŋ afr, ke ŋ e nin lala a ɔ́ny ɛlum;
40006010	ke ŋ ec’ es ɛw a ów; ke wɛl kók ŋ ec’erur wus aŋa ɛsɛ afr ec’ab af.
40006011	Ɔ̀ŋ ɛy yɛfɛnyna ec’ob ij a ek’it a.
40006012	Àp ɛy low ŋuŋ a eke si kok a, ɛsɛ elel eke si b’ap agŋ a eke kok ɛy low ŋuŋ ab af.
40006013	Kì yɛb ɛy si k’ɛy ɛbm owi ɛm, kɔ ɔ̀ny oc ɛy es low ŋuŋ ec’abu ɛm; [aŋke akpo akpo fɛŋ, es ɛw, abusu ɔny lele anygbɛl ab él ŋ eci. Amɛn.]
40006014	Tasi ɛm a, ek’ocr low ŋuŋ ek’agŋ kok ɔny a apr, ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a yɛji b’ow oc ap ɔny.
40006015	Kɔ eke ocmn low ŋuŋ ek’ɛgŋ kok ɔny a apmn, ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a yɛji, k’ow ocm ɔny e low ŋuŋ e kokr a apm ɔny.
40006016	Ɛtŋ kin, eke am ɛnŋn nɛny, k’ɛ̀wr sɔrŋ e sos ɛsɛ elel eke ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl bi kok ab af; -li b’ɛw any ek’agŋ fɛŋ k’uw any eke -n’am ɛnŋ nɛny. M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm ek’ɛl e labm sɔg a -n’ɛŋn ŋ̂.
40006017	Kɔ ŋ ec’a, ek’am ɛnŋ nɛny, yɔ̀g any, ɛ̀fŋ sin,
40006018	yec’ɛtŋ k’agŋ k’úwm any ek’anŋ nɛny ɛnŋ ɛm. Asŋ sɔny coco ek’ɛgŋ ɛknm a cɛ b’ow ɛkn, ɛtŋ in eke li b’ɛkn low yec’a ek’am kok es lɔl ɛm a, li b’ow li sɔg’ŋ ow e labm."
40006019	"K’àsr ɔny ec’ob ɔny luku wus af aŋa eke sisŋ lele adagra ab bi ŋuŋn, ke elu yɛji b’ok akŋ iy mil a.
40006020	Kɔ àsr ɔny ec’ob ɔny luku afr. Yogŋ, ke ow el sisŋ, ke ow el adagra, -li k’ɔtumn -ni ŋuŋnmn; ɛtŋ yogŋ, elu k’ɔtum okm akŋ iym mil.
40006021	Tasi ɛm a, yogŋ eke ŋ ec’ob ɔny a anŋ a, yogŋ cɛ ŋ ec’ɛrm a yɛji b’ow anŋ."
40006022	"Anyamn el sos megl e kɛniɛ. Eke anyamn akpl’ŋ a, ŋ e sos megl a fɛŋ anŋ usuayl ɛm;
40006023	kɔ eke anyamn akplm’ŋ a, ke ŋ e sos megl a fɛŋ yɛji anŋ ncebn ɛm ŋ̂. Eke batŋ usuayl ek’anŋ’ŋ ɛm a el ncebn, ke ncebn ligbɛl marɛm ow b’ow el a!"
40006024	"Aduigŋ kaka k’ɔtum kokm es ɛw ɛsɛl yony e juma; oglog li b’ow l’ifn krɛkrɛ ec’a, ke l’érur yony ɛm ec’a; oglog li b’ow l’ij nɛny nyam nyam e lís, ke li k’ɛ́wm nyam e low any. Ɔtumn eke ki kokr Nyam e juma ke kokr jɛtɛ yɛji e juma.
40006025	Ow amua fɛŋ sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny: k’èbar ob ek’ijr [mij ek’ɛgŋn] ɛsŋn sel, oglog ɔny ec’ob sos ɛw e low ɛrmij. Kɔ sel ɛŋn akplm akam ob ij ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ sos megl apklm akam ob sos ɛw ee?
40006026	Lɛ̀ɛr ɔr: -l’ewlmn egb, -l’ubmn egb, -l’asmn egb luku egbel ɛm, gbɛkɔ ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a bi gbagbl ɛl! Kɔ ilmn an akamn ɔr amua ee?
40006027	Ɔny ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke in ec’ɛrmij ebr ɛm k’obn in ec’owr anŋ e sɛgŋ a tɛl ee?
40006028	Ɛtŋ kɔ bla ɛtŋ ob sos ɛw e low b’okr ɔny ɛrmij ee? Lɛ̀ɛr ɔgm e suw ɔdɔdɔ ec’elel eke b’ɛlil: -li kokmn juma, -l’olmn gbad.
40006029	Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny eke Salomɔ ek’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a yɛji, ɔnym ob sos ɛw ek’akpl akm ɔgm suw ɔdɔdɔ amua ɛm e nyam.
40006030	Nyam b’ɛw ɔgm e suw ek’anŋ yɛfɛnyna, ke efi wɛl b’ow oc ɔwl alm a ob sos. Sakp abi ɔny yɛji li k’ow l’ɛwm ɔny ob sos ɛbɛn ee? Ɔmn ufum ɔny es gbɛ!
40006031	K’èbar ɛrmij ki dadr k’ɛsrɛ: 'Bla obi si b’ow s’ij ee? Bla mij iy si b’ow s’ɛgŋ ee? Bla obi si b’ow s’ɛw sos ee?'
40006032	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl anake sakp sakp fɛŋ b’ɔl ów amua fɛŋ es a. Kɔ, ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a uw any eke ɔnyn ow ec’es abur.
40006033	Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a eci low íkŋ anym okr ɔny ɛrmij, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke n’am ibrm a yɛji, ke ow e likpr a fɛŋ Nyam b’ow igŋ af ɔŋ ɔny.
40006034	Ca k’èbar efi e low ɛrmij, efi b’ow ism in e low ab. Lɛgŋ lɛgŋ e gbre a bi bɛbmn lɛgŋ ab ab."
40007001	"Kì jɛjr agŋ e lís ec’ów k’okr, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny yɛji, Nyam kí jɛjm ɔny e lís ec’ów okm;
40007002	aŋke Nyam b’ow jɛj ɔny e lís e low ok ɛsɛ elel eke bi jɛjr agŋ ɛjeci e lís e low okr ab af, ɛtŋ akunda yec’ɛm eke b’ocr ɛbmnin ob ɔŋn agŋ ɛjec’a, ow ɛm cɛ Nyam yɛji b’ow oc ɛbmn ɔŋ ɔny.
40007003	Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am lɛr suwli ek’anŋ esŋ jim e nyamn ɛm a, ɛtŋ ɛ́wm likŋ ikpr ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm a e low ɛrm ee?
40007004	Oglog ayaf likŋ ikpr ɔtu ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm ke dad esŋ jim ɛsɛ: 'Yɛ̀b’m m’ɔny suwli na m’óc’ŋ es nyamn ɛm ee?'
40007005	Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs, ìkŋ anym ɔny likŋ ikpr ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm a oc es, ke sica b’ow ɛkn es sɛnyn sɛnyn ɔny esŋ jim e suwli ek’anŋ nyamn ɛm a oc es.
40007006	K’òcr Nyam ec’ob k’ɔŋn mɔwr bake -l’ɛwl -li gugŋ ɔny; k’òcr an gbɛl e miyob k’okr es sigbroko ec’any af bake -l’uyu af."
40007007	"Ìbrmn ob eke erurir a, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny. Ɔ̀ɔl ob eke erurir a es, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɛŋn’n. Ìcmn lisany abu, Nyam b’ow fig ɔny.
40007008	Kɔ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ibrm ob eke l’erur a, Nyam b’ɔŋ’n; ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɔl ob eke l’erur a es a, Nyam b’ɔŋ n’ɛŋn; ɛtŋ Nyam bi fig ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’icm’n lisany abu a.
40007009	Kɔ ɔny ɛm aŋa, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ek’in ec’iy b’ibrm’n futufutu ke l’óc lebn n’ɔŋ ow ee?
40007010	Oglog ow b’ibrm’n ɔcn, ke l’óc lorŋn n’ɔŋ ow ee?
40007011	Ɔny nana ek’eel agŋ eŋuŋ a, b’uwr ob amamn any ɔŋn ɔny ec’ey; ɛtŋ Nyam ek’anŋ afr a anake k’ow uwm any ɔɔm agŋ ek’am ibrm’n ów amamn ab ee?
40007012	Low fɛŋ ek’am erurir eke agŋ ki kok ɔŋ ɔny a, ɔny yɛji, kòkr ɛbɛn kpɛŋ ɔŋn agŋ ɛjec’a. Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl a e low yɛgm ek’ɛy ɔkm ana."
40007013	"Èbar lisany likekli eci! Aŋke lisany gbada lele ejagb gbada ab b’irmn ɛgŋ, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ b’ɛcr yogŋ eci.
40007014	Kɔ lisany eke b’ɛwl ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a ɛw likekli afŋn es, ɛtŋ ejagb eke b’ɛwl ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a ɛw kɔli nɔnɔ. Agŋ tɛl cɛ b’ɛcr yogŋ eci."
40007015	"Ɔ̀sur sos kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu e lís, -li b’itŋn -l’ɛw mɛcɛb e sos -l’ow ɔny ɛm, kɔ ɛl obi ɛm a, botimbo.
40007016	B’ow uwr ɛl any ɛl e low kok ɛm. Kɔ kati ɛm wɛl b’ɔw kɔkɔbri, ɛtŋ kɔ librebr ɛm, wɛl b’ɔw babm ee?
40007017	Likŋ mamn, ey amamn li b’ɔsu, ɛtŋ likŋ ŋuŋ ey eŋuŋ li b’ɔsu.
40007018	Likŋ mamn k’ɔtum ɔsum ey eŋuŋ, ɛtŋ likŋ ŋuŋ k’ɔtum ɔsum ey amamn.
40007019	Likŋ fɛŋ ek’ɔ́sum ey amamn a, wɛl b’ow ubr’r es oc ɔwl’l alm.
40007020	Ɛbɛn eke b’ow uwr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu any ɛl ec’ów kok ɛm ana."
40007021	"Ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛsŋ’m: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ' a, k’ow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, kɔ agŋ a cɛ eke b’ow kok ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr e ec’erur a.
40007022	Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow dad’m ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ ow elm ŋ e nin ɛm s’elm kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, ŋ e nin ɛm s’ogŋm abŋ eŋuŋ, ŋ e nin ɛm si kokm sakrowa nɔnɔ ee?'
40007023	Ɛtŋ m’ow mi dad ɛl any af m’ɛsɛ: 'Ìmn yogŋ a, ɔny ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl, lɛgŋ kaka m’uwm ɔny any!'
40007024	Na sosiɛm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’iri sodad amua eke mi dad, ke kok ɛsɛ elel eke l’irir ab af a, n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛwru nyam eke us in ec’êl lob af af.
40007025	Mij an ok wus, mij ewl mij fɛŋ iy igŋ êl a, lɛf ɛlul êl a lɛc ɛm, kɔ l’ɛym aŋke wɛl us’r lob af.
40007026	Kɔ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’iri sodad amua eke mi dad, ke kokm ɛsɛ elel eke l’irir ab af a, n’anŋ ɛsɛ nyamb ɛgŋ nyam ek’us in ec’êl a mrici af af.
40007027	Mij an ok wus, mij ewl mij fɛŋ iy igŋ êl a, lɛf ɛlul êl a ɛtŋ ow ɛy wus kikn es nimum."
40007028	Eke Jesu dad ów ɔm e sodad amua bake ow uwr a, agŋ a ek’am iri in e low yɛgm a, low am iti any in ec’elel eke n’am yɛgmn agŋ low a sosiɛm,
40007029	aŋke n’anm ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab af, kɔ n’am yɛgm wɛl low abusu ɔny ɛm.
40008001	Jesu anŋ lafɛny ab af us es, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam.
40008002	Kpɛkŋ kokobe ɛs nyam ow titm’n, ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke ŋ erur, ɔtu eke k’ ayal’m."
40008003	Jesu ɛgŋm abu es itŋn in ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "M’erur, àyl!" Kpɛkŋ kokobe a oc’r es lís ɛtŋ l’ayl.
40008004	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìri sɛnyn sɛnyn: kì dad low na k’ok ɛgŋ kaka. Gbɛkɔ ìm yɛgm egb waw ɛs a sos, ke wáw egb a ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ol a ibrm ab af ɛsɛ daŋku ij af."
40008005	Wanci ab af eke Jesu am ɛy Kapɛrnayum a, Rom e srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen eci anym ɛs nyam ow titm’n ɛtŋ am ŋɔŋn’n
40008006	dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛm e juma kok ɛs a bubm es ɛru es akŋ, n’am ij gbre nɔnɔ."
40008007	Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "M’ím m’ewlm’n ee?"
40008008	Gbɛkɔ anym ɛs a dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’itm eke k’ɛy ɛm e gbugŋ a. Kɔ dàd odad ebl nyam cɛ ke kpɛkŋ ɛm e juma kok ɛs a éwl.
40008009	Ɛm obi yɛji, m’anŋ abusu ɛsɛl ekpekp ec’ew, ɛtŋ m’ɔny srɔda eyŋ eke m’ɛw es. Eke mi bi dad nyam m’ɛsɛ: 'Ìm!', kpɛkŋ li b’im; ɛtŋ eke mi bi dad ɛjeci nyam m’ɛsɛ: 'Òw!', kpɛkŋ li b’ow; ɛtŋ eke mi bi dad ɛm ec’aduigŋ a m’ɛsɛ: 'Kòk low na!', kpɛkŋ li bi kok."
40008010	Eke Jesu iri sodad amua a, l’erur anym ɛs a e low ɛtŋ n’am dad agŋ a ek’am us’r jam a l’ɛsɛ: "M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm, m’ɛŋnm ɔmn ɛs nɛnɛ kaka Israɛl eyŋ ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
40008011	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow anŋ yogŋ eke ligbn b’anŋ igb lele yogŋ eke ligbn b’ɛru es ab ow Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a, -l’ok es Abraham, Isak, lele Jakɔb ab ob ij usu a.
40008012	Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’it eke blel ɛŋn Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a, wɛl b’ow ogŋ ok ɛl gbeŋ ncebn ab ɛm, yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a."
40008013	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad anym ɛs a ninɛ: "Ìm gbugŋ, yec’a ek’ŋ ec’ɔmn a am erur a, b’ow ɛŋn." Ɛtŋ anym ɛs a e juma kok ɛs a ewl wanci ab af cɛ.
40008014	Ca Jesu im Piɛr ec’akŋ a, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn Piɛr ɛy lis eke sos am ɛtu es ɛru es.
40008015	Jesu itŋn yɔw a ec’abu a abu ɛtŋ lɛfr ɔl a oc’r es lís; l’igb ɛtŋ n’am kok Jesu e lís e low.
40008016	Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, wɛl ot agŋ nɔnɔ eke abŋ eŋuŋ am ijr gbre a is Jesu. In ec’odad ebl ɛm cɛ l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a ɛtŋ l’ewlm ɔ́lu a fɛŋ.
40008017	Li kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi ec’odad na eke dad a íy nɛny: L’eb ɛy e sos dudu a ɛtŋ l’okm ɛy sel es ɛy ec’ɔl ɛm.
40008018	Eke Jesu b’ɛkn bieku a eke did ɛlul il ɛm a, l’ibrm eke in e jam ɛsɛl a k’ubr mij lekpl a e jam in ab.
40008019	Ol e low yɛgm ɛs nyam ɛri ow ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ow m’us’ŋ jam usu fɛŋ eke b’ow im a."
40008020	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛkrɛ ɔny ɛl ec’ɔmu wus ɛm eke b’ɛru ɛm, ɔr yɛji ɔny ɛl e mel; kɔ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔnym usu nuŋ nyam ek’ɔtu ek’ɛru es eb sel."
40008021	Ɛgŋ ɛjeci, in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ŋ’m abusu m’ím m’oc ɛm ɛs es gbuŋ ke m’ów."
40008022	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam ke yɛ́b agŋ a ek’uw abŋ ɛm a, ót ɛl ec’agŋ a ek’uw ab es."
40008023	Sica Jesu ɛy mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm ɛtŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a igŋ’n ab im.
40008024	Kpru ɛm, lidgbegb ligbɛl am ɛlu mij lekpl ab af, toŋ batŋ mra am ɔl eke k’ubur mijɛtŋ ab es; kɔ Jesu gbɛ, n’am ɛru mɛmn.
40008025	Jam ɛsɛl a ɛri ow titm’n ɛtŋ am uwr’r dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, èb ɛy, kɔ s’am uw!"
40008026	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ erŋn am ɔny ɔny ee? Ɔmn ufum ɔny es tasi!" L’igb, ɛtŋ lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm, li dad lidgbegb a lele mra ab ab eke k’irm es, ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ irm es tiŋ.
40008027	Agŋ a fɛŋ low iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ ikŋ na eke lidgbegb lele mra ab b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ab ee?"
40008028	Eke Jesu ubr mij lekpl a e jam, Gadareni eyŋ eci wus ab af a, agŋ yony anŋ suwɔmu ec’araŋn ok ɔkm ɛtŋ am ow ɔbr’r. Abŋ eŋuŋ anŋ agŋ amua ɛm, ɛtŋ -li b’ɔr abr nɔnɔ. Ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɔ́tum ɛcrm ebr ab af eci.
40008029	Kpɛkŋ abŋ eŋuŋ ɛsɛl a am ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Nyam ec’Iy, kɔ bla lowi anŋ ɛy araŋn ee? Kɔ ɛy e gbre ijr ec’ow gbuŋ ke lɛgŋ a ów ee?"
40008030	Akpoj ɛm a, gbroko nɔnɔ anŋ ek’am ɔl ɛl ec’ob ij es ɛc.
40008031	Abŋ eŋuŋ a am ŋɔŋn Jesu ɛsɛ: "Ek’erur eke k’ogŋ ɛy a, ógŋ ɛy s’ok sigbroko amua ɛm."
40008032	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn." -L’ok ɔkm wɛl ɛm -n’im -l’ir sigbroko ab ɛm. Kpɛkŋ gbroko a fɛŋ anŋ lafɛny ab af uru es ok mij lekpl ab ɛm uw.
40008033	Sigbroko ɔsu ɛsɛl a uru es im baŋn ɔb low a ek’ɛy a ec’amani; -li dad abŋ eŋuŋ ɛsɛl yony a yɛji ec’odad.
40008034	Ow sosiɛm, baŋn a ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ok ɔkm im am ɛkn Jesu; eke -l’ɛkan ow a, -ni ŋɔŋn ow ek’ow k’ŋgboŋ ɛl eci wus ab af.
40009001	Jesu ɛy mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛwl ubr mij lekpl a im baŋn.
40009002	Agŋ oc sos es wɛw ɛs nyam ek’anŋ faja ɛm is’r. Eke Jesu b’ɛkn agŋ a ec’ɔmn a, li dad sos es wɛw ɛs a ninɛ: "Ɛm jim, ɛrmij k’ók’ŋ! M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ!"
40009003	Ow sosiɛm, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb am dad ɛl obi ɛm ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na am ocr in sosi Nyam! N’am ɔbr Nyam any!"
40009004	Eke Jesu uw ɛl e tutr ab any a, li dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɔnyn sow tutr eŋuŋ amua ee?
40009005	Kɔ bogŋ ec’anake ɛw fuɛfuɛ eke wɛl ki dad sos es wɛw ɛs ab ee? 'M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ,' oglog wɛl dád’r ɛsɛ: 'Ìgb ke án es ee'?
40009006	Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke k’uwr low na any: wus af aŋa, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔny abusu eke k’oc sikpl ap." Ɛtŋ sica li dad sos es wɛw ɛs a ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc ŋ e eci faja a eb ejagb im gbugŋ!"
40009007	Ɛtŋ sos es wɛw ɛs a igb aam gbugŋ.
40009008	Eke bieku a b’ɛkn low na a, ow am ɔny ɛl erŋn ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Nyam, abusu ikŋ na eke n’ɔŋ agŋ a sosiɛm.
40009009	Eke Jesu igb yogŋ aam a, in ec’ɛc ɛm a, l’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Matie eke sig es wus labm eb usu. Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam." Ɛtŋ l’igb l’us ow jam.
40009010	Sica eke Jesu am ij ob Matie ec’akŋ a, wus labm eb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ lele sikpl ɛsɛl ɛjec’ab ow ɛŋn Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ɛtŋ -l’okr af -n’am ij ob.
40009011	Farisiɛl ɛkn low na ɛtŋ am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ɔny eci low yɛgm ɛs a am ij ob agŋ amua ab ee?"
40009012	Jesu iri ɛl lebl ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ a eke anŋ sos tuɔtuɔ ɛm a, ibram sos kok ɛs, kɔ ɔ́lu a anake ibrm sos kok ɛs a.
40009013	Ìmn ke wéwar Nyam e sodad amua eke dad a: Mi b’erur ɛrm mamn owi m’akm ndey ɛm e segb waw. Tasi ɛm a, m’owm eke mi k’ɛsŋ agŋ eke b’ubr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl a, kɔ m’ow eke mi k’ɛsŋ sikpl ɛsɛl."
40009014	Ow e jam a, Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs eci jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ sakp nɔnɔ ɛy lele Farisiɛl ab si b’ ɛnŋ nɛny ɛtŋ ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a ɛ́nŋm ee?"
40009015	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Am tutar ek’agŋ lawlɛl eke wɛl ɛsŋ mɛbi ec’es gbɛgbl ɛm a ɔtu eke k’anŋ sos es ɔw ɛm eke yɔw ɛ́c a anŋ ɛl ab ee? Njaŋ! Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ am ow eke wɛl b’ow ɔny yɔw ɛ́c a oc es ɛl ec’araŋn, ke sica -n’ɛnŋ nɛny gɔŋ.
40009016	Ɛgŋ ócm gbad owr lele gbad sig ab ɔbarm gigŋm; aŋke gbad owr a b’ɔny gbad sig a agbr ɛm, ɛtŋ gbad a ec’ɛm agbr a b’ow agb nɔnɔ.
40009017	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ócm mar owr okm marel sig ɛm; eke kok ɛbɛn a, mar owr a b’ow ɔny marel sig a ɔb es; mar a b’ow ok es ɛtŋ marel a b’ow uŋ. Tasi ɛm a, mar owr, marel owr ɛm wɛl b’ok’r ɛtŋ mar a lele marel ab ab b’anŋ."
40009018	Eke Jesu am dad ɛl sodad amua a, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam ow. L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm jɔw uw wanci na af cɛ; gbɛkɔ òw itŋn in abu, li b’ow l’igb."
40009019	Jesu lele in eci jam ɛsɛl ab ab igb us’r jam.
40009020	Kpɛkŋ kin yɔw nyam eke b’ub abu ke mebl a ɛ́dŋm es toŋ ow ij akpo lɛw yony. L’ɛcr jam jam eci l’ow li titm Jesu ɛtŋ l’itŋn ow e mob sus ɛm a ec’ɛnyɛmbri a abu,
40009021	aŋke n’am dadr in sosi l’ɛsɛ: "Blel mi k’itŋn in e mob sus ɛm a abu cɛ, ke m’ewl ŋ̂."
40009022	Jesu ɛwl mɛny lɛr’r ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm jɔw, ɛrmij k’òk’ŋ, ŋ ec’ɔmn a ewlm’ŋ!" Ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ yɔw a ewl.
40009023	Sica Jesu im es ɛw ɛs a ec’akŋ a. Eke li b’ok yogŋ a, l’ɛkn kete afl ɛsɛl eke bɛbm sos ɛgŋ es oc eci lele dedeku a ek’am ɔg ab ab,
40009024	ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Òkr ɔkm aŋa, dedyɔwli a, l’uwm, kɔ mɛmn n’am ɛru." Dedeku a am kokr Jesu miyɛr.
40009025	Eke wɛl ogŋ agŋ a ok gbeŋ a, Jesu ɛy ojli ɛm a, n’ɔny dedyɔwli a abu ɛtŋ ow igb.
40009026	Amani a eb es wus ab af nimum.
40009027	Sica eke Jesu igb yogŋ aam a, ány eflu yony am us’r jam. -N’am ɔgr ow -l’ɛsɛ: "David e lilaw, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
40009028	Eke Jesu im ɛy gbugŋ a, ány eflu a im titm’n ɛtŋ n’am ibrm wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɔnyn ɔmn eke m’ɔtu eke mi k’ewlm ɔny ee?" -Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔtu eke k’ewlm ɛy."
40009029	Ɛtŋ Jesu itŋn ɛl anyamn abu ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Nyam ɔ́ŋ ɔny low a ek’am ekur ɔmn ɛm a!"
40009030	Ɛtŋ -n’am ɛkn es. Jesu dad ɛl lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Kì kokr ɛgŋ kaka k’úw any."
40009031	Gbɛkɔ ány eflu a im, ɛtŋ wus a nimum af -n’am dad Jesu ec’odad.
40009032	Eke ány eflu a b’im a, kpɛkŋ wɛl oc ɛbrm nyam ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ anŋ ɛm is Jesu.
40009033	Sica eke Jesu ogŋ abŋ ikŋ na a, ɛbrm a am dad odad. Bieku a low iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Israɛl wus af aŋa, s’ɛknm low nɛnɛ lɛgŋ kaka."
40009034	Gbɛkɔ Farisiɛl a gbɛ am dad ɛsɛ: " Abŋ eŋuŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a anake b’ɔŋ’n abusu l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ amua a."
40009035	Jesu am ɛc baŋn ɛgbɛl ɛm lele baŋn ekekey ɛm ab. N’am yɛgm agŋ low ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, n’am ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba ɛtŋ n’am ewlm ɔ́lu a ɛl ec’ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛl e dudu fɛŋ ab.
40009036	Agŋ dedeku a eke n’am ɛkn a e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ afŋn in es, aŋke agŋ amua sos kikn es, sos ɔw es ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ek’ɔnym ɔsu ɛs af.
40009037	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Egb ub a ufu es nɔnɔ, kɔ juma kok ɛsɛl ɛnym.
40009038	Ìbrmn egb ɔgm ɛs a ke l’ɛ́rm juma kok ɛsɛl nɔnɔ im in ec’egb ub ab ɛm."
40010001	Jesu ɛsŋ in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu eke wɛl k’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ, ewlm ɔ́lu lele ɛl eci ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛl eci dudu fɛŋ ab.
40010002	Kin ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ec’en: krɛkrɛ ɛm a, Simɔ eke wɛl igŋ nin af Piɛr, lele lisijim Andre ab; Jak lele lisijim Jan ab, agŋ a yony mum Sebede ec’ey;
40010003	Filip, Bartelemi, Toma lele Matie ek’el wus labm eb ɛs; Tade lele Alfe jim Jak ab;
40010004	Simɔ ɛb dogŋn ɛs lele Judas Iskariɔt ek’ɔl Jesu ij ab ab.
40010005	Sica Jesu ɛrm agŋ lɛw yony amua ɛtŋ am ijl ɛl nɛny dad ɛsɛ: "K’ìmn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci wus af, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny k’ɛ̀yr Samari eci baŋn fɛŋ ɛm yɛji.
40010006	Kɔ ìmn Israɛl ec’agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ek’irm af ogŋ.
40010007	Ejagb us ɛm a, ɔ̀br Amani a dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Afr eci es ɛw a ow titm!'
40010008	Èwlmn ɔ́lu, ìgbmn agŋ luw ɛm, èwlmn kokobe ɛsɛl ayl, ògŋn abŋ eŋuŋ. Ɔfr ɛm ɛŋan, ɛl yɛji ɔ̀ŋn ɛl ɔfr ɛm.
40010009	K’òcr sika, os, deŋ kaka fɛŋ k’ánŋ ɔny ekpr ɛm.
40010010	K’òcr usu im ec’ekpr, k’òcr kotu yony, cɔkrukpɔ lele kpama ab. Tasi ɛm a, ob kok ɛs it ob ij ɔŋ.
40010011	Eke okr ɛb nyam ɛm, ìbrmn ɛŋan ɛgŋ ek’erur eke k’eb ɔny a, ke ánŋn ɛgŋ ikŋ na ogŋ toŋ ke ókr ɔkm yogŋ.
40010012	Eke b’okr akŋ nyam, ɛ̀sŋnin ɛl ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛrm es ɛy ánŋ ɔny ab.'
40010013	Eke akŋ a ec’agŋ a eb ɔny a, ɔny ec’ɛrm es ɛy a b’ow anŋ ɛl ab; kɔ eke -l’ebm ɔny a, ke ɔny ec’ɛrm es ɛy a ɛ́wl ow ɔny ab.
40010014	Ek’akŋ nyam oglog ɛb nyam ɛm wɛl ɛgŋm ebm ɔny oglog irim ɔny ec’odad a, òkr ɔkm yogŋ ke cícr ɔny ec’akr sɛc a okr ɛl es.
40010015	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Sodɔm lele Gomɔr ab e low ŋuŋ e wɛl ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ tɛl akm ɛb na ec’agŋ ec’a."
40010016	"Kin m’am m’ɛrm ɔny ɛsɛ mɛcɛb af sibotimbo ec’araŋn. Ɛ̀war ɛsɛ morŋn af, ke ánŋn frɔrɔ ɛsɛ kel af.
40010017	Ɔ̀sur sos kɔ agŋ b’ow ot im ɔny jɛj ok ec’any af ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɔr ɔny say ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu.
40010018	Ɛm sosiɛm, wɛl b’ow ot im ɔny es ɛw ɛsɛl lele ɛ́b ebu ab ec’any af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl lele Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ab ec’any af íjr daŋku.
40010019	Lɛgŋ eke wɛl b’ow ot im ɔny jɛj ok ec’any af a, odad yec’a eke ki dadr a, lele elel eke ki dadr ab ab ec’ɛrmij k’ók ɔny; wanci ab af cɛ Nyam b’ow dad ɔny sodad a eke ki dadr a.
40010020	Sodad a k’ow anm ɔny ɛm owm, kɔ ɔny Ɛs Nyam ec’Abŋ a b’ow dad odad ɔŋ ɔny.
40010021	Agŋ lisijimɛl b’ow ot ɛl lisijimɛl lokm ow ibi eci; ey ɛsɛl yɛji b’ow kok ɛbɛn ɛl ec’ey e lís, ey yɛji b’ow ɔbr ɛl ɛsɛl any, ɔŋ wɛl ibi ɛl.
40010022	Ɛm sosiɛm agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow ifn ɔny; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow inym es kikri toŋ ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn sel.
40010023	Eke wɛl am ijr ɔny gbre ɛb nyam ɛm a, òkr ɔkm imn ɛb ɛjec’ɛm. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: k’ow ɛcmn Israɛl ec’ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm uwrm ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow.
40010024	Low wewr ɛs kaka ágbm akam in e low yɛgm ɛs; ɛtŋ juma kok ɛs kaka ágbm akam in ec’es ɛw.
40010025	Ow it eke low wewr ɛs k’anŋ ɛsɛ in e low yɛgm ɛs ab af, ke juma kok ɛs yɛji ánŋ ɛsɛ in ec’es ɛw ɛs ab af. Eke wɛl ɛsŋ akŋ ɛs a Bɛlsebul, ke sakp abi wɛl k’ow wɛwrm akŋ a ec’agŋ ab ee?
40010026	Ow sosiɛm k’ùrur agŋ amua. Kɔ low fɛŋ eke lɔl es a b’ow ɛy ɔkm; ɛtŋ low fɛŋ ek’el asre ɛm ec’a, wɛl b’ow uw any.
40010027	Low yec’eke mi dad ɔny saw ɛm a, dàdr agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af; ke ow eke irir asre ut ɛm a, úyur êl luw af ɛlul lebl agŋ iri.
40010028	K’ùrur agŋ a eke b’ibi sos megl ke ɔ́tum ibim ɛgŋ e liy a; kɔ ùrur Nyam ek’ɔny abusu ek’ibi sos megl lele liy ab gbre ij usu a.
40010029	Kɔ wɛl ɔ́lm yay yony ijm lɛl nyam ee? Ɛbɛn yɛji, yony ab ɛm e nyam ɛ́ym wus ek’ow elm Nyam ec’erur.
40010030	Ɔny ec’a, ɔny e sin nuŋ bɔbɔ yɛji Nyam awl uw any.
40010031	K’ùrur erŋn: ɔny, iil an nɔnɔ akmn siyay nɔnɔ!"
40010032	"Eke ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af ek’in el ɛm eci, ɛm yɛji, ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr ec’any af, m’ow mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'L’el ɛm eci.'
40010033	Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af ek’in uwm im any, ɛbɛn ɛm yɛji, ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr ec’any af a m’ow mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm’n any.' "
40010034	"K’ɔ̀nyn ɔmn eke m’is ɛrm es ɛy wus af aŋa. M’owm eke mi k’is ɛrm es ɛy, kɔ ar owi.
40010035	Tasi ɛm a, m’ow eke mi k’ɔbar ɛgŋ lele ɛs ab nuŋ, yɔwli lele lis ab, yɔw eke wɛl ɛbi ow lele ɛc lis ab.
40010036	Ifanin b’ow anŋ akŋ nyam coco ec’agŋ ec’araŋn.
40010037	Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur ɛs oglog lis akm’m a, itm eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs; ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur jim oglog jɔw akm’m a, in yɛji itm eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs.
40010038	Ɛgŋ ek’abum in obi ec’olikŋ usm im jam a, itm eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs.
40010039	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɔsu in e sel a, li b’ow l’irmn; kɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow irmn in e sel a ɛm sosiɛm a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn."
40010040	"Ɛgŋ ek’eb ɔny a, eb’m; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’eb’m a, eb Nyam ek’ɛrm’m a.
40010041	Ɛgŋ ek’eb kokoba ɔb ɛs, Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs ek’ow el a sosiɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn ob ap ek’el Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’eb low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs ek’ɛgŋ na el Nyam ec’any af a sosiɛm a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn ob ap a ek’el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl ec’a.
40010042	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow aw mij dra kpɔk nyam cɛ ɔŋ ɛm e jam ɛsɛl ey amua ɛm e nyam, ɛm e jam us ɛs eke iy a el a sosiɛm a, ɛgŋ ikŋ na b’ow ɛŋn in ec’ob ap."
40011001	Eke sica Jesu dad ów ɔm e sodad amua ok in jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a bake ow uwr a, l’igb yogŋ, n’im eke li ki yɛgm agŋ low ke li dád Nyam ec’odad wus ab af e sɛb ab ɛm.
40011002	Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ek’anŋ sobel ɛm a, iri wɛl dad Krist ec’ów eke am kok. L’ɛrm in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm e bɛb Jesu ogŋ
40011003	eke -li k’ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, Mesi a eke in k’ow ab ana, oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci ɛl k’eku ee?"
40011004	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn dadr Jan low yec’a ek’am irir ke am ɛkan a:
40011005	ány eflu am ɛkn es, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl am an es, kokobe ɛsɛl yɛji am ewl, ɔru ablu yɛji am iri ów, agŋ ek’uw a yɛji am igb ɛtŋ wɛl am ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba ok ɔgbɔru.
40011006	Ehe él ɛgŋ a eke k’ow irmnm in ec’ɔmn eke n’ɔny ɛm ɛm a eci."
40011007	Kpɛkŋ eke Jan eci jam ɛsɛl a im a, Jesu oc Jan e lís e low am ibrm dedeku a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ loj yogŋ bla imn eke k’ɛkan ee? Kɔ ɛgŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ anany eke lɛf am ɔny mumu af ee? Njaŋ!
40011008	Ca eke ow elm ɛbɛn a, ke bla im ɛkan ee? Ɛgŋ eke sus mob sɛnyn ee? Njaŋ, agŋ eke bi sus mob sɛnyn sɛnyn a, ɛ́b ebu e gbugŋ -li b’anŋ.
40011009	Ɛtŋ ca bla tasi im ɛkan ee? Kɔ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ee? Ɛɛ, m’am dad ɔny ek’ɛgŋ a ek’ɛkan a agb akm kokoba ɔb ɛs;
40011010	aŋke Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad Jan e lís e low ninɛ: Kin, m’am ɔŋ ɛm ec’ɛrm ɛs ikŋ’ŋ anym kók ŋ ec’ejagb a.
40011011	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ a eke wɛl ew ab ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka anm agbm akam Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs; gbɛkɔ Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ a ek’anŋ a e likekli a agb akm Jan.
40011012	Lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke Jan am ɔb Amani a toŋ ke k’it yɛfɛnyna a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a e low am ɛy lɛc, ɛtŋ ów gaŋgaŋ ɛsɛl a am ɔl ek’oc lɛc ɛm.
40011013	Toŋ k’igŋ Jan e lɛgŋ ɛm a, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ lele Mois ec’ ol ab ab ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a ec’amani.
40011014	Ɛtŋ ek’erurir ek’ubr’m nawrɛ, ke Jan anake el Eli a eke k’ɛwl ow a.
40011015	Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, k’írir sɛnyn sɛnyn.
40011016	Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ m’ɔtu eke mi k’oc mi bɛbmn yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ab ab ee? -L’ot etuey ek’anŋ an ɔl usu es, ke bɛb am dad ɛjeci lebl gege ɛm ɛsɛ:
40011017	'S’afl kete ɛj ub eci s’ok ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn eke k’ubr ɛj! S’ɛgŋ sɔrŋ ɛj s’ok ɔny ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn okmn sabu ɛrmni ikŋmn ɔŋn!'
40011018	Kin, Jan ek’ow a, li b’ɛnŋ nɛny, l’ɛ́gŋm mar, ɛtŋ agŋ bi dad ek’ow’n ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ.
40011019	Sica ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ek’ow a, li b’ij ob, li b’ɛgŋ mar, ɛtŋ agŋ bi dad ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na in el ob iju, mar ɛgŋu, wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab e lawl. Gbɛkɔ Nyam eci sɛwr a b’ulm es in ec’ów a ec’ɔkm ok ɛm."
40011020	Ɛmɛny Jesu am ɛnym sɛb a eke wɛl ɛm li kok in e sakrowa ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ a abr, aŋke ɛb eyŋ a itŋnm ɛrm ɛm. Li dad ninɛ:
40011021	"Korasin ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Bɛtsayida ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke sakrowa a eke wɛl kok ɔny ogŋ a, blel ow el Tir lele Sidɔn ab wɛl kok ana, ke blel -l’ɛw sɔrŋ e sos, -li kpakp milakŋ, -l’ok fandi, ɛrm ɛm itŋn eci.
40011022	Na sosiɛm m’am dad ɔny jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Tir lele Sidɔn ab e low ŋuŋ eke Nyam ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ akm ɔny ec’a.
40011023	Ɛtŋ ŋ Kapɛrnayum, am tutr eke any ij ɛm b’ow agb toŋ bake ím titm afr ee? Njaŋ, b’ow is es toŋ bake igŋ ɔŋnes baŋn; aŋke sakrowa a eke wɛl kok ŋ ogŋ a, blel Sodɔm ana, ke ɛb ikŋ na ánŋ yɛfɛnyna yɛji.
40011024	Na sosiɛm m’am dad’ŋ, jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Sodɔm e low ŋuŋ eke wɛl ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ tɛl akm ŋ ec’a."
40011025	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, ŋ ek’el afr lele wus ab ec’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a, m’am ɛlu’ŋ bia, ów a ek’ot lɔl es, ɛsɛwru lele nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ab ec’any af, ke yɛgm etuey uw any a eci.
40011026	Ɛɛ! Ɛm Ɛs erur eke ow k’el ɛbɛn.
40011027	Ɛm Ɛs ocr in sosi nimum ɛlul’m abu ɛm. Ɛgŋ kaka uwm Iy ab any eke ow elm Ɛs sɔny coco cɛ, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka uwm Ɛs any eke ow elm Iy a sɔny coco lele agŋ a eke Iy a erur eke k’ɛlu ɔkm yɛgm ab ab.
40011028	Ɔny fɛŋ ek’ɛrɛkp am leg leg ɔny a òwr ɛm ogŋ, m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
40011029	Ɛ̀gŋn ɛm e low ɛbr, ke yɛ́br mi yɛgm ɔny low aŋke m’el ɛrm frɔrɔ, ɛrm nini ɛs; ow ɛm b’ow ɛŋan ɔny obi ec’ɛrm es ɛy.
40011030	Ɛm e low a eke m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny a ec’ɔsu a, ɛw fuɛfuɛ, ɛtŋ ɛrɛkp eke m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny a ɛwm leg leg."
40012001	Eke sɛgŋ bɛb ɛc a, nɛnɛgŋ nyam, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab am ɛcr segb ɔgm eci. Jam ɛsɛl a namn am ɔny ɛtŋ am bubm egbey a ij.
40012002	Eke Farisiɛl b’ɛkn a, -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ìs any ɛkn, ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a am kok low eke ɛy ec’ol a ɔɔm abusu eke wɛl ki kok nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ!"
40012003	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Awlmn low a eke ɛb ebu David in obi in obi lele in ec’agŋ ab ab kok lɛgŋ nyam eke namn am ɔny ɛl ab ee?
40012004	L’ɛy Nyamel ɛm, ɛtŋ in ec’agŋ ab ab -l’ij egb waw e futufutu a; ke -n’ɔnym ow ec’ij ec’abusu kaka. Ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke egb waw ɛsɛl sɔny coco k’ij.
40012005	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny awlmn Mois ec’ ol ab ɛm eke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ, egb waw ɛsɛl ek’ɔny juma Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a, ɔ́sum nɛnɛgŋ ec’ol a, ke ow élm ɛl ec’ów ɔbr ab ee?
40012006	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny ek’aŋa low nyam anŋ ek’ɔny any akm Nyamel gbɛl a!
40012007	Blel uwr Nyam Lɛl a e sodad amua ek’am dad ɛsɛ: mi b’erur ɛrm mamn owi m’akm ndey ɛm e segb waw e nyandrɛ any tasi ana, ke agŋ amua ek’ɛknm low a, blel ɔbmn ɛl low.
40012008	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy anake el nɛnɛgŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a."
40012009	Eke Jesu ŋgboŋ yogŋ im ɛy ɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a,
40012010	ɛgŋ nyam ek’abu wɛw es anŋ yogŋ. Agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a erur eke k’ok Jesu ów af; ow sosiɛm -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ewlm ɛgŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ee?"
40012011	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny licɛb nyam coco ɛtŋ licɛb a ɛy nɔmu croŋ ɛm nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, li k’ow n’iim n’ɔnym l’ocm ow es ee?
40012012	Ɛgŋ il an akm licɛb! Ow sosiɛm ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl ki kok low mamn ɔŋ ɛgŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ."
40012013	Jesu dad ɛgŋ a ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋm abu es." L’ɛgŋm abu a es ɛtŋ ow ɛwl akpl ɛsɛ yec’ab af.
40012014	Ow ɔŋ Farisiɛl a ok ɔkm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, -n’im -n’am as luku -l’ɔl elel eke -li k’ɔnyn Jesu bake -l’ibi ow.
40012015	Eke Jesu iri in e luw ec’amani a, n’ŋgboŋ yogŋ ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam. N’am ewlm ɔ́lu a fɛŋ,
40012016	ɛtŋ n’am ijl wɛl nɛny l’ɛwar eke wɛl k’ulam’n es.
40012017	Li kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi eci sodad amua eke dad a íy nɛny:
40012018	Nyam dad ninɛ: "Kin ɛm e libɔwi eke mi sɔsum m’oc ke m’ɔny in ec’erur ɛtŋ m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn m’ɛlu’l ɛm. M’ow m’ɛlu’l ɛm ec’Abŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ɛwar ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ɛm e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a.
40012019	Li k’ow l’atarm ów es ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab ɛtŋ li k’ow l’ɛlum lebl, wɛl k’ow irim’n lebl ɛbɛrŋ ɛm.
40012020	Anany ek’ibn es a, li k’ow n’ɔnym l’ubm es. Kɛniɛ ek’in ec’al a am irm es a, li k’ow n’ɔnym l’irmnm es. Li b’ow li kok ɛbɛn toŋ ke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam éb es usu a fɛŋ;
40012021	Ɛtŋ wus na e ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ b’ow oc ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɛlu’l ɛm."
40012022	Sica ɛmɛny wɛl oc any eflu nyam eke el ɛbrm yɛji, abŋ eŋuŋ ek’anŋ’n ɛm a sosiɛm is Jesu. Jesu ewlm ɛgŋ a; ow ɔŋ n’am dad ów ɛtŋ n’am ɛkn es yɛji.
40012023	Agŋ a fɛŋ low iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ sɔŋ Jesu na David eci lilaw li k’el ee?"
40012024	Eke Farisiɛl iri odad na a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ aŋke ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs Bɛlsebul anake am ɔŋ’n abusu a."
40012025	Jesu uw ɛl e sow tutr ab any ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Es ɛw fɛŋ eke in ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm a b’uŋ. Ɛb fɛŋ, oglog akŋ fɛŋ ek’in ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm a, b’uŋ.
40012026	Eke sica Satan am ogŋ abŋ ek’el Satan eci, ke in sosi n’am ogŋn ar a; kɔ in ec’es ɛw a ɔtu eke k’anŋ ee?
40012027	Am ubr eke m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ Bɛlsebul ec’abusu ɛm; ɛtŋ ɔny agŋiyɛl ec’a eke b’ogŋ a, kɔ bwo b’ɔŋ ɛl abusu ee? Ɛl obi ɛl obi -n’am yɛgm eke ɔnymn low ij!
40012028	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ec’Abŋ ɛm anake m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a; ow am yɛgm eke Nyam ec’ es ɛw a ow ɔny ec’araŋn ŋ̂.
40012029	Eke wɛl erur eke k’im ɛy lɛc ɛs nyam ec’akŋ iy’r mil a, ow it ke wɛl íkŋ anym ɔny awŋ’n gbuŋ ke wɛl ɔ́tu ɛy in ec’akŋ ot in eci mob a fɛŋ.
40012030	Ɛgŋ ek’anm ɛm ab a, el ɛm ec’ifnu, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke ɛ́luam im abu s’asm Nyam ec’ey luku a, am ɔmun ɛl es.
40012031	Na sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny: wɛl ɔtu eke k’oc agŋ e sikpl owi lele wɛwr owi eke dad ab ab a ap ɛl; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok Abŋ Lala af a, Nyam k’ow ocm apm’n.
40012032	Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok ɛgŋ ec’ Iy af a, Nyam b’ow oc ap’r; kɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok Abŋ Lala af a, ke ow él yɛfɛnyna, ke ow él efi, Nyam k’ow ocm apm’n."
40012033	"Kòkr likŋ akpl, in ec’ey a yɛji b’ow akpl; kòkr likŋ él likŋ ŋuŋ, in ec’ey a yɛji k’ow akplm, aŋke wɛl b’uw likŋ fɛŋ any in ec’ey ɔsu ab ɛm.
40012034	Ɔny morŋn, ayaf ɔtur eke ki dadr ów amamn, ɔny ek’eel agŋ eŋuŋ ab ee? Low yec’a ek’iy ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ a anake nɛny bi dad ɛlu ɔkm a.
40012035	Ɛgŋ mamn, in ɛm ec’ów amamn eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ŋuŋ, in ɛm ec’ów eŋuŋ eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a.
40012036	M’am dad ɔny eke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, sodad eke agŋ dad ɛsɛ odad ɔfr ɔfr af a, -li b’ow -l’awl;
40012037	aŋke ŋ ec’odad ebl ɛm wɛl b’ow jɛj ŋ e low ok ɛgŋ’ŋ low oglog ɔb’ŋ low."
40012038	Ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb lele Farisiɛl bɛb ab am dad Jesu ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, s’am erur eke k’ɛlu mɛny ɛwr nyam ɔkm yɛgm ɛy."
40012039	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ amua ek’ijm nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af a, am ibrm mɛny ɛwr, kɔ wɛl k’ow kokm mɛny ɛwr kaka ɔɔm ɛl ek’ow elm kokoba ɔb ɛs Jonas ec’a cɛ.
40012040	Tasi ɛm a ɛsɛ elel eke Jonas anŋ ɔcn gbɛl a lokm ij sɛgŋ nyahan ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab a, ɛbɛn nyam coco ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji b’ow anŋ wus ɛm ij sɛgŋ nyahan ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab.
40012041	Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Ninif eyŋ b’ow igb yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke ɛl, eke -l’irir Jonas eci Nyam odad a, -l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm. Ɛtŋ kin ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Jonas!
40012042	Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Seba ec’es ɛw lis a b’ow igb inym es yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke n’anŋ usu kpekpe l’ow yec’ɛtŋ ke l’íri eke li k’iri Salomɔ eci sɛwr e sodad a. Ɛtŋ kin, ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Salomɔ!"
40012043	"Ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ nyam anŋ ɛgŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, li b’anŋ usu wɛwɛ n’am rereb usu a, n’ám ɔl usu eke li k’ir. Eke sica n’ɛ́ŋnm a,
40012044	ke n’ám dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'M’ow m’ɛwl m’im m’ɛy ɛm ec’akŋ a eke m’anŋ m’ɛy ɔkm a.' Eke li b’ɛwl mɛny l’ow a, li b’ɛkn eke wɛl apl akŋ ab es ayl, wɛl nyinyimn ow akpl ɛtŋ ɛgŋ irm ɛm.
40012045	Sica li b’ɛwl n’im l’ɛsŋ lawlɛl abŋ eŋuŋ lɔbŋ ek’uŋ akm’n, -li b’okr af -l’ir yogŋ. Ow e jam a, abŋ amua b’ijr ɛgŋ na gbre akm krɛkrɛ ec’a. Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ ec’a yɛji, ɛbɛn ow b’ow el."
40012046	Eke Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym am dad agŋ a, kpɛkŋ lis lele lisijimɛl ab ow inym es gbeŋ eke ki dad’r odad.
40012047	Ɛgŋ nyam dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kin esŋ lele esŋ jimɛl ab ek’ow inym es gbeŋ. -N’am erur eke -li ki dad’ŋ odad."
40012048	Jesu dad ɛgŋ a ninɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛm lis ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bwo ɛl el ɛm lisijimɛl ee?"
40012049	Ɛtŋ n’am ɔkŋ jam ɛsɛl a abu li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Kin ɛm lis lel ɛm lisijimɛl ab ek’anŋ aŋa,
40012050	aŋke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke bi kok Ɛs ek’anŋ afr ec’erur a, el ɛm lisijim, ɛm lisijɔw lel ɛm lis ab."
40013001	Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Jesu anŋ akŋ a ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ im sig es mij saw eke ki yɛgm agŋ low.
40013002	Agŋ nɔnɔ ar ɛlul il ɛm; na sosiɛm l’ɛy mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm li sig es. Kɔ bieku a gbɛ inym es mij nɛny a.
40013003	N’am dad wɛl ów nɔnɔ nyandrɛ ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ nyam, ɛgb ewl ɛs nyam im ɔgm am ewl egb.
40013004	Eke n’am ufŋ egb ey ab es a, bɛb ok ebr af ɛtŋ ɔr ow sus ij.
40013005	Bɛb ok mebn wus af, usu eke sɛc ɛnym. Kpɛkŋ -l’ɛli, sɛc a ek’ɛnym a sosiɛm.
40013006	Kɔ eke ligbn ow afr a, l’ebal egb a eke ɛli ok ɔkm a ɛtŋ li wɛwr wɛl es aŋke min ɔnym ɛl wus tasi.
40013007	Bɛb ɛjeci ok usu eke mirŋ anŋ. Mirŋ a ɛli ɔny awŋ ɛl es.
40013008	Gbɛkɔ egb ey a e bɛb ok wus mamn af ɛtŋ il ewŋ: bɛb ɔny likŋ lele lɛw ab, bɛb ɔny ekŋ nyahan, ɛtŋ ow e bɛb a, ekŋ yen."
40013009	Ɛtŋ Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Eke ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn."
40013010	Jam ɛsɛl a ow titm Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ bi dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ee?"
40013011	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny, ɛŋan Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ów a eke lɔl es a ec’any uw, kɔ ɛl -n’ɛŋnm.
40013012	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn any uw a, wɛl b’ow obn’n ɛtŋ ow b’ow ufur es; kɔ ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋnm a, tɛl a eke ɔtu eke k’anŋ’n a, wɛl b’ow eb.
40013013	Ow sosiɛm mi b’oc nyandrɛ ɛm mi dad ɛl odad, aŋke -li bi lɛr kɔ -l’ɛknmn, ɛtŋ ow b’ok ɛl ɔru ɛm yɛji kɔ -l’irimn, ɛtŋ ow ókm ɛl es sos ɛm.
40013014	Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ec’odad eke dad ɛl Esayi eci kokoba ɔb ɛm a, ɛy ɔkm sodad amua ɛm ana: Ow b’ow ok ɔny ɔru ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow irimn; b’ow lɛɛr sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow ɛknmn.
40013015	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua na itŋn ɛw tuɔtuɔ; -li babl ɔru es, -li bubur anyamn yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl ec’anyamn k’ɛ́knm, ke ɛl ec’ɔru a k’írim ów, ɛl eci nuŋ ɛm ɔny a k’ánm es, -l’ɛwlmn -l’owmn ɛm ogŋ bake m’éwlm ɛl.
40013016	Ɔny ec’a, sos ɛm ɔtu eke k’iŋn ɔny aŋke ɔny ec’anyamn am ɛkn es ɛtŋ ɔny ec’ɔru am iri ów!
40013017	M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm: kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ lele agŋ ek’ij nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af ab a erur eke k’ɛkn low na eke am ɛkan a, kɔ -l’ɛknm, iri low na ek’am irir a, kɔ -l’irim."
40013018	"Ìrir egb ewl ɛs ec’odad a e nyandrɛ.
40013019	Ebr ab af a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri wɛl am dad gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad ke ɛ́wm ɛrm af a, agn low ŋuŋ ɛs b’ow oc yec’a eke wɛl ewl ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm a.
40013020	Mebn wus a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam ec’odad ke kpɛkŋ b’eb’r sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a.
40013021	Gbɛkɔ -li yɛbmn odad a okm min ɛl ɛm, -li b’ɛw ɛrm af tɛl cɛ. Eke sica sos es ɔw owi oglog gbre ij owi b’ow Nyam odad a sosiɛm a, -li b’ɛgbr ɔmn a fafa.
40013022	Wus a eke mirŋ nɔnɔ anŋ af ke egb a ok af a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam ec’odad, ke ɛmɛny b’ebr wus na ec’ów a e low ɛrmij a. -Li b’ɔl ob ɔny es. Ɛrmij owi amua b’ɛju ɛl, b’awŋ odad ab es, ɛtŋ ow ɔ́sum ey kaka.
40013023	Wus mamn a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam ec’odad ke b’ɛw ɛrm af a. -Li b’ɔsu ey: bɛb ec’a likŋ lele lɛw ab oglog ekŋ nyahan ɛtŋ bɛb ec’a ekŋ yen."
40013024	Jesu am dad ɛl nyandrɛ ɛm odad ɛjeci ɛsɛ: "Kin Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a eci elel eke anŋn: ɛgŋ nyam ewl egb amamn in ec’ɔgm a.
40013025	Ncok nyam, eke agŋ a fɛŋ am ɛru mɛmn a, in ec’ifnu nyam ow ewl suw eŋuŋ egb ab ɛm ɛtŋ im.
40013026	Eke egb a ɛli bake il ewŋ a, suw eŋuŋ a yɛji ɛli ok ɔkm.
40013027	Ɔgm ɛs a eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ow am dad’r ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ow elm egb amamn ewlm ŋ ec’ɔgm a ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bogŋ suw eŋuŋ amua anŋ ow ee?'
40013028	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ifnu nyam e low eke kok ana.' Juma kok ɛsɛl a ibrm’n ninɛ: 'Erur eke si k’im s’iri suw eŋuŋ ab es ee?'
40013029	Li dad ninɛ: 'Njaŋ, aŋke ow eci es iri ɛm a, ɔtur eke k’irir egb amamn ab es.
40013030	Yɛ̀br ɛl -l’okr af -l’agb toŋ ke ow ít egb ub e lɛgŋ a, ke sica yogŋ, m’ow mi dad egb ub ɛsɛl a m’ɛsɛ: Ìkŋn anym irir suw eŋuŋ ab es awŋ es eku eku ofŋn, ke sica ókr egb a, ɛm ec’egbel ab ɛm.' "
40013031	Jesu am dad ɛl nyandrɛ ɛm odad ɛjeci: "Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ likŋ e liy nyam ek’igŋ nyam oc ewl in ec’ɔgm af.
40013032	L’el egb ey a fɛŋ ɛm eci likekli tasi; kɔ eke l’ɛli a, l’el egb ewlu ab ɛm e likŋ ligbɛl tasi. L’el likŋ toŋ batŋ ɔr b’ow us mel in ec’ál ab ɛm."
40013033	Jesu am dad ɛl nyandrɛ ɛm odad ɛjeci: "Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ lijru eke yɔw nyam oc wuwlm ma toy likŋ lele yen ab toŋ bake ma a nimum inŋ eb es ab af."
40013034	Jesu am dad dedeku a ów amua fɛŋ nyandrɛ ɛm; li dádm wɛl low ek’ow elm nyandrɛ ɛm.
40013035	Li bi kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs ec’odad a íy nɛny: M’ow mi dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm, m’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl ów eke lɔl es wus eci nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ a ec’amani.
40013036	Sica Jesu ɛlu bieku ab es ɛtŋ im akŋ. In e jam ɛsɛl a im titm’n ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Òtar nyandrɛ ɛm odad a ek’el suw eŋuŋ ek’anŋ ɔgm a e low akr ok ɛy."
40013037	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ec’ Iy anake ewl egb amamn a;
40013038	ɔgm a, ke wus na nimum ana; egb amamn a el agŋ a eke b’ɛlum gbreŋgbi usu a eci low; suw eŋuŋ a, el agŋ a eke b’ɛlum agn low ŋuŋ ɛs e low a;
40013039	ifnu a eke am ewl suw eŋuŋ a, ke agn ana; egb ub a, ke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ ana; ɛtŋ egb ub ɛsɛl a ke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ana.
40013040	Ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl am iri suw eŋuŋ es eke wɛl k’ɔwl al ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke ow b’ow el jɛj ok e lɛgŋ ec’ab ana:
40013041	ɛgŋ ec’Iy b’ow ɛrm in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a, -li b’ow -n’ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’irmn ɛl lawlɛl ec’ɔmn a lele ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl ab ab -l’ot es gbreŋgbi usu a,
40013042	ke -l’ot -l’ɔwl wɛl al gbɛl ab ɛm; yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a.
40013043	Kɔ sica agŋ a eke ij nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af a, b’ow jɛjn ɛsɛ ligbn af ɛl Ɛs eci gbreŋgbi usu a. Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn."
40013044	"Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ ob ɔny eke lɔl es ɔgm nyam af. Ɛgŋ nyam iwr ob ɔny na es ɛtŋ ɛmɛny oc lɔl’l es ɔgm a. Sos ɛm iŋn’n toŋ batŋ n’im l’ɔl ob fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ij, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl l’ow l’ɔl ɔgm a."
40013045	"Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ an ɔlu nyam ek’am ɔl miyob amamn es af.
40013046	Eke n’ɛŋn an gbɛl e miyob nyam a, n’im l’ɔl ob fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ij, ɛtŋ l’ɔl miyob a."
40013047	"Ɛmɛny Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ muw eke wɛl ok ke ɔny ɔcn ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ af.
40013048	Eke ow b’iy a, mij juma kok ɛsɛl a b’ɔdu ow’r ákpaf ke ok es am jɛj ɔcn ab es: -li b’ok amamn a mulu ɛm, ke -l’ɔwl yec’eke akplm a.
40013049	Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, ɛbɛn ek’ow b’ow el ana: afr ɛrm ɛsɛl b’ow ow kpab agŋ eŋuŋ a es, amamn a e lís,
40013050	ke ɔ́wl ɛl al gbɛl ab ɛm. Yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a."
40013051	Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ irir ów a fɛŋ ee?" -L’ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ɛɛ."
40013052	Ɛtŋ ca li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn eke ol eci low yɛgm ɛs fɛŋ ek’am el Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛgŋ a, anŋ ana. N’anŋ ɛsɛ akŋ ɛs nyam eke b’ɛlu in ec’ob ɔny ɔkm low yɛgm owr ɛm lele low yɛgm esig ɛm ab af."
40013053	Eke Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm odad amua bake ow uwr a, l’igb yogŋ
40013054	n’im ɛb ab ɛm eke n’anŋ l’agb a. N’am yɛgm agŋ low yogŋ eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a toŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ yogŋ a low iti any afŋn es. -N’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ nuŋ ɛm ɔny na anŋ ow’r ee? Ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki kok sakrowa amua ee?
40013055	Kɔ ow elm ɔgɔg es ɔdu ɛs a ec’iy ab ee? Kɔ ow elm Mari elm lis ee? Kɔ Jak, Josɛf, Simɔ lele Jud ab elm lisijimɛl ee?
40013056	Kɔ lisijɔwɛl fɛŋ irm ɛy ab ee? Kɔ abusu ikŋ na bogŋ n’ɛŋn ee?"
40013057	Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ ɔ́ɔm abusu eke -li k’ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm. Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Usu a fɛŋ wɛl b’ɔny kokoba ɔb ɛs ec’ɛlum, ek’ow elm in ec’ɛb ab ɛm lele in ec’akŋ ab cɛ wɛl ɔ́nym in ec’ɛlum."
40013058	Yogŋ eci sakrowa a eke Jesu kok a tɛl cɛ, ɛl eci ɔmn a eke -n’ɔnym a sosiɛm.
40014001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Galile eci es ɛw ɛs Erɔd Antipas am iri Jesu eci nin ek’am il e low.
40014002	Li dad in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs! L’igb luw ɛm, na sosiɛm anake n’am ɔny abusu li kok sakrowa a."
40014003	-
40014004	Kin elel eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs a e luw owi a ɛcr: Erɔd Antipas oc lisijim Filip e yɔw Erodiad, ɛtŋ Jan im dad Erɔd ninɛ: "Ow itm eke k’oc esŋ jim e yɔw." Ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm Erɔd ɔŋ abusu wɛl ɔny Jan ok ŋgbraka ɛlu sobel ɛm.
40014005	Erɔd am erur eke k’ibi Jan, kɔ n’am uru Jwifɛl a, aŋke -li b’oc Jan ɛsɛ kokoba ɔb ɛs af.
40014006	Gbɛkɔ sica Erɔd e mew ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Erodiad jɔw ub ɛj etu a eke wɛl ɛsŋ a ec’any af. In e low iŋn Erɔd sos ɛm
40014007	toŋ l’ɛgŋ l’eb eke li k’ɔŋ ow ob fɛŋ eke ow b’ow ibrm a.
40014008	Erodiad ec’ów ɔm ebl ɛm, jɔw dad Erɔd ninɛ: "Òc Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs eci nuŋ a wayas ɛm is’m aŋa!"
40014009	Ɛb ebu a sos ɔw es; gbɛkɔ eke l’ij nɛny etu a ec’any af a, l’ɛlu abusu es eke li k’ɔŋ ow.
40014010	N’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im sobel ɛm ubr Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs nuŋ.
40014011	Wɛl oc nuŋ a wayas ɛm ow ɔŋ dedyɔwli a ɛtŋ l’eb n’ɔŋ lis.
40014012	Ek’ów a ɛc ɛbɛn a, Jan eci jam ɛsɛl a ow oc in e sos megl a im oc es, ɛtŋ im ɛwl Jesu amani low na ek’ɛy a eci.
40014013	Eke Jesu iri Jan e low na a, l’igb yogŋ mijɛtŋ ɛm eke li k’im in sɔny usu saw ɛm, kɔ agŋ a uw any; -l’ok ɔkm sɛb a ek’anŋ yogŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ mij nɛny a -n’am us Jesu jam lakr ɛm.
40014014	Mijɛtŋ a b’itr es eke Jesu b’us es a, l’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ; wɛl e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’am ewlm ɛl ec’ɔ́lu a.
40014015	Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, in e jam ɛsɛl a ow titm’n ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ ɛc, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny usu na yɛji ɛw usu saw ɛm. Òk agŋ ab es ím baŋn baŋn ek’anŋ saw saw aŋa a yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔl ob ij."
40014016	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ow itm eke -li k’im; ɔny obi, ɔ̀ŋn ɛl ob -l’ij!"
40014017	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Futufutu yen lele ɔcn yony ab cɛ anake s’ɔnym ab aŋa a."
40014018	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Òtr isr’m aŋa."
40014019	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li dad agŋ a eke k’ok es suw ab af; sica l’oc futufutu yen a lele ɔcn yony ab ab, l’igbl any ogŋ afr ɛtŋ l’ɛlu Nyam bia. Li bubr ɛm n’ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ -li cɛc -n’ɔŋ agŋ a.
40014020	Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ij ob lok iy ɛl ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ow wal es. Jam ɛsɛl a ot ekpr a eke wal es a as luku, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu lɛw yony.
40014021	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ij ob a ɔtu eke k’ij agŋ fandi yen; wɛl awlm ɔyɔw lel ey ab.
40014022	Kpɛkŋ eke ow b’uwr a, Jesu ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm eke k’ikŋ anym im mij lekpl a e jam a, ke n’ánŋ in obi l’afl agŋ ab es.
40014023	Eke l’afl wɛl es a, l’uyu lafɛny ab af eke li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam. Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, n’anŋ yogŋ in sɔny.
40014024	Mijɛtŋ a gbɛ, wus ab a, n’im kpekpe, mra am ɛlul il aŋke lɛf am ɛlu ɔbr’r.
40014025	Eke lɛgŋ am ɛny ow a, Jesu am an es mij ab af im ɛŋn in e jam ɛsɛl a.
40014026	Eke -l’ɛkan Jesu am an es mij af a, -li kpikprm es ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Na ɔŋnabŋ!" Ɛtŋ -n’am ɔg erŋn ebl ɛm.
40014027	Gbɛkɔ kpɛkŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛrm úsu ɔny lokm! Erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny! Kɔ ɛm!"
40014028	Piɛr ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke ow el ŋ tasi, ke ɔ̀ŋ abusu m’an es mij ab af m’ow m’ɛŋn’ŋ."
40014029	Jesu ɛgŋ dad ninɛ: "Òw!" Piɛr ɛy ɔkm mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ am an es mij ab af im ɛŋn’n.
40014030	Gbɛkɔ eke l’ɛkn lɛf a e lɛc ek’am ɛlu ɔkm a, erŋn ow’r sos ɛtŋ n’am ɛmn. L’ɛlu lebl li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, èb ɛlu’m es!"
40014031	Kpɛkŋ Jesu ɛgŋm abu es ɔny’n, ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɔmn ɛw’ŋ fuɛfuɛ tasi! Kɔ bla ɛtŋ bɛbar ee?"
40014032	Ɛl yony mum -l’ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ lɛf a irm es.
40014033	Ow ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a, ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ŋ gbɛ Nyam ec’Iy tasi!"
40014034	Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ubr mij lekpl a e jam a ke -l’itar es Genesarɛt wus af a,
40014035	yogŋ ec’agŋ a uw Jesu any ɛtŋ ɛwl susu a fɛŋ in ec’ow ec’amani. Ɛtŋ wɛl ot ɔ́lu fɛŋ is’r.
40014036	-N’am ŋɔŋn ow eke ow ki yɛb wɛl itŋn in e mob sus ɛm a ec’ɛnyɛmbri a cɛ abu, ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am itŋn in e mob sus ɛm a abu a, am ewl.
40015001	Sica Farisiɛl lele ol eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab anŋ Jerusalɛm ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ:
40015002	"Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a ɛ́luam ɛy lagŋɛl ec’ɛb ir owi a ek’ɔŋ ɛy a ee? Tasi ɛm a, low yɛgm a am ibrm eke wɛl ki yɔg sabu gbuŋ ke ij ob, kɔ -li kokmn."
40015003	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ kɔ ɔny, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ɔny ec’ɛb ir ec’ów a sosiɛm ɛ́luamn Nyam ec’ol ab ee?
40015004	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛ̀lum asŋ lele esŋ ab, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny: ɛgŋ eke bi yayr ɛs lele lis ab a, l’it eke wɛl k’ibi’r.
40015005	Kɔ ɔny, ɔny e low yɛgm ab ɛm bi dadr ɛsrɛ: ek’ɛgŋ nyam in dad ow ɛs oglog ow lis in ɛsɛ: 'Ob a eke mi k’ɔŋ’ŋ ŋ ec’abu ɛlum ec’a, m’oc m’ɛw es Nyam ec’egb wawr eci,'
40015006	ke ɛgŋ ikŋ na, ɔny ec’a, yec’eke li k’ɔŋ ɛs a, n’ŋgboŋ ow e low ɛm ŋ̂. Ɛbɛn eke b’isr Nyam ec’odad ab es ɔŋn ɔny ec’agŋ ɛm ec’ów a usu ana!
40015007	Ɔny, agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl! Nawrɛ tasi, Esayi dad ɔny e lís e low na in e kokoba ɔb ab ɛm:
40015008	Nyam dad eke: 'Agŋ amua na nɛny ɛm ɔfr ɔfr -n’am kɔklm im, kɔ ɛl ec’ɛrm a kpab es ɛm e lís.
40015009	Nuŋ ɔfr ɔfr agŋ amua am igŋ’m, aŋke agŋ ɛm ec’ów anake -li b’oc -li yɛgmn agŋ low a.' "
40015010	Sica Jesu ɛsŋ dedeku a ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ìgŋn lɔru es irir low na sɛnyn sɛnyn:
40015011	ow elm ob eke b’ɛy ɛgŋ nɛnym a, ɔɔm ɛgŋ uwm anŋ, kɔ low eke b’anŋ ɛgŋ nɛnym ɛy ɔkm a, low na anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ úwm anŋ a."
40015012	Low na af jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Odad na eke dad Farisiɛl iri a, kɔ uw any ek’ow ɛy ɛl sos ɛm ee?"
40015013	Li dad ninɛ: "Likŋ fɛŋ ek’elm ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr eci likŋ ek’ewl a, li b’ow l’iri ow es.
40015014	Ɛ̀gbr ɛl es, -l’el ány eflu ek’am nyimn ány eflu! Ek’any eflu nyam am nyimn any eflu ɛjeci nyam, ɛl yony mum -li b’ow -l’ok nɔmu nyam ɛm."
40015015	Piɛr ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Òtar nyandrɛ ɛm odad na e low akr ok ɛy."
40015016	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny bɔbɔ yɛji, k’irimn low na eci nyandrɛ ab ee?
40015017	Kɔ uwmn any eke ob fɛŋ eke b’ɛy ɛgŋ nɛnym a, b’im ɛy lokm, ke sica n’anŋ lokm a l’ɛy ɔkm ee?
40015018	Low eke b’anŋ nɛnym ɛy ɔkm a, ɛrm ɛm ow b’anŋ ow; ɛtŋ low na anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ uwm anŋ a.
40015019	Tasi ɛm a, sow tutr eŋuŋ eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ibi ɛgŋ, ɛrum yɔw ɛjec’ab, ij nfaci, iy mil, ij daŋku yadŋ ke dád sodad eŋuŋ ok agŋ af a, ɛrm ɛm -li b’anŋ -l’ow.
40015020	Ów amua anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ uwm anŋ a! Ij ob ke kí yɔgm abu a ɔ́ɔm ɛgŋ uwm anŋ."
40015021	Ɛtŋ Jesu igb yogŋ im Tir lele Sidɔn ab eci wus ab af.
40015022	Kpɛkŋ kin Kana wus af e yɔw nyam ek’ir wus ikpr ab af a, ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, David e lilaw, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ! Kɔ abŋ ŋuŋ am ijr ɛm jɔw gbre, ow k’akplm kaka!"
40015023	Gbɛkɔ Jesu cicm sar okm’n es. In e jam ɛsɛl a ow titm’n ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ògŋ’n kɔ n’am us ɛy jam l’ɔgr ɛy nɔnɔ."
40015024	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nyam ɛrm’m Israɛl ec’agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ek’irm af a eci cɛ."
40015025	Kɔ yɔw a ow ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ!"
40015026	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ow itm eke wɛl k’oc etuey ec’ob ij ɔŋ mɔwr."
40015027	Yɔw a dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, tasi, gbɛkɔ mɔwr yɛji, ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl eci ob ij a ec’ekpr a eke b’anŋ tabl af ok wus a, -li b’ij."
40015028	Ow ɔŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Oy! Ɔmn agb’ŋ gbɛ! B’ow ɛŋn low a ek’am erur a." Ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ, yɔw a ec’iy a ewl.
40015029	Sica Jesu igb yogŋ im ɛy Galile eci mij lekpl a ogŋ. L’uyu ligigl nyam af li sig es.
40015030	Agŋ nɔnɔ ow ɛŋn’n. -L’ism akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl, ány eflu, sos ɛ́yru, ɛbrmɛl, lele ɔ́lu ɛjeci nɔnɔ ab. -L’ok wɛl es Jesu ec’any af ɛtŋ l’ewlm wɛl.
40015031	Eke -l’ɛkan ɛbrmɛl dad ów, sos ɛ́yru ewl, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl an es lele ány eflu ek’ɛkn es ab ab a, agŋ a low iti any afŋn es ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Israɛl e Nyam a.
40015032	Ɛmɛny Jesu ɛsŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ amua e low am ɔny’m sɔrŋ, aŋke kin sɛgŋ emum nyahan eke -n’anŋn ɛm ab ke -n’ɔnym ob kaka eke -li k’ij. M’erurm eke mi k’ɔŋ ɛl -n’im namn; ejagb -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛŋn es abur."
40015033	Jam ɛsɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ usu saw ɛm aŋa, bogŋ s’ɔtu eke si k’ɛŋn ob ij s’ɔŋ agŋ amua ij lok iy ee?"
40015034	Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ futufutu abi ɔnymn ab ee?" Ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Futufutu lɔbŋ lele ɔcn ekekey abi ka ab."
40015035	Ca li dad agŋ a eke k’ok es wus.
40015036	Ɛtŋ l’ot futufutu lɔbŋ a lele ɔcn ab ab, l’ɛlu Nyam bia, li bubr ɛm n’ɔŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ -li cɛc agŋ a fɛŋ.
40015037	Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ij lok iy ɛl. Jam ɛsɛl a ot ekpr a eke wal es a as luku, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu ɛgbɛl lɔbŋ.
40015038	Agŋ a ek’ij ob a ij agŋ fandi yar, wɛl awlm ɔyɔw lele etuey ab.
40015039	Eke sica Jesu ɔŋ bieku a im a, l’ɛy mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ n’im Magadan eci wus ab af.
40016001	Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab ow ɛŋn Jesu eke k’ɛbm’n. -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛ̀lu mɛny ɛwr nyam ɔkm yɛgm ɛy ek’ow el Nyam ɛrm’ŋ."
40016002	Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: ["Lɛgŋ es ew ɛm bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Efi e lɛgŋ a b’ow akpl, aŋke afr ebl es.'
40016003	Ɛtŋ ibribr fafa, eke afr b’ibr es a, bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Yɛfɛnyna nyam b’ow an.' Lɛgŋ eci elel eke b’anŋn a b’uwr any, kɔ sɛgŋ amua eci mɛny ɛwr a, ɔ́tumn uwmn any!]
40016004	Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ amua eke íjm nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af a am ibrm mɛny ɛwr; kɔ wɛl k’ow kokm mɛny ɛwr kaka ɔɔm ɛl ek’ow elm Jonas ec’a cɛ." Ɛtŋ l’ɛlu wɛl es n’im.
40016005	Eke jam ɛsɛl a im ok mij lekpl a e jam a, -l’ijl es eke -li k’oc futufutu.
40016006	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ɔ̀sur sos Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab eci lijru a e lís."
40016007	Jam ɛsɛl a am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛsɛ: "Eke s’ocm futufutu a sosiɛm anake n’am dad ów amua a."
40016008	Jesu uw odad a eke -n’am dad ab any ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am dadr ɔny ɔfr ɛm ɛsrɛ: 'Eke s’ebm futufutu a sosiɛm ee?' Kɔ k’irimn cɛ ee!
40016009	Ow k’okm ɔny es sos ɛm cɛ ee? Futufutu yen a eke mi bubr ɛm, m’ɔŋ agŋ fandi yen lele ekpr a eke wal es eci mulu abi a eke otr imn a, kɔ k’ɔknmn ow e low ee?
40016010	Ɛtŋ kɔ futufutu lɔbŋ a eke mi bubr ɛm m’ɔŋ agŋ fandi yar a, lele ekpr a eke wal es a eci mulu ɛgbɛl abi a eke otr imn a, k’ɔknmn ow e low ee?
40016011	Ɔ̀sur sos Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab e lijru a e lís. Kɔ ayaf ɔtur eke k’uwmn any ek’ow elm futufutu ec’odad mi dadm ɔny ee?"
40016012	Ca jam ɛsɛl a iri ek’ow elm lijru a eke wɛl b’oc kokr futufutu a ec’odad Jesu dadm ɛl, kɔ Farisiɛl lele Sadusiɛl ab e low yɛgm a e low.
40016013	Jesu im ɛy Sesare Filip ec’ɛb ɛm. N’am ibrm in e jam ɛsɛl a l’ɛsɛ: "Ayaf agŋ bi dadr ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e lís ee?"
40016014	-Li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ ŋ Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs, bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ ŋ Eli, ɛtŋ agŋ likpr ec’a, -li b’oc’ŋ ɛsɛ Jeremi oglog kokoba ɔb ɛs ɛjeci nyam af."
40016015	Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny obi ɔny obi a, ayaf b’ocar’m ee?"
40016016	Simɔ Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Ŋ Mesi a, Nyam a ek’anŋ owr ec’Iy."
40016017	Ca Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Simɔ Jonas jim, ehe él ŋ eci, aŋke nawrɛ ikŋ na, ow elm ɛgŋ ɛlum ɔkm dadm’ŋ, kɔ ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a.
40016018	Sica ɛm, m’am dad’ŋ m’ɛsɛ: ŋ Lob, ɛtŋ lob ikŋ na af, m’ow m’us ɛm e Nyamel a. Luw ec’abusu a k’ɔtum ɔnym lɛc in af.
40016019	M’ow m’ɔŋ’ŋ Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a eci sisafuɛ a: low fɛŋ eke b’ow igŋ wus af aŋa a, Afr b’ow igŋ; low fɛŋ eke b’ow eb wus af aŋa a, Afr yɛji b’ow eb."
40016020	Jesu ijl in e jam ɛsɛl a nɛny dad ninɛ: "Kì dadr ɛgŋ kaka eke m’el Mesi a."
40016021	Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Jesu ɔb nuŋ am dad ulm in e jam ɛsɛl a es ɛsɛ: "Ow it eke mi k’im Jerusalɛm ke yogŋ m’íj gbre nɔnɔ, agŋ ekpekp, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl, lel ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab ec’abu ɛm. Wɛl b’ow ibi’m ɛtŋ sɛgŋ nyahan m’ow m’igb luw ɛm."
40016022	Ɛbɛn a, Piɛr oc’r ab im saw ɛm ɛtŋ am ɛnym’n abr dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl! Nyam ɔ́ny oc’ŋ es ɛm! Low na k’ow ɛŋnm’ŋ lɛgŋ kaka!"
40016023	Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɛwl sos mɛny ɛtŋ am dad Piɛr ɛsɛ: " Satan, kpàb’m es lís! Ŋ el ɛm ec’ejagb us e lirikp, aŋke ŋ e tutr a elm Nyam e tutr, kɔ agŋ ɛm eci."
40016024	Ɛmɛny Jesu am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛsɛ: "Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am erur eke k’us’m jam a, ow it ke li kí tutrm in e lís owi, l’ábu in obi ec’olikŋ a, ke l’ús’m jam.
40016025	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow erur eke ki dogŋn in e sel a, b’ow irmn. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow irmn in e sel a ɛm sosiɛm a b’ow ɛŋn.
40016026	Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɔny wus ec’ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’irmn in e sel a, ke bla ow b’ow eel il ab ee? Kɔ bla ob iy ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’oc sɔgr in e sel ab ee?
40016027	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow Ɛs ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm lele in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ in eci es an ab ɛm, li b’ow li sɔg ow labm.
40016028	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ amua ek’anŋ aŋa a e bɛb b’ow ɛkn ɛgŋ ec’Iy ow ɛsɛ ɛb ebu af gbuŋ ke -l’uw."
40017001	Eke sɛgŋ nɔhɔn ɛc a, Jesu ɛsŋ Piɛr, Jak lele Jan ek’el Jak lisijim ab ɛtŋ -li kpab es -n’im saw ɛm ɛl sɔny lafɛny gege nyam af.
40017002	Jesu itŋn sos ɛl ec’any af: any am jɛjn’n ɛsɛ ligbn af ɛtŋ in e mob sus ɛm a ufu pum pum pum anŋ ɛsɛ usuayl af.
40017003	Ɛtŋ kin, jam ɛsɛl nyahan a ɛkn Mois lele Eli ab ek’ilm any am dad ów Jesu ab.
40017004	Ɛtŋ Piɛr dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ow akpl eke si k’anŋ aŋa! Ek’erur, aŋa m’ɔtu eke mi k’us nuŋ igŋ usu nyahan: ŋ e nyam, Mois e nyam lele Eli e nyam ab."
40017005	Odad anŋ Piɛr nɛnym am dad ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ kin jru ek’am jɛjn ow ubur ɛl es. Lebl nyam anŋ jru ab ɛm am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na el ɛm ec’Iy eke m’erur tasi; m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ m’ɛlu’l ɛm. Ìrir in e low!"
40017006	Eke jam ɛsɛl a iri lebl ikŋ na a, erŋn ɔny ɛl afŋn es ɛtŋ -li bubu any es wus.
40017007	Jesu im titm ɛl, itŋn ɛl abu ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìgbr, k’ùrur erŋn."
40017008	-Li gbigbl any ogŋ ɛtŋ -l’ɛknm ɛgŋ kaka ek’ow elm Jesu sɔny cɛ.
40017009	Eke -n’anŋn lafɛny ab af -n’am us es a, Jesu am ijl ɛl nɛny dad ɛsɛ: "Low na ek’ɛkan a, kì dadr kokr ɛgŋ kaka toŋ bake ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ígb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm."
40017010	Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Dàd ɛy, kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a bi dad ek’Eli in k’ow gbuŋ ke Mesi in ow ee?"
40017011	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Tasi ɛm a, Eli eke li k’ow ke ni nyímn ów a fɛŋ.
40017012	Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny ek’Eli ow lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ, agŋ ɛgŋm ebm’n ɛtŋ kok’r low yec’eke -l’erurir a. Ɛbɛn eke -li b’ow -li kok ɛgŋ ec’Iy sos keskes ana."
40017013	Sica jam ɛsɛl a iri eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ec’odad anake Jesu am dad ɛl a.
40017014	Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ok yogŋ a eke bieku a anŋ a, ɛgŋ nyam ow titm Jesu, ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af
40017015	ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ny ɛm ec’iy a eci sɔrŋ ikŋ. L’el krokro ɛs ɛtŋ ɔl a b’ijr’r gbre toŋ sakp nɔnɔ ec’a li b’ɛy alm, oglog mij ɛm.
40017016	M’oc’r m’is ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a kɔ -l’ɔtum -l’ewlam ow."
40017017	Jesu igbl lebl ogŋ dad ninɛ: "Wew! Ɔny eel agŋ eŋuŋ eke ɔmn anm ɛm tasi! Ɛmɛny sɛgŋ abi m’it eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab ee? Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sakp abi ow it eke mi k’ɛgŋ low na m’eb ee? Òcr iy a isr’m aŋa."
40017018	Jesu ɔɔr abŋ ŋuŋ a abr ɛy ɔkm iy ab ɛm ɛtŋ l’ewl wanci ab af cɛ.
40017019	Jam ɛsɛl a im titm Jesu saw ɛm ɛtŋ ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ɛy s’ɔtum s’ɔnym abusu s’ogŋm abŋ na ee?"
40017020	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny ec’ɔmn a ufum es. Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: blel ɔnyn ɔmn ɛw likekli ɛsɛ likŋ e liy af, ɔtur eke ki dadr ligigl na ɛsrɛ: 'Ìgb aŋa im yogŋ a', li b’ow n’im. Low kaka k’ow ɔtum akam ɔny. [
40017021	Abŋ akpasu na, Nyam ŋɔŋn lele nɛny ɛnŋ ɛm ab cɛ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ogŋ’n.]"
40017022	Lɛgŋ nyam, jam ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ɛŋanin Galile, ɛtŋ Jesu am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Wɛl b’ow ɔny ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɛlu agŋ abu ɛm,
40017023	ke -l’ibi ow; gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ nyahan, li b’ow l’igb luw ɛm." Ow sosiɛm jam ɛsɛl a sos ɔw es nɔnɔ.
40017024	Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ok Kapɛrnayum a, Nyamel gbɛl a eci wus labm eb ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Piɛr ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɔny eci low yɛgm ɛs a, n’am sɔgm Nyamel gbɛl a eci wus labm ee?"
40017025	Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Njaŋ, li bi sɔg." Wanci ab af a eke Piɛr am ɛy akŋ a, Jesu ikŋ anym eb odad ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Simɔ, kɔ ayaf am tutar ee? Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a, kɔ bwo ki sɔg wus labm ɔŋ ɛl ee? Ɛl ec’ɛb eyŋ a, kɔ etu agŋ ab ee?"
40017026	Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Etu agŋ a cɛ." Af yogŋ Jesu dad Piɛr ninɛ: "Ɛb eyŋ a ɔnym labm sɔg ij.
40017027	Gbɛkɔ s’erurm eke si k’ebal agŋ amua ɛrm es. Na sosiɛm ìm mij lekpl ab ɛm ɔwl ew; ɔcn krɛkrɛ a eke b’ow ɔny a, fìg in e nɛny a, b’ow ɛŋn os eke b’ow ɛbm ŋ lele ɛm ab eci wus labm a eci sɔg. Òc os a ow sɔg ɛl ɛy ec’a."
40018001	Wanci ab af a, jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu yogŋ, kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ el ligbɛl ee?"
40018002	Jesu ɛsŋ iyli nyam ow, n’inymn ow es ɛl ec’araŋn
40018003	ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: eke itŋnmn ɔnymn ɛrm ɛsɛ etuey af, k’ow ɔtumn ɛymn Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a.
40018004	Gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a, in l’el ɛgŋ a eke b’is es ke b’ɛwl anŋ ɛsɛ iy na af a."
40018005	"Eke ɛgŋ eb ey amua ɛm e nyam ɛm sosiɛm a, ke ɛm anake l’eb’m a.
40018006	Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɔny ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm ɛsɛ iy na af ɛlu wus a, low ŋuŋ a eke li k’ɛŋn a agb nɔnɔ. Eke wɛl oc meb ucur lob ligbɛl ucu’r ɛmn, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛman in okij a, ow akpl akm low ŋuŋ a eke wɛl ki kok’r a.
40018007	Bogŋ e gbre ana! Wus na af, ów nɔnɔ anŋ low ŋuŋ kok eci! Tasi ów amua b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, gbɛkɔ gbre b’ow el ɛgŋ a eke b’ow kok ów amua a eci!
40018008	Eke batŋ ow el ŋ ec’abu a oglog ŋ e lakr a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ke ùbr’r es oc ɔwl’l kpekpe; ow akpl ŋ eci eke k’ɛy sel ɛŋn tasi ab ɛm abu nyam coco ab oglog lakr nyam coco ab, ow a eke k’ɛli sabu yony lele akr yony ab, ke wɛl óc ɔwl’ŋ al a ek’iram es ab ɛm a.
40018009	Ɛtŋ ek’ow el ŋ e nyamn a anake b’ɔŋ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm a, ɔ̀kr ɔny oc es oc’r ɔwl’l kpekpe; ow akpl ŋ ec’eke k’ɛy sel ɛŋn tasi ab ɛm nyamn nyam coco ab, ow a eke k’ɛli anyamn yony, ke wɛl óc ɔwl’ŋ gbre ij usu ec’al ab ɛm a."
40018010	"Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ɛm e jam ɛsɛl ey amua ɛm e nyam ec’ifn owi ɛm; tasi ɛm a, m’am dad ɔny eke ɛl ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a ec’any af. [
40018011	]
40018012	Kin low nyam, ɔny e tutr el bogŋ ec’ee? Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny mɛcɛb ekŋ yen, ɛtŋ ɛl ɛm eci nyam irm a, kɔ li k’ow l’igŋm ekŋ yar lɛw libarm a l’ɛlum es lafɛny af yogŋ, n’iim l’ɔlm yec’a ek’irm a l’ocm ee?
40018013	M’am dad ɔny, eke n’ɛŋn ow, li b’ow n’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn licɛb na e nuŋ af l’akm ekŋ yar lɛw libarm a ek’iram a.
40018014	Ɛbɛn ek’ɔny Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a erurm eke ɛm e jam ɛsɛl ey amua ɛm e nyam k’irm ana."
40018015	"Eke esŋ jim nyam kok low ŋuŋ [ŋ e lís], ke ìm ɛŋn’n ŋ sɔny, ke dád’r in e low ŋuŋ a eke li kok a. Eke l’iri ŋ ec’odad a, ke esŋ jim a l’el ŋ ec’ŋ̂.
40018016	Kɔ eke l’ɛgŋm l’irim ŋ ec’odad a, òc ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam oglog agŋ yony ab im, yec’ɛtŋ ke, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl a am dadr ab af a: odad fɛŋ eci nyinyimn ɛm, adaŋku yony oglog nyahan ánŋ ɛm.
40018017	Gbɛkɔ eke l’ɛgŋm l’irim wɛl ec’odad a, dàd ok Nyamel; ɛtŋ eke l’ɛgŋm l’irim Nyamel ec’odad a, òc’r ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛs af oglog wus labm eb ɛs af.
40018018	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: low fɛŋ eke b’ow igŋn wus af aŋa a, Afr b’ow igŋ; low fɛŋ eke b’ow ebr wus af aŋa a, Afr yɛji b’ow eb.
40018019	Ɛmɛny m’am dad ɔny, eke wus af aŋa, ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ yony okr af eke k’ibrm low kaka fɛŋ jɛj ok owi ec’a, ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a b’ow ɔŋ ɛl.
40018020	Tasi ɛm a, yogŋ ek’agŋ yony nyahan as luku ɛm e nin ɛm a, m’anŋ ɛl ec’araŋn."
40018021	Ɛtŋ Piɛr ow titm Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ek’ɛm lisijim bi kok’m low ŋuŋ, ke sakp abi mi k’oc m’ap’r ee? Kɔ sakp lɔbŋ ee?"
40018022	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Njaŋ, mi dadm’ŋ m’ɛsmɛ toŋ sakp lɔbŋ, kɔ toŋ sakp ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw ab toŋ sakp lɔbŋ.
40018023	Na sosiɛm, kin Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’elel ek’anŋn: ɛb ebu nyam erur eke k’ub in ec’ob a ek’in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ɔnym’n ab a.
40018024	Eke l’ɔb nuŋ n’am kok ow e low a, wɛl oc juma kok ɛs nyam ek’ɔnym’n os bubutɛ gbɛl ab is’r.
40018025	Ɛgŋ a ɔnym ob kaka eke k’oc sɔgr in e labm a; ow sosiɛm ɛb ebu a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɔl’l ij’r ɛsɛ aduigŋ af, ke wɛl ɔ́l in e yɔw, in ec’ey lele ob fɛŋ eke n’ɔny ab ab ij yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɔ́tu li sɔg labm a.
40018026	Juma kok ɛs a ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛb ebu a ec’any af ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: 'Ɛrm ɛ́y’ŋ es, èku bɛb, m’ow mi sɔg’ŋ fɛŋ!'
40018027	Ɛb ebu a sɔrŋ ɔny nɔnɔ: l’oc labm a l’ap ow ɛtŋ l’ɛlu ow es ow im.
40018028	Juma kok ɛs a ec’im ɛm a, l’ɔbr lawl juma kok ɛs nyam ek’ɔnym’n os tɛl ab. N’ɔny ow ɛmn ɛmn n’am bɔbrm ow l’atr ow sel li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Sɔ̀g ɛm ec’os a ek’ɔnym ab a!'
40018029	Lawl a ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af ɛtŋ am ŋɔŋn’n ɛsɛ: 'Ɛrm ɛ́y’ŋ es, èku bɛb, m’ow mi sɔg’ŋ!'
40018030	Gbɛkɔ l’ɛgŋm; n’ɔny l’ɛlu ow sobel ɛm ek’ow k’anŋ ɛm toŋ ke ow sɔ́g’r labm a.
40018031	Eke juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjec’a ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a, sos ɔw ɛl es sɛnyn sɛnyn ɛtŋ -n’im -l’awl ów a fɛŋ -l’ok ɛb ebu a.
40018032	Af yogŋ, ɛb ebu a ɔŋ wɛl ɛsŋ juma kok ɛs a ow ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: 'Juma kok ɛs ŋuŋ! M’oc ŋ e labm a fɛŋ m’ap’ŋ eke ŋɔŋn’m a sosiɛm.
40018033	Ŋ yɛji, blel ɔ́ny awl’ŋ a eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɔny ŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ ab af.'
40018034	Ɛb ebu a ɛrm ebl afŋn es ɛtŋ n’ɔny juma kok ɛs a l’ɛlu sobel ɛm milɔlu kokr eci toŋ ke li sɔ́g labm a fɛŋ."
40018035	Ɛtŋ Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn eke ɛm Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a b’ow kok ɔny ana, ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam ocm low ŋuŋ eke lisijim kok’r a apm’n ɛrm nyam ɛm."
40019001	Eke sica Jesu dad ów ɔm odad bake ow uwr a, l’igb Galile ɛtŋ n’im Jude wus af e mij jam ek’el Jurdɛn a.
40019002	Agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam ɛtŋ l’ewlm ɛl ɛm ec’ɔ́lu a.
40019003	Farisiɛl bɛb ow titm Jesu eke k’uk’r meb odad ebl ɛm. -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ low kaka fɛŋ ɛm, ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke ɛgŋ k’ogŋ in e yɔw ee?"
40019004	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ awlmn low yec’a eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab ee? Nuŋ ɔb ɛm a, Nyam kok igŋ lele yɔw ab,
40019005	ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: Na sosiɛm anake igŋ b’ow ŋgboŋ ɛs lele lis ab ec’akŋ, ke l’ókr af in e yɔw ab ab -l’el sos megl nyam a.
40019006	Ca -l’elm agŋ yony ij, kɔ sos megl nyam. Ke ɛgŋ k’ɔ́nym yec’eke Nyam ɔny okr af a kpabm es."
40019007	Ɛmɛny Farisiɛl am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛgŋ am ow ogŋ in e yɔw a, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ Mois b’ibrm eke wɛl k’ɔŋ ow igŋnin e lɛl ee?"
40019008	Li dad ninɛ: "Ɔny ec’ɛrm tuɔtuɔ a sosiɛm anake Mois ɔŋ ɔny abusu eke k’ogŋn ɔny ec’ɔyɔw a. Kɔ nuŋ ɔb ɛm a, ow elm ɛbɛn ow ɛcrm.
40019009	M’am dad ɔny: igŋ fɛŋ eke ɛlu in e yɔw es, ke ow elm egŋ ot owi ɛm, ke im ɛbi yɔw ɛjec’a, l’ij nfaci ŋ̂."
40019010	In e jam ɛsɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Ek’ow el ɛbɛn tasi ɛgŋ k’anŋ in e yɔw ab a, ke ow akplm ek’ɛgŋ k’ɛbi yɔw."
40019011	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ a fɛŋ k’ɔtum ɛgŋm odad na ebm ek’ow elm agŋ a cɛ eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ow ec’abusu a.
40019012	Ów nɔnɔ anŋ eke b’ɛdŋn agŋ yɔw ec’ɛbi: bɛb ec’a, mew ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ijm ow e lɛc; bɛb ec’a egŋ agbru, agŋ ɔŋ -n’ɔnym ow ec’abusu; sica bɛb ec’a, Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu e juma kok sosiɛm -l’erurmn eke -li k’ɛbi yɔw. Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke k’ɛgŋ low yɛgm na eb a, l’ɛ́gŋ l’eb!"
40019013	Sica agŋ ot etuey am is Jesu eke li k’at wɛl abu nuŋ ni ŋɔŋn Nyam n’ɔŋ wɛl, kɔ jam ɛsɛl a am ɛnym agŋ a abr.
40019014	Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Yɛ̀br etuey ow ɛm ogŋ! Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́dŋn ɛl, aŋke tasi ɛm a, Afr e gbreŋgbi usu a el agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛl af a eci."
40019015	L’at wɛl abu nuŋ l’ɛdŋ wɛl ɔwrɔ ɛtŋ l’igb yogŋ n’im.
40019016	Ɛtŋ kin ɛgŋ nyam ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ bla low mamn iy m’ɔtu eke mi ki kok ke m’ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr ee?"
40019017	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ibrm im low yec’a eke k’akpl ab af ee? Nyam sɔny coco cɛ akpl. Eke batŋ am erur eke k’ɛy sel ek’ɔnym uwr ɛm a, ɛ̀lum sol a."
40019018	L’ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ eci sol ee?" Jesu dad ninɛ: "K’íbim ɛgŋ, k’íjm nfaci, k’íym mil, k’íjm daŋku yadŋ ɛm ɛgŋ e nuŋ af;
40019019	ɛ̀lum asŋ lele esŋ ab, ke érur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af."
40019020	Ŋgbafrɛli a dad’r ninɛ: "Mi b’ɛlum sol amua fɛŋ. Ɛmɛny bogŋ ec’anake anŋ ab ee?"
40019021	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ek’am erur eke k’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam am erur ab af a, ke ìm ɔl ŋ ec’ob a eke ɔny a ij, òc ow ec’os a ɔŋ ɔgbɔru, ke b’ow ɛŋn ob ɔny afr, ca ɛ́wl mɛny ow ke ús’m jam."
40019022	Ŋgbafrɛli a b’iri low na a, n’aam sos es ɔw ɛm aŋke tasi ɛm a, n’ɔny ob nɔnɔ.
40019023	Ɛtŋ sica Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ eke gbreŋgbi k’ɛy Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a.
40019024	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, kin low nyam eke m’am dad ɔny: gbaŋkɔ kedebnam eci fɛfn ɔmu ɛm eke k’ɛcr a ɛw fuɛfuɛ akm gbreŋgbi eci Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛm ɛy a."
