40019025	Eke jam ɛsɛl a iri ów amua a, low iti ɛl any ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke sica bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ɛŋn sel ee?"
40019026	Jesu lɛr ɛl ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ ec’any af a ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ, kɔ ow elm Nyam ec’any af gbɛ, aŋke Nyam ec’a, fɛŋ ɛw fuɛfuɛ!"
40019027	Ca kin Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi yɛji ɛ̀kn! Ɛy, s’igŋ fɛŋ s’ok es ɛtŋ s’us’ŋ jam. Kɔ ɛy ec’a, ayaf ow b’ow ɛcr ab ee?"
40019028	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: lɛgŋ a eke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow sig es in ec’anygbɛl ec’atufu lɛkpn af, ɛb owr ab ɛm yogŋ a, ɔny lɛw yony a ek’usr’m jam a, ɔny yɛji b’ow sigr es atufu mɛkpn af, ke jɛ́jr Israɛl ec’eb lɛw yony a ec’ów okr.
40019029	Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’igŋ ɛl ec’akŋ oglog ɛl lisijimɛl oglog ɛl lisijɔwɛl, ɛl ɛsɛl, ɛl lisɛl, ɛl ec’ey, ɛl e sɔgm ok es, ɛm e nin a sosiɛm a, -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn sakp ekŋ yen ok af ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
40019030	Kɔ agŋ nɔnɔ a eke caca ɛm el ánymu a, b’ow el ajamu ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ a eke caca ɛm el ajamu a, b’ow el ánymu."
40020001	"Tasi ɛm a, kin elel eke Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋn: gbreŋgbi nyam ɛy ɔkm ibribr fafa eke k’eb juma kok ɛsɛl in e viny ɔgm a eci, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋn.
40020002	Nɛny okr ɛl af juma kok ɛsɛl ab ab os nyam, ek’el lɛgŋ nyam e labm sɔg eci, ɛtŋ l’ot wɛl n’im in ec’ɔgm a.
40020003	Wanci libarm ɛm a, l’ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ l’ɛkn bɛb ek’anŋ ɛbɛrŋ ɛm ke ɔnym low kaka eke ki kok.
40020004	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ɔny yɛji ìmn ɛm ec’ɔgm a kokr juma, m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny labm sɔg ek’it a,'
40020005	ɛtŋ -n’im ɔgm a. Lɛgŋ b’uyu nuŋ, ɛmɛny ɔgm ɛs a ɛy ɔkm ot agŋ ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ncebles eci wanci nyahan ɛm yɛji, l’ɛy ɔkm li kok ɛbɛn.
40020006	Sica ncebles eci wanci yen ɛm a, l’ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’ɛkn agŋ ɛjeci ek’anŋ ɛbɛrŋ ɛm yogŋ. L’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: 'Kɔ bla ɛtŋ lɛgŋ mum a b’anŋn ɔfr ɔfr nɛnɛ ee?'
40020007	-Li dad ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ kaka ebm ɛy juma.' Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ek’ow el ɛbɛn, ke ɔny yɛji, ìmn ɛm eci viny ɔgm a kokr juma.'
40020008	Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, ɔgm ɛs a dad in ec’ob awl ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛ̀sŋ juma kok ɛsɛl a ke sɔ́g ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e labm a. B’ow ɔb nuŋ ajamu ab ɛm toŋ ke úwar ánymu ab ɛm.'
40020009	Agŋ a ek’ɔb juma nuŋ ncebles eci wanci yen ɛm a ow, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛŋn in ec’os nyam a.
40020010	Eke sica ow igŋ agŋ a eke wɛl ikŋ anym eb a ogŋ a, -li tutr eke -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn ow afŋ es; gbɛkɔ ɛl yɛji, wɛl ɔŋ ɛl ɛgŋ ɛgŋ os nyam.
40020011	Os a ec’eb ɛm a, -n’am ɛny abr -l’ok ɔgm ɛs ab af
40020012	-li dad -l’ɛsɛ: 'Juma kok ɛsɛl amua eke wɛl anŋ jam eb a, wanci nyam eci juma cɛ -li kok ɛtŋ sɔg ɛl labm ɛsɛ ɛy eke lɛgŋ mum a s’ij gbre ligbn kpaŋ kpaŋ na ɛm ab af!'
40020013	Gbɛkɔ ɔgm ɛs a dad ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ninɛ: 'Lawl, mi kokm ɛnyɛmbri yony owi ŋ e lís. Nɛny okr ɛy af os nyam ek’el lɛgŋ nyam juma eci, kɔ yadŋ ee?
40020014	Èb ŋ e labm sɔg a ke ím. M’erur eke ɛgŋ na eke wɛl anŋ jam eb a, m’ɔ́ŋ’n os a ɛsɛ ŋ ec’ab af.
40020015	Kɔ m’ɔnym abusu eke ɛm ec’os a, mi ki kokr low yec’eke m’erur ab ee? Kɔ ɛm ec’ɛrm mamn a e low a, nyamn ɛyr ow am ɔny’ŋ ee?' "
40020016	Ɛtŋ sica Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Agŋ ek’el ajamu a b’ow el ánymu, ɛtŋ agŋ ek’el ánymu a, b’ow el ajamu."
40020017	Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab am uyu im Jerusalɛm. Es an im ɛm a, l’ot jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ab n’im saw ɛm, ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ:
40020018	"Ìsr any ɛkan, kin Jerusalɛm anake s’am uyu s’im a; yogŋ, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ɛy egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lel ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab ec’abu ɛm. -Li b’ow -l’ɔb ow low luw eci,
40020019	ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’oc ow -n’ɔŋ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke ki kokr’r miyɛr, ɔr’r say ɛm, ɛw’r olikŋ af luw eci. Eke ow b’ow kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, li b’ow l’igb luw ɛm."
40020020	Sica Sebede ec’ey yony a ec’ɛl lis a ow titm Jesu, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ow ec’any af ɛtŋ n’am ibrm ow ob.
40020021	Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ bla low iy am erur ee?" Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋ eb eke ɛm ec’ey yony amua b’ow ok es susu amamn lɛgŋ eke b’ow eb ŋ ec’ɛb eb e lɛkpn a; nyam ánŋ lidr ogog ke nyam ánŋ nɛmn ogog."
40020022	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low yec’a ek’am ibrmn a, k’uwmn any. Kɔ ɔtur eke k’ɛgŋn gbre eci mij kpɔk a eke m’ow m’ɛgŋ ab ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, s’ɔtu."
40020023	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Tasi ɛm a, b’ow ɛgŋn ɛm e mij kpɔk a. Gbɛkɔ ɛm e lidr abu af ec’es sig a, lele nɛmn abu af ec’ab ab a, ow elm ɛm m’ɔɔm ɛgŋ; susu amua, ɛm Ɛs kok agŋ a eke li bɛbm sos a eci."
40020024	Eke jam ɛsɛl agŋ lɛw a iri low na a, -l’ebl ɛrm -l’ok agŋ lisijimɛl yony ab af.
40020025	Ow sosiɛm Jesu ɛsŋ ɛl fɛŋ ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛkan ɛb ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a, -li b’ɛw ɛb ab es abusu ɔny ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ any ɛsɛl ek’anŋ a b’ɛlu ɛl ec’abusu ɔny a ɔkm dedeku a e nuŋ af.
40020026	Gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’araŋn ec’a, ow k’ɛ́cr ɛbɛn. Eke batŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am erur e k’el ɔny ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ke l’él ɔny a fɛŋ ec’ob oc ɔŋ ɛs;
40020027	ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am erur eke k’el ɔny ec’anymu a, ke l’él ɔny a fɛŋ ec’adu.
40020028	Ɛbɛn nyam coco ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji owm ek’agŋ ki kok in e lís e low, kɔ l’ow eke li ki kok agŋ e lís e low, ke l’óc in e sel a l’ɛw awoba li sɔgr agŋ nɔnɔ."
40020029	Eke -l’okr ɔkm Jeriko a, agŋ nɔnɔ am us Jesu jam.
40020030	Kpɛkŋ kin, ány eflu yony eke sig es ejagb saw, -l’iri eke Jesu am ɛc. -N’am ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, David e lilaw, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
40020031	Dedeku a am ɛnym ɛl abr eke -li ki yewal, gbɛkɔ ca -n’am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, David e lilaw, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
40020032	Jesu inym es ɛtŋ ɛsŋ ɛl am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla low iy am erurir eke mi ki kok m’ɔŋ ɔny ee?"
40020033	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kòk ke ɛy ec’anyamn a ɛ́kn es."
40020034	Ɛl e low ɔny Jesu sɔrŋ ɛtŋ l’itŋn wɛl ec’anyamn a abu; kpɛkŋ agŋ a yony mum am ɛkn es, ɛtŋ -n’am us Jesu jam.
40021001	Sica Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab im titm Jerusalɛm. Eke -li titmn Bɛtfaje baŋn, Olivie lafɛny af a, Jesu ɛrm jam ɛsɛl yony.
40021002	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn baŋn a ek’anŋ ɔny any af ab ɛm; kpɛkŋ yogŋ b’ow ɛŋan gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋ yɔw nyam eke wɛl ucur es ke in e liy a anŋ in ab. Mɔ̀mun in es otr ɛl isr’m.
40021003	Eke batŋ ɛgŋ b’ibrm ɔny low, dàdr ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl a ɔny ow ec’es abur.' Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl b’ow ɛlu ɛl es ɔŋ ɔny."
40021004	Low na ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛs eci sodad amua eke dad a íy nɛny:
40021005	Dàdr Siɔn ec’agŋ a: kin ɔny ec’ɛb ebu a am ow ɔny ogŋ a frɔrɔ ɛm, l’uyu gbaŋkɔ yɔw lele in e liy ab af.
40021006	Jam ɛsɛl yony a im, ɛtŋ kok yec’a eke Jesu dad ɛl a.
40021007	-L’ot gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋ yɔw a lele liy ab ab -l’ow, -l’ot ɛl e sigbad a -l’ok wɛl af ɛtŋ Jesu sig es af.
40021008	Agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ot ɛl e sigbad a faf ejagb, bɛb am bubr ekŋ ál ok ejagb.
40021009	Agŋ a ek’anŋ’n anym a lele bɛb a ek’anŋ’n jam ab ab am ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Hosana! Anygbɛl él David e lilaw eci. Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ ɛgŋ ek’am ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ɔwrɔ! Anygbɛl él Nyam ek’anŋ afr kpekpe a eci!"
40021010	Ɛtŋ eke n’am ɛy Jerusalɛm a, bieku a fɛŋ am bɔbar. Wɛl am ibrm ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ na ee?"
40021011	Agŋ a am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na, kokoba ɔb ɛs Jesu, Nasarɛt ek’anŋ Galile wus af a ec’ɛgŋ."
40021012	Sica Jesu im ɛy Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ ogŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am ɔl mob ij a, lele agŋ a ek’am ɔl mob ab ab gbugŋ yogŋ. N’ɔny jɛtɛ titŋn ɛsɛl a e sitabl a lele prɛndrɛ ɔl ij ɛsɛl a e mɛkpn ab ab l’ok wus.
40021013	Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Nyam Lɛl ɛm a Nyam dad ninɛ: Wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ ɛm ec’êl a, Nyam ŋɔŋn ec’êl. Kɔ ɔny, am ocr kokr elu ec’ɛŋanin usu."
40021014	Ány eflu lele akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl ab ow titm Jesu Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ l’ewlm wɛl.
40021015	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab ɛkn ów any iti owi eke n’am kok, -l’ɛkn etuey ek’am ɔg Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm dad ɛsɛ: "Anygbɛl él David e lilaw eci!" Ɛrm ebl ɛl,
40021016	ɛtŋ -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kɔ am iri odad a eke -n’am dad ab ee?" Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, m’am iri kɔ lɛgŋ kaka awlmn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ec’odad na ek’el: Kok elel eke toŋ etuey lele ey mɛny nɛnym ab bɔbɔ yɛji kɔklm’ŋ ab ee?"
40021017	Ɛtŋ l’ɛlu wɛl es l’ɛy ɔkm ɛb ab ɛm, n’im Betani l’ɛru.
40021018	Lɛgŋ b’ɛny akr af ec’ibribr fafa a, eke Jesu am ɛwl ow ɛb ab ɛm a, namn ow’r sos.
40021019	L’ɛkn babm ikŋ nyam ek’inym es ejagb saw ɛtŋ n’im l’ɛy ow ec’ew a; gbɛkɔ n’ɛŋnm ob kaka ek’ow elm suw a cɛ. Li dad babm ikŋ a ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɔsum liy ij!" Kpɛkŋ wanci ab af cɛ babm ikŋ a inym es uw es.
40021020	Jam ɛsɛl a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, low iti ɛl any afŋn es, ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm Jesu -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf ɛtŋ babm ikŋ na inym es kpɛkŋ uw es ee?"
40021021	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: eke ɔnyn ɔmn ɛtŋ bɛbar anm ɔny ɛm a, ɔtur eke ki kokr low na eke mi kok babm ikŋ na a. Ow elm low na sɔny cɛ, kɔ ɔtur yɛji eke ki dadr ligigl na ɛsrɛ: 'Ŋ̀gboŋ aŋa, ke ím ɛy okij ɛm,' ɛtŋ ow b’ow el.
40021022	Eke ɔnyn ɔmn, b’ow ɛŋan low fɛŋ eke b’ow ibrmn Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm a."
40021023	Jesu ɛwl ow Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ low. Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ ec’abusu ɛm bi kok ów amua ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bwo b’ɔŋ’ŋ ow e kok ec’abusu ee?"
40021024	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm yɛji m’am ow m’ibrm ɔny low nyam cɛ; eke dadr’m a, ɛm yɛji mi b’ow mi dad ɔny abusu yec’ɛm eke mi bi kok ów amua a.
40021025	Kɔ bwo ɔŋ Jan abusu ow ok agŋ mij nuŋ ee? Kɔ Nyam oglog agŋ ee?" Ɛtŋ ow ɛw ɛl ów es atar ɛl ɔfr ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Eke si dad eke Nyam ɔŋ’n abusu l’ow, li b’ow l’ibrm ɛy l’ɛsɛ: 'Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ubmn in nawrɛ ee?'
40021026	Ɛtŋ eke si dad eke agŋ ɔŋ’n abusu l’ow yɛji, ow it eke si k’ɔny dedeku a e muru, aŋke tasi ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ b’oc Jan ɛsɛ kokoba ɔb ɛs af."
40021027	Ɛtŋ sica -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "S’uwm any." Ɛtŋ Jesu yɛji dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ɛm yɛji mi k’ow mi dadm ɔny abusu yec’ɛm eke mi bi kok ów amua fɛŋ a."
40021028	Jesu usr af dad ninɛ: "Kɔ ayaf am ɛkanin low na ee? Ɛgŋ nyam ɔny ey yony. Lɛgŋ nyam, li dad iy kpekp a ninɛ: 'Ɛm jim, yɛfɛnyna ìm ɔgm kok juma.'
40021029	Li dad ninɛ: 'M’iim', gbɛkɔ ow b’inŋn ebr a, l’itŋn odad ebl ɛtŋ n’im ɔgm a.
40021030	Odad nyam a cɛ, iy ɛs a dad ok jam ɛs a. Iy a dad ɛs ninɛ: 'M’ow m’im,' gbɛkɔ n’iim.
40021031	Agŋ yony na, bogŋ ec’anake kok ɛs ec’erur ab ee?" -Li dad ninɛ: "Iy kpekp a." Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele afacyɔw ab b’ow ikŋ ɔny anym Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.
40021032	Tasi ɛm a, Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ow ɔny ogŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e yɛgm eci, ɛtŋ ubmn in nawrɛ; gbɛkɔ wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele afacyɔw ab ub’r nawrɛ. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ów amua bɔbɔ ek’ɛkan a yɛji, itŋnmn ɛrm ɛm ubmn in nawrɛ."
40021033	"Ìrir nyandrɛ ɛm odad ɛjeci na: lɛgŋ nyam, ɔgm ɛs nyam ewl viny in ec’ɔgm a. N’awŋ lakp l’ɛlul ɛm, li kok usu eke wɛl k’ifi egb ey ab es, ɛtŋ li kok usu gege eke wɛl k’anŋ ɔsu ɔgm a. Ɛtŋ l’oc egb ɔgm a l’abul ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl ɛtŋ l’eb ejagb n’im usu.
40021034	Eke egb ub e lakpo ow a, l’ɛrm in ec’abu ɛlum ɛsɛl a im ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl a ogŋ eke li k’ɛŋn in ec’egb eke k’ɛbm’n a.
40021035	Ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl a ɔny in ec’abu ɛlum ɛsɛl a, ɔr nyam, ibi yec’a, ɛtŋ nyahan ɛm ec’a, -l’ibi ow mebn ɛm.
40021036	Sica ɔgm ɛs a ɛrm in ec’abu ɛlum ɛsɛl a im nɔnɔ ɛm akm krɛkrɛ ɛm ec’a, kɔ ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl a kok ɛl low nyam cɛ.
40021037	Ow e jam a, l’ɛrm in ec’iy a ɛtŋ n’am tutr l’ɛsɛ: '-Li b’ow -n’ɔny ɛm jim ec’ɛlum.'
40021038	Gbɛkɔ eke ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl a ɛkn iy a, -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: 'Kin ɛgŋ a eke godo godo b’ow el aja ij ɛs a! S’ímn, s’íbir ir ke egb ɔgm a él ɛy eci!'
40021039	-N’ɔny iy a, -l’oc -n’im -l’ɔwl ow ɔgm a e lakp jam a ɛtŋ -l’ibi ow."
40021040	Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ sica lɛgŋ eke egb ɔgm ɛs a b’ow ow a, bla lowi li b’ow li kok ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl ab ee?"
40021041	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Agŋ ibiu amua ec’a, sɔrŋ ikŋ k’ow anm ɛm, li b’ow l’ibi wɛl, l’éb ɔgm a l’abul ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjeci. Eke egb ub e lɛgŋ a b’ow ow a, wɛl b’ow ɔŋ’n in ec’egb ek’it a."
40021042	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ awlmn lɛgŋ kaka Nyam Lɛl ec’odad eke dad ab ee? Lebn a eke êl us ɛsɛl a oc ɔwl a, ɛwl el êl lɔy ɛm e lebn tasi. Na low ek’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ke el low sɔbɔ ɛy ec’any af."
40021043	Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "M’am dad ɔny, na sosiɛm wɛl b’ow eb ɔny Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a abu ɛm ɔŋ ɛbr nyam ec’agŋ a eke b’ow kok ow e low a. [
40021044	Ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛy lebn na af a, b’ow kikn es, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke lebn a b’ow ɛy af a, b’ow piplm ɛm el siflefl.]"
40021045	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele Farisiɛl ab iri Jesu eci sodad a, ɛtŋ -l’uw any eke ow am dad ɛl ec’odad.
40021046	-N’am ɔl akunda yec’ɛm eke -li k’ɛdŋn Jesu, gbɛkɔ -n’am uru dedeku a, aŋke agŋ amua b’oc Jesu ɛsɛ kokoba ɔb ɛs af.
40022001	Ɛmɛny Jesu oc nyandrɛ ɛm odad am dad ok agŋ a ek’ow low iri ɛm a. N’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ:
40022002	"Kin Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a ec’elel eke anŋn: es ɛw ɛs nyam kok ob ij, jim e mɛbi ec’es gbɛgbl a eci.
40022003	L’ɛrm in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a im eke k’ɛsŋ agŋ a eke l’ɛw abu ob ij na ec’a, kɔ -l’ɛgŋm -l’owm.
40022004	Ɛmɛny l’ɛrm juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjeci ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Dàdr agŋ a eke m’ɛw abu a: Sica wɛl iny ob ab ŋ̂, wɛl ibi ɛm eci sed a, mindey sɔbɔ fɛŋ iy nɛny. Òwr mɛbi a ec’es gbɛgbl a ec’ob ij ab ɛm!'
40022005	Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke wɛl ɛw abu a tutrm ow e low ɛtŋ im ɛl ec’ów ɛm: nyam ec’a, in ec’ɔgm owi ɛm, yec’a, in ec’an ɔl owi ɛm;
40022006	bɛb ɔny juma kok ɛsɛl a, ijr gbre ɛtŋ ibi ɛl.
40022007	Es ɛw ɛs a ɛrm ebl: l’ɛrm in ec’ar ɛsɛl a im ibi agŋ ibiu amua ɛtŋ ɛtul ɛl ec’ɛb a.
40022008	Sica li dad juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: 'Mɛbi a ec’es gbɛgbl ec’ob ij a bɛbmn ab, gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke m’ɛw abu a itm.
40022009	Ìmn sɛbɛrŋ ɛm, ke ɛ́wr agŋ ek’ɔtur eke k’ɛŋan a abu ob ij a eci.'
40022010	Juma kok ɛsɛl a im sɛbɛrŋ ab ɛm, as agŋ a fɛŋ eke -n’am ɛŋn a luku, amamn lele eŋuŋ ab, ɛtŋ es gbɛgbl usu a agŋ iy gbɔŋ.
40022011	Es ɛw ɛs a ɛy akŋ eke k’ɛkn agŋ a eke wɛl im ot ow a, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam ek’ɛwm es gbɛgbl a ec’ob sos.
40022012	Li dad ow ninɛ: 'Lawl, kɔ ayaf ɛyr akŋ aŋa, ɛtŋ ɛwm es gbɛgbl a ec’ob sos ee?' Ɛgŋ a yewal tiŋ.
40022013	Ɛtŋ es ɛw ɛs a dad juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: 'Àwŋn in sabu lele akr ab, ke ócr ɔwal il gbeŋ ncebn ab ɛm. Yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a.' "
40022014	Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Tasi ɛm a, wɛl ɛw nɔnɔ abu, kɔ tɛl cɛ wɛl sɔsum ot."
40022015	Sica ow ɔŋ Farisiɛl a im ut asre. -N’am bɛbm elel eke -li k’uk Jesu meb ke -n’ɔny ow odad ebl ɛm.
40022016	Ow b’uwr a, -l’ɛrm ɛl e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb lele Erɔd ec’ogog ec’agŋ ab im dad Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, s’uw any eke ŋ bi dad low nɛnyɛmbri nyam: Nyam ec’elel eke am ibrm eke si k’iir ɛb a, bi yɛgm ow ec’ejagb a kpɛŋ. Ɔ́nym ɛgŋ kaka e muru; ŋ ec’a, agŋ a fɛŋ el agŋ nɛnyɛmbri nyam.
40022017	Dàd ɛy yec’ek’am tutr odad na af a: kɔ ɛy ec’ol ab ɛm abusu ɛru es eke si ki sɔg wus labm s’ɔŋ Sesar ee?"
40022018	Gbɛkɔ Jesu uw ɛl eci sow tutr eŋuŋ ab any, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ukr’m meb ee?
40022019	Yɛ̀gmn’m os a eke wɛl b’oc sɔgr wus labm a." -L’oc os deŋ nyam -l’ow -li yɛgm ow,
40022020	ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Mɛny ɛwr na lele nin na eke wɛl nɔn os na af a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ec’ow el ee?"
40022021	-Li dad ninɛ: "Sesar eci." Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ke ɔ̀ŋn Sesar yec’ek’el Sesar ec’a, ke ɔ́ŋn Nyam yec’ek’el Nyam ec’a."
40022022	Eke -l’irir odad a, low iti ɛl any afŋn es, ɛtŋ -l’ɛlu ow es -n’im.
40022023	Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Sadusiɛl bɛb ow ɛŋn Jesu. (Ke Sadusiɛl anake bi dad ɛsɛ luw ɛm anŋ igb in anm a.) -N’am ibrm Jesu low na
40022024	-l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kin Mois ec’elel eke dadr: Eke ɛgŋ nyam uw ɛtŋ l’ewm ey a, ow it eke lisijim k’ɛbi iŋnyɔw a ew ey in ab ɛw’r nin es.
40022025	Kin ɛy ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl lɔbŋ e low ek’ɛŋn: likpekp a ɛbi yɔw, ewm iy kaka toŋ ɛtŋ l’uw. Eke l’ewm iy a, l’ɛlu lisijim iŋnyɔw ab es.
40022026	Lisijim yony ɛm a yɛji ɛbɛn, nyahan ɛm ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn; ɛtŋ ɛl lɔbŋ mum ec’a, ow el ɛbɛn.
40022027	Eke ɛl fɛŋ -l’uwr a, yɔw a yɛji uw.
40022028	Sica lɛgŋ eke agŋ ek’uw a b’ow igb luw ɛm a, agŋ lisijimɛl lɔbŋ a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ anake yɔw a b’ow el in ec’ab ee? Aŋke ɛl fɛŋ -l’ɛbi ow, ow el ɛl e yɔw!"
40022029	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny, ek’am irmn, aŋke uwmn Nyam Lɛl a eke wɛl nɔn a ab any, ɛtŋ Nyam ec’abusu a yɛji uwmn any.
40022030	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ ek’agŋ ek’uw a b’ow igb a, egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab k’ow ɛbirm okm es ij, kɔ -li b’ow -l’ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl anŋn afr ab af.
40022031	Yec’a eke k’el agŋ eke k’igb luw ɛm a, kɔ awlmn lɛgŋ kaka low yec’a eke Nyam dad ɔny ab ee? Li dad ninɛ:
40022032	Ɛm m’el Abraham e Nyam, Isak e Nyam, lele Jakɔb e Nyam ab." Ɛtŋ Jesu usr af dad ninɛ: "Kɔ agŋ ek’uw a e Nyam li k’el ee? Njaŋ, l’el agŋ ek’uw ke anŋ owr a e Nyam."
40022033	Eke dedeku a iri low na a, ow ɔr ɛl.
40022034	Eke Farisiɛl iri eke Jesu abl Sadusiɛl nɛny es odad ebl ɛm a, -l’ut asre.
40022035	Ɛtŋ ɛl ɛm ec’ol e low yɛgm ɛs gbɛl nyam erur eke k’ɛbm Jesu. L’ibrm ow ninɛ:
40022036	"Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ ol a fɛŋ ɛm e ligbɛl el bogŋ ec’ee?"
40022037	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "B’ow erur Asŋ Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam ŋ ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ŋ ec’abŋ fɛŋ ɛm, lele ŋ e tutr pupukpaŋ ab.
40022038	Na anak’el ol ab ɛm e ligbɛl lele ow eci tasi ab a.
40022039	Ɛtŋ kin yony ɛm ec’eke akpl ot krɛkrɛ ec’ab es: b’ow erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi ŋ obi af.
40022040	Mois ec’ ol a fɛŋ lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci low yɛgm ab ab anŋ ol yony na ɛm."
40022041	Farisiɛl as luku ɛtŋ Jesu am ibrm ɛl low na:
40022042	"Tutr eke ɔnyn Mesi a e lís el bogŋ ec’ee? Bwo e lilaw eel ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "L’el David e lilaw."
40022043	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ kɔ sica ayaf David ek’Abŋ Lala nyimn a ɔtu ɛsŋ’n 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ' ee? Ke David dad ninɛ:
40022044	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam dad ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ninɛ: Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af toŋ bake m’ót ŋ ec’efnu a m’ok ŋ ec’akr ew.
40022045	Eke sica David b’ɛsŋ’n 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ', ke ayaf Mesi a ɔtu eke k’el David e lilaw ee?"
40022046	Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum pigm nɛny dadm odad nyam coco yɛji, ɛtŋ ow e lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ a, ɛgŋ kaka úsm ibram’n low ij.
40023001	Sica Jesu am dad bieku a lel in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ɛsɛ:
40023002	"Wɛl abul ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab Mois ec’ ol a ec’akr otar.
40023003	Ow sosiɛm ɛ̀lumn ɛl, ke kókr low yec’a eke -li bi dad ɔny a, gbɛkɔ k’èbr ɛl ec’es an a e lakr, aŋke low a eke -li bi yɛgm agŋ a, -li kokmn.
40023004	Ow b’el ɛrɛkp leg leg eke -li b’awŋ -l’itm agŋ ɔbi af, kɔ ɛl obi ɛm a, -l’ɛgŋmn -l’ocmn abuli ɛm -l’ɛluamn agŋ abu uyum sɛrɛkp leg leg amua.
40023005	Ɛl ec’ów fɛŋ e kok ɛm, -li b’erur ek’ɛgŋ ki lɛr ɛl. Ow ɛm a, Nyam odad a eke -li b’oc -l’ucu ɛl e sos a, b’ɛw low agbr ɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛl eci mob af ɛw a ec’ɛnyɛmbri a eke -li bi gigŋ a yɛji b’ar es afŋn es.
40023006	Ek’ow el ob ij ec’es gbɛgbl ɛm yɛji, -li b’erur susu amamn, ɛtŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a, -li bi dogŋn mɛkpn anym es;
40023007	-li b’erur eke dedeku ɛm wɛl k’ɛsŋn ɛl ɛlum ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -li b’erur ek’agŋ k’ɛsŋ ɛl 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs'.
40023008	Gbɛkɔ ɔny, k’ɔ̀ŋn agŋ k’ɛsŋ ɔny 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs', aŋke ɛgŋ nyam coco cɛ bi yɛgm ɔny low ɛtŋ ɔny fɛŋ eel agŋ lisijimɛl ɔfr.
40023009	Wus af aŋa, k’ɛ̀sŋn ɛgŋ kaka ɛy 'Ɛs', aŋke ɛgŋ Ɛs nyam coco ɔnyn, in a ek’anŋ afr a.
40023010	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny k’ɔ̀ŋn ɛgŋ k’ɛsŋ ɔny 'Es Ɛw Ɛs', aŋke Es Ɛw Ɛs nyam coco ɔnyn, in l’el Mesi a.
40023011	Ow it ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a k’él ɔny ec’ob oc ɔŋ ɛs.
40023012	Ɛgŋ eke b’ow igbl’l in sosi ogŋ a, wɛl b’ow is’r es, gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow is es a, wɛl b’ow igbl’l ogŋ."
40023013	"Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab, ɔny agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’abal Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a e lisany a agŋ ec’any af. Ɔny obi ókmn ɛm ɛtŋ agŋ a eke b’erur eke k’ok ɛm a, ɛ́gŋmn -l’okmn ɛm. [
40023014	]
40023015	Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab, ɔny, agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’ɛcar mij af eci, wus wɛwɛ af eci imn susu fɛŋ eke k’ɛŋan ɛgŋ nyam coco eke k’us ɔny jam; eke b’ɛŋan in a, bi kokar ir l’ot gbre ij usu ec’ɛgŋ es sakp yony l’akm ɔny.
40023016	Nyimn ɛsɛl ek’any efl, gbre él ɔny eci! Ɔny bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ij nɛny Nyamel gbɛl a e nin ɛm, ke n’anm nɛny ij ab ɛm; kɔ eke l’ij nɛny sika a ek’anŋ Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a e nin ɛm, ke n’anŋ nɛny ij ab ɛm.'
40023017	Ɔny anyamb agŋ! Ány eflu! Kɔ bogŋ ec’ob anake ɔny any ab ee? Sika a, kɔ Nyamel gbɛl a eke b’ɔŋ sika a ɔny any ab ee?
40023018	Ɛmɛny bi dadr yɛji ɛsrɛ: 'Ek’ɛgŋ ij nɛny egb waw usu e nin ɛm, ke n’anm nɛny ij ab ɛm; kɔ eke l’ij nɛny ob ap a ek’anŋ egb waw usu a e nin ɛm a, ke n’anŋ nɛny ij ab ɛm.'
40023019	Ány eflu! Bogŋ ec’ob anake ɔny any ab ee? Ob ap a, kɔ egb waw usu a eke b’ɔŋ ob ap a ɔny any ab ee?
40023020	Ɛgŋ ek’am ij nɛny egb waw usu a e nin ɛm a, am ij nɛny egb waw usu a lel ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ egb waw usu ab ab e nin ɛm.
40023021	Ɛgŋ ek’am ij nɛny Nyamel gbɛl a e nin ɛm a, am ij nɛny Nyamel gbɛl a lele Nyam ek’ir ɛm ab ab e nin ɛm.
40023022	Ɛgŋ ek’am ij nɛny afr e nin ɛm a, am ij nɛny Nyam e lɛkpn a lele Nyam eke sig es af ab ab e nin ɛm.
40023023	Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab, ɔny agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’ɔŋn Nyam ɔny ec’ob ek’ewal a eci sakp lɛw ɛm toŋ mob sɔsŋn ob ab yɛji, gbɛkɔ b’igŋn low yɛgm amamn a ek’el ol a ec’a ɛlul es, ɛsɛ jɛj ok nyim nyim, sɔrŋ ikŋ lele nɛny nyam ij ab. Ke tasi ɛm a, low na anake wɛl ki kok a, ke ow e likpr a yɛji, wɛl k’igŋm ɛlum es.
40023024	Nyimn ɛsɛl ek’any efl! B’ɔsr mij es eke k’ɔnyn kpikpi ek’anŋ ɛm a ocr es, kɔ b’ɛman gbaŋkɔ kedebnam!
40023025	Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab, ɔny agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke ɔny e mij kpɔk lel ɔny e kpokpo ab ab e jam jam a, b’ɛtŋn es, kɔ ow e lokm a, ów eŋuŋ b’iy ɛm: sos es ɔnyn anm ɔny ɛm, b’erurir ob ɔny toŋ él ɔny mil.
40023026	Farisiɛl ek’any efl, tɛ̀tŋn mij kpɔk a e lokm ab es yɛ, ɛtŋ ow e jam jam a yɛji b’ow ayl.
40023027	Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab, ɔny agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke ɔny b’otr suwɔmu eke wɛl ufur es; ow ec’af a b’akpl, kɔ ow e lokm a, agŋ ek’uw ec’ew lele kpɔtɔm owi ab b’anŋ.
40023028	Ɛbɛn nyam coco ɔny yɛji, sos af a, bi yɛgmn agŋ ek’ijr nɛny nyam Nyam ec’any af, kɔ ɔny e lokm a, ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony lele ów eŋuŋ ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ.
40023029	Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab, ɔny agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke bi kokr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci suwɔmu a akpl, ɛtŋ b’ijr mɛwl nɛny nyam ɛsɛl ec’ab af,
40023030	ɛtŋ bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Blel ɛy lagŋɛl e lɛgŋ ab ɛm s’anŋ ana, ke blel nɛny okrm ɛy af s’ibim kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a.'
40023031	Ɛbɛn a, ɔny obi ɛm uwar ɔny sosi any eke eel agŋ a ek’ibi kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a ec’alaw.
40023032	Sica ɔny ec’a, abu ánŋ ɔny ɛm! Ùwarir low yec’a eke ɔny lagŋɛl ɔb nuŋ a!
40023033	Ɔny morŋn kpu ec’eb amua, ayaf ɔtur eke k’ánmn gbre ij usu ee?
40023034	Na sosiɛm kin, m’ow m’ɛrm kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, agŋ nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl lele low yɛgm ɛsɛl tasi ab ɔny ogŋ. Ɔny b’ow ibir bɛb, ɛwr bɛb ol likŋ af. Ɔny e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, b’ow ɔɔr bɛb say ɛm, ɛtŋ b’ow ogŋn ɛl es ɛb ɛb ɛm.
40023035	Ow ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋan low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl eci low ŋuŋ a eke wɛl kok a ec’abr ɛnym ek’it a. Ow ɔb nuŋ nɛny nyam ɛs Abɛl eci low ŋuŋ a eke wɛl kok ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ow im toŋ ɛdŋ nuŋ Zakari Baraki jim ec’ab ɛm. Ibir ir egb waw usu a lele usu lala ab ab ec’araŋn a.
40023036	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ów eŋuŋ a ec’abr ɛnym a ek’it a b’ow ɛy yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a e nuŋ af!"
40023037	"Jerusalɛm Jerusalɛm, ŋ eke b’ibi kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ke b’ɔr agŋ eke Nyam b’ɛrm ow ŋ ogŋ a mebn ɛm a! Sakp abi m’erur eke mi k’as ŋ ec’ey luku ɛm e lís, ɛsɛ elel eke ŋgɔs ey lis b’as in ec’ey luku ɔw éw ab af, ɛtŋ ɛ́gŋm!
40023038	Ow sosiɛm kin, Nyam b’ow digŋ ɔny ec’akŋ a ɛlu es foŋ.
40023039	Tasi ɛm m’am dad ɔny: k’ow ɛknmn’m toŋ ba ke lɛgŋ a ow; yogŋ anake b’ow dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ ɛgŋ ek’am ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ɔwrɔ a!' "
40024001	Jesu ɛy ɔkm Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ɛtŋ aam. In e jam ɛsɛl a im ɛŋn’n eke ki yɛgm’n Nyamel gbɛl a ec’elel eke wɛl usr a.
40024002	Jesu ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Am ɛkan ów amua fɛŋ ee? Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: aŋa lebn kaka k’ow usrm lawl lebn af anm, fɛŋ b’ow ɛr ok wus."
40024003	Eke Jesu sig es Olivie lafɛny af a, jam ɛsɛl a im ɛŋn’n in sɔny ɛm ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Dàd ɛy ɔ! Kɔ bogŋ lɛgŋ iy low na b’ow ɛy, ɛtŋ bogŋ eci mɛny ɛwr b’ow yɛgm ŋ e mowrer lele wus na e nuŋ ɛdŋ ab ee?"
40024004	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Kì yɛbr ɛgŋ k’irmn ɔny.
40024005	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ow ɛm e nin ɛm dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm Mesi a', ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’irmn agŋ bubutɛ.
40024006	B’ow irir ar ek’am ɛy aŋa e likekr lele ar owi eke b’ow ɛy akpoj a ec’amani ab; kì yɛbr erŋn k’ɔny ɔny. Ow it ek’ów amua k’ɛy, kɔ ow k’elm wus na e nuŋ ɛdŋ.
40024007	Tasi ɛm a, ɛbr nyam ec’agŋ b’ow im ɛŋn ɛbr ɛjeci nyam ogŋ ar; es ɛw nyam b’ow im ɛŋn es ɛw ɛjeci nyam ar ogŋ eci; lek b’ow ɛy ɛtŋ wus b’ow umu susu susu af.
40024008	Ów amua fɛŋ b’ow ɛw ɛsɛ iy ɔnyn eci dudu krɛkrɛ ab af.
40024009	Ow sosiɛm agŋ b’ow ot im ɔny gbre ijr eci ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ibi ɔny. Ɛm sosiɛm ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ b’ow ifn ɔny.
40024010	Ɛtŋ ow e lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow irmn ɛl ec’ɔmn; -li b’ow -l’ɛjurir ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ifanin ɛl ɔfr yɛji.
40024011	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu nɔnɔ b’ow ok ɔkm ɛtŋ b’ow irmn agŋ nɔnɔ.
40024012	Low ŋuŋ kok b’ow ɛny eb es toŋ ke agŋ bɛb ec’erur ek’ɔny a írm.
40024013	Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow inym es kikri toŋ ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn sel.
40024014	Wɛl b’ow ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn na wus na nimum af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ íj daŋku; ke sica ow él ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ gɔŋ."
40024015	"Sica b’ow ɛkan ob yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Musue ob iy' eke kokoba ɔb ɛs Daniɛl dad ow ec’odad a. Wɛl b’ow ɛw’r usu lala a. (Ke ɛgŋ eke b’ow awl ów amua a, íri sɛnyn sɛnyn!)
40024016	Ke kpɛkŋ agŋ a eke b’ow anŋ Jude wus af a, ow akpl ke -l’uru es -n’im mafɛny ɛm;
40024017	ɛgŋ eke b’ow anŋ in ec’êl af e lɛf eb usu a, k’úsm es ɛym akŋ ocm ob;
40024018	ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ow anŋ ɔgm a, k’ɛ́wlm iim jam ocm in e mob af ɛw a ij.
40024019	Sɛgŋ amua b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ molok ab lisɛl lel ɛl ek’am ɔŋ ey mɛny ab ab eci.
40024020	Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke es uru ikŋ na k’ɛ́ym nyam es us ɛm, oglog nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ!
40024021	Tasi ɛm a, ow e lɛgŋ ab ɛm, gbre ij a b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ afŋn es. Ow b’ow akm gbre ij fɛŋ eke wɛl ɛkn wus e nuŋ ɔb ɛm toŋ ke k’it yɛfɛnyna ec’a. Lɛgŋ kaka, gbre ij ikŋ na k’ow anm ij.
40024022	Ɛtŋ blel Nyam ɛgŋm isrm sɛgŋ amua ɛm, ke ɛgŋ kaka blel ɔtum anm owr. L’isr sɛgŋ amua ɛm agŋ a eke li sɔsum l’ot a sosiɛm eci.
40024023	Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam bi dad ɔny ɛsɛ: 'Ɛ̀kan, Mesi a anŋ aŋa!' oglog: 'N’anŋ yogŋ a!' k’ùbr ɛgŋ a nawrɛ.
40024024	Tasi ɛm a, mesiɛl ayadŋu lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu ab b’ow ok ɔkm. -Li b’ow -li kok mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl lele ów any iti owi ab agŋ ec’irmn eci, ɛtŋ ek’ow it yɛji, -l’ɔtu -l’irmn agŋ a eke Nyam sɔsum ot a.
40024025	Kin, ìrir! M’ikŋ anym m’ɛwar ɔny.
40024026	Eke batŋ wɛl bi dad ɔny ɛsɛ: 'Ɛ̀kan, n’anŋ loj yogŋ!' k’ìmn. Oglog ek’ɛgŋ bi dad ɔny ɛsɛ: 'Ɛ̀kan, n’am lɔl es aŋa!' k’ùbr ir nawrɛ.
40024027	Ɛsɛ elel eke afr b’ɛŋn ke b’ayal yogŋ a eke ligbn b’igb, toŋ ok yogŋ a eke ligbn b’ɛru es a, ɛbɛn eke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow owr ana.
40024028	Yogŋ eke sos megl ugŋn anŋ a, yogŋ anake sikaka b’as luku a."
40024029	"Kpɛkŋ eke sɛgŋ ab ɛm eci gbre ij owi a b’oc es a, ligbn b’ow irm es ɛtŋ awl yɛji k’ow afŋm ij, mílɛ́l b’ow anŋ afr ok wus ɛtŋ afr ec’abusu owi fɛŋ b’ow wuwal.
40024030	Ɛtŋ sica ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e mɛny ɛwr a b’ow ɛy ɔkm afr; ɛtŋ wus na nimum ec’ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ b’ow ikŋ ɔŋn kok sɔrŋ, -li b’ow -l’ɛkn ɛgŋ ec’Iy eke b’ow anŋ afr e jru ɛm am ow abusu fɛŋ lel anygbɛl ab.
40024031	Krɔkr gbɛl a b’ow ikŋ, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a im wus na eci ɔy yar ab ɛm as agŋ a eke li sɔsum l’ot a luku; ow b’ow ɔb nuŋ ogog nyam toŋ ogog yec’a."
40024032	"Kin low yɛgm ek’el babm e likŋ a eci eke k’irir: kpɛkŋ eke in ec’ál a b’ɛw wrɔwrɔ, ke n’am gigŋ ɔdɔdɔ a, kpɛkŋ b’uwr any eke mewij ow titm ŋ̂.
40024033	Ɛbɛn nyam coco, eke b’ɛkan ów amua ow a, ke kpɛkŋ úwr any eke low a titm, ɛtŋ ow b’ow ɛy.
40024034	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a fɛŋ k’ow uwm uwrm ɛtŋ ów amua b’ow ɛy.
40024035	Afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛc, gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ kaka ɛm e sodad a k’ow ɛcm."
40024036	"Gbɛkɔ ów a e lɛgŋ lele wanci ab ab eke b’ow ɛy a, ɛgŋ kaka uwm any: afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yɛji uwm any, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy bɔbɔ yɛji uwm any, ek’ow elm ɛm Ɛs sɔny coco cɛ.
40024037	Low yec’a ek’ɛy Noe e lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, lɛgŋ ek’ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow a, ow b’ow el ɛbɛn.
40024038	Tasi ɛm a, ow e lɛgŋ a, gbuŋ ke mij gbɛl a ek’an a eci lɛgŋ ów a, agŋ am ij ɛtŋ am ɛgŋ ɛsɛ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’ab af. -N’am ɛbi ɔyɔw, -n’am ɛbir ɛl ec’ey ɔyɔw egŋ toŋ batŋ it lɛgŋ a eke Noe ɛy mijɛtŋ gbɛl ab ɛm a;
40024039	-l’ɛwm ow e low ɛrm toŋ ow it lɛgŋ a eke mij gbɛl a an ot ɛl fɛŋ ab im a. Lɛgŋ ek’ɛgŋ ec’Iy b’ow ow a, ɛbɛn ek’ow b’ow ɛcr ana.
40024040	Ow ɛm a, ek’agŋ yony anŋ ɔgm, wɛl b’ow oc nyam ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.
40024041	Ek’ɔyɔw yony am bɛbm sos ob iny eci, wɛl b’ow oc nyam ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.
40024042	Ɔ̀sur, aŋke uwmn lɛgŋ a eke ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ow ab any.
40024043	Ìrir low na ow ók ɔny es sos ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn: blel akŋ ɛs b’uw ncok e wanci ek’ulu k’ow ab any ana, ke blel n’ánŋ any owr yec’ɛtŋ ke li kí yɛbm ow ɛpirm ɛym’n akŋ.
40024044	Na sosiɛm, ɔny yɛji, bɛ̀bmn sos, aŋke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow wanci af eke k’ow ɔmnmn a."
40024045	"Bwo ec’ɛgŋ el juma kok ɛs mamn lele nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs ab ee? Kin ɛgŋ nyam eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs a ɔŋ abusu eke k’ɛkn juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjec’a e lís e low, n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl ob ij wanci a ek’ow b’it a.
40024046	Ehe él juma kok ɛs ikŋ na eci, eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs a e mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm, b’ow ɛŋan am kok juma a!
40024047	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: es ɛw ɛs a b’ow afl in ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ es ɛlul il abu ɛm.
40024048	Gbɛkɔ ek’ow el juma kok ɛs ŋuŋ, li b’ow li dad in ec’ɛrm ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm ec’es ɛw ɛs a k’ow owm caca.'
40024049	Ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ɔb nuŋ n’am ɔr in e juma ɛm e lawlɛl a, n’ám ij ke n’ám ɛgŋ, mar ɛgŋ ɛsɛl ab ab.
40024050	Kɔ es ɛw ɛs a b’ow ɛwl ow lɛgŋ nyam eke li k’ow n’ɔmnm, wanci nyam af eke li k’ow l’uwm any.
40024051	Li b’ow l’ogŋ juma kok ɛs a ke n’ɔ́ŋ ow ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl eci gbre ij a; yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a."
40025001	"Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ ededyɔw oto lɛw a e low ab af. -L’ot ɛl e mun al a ɛtŋ -l’ok ɔkm -n’aam -l’ɔbr mɛbi ɛs a.
40025002	Ɛl ɛm a, yen ɛ́wm low ɛrm ɛtŋ yen a gbɛ b’ɛw low ɛrm.
40025003	Ɛl a eke ɛ́wm low ɛrm a, ot ɛl e mun al a, kɔ -l’ocm mun kaka -l’akŋam abu ab.
40025004	Ɛtŋ ɛl a eke b’ɛw low ɛrm a, ot ɛl e mun al a lele mun ek’anŋ mun kpar ɛm ab im.
40025005	Eke mɛbi ɛs a ec’ow a am ibn, ɔyɔw oto a fɛŋ mɛmn eb sos, ɛtŋ am ɛru mɛmn.
40025006	Eke lɛgŋ usu a, lebl nyam ikŋ dad ninɛ: 'Kin mɛbi ɛs a! Òkr ɔkm ɔbar ir!'
40025007	Ededyɔw oto lɛw a ufŋm es igb ɛtŋ am bɛbm ɛl e mun al a sos.
40025008	Low ɛrm ɛ́wm lisɛl a am dad likpr a ɛsɛ: 'Ɔ̀ŋn ɛy ɔny e mun a tɛl, kɔ ɛy e mun al a am irm es.'
40025009	-Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Njaŋ, aŋke ow ɛnym eke ow b’ow ɛbm ɛy bake ow ɛbm ɔny. Ìmn ɔl ij usu a, ke ɔ́ɔl ɔny eci.'
40025010	Low ɛrm ɛ́wm lisɛl a im am ɔl mun, ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ mɛbi ɛs a ow. Ededyɔw oto yen a eke bɛbm sos a ok es gbɛgbl usu a in ab ɛtŋ wɛl abl êl a safuɛ ɛm.
40025011	Eke ow ibn tɛl a, ɔyɔw oto ɛjec’a yɛji ow, ɛtŋ am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛgŋ gbɛl, fìg ɛy lisany!'
40025012	Kɔ mɛbi ɛs a dad ninɛ: 'Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: m’uwm ɔny any.' "
40025013	Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Ɔ̀sur aŋke uwmn lɛgŋ a lele wanci ab ab any."
40025014	"Tasi ɛm a, Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyam ek’am ow im usu af. L’ɛsŋ in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ l’abul wɛl in ec’ob ɔny a.
40025015	N’ɔŋ nyam sika ɛm os yen, yec’a yony, ɛtŋ nyahan ɛm ec’a nyam. Ɛgŋ ɛgŋ eci lɛc ogŋ eke b’im ok a, ow ɛm li cɛc wɛl os a, ɛtŋ n’im.
40025016	Kpɛkŋ juma kok ɛs a ek’ɛŋn yen a oc im ɔɔl an ɛtŋ ɛŋn sika ɛm os ɛjeci yen.
40025017	Yec’a ek’ɛŋn yony a yɛji kok ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ ɛŋn sika ɛm os ɛjeci yony.
40025018	Gbɛkɔ yec’a ek’ɛŋn ekŋ nyam a im ur nɔmu lɔl in ɛgŋ gbɛliy ec’os ab es ɛm.
40025019	Eke ow kok sɛgŋ nɔnɔ a, juma kok ɛsɛl a ec’es ɛw ɛs a ow, ɛtŋ wɛl ab n’am ub ob.
40025020	In a eke ɛŋn sika ɛm os yen a, ɛri ow ɛtŋ ok ɛjeci yen ɔkm ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: 'Es ɛw, ɔŋ’m sika ɛm os yen. M’ɛŋn ekŋ ɛjeci yen: kin ow.'
40025021	In eci es ɛw ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ow akpl, ŋ juma kok ɛs mamn nɛny nyam ɛs. Ij nɛny nyam ów ekekey ɛm, m’ow m’abul’ŋ ów ɛgbɛl. Òw kok sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab.'
40025022	Juma kok ɛs a eke ɛŋn sika ɛm os yony a yɛji ow dad ninɛ: 'Es ɛw, ɔŋ’m sika ɛm os yony. M’ɛŋn ɛjeci yony: kin ow.'
40025023	In ec’es ɛw ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ow akpl, ŋ juma kok ɛs mamn nɛny nyam ɛs. Ij nɛny nyam ów ekekey ɛm, m’ow m’abul’ŋ ów ɛgbɛl. Òw kok sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab.'
40025024	Sica juma kok ɛs a ek’ɛŋn sika ɛm os nyam a ɛri ow ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: 'Es ɛw, m’uw any eke ŋ ɛw tuɔtuɔ: yogŋ eke ewlm a, b’ɔw, yogŋ eke ɛlum egb nɔmu ɛm a yɛji b’ub.
40025025	Erŋn ɔny’m ɛtŋ m’oc ŋ ec’os a mi lɔl es nɔmu ɛm: kin ow.'
40025026	In ec’es ɛw ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ŋ juma kok ɛs ŋuŋ, ɔrŋu! Uw any eke mi b’ɔw egb yogŋ eke m’ewlm a, ɛtŋ mi b’ub egb yogŋ eke m’ɛlum egb nɔmu ɛm.
40025027	Blel óc ɛm ec’os a ɛw es ob es ɛw usu, ke ɛm eci mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm a, m’óc ɛm ec’ob a lele ow eci mij ab ab.
40025028	Èbr ir sika ɛm os nyam a abu ɛm, ke ócr ɔŋn ɛgŋ a ek’ɔny sika ɛm os lɛw a.
40025029	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’ɔnym ob ab a, wɛl b’ow obn’n ɛtŋ ow b’ow ufu’r es, kɔ ɛgŋ ek’ɔnym ob kaka a, tɛl a eke n’ɔny a yɛji, wɛl b’ow ɔdu eb’r abu ɛm.
40025030	Juma kok ɛs keskes na ec’a, ɔ̀nyn ɔwal il gbeŋ ncebn ab ɛm, yogŋ anake ɔŋn ikŋ lele an ɛm sasagr ab b’ow anŋ a.' "
40025031	"Lɛgŋ ek’ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow in ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl fɛŋ ab a, li b’ow li sigr in ec’ɛb ebu el e lɛkpn a.
40025032	Wus na nimum eci ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ b’ow as luku in ec’any af, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ok agŋ a sakp yony ɛsɛ elel eke mɛbob ɔsu ɛs b’ok mɛcɛb ogog ke b’ok sican ogog ab af.
40025033	Li b’ow l’ok mɛcɛb in e lidr ogog a, ke l’ók sican in e nɛmn ogog a.
40025034	Ɛtŋ ɛb ebu a b’ow dad agŋ a ek’anŋ in e lidr ogog a ɛsɛ: 'Ɔny a eke ɛm Ɛs ɛdŋ ɔwrɔ a, òwr ke íjr gbreŋgbi usu a eke wɛl kok ɛw es wus e nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ a ec’aja.
40025035	Tasi ɛm a, namn ɔny’m ɛtŋ ɔŋn’m ob m’ij; mijamn ɔny’m ɛtŋ ɔŋn’m mij m’ɛgŋ; m’el utuɛgŋ ɛtŋ ebr ɛlul’m akŋ;
40025036	m’anŋ sos ɔfr ɛtŋ ɛwr’m ob sos; m’anŋ ɔl ɛm, ɛtŋ kokr’m sos; m’anŋ sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ owr ɛkan’m.'
40025037	Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke kok Nyam ec’erur a b’ow ibrm’n ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ bogŋ e lɛgŋ s’ɛkn’ŋ namn ab ɛtŋ s’ɔŋ’ŋ ob ij, oglog mijamn ɛm ɛtŋ s’ɔŋ’ŋ mij ɛgŋ ee?
40025038	Kɔ bogŋ e lɛgŋ s’ɛkn’ŋ ɛsɛ utu af, ɛtŋ s’eb s’ɛlu’ŋ akŋ, oglog sos ɔfr ɛtŋ s’ɛw’ŋ ob sos ee?
40025039	Kɔ bogŋ e lɛgŋ s’ɛkn’ŋ ɔl ɛm oglog sobel ɛm ɛtŋ s’ow s’ɛkn’ŋ ee?'
40025040	Ɛb ebu a b’ow dad ɛl ɛsɛ: 'Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: sakp sakp fɛŋ a eke kokr ów amua ɔŋn ɛm lisijimɛl ey amua ɛm e likekli nyam a, ke ɛm anake kokr ɔŋn a.'
40025041	Ɛtŋ ɛb ebu a b’ow dad agŋ a ek’anŋ’n nɛmn ogog a ɛsɛ: 'Ɔny agŋ eke wɛl ofn, kpàbr’m es lís imn kpekpe. Ìmn al a ek’iram es ab ɛm, al a eke wɛl kok ɛw agn lele in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab es a.
40025042	Tasi ɛm a, namn ɔny’m ɛtŋ ɔɔmn’m ob m’ijm; mijamn ɔny’m ɛtŋ ɔɔmn’m mij m’ɛgŋm;
40025043	m’el utuɛgŋ, ɛtŋ ebmn’m; m’anŋ sos ɔfr, ɛtŋ ɛwmn’m ob sos; m’anŋ ɔl ɛm, m’anŋ sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ kokmn ɛm e lís e low kaka.'
40025044	Ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ bogŋ e lɛgŋ s’ɛkn’ŋ namn, mijamn, oglog utuɛgŋ, oglog sos ɔfr, oglog ɔl ɛm, oglog sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ s’ɛluam’ŋ abu ee?'
40025045	Ɛb ebu a b’ow dad ɛl ɛsɛ: 'Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: sakp sakp fɛŋ eke kokmn ów amua ɔɔmn ɛm e jam ɛsɛl ey amua ɛm e nyam a, ke ɛm anake kokmn ɔɔmn a.'
40025046	Ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’im gbre ij ek’ɔnym uwr ab ɛm, ke agŋ a eke kok Nyam ec’erur a ím sel ɛŋn ek’ɔnym uwr ab ɛm."
40026001	Eke Jesu dad ów ɔm eci sodad amua bake ow uwr a, li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ:
40026002	"Uwr any eke ow anŋ sɛgŋ yony ke Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a ów. Wɛl b’ow ɔl ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ij yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ɔ́b’r ecigbrɔ olikŋ af."
40026003	Ke ɛbɛn a, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele Jwifɛl ɛm ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab as luku egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Kayif e gbugŋ a;
40026004	ɛl fɛŋ -l’okr af -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb eke ew ew ɛm -li k’ɔny Jesu ke -l’ibi ow.
40026005	-N’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ow itm eke si k’ɔny’n es gbɛgbl na ɛm; ek’ow el ɛbɛn, bɔbar owi b’ow ɛy bieku ab ɛm."
40026006	Jesu im Betani baŋn, Simɔ a eke lɛgŋ anym ɛm kokobe ok a ec’akŋ.
40026007	Eke Jesu anŋ ob ij lɔfu lís a, yɔw nyam ow titm’n. N’ɔnym an gbɛl e mijey kɔk nyam eke wɛl kok lebn ɛm ab; lebn na, wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n albatr. L’ɛwl mijey a fɛŋ l’ok Jesu nuŋ.
40026008	Eke jam ɛsɛl a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, ow e low ebl ɛl ɛrm ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ ec’ob ŋuŋn el na ee?
40026009	Kɔ ow itm eke mijey ikŋ na, wɛl k’ɔl ij an tuɔtuɔ oc ow ec’os a ɔŋ ɔgbɔru ee?"
40026010	Jesu iri low na eke -n’am dad a, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ijar yɔw na gbre ee? Low na eke li kok ɛm e lís a el low mamn.
40026011	Tasi ɛm a, ɔgbɔru ec’a, -n’anŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ a fɛŋ; kɔ ɛm, mi k’ow m’anm ɔny ab sɛgŋ a fɛŋ.
40026012	L’ok’m mijey na sos yec’ɛtŋ ke ow bɛ́bm im sos uwɔmu ɛm eci.
40026013	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: wus na nimum af ec’usu kaka fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ow ɔb Amani Mamn a eci kokoba a, wɛl b’ow ɔkn yɔw na e low, ke wɛl dád low a eke li kok a yɛji."
40026014	Jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Judas Iskariɔt, im ɛŋn egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a
40026015	ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ eke m’ɔny Jesu m’ɔŋ ɔny, ke bla b’ow ɔŋn’m ee?" Agŋ a awl os likŋ lele lɛw ab ɔŋ’n.
40026016	Wanci ab af cɛ, Judas am ɔl akunda sɛnyn yec’ɛm eke k’ɔny Jesu ɔŋ ɛl.
40026017	Futufutu ek’ejru ánm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ a, jam ɛsɛl a ow am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ am erur eke si k’im si bɛbm Pak eci ob ij a eci sos ee?"
40026018	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn ɛb ab ɛm, ɛy ec’ɛgŋ a ogŋ ke dádr ir ɛsrɛ: 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs ninɛ in eci wanci a in bɛbmn ab; ŋ ogŋ a anake in eci jam ɛsɛl ab ab, ɛl b’ow ɛl kok Pak a.' "
40026019	Jam ɛsɛl a kok yec’a eke Jesu dad ɛl a, ɛtŋ -li bɛbm Pak ec’ob ij a eci sos.
40026020	Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ab sig es ob ij lɔfu lís.
40026021	Eke -n’am ij ob a, Jesu dad ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam b’ow ɔl ij’m."
40026022	Jam ɛsɛl a sos ɔw es afŋn es, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ow ɔtu eke k’el ɛm ee?"
40026023	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a eke ɛm ab us abu lɔfu nyam ɛm a, in anake li b’ow l’ɔl l’ij’m a.
40026024	Ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow uw ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ɛwar in e lís ab af; gbɛkɔ gbre él ɛgŋ a ek’am ɔl ij’r a eci! Ɛgŋ ikŋ na, blel wɛl ewm’n bɔbɔ yɛji!"
40026025	Judas a ek’am ɔl ij’r a am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ ow ɔtu eke k’el ɛm ee?" Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi dad."
40026026	Eke -n’am ij ob a, Jesu oc futufutu, l’ɛlu Nyam bia, l’ubr ɛm n’ɔŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Èbr ke íjr, na el ɛm e sos megl."
40026027	Ɛmɛny l’oc mij kpɔk eke mar anŋ ɛm; eke l’ɛlu Nyam bia a, n’ɔŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋn ɔny fɛŋ,
40026028	aŋke na el ɛm e mebl, Nyam e sinm a e mebl ek’am ow ok es agŋ nɔnɔ e sikpl oc ap eci.
40026029	M’am dad ɔny ek’igŋ yɛfɛnyna a, mi k’ow m’ɛgŋm mar na sakp ɛjeci toŋ ke ow ít lɛgŋ a eke ɔny ab, ɛm Ɛs e gbreŋgbi usu a, m’ow m’ɛgŋ mar owr a."
40026030	Sica -l’ɛgŋ es gbɛgbl a ec’ɛj ba ow b’uwr, ɛtŋ -n’im Olivie lafɛny af.
40026031	Sica Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ncok na cɛ, low a eke b’ow ɛŋn’m a b’ow ok ɔny ec’ɔmn a wus. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ab ɛm wɛl nɔn: M’ow m’ibi mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs a, ɛtŋ mɛcɛb a fɛŋ b’ow ɔmu es.
40026032	Gbɛkɔ ɛm eci uwɔmu ɛm anŋ igb ɛm a, m’ow m’ikŋ anym m’im Galile m’eku ɔny."
40026033	Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Eke agŋ a fɛŋ igŋ ɛlu’ŋ es yɛji, ɛm gbɛ lɛgŋ kaka mi k’ow m’igŋm m’ɛlum’ŋ es."
40026034	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ: ncok na cɛ, gbuŋ ke ŋgɔs íkŋ a, b’ow ɛgbr’m sakp nyahan dad eke uwm im any."
40026035	Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Eke ow it ŋ ab eci luw bɔbɔ yɛji, mi k’ow mi dadm m’ɛsmɛ m’uwm’ŋ any." Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl ɛjec’a yɛji dad ɛbɛn.
40026036	Ɛtŋ sica Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ok usu nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jɛsemane, ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Eke m’aam yogŋ a mi ŋɔŋn Nyam a, òkr es aŋa."
40026037	L’oc Piɛr lele Sebede ec’ey yony ab ab l’igŋ sos af n’im. Sos ɔb nuŋ am ɔw’r es, ɛtŋ ɛrmij yɛji am ok’r afŋn es.
40026038	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Sos es ɔw ek’el luw eci afŋn ɛm ec’abŋ ab es; òkr es aŋa ke ɔ́sur ɛm ab."
40026039	L’ɛri n’im kpekpe tɛl, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus l’ubu any es ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam li dad sodad amua: "Ɛm Ɛs, ek’ow it tasi, ke ɔ̀ny gbre eci mij kpɔk na kpab’m es lís. Ke fɛŋ ɛm a, ow k’él yec’a eke m’am erur a, kɔ yec’a eke ŋ am erur a."
40026040	Jesu ɛwl ow jam ɛsɛl nyahan a ogŋ a, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋan wɛl eke wɛl am ɛru mɛmn. Li dad Piɛr ninɛ: "Kɔ wanci nyam bɔbɔ yɛji, ɔtumn ɔsumn ɛm ab ee?
40026041	Ànŋn any owr ɔsur ke ŋɔ́ŋan, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɛ́ymn ɛbm ɛkn owi ɛm. Ɔny ec’abŋ a gbɛ inym es low fɛŋ e kok eci, kɔ ɔny e sos megl a gbɛ ijm lɛc."
40026042	N’im akpoj sakp yony ɛm ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam li dad sodad amua: "Ɛm Ɛs, eke mij kpɔk na k’ow ocm im es lís eke mi k’ɛgŋm ow e mij a, ke kòk ŋ ec’erur a!"
40026043	Eke ɛmɛny l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow in e jam ɛsɛl a ogŋ a, n’ɛŋan wɛl mɛmn ɛru ɛm; mɛmn am bɔbm ɛl anyamn.
40026044	Ɛmɛny Jesu ɛlu ɛl es im akpoj ɛtŋ am ŋɔŋn Nyam sakp nyahan ɛm. N’am ebr sodad nyam coco ab ɛm.
40026045	Ɛmɛny l’ɛwl l’ow jam ɛsɛl a ogŋ a ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Aŋ! Am ɛrur mɛmn a cɛ ebr sel ee? Kin, wanci a eke wɛl b’ow ɔl ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ij sikpl ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm a ow ŋ̂.
40026046	Ìgbr s’ímn! Kin, ɛgŋ a eke am ɔl ij’m a ow titm ŋ̂!"
40026047	Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym k’uwrm ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Judas, jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam a, ilm any. Agŋ nɔnɔ a ek’ow in ab a ɔnym ekŋ ekpr lele mab ler ɛm ab. Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab anake ɛrm ɛl a.
40026048	Judas eke b’ow ɔl Jesu ij a, ikŋ anym yɛgm dedeku a in ec’akunda yec’ɛm eke -li k’ɔnyn ow a. Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a eke m’ow mi joj nɛny a, in ana; ɔ̀nyn in."
40026049	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Judas ow titm Jesu ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, m’am ɛsŋn’ŋ!" Ɛtŋ li joj ow nɛny.
40026050	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm lawl, low yec’a ek’ow eke ki kok a, kòk fafa." Kpɛkŋ agŋ a ok’r af ɔny’n.
40026051	Agŋ a ek’anŋ Jesu ab a e nyam ɔdu in e lab ler ɛm a eb. L’iyr egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a ec’abu ɛlum ɛs a ɛtŋ l’ubr ow lɔru es.
40026052	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Òc ŋ e lab ler ɛm a ɛw ow eci usu a, aŋke agŋ a eke b’oc lab ler ɛm a, -li b’ow -l’uw lab ler ɛm ɛm.
40026053	Kɔ uwm any eke m’ɔtu eke mi k’ibrm ɛm Ɛs abu ɛlum, ke kpɛkŋ l’ís’m afr ɛrm ɛsɛl áru eb lɛw yony ee?
40026054	Ke low na eke kok ab ɛm, ayaf Nyam Lɛl a ɔtu eke k’iy nɛny ee? Nyam Lɛl a dad eke ów a k’ɛcr ɛbɛn."
40026055	Ɛtŋ Jesu am dad dedeku a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛm eci ɔny a ibrm eke k’otr ekŋ ekpr lele mab ler ɛm ab owr ɛsɛ low ŋuŋ kok ɛs ɛm el af ee? Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ mi bi sig es Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ mi yɛgm agŋ low ɛtŋ ɔnymn’m.
40026056	Kɔ ów amua ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad a ek’anŋ Nyam Lɛl ɛm a íy nɛny." Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a fɛŋ igŋ ɛlu’l es uru es im.
40026057	Agŋ a ek’ɔny Jesu a, -l’oc -n’im ow egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Kayif ec’any af, yogŋ a eke ol e low any uw ɛsɛl lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab as luku a.
40026058	Piɛr anŋ akpoj ɛm am us Jesu jam toŋ l’ok egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a e gbugŋ a. L’ɛy gbugŋ a li sig es usu ɔsu ɛsɛl ab ab yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́kn elel eke low a b’ow ɛcr a.
40026059	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Sanedrɛn a ec’agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab am ɔl daŋku ij nyam, eke k’ɔbr Jesu low, ek’ow el yadŋ ɛm yɛji, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ibi ow,
40026060	kɔ -n’ɛŋnmn low kaka. Ke agŋ nɔnɔ ow cicr’r yadŋ ɛm cɛ. Sica ow ec’uwr ɛm a, agŋ yony ow
40026061	ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na dad nɛny ij ɛm ninɛ: 'M’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔny Nyamel gbɛl a mi ŋuŋn, ke sɛgŋ nyahan m’úsr ɛm.' "
40026062	Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a igb ɛtŋ dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kɔ wɛl ám dad sodad amua ok’ŋ af, ke k’ɔ́bm kpu ee?"
40026063	Kɔ Jesu yewal tiŋ. Ɛtŋ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Nyam ek’anŋ owr e nin ɛm, m’am ibrm’ŋ, dàd ɛy ofn ɛm tasi ek’ow el ŋ el Mesi, Nyam ec’Iy a."
40026064	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi dad. Ɛmɛny m’am dad ɔny: jam aŋa b’ow ɛkan ɛgŋ ec’ Iy eke sig es Nyam Abusu Ɛs eci lidr abu af, ke b’ow anŋ afr eci jru ɛm ám ow."
40026065	Odad na sosiɛm egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a ɔny in eci simob sus ɛm a gbagbrm ɛm, ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "L’ɔbr Nyam any! Ɛy s’ibram adaŋku ij! Ɔny yɛji caca irir eke li dad low ɔbr any owi Nyam e lís a.
40026066	Kɔ ɔny e tutr el bogŋ ec’ee?" -Li dad ninɛ: "Ow ɛy’r af, l’it eke wɛl k’ibi’r gɔŋ."
40026067	Ɛtŋ sica -n’am afl ow sar any -l’ɔr ow kukuta ɛm; bɛb gbɛ am dɛdŋ’n any af,
40026068	ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ŋ ek’el Mesi a, ɛ̀lu es ɛkn ɔkm ke dád ɛy ɛgŋ a ek’iyr’ŋ ob a!"
40026069	Piɛr sig es gbugŋ yogŋ. Ob oc ɔŋ lisɛl ab ɛm e nyam ow titm’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ yɛji, anŋ Jesu Galile iyli na ab!"
40026070	Kɔ l’ɛgbr ow dedeku a fɛŋ ec’any af ninɛ: "Low yec’a ek’am ɔl eke ki dad a, mi k’uwm any."
40026071	L’igb n’aamn gbugŋ a e lisany a eci, ɛtŋ ob oc ɔŋ lis ɛjeci nyam ɛkn’n ɛtŋ am dad ok agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na yɛji, n’anŋ Nasarɛt iyli Jesu ab."
40026072	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Piɛr ɛgbr’r dad ofn ɛm ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ikŋ na, m’uwm’n any."
40026073	Ow b’inŋn ebr tɛl a, agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ow titm Piɛr ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Tasi, ŋ, ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam. Ŋ ec’odad a am ot’ŋ suw es af yɛgm yogŋ ek’anŋ ow a."
40026074	Piɛr ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ek’ow el yadŋ m’am ɔny, ke Nyam kók’m low ŋuŋ! M’am ofn mi dad ek’ɛgŋ na m’uwm’n any!" Odad na anŋ’n nɛnym n’am dad, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ŋgɔs ikŋ.
40026075	Ow ɔŋ Piɛr ɔkn odad a eke Jesu dad’r a: "Gbuŋ ke ŋgɔs íkŋ a, b’ow dad sakp nyahan eke uwm’m any." Ɛtŋ Piɛr ɛy ɔkm im gbeŋ am ikŋ low dudu eci ɔŋn.
40027001	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, ibribr fafa, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a fɛŋ lele Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab okr af ɛgŋ eb eke k’ibi Jesu.
40027002	-N’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny awŋ’n, -l’oc -n’im -n’ɔŋ ow Pilat, Rom iy ek’el Jude ec’es ɛw ɛs.
40027003	Judas a eke ɔl Jesu ij a, iri eke wɛl ɔb Jesu low. Ow e low ɛy’r sos ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛwlm os likŋ lele lɛw ab ab a mɛny n’im n’ɔŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab.
40027004	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "M’ɛy lɔbr, m’ɔl ɛgŋ ek’ɛknm low a m’ij luw eci!" Kɔ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Na ŋ e low ana, ɛy e low kaka anm ɛm!"
40027005	Ɛtŋ Judas, ɔkm ɛy ɛm a, oc os a im ɔwl Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ n’im l’oc meb l’ɛdŋn ɛmn.
40027006	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ot os a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛy ec’ol a ɛdŋn eke wɛl k’oc os ikŋ na wuwlm Nyamel gbɛl a ec’os ab ab, aŋke ow el mebl ec’os."
40027007	Eke sica nɛny okr ɛl af a, -l’oc os a -l’ɔl mijel kok ɛs a ec’ɔgm eke -li ki kok etu agŋ ec’es oc usu.
40027008	Na sosiɛm anake wɛl ɛsŋ ɔgm a 'mebl ec’ɔgm' toŋ k’ow it yɛfɛnyna a.
40027009	Ow ɔŋ kokoba ɔb ɛs Jeremi eci sodad amua eke dad a iy nɛny: -L’ot os likŋ lele lɛw ab a, (an eke Israɛl eyŋ ɛw ana,)
40027010	-l’ɔɔl mijel kok ɛs a ec’ɔgm a, ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dadr’m ab af.
40027011	Jesu anŋ es ɛw ɛs Pilat ec’any af ɛtŋ ow am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu ab ana ee?" Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi dad."
40027012	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab am cicr’r a, li dadm odad kaka.
40027013	Ɛtŋ Pilat dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ ów amua eke -n’am dad -l’ok’ŋ af a, am iri ee?"
40027014	Kɔ Jesu ɔbm kpu low kaka af toŋ es ɛw ɛs a low iti any afŋn es.
40027015	Sakp sakp fɛŋ eke Pak ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ b’ow a, es ɛw ɛs a b’ɛlu sobel ɛm ɛs nyam es, in a eke dedeku a b’erur a.
40027016	Ke lɛgŋ ab ɛm, ɛb any ɔbr ɛs ligbɛl nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Barabas anŋ sobel ɛm.
40027017	Pilat am ibrm dedeku a ek’as luku a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ am erurir eke mi k’ɛlu es m’ɔŋ ɔny ee? Barabas kɔ Jesu a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Krist ab ee?"
40027018	Tasi ɛm a, l’uw any sɛnyn sɛnyn eke nyamn ɛyr ɛm wɛl oc Jesu is’r.
40027019	Eke Pilat sig es jɛj ok usu a, in e yɔw a ɔŋ wɛl is’r amani na: "K’ɛ̀y ɛgŋ na eke ɛknm low kaka a e low na ɛm, aŋke tasi ɛm a, ncok na, mɛmn ɛm m’ij gbre nɔnɔ in sosiɛm."
40027020	Kpɛkŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab am itr dedeku a eke k’ibrm Barabas ec’es ɛlu lele Jesu ec’ibi ab e low.
40027021	Es ɛw ɛs a ɛmɛny ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Agŋ yony a, bogŋ eci am erurir eke mi k’ɛlu es m’ɔŋ ɔny ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Barabas!"
40027022	Pilat ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Ke sica Jesu a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Krist a ec’a, ayaf mi ki kokr’r ab ee?" Ɛl fɛŋ -l’okr lebl af -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af!"
40027023	Pilat ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla low ɔbr iy li kok ee?" Kɔ -n’am ɔg lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af cɛ!"
40027024	Eke sica Pilat ɛkn ek’ow akplm ij, ke ɛmɛny itarir a lele sɔg ab ab am bobn a, l’oc mij li yɔg sabu dedeku a ec’any af ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Na ɔny e low ana! M’anm ɛgŋ na e luw owi ɛm!"
40027025	Dedeku a fɛŋ ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ke in e luw a e ligbɔw ánŋ ɛy lele ɛy ec’alaw ab ab e nuŋ af!"
40027026	Pilat ɛlu Barabas es ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr Jesu say ɛm gbuŋ ɛtŋ l’ɛlu abusu es eke wɛl k’oc im ɛw ow olikŋ af.
40027027	Pilat eci srɔda eyŋ a ɔny Jesu ɛlu lakp lokm a ek’el Pilat e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ ɛl a fɛŋ -l’iwr -li did -l’ɛlul ow ɛm.
40027028	Wɛl ɔny in e mob a ot’r es sos ɛtŋ wɛl sus’r mob af ɛw ebl.
40027029	-Li kok mirŋ ɛm tufɛ, -l’oc -l’us ow ɛtŋ -l’ɛlu ow anany in e lidr abu ab ɛm. -L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ow ec’any af ɛtŋ -n’am kokr ow miyɛr -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "S’am ɛsŋn’ŋ o, Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu!"
40027030	-N’am fafl ow sar any ɛtŋ -l’oc anany a -n’am nɛnŋn ow nuŋ.
40027031	Eke -li kokar ow miyɛr sɛnyn sɛnyn bake ow uwr a, -n’ɔny mob af ɛw a -l’oc ow es, -l’ɛwl -li sus ow ow e mob a ɛtŋ -l’oc -n’im ow eke -li k’ɛw ow olikŋ af.
40027032	Eke -n’anŋn baŋn a -n’am ok ɔkm a, -l’ɔbr Sirɛn iy nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ; srɔda eyŋ a ɔny’n lɛc ɛm eke li k’abu Jesu ec’olikŋ a.
40027033	-N’im -l’ok usu nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Gɔlgota ek’el nyandrɛ ɛm 'Nuŋ kpɔk ec’usu.'
40027034	Yogŋ, -n’ɔŋ Jesu mar eke wɛl wuwlm ob lolo ab eke k’ɛgŋ; eke li tat anm a, l’erurm eke li k’ɛgŋ.
40027035	-L’ɛw ow olikŋ af ɛtŋ -li cɛc ow eci mob sus ɛm a sɔsum oc kok ɛm.
40027036	Ɛtŋ -l’ok es yogŋ -n’am ɔsu ow.
40027037	In e nuŋ af a, -ni nɔn lɛl ek’am yɛgm low a sosiɛm eke wɛl ɔb’r low a. Ow eke wɛl nɔn a el: 'Ɛgŋ na Jesu, Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu.'
40027038	In e saw saw a, wɛl ok elu yony olikŋ af; nyam anŋ’n lidr abu af ɛtŋ nyam anŋ’n nɛmn abu af.
40027039	Agŋ ek’am ɛc a am ɛgŋn nuŋ ɛm wɛwr’r,
40027040	ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ŋ ek’am erur eke k’ufŋ Nyamel gbɛl ab es ke sɛgŋ nyahan kpɛŋ ús ɛjec’a, eke el Nyam ec’Iy tasi, èbr ŋ sosi, ànŋ olikŋ af yogŋ us es!"
40027041	Ɛtŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab yɛji am kokr’r miyɛr dad ɛsɛ:
40027042	"L’eb agŋ ɛjeci l’ɛlu es, ɛtŋ l’ɔtum eke li k’eb’r in sosi! Kɔ Israɛl ec’ɛb ebu tasi ee? Sica n’ánŋ olikŋ af yogŋ l’us es, ke s’úb’r nawrɛ.
40027043	L’oc in ec’ɔmn a l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm li dad ninɛ: 'M’el Nyam ec’Iy.' Ɛɛ! Eke Nyam ɔny in ec’erur tasi, ke l’éb l’ɛlu ow es gɔŋ!"
40027044	Ɛtŋ ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl eke wɛl ɛw olikŋ af in ab a yɛji am wɛwr’r dad ɛbɛn.
40027045	Sica lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm a, ncebn ɛy wus a nimum af toŋ ok ncebles eci wanci nyahan ɛm.
40027046	Ek’ow am titm ncebles eci wanci nyahan a, Jesu barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Eli, Eli, lema sabaktani?" (ek’el nyandrɛ ɛm: 'Ɛm e Nyam, ɛm e Nyam, kɔ bla ɛtŋ digŋ ɛlu’m es ee?')
40027047	Agŋ nyam nyam ek’anŋ yogŋ a iri odad na ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "N’am ɛsŋ Eli!"
40027048	Kpɛkŋ ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam uru es im oc mbra usm ɛl eci mar ab ɛm ɛtŋ oc ucur anany ɔkŋ Jesu eke k’ɛgŋ.
40027049	Gbɛkɔ agŋ ɛjec’a am dad ɛsɛ: "Èku yɛ, si b’ow s’ɛkn eke Eli b’ow eb ɛlu’l es!"
40027050	Ɛmɛny Jesu barm lebl ligbɛl nyam ɛtŋ ok sel es.
40027051	Kpɛkŋ, Nyamel ab ɛm eci gbad gbɛl gbada a eke wɛl ɛw ɛdŋn usu lala ab any a, igŋ afr ɛm a ɛtŋ agbr ɛm araŋn didi toŋ ok esr ɛm a. Wus umu, mób gbagbrm ɛm,
40027052	-
40027053	suwɔmu fifig. Eke Jesu igb luw ɛm a, ɔmn ɛsɛl nɔnɔ a ek’uw a igb luw ɛm; -n’anŋ suwɔmu ab ɛm -l’ok ɔkm. -L’ok Jerusalɛm, ɛb lala ab ɛm; yogŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ɛkn ɛl.
40027054	Eke srɔda eyŋ a eci anym ɛs a lele srɔda eyŋ ab ab ek’am ɔsu Jesu a ɛkn wus umu a lele ów a ek’am ɛy ow ab ab a, erŋn ɔny ɛl afŋn es. -N’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Njɛ, tasi ɛgŋ na Nyam ec’Iy!"
40027055	Ɔyɔw nɔnɔ ek’us Jesu jam Galile ɛtŋ eke ki kok in e lís e low a anŋ yogŋ am ɛkn low a akpoj ɛm.
40027056	Ɛl ɛm a, Mari, Magdala baŋn yɔwi a, Mari Jak lele Josɛf ab e lis a, lele Sebede ec’ey a ec’ɛl lis ab yɛji anŋ.
40027057	-
40027058	Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, Arimate baŋn eci gbreŋgbi nyam, eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Josɛf, ke in yɛji el Jesu eci jam us ɛs a im ɛŋn Pilat ɛtŋ ibrm ek’ow k’oc Jesu eci sos megl a ɔŋ’n; ɛtŋ Pilat ɔŋ abusu.
40027059	Josɛf oc sos megl a wiwrm gbad ufu owr ab
40027060	ɛtŋ l’oc n’im l’oc ow es in obi eci uwɔmu lob owr eke n’ɔŋ wɛl ur ab ɛm. Li wuwl lob nyam l’abl uwɔmu a ec’ɛm ɛy usu ab es ɛtŋ n’im.
40027061	Mari Magdala yɔwi a lele Mari yec’ab ab anŋ yogŋ, -l’ok es -l’ɔbr uwɔmu ab any.
40027062	Nɛnɛgŋ e sos bɛbm e lɛgŋ ɛc; sica lɛgŋ bɛny a, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab okr af im Pilat ogŋ a
40027063	ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, low nyam ow ɛy nuŋ ɛm: yadŋu na, in ec’owr anŋ ɛm a, li dad eke, ek’in uw ba ow’n bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, in b’ow in igb luw ɛm.
40027064	Ɛ̀gŋ ɔŋ abusu ke wɛl ɔ́su uwɔmu a toŋ ow kok sɛgŋ nyahan, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e jam ɛsɛl a k’íym sos megl a bake -li dadmn dedeku a eke l’igb luw ɛm. Sica eci, yadŋ ikŋ na b’ow agb akm krɛkrɛ ec’a."
40027065	Pilat dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔnyn usu ɔsu ɛsɛl. Ìmn ke ɔ́ŋn ɛl -l’ɔsu uwɔmu a ɛsɛ elel eke am erurir ab af."
40027066	-N’im -n’am bɛbm uwɔmu a ec’elel eke wɛl k’ɔsur a. -L’ɔkr lob a ek’anŋ uwɔmu nɛny a wɛl kɔkr saw saw ab es sɛnyn sɛnyn ɛtŋ -l’ok usu ɔsu ɛsɛl.
40028001	Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a b’ɛc eci dimas lɛgŋ ɛny ow ɛm a, Mari Magdala yɔwi a lele Mari yec’ab ab ow am ɛkn uwɔmu a.
40028002	Kpru ɛm, wus umu lɛc ɛm, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam anŋ afr us es, ow wuwl lob a oc es ɛtŋ sig es af.
40028003	L’ɛw ɛsɛ afr eke b’ɛŋn af, ɛtŋ in eci mob sus ɛm a ufu ɛsɛ nyamok af.
40028004	Usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a erŋn ɔny afŋn es, am ufŋ bɔbar, ɛtŋ ɛw ɛsɛ agŋ ek’uw cɛ af.
40028005	Afr ɛrm ɛs a dad ɔyɔw a ninɛ: "Erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny. M’uw any ek’am ɔɔl Jesu a eke wɛl ɛw olikŋ af a;
40028006	n’anm aŋa. L’igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke l’ikŋ anym li dad ab af. Òwr ɛkan usu a eke l’ɛru es a.
40028007	Sica ìmn fafa dadr in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛsrɛ: 'L’igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm n’aam l’eku ɔny Galile. Yogŋ anake b’ow ɛkan in a.' "
40028008	Erŋn lele sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm ab, -l’ogŋ es -n’ŋgboŋ uwɔmu a ec’usu a, ɛtŋ -l’uru es -n’aam -l’ɛwl Jesu e jam ɛsɛl a amani.
40028009	Kpɛkŋ Jesu ɔbr ɛl ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "M’am ɛsŋn ɔny!" -N’im -li titm ow, -n’ɔny ow akr es ɛtŋ -n’am igŋ ow nuŋ.
40028010	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny. Ìmn dadr ɛm lisijimɛl a im Galile: yogŋ anake -li b’ow -l’ɛkn’m a."
40028011	Eke ɔyɔw a anŋ ejagb af yogŋ aam a, srɔda eyŋ ab ɛm e bɛb ek’am ɔsu usu a ɛwl ow baŋn a, ɛtŋ awl ów a fɛŋ ek’ɛy a ok egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a.
40028012	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab ɔny luku as. Sica eke nɛny okr ɛl af a, -n’ɔŋ srɔda eyŋ a os nɔnɔ,
40028013	ɛtŋ -li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Dàdr ɛsrɛ: 'S’am ɛru mɛmn ncok ɛm, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ɛgŋ a, in e jam ɛsɛl a ow iy in e sos megl a.'
40028014	Ɛtŋ eke Pilat iri yɛji, si b’ow s’ɛyr’r ɛrm es; s’uw elel eke si k’ɛwr nɛny ke k’ɛŋnmn es abur kaka ab any."
40028015	Usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a eb os a ɛtŋ kok ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl dadr ɛl ab af. Ɛbɛn eke amani a eb es Jwifɛl ɛm toŋ it yɛfɛnyna ana.
40028016	Jam ɛsɛl lɛw nyam a ec’a, -n’im Galile eci lafɛny a eke Jesu yɛgm ɛl ab af.
40028017	Yogŋ, eke -l’ɛkan ow a, -l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus -l’igŋ ow nuŋ, gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb gbɛ am bɛbar.
40028018	Jesu ɛri ow ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Afr lele wus ab ec’abusu a fɛŋ, Nyam ɔŋ’m.
40028019	Sica ìmn wus na eci ɛbr ɛbr a ec’agŋ a ogŋ, ke kókr ɛl -l’el ɛm e jam us ɛsɛl; òkr ɛl mij nuŋ Ɛs, Jim, lele Abŋ Lala e nin ɛm ab;
40028020	yɛ̀gmn ɛl -l’ɔsu ów a fɛŋ eke mi dad ɔny a. Sica ìrir: sɛgŋ a fɛŋ m’ow m’anŋ ɔny ab toŋ wus na e nuŋ ɛdŋ."
41001001	Aŋa anake Jesu Krist [Nyam Jim] ec’Amani Mamn a ɔb nuŋ a,
41001002	ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam eci kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi nɔn ab af: Ɛm Nyam, m’ow m’ɔŋ ɛm ec’ɛrm ɛs ikŋ anym kok ŋ ec’ejagb a.
41001003	Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ loj am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: "Kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ejagb a, kòkr in e sebr a ínym nyim nyim!"
41001004	Kin elel eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ɛy ɔkm loj, ke am ɛlu lebl dad: "Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm, òkr mij nuŋ, ke Nyam b’ow oc ɔny e sikpl a ap ɔny."
41001005	Jude wus a nimum ec’agŋ a fɛŋ lele Jerusalɛm ec’ab ab am ow Jan ogŋ. -N’am ɛgŋ ɛl e sikpl a -l’eb agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ Jan am ok ɛl mij nuŋ Jurdɛn erŋ.
41001006	Jan sus mob eke wɛl kok gbaŋkɔ kedebnam e suw ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛgŋ ndey lɛl ɛm e meb er ɛm. In ec’ob eke li b’ij a el tɛtɛ gbaŋgban lele mow mun ab.
41001007	N’am dad agŋ a fɛŋ l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ’m jam b’ow a, ɔny abusu nɔnɔ akm im, m’itm yɛji eke mi k’is es bake m’ɔny in e cɔkrukpɔ meb a mi mɔmu es.
41001008	Ɛm ec’a, m’am ok ɔny mij nuŋ mij ɛm, kɔ in li b’ow l’ok ɔny mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm."
41001009	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm, Jesu anŋ Nasarɛt Galile wus af ow, ɛtŋ Jan ok’r mij nuŋ Jurdɛn erŋ.
41001010	Eke n’anŋ mij ab ɛm n’am ɛy ɔkm a, l’ɛkn afr agbr ɛm ɛtŋ Abŋ us’r es nuŋ af ɛsɛ kel af.
41001011	Ɛtŋ lebl nyam anŋ afr ikŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ŋ el ɛm ec’Iy eke m’erur tasi; m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ m’ɛlu’ŋ ɛm."
41001012	Kpɛkŋ eke ow b’uwr a, Abŋ Lala oc im’n loj.
41001013	N’anŋ yogŋ l’ij sɛgŋ ekŋ yony eke Satan ɛju’r. L’ir yogŋ akp ɛm e mindey ab, ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ow am kok in e lís e low.
41001014	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke wɛl ɛlu Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs sobel ɛm a, Jesu im Galile wus af ɛtŋ n’am ɔb Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a eci kokoba li dad l’ɛsɛ:
41001015	"Lɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛwar a ow ŋ̂, aŋke Nyam ec’ es ɛw a ow titm. Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm ke ébr Amani Mamn a."
41001016	Eke Jesu am ɛcr Galile eci mij lekpl a e saw saw a, l’ɛkn ɔcn ibi ɛsɛl agŋ yony, Simɔ lele lisijim Andre ab ek’am ok muw mij lekpl ab ɛm.
41001017	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ùsr’m jam, m’ow mi kok ɔny éel agŋ eb ɛsɛl."
41001018	Kpɛkŋ -li digŋ ɛl e muw a -l’ok es, ɛtŋ -l’us ow jam.
41001019	Jesu b’imn anym eci tɛl a, l’ɛkn Sebede jimɛl a, Jak lele lisijim Jan ab. -N’anŋ ɛl eci mijɛtŋ ab ɛm -n’am kok ɛl eci muw a.
41001020	Kpɛkŋ Jesu ɛsŋ ɛl; -li digŋ ɛl ɛs Sebede lele ɛl e juma kok ɛsɛl ab ab -l’ɛlu es lɛtŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’us ow jam.
41001021	Jesu lel in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab im Kapɛrnayum ec’ɛb ab ɛm. Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, Jesu ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ low.
41001022	Agŋ a ek’am iri in e low yɛgm a, low am iti any in ec’elel eke n’am yɛgmn agŋ low a sosiɛm, aŋke n’anm ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab af, kɔ n’am yɛgm wɛl low abusu ɔny ɛm.
41001023	Ke Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ ɛgŋ nyam ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ anŋ ɛm a, am ɔg dad ɛsɛ:
41001024	"Oy! Nasarɛt e Jesu, bla am erur eke ki kok ɛy ee? Kɔ ek’ow eke ki ŋuŋn ɛy ee? Ɛm, m’uw ɛgŋ ek’el’ŋ ab any: Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛs lala."
41001025	Jesu dad abŋ ŋuŋ a odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Yèwal, ke ɛ́y ɔkm ɛgŋ na ɛm!"
41001026	Abŋ ŋuŋ a mumu ɛgŋ a lɛc ɛm, ɛtŋ am ɔg ɛy ɔkm in ɛm.
41001027	Agŋ a fɛŋ low iti any afŋn es toŋ batŋ -n’am bibrmnin ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ na bla lowi ana ee? Bogŋ ec’abusu ɔny ɛm e low yɛgm owr ana ee? Ɛgŋ ikŋ na ɛw abŋ eŋuŋ yɛj’es, ɛtŋ -li b’ɛlum ow!"
41001028	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ agŋ am dad Jesu e lís e low Galile wus nimum af.
41001029	Eke -n’anŋn Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a -l’okr ɔkm a, Jesu, Jak lele Jan ab im Simɔ lele lisijim Andre ab ogŋ a.
41001030	Simɔ ɛy lis eke sos am ɛtu es a, ɛru es. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl dad in ec’ɔl owi ok Jesu.
41001031	Jesu im ɛŋn yɔw a, l’ucu abu n’ɔny l’igbm ow, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ in ec’ɔl a oc’r es lís. Ɛtŋ yɔw a am kok ɛl e lís e low.
41001032	Ncebles ɛm a, eke ligbn im ɛru es a, agŋ ot ɛl ec’ɔ́lu a fɛŋ is Jesu; abŋ eŋuŋ ɛsɛl yɛji anŋ ɛm.
41001033	Ɛb ab ɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ as luku Simɔ eci lisany a.
41001034	Jesu ewlm ɔ́lu a lel ɛl ec’ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ ab. N’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a, ɛtŋ l’ɛ́lum wɛl abusu es eke wɛl ki dad odad, aŋke -l’uw ɛgŋ a ek’el Jesu ab any.
41001035	Lɛgŋ ɛny ow ɛm a, eke usu k’otm es a, Jesu igb ɛy gbeŋ ɛtŋ im usu saw ɛm. Yogŋ, n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam.
41001036	Simɔ lele lawlɛl a ek’anŋ in ab ab ok ɔkm im in ec’ɔl ɛm.
41001037	Eke n’ɛŋan ow a, -li dad ow ninɛ: "Agŋ a fɛŋ am ɔl’ŋ."
41001038	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "S’ŋ́gboŋn aŋa, s’ímn baŋn saw saw a, aŋke yogŋ yɛji ow it eke mi ki dad ɛl Amani Mamn a ec’odad. Na sosiɛm eci m’ow wus na af."
41001039	Ɛtŋ Jesu am ɛc Galile wus ab af nimum. N’am ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a fɛŋ, ɛtŋ n’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ yɛji.
41001040	Lɛgŋ nyam kokobe ɛs nyam ow am kok sɔrŋ ibrm Jesu abu ɛlum; l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: "Eke ŋ erur, ɔtu eke k’ ayal’m."
41001041	In e low ɔny Jesu sɔrŋ; l’ɛgŋm abu es l’itŋn ow ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "M’erur, àyl!"
41001042	Kpɛkŋ kokobe a oc’r es lís, ɛtŋ l’ayl.
41001043	Jesu ɛlu ɔlu a eke l’ewlm a abusu es eke k’im, ɛtŋ l’ɛwar ow lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ:
41001044	"Ìri sɛnyn sɛnyn, kì dad low na k’ok ɛgŋ kaka! Gbɛkɔ ìm yɛgm egb waw ɛs a sos, ke wáw egb ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ol a ibrm ab af, ke ow íj daŋku."
41001045	Ɔlu a im, ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ n’am dad low a eke ɛŋn’n a ec’odad. Na sosiɛm Jesu ɔ́tum ilam sos any ɛb ɛm, kɔ li b’anŋ usu saw ɛm ke agŋ am anŋ susu a fɛŋ ow in ogŋ.
41002001	Eke sɛgŋ bɛb ɛc a, Jesu ɛwl ow Kapɛrnayum, ɛtŋ dedeku a iri eke l’ɛc akŋ.
41002002	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ow as luku gbugŋ a eb usu a fɛŋ; usu kaka anm, lisany a bɔbɔ yɛji usu anm. N’am dad wɛl Nyam ec’odad,
41002003	ɛtŋ agŋ yar abu sos es wɛw ɛs nyam am is Jesu.
41002004	Gbɛkɔ eke -li k’ɔtumn -l’okmn yogŋ a eke Jesu sig es agŋ a sosiɛm a, -li fig usu nyam êl luw af a, ɛtŋ -l’oc ɔlu a ek’anŋ in eci faja ɛm a -l’usm es Jesu ec’any af.
41002005	Eke Jesu b’ɛkn agŋ a ec’ɔmn a, li dad sos es wɛw ɛs a ninɛ: "Ɛm jim, m’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ."
41002006	Ol eci low any uw ɛsɛl bɛb sig es yogŋ, ɛtŋ am tutr ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm dad ɛsɛ:
41002007	"Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ɛgŋ na am dad odad nɛnɛ ee? N’am ɔbr Nyam any! Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’óc sikpl ap ek’ow elm Nyam sɔny coco ee?"
41002008	Eke Jesu uw ɛl e sow tutr ab any a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am tutar ów amua na ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm ee?
41002009	Kɔ bogŋ ec’anake ɛw fuɛfuɛ eke wɛl ki dad sos es wɛw ɛs ab ee? 'M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ', oglog ke wɛl dád’r ɛsɛ: 'Ìgb oc ŋ eci faja a ke án es ee'?
41002010	Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke k’uwr low na any: wus na af, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔny abusu eke k’oc sikpl ap." Ɛtŋ sica li dad sos es wɛw ɛs a ninɛ:
41002011	"M’am dad’ŋ, ìgb oc ŋ eci faja a eb ejagb ím gbugŋ!"
41002012	Kpɛkŋ ɛgŋ a igb agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af, l’oc in eci faja a, ɛtŋ l’ɛy ɔkm n’am an es n’im. Ow e low a iti dedeku ab any, ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Nyam -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ kaka s’ɛknm low akpasu na."
41002013	Ɛmɛny Jesu ɛwl im Galile eci mij nɛny a. Agŋ nɔnɔ am ow in ogŋ, ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm wɛl low.
41002014	In ec’ɛc ɛm a, l’ɛkn Alfe jim Levi, eke sig es wus labm eb usu. Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam!" Levi igb ɛtŋ us’r jam.
41002015	Ow e jam a, Jesu im Levi ec’akŋ a, ɛtŋ am ij ob. Wus labm eb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab am ij ob Jesu lele in eci jam ɛsɛl ab ab, aŋke agŋ amua e nɔnɔ anake am us’r jam a.
41002016	Ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ek’el Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ a, ɛkn eke Jesu am ij ob agŋ amua fɛŋ ab; ɛtŋ -li dad in eci jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ n’am ij ob wus labm eb ɛsɛl amua lele sikpl ɛsɛl amua ab ee?"
41002017	Jesu iri odad a eke -n’am dad a, ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ a ek’anŋ sos tuɔtuɔ ɛm a, íbram sos kok ɛs, kɔ ɔ́lu anake b’ibrm sos kok ɛs a. M’owm eke mi k’ɛsŋ agŋ eke b’ubr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl a, kɔ m’ow eke mi k’ɛsŋ 'sikpl ɛsɛl'."
41002018	Lɛgŋ nyam, Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs eci jam ɛsɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab am ɛnŋ nɛny. Agŋ ow am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs eci jam ɛsɛl a lele Farisiɛl ec’ab ab b’ ɛnŋ nɛny ɛtŋ ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a ɛ́nŋm nɛny ee?"
41002019	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ am tutar ek’agŋ lawlɛl eke wɛl ɛsŋ mɛbi eci es gbɛgbl ɛm a ɔtu eke k’ɛ́nŋ nɛny eke yɔw ɛc a anŋ ɛl ab ee? Njaŋ! Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ eke yɔw ɛc a b’ow anŋ ɛl ab a, -li b’ow -l’ij ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɛgŋ.
41002020	Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ am ow eke wɛl b’ow ɔny yɔw ɛc a oc es ɛl ec’araŋn, ke sica -n’ɛnŋ nɛny gɔŋ."
41002021	Ɛtŋ Jesu ub ɛl nyandrɛ ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ócm gbad owr lele gbad sig ab ɔbarm gigŋm. Eke kok ɛbɛn, ke gbad owr a b’ow ɔny gbad sig a agbr ɛm; ɛtŋ gbad a ec’ɛm agbr a b’ow agb nɔnɔ.
41002022	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ócm mar owr okm marel sig ɛm. Eke kok ɛbɛn a, mar owr a b’ow inŋ toŋ ba ke ɔ́ny marel sig a ɔb es. Ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow irmn mar a lele marel ab ab. Tasi ɛm a, mar owr, marel owr ɛm wɛl k’ok."
41002023	Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu lel in eci jam ɛsɛl ab ab am ɛcr segb ɔgm eci. Ɛl ec’ejagb us ɛm a, jam ɛsɛl a am bubm egbey a.
41002024	Farisiɛl ow ɛtŋ am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Ìs any ɛkn, kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a am kok low ek’ɛy ec’ol a ɔɔm abusu eke wɛl ki kok nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ee?"
41002025	Jesu ɔdu eb dad ɛl ninɛ: "Awlmn low eke ɛb ebu David in obi in obi lele in ec’agŋ ab ab kok lɛgŋ nyam eke namn am ɔny ɛl ab ee?
41002026	L’ɛy Nyamel ɛm, ɛtŋ in eci agŋ ab ab -l’ij egb waw eci futufutu a. Low na ɛy egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Abiatar e lɛgŋ ab ɛm. Ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke egb waw ɛsɛl sɔny coco k’ij egb waw e futufutu na."
41002027	Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Nyam kok nɛnɛgŋ ɛgŋ e nimamn sosiɛm kɔ ow elm nɛnɛgŋ sosiɛm Nyam kokm ɛgŋ.
41002028	Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ ec’ Iy el nɛnɛgŋ yɛji ec’es ɛw ɛs a."
41003001	Ɛmɛny Jesu ɛwl ow Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. Yogŋ, l’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam ek’abu wɛw es.
41003002	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ok’r anyamn af am lɛr gbiy ɛkn, eke li b’ow l’ewlm ɛgŋ na nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ na, aŋke -n’am ɔl low nyam eke -li k’ebr ow af -l’ok ow ów af.
41003003	Jesu ɛsŋ ɛgŋ a ek’abu wɛw es a, ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Ìgb ow aŋa inym es agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af!"
41003004	Ɛtŋ n’am ibrm agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a l’ɛsɛ: "Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a bla lowi ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl ki kok ee? Low nimamn kɔ low ŋuŋ ee? Wɛl ɔtu eke ki sɔg ɛgŋ oglog wɛl ɛgb’r es luw ee?" Kɔ -l’ɔbm kpu.
41003005	Ɛtŋ Jesu am lɛr ɛl ɛrm bebl ɛm; sos yɛji ɔw’r es aŋke -n’ɔnym sɔrŋ ikŋ kaka. Li dad ɔlu a ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋm abu es!" L’ɛgŋm abu es ɛtŋ l’ewl.
41003006	Kpɛkŋ Farisiɛl a ok ɔkm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ Erɔd Antipas ec’ogog ec’agŋ ab ab -n’im -n’am as luku, -l’ɔl elel eke -li k’ɔnyn Jesu bake -l’ibi ow.
41003007	Jesu lel in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ocr sos es im Galile e mij saw a, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam. Agŋ am anŋ Galile, Jude,
41003008	Jerusalɛm, Idume, Jurdɛn ogog eci wus ab af, Tir lele Sidɔn eci baŋn saw saw a ow. Bieku na am ow eke k’ɛkn Jesu aŋke -l’iri ów a fɛŋ ek’ow am kok a.
41003009	Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Òcr mijɛtŋ nyam owr ɛwr es aŋa, yec’ɛtŋ ke dedeku a k’átram im sel."
41003010	Eke Jesu ewlm agŋ nɔnɔ a sosiɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a, am itarir eke k’ɛŋn usu itŋn in abu.
41003011	Ek’agŋ ek’ abŋ eŋuŋ anŋ ɛm a b’ɛkn Jesu a, -li b’ok wus ow ec’any af -n’am babarm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ŋ Nyam ec’Iy."
41003012	Kɔ Jesu am ijl ɛl nɛny kpoŋkpoŋ dad ɛsɛ: "K’ùlmn’m es!"
41003013	Ca Jesu uyu lafɛny af, l’ɛsŋ agŋ eke l’erur a ɛtŋ wɛl ow in ogŋ.
41003014	Ɛl ɛm a li sɔsum agŋ lɛw yony l’ot [ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl nin ɛrm ɛsɛl]. Li sɔsum l’ot wɛl eke wɛl k’anŋ in ab ke n’ám ɛrm wɛl -n’im -l’ɔb gbreŋgbi usu a e kokoba.
41003015	N’ɔŋ wɛl abusu eke wɛl k’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ yɛji.
41003016	Kin ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ec’en: Simɔ (Jesu igŋ’n nin af Piɛr),
41003017	Jak lele lisijim Jan ab, ɛl Sebede ec’ey (Jesu ɔŋ ɛl nin Bwanɛrgɛs ek’el nyandrɛ ɛm: 'agŋ ek’ɛl e low kok b’ot nyamgbrany es'),
41003018	Andre, Filip, Bartelemi, Matie, Toma, Jak Alfe jim, Tade, Simɔ low dogŋn ɛs,
41003019	lele Judas Iskariɔt ek’ɔl Jesu ij ab ab.
41003020	Ɛmɛny Jesu ɛwl mɛny ow akŋ a. Agŋ nɔnɔ ɛwl mɛny ow as luku yogŋ toŋ Jesu lel in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ɛ́ŋnm abusu eke k’ij ob yɛji.
41003021	Jesu ec’akŋ ec’agŋ am ow eke k’oc’r ab im aŋke -n’am iri eke Jesu in ki kokm ɛgŋ ɛm owi.
41003022	Ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm ow a am dad ɛsɛ: " Bɛlsebul, abŋ eŋuŋ ec’es ɛw a, anŋ Jesu ɛm! Ow anake ow b’ɔŋ’n abusu ke li b’ɔtu l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a."
41003023	Jesu ɛsŋ ɛl ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl sodad nyandrɛ ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Ayaf Satan ɔtu eke k’ogŋn in sosi ar ee?
41003024	Eke batŋ es ɛw nyam ec’agŋ b’ogŋ ar ɛl ɔfr ɛm, es ɛw a k’ɔtum anm ij.
41003025	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam bosu nyam ec’agŋ ek’ubr ɛm ɛl ɔfr a, k’ɔtum anm ij.
41003026	Eke batŋ Satan b’ogŋn in sosi ar, oglog Satan nɛny ókrm af in obi ab ij a, ke in eci abusu a k’ɔtum ibnm ij; in eci es ɛw a uwr ŋ̂.
41003027	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, eke wɛl erur eke k’im ɛy lɛc ɛs nyam ec’akŋ iy’r mil a, ow it ke wɛl íkŋ anym ɔny awŋ’n gbuŋ ke wɛl ɔ́tu ɛy in ec’akŋ a ot in eci mob a fɛŋ."
41003028	Ɛtŋ Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm tasi, agŋ ɔtu eke k’ɛŋn sikpl fɛŋ lele sodad eŋuŋ fɛŋ eke -li b’ow -li dad -l’ok Nyam af ab ab ec’oc ap.
41003029	Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam dad low ŋuŋ ok Abŋ Lala af a, li k’ow n’ɛŋnm ow ec’oc ap lɛgŋ kaka, aŋke low ŋuŋ a b’ow anŋ’n af sɛgŋ fɛŋ."
41003030	Jesu dad odad na ok ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab af, aŋke -li dad ek’abŋ ŋuŋ in anŋ ow ɛm sosiɛm.
41003031	Ɛtŋ Jesu lis lele lisijim jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow. -N’inym es gbeŋ a ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛy akŋ a eke k’ɛsŋ’n.
41003032	Agŋ nɔnɔ ok es iwr ɛlul Jesu ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl dad’r eke: "Kin, esŋ lele esŋ jimɛl ab ek’ow inym es gbeŋ a. -N’am erur eke -li k’ɛkn’ŋ."
41003033	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛm lis ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bwo ɛl el ɛm lisijimɛl ee?"
41003034	Ɛtŋ eke l’ɛw nyamn li lɛr agŋ a ek’ok es iwr did ɛlul il ɛm a, li dad ninɛ: "Kin ɛm lis lel ɛm lisijimɛl ab ek’anŋ aŋa,
41003035	aŋke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke bi kok Nyam ec’erur a, el ɛm lisijim, ɛm lisijɔw, lel ɛm lis ab."
41004001	Sakp ɛjeci, Jesu ow Galile eci mij nɛny a, ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm agŋ low. Agŋ nɔnɔ ow ar did ɛlul il ɛm. Na sosiɛm l’ɛy mijɛtŋ nyam ek’anŋ mij af ab ɛm ɛtŋ li sig es. Bieku a nimum ok es mij nɛny a.
41004002	Jesu am ot nyandrɛ ɛm ec’ów nɔnɔ yɛgmn ɛl low. In eci low yɛgm ab ɛm, n’am dad l’ɛsɛ:
41004003	"Ìgŋn lɔru es irir! Lɛgŋ nyam, egb ewl ɛs nyam im ɔgm am ewl egb.
41004004	Eke n’am ufŋ egb ey ab es a, bɛb ok ebr af ɛtŋ ɔr ow sus ij.
41004005	Bɛb ok mebn wus af, usu eke sɛc ɛnym. Kpɛkŋ -l’ɛli sɛc a ek’ɛnym a sosiɛm.
41004006	Kɔ eke ligbn ow afr a, l’ebal egb a eke ɛli ok ɔkm a ɛtŋ li wɛwr ow es aŋke min ɔnym ɛl wus tasi.
41004007	Bɛb ɛjeci ok usu eke mirŋ anŋ. Mirŋ a ɛli ɔny awŋ ɛl es. Na sosiɛm -l’ɔsum ey kaka.
41004008	Gbɛkɔ egb ey a e bɛb ok wus mamn af. -L’ɛli -l’ok ɔkm, -l’agb ɛtŋ -l’ɔsu ey. Bɛb ɔsu likŋ lele lɛw ab, bɛb ec’a ekŋ nyahan ɛtŋ ow e bɛb a ɔsu ekŋ yen."
41004009	Ɛtŋ Jesu igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn!"
41004010	Eke Jesu anm bieku ab ab ij a, in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a lel agŋ a eke b’anŋ in ab a, am ibrm’n low sodad nyandrɛ ab af.
41004011	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny ɛŋan Nyam eci gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ów a eke lɔl es a ec’any uw. Kɔ ɛl ec’a, nyandrɛ ɛm cɛ m’am dad ɛl,
41004012	yec’ɛtŋ ke -li bi lɛr ke -li k’ɛknmn; -li b’iri ke ow k’okm ɛl es sos ɛm, aŋke blel ow am ok ɛl es sos ɛm, blel -l’ɛwl mɛny -l’ow Nyam ogŋ, ke blel ow áp ɛl low."
41004013	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ninɛ: "Ɔny ɔtumn irimn egb ewl ɛs a ec’odad a e nyandrɛ? Ayaf b’ow ɔtur irir sodad nyandrɛ ɛm a fɛŋ ee?
41004014	Egb ewl ɛs a ewl Nyam odad.
41004015	Ebr ab af a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ eke b’iri odad a. Kpɛkŋ Satan ow ɔny odad eke wɛl ewl ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm a oc es.
41004016	Mebn wus a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ eke b’iri odad a ke kpɛkŋ eb’r sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
41004017	Gbɛkɔ, -li yɛbmn odad a okm min ɛl ɛm, -li b’ɛw ɛrm af tɛl cɛ. Eke sica sos es ɔw owi oglog gbre ij owi b’ow Nyam odad a sosiɛm a, -li b’ɛgbr ɔmn a fafa.
41004018	Wus a eke mirŋ nɔnɔ anŋ af ke egb a ok af a, el agŋ eke b’iri odad a.
41004019	Gbɛkɔ wus aŋa ec’ɛrm mij ebr, ob ɔny e mɛju lele wus ec’ów aw ɛjeci nɔnɔ iy ɛl ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ, ɛtŋ ɔny odad a awŋ es ɛl ɛm, ke ɔ́tum ɔsum ey kaka.
41004020	Wus mamn a el agŋ eke b’iri odad a ke eb’r. Ow ɔsu ey ɛl ɛm. Bɛb ɔsu likŋ lele lɛw ab, likpr ɔsu ekŋ nyahan ɛtŋ bɛb a ɔsu ekŋ yen!"
41004021	Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ kɛniɛ eke wɛl b’igŋ a, ob ew eke wɛl k’ubur es oglog kofa ew eke wɛl k’oc ɛw sosiɛm wɛl b’igŋ ee? Njaŋ! Tasi ɛm a, ob gege af wɛl b’itmn es.
41004022	Ɛbɛn low fɛŋ eke lɔl es a b’ow ɛy ɔkm, ɛtŋ yec’ek’anŋ ncebn ɛm a b’ow ilm any usuayl ɛm.
41004023	Ke ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔru eke k’iri a, íri gɔŋ!"
41004024	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr low fɛŋ eke b’ow irir a ɛrm sɛnyn sɛnyn! Aŋke akunda yec’ɛm eke b’ow ocr ɛbmnin ob ɔŋn ɛgŋ ɛjec’a, ow ɛm cɛ Nyam yɛji b’ow ɛbmn ɔŋ ɔny, ɛtŋ li b’ow li kok l’akm ɔny ec’a.
41004025	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’iri odad a ke ucu ɔny es a, Nyam b’ow obn’n; kɔ ɛgŋ ek’irim kaka a, tɛl a eke l’iri a yɛji, wɛl b’ow ɔny oc’r es ɛrm af."
41004026	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a otarir es odad na ab: igŋ nyam ewl egb ey in ec’ɔgm a.
41004027	Sica n’im ɛtŋ n’am ir ɛb, l’ɛru es l’igb, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab ɛsɛ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’ab af. Gbɛkɔ egb ey a ɛli ok ɔkm ɛtŋ am agb ek’ɛgŋ a in obi uwm ow e low kaka any.
41004028	Kɔ wus in obi li bi kok ɛtŋ egb ey a b’ɛli ok ɔkm, agb toŋ usu sel ɛm.
41004029	Ɛtŋ ek’egb ey a usu a, kpɛkŋ ɛgŋ a ow ɛl ec’ub ɛm, aŋke ow it eke sica wɛl k’ub ɛl gɔŋ."
41004030	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Bla lowi wɛl ɔtu eke k’oc bɛbmn Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu ab ab ee? Ɛtŋ bogŋ ec’odad wɛl ɔtu eke k’oc dadr ow e low ee?
41004031	Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a anŋ ɛsɛ likŋ e liy nyam eke wɛl ewl af. Gbuŋ eke wɛl k’ewl’l a, l’el egb ey a fɛŋ ɛm eci likekli tasi.
41004032	Sica eke li b’ɛli l’ɛy ɔkm a, li b’agb l’akm wɛl fɛŋ. Li b’ok ál, li faf es toŋ bake ɔ́r ám ow sus mel in ec’ál a eci lɔw ew a."
41004033	Sodad nyandrɛ amua ɛm anake Jesu b’oc am dadr ɛl Nyam ec’odad a, yec’a cɛ eke -l’ɔtur eke -li k’oc -l’ɛw es ɛrm ɛm a.
41004034	Sakp sakp fɛŋ Jesu b’oc sodad nyandrɛ ɛm am dadr ɛl ów. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’anŋ in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab a, li b’otar ów a fɛŋ akr l’ok wɛl.
41004035	Lɛgŋ a cɛ eci ncebles a, Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "S’úbar mij jam a."
41004036	Ɛtŋ eke -l’ɛlul bieku ab es a, jam ɛsɛl a ok lɛtŋ a eke Jesu anŋ ɛm ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -n’im. Mɛtŋ ɛjeci yɛji anŋ ɛl saw.
41004037	Ɛl ec’ubr ɛm a, kpɛkŋ lidgbegb okr ɛl es ɛtŋ mra am ɛlul ɛl, toŋ mij am bubm ok ɛl lɛtŋ ɛm.
41004038	Jesu gbɛ ɛkpn ob, ɛru es lɛtŋ nɛny a am ɛru mɛmn. Jam ɛsɛl a am uwr’r dad’r ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ ɛy e luw na eke s’am ow s’uw a, ow am kokm’ŋ low kaka ee?"
41004039	Jesu ufŋm es ɛtŋ dad lidgbegb a lele mij ab ab ninɛ: "Ìrmn es! Àdar!" Ɛtŋ lidgbegb a ec’ɛlu a ubr es ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ irm es tiŋ.
41004040	Sica Jesu am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ erŋn am ɔny ɔny ee? Kɔ ɔny k’ɔnymn ɔmn cɛ ee?"
41004041	Jam ɛsɛl a erŋn ligbɛl am ɔny ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɔfr ɛm ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ ikŋ na eke lidgbegb lele mij ab b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ab ee?"
41005001	Jesu lel in eci jam ɛsɛl ab ab im ok Galile eci mij jam a, Geraseni eyŋ eci wus ab af.
41005002	Eke n’anŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm l’us es a, kpɛkŋ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ɛgŋ es oc usu a ɛy ɔkm ow am ɔbr’r. Ɛgŋ a, abŋ ŋuŋ anŋ’n ɛm.
41005003	Suwɔmu ec’araŋn anake li b’anŋ a. Ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́tum ucurm’n es, ŋgbraka ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji,
41005004	aŋke sakp nɔnɔ wɛl b’awŋ’n akr lele sabu ab ŋgbraka ɛm, kɔ li b’ɔny fɛŋ li bubr es. Ɛgŋ kaka ɔnym lɛc eke k’ɔtu ɔny’n yɛji.
41005005	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, li b’anŋ suwɔmu ek’anŋ mafɛny ɛm a ec’araŋn; n’am babarm ke n’am ot mebn li kokr in sosi mob.
41005006	L’ɛkn Jesu akpoj ɛm, l’uru es l’ow, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ow ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ li dad l’ɛsɛ:
41005007	"Jesu, Nyam ek’anŋ afr kpekpe ec’Iy, kɔ bla lowi anŋ ɛy araŋn ee? Nyam e nin ɛm m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, kì kok’m low ŋuŋ!"
41005008	Abŋ ŋuŋ a ɛw lebl am dad ɛbɛn aŋke Jesu ikŋ anym dad’r ninɛ: "Abŋ ŋuŋ, ɛ̀y ɔkm ɛgŋ na ɛm!"
41005009	Ca Jesu am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf wɛl b’ɛsŋn’ŋ ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "Wɛl b’ɛsŋ’m 'Bubutɛ', aŋke s’ɛny nɔnɔ."
41005010	Ɛtŋ n’am at lebl es ni ŋɔŋn Jesu l’ɛsɛ: "K’ògŋ abŋ eŋuŋ amua k’ŋgboŋ wus ikpr ab af."
41005011	Yogŋ, gbroko nɔnɔ anŋ ek’am ij ob lafɛny a saw.
41005012	Abŋ eŋuŋ a am ŋɔŋn Jesu dad ɛsɛ: "Ògŋ ɛy s’im sigbroko amua ogŋ a yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ók ɛl ɛm!"
41005013	Jesu ɔŋ ɛl ow ec’abusu. Abŋ eŋuŋ a ok ɔkm ɛgŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ im ok sigbroko ab ɛm. Gbroko a fɛŋ ek’anŋ yogŋ a ɔtu eke k’ij fandi yony. Ɛl a fɛŋ -n’anŋ lafɛny ab af -l’uru es -l’ok mij lekpl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -n’ɛmn.
41005014	Es uru ɛm, sigbroko ɔsu ɛsɛl a ɛwl im am ɔb amani ɛb ab ɛm lele sikpukpu ɛm ab. Ɛtŋ agŋ am ow ɛkn low yec’a ek’ɛy a.
41005015	-L’ow -n’ɛŋn Jesu, ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn ɛgŋ a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm abŋ eŋuŋ anŋ ɛm a eke sig es. Sica li sus mob; nuŋ ɛm ayal. Ɛtŋ agŋ a erŋn am ɔny.
41005016	Agŋ a ek’ɛkn ów a fɛŋ ek’ɛŋn ɛgŋ a ek’ɔny abŋ eŋuŋ a, lele low yec’a ek’ɛŋn sigbroko ab ab a, am awl ow ec’ów ok ɛl.
41005017	Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ow a okr af am ŋɔŋn Jesu eke li k’ŋgboŋ ɛl eci wus ab af.
41005018	Eke Jesu am ɛy mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a, ɛgŋ a ek’ɔny abŋ eŋuŋ bake ewl a am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ek’ow akpl’ŋ sos ɛm, ke m’am erur eke mi k’anŋ ŋ ab!"
41005019	Jesu ɛgŋm, gbɛkɔ li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wl im ŋ ec’agŋ a ogŋ a, ke áwl ów a fɛŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ kok ɔŋ’ŋ a, lele sɔrŋ ikŋ e n’ɔny ŋ ec’ab ab a ok ɛl."
41005020	Ɛgŋ a im, ɛtŋ l’ɔb nuŋ Ɛb Lɛw ab ɛm, n’am dad ów a fɛŋ eke Jesu kok ɔŋ’n a l’ok agŋ. Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ low iti any.
41005021	Eke Jesu anŋ mij jam a owr mijɛtŋ ɛm ec’a, agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ow iwr did ɛlul il ɛm mij nɛny yogŋ.
41005022	Ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jayirus, Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw ɛs anŋ ow ɛtŋ eke l’ɛkn Jesu a, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ow ec’any af.
41005023	N’am at lebl es ni ŋɔŋn Jesu li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛm jɔwli am uw. Òw ke át’r abu nuŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’úwm kɔ ke n’ánŋ owr."
41005024	Jesu ab -n’im, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ a ek’aam ɛwl’l a am itarir -l’ul il.
41005025	Bieku na ɛm, yɔw nyam eke b’ub abu ke mebl a ɛdŋm es toŋ ij akpo lɛw yony anŋ.
41005026	L’ij gbre nɔnɔ gbɛl sos kok ɛsɛl nɔnɔ ec’abu ɛm. Ni ŋuŋn in ec’os fɛŋ, kɔ l’ewlm, gbɛkɔ catŋ anake ɔl a am ɔtu yɛj’a.
41005027	Ɛtŋ eke l’iri Jesu e lís e l’ow a, l’ow l’ɛy dedeku ab ɛm, l’ɛc Jesu jam, ɛtŋ l’itŋn ow eci mob sus ɛm a abu.
41005028	Ke li dad in ec’ɛrm ɛm ninɛ: "Blel mi k’itŋn in e mob sus ɛm a abu cɛ, ke m’ewl ŋ̂."
41005029	Kpɛkŋ l’ɛkn eke mebl a ek’am ok’r a ɛdŋ es, ɛtŋ l’ɛkan in sosi ɛm eke l’ewl in ec’ɔl ab ɛm.
41005030	Akr af yogŋ cɛ Jesu uw any eke lɛc nyam ɛy ɔkm in ɛm. L’ɛdŋ mɛny bieku ab ɛm ɛtŋ n’am ibrm wɛl li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ itŋn ɛm eci mob sus ɛm a abu ee?"
41005031	In e jam ɛsɛl a am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ám ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ na ek’am itarir -l’ul’ŋ a, ke ám ibrm ɛgŋ ek’itŋn’ŋ abu ee?"
41005032	Ɛtŋ Jesu am ɛw nyamn in e saw saw a, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́kn ɛgŋ a eke kok low na a.
41005033	Yɔw a erŋn am ɔny, n’am ufŋ, aŋke l’uw low a ek’ɛŋn’n ab any. Na sosiɛm l’ow l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af, ɛtŋ l’ɛgŋ low a l’eb.
41005034	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm jɔw, ŋ ec’ɔmn a ewlm’ŋ! Ìm ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke éwl ŋ ec’ɔl ab ɛm gɔŋ."
41005035	Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym am dad ɛtŋ agŋ anŋ Jayirus ogŋ a ow. -N’am dad ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Ejɔŋ uw! K’ìjr low yɛgm agŋ ɛs gbre ɔfr ɔfr."
41005036	Jesu usm ɛl e sodad ebl a jam kɔ li dad Jayirus ninɛ: "K’ùru erŋn, kɔ ɔ̀ny ɔmn sɔny coco cɛ."
41005037	N’ɔɔm ɛgŋ kaka abusu eke k’im ɛwl’l ek’ow elm Piɛr, Jak lele Jan ek’el Jak lisijim ab cɛ.
41005038	-N’im -l’ok Jayirus ec’akŋ a; yogŋ, sɔ́g ɔnym nuŋ. Jesu ɛkn ek’agŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn babarm.
41005039	L’ɛy akŋ a, ɛtŋ n’am ibrm wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ikŋn ɔŋn ɔgr ee? Dedyɔwli a, l’uwm kɔ mɛmn n’am ɛru."
41005040	Ɛtŋ dedeku a am kokr Jesu miyɛr. Ow sosiɛm l’ogŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ok ɔkm. Gbɛkɔ l’ɛsŋ iy ɛs a, iy lis a, lel in eci jam ɛsɛl agŋ nyahan ab ab, ɛtŋ -l’ok akŋ a eke dedyɔwli a anŋ a.
41005041	N’ɔny ow abu, ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Talita, kum!" (Ow e nyandrɛ el: 'Dedyɔwli, m’am dad’ŋ, ìgb!')
41005042	Kpɛkŋ dedyɔwli a igb ɛtŋ n’am an es. Ke dedyɔwli a, n’ɔny akpo lɛw yony. Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ yogŋ a, low iti any.
41005043	Jesu am dad ɛl lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛsɛ: "Kì dadr k’okr ɛgŋ kaka." Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Ɔ̀ŋan in ob tɛl l’ij."
41006001	Jesu ŋgboŋ yogŋ, ɛtŋ n’im Nasarɛt baŋn a eke l’agb a. In eci jam ɛsɛl a im ɛwl’l.
41006002	Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a Jesu am yɛgm agŋ low Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. Yogŋ, agŋ nɔnɔ anŋ. Eke -n’am iri Jesu eci low yɛgm a, low am iti ɛl any ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ low na anŋ ow’r ee? Ɛtŋ bogŋ eci nuŋ ɛm ɔny anake n’ɛŋn ab ee? Ayaf li b’ɔtu li kok sakrowa amua yɛj’ee?
41006003	Kɔ ɛgŋ na ow elm ɔgɔg es ɔdu ɛs ab ee? Mari jim ab ee? Jak, Jose, Jud lele Simɔ ab ec’ɛl lisijim ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ lisijɔwɛl gbɛ irm ɛy ab aŋa ee?" Ów amua fɛŋ ɔ́ɔm Nasarɛt eyŋ abusu eke k’ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm.
41006004	Ow sosiɛm li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Usu a fɛŋ wɛl b’ɔny kokoba ɔb ɛs ec’ɛlum, ek’ow elm in ec’ɛb a, in ec’agŋ ɛm, lel in ec’akŋ ab cɛ eke wɛl ɔ́nym in ec’ɛlum."
41006005	Jesu ɔtum kokm akrowa kaka Nasarɛt yogŋ, ek’ow elm ɔ́lu bɛb eke l’at abu nuŋ ke ewl a.
41006006	Ɛtŋ ɛb eyŋ a ec’ɔmn ɔnym a e low am at’r sel. Ɛmɛny Jesu am ɛc baŋn baŋn a ek’anŋ saw saw yogŋ a, ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm agŋ low.
41006007	L’ɛsŋ jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a, ɛtŋ l’ɔb nuŋ n’am ɛrm wɛl agŋ yony yony. N’ɔŋ wɛl abusu abŋ eŋuŋ fɛŋ eci nuŋ af.
41006008	Ɛtŋ n’am ijl wɛl nɛny li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Ɔny ec’ejagb us ɛm a, k’òcr ob kaka ek’ow elm kpama cɛ. K’òcr futufutu, k’òcr ekpr, k’òcr os k’ánŋ ɔny ekpr ɛm.
41006009	Òkr cɔkrukpɔ gbɛ, ke ɛ́wal mob sus ɛm nyam cɛ.
41006010	Eke batŋ okr akŋ nyam ɛtŋ agŋ a eb ɔny a, ke ánŋn yogŋ toŋ ɔny eci lɛgŋ a eke k’imn a ow.
41006011	Eke batŋ usu nyam ec’agŋ ɛgŋm ebm ɔny, oglog ɛgŋm eke k’iri ɔny e nɛny ɛm ec’odad, ke ókr ɔkm yogŋ, cícr ɔny ec’akr sɛc a okr ɛl es, ke ow íj low ŋuŋ a eke -li kokr a eci daŋku."
41006012	Jam ɛsɛl a im ɛtŋ -n’am ɔb ɛrm ɛm itŋn eci kokoba.
41006013	-N’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ -n’am udu ɔ́lu a mun nuŋ -l’ewlm wɛl.
41006014	Eke Jesu e nin a eb es usu a fɛŋ a, ɛb ebu Erɔd Antipas yɛji iri in e lebl. Wɛl am dad ɛsɛ: "Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs igb luw ɛm; na sosiɛm anake n’am ɔny abusu li kok sakrowa a."
41006015	Bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: " Eli." Oglog am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na anŋ ɛsɛ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl esig ab af."
41006016	Ek’ów amua na ok Erɔd ɔru ɛm a, li dad ninɛ: "Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs a eke m’ɔŋ abusu wɛl ubr nuŋ es a, anake igb luw ɛm a!"
41006017	-
41006018	Kin elel eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs e luw owi a ɛcr. Erɔd Antipas oc lisijim Filip e yɔw Erodiad. Jan im dad Erɔd ninɛ: "Ow itm eke k’oc esŋ jim e yɔw." Ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm Erɔd ɔŋ abusu wɛl ɔny Jan ok ŋgbraka ɛlu sobel ɛm.
41006019	Erodiad ɔny Jan e sifn; n’am erur eke li k’ibi ow kɔ n’ɛ́ŋnm ow ec’abusu,
