42003020	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’ɛlu Jan sobel ɛm l’igŋ ów eŋuŋ amua eke li kok ab af.
42003021	Eke Jan ok agŋ a fɛŋ mij nuŋ bake ow uwr a, l’ok Jesu yɛji. Eke Jesu ok mij nuŋ oc es ke am ŋɔŋn Nyam a, afr fig,
42003022	ɛtŋ Abŋ Lala us’r es nuŋ af ɛsɛ kel af. Ɛtŋ Nyam e lebl anŋ afr ikŋ dad ninɛ: "Ŋ el ɛm ec’iy eke m’erur tasi, m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ m’ɛlu’ŋ ɛm."
42003023	Jesu ɔb nuŋ am yɛgm agŋ low, l’ɔtu eke li k’ɔny akpo likŋ lele lɛw ab. Agŋ bi tutr eke Jesu el Josɛf jim. Ɛtŋ kin Josɛf lagŋɛl ec’en ec’es ɔsŋm:
42003024	Eli, Matat, Levi, Mɛlki, Janayi, Josɛf.
42003025	Matatias, Amɔs, Nahum, Ɛsli, Nagayi.
42003026	Maat, Matatias, Semeyin, Josɛk, Joda.
42003027	Joana, Resa, Sorobabɛl, Salatiɛl, Neri.
42003028	Mɛlki, Adi, Kosam, Ɛlmadam, Ɛr.
42003029	Joswe, Eliesɛr, Jorim, Matat, Levi.
42003030	Simeɔn, Juda, Josɛf, Jonam, Eliakim.
42003031	Meleya, Mena, Matata, Natan, David.
42003032	Jese, Jobɛd, Boas, Sala, Nasɔn.
42003033	Aminadab, Admin, Arni, Esrɔm, Farɛs, Juda.
42003034	Jakɔb, Isak, Abraham, Tera, Nakɔr.
42003035	Seruk, Rago, Falɛk, Ebɛr, Sala.
42003036	Kayinam, Arpasad, Sɛm, Noe, Lemɛk.
42003037	Matusala, Enɔk, Yarɛd, Maleleyɛl, Kayinam.
42003038	Enɔs, Sɛt, Adam eke Nyam in obi kok in ec’abu ɛm.
42004001	Eke Jesu anŋ Jurdɛn ow a, Abŋ Lala iy’r ɛm, ɛtŋ l’oc ow n’im loj.
42004002	Yogŋ, agn ɛju’r toŋ ow ij sɛgŋ ekŋ yony. Sɛgŋ a nimum fɛŋ ɛm a, n’ ɛnŋ nɛny eke l’ijm ob kaka. Eke ow b’uwr a, namn ow’r sos,
42004003	ɛtŋ agn dad’r ninɛ: "Eke el Nyam ec’Iy, ke dàd lebn na ítŋn el ob ij."
42004004	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: Ow elm ob ij sɔny cɛ ɔ́ɔm ɛgŋ sel."
42004005	Ɛmɛny agn oc’r ab im lafɛny gege nyam af, ɛtŋ inym es yɛgm’n wus na nimum ec’es ɛw es ɛw a fɛŋ,
42004006	-
42004007	ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "M’ow m’ɔŋ’ŋ abusu lele anygbɛl fɛŋ ek’anŋ es ɛw na ɛm a, eke ok ɔwrɔkp wus igŋ’m nuŋ, aŋke na fɛŋ, ɛm wɛl ɔŋ’m, ɛtŋ m’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔŋ ɛgŋ eke m’erur a."
42004008	Kɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: B’ow igŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam nuŋ ke kók in sɔny coco cɛ e juma."
42004009	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny agn oc’r im uyum’n Jerusalɛm e Nyamel gbɛl a e luw af ec’usu gege a, ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Eke el Nyam ec’Iy tasi, ke ànŋ aŋa igb us es wus;
42004010	aŋke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm eke: Nyam b’ow ɔŋ in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɔsu’ŋ.
42004011	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny: -Li b’ow -l’oc’ŋ abu ɛm abu ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke lebn kaka kí kokm’ŋ ob lakr."
42004012	Jesu ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Nyam Lɛl dad eke: K’ɛ́bam Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam."
42004013	Eke l’ɛju Jesu kprakpr amua na ɛm bake ow uwr a, agn ŋgboŋ ɛgb’r es im am eku’r lɛgŋ ɛjeci.
42004014	Jesu ɛwl im Galile; Abŋ Lala ec’abusu a iy’r ɛm, ɛtŋ yogŋ agŋ am dad in e lís e low.
42004015	N’am yɛgm agŋ low Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu, ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ am aw’r.
42004016	Jesu im Nasarɛt baŋn, yogŋ eke wɛl gbagbl’l a. Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, n’im l’ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ɛsɛ elel eke li bi kok god’ɛtŋ ab af. L’igb eke li k’awl Nyam odad eke wɛl nɔn a l’ok agŋ,
42004017	ɛtŋ wɛl oc kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi e lɛl ɔŋ’n. Ni mɔmu lɛl ab es, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋn usu a eke wɛl nɔn eke:
42004018	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’Abŋ anŋ ɛm ab, aŋke li sɔsum l’oc’m eke mi k’ɔb Amani Mamn a m’ok ɔgbɔru. L’ɛrm im eke mi ki dad sobel ɛm ɛsɛl ec’es eb ɛlu owi, ke m’ɔ́ŋ ány eflu ɛkn es, ke m’éb agŋ eke am ij gbre a m’ɛ́lu es,
42004019	ke mi dád agŋ eke lakpo eke Nyam b’ow ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔkm agŋ e lís a ow.
42004020	Eke Jesu awl lɛl a bake ow uwr a, l’ar lɛl a es l’oc n’ɔŋ ob oc ɔŋ ɛs a, ɛtŋ li sig es. Agŋ a fɛŋ a ek’anŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ok’r anyamn af.
42004021	Ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna, Nyam Lɛl na ec’odad na eke wɛl awl ok ɔny ke irir a, ow e lɛgŋ a ow ŋ̂."
42004022	Agŋ a fɛŋ am aw Jesu, ɛtŋ ow am iti ɛl any sodad amamn amua eke ow am dad a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm Josɛf jim ab ana ee?"
42004023	Ow ɛm a, Jesu ɔdu eb dad ɛl ninɛ: "Nawrɛ, b’ow dadr’m nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ɛsrɛ: 'Sɛkp kok ɛs, kòkr ŋ sosi sɛkp!' Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny b’ow dadr’m ɛsrɛ: 'S’iri yec’a fɛŋ eke kok Kapɛrnayum a; aŋa ek’el ŋ e baŋn a yɛji kòk ɛbɛn nyam coco gɔŋ!'
42004024	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: wɛl ébm kokoba ɔb ɛs kaka sɛnyn sɛnyn in ec’ɛb ɛm.
42004025	M’am dad ɔny nawrɛ tasi eke Eli e lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, eŋnyɔw nɔnɔ gbɛl anŋ Israɛl wus af. Lɛgŋ a, nyam anm toŋ batŋ ow ij akpo nyahan lele likpr ab, ɛtŋ lek ligbɛl ɛy eb ɛb a nimum ɛm.
42004026	Ɛbɛn yɛji Nyam ɛram Eli iim Israɛl wus af ec’iŋnyɔw kaka ogŋ, kɔ l’ɛrm ow iŋnyɔw a ek’ir Sarɛpta, Sidɔn wus af a ogŋ.
42004027	Kokoba ɔb ɛs Elise e lɛgŋ ab ɛm yɛji, kokobe ɛsɛl nɔnɔ gbɛl anŋ Israɛl wus af. Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ewlm in e kokobe ec’ɔl ab ɛm, eke ow elm Nayma, Siri iy a sɔny cɛ."
42004028	Eke Jesu dad ów amua a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ke iri a am ebl ɛrm.
42004029	Ɛtŋ -l’igb -n’ɔny ow l’oc ow ab -n’im ɛl eci baŋn a ek’anŋ ligigl af a eke -li ki pipig ow, ow ɛ́y nɔmu ab ɛm.
42004030	Kɔ l’ɛpir wɛl araŋn l’eb ejagb n’im.
42004031	Ɛmɛny Jesu im Kapɛrnayum baŋn, Galile ɛb ɛm, ɛtŋ yogŋ n’am yɛgm agŋ low nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ.
42004032	Agŋ a ek’am iri in e low yɛgm a, low am iti any in ec’elel eke n’am yɛgmn agŋ low ab ɛm, aŋke n’am dad wɛl odad abusu ɛm.
42004033	Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ a, igŋ nyam anŋ ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ anŋ ɛm. N’am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ li dad l’ɛsɛ:
42004034	"Oy! Nasarɛt e Jesu, kɔ bla am erur eke ki kok ɛy ee? Kɔ ek’ow eke ki ŋuŋn ɛy ee? Ɛm, m’uw ɛgŋ ek’el’ŋ ab any: Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛs Lala!"
42004035	Jesu dad abŋ ŋuŋ a odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Yèwal! Ke ɛ́y ɔkm ɛgŋ na ɛm!" Abŋ ŋuŋ a ɔny igŋ a ɛlu wus agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ l’ɛy ɔkm eke li kokm ow low ŋuŋ kaka.
42004036	Agŋ a fɛŋ low iti any afŋn es ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir -l’ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ ec’odad el na ee? Igŋ na bi dad odad lɛc ɛm lele abusu ɛm ab, ke kpɛkŋ abŋ eŋuŋ am ok ɔkm!"
42004037	Ɛtŋ -n’am dad Jesu e lís e low wus ab af nimum.
42004038	Jesu anŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ im igŋ nyam e gbugŋ. Igŋ a wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Simɔ, ɛtŋ ɛy lis lɛfr ɔl am ɔny tuɔtuɔ. Wɛl am dad Jesu eke k’ewlm yɔw a.
42004039	N’im li titm ow ɛtŋ l’is es li dad lɛfr ɔl a odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm, n’ɔŋ ow ol, ɛtŋ lɛfr ɔl a oc’r es lís. Kpɛkŋ l’igb wus ɛtŋ n’am kok Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab e lís e low.
42004040	Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɔl akpasu akpasu am ɔny a, wɛl ot ow ɛl Jesu ogŋ. Ɛtŋ l’at ɛgŋ nyam nyam abu nuŋ, l’ewlm wɛl.
42004041	Abŋ eŋuŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl anŋ agŋ ab ɛm ok ɔkm am ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Ŋ el Nyam ec’Iy tasi!" Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛdŋn ɛl eke -li ki dadmn odad, aŋke -l’uw any eke Jesu el Mesi.
42004042	Sica eke lɛgŋ am ɛny a, Jesu ɛy ɔkm ɛb ab ɛm im usu saw ɛm. Agŋ nɔnɔ am ɔl’l. Eke -n’ɛŋan ow a, -l’erur eke -li k’ucu -n’ɔny ow es, ow ánŋ ɛl ab.
42004043	Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ow akpl ke m’ím sɛb ɛjec’ɛm yɛji mi dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’amani ec’odad, aŋke na sosiɛm eci Nyam ɛrm im m’ow."
42004044	Ɛtŋ n’am dad Nyam ec’odad Jude wus af e Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a.
42005001	Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu inym es Genesarɛt e mij lekpl a ec’any af a, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ow iwr ɛlul il ɛm ɛtŋ am itarir eke k’iri Nyam ec’odad.
42005002	Eke Jesu b’ɛdŋ mɛny a, l’ɛkn muwɛtŋ yony ek’itr es nanu a. Ɛtŋ ɔcn ibi ɛsɛl anŋ ɛm us es am yɔyɔg ɛl e muw ab es.
42005003	Jesu ɛy mɛtŋ a e nyam ɛm, ek’el Simɔ ec’a, ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn ow eke ow k’ɔdu lɛtŋ a eb jam tɛl ɛy mij ab ɛm. Jesu sig es lɛtŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny am yɛgm agŋ a low.
42005004	Eke li yɛgm wɛl ów bake ow uwr a, li dad Simɔ ninɛ: "Ɔ̀du lɛtŋ a eb im libn ab ɛm, ke ŋ lele awlŋɛl ab ab ókr ɔny e muw a ɔnyn ɔcn."
42005005	Ɛtŋ Simɔ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm ɛgŋ gbɛliy, s’ɔdu muw ncok a toŋ s’ɛŋnm ob kaka. Kɔ eke dad a, m’ow m’ɔdu muw a m’ɛkn."
42005006	-L’ɔdu muw a, ɛtŋ -n’ɔny ɔcn bubutɛ gbɛl, toŋ batŋ ɛl e muw a am ɔl eke ki gbagbrm ɛm.
42005007	Ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm ɛl lawlɛl a ek’anŋ lɛtŋ ɛjec’ab ɛm a, eke k’ow ɛlum ɛl abu. -L’ow ɛtŋ -n’ɔny ɔcn a -l’ok mɛtŋ yony ab ɛm iy gbɔŋ gbɔŋ, batŋ mɛtŋ a am ɔl eke k’ɛmn.
42005008	Eke Simɔ Piɛr b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af, ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, k’òw ki titm’m, aŋke m’el sikpl ɛs!"
42005009	Tasi ɛm a, low na iti Simɔ lele agŋ a ek’anŋ in ab a any, ɔcn bubutɛ a eke -n’ɔnyn a sosiɛm.
42005010	Ɛtŋ lawlɛl Jak lele Jan ab ek’el Sebede jimɛl a yɛji, low iti any. Kɔ Jesu dad Simɔ ninɛ: "K’ùru erŋn; kɔ jam aŋa agŋ anake b’ow eb ɔŋ’m a."
42005011	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -l’ot ɛl e mɛtŋ a -l’ow itr es ákpaf, ɛtŋ -l’igŋ fɛŋ -l’ok es -n’am us Jesu jam.
42005012	Eke Jesu anŋ Galile wus af eci baŋn nyam a, kokobe ɛs nyam ow ɛŋn’n. Eke li b’ɛkn Jesu a, l’ɛy wus l’ubu any es ow ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn ow li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke erur, ɔtu eke k’ ayal’m."
42005013	Jesu ɛgŋm abu es itŋn in ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "M’erur, àyl!" Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ kokobe a oc’r es lís.
42005014	Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɛdŋn in dad’r ninɛ: "Kì dad ɛgŋ kaka ŋ ec’ewl a e low; kɔ ìm yɛgm egb waw ɛs a sos, ke wáw egb a ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ ol a ibrm ab af, ke ow íj daŋku."
42005015	Ɛbɛn a yɛji, Jesu e nin a am eb es susu a fɛŋ. Ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl b’ow in ogŋ am iri in ec’odad a, ɛtŋ ɔ́lu a b’ibrm eke li k’ewlm wɛl.
42005016	Kɔ Jesu b’ocr sos es im usu saw ɛm am ŋɔŋn Nyam.
42005017	Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu am yɛgm agŋ low, ɛtŋ Farisiɛl lele ol e low any uw ɛsɛl ab, anŋ Galile baŋn baŋn, Jude baŋn baŋn lele Jerusalɛm ab ow ok es yogŋ. Ɛtŋ Nyam ec’abusu a anŋ Jesu ab ɛtŋ am ɔŋ’n l’ewlm ɔ́lu.
42005018	Ɛtŋ kin agŋ oc sos es wɛw ɛs nyam ek’ɛru es faja ɛm ow, ɛtŋ am ɔl eke k’oc ɛlu’l akŋ Jesu ec’any af.
42005019	Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛknmn usu eke -li k’ɛcr agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl a sosiɛm. -L’oc -l’uyum ow êl luw af ɛtŋ -li fig usu nyam, -l’usm ow es faja ab agŋ a ec’araŋn, Jesu ec’any af.
42005020	Eke Jesu b’ɛkn ɛl ec’ɔmn a, li dad ɔlu a ninɛ: "Lisijim, m’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ!"
42005021	Eke Jesu dad ɛbɛn a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab am bibrmnin ɛl ɔfr ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛgŋ na, ayaf n’am ocr in sosi ɛtŋ n’am ɔbr Nyam any nɛnɛ na ee? Kɔ bwo ɔtu ek’ap ɛgŋ sikpl ek’ow elm Nyam sɔny cɛ ee?"
42005022	Jesu uw ɛl e sow tutr ab any ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Bla ɛtŋ am ɔnyn sow tutr nɛnɛ ɔny eci mɛrm ab ɛm ee?
42005023	Kɔ bogŋ ec’anake ɛw fuɛfuɛ eke wɛl ki dad sos es wɛw ɛs ab ee? 'M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ' oglog ke wɛl dád’r ɛsɛ: 'Ìgb ke án es ee'?
42005024	Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke k’uwr low na any: wus af aŋa, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔny abusu eke k’oc sikpl ap." Ɛtŋ sica li dad sos es wɛw ɛs a ninɛ: "M’am dad ŋ, ìgb, òc ŋ eci faja a eb ejagb im gbugŋ."
42005025	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ igŋ a igb wus agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af oc in eci faja a eke l’ɛrur a aam gbugŋ, ɛtŋ n’am kɔklm Nyam.
42005026	Eke agŋ a ɛkn low na a, ow iti ɛl any, erŋn am ɔny ɛl, ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Nyam -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna s’ɛkn low any iti owi eke s’ɛknm lɛgŋ kaka!"
42005027	Eke low na ɛc a, Jesu ɛy ɔkm aam ɛtŋ ɛkn wus labm eb ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Levi. Li sig es wus labm eb usu, ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam!"
42005028	Levi igb wus, digŋ wus labm eb e juma a ɛlu es ɛtŋ us’r jam.
42005029	Ow e jam a, Levi kok ob ij ligbɛl nyam in ogŋ a ɔŋ Jesu. Wus labm eb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ gbɛl lele agŋ ɛjec’ab yɛji anŋ ob ij ab ɛm.
42005030	Eke -n’am ij ob a, Farisiɛl lele ɛl ɛm ec’ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab am ɛny abr dad Jesu e jam ɛsɛl a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ijr ɛtŋ am ɛgŋn lɔfu nyam ɛm wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab ee?"
42005031	Jesu ɔdu eb dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ ek’anŋ sos tuɔtuɔ ɛm a, íbram sos kok ɛs. Kɔ ɔ́lu anake b’ibrm sos kok ɛs a.
42005032	M’owm eke mi k’ɛsŋ agŋ eke b’ubr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl a, kɔ m’ow eke mi k’ɛsŋ 'sikpl ɛsɛl' yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm."
42005033	Sica agŋ bɛb am dad Jesu ɛsɛ: "Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs e jam ɛsɛl a b’ ɛnŋ nɛny ke ám ŋɔŋn Nyam, ɛtŋ Farisiɛl e jam ɛsɛl a yɛji bi kok ɛbɛn. Kɔ ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a am ij ob ɛtŋ am ɛgŋ!"
42005034	Ɛtŋ Jesu ɔdu eb dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔtur eke k’ɛdŋnin agŋ eke wɛl ɛsŋ mɛbi ec’es gbɛgbl ɛm a ob ij, eke yɔw ɛc a anŋ ɛl ab ee? Njaŋ!
42005035	Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ am ow, eke wɛl b’ow ɔny yɔw ɛc a oc es ɛl ec’araŋn, ke sica -n’ɛnŋ nɛny gɔŋ."
42005036	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl nyandrɛ ɛm odad na ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ócm gbad owr log ɛlum gbad sig ɛm gigŋm. Eke kok ɛbɛn, ke gbad owr a ŋuŋn a; ow k’ow okrm af gbad sig ab ab.
42005037	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ócm mar owr okm marel sig ɛm. Eke kok ɛbɛn a, mar owr a b’ow inŋ toŋ bake ɔ́ny marel sig a ɔb es: mar a b’ow ok es ɛtŋ marel a b’ow uŋ.
42005038	Kɔ mar owr, marel owr ɛm wɛl b’ok’r.
42005039	Ɛgŋ ek’ɛgŋ mar sig ɛcm ab a, k’ow erurm mar owr ec’ɛgŋ aŋke li b’ow li dad eke mar sig a in akpl!"
42006001	Nɛnɛgŋ nyam, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab am ɛcr segb ɔgm eci. In e jam ɛsɛl a am bubm egb a ec’ey a, ɛtŋ -n’am gag es -l’ij.
42006002	Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ Farisiɛl bɛb am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm am kokr low eke ɛy ec’ol a ɔɔm abusu eke wɛl ki kok nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ee?"
42006003	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Awlmn low eke ɛb ebu David in obi in obi lele in ec’agŋ ab ab kok lɛgŋ nyam eke namn am ɔny ɛl ab ee?
42006004	L’ɛy Nyamel ab ɛm, ɛtŋ in ec’agŋ ab ab -l’ij egb waw eci futufutu a; ke -n’ɔnym ow ec’ij ec’abusu kaka. Ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ egb waw ɛsɛl sɔny coco abusu eke k’ij."
42006005	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ec’ Iy el nɛnɛgŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs."
42006006	Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam, Jesu im ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a am yɛgm agŋ low. Yogŋ n’ɛŋn igŋ nyam eke lidr abu wɛw es.
42006007	Ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab am ɔsu Jesu eke -li k’ɛkn ek’ow b’ow ewlm ɛgŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ, aŋke -n’am ɔl low ij nyam eke -li k’ebr ow af -n’ɔŋ ow dedeku.
42006008	Kɔ Jesu uw ɛl e sow tutr ab any, ɛtŋ li dad igŋ a ek’abu wɛw es a ninɛ: "Ìgb inym es araŋn aŋa agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af!" Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ igŋ a igb inym es.
42006009	Ca Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Dàdr’m: nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, bla lowi ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl ki kok ee? Low nimamn kɔ low ŋuŋ ee? Wɛl ɔtu eke ki sɔg ɛgŋ oglog wɛl ɛgb’r es luw ee?"
42006010	Eke Jesu ibrm ɛl ów amua bake ow uwr a, n’am lɛr wɛl ɛtŋ li dad igŋ a ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋm abu es!" Ɛtŋ eke li b’ɛgŋm abu es a, in ec’abu a ɛwl mɛny akpl’l.
42006011	Ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab ɛrm am ebl, ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr elel eke -li ki kokr Jesu.
42006012	Ow e jam a, Jesu uyu lafɛny nyam af eke ki ŋɔŋn Nyam, ɛtŋ ni ŋɔŋn Nyam ncok nyam a nimum.
42006013	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, l’ɛsŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ li sɔsum lɛw yony l’ot, l’ɛw wɛl nin ' ɛrm ɛsɛl'.
42006014	Ɛl ec’en el: Simɔ, eke Jesu igŋ nin af Piɛr; lisijim Andre, Jak lele Jan ab, Filip lele Bartelemi ab,
42006015	Matie, Toma lele Jak, Alfe jim ab, Simɔ, ɛb dogŋn ɛs,
42006016	Judas ek’el Jak jim lele Judas Iskariɔt ek’ɔl Jesu ij ab ab.
42006017	Jesu anŋ lafɛny ab af us es ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab, ɛtŋ ow inym es lafɛny a ec’esr pɛtɛ a. Yogŋ, in e jam ɛsɛl nɔnɔ gbɛl lele bieku bieku ek’anŋ Jude, Jerusalɛm, Tir lele Sidɔn ek’el ɛb yony ek’anŋ okij any ab yɛji, ow.
42006018	-L’ow eke -li k’iri ow ec’odad ke ow éwlm ɛl ec’ɔl a yɛji. Ɛtŋ agŋ eke abŋ eŋuŋ am ijr gbre a yɛji ewl.
42006019	Agŋ a fɛŋ am ɔl eke k’itŋn in abu, aŋke ewlm ec’abusu e lɛc nyam b’ɛy ɔkm in ɛm ewlm agŋ a fɛŋ.
42006020	Jesu is any lɛr in e jam ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny ek’eel ɔgbɔru a, ehe él ɔny eci aŋke Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a el ɔny eci!
42006021	Ɔny eke sica namn am ɔny ɔny a, ehe él ɔny eci aŋke lɛgŋ nyam am ow eke Nyam b’ow iyr ɔny lok! Ɔny eke sica am ikŋn ɔŋn a, ehe él ɔny eci aŋke b’ow ifir miyɛr!
42006022	Ehe él ɔny eci, ɔny eke agŋ am ifn ɔny, ebm ɔny ke am wɛwr ɔny, ke am dad ɔny ec’odad eŋuŋ, eke eel ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e jam ɛsɛl a sosiɛm a!
42006023	Sos ɛm íŋn ɔny! Ìgbr susr es eke ów nɛnɛ b’ɛŋn ɔny a, aŋke afr, ob ap ligbɛl nyam am eku ɔny. Ɛbɛn eke ɛl lagŋɛl a ijr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl gbre ana.
42006024	Kɔ ɔny egbreŋgbi a, gbre él ɔny eci, aŋke ɛŋan ɔny ec’ehe a god’ɛtŋ!
42006025	Gbre él ɔny eci, ɔny eke lok iy ɔny a aŋke namn b’ow ɔny ɔny! Gbre él ɔny eci, ɔny eke am ifir miyɛr a aŋke b’ow ikŋn ɔŋn nɔnɔ!
42006026	Gbre él ɔny eci, eke agŋ a fɛŋ bi dad ɔny e lís e low mamn. Ɛl lagŋɛl yɛji, ɛbɛn eke godo godo a -li dadr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu a ec’ów amamn ana!"
42006027	"Ɔny ek’am irir ɛm ec’odad a, kin yec’eke m’am dad ɔny: èrurir ɔny ec’efnu ke kókr ów amamn ɔŋn agŋ eke b’ifn ɔny a.
42006028	Àfal agŋ a eke b’ofn ɔny ab es, ke ŋɔ́ŋan ɔŋn agŋ a eke bi kok ɔny ów eŋuŋ a.
42006029	Ek’ɛgŋ b’ɛdŋ’ŋ any af láwl ogog, ke ɛ̀wl ogog nyam a yɛji ɔŋ’n l’ɛ́dŋ’ŋ. Ek’ɛgŋ b’eb’ŋ gbad, ke yɛ̀b’r l’éb ŋ e mob af ɛw a yɛji.
42006030	Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ibrm’ŋ ob a, ɔ̀ŋ’n. Ɛtŋ ek’ɛgŋ oc ŋ ec’ob, ke k’ìbrm’n k’eb.
42006031	Low fɛŋ ek’am erurir eke agŋ ki kok ɔŋ ɔny a, ɔny yɛji kòkr ɛbɛn kpɛŋ ɔŋn agŋ ɛjec’a.
42006032	Eke b’erurir agŋ a cɛ eke b’erur ɔny a, ke bla low mamn iy am ekur eke b’ow ɛŋan ee? Sikpl ɛsɛl bɔbɔ yɛji b’erur agŋ eke b’erur ɛl a!
42006033	Ɛtŋ eke bi kokr low nimamn ɔŋn agŋ a sɔny cɛ eke bi kok ɔny low nimamn a, ke bla low mamn iy am ekur eke b’ow ɛŋan ee? Sikpl ɛsɛl bɔbɔ yɛji bi kok ɛbɛn!
42006034	Kɔ eke ow el agŋ a sɔny cɛ ek’am ɔman eke b’ow ɔwr ob ɔŋ ɔny a b’abmnin ob, ke bla low mamn iy am ekur eke b’ow ɛŋan ee? Sikpl ɛsɛl yɛji b’abmn ɛl lawlɛl sikpl ɛsɛl ob, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl yɛji wɛl ɔ́wr ɔŋ ɛl ɛbɛn kpɛŋ!
42006035	Yec’eke ki kokr a el: èrurir ɔny ec’efnu, kòkr ɛl ów amamn. Àbmnin ɛl ob ke k’ɔ́mnmn eke -li k’ɔwr -n’ɔŋ ɔny. Eke bi kokr ɛbɛn a, b’ow ɛŋan ob ap ligbɛl ɛtŋ b’ow eel Nyam ek’anŋ afr kpekpe ec’ey, aŋke Nyam akpl ɛtŋ li bi kok low mamn n’ɔŋ agŋ eŋuŋ lele agŋ ek’uwm low mamn any ab.
42006036	Ɔny yɛji, èel ɛ́rm mamnu, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy Ɛs el ɛrm mamnu ab af."
42006037	"Kì jɛjr agŋ ec’ów kokr, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam kí jɛjm okm ɔny. K’ɔ̀br agŋ low, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam yɛji k’ɔ́bm ɔny low. Òcr low apr agŋ ke Nyam yɛji óc low ap ɔny.
42006038	Ɔ̀ŋn agŋ ob, ke Nyam yɛji ɔ́ŋ ɔny ob yiyibr ɔny: ɔny e gbad a eke ɔkŋn eke wɛl kok ɔny ob ɛm a, wɛl b’ow ok ɔny ob ow íy gbɔŋ, tatakŋ es, gigigŋ es. Akunda yec’ɛm eke b’ocr ɛbmnin ob ɔŋn ɛgŋ ɛjec’a, ow ɛm cɛ Nyam yɛji b’ow oc ɛbmn ɔŋ ɔny."
42006039	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ninɛ: "Kɔ any eflu ɔtu eke ki nyimn lawl any eflu ee? Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ke ɛl yony mum -li b’ow -l’ok nɔmu nyam ɛm.
42006040	Low wewr ɛs kaka ágbm akam in e low yɛgm ɛs; kɔ low wewr ɛs fɛŋ ek’uw low any sɛnyn sɛnyn a b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ in e low yɛgm ɛs ab af.
42006041	Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am lɛr suwli ek’anŋ esŋ jim e nyamn ɛm a, ɛtŋ ɛ́wm likŋ ikpr ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm a e low ɛrm ee?
42006042	Ɛtŋ ayaf ɔtu eke ki dad esŋ jim ɛsɛ: 'Lisijim, yɛ̀b’m m’ɔ́ny suwli ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm a m’óc es, ke k’ɛ́knm likŋ ikpr ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm ab ee?' Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs, ìkŋ anym ɔny likŋ ikpr ek’anŋ’ŋ nyamn ɛm a oc es, ke sica b’ow ɛkn es sɛnyn sɛnyn ɔ́ny esŋ jim e suwli ek’anŋ nyamn ɛm a oc es."
42006043	"Likŋ mamn ɔ́sum ey eŋuŋ, ɛtŋ likŋ ŋuŋ ɔ́sum ey amamn.
42006044	Tasi ɛm a, wɛl b’uw likŋ nyam nyam any in ec’ey ɔsu ɛm: wɛl ɔ́wm babm librebr ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl ɔ́wm kɔkɔbri kati ɛm.
42006045	Ɛgŋ mamn, in ɛm ec’ów amamn eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nuŋ, in ɛm ec’ów eŋuŋ eke b’anŋ a anake li b’oc l’ɛlu ɔkm a. Low yec’a ek’iy ɛgŋ ec’ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ a anake nɛny bi dad ɛlu ɔkm a."
42006046	"Kɔ bla ɛtŋ b’ɛsŋn’m 'Ɛgŋ Gbɛl, Ɛgŋ Gbɛl' ɛtŋ am kokmn yec’a eke mi bi dad ɔny ab ee?
42006047	Ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛm ogŋ iri ɛm ec’odad, ke b’ucu ɔny es kok a, m’am ow mi yɛgm ɔny ob eke li b’ot es a:
42006048	n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyam ek’am us êl af, l’agbr nɔmu im wus ɛm kpekpe ɛtŋ li sigm in ec’êl ab es lebn af. Eke mij iy am ewl igŋ êl a, êl a ɛym wus aŋke ɛgŋ na us’r l’akpl.
42006049	Kɔ ɛgŋ eke am iri ɛm ec’odad a ke úcum ɔnym es kokm ɛsɛ elel eke n’am iri ab af a, anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyam ek’am us êl sɛc af ke agbrm nɔmu yɛji af. Eke mij iy am ewl igŋ êl a, kpɛkŋ êl a ɛy wus gbruu bubm es nimum!"
42007001	Eke Jesu dad agŋ a odad bake ow uwr a, n’im Kapɛrnayum.
42007002	Yogŋ, Rom eci srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs nyam ɔny in e juma kok ɛs nyam eke l’erur nɔnɔ; ɛtŋ juma kok ɛs a ɔl am ɔny toŋ batŋ am ow uw.
42007003	Eke l’iri wɛl dad’r Jesu e low a, l’ɛrm Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp bɛb im am ɛsŋ’n eke li k’ow l’ewlm in e juma kok ɛs a.
42007004	-N’im -n’ɛŋn ow ɛtŋ -n’am ŋɔŋn ow atrm ɛm -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na ek’ɛrm ɛy a it eke k’ɛŋn in ec’abu ɛlum.
42007005	L’erur ɛy ec’ɛb na ɛtŋ in anake n’ɔŋ ke wɛl us ɛy e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a."
42007006	Eke Jwifɛl a dad ów amua ok Jesu a, l’ɛgŋ ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’aam wɛl ab. Ow anŋ tɛl ke -l’ok gbugŋ, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny anym ɛs a ɛrm lawlɛl eke k’im dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛs ow ɛs dad’ŋ eke ŋ k’ìjr sos gbre ŋ k’ow yɛji, kɔ in itm eke ŋ k’ɛy in e gbugŋ a;
42007007	na sosiɛm anake in igbm in obi in owm toŋ bake in ɛŋn’ŋ a. Kɔ ŋ dád odad ebl nyam cɛ, ke kpɛkŋ in e juma kok ɛs a in b’ow in ewl.
42007008	In obi yɛji in anŋ abusu ɛsɛl ekpekp ec’ew, ɛtŋ in ɔny srɔda eyŋ eke in ɛw es. Eke in bi dad nyam in ɛsɛ: 'Ìm!', kpɛkŋ ow’n b’im; in bi dad ɛjeci in ɛsɛ: 'Òw!', kpɛkŋ ow’n b’ow; ɛtŋ eke in bi dad in e juma kok ɛs in ɛsɛ: 'Kòk low na!', kpɛkŋ ow’n bi kok low a."
42007009	Eke Jesu iri sodad amua eke wɛl ow dad’r a, l’erur anym ɛs a e low. Sica l’ɛwl mɛny n’am dad agŋ a ek’am us’r jam a l’ɛsɛ: "M’am dad ɔny, m’ɛŋnm ɔmn ɛs nɛnɛ kaka Israɛl eyŋ ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji."
42007010	Agŋ a eke wɛl ɛrm a ɛwl mɛny im anym ɛs a e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn eke juma kok ɛs a ewl.
42007011	Eke low na ɛc a, Jesu aam baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Nayin; ɛtŋ in e jam ɛsɛl a lele agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ab am us’r jam.
42007012	Eke n’am titm baŋn ec’ɛm ɛy usu a, wɛl oc ɛgŋ nyam ek’uw a aam oc es ɛtŋ baŋn a ec’agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl yɛji aam ɛl ab. Ow el iŋnyɔw nyam ec’iy ekpɔbi.
42007013	Eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛkn yɔw a, ow e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "K’ìkŋ ɔŋn!"
42007014	Kpɛkŋ li tat n’im l’itŋn lɛblakp a abu, ɛtŋ agŋ a inym es. Li dad ninɛ: "Ŋgbafrɛli, m’am dad’ŋ, ìgb!"
42007015	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’uw a igb inym es ɛtŋ am dad odad. Ɛtŋ Jesu dad lis ninɛ: "Kin ŋ ec’iy a."
42007016	Agŋ a fɛŋ erŋn am ɔny ɛtŋ am kɔklm Nyam dad ɛsɛ: " Kokoba ɔb ɛs ligbɛl nyam ɛy ɔkm ɛy ɛm! Nyam ow am ɛlum in ec’agŋ abu!"
42007017	Ɛtŋ Jude wus ab af lele baŋn a fɛŋ eke ɛlulil ɛm ab ab iri low a eke Jesu kok a.
42007018	Jan e jam ɛsɛl a im dad ów a fɛŋ eke Jesu kok a ok Jan. L’ɛsŋ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ yony,
42007019	ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ eke -li k’ibrm ow eke ow el Mesi a eke ow a, oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci -li k’eku.
42007020	Eke jam ɛsɛl yony a im ok yogŋ a, -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ɛrm ɛy s’ow eke si k’ibrm’ŋ: 'Kɔ ŋ, ŋ el ɛgŋ a eke ɛl uw any eke in b’ow in ow a, oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci ɛl k’eku ee?' "
42007021	Wanci ab af a, Jesu am ewlm agŋ nɔnɔ ek’ɔl akpasu akpasu am ɔny, n’am ogŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ec’ abŋ eŋuŋ; ɛtŋ n’am ɔŋ ány eflu nɔnɔ ɛkn es.
42007022	Ɛtŋ li dad agŋ a eke Jan ɛrm a ninɛ: "Ìmn ke dádr Jan low a eke ɛkan ke irir a: ány eflu am ɛkn es, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl am an es, kokobe ɛsɛl yɛji am ewl, ɔ́ru ablu yɛji am iri ów, agŋ ek’uw a yɛji am igb, ɛtŋ wɛl am ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba ok ɔgbɔru.
42007023	Ehe él ɛgŋ a eke k’ow irmnm in ec’ɔmn eke n’ɔny ɛm ɛm a eci!"
42007024	Eke Jan ec’agŋ a ek’ɛrm a ɛwl mɛny im a, Jesu oc Jan e lís e low am ibrm agŋ a ɛsɛ: "Kɔ loj yogŋ bla imn eke k’ɛkan ee? Kɔ ɛgŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ anany eke lɛf am ɔny mumu af ee? Njaŋ!
42007025	Ca eke ow elm ɛbɛn a, ke bla imn ɛkan ee? Ɛgŋ eke sus mob sɛnyn ee? Njaŋ! Agŋ eke bi sus mob sɛnyn sɛnyn íj ɛb a, ɛ́b ebu e gbugŋ -li b’anŋ.
42007026	Ɛtŋ ca bla tasi imn ɛkan ee? Kɔ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ee? Ɛɛ, m’am dad ɔny eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɛkan a agb akm kokoba ɔb ɛs.
42007027	Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad Jan e lís e low ninɛ: Kin, m’am ɔŋ ɛm ec’ɛrm ɛs íkŋ’ŋ anym kok ŋ ec’ejagb a."
42007028	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’am dad ɔny eke agŋ eke wɛl ew ab ɛm, ɛgŋ kaka anm ek’agb akm Jan; kɔ Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ ek’anŋ a e likekli a agb akm’n."
42007029	Agŋ nɔnɔ toŋ wus labm eb ɛsɛl bɔbɔ yɛji ek’iri Jesu ec’odad a, uw any eke Nyam e low a nawrɛ, aŋke -l’ɛgŋ Jan ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
42007030	Kɔ Farisiɛl lele ol e low any uw ɛsɛl ab ab ɛgŋm Nyam e low eke ki kok ɔŋ ɛl a ebm, aŋke -l’ɛgŋm eke Jan k’ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
42007031	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ m’ɔtu eke mi k’oc mi bɛbmn yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ab ab ee? Bogŋ ec’agŋ -l’ot es ee?
42007032	-L’ot etuey ek’anŋ an ɔl usu es ke am dad lebl gege ɛm ɛsɛ: 'S’afl kete ɛj ub eci s’ok ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn eke k’ubr ɛj! S’ɛgŋ sɔrŋ ɛj s’ok ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn okmn sabu ɛrmni ikŋmn ɔŋn!'
42007033	Kin Jan ek’ow a, li b’ɛnŋ nɛny, l’ɛ́gŋm mar, ɛtŋ ɔny bi dadr ek’ow’n ɔny abŋ ŋuŋ!
42007034	Sica ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ek’ow a, li b’ij ob, li b’ɛgŋ mar, ɛtŋ ɔny cɛ bi dadr eke ɛgŋ ikŋ na, in el ob iju, mar ɛgŋu, wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab e lawl!
42007035	Agŋ a eke ɛgŋ Nyam e sɛwr a eb a uw any eke sɛwr a el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam."
42007036	Lɛgŋ nyam, Farisi nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ ɛsŋ Jesu eke k’ow ij ob in ab. Jesu ɛgŋ ɛtŋ im ɛy in e gbugŋ a sig es ob ij usu.
42007037	Baŋn yogŋ yɔw nyam eke nin uŋ a anŋ. Eke l’iri eke Jesu anŋ ob ij usu Farisi a e gbugŋ a, l’ow yogŋ. N’ɔnym mijey kɔk nyam eke wɛl kok lebn eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ albatr ɛm ab, ke mijey sŋɔsŋɔ iy ɛm gbɔŋ.
42007038	L’is es Jesu ec’akr esr n’am ikŋ ɔŋn l’ɔpar ow akr es in e mikŋ ab ɛm, l’oc in e sin nuŋ a n’am tɛtŋ ow es; n’am ɛy ow akr af li joj ow akr, ɛtŋ n’am ok ow mijey a.
42007039	Eke Farisi a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, n’am dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Blel igŋ na el kokoba ɔb ɛs tasi ana, ke blel l’úw any eke yɔw na ek’am titŋn in sabu a el yɔw eke nin uŋ."
42007040	Kɔ Jesu dad Farisi a ninɛ: "Simɔ, m’ɔny low eke mi ki dad’ŋ." Ɛtŋ Simɔ ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, dàd gɔŋ."
42007041	Ɛtŋ l’ub ow nyandrɛ nyam li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ yony abmn os ɛgŋ nyam ogŋ: nyam ij os ekŋ yen yen sakp yen e labm, ɛtŋ nyam a ij os ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab e labm.
42007042	Ɛl yony mum -l’ɔtum -li sɔgm labm a, ɛtŋ igŋ a oc ap ɛl. Kɔ ɛl yony na ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ anake b’ow erur igŋ a akm lawl ab ee?"
42007043	Ɛtŋ Simɔ ninɛ: "M’am tutr ke ɛgŋ eke wɛl oc in e labm nɔnɔ a ap a." Jesu ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ow tasi anake dad a."
42007044	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ l’ɛwl mɛny l’ɔkŋ yɔw ab any ɛtŋ li dad Simɔ ninɛ: "Kɔ am ɛkn yɔw na! M’ow m’ɛy’ŋ gbugŋ ɛtŋ ɔɔm im mij akr es yɔg eci. Kɔ in, li yɔg’m akr es in e mikŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ li tɛtŋ es in e sin nuŋ ab ɛm.
42007045	Eke m’ow a, ɛym im af. Kɔ in, anym ɛtŋ n’am ɛy’m akr af li jój’m akr.
42007046	Okm im mun nuŋ, kɔ in l’ok’m mijey akr.
42007047	Na sosiɛm m’am dad’ŋ: erur ligbɛl na eke l’ɛlu ɔkm a am yɛgm eke in e sikpl nɔnɔ gbɛl a yɛji wɛl oc ap’r. Kɔ ɛgŋ eke wɛl ap sikpl tɛl a, erur tɛl cɛ li b’ɛlu ɔkm."
42007048	Ɛtŋ li dad yɔw a ninɛ: "M’oc ŋ e sikpl a m’ap’ŋ."
42007049	Agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ am ij ob ɛl ab a am dad ɛl ɔfr ɛm ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ na ɛtŋ li k’ap ɛgŋ sikpl ee?"
42007050	Kɔ Jesu dad yɔw a ninɛ: "Ŋ ec’ɔmn a eb ɛlu’ŋ es; ìm ɛrm es ɛy ɛm gɔŋ."
42008001	-
42008002	Eke na b’ɛc a, Jesu am ɛc baŋn ɛgbɛl ɛm lel ekekey ɛm ab dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn ec’odad. In e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a lel ɔyɔw bɛb eke l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ wɛl e lís ke l’ewlm wɛl ɔl ɛm ab yɛji am us’r jam: Mari Magdala yɔwi a eke ow ɛm l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ lɔbŋ a;
42008003	Jana, Erɔd e gbugŋ a ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kusa e yɔw; Susan lele ɔyɔw nɔnɔ gbɛl eke b’is Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab abu ɛlum.
42008004	Eke agŋ nɔnɔ anŋ baŋn baŋn am ow Jesu ogŋ, ke sica ɛl fɛŋ -l’asr luku a, li dad wɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ninɛ:
42008005	"Lɛgŋ nyam, egb ewl ɛs nyam im ɔgm am ewl egb. Eke n’am ufŋ egb ey ab es a, bɛb ok ebr af: agŋ uyu af ɛtŋ ɔr ow sus ij.
42008006	Bɛb ok mebn wus af. Eke egb a ɛli a, -li wɛw es aŋke -n’ɛŋnm sɛc prɔprɔ eke -li k’akpl.
42008007	Bɛb ok mirŋ wus af. Kpɛkŋ mirŋ a ɛli ok ɔkm egb amamn ab ab, ɛtŋ ɔny egb amamn a awŋ es.
42008008	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny bɛb ok wus mamn af. Egb a ɛli ɛtŋ ɔsu ey: nyam ɔsu ey ekŋ yen." Ɛtŋ Jesu igbl lebl ogŋ dad ninɛ: "Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn!"
42008009	Eke li dad nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na bake ow uwr a, in e jam ɛsɛl a am ibrm’n odad a e nyandrɛ.
42008010	Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny, ɛŋan Nyam eci gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ów a eke lɔl es a ec’any uw. Kɔ agŋ ɛjec’a, ɛl -l’uwmn any. Nyandrɛ ɛm wɛl ki dad yec’ɛtŋ ke -li bi lɛr yɛji -li k’ɛknmn; -li b’iri yɛji -li k’uwmn any."
42008011	"Kin odad a e nyandrɛ: egb a el Nyam ec’odad.
42008012	Ebr ab af a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri Nyam odad, ke agn b’ɔny odad a oc es ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ubmn nawrɛ bake -n’ɛŋn sel.
42008013	Mebn wus a eke egb a ok a, el agŋ a eke b’iri odad a ke b’eb’r sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a, kɔ ow ókm min ɛl ɛm. -L’ubmn nawrɛ ow ibnm, ɛtŋ eke -li b’ɔbr gbre a -li bi digŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a -l’ɛlu es.
42008014	Wus a eke mirŋ nɔnɔ anŋ af ke egb a ok af a, el agŋ a eke b’iri odad a ke b’ebr wus na ec’owr anŋ ec’ɛrmij a, b’ɔl ob ɔny lel ɛb ij owi ab es a. Ów amua na b’ɔny awŋ ɛl es, ɛtŋ -li kokmn ów amamn.
42008015	Wus mamn a el agŋ eke b’iri odad a ke b’eb ɛw es ɛl ec’ɛrm tasi ab ɛm a; -li b’ij nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛtŋ -li bi kok ów amamn."
42008016	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ígŋm kɛniɛ uburm es lɔfu ew, oglog kofa ew. Kɔ b’igŋ kɛniɛ a, ke ítm es ob es itm ob af, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ eke b’ok akŋ a ám ɛkn usuayl a.
42008017	Low eke lɔl es agŋ ɛ́knm a, -li b’ow -l’ɛkn; ɛtŋ low eke agŋ úwm any a, -li b’ow -l’uw any ke -l’iri yɛji.
42008018	Na sosiɛm, ɛ̀wr ɛrm elel eke am iririr ab ɛm! Aŋke ɛgŋ ek’iri odad a ke ucu ɔny es a, Nyam b’ow obn’n; kɔ ɛgŋ ek’irim kaka a, tɛl a eke n’am tutr eke l’iri a yɛji, wɛl b’ow ɔny oc’r es ɛrm af."
42008019	Jesu lis lele lisijimɛl ab ow ok yogŋ a eke Jesu anŋ a, kɔ -l’ɔtum eke -li k’im bake -li titm ow bieku a sosiɛm.
42008020	Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a am dad Jesu ɛsɛ: "Kin esŋ lele esŋ jimɛl ab ek’ow inym es gbeŋ. -N’am erur eke -li k’ɛkn’ŋ."
42008021	Kɔ Jesu dad agŋ a fɛŋ ninɛ: "Ɛm lis lele ɛm lisijimɛl ab a el agŋ a eke am iri Nyam ec’odad ke am ɛlum a."
42008022	Lɛgŋ nyam Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ok mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "S’úbr mij lekpl na e jam a!" Ɛtŋ -l’ok lɛtŋ ab ɛm -n’aam.
42008023	Eke -n’am ɔr mij -n’im a, Jesu am ɛru mɛmn. Kpru ɛm lidgbegb ligbɛl nyam igb mij lekpl ab af, ɛtŋ mij am ok ɛl lɛtŋ ɛm toŋ batŋ ow am iy, ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a anŋ ɛrmij ɛm.
42008024	-N’im -n’am uwr Jesu ɛtŋ -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛgŋ gbɛl, s’am uw!" Jesu ufŋm es ɛtŋ dad lidgbegb a lele mra ab ab odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛtŋ -l’adr. Ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ irm es tiŋ.
42008025	Sica l’ibrm in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Bogŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn ab a ee?" Kɔ erŋn am ɔny ɛl, low iti ɛl any ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ el ɛgŋ na ee? Li bi dad lɛf lele mij ab odad, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ɛlum’n!"
42008026	Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab ubr mij lekpl a jam. Ca -n’im -l’ok Geraseni wus af ek’anŋ Galile any af a.
42008027	Eke Jesu anŋ lɛtŋ ɛm us es wus a, baŋn a ec’ɛgŋ nyam am ow ɔbr’r. Ɛgŋ a abŋ eŋuŋ b’ijr’r gbre. Lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ li b’anŋ sos ɔfr; n’ánm akŋ kɔ suwɔmu ɛm ɔfr li b’anŋ.
42008028	Eke li b’ɛkn Jesu a, li barm ɛtŋ l’ɛy l’ubu es ow ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am dad odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu, Nyam ek’anŋ afr kpekpe ec’Iy, kɔ bla lowi anŋ ɛy araŋn ee? M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, k’ìjr’m gbre!"
42008029	N’am dad ɛbɛn aŋke Jesu am ogŋ abŋ ŋuŋ a eke k’ɛy ɔkm in ɛm. Sakp nɔnɔ, eke abŋ akpasu na b’ɛy’r af a, wɛl b’awŋ’n akr lele sabu ab ŋgbraka ɛm am ɔsu’r. Kɔ li bi dɛdŋ ŋgbraka ab es, ɛtŋ abŋ a b’oc ɛlu’l loj n’am adŋ es.
42008030	Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ ayaf wɛl b’ɛsŋn’ŋ ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm e nin el 'Bubutɛ' " (eke abŋ eŋuŋ nɔnɔ anŋ’n ɛm a sosiɛm).
42008031	Ɛtŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a am ŋɔŋn Jesu dad ɛsɛ: "K’ògŋ ɛy si k’im si k’ok nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm."
42008032	Lafɛny nyam anŋ yogŋ eke gbroko nɔnɔ anŋ af am ij ob. Abŋ eŋuŋ a am ŋɔŋn Jesu eke ow k’ɔ́ŋ ɛl abusu -n’im -l’ok sigbroko ab ɛm, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu.
42008033	Abŋ eŋuŋ a ok ɔkm igŋ ab ɛm im ok sigbroko ab ɛm, ɛtŋ gbroko a fɛŋ anŋ lafɛny ab af uru es im ok mij lekpl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -n’ɛmn.
42008034	Eke agŋ a ek’am ɔsu sigbroko a b’ɛkn low na ek’ɛy a, -l’uru es -n’im -l’ɔb amani -l’ok baŋn a lele sikpukpu ɛm ab ab ec’agŋ a.
42008035	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’iri low na ek’ɛy a ok ɔkm aam ɛkn. -L’ow -n’ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn igŋ a eke abŋ eŋuŋ anŋ ɛm ok ɔkm a eke sus mob sig es Jesu saw, ke nuŋ ɛm ayal. Ɛtŋ agŋ a erŋn am ɔny.
42008036	Agŋ ek’ɛkn low na a am dad ɛl elel eke abŋ eŋuŋ ɛs a ewl a.
42008037	Ɛtŋ Geraseni eyŋ a ow nɔnɔ am dad Jesu eke k’ŋgboŋ ɛl e wus ab af, eke erŋn am ɔny ɛl a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛy lɛtŋ ɛm eke k’im.
42008038	Sica igŋ a eke l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ ok ɔkm in ɛm a am ŋɔŋn’n eke li k’anŋ ow ab. Kɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ:
42008039	"Ɛ̀wl mɛny im gbugŋ ke ɔ́b low a eke Nyam kok’ŋ a ec’amani ok agŋ." Igŋ a ɛwl im ɛtŋ am dad baŋn a nimum ec’agŋ a, low a eke Jesu kok ɔŋ’n a e low.
42008040	Eke Jesu anŋ mij jam a ow a, agŋ a ek’im am eku’r a eb’r.
42008041	Igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jayirus ow ɛŋn’n; l’el Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam. L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Jesu ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn ow eke ow k’ow in ogŋ a,
42008042	aŋke n’ɔny iy yɔwli ekpɔbi ek’ij akpo lɛw yony ke am uw. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Jesu igb aam yogŋ. Eke n’aam a, agŋ nɔnɔ iwr ɛlul il ɛm am atr’r sel.
42008043	Yogŋ, yɔw nyam eke b’ub abu ke mebl a ɛ́dŋm es toŋ ow ij akpo lɛw yony a anŋ. Ni ŋuŋn in ec’ob eke n’ɔny a sos kok ɛsɛl ogŋ, kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum ewlam’n.
42008044	L’ɛcr jam jam eci l’ow li titm Jesu ɛtŋ l’itŋn ow e mob sus ɛm a eci ɛnyɛmbri a abu, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ mebl a ek’am ok’r a ɛdŋ es.
42008045	Jesu ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ bwo itŋn’m abu ee?" Ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -n’am dad eke ɛl ɛknm. Kɔ Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ ɛ́knm bieku na ek’iwr did ɛlul’ŋ ɛm am atr’ŋ sel ab ee?"
42008046	Kɔ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, ɛgŋ ɛkn piy ɛtŋ itŋn’m abu, aŋke m’ɛkn eke lɛc nyam ɛy ɔkm ɛm ɛm."
42008047	Yɔw a b’ɛkn eke low a lɔlm es a, sos ufŋ ɛm l’ow l’ɛy Jesu ec’akr af a, ɛtŋ li dad agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af low a sosiɛm eke l’itŋn ow abu, ke kpɛkŋ l’ewl a.
42008048	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad yɔw a ninɛ: "Ɛm jɔw, ŋ ec’ɔmn a ewlm’ŋ! Ìm ɛrm es ɛy ɛm."
42008049	Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym am dad, ɛtŋ wɛl ɛrm ɛgŋ nyam anŋ Jayirus ogŋ a ow. N’am dad ow l’ɛsɛ: "Ejɔŋ uw! K’ìjr low yɛgm agŋ ɛs gbre ɔfr ɔfr."
42008050	Eke Jesu b’iri ɛbɛn a, li dad Jayirus ninɛ: "K’ùru erŋn, kɔ ɔ̀ny ɔmn sɔny coco cɛ; li b’ow l’igb."
42008051	Eke n’im l’ɛy gbugŋ a, n’ɔɔm ɛgŋ kaka abusu eke k’ɛy akŋ a in ab, ek’ow elm Piɛr, Jan, Jak, lele iy ɛs a lele iy lis ab cɛ.
42008052	Agŋ a fɛŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn ok sabu ɛrmni iy a sosiɛm. Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "K’ìkŋn ɔŋn! Dedyɔwli a l’uwm kɔ mɛmn n’am ɛru."
42008053	Kɔ eke Jesu dad ɛbɛn a, -n’am kokr ow miyɛr aŋke -l’uw any eke dedyɔwli a uw.
42008054	Kɔ Jesu im ucu iy a abu ɔny ɛtŋ dad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Dedyɔwli, ìgb wus!"
42008055	Dedyɔwli a ɛwl anŋ owr ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ igb wus. Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɔ̀ŋn in ob l’íj."
42008056	Iy ɛs a lele iy lis ab ab low iti any, kɔ Jesu ɛdŋn ɛl eke -li ki dadmn low a ek’ɛy a -l’okmn ɛgŋ kaka.
42009001	Lɛgŋ nyam Jesu as in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a luku, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu lele lɛc ab eke -li k’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ fɛŋ ke -l’ewlm ɔl ɛsɛl.
42009002	Ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl eke -li k’im -li dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad, ke -l’ewlm ɔ́lu.
42009003	N’ɔm wɛl ów ninɛ: "K’òcr usu im ec’ob kaka k’ɔnymn ab: kpama, ekpr, ob ij, os yɛji. Ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ócm mob sus ɛm ɛjeci akrm af.
42009004	Usu fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ow eb ɔny a, ànŋn gbugŋ a cɛ toŋ bake ŋ́gbroŋn yogŋ a.
42009005	Usu fɛŋ eke agŋ k’ow ɛgŋm ebm ɔny a, ̀ŋ̀gbroŋn ɛl ec’ɛb ab ɛm, ke cícr ɔny ec’akr sɛc a okr ɛl es. Na b’ow ij ɛl e nuŋ af e daŋku Nyam ec’any af."
42009006	Jam ɛsɛl a im ɛtŋ am ɛc baŋn baŋn fɛŋ dad Amani Mamn a ec’odad, ɛtŋ usu a fɛŋ -n’am ewlm ɔ́lu.
42009007	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Erɔd Antipas ek’el Galile wus af ec’es ɛw ɛs a iri wɛl am dad ów a ek’am ɛy a ec’amani. Ɛtŋ l’úwm elel eke li ki dadr any, aŋke agŋ bɛb am dad ɛsɛ Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs ek’in uw a, in igb luw ɛm.
42009008	Agŋ oglog am dad eke ow’n b’ow in el kokoba ɔb ɛs Eli anake in ɛwl in ow a. Ɛtŋ bɛb am dad eke ow’n b’ow in el godo godo e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a e nyam anake in igb luw ɛm a.
42009009	Kɔ Erɔd am tutr ów dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ m’ubr Jan nuŋ es; ɛtŋ bogŋ ec’ɛgŋ anake m’am iri in e lís ec’ów ab ee?" Ɛtŋ n’am ɔl eke li k’ɛkn Jesu.
42009010	Eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a ɛwl mɛny ow a, -n’am dad Jesu ów a fɛŋ eke -li kokr a e low. Ɛtŋ Jesu ot ɛl ab im baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Bɛtsayida e saw eke -li k’anŋ ɛl sɔny.
42009011	Kɔ eke -l’okr yogŋ a, agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl uw any ɛtŋ am us’r jam im. Jesu eb ɛl ɛtŋ am dad ɛl Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a e low ɛtŋ n’am ewlm ɔ́lu a ek’am ibrm eke k’ewl a.
42009012	Eke lɛgŋ am ew es a, jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òk bieku ab es ím baŋn baŋn lele sikpukpu ɛm ab yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɛŋn ob ij lele es ɛru usu ab, aŋke aŋa eke s’anŋ a el usu saw ɛm."
42009013	Kɔ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɔny obi, ɔ̀ŋn ɛl ob -l’ij!" Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a ɔdu eb ninɛ: "Futufutu yen lele ɔcn yony ab cɛ s’ɔnym ab. Kɔ erur eke si k’im s’ɔl ob ij ɛbm agŋ nɔnɔ na ee?"
42009014	(Agŋ egŋ ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm yogŋ a ɔtu ek’ij agŋ fandi yen). Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl ninɛ: "Dàdr ɛl -l’ok es eku eku ɛm ek’ɔtu eke k’ij agŋ ekŋ yony lele lɛw lɛw ab."
42009015	Jam ɛsɛl a ɛlum ɛtŋ ɔŋ ɛl -l’ok es ɛbɛn.
42009016	Jesu oc futufutu yen a lele ɔcn yony ab ab igbl any ogŋ afr, ɛtŋ ɛlu Nyam bia. Li bubr ɛm n’ɔŋ in jam ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ -li cɛc -n’ɔŋ bieku a.
42009017	Agŋ a fɛŋ ij ob a lok iy, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ow wal es. Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a ot ekpr a eke wal es a as luku, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu lɛw yony.
42009018	Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu ocr sos es im Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm; jam ɛsɛl a yɛji im in ab. N’am ibrm wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf agŋ a bi dadr ɛm e lís ee?"
42009019	-L’ɔdu -l’eb -li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ bɛb bi dad eke ŋ Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs. Agŋ oglog b’ɛsɛ ŋ Eli. Ɛtŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ ŋ godo godo e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam eke in igb luw ɛm."
42009020	Eke -li dadr ɛbɛn a, Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ kɔ ɔny obi ɔny obi a ayaf b’ocar’m ee?" Ɛtŋ Piɛr ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ŋ el Nyam e Mesi!"
42009021	Eke Piɛr dad ɛbɛn a, Jesu ijl ɛl nɛny kpoŋ kpoŋ kpoŋ ninɛ: "Kì dadr low na k’okr ɛgŋ kaka."
42009022	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li dad ninɛ: "Ow it ek’ɛgŋ ec’ Iy k’ij gbre nɔnɔ, ke agŋ ekpekp, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl, lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ígŋ ɛlu’l es, ɔ́ŋ wɛl ibi’r ke sɛgŋ nyahan l’ígb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm."
42009023	Ɛtŋ li dad agŋ a fɛŋ ninɛ: "Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am erur eke k’us’m jam a, ow it ke li kí tutrm in e lís owi, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ l’ábu in obi ec’olikŋ a, ke l’ús’m jam.
42009024	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow erur eke ki dogŋn in e sel a b’ow irmn. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow irmn in e sel a b’ow ɛŋn.
42009025	Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny wus ec’ob a fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’irmn in e sel a, ke bla ow b’ow eel il ab ee?
42009026	Ek’ɛgŋ ɛ́s b’ɔny ɛm sosiɛm lele ɛm ec’odad ab ec’a, ɛbɛn ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji ɛ́s b’ow ɔny in e lís, lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ow in ec’anygbɛl ɛm a, anygbɛl ek’el Ɛs lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala ab eci.
42009027	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ a eke anŋ aŋa a e bɛb b’ow ɛkn Nyam ec’ es ɛw a gbuŋ ke -l’uw."
42009028	Eke ow ij sɛgŋ niwn eke li dad odad na a, Jesu uyu lafɛny nyam af, in lele Piɛr, Jan lele Jak ab eke li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam.
42009029	Eke n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam a, in ec’any a itŋn ɛtŋ in e mob sus ɛm a yɛji ufu toŋ am jɛjn.
42009030	-
42009031	Kpɛkŋ agŋ yony ok ɔkm am dad ów Jesu ab: ow el Mois lele Eli ab eke anŋ Nyam ec’usuayl ek’am jɛjn ab ɛm okm sos ɔkm. -N’am dad elel eke Jesu b’ow uw Jerusalɛm, ke ow ɛm in e juma b’ow iy nɛny a.
42009032	Low na ek’am ɛy a, Piɛr lele lawlɛl ab ab mɛmn ibi. Eke any b’ok ɛl es a, -l’ɛkn Jesu ek’anŋ Nyam ec’usuayl ab ɛm lele agŋ yony eke inym es ab.
42009033	Eke agŋ a k’ɛlu Jesu es im a, Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ow akpl eke si k’anŋ aŋa! S’ús nuŋ igŋ usu nyahan: ŋ e nyam, Mois e nyam lele Eli e nyam ab." (Odad cɛ ek’ɛy’r nɛnym ke li dad.)
42009034	Eke n’am dad odad ɛbɛn a, kpɛkŋ jru ɛy ɛtŋ ubur ɛl fɛŋ es. Eke -l’ɛkan jru na ow am ubur ɛl es a, jam ɛsɛl a erŋn am ɔny.
42009035	Ɛtŋ lebl nyam anŋ jru ab ɛm am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na el ɛm ec’Iy eke mi sɔsum m’oc. Ìrir in e low!"
42009036	Eke lebl a ikŋ dad odad na bake ok es a, jam ɛsɛl a ɛkn Jesu sɔny coco eke inym es. Low na eke jam ɛsɛl a iri ke ɛkn a, lɛgŋ ab ɛm a -li dadm -l’okm ɛgŋ kaka.
42009037	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab anŋ lafɛny ab af us es ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ow am ɔbr’r.
42009038	Bieku ab ɛm yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam am ɛlu lebl ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, ìs any lɛr ɛm ec’iy na, l’el ɛm ec’iy igŋ ekpɔbi!
42009039	Abŋ ŋuŋ a b’ɛy’r ɛm a ke n’am ɔg, ow ám ɔny ufŋ’n lɛc ɛm ke sar ám ifl’l nɛny. Ow b’ijr’r gbre toŋ bake sos kikn’n es gbuŋ ke ow ɛ́lu’l es.
42009040	Mi dad ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a ow ek’ogŋ abŋ ikŋ na, kɔ -l’ɔtum."
42009041	Eke igŋ a dad ɛbɛn a, Jesu igbl lebl ogŋ dad agŋ a fɛŋ ninɛ: "Wew! Ɔny eel agŋ eŋuŋ eke ɔmn anm ɛm tasi! Ɛmɛny sɛgŋ abi m’it eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab ee? Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sakp abi ow it eke mi k’ɛgŋ low na m’eb ee?" Ɛtŋ ca li dad iy ɛs a ninɛ: "Òc ŋ ec’iy a ow aŋa!"
42009042	Eke iy a am ow titm’n a, abŋ a ɔny ɛlu’l wus ɛtŋ am ɔny ufŋ’n lɛc ɛm. Kɔ Jesu dad odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ogŋ abŋ ŋuŋ a, ewlm iy a, ɛtŋ l’oc n’ɔŋ ow ɛs.
42009043	Low na ek’ɛy ɛbɛn a, ow iti agŋ a fɛŋ any, Nyam ec’abusu ligbɛl na ek’ɛy ɔkm a sosiɛm. Ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ low am iti any Jesu e low na eke kok a sosiɛm a, li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ:
42009044	"Low na eke ca m’am ow mi dad ɔny a, ùcur ɔnyn es: wɛl b’ow ɔny ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɛlu agŋ abu ɛm."
42009045	Kɔ -l’irim odad a okm ɛl es sos ɛm, aŋke Nyam lɔl odad na e nyandrɛ ab es yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’uwmn any; ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -n’am uru eke -li k’ibrm Jesu low na ec’akr otar a.
42009046	Sica jam ɛsɛl a am atar ów es eke k’uw ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ eke k’el ɛl ec’anymu ab any.
42009047	Kɔ Jesu uw ɛl e tutr ab any. L’ɛsŋ iyli nyam ow inym’n es saw,
42009048	ɛtŋ li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ek’eb iyli na ɛm sosiɛm a, ke ɛm anake l’eb’m a; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’eb’m a, eb ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm im a yɛji. Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’el ɔny ɛm e likekli a, in ana l’agb l’akm ɔny a."
42009049	Eke Jesu dad ɛbɛn a, Jan ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, s’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam eke oc ŋ e nin a am kokr juma ogŋn abŋ eŋuŋ. S’ɛdŋn in, eke l’elm ɛy ec’ɛgŋ a sosiɛm."
42009050	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́dŋn in, aŋke ɛgŋ eke ifnm ɔny a el ɔny eci."
42009051	Eke sɛgŋ a eke Jesu k’uyu afr a ow titm a, ca li bɛbm tasi eke li k’im Jerusalɛm.
42009052	L’ɛrm agŋ ikŋ’n anym. Eke ɛ́rmu a us ejagb a, -n’im -l’ok Samari eyŋ e baŋn nyam eke -li ki bɛbm ow e lís e low.
42009053	Kɔ ɛb eyŋ a erurm eke k’eb’r aŋke -l’erurmn eke Jwifɛl k’ɛcr ɛl ogŋ a eci im Jerusalɛm.
42009054	Eke jam ɛsɛl Jak lele Jan ab b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ erur eke si k’ɔŋ al anŋ afr ow ɛtul ɛl ee?"
42009055	Jesu ɛwl mɛny lɛr ɛl ɛtŋ ɛnym ɛl abr lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm.
42009056	Ɛtŋ -n’im baŋn ɛjeci.
42009057	Eke -n’anŋn ejagb -n’aam a, ɛgŋ nyam dad Jesu ninɛ: "M’ow m’us’ŋ jam usu fɛŋ eke b’ow im a."
42009058	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛkrɛ b’ɔny ɛl ec’ɔmu wus ɛm eke b’ɛru ɛm, ɔr yɛji b’ɔny ɛl e mel; kɔ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɔnym usu nuŋ nyam ek’ɔtu eke k’ɛru es eb sel."
42009059	Ɛmɛny li dad ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam." Kɔ ɛgŋ a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ŋ’m abusu m’ím m’oc ɛm ɛs es gbuŋ ke m’ów."
42009060	Kɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɛ̀b agŋ ek’uw abŋ ɛm a ót ɛl ec’agŋ ek’uw ab es; kɔ ŋ, ìm dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad."
42009061	Ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ow m’us’ŋ jam; gbɛkɔ yɛ̀b m’ím m’ibrm ɛm e gbugŋ ec’agŋ a abusu gbuŋ ke m’ów."
42009062	Kɔ in yɛji Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ eke b’agbr wus, ke b’ɛdŋ mɛny a, akplm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a eci."
42010001	Eke na b’ɛc a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu sɔsum jam ɛsɛl ɛjeci ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw yony ab ot. L’ɛrm wɛl yony yony wɛl ikŋ anym im ɛb ɛb ɛm lele susu susu ek’in obi yɛji li b’ow n’im a.
42010002	Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Egb ub a ufu es nɔnɔ, kɔ juma kok ɛsɛl ɛnym. Ow sosiɛm, ìbrmn egb ɔgm ɛs a, ke l’ɛ́rm juma kok ɛsɛl nɔnɔ im in ec’egb ub ab ɛm.
42010003	Ìmn gɔŋ! M’am ɛrm ɔny ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ey af sibotimbo ec’araŋn.
42010004	K’òcr os, ekpr, lele cɔkrukpɔ ab. Eke aamn a, k’ìrmnin lɛgŋ ejagb af k’ɛ̀sŋnin ɛgŋ.
42010005	Gbugŋ nyam eke b’ow im okr a, ìkŋn anym dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ke Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a ánŋ gbugŋ na ec’agŋ ab ab!'
42010006	Eke yogŋ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ek’erur Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a, ke ɔny ec’ɛrm es ɛy a b’ow anŋ in ab. Eke ɛgŋ nɛnɛ anm a, ɛrm es ɛy a b’ow ɛwl anŋ ɔny ab.
42010007	Ànŋn gbugŋ yogŋ ijr ob, ke ɛ́gŋn yec’eke wɛl b’ow ɔŋ ɔny a, aŋke juma kok ɛs it eke k’ɔny in e labm sɔg. K’ɛ̀cr gbugŋ gbugŋ.
42010008	Eke b’ɛyr ɛb nyam ɛm ɛtŋ -l’eb ɔny a, ìjr ob yec’eke -li b’ow -n’ɔŋ ɔny a.
42010009	Èwlmn ɔ́lu ek’anŋ ɛb ab ɛm a, ke dádr ɛb eyŋ a ɛsrɛ: 'Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ow titm ɔny.'
42010010	Kɔ eke b’ɛyr ɛb nyam ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ɛgŋm -l’ebm ɔny a, ɛ̀cr ɛb ab ɛm, ke dádr ɛsrɛ:
42010011	'S’am cic ɔny ec’ɛb ab ɛm ec’akr sɛc a s’ók ɔny es. Gbɛkɔ ùwr low na any: Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ow titm ɔny.'
42010012	M’am dad ɔny: jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Sodɔm e low ŋuŋ a eke Nyam ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ tɛl akm ɛb na ec’a."
42010013	"Korasin ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Bɛtsayida ec’agŋ, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke sakrowa a eke wɛl kok ɔny ogŋ a, blel ow el Tir lele Sidɔn ab wɛl kok ana, ke blel -l’ɛw sɔrŋ e sos, -li kpakp milakŋ, -l’ok fandi ɛrm ɛm itŋn eci ow yɛ́gm eke -l’erur eke -li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm.
42010014	Na sosiɛm jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Tir lele Sidɔn ab e low ŋuŋ eke Nyam ki kok a b’ow ɔdŋ akm ɔny ec’a.
42010015	Ɛtŋ ŋ Kapɛrnayum, am tutr eke any ij ɛm b’ow agb toŋ bake ím titm afr ee? Njaŋ, b’ow is es toŋ bake ígŋ ɔŋnes baŋn."
42010016	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li dad jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ eke b’iri ɔny e low a, iri ɛm e low. Ɛgŋ eke ebm ɔny a, ebm im; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke ebm im a, ebm ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm im a."
42010017	Agŋ ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw yony ab ab eke wɛl ɛrm a ɛwl mɛny ow sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, eke s’im a, abŋ eŋuŋ yɛji ɛlum ɛy ŋ e nin ɛm!"
42010018	Jesu ɔdu eb dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’ɛkn Satan ek’anŋ afr ɛy wus ɛsɛ nyam eke b’ɛŋn af.
42010019	Kin, m’ɔŋ ɔny abusu eke k’aan es morŋn lele sibɔban ab af, ke ákmn ifnu ec’abusu fɛŋ es; ɛtŋ ob kaka k’ow kokm ɔny.
42010020	Ɛbɛn yɛji sos ɛm k’íŋn ɔny eke abŋ eŋuŋ ɛlum ɔny a sosiɛm. Kɔ sos ɛm íŋn ɔny eke afr wɛl nɔn ɔny ec’en a sosiɛm."
42010021	Wanci ab af cɛ, Abŋ Lala ɔŋ Jesu sos ɛm am iŋn toŋ batŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, ŋ ek’el afr lele wus ab ec’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a, m’am ɛlu’ŋ bia, ów a ek’ot lɔl es, ɛsɛwru lele nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl ab ec’any af, ke yɛgm etuey uw any a eci. Ɛɛ! Ɛm Ɛs, erur ek’ow k’el ɛbɛn.
42010022	Ɛm Ɛs ocr in sosi ɛlul’m abu ɛm. Ɛgŋ kaka uwm Iy ab any eke ow elm Ɛs sɔny coco cɛ, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka uwm Ɛs any eke ow elm Iy a sɔny coco cɛ lele agŋ eke Iy a erur eke k’ɛlu ɔkm yɛgm’n ab ab."
42010023	Ca Jesu ɛwl sos mɛny ɛtŋ am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a sɔny cɛ ɛsɛ: "Na eke ɛkan a, ehe el ɔny ec’ŋ̂!
42010024	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, godo godo e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl nɔnɔ lele ɛ́b ebu nɔnɔ ab erur eke k’ɛkn low na ek’am ɛkan a, kɔ -l’ɛknm, iri low na ek’am irir a, kɔ -l’irim."
42010025	Ca ol e low any uw ɛs nyam ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ ibrm Jesu ɛbm ɛkn ɛm ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ke m’ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr ee?"
42010026	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi wɛl nɔn ol ab ɛm ee? Ɛtŋ eke b’awl a, ayaf b’irir ee?"
42010027	Li dad ow ninɛ: "B’ow erur Asŋ Kɔtɔkɔ ŋ e Nyam ŋ eci ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ŋ ec’abŋ fɛŋ ɛm, ŋ e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm, lele ŋ e tutr pupukpaŋ ab; ke érur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af."
42010028	Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ow anake dad a. Kòk ɛbɛn cɛ ke b’ow ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr."
42010029	Kɔ eke ol e low any uw ɛs a erur eke in e low k’ij low a, li dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kɔ bwo el ɛgŋ ɛjec’ab ee?"
42010030	Jesu ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ nyam igb Jerusalɛm am us nuŋ es im Jeriko baŋn ɛtŋ l’ɛy elu abu ɛm. Wɛl ɔr’r, eb’r mob ɛtŋ wɛl digŋ ɛlu’l es im. Ɛtŋ n’anŋ luw lele owr anŋ ab ec’araŋn.
42010031	Egb waw ɛs nyam eb ejagb a aam. Eke li b’uyum ow ab a, l’aru l’ɛgb ow es n’im.
42010032	Leviɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’eb ejagb a am ow a, ɛkn’n, ɛtŋ in yɛji l’aru l’ɛgb ow es n’im.
42010033	Kɔ Samari iy nyam ek’aam usu a, im ok yogŋ. Eke li b’ɛkn ow a, ow e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ.
42010034	L’ɛri n’im li titm ow, l’oc mar li yɔyɔg ow abi ab es, l’ok mun ɛm ɛtŋ n’awŋ ow abi ab es. L’oc ow in e gbaŋkɔ ab af, l’oc n’im ow etu eb usu.
42010035	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, l’oc os yony n’ɔŋ etu eb usu a ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: 'Kòk ɛgŋ na sɛkp sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ek’os a obn a, ɛm e mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm a, m’ow mi sɔg’ŋ fɛŋ.' "
42010036	Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ agŋ nyahan amua ɛm a, bwo el ɛgŋ eke elu a ɔr eb mob a e lawl ee?"
42010037	Ɛtŋ ol e low any uw ɛs a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a ek’ikŋ’n sɔrŋ a anake el lawl a." Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìm ke ŋ yɛji kók ɛbɛn."
42010038	Eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab us ejagb aam a, -n’im -l’ok baŋn nyam. Yogŋ yɔw nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mart eb Jesu in e gbugŋ a.
42010039	N’ɔny lisijɔw nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mari, ke ow sig es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e saw am iri ow ec’odad a.
42010040	Mart eke akŋ e juma kok afŋn es a ow ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ow ám kokm’ŋ low kaka sos ɛm eke ɛm lisijɔw ɛlu’m es ɛm sɔny m’am kok akŋ e juma na ab ee? Dàd’r ke l’ów l’ɛlum im abu."
42010041	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: "Mart, Mart, am ebr ɛrmij lul es ów nɔnɔ eci,
42010042	kɔ low nyam sɔny coco cɛ akpl: Mari sɔsum yec’a eke akpl a oc, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔtum ebm’n abu ɛm."
42011001	Lɛgŋ nyam Jesu im usu nyam am ŋɔŋn Nyam. Eke ni ŋɔŋn Nyam bake ow uwr a, in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, yɛ̀gm ɛy elel eke si ki ŋɔŋan Nyam, ɛsɛ elel eke Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs yɛgmn in e jam ɛsɛl ab af."
42011002	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke b’ow ŋɔŋan Nyam a, ke dàdr ɛsrɛ: Ɛs, ke ŋ e nin lala a ɔ́ny ɛlum, ke ŋ ec’es ɛw a ów.
42011003	Ɔ̀ŋ ɛy lɛgŋ lɛgŋ ec’ob ij ek’it a.
42011004	Àp ɛy e sikpl, eke ɛy yɛji si b’ap agŋ eke bi kok ɛy low ŋuŋ a. Kì yɛb ɛy si k’ɛ̀y ɛbm owi ɛm."
42011005	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "S’óc low nyam s’ɛbmn: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam im njijm ɛm ɛŋn lawl nyam ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm lawl, àbmn’m futufutu nyahan.
42011006	Ɛm lawl nyam ek’ɛc aam usu a ow ɛm ogŋ a, ɛtŋ m’ɔnym ob kaka eke mi k’ɔŋ’n l’ij.'
42011007	Ɛtŋ lawl a ek’anŋ akŋ a dad’r ninɛ: 'K’ìjr’m gbre! M’abl êl ŋ̂. Ɛm lele ɛm ec’ey ab s’ɛru es ŋ̂. Mi k’ɔtum m’igbm m’ɔɔm’ŋ futufutu!'
42011008	Eke ow el lawl yɛji, li k’ow l’igbm n’ɔɔm ow futufutu a eke ow ibrm a. Kɔ eke n’am at l’ibrm ow a, li b’ow l’igb n’ɔŋ ow ob fɛŋ a eke ow am ibrm’n a, ɛ́s eke k’ɔnym’n a sosiɛm.
42011009	Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, m’am dad ɔny: ìbrmn ob eke erurir a, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny. Ɔ̀ɔl es, ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛŋn’n. Ìcmn lisany abu, ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow fig ɔny.
42011010	Kɔ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ibrm ob eke l’erur a, Nyam b’ɔŋ’n; ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɔl ob eke l’erur a es a, Nyam b’ɔŋ n’ɛŋn; ɛtŋ Nyam bi fig ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’icm’n lisany abu a.
42011011	Ɔny ɛm aŋa, bwo ec’ɛgŋ el iy ɛs eke jim b’ibrm’n futufutu, ke l’óc lebn n’ɔŋ ow ee? Oglog jim b’ibrm’n ɔcn, ke l’óc lorŋn n’ɔŋ ow ee?
42011012	Ɛmɛny ow b’ibrm’n ŋgɔs mbue, ke l’óc bɔban n’ɔŋ ow ee?
42011013	Ɔny nana ek’eel agŋ eŋuŋ a b’uwr ob amamn any ɔŋn ɔny ec’ey; ayaf Nyam ek’anŋ afr a k’ow kokm ow afŋm es ee? Agŋ eke am ibrm’n Abŋ Lala a, li b’ow n’ɔŋ wɛl."
42011014	Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu am ogŋ abŋ ŋuŋ ek’anŋ igŋ nyam ɛm, ke ow ɔŋ’n l’el ɛbrm. Eke abŋ ŋuŋ a ɛy ɔkm a, ɛbrm a am dad odad ɛtŋ agŋ a low am iti any.
42011015	Kɔ agŋ oglog am dad ɛsɛ: " Bɛlsebul ek’el abŋ eŋuŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a anake b’ɔŋ’n abusu l’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ amua a!"
42011016	Agŋ oglog erur eke k’ɛbm’n odad ebl ɛm. -N’am ibrm eke ow ki kok mɛny ɛwr yɛgm eke ow ec’abusu b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow.
42011017	Kɔ Jesu uw ɛl ec’ów tutr ab any, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Es ɛw fɛŋ eke in ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm a b’uŋ; ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam akŋ ek’ubr ɛm a yɛji b’uŋ.
42011018	Eke Satan ubr ɛm sakp yony, ke in ec’es ɛw a ɔtu eke k’anŋ ee? Ɔny bi dadr eke Bɛlsebul ec’abusu ɛm m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ.
42011019	Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke ɔny agŋiyɛl ec’a eke b’ogŋ a, kɔ bwo b’ɔŋ ɛl abusu ee? Ɛl obi -n’am yɛgm eke ɔnymn low ij!
42011020	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ec’abusu ɛm anake m’am ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a; ow am yɛgm eke Nyam ec’ es ɛw a ow ɔny ec’araŋn ŋ̂.
42011021	Eke lɛc ɛs nyam ok ar mob sos am ɔsu in e gbugŋ a, in ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ b’anŋ tiŋ.
42011022	Kɔ eke lɛc ɛs ɛjeci nyam ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ akm’n es a, ow b’eb’r ar mob a eke n’am ɔmn a, ke ow eci mob eke l’eb a, li cɛ́c n’ɔŋ agŋ.
42011023	Ɛgŋ ek’anm ɛm ab a, el ɛm ec’ifnu; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke ɛ́luam im abu s’asm Nyam ec’ey luku a, am ɔmun ɛl es."
42011024	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ek’ abŋ ŋuŋ nyam anŋ ɛgŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, li b’anŋ usu wɛwɛ n’am rereb usu a, n’ám ɔl usu eke li k’ir. Eke sica n’ɛ́ŋnm a, ke n’ám dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'Mi b’ow m’ɛwl m’im m’ɛy ɛm ec’akŋ a eke m’anŋ m’ɛy ɔkm a.'
42011025	Eke li b’ɛwl mɛny l’ow a, li b’ɛkn eke wɛl apl akŋ ab es ayl, wɛl nyinyimn ow akpl.
42011026	Sica li b’ɛwl n’im l’ɛsŋ lawlɛl abŋ eŋuŋ lɔbŋ ek’uŋ akm’n, -li b’okr af -l’ir yogŋ. Ow e jam a, abŋ amua b’ijr ɛgŋ na gbre akm krɛkrɛ ec’a."
42011027	Eke Jesu dad odad na ɛbɛn ok es a, yɔw nyam anŋ bieku ab ɛm ɔdu odad eb dad ninɛ: "Ehe el yɔw na eke ew’ŋ ke ɔŋ’ŋ mɛny a eci!"
42011028	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ, kɔ ehe tasi el agŋ a ek’am iri Nyam ec’odad ke am ɛlum a eci!"
42011029	Eke agŋ a am ow Jesu ogŋ egbekl ɛm a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ eŋuŋ amua am ibrm mɛny ɛwr, kɔ wɛl k’ow kokm mɛny ɛwr kaka ɔɔm ɛl, eke ow elm Jonas ec’a cɛ.
42011030	Tasi ɛm a, ɛsɛ elel eke Jonas el Ninif baŋn eyŋ e mɛny ɛwr ab af a, ɛbɛn cɛ ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji b’ow el yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a e mɛny ɛwr.
42011031	Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Seba ec’es ɛw lis a b’ow igb inym es yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke n’anŋ usu kpekpe l’ow yec’ɛtŋ ke l’íri Salomɔ e sɛwr e sodad a. Ɛtŋ kin, ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Salomɔ!
42011032	Jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Ninif baŋn eyŋ b’ow igb yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a ec’any af ɛtŋ b’ow ɔb ɛl low, aŋke eke -l’irir Jonas eci Nyam odad a, -l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm. Ɛtŋ kin, ɛgŋ anŋ ek’agb akm Jonas!"
42011033	"Ɛgŋ ígŋm kɛniɛ itam es ob ew, kɔ wɛl b’igŋ kɛniɛ a, ob gege af wɛl b’itm es yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ eke b’ok akŋ a ɛ́kn usuayl.
42011034	Ŋ ec’anyamn a el ŋ e sos megl a e kɛniɛ: ek’anyamn akpl’ŋ a, ŋ e sos megl a fɛŋ anŋ usuayl ɛm; kɔ ek’anyamn akplm’ŋ a, ke ŋ e sos megl a yɛji anŋ ncebn ɛm ŋ̂.
42011035	Na sosiɛm a, ɛ̀w ɛrm ke usuayl ek’anŋ’ŋ ɛm a k’élm ncebn.
42011036	Eke ŋ e sos megl ikpr kaka anm ncebn ɛm, ɛtŋ fɛŋ anŋ usuayl ɛm a, sos a nimum b’ow anŋ usuayl ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke kɛniɛ bi jɛjn in ec’usuayl mamn ok’ŋ af ab af."
42011037	Eke Jesu dad odad bake ow uwr a, Farisi nyam ɛsŋ’n ob ij. Jesu ɛgŋ ɛtŋ im ɛy akŋ a sig es ob ij usu a in ab.
42011038	Gbuŋ ke -l’ij ob a, Jesu yɔgm sabu ɛsɛ elel eke ɛl ec’ol a dad ab af; low na iti Farisi a any.
42011039	Kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ uw in ec’ów tutr ab any ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Kin elel eke ɔny Farisiɛl anŋnin: ɔny, b’ɛtŋn mij kpɔk lele nagbeŋ ab eci jam jam ab es; kɔ ɔny e lokm a, ów eŋuŋ b’iy ɛm: b’erurir ob ɔny toŋ él ɔny mil, ɛtŋ bi kokr lokm suŋ owi.
42011040	Anyamb agŋ! Kɔ ow elm Nyam a eke kok sos af a kokm lokm a yɛj’ee?
42011041	Gbuŋ ke ɔny e low a áyl akpl tasi a, ɔ̀ŋn ɔgbɔru ɔny e magbeŋ ɛm ec’ob a lele kpɔk ɛm ec’ab ab.
42011042	Farisiɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’ɔŋn Nyam ɔny ec’ob fɛŋ eke b’ewal a eci sakp lɛw ɛm toŋ alaf mob yɛji, gbɛkɔ ɛ́wmn Nyam ec’erur a eke k’ɔnyn a lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e kok ab e low any. Ke tasi ɛm a, low na anake wɛl ki kok a, ke ow e likpr a yɛji wɛl k’igŋm ɛlum es.
42011043	Farisiɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’erurir Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu e mɛkpn anym e sisigr, ɛtŋ dedeku ɛm b’erurir eke wɛl k’ɛsŋn ɔny ɛlum ɛm.
42011044	Gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke anŋn ɛsɛ uwɔmu eke wɛl ɛwrm mɛny, ke any uwm ɛm, wɛl b’uyu af af!"
42011045	Ol e low any uw ɛsɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam dad’r ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, eke am dad ɛbɛn, ke ɛy anake am wɛwr ɛy a!"
42011046	Jesu ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ol e low any uw ɛsɛl, ɔny yɛji gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke b’uyulil agŋ ɛrɛkp legleg ɛtŋ érurmn eke k’ɛlumn ɛl abu -l’uyu ɛrɛkp a.
42011047	Gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke bi kokr suwɔmu amamn ɔŋ’n Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ek’ɔny ɛsɛl ibi a!
42011048	Na bi yɛgm eke ɔny ɛsɛl ec’ów eke kok a ɔny yɛji erurir, aŋke -l’ibi kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji bi kokr ɛl eci suwɔmu!
42011049	Na sosiɛm Nyam, in e sɛwr ab ɛm dad ninɛ: 'M’ow m’awŋ ɛl kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lele ɛrm ɛsɛl ab; -li b’ow -l’ibi wɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ijr bɛb gbre.'
42011050	Na sosiɛm, Nyam b’ow kok yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a low ŋuŋ, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eke ɛl lagŋɛl ibi wus na eci kok ɛm ɛtŋ sosiɛm.
42011051	Ow ɔb nuŋ Abɛl ec’ibi ɛm toŋ im igŋ Zakari eke wɛl ibi egb waw usu a lele usu lala ab ab ec’araŋn a. Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: Nyam b’ow kok yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a low ŋuŋ, agŋ na fɛŋ eke wɛl ibi a sosiɛm.
42011052	Ol e low any uw ɛsɛl, gbre él ɔny eci! Aŋke ocr low any uw e safuɛ a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ abusu uw low any a; ɔny obi a yɛji ókmn ɛm, ɛtŋ b’ɛdŋnin agŋ eke am erur eke k’ok ɛm a yɛji."
42011053	Eke Jesu ŋgboŋ yogŋ a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele Farisiɛl ab ɛrm ebl ligbɛl ɛtŋ -n’am bibrm ow ów nɔnɔ.
42011054	-N’am uk ow meb eke -li k’ɔny ow eke batŋ yadŋ ɛm ec’odad ka anŋ’n nɛnym ɛy ɔkm.
42012001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, agŋ fandi fandi as luku toŋ batŋ am yuyurir af. Ɛtŋ Jesu ikŋ anym am dad in e jam ɛsɛl a odad ɛsɛ: "M’am dad ɔny, ɔ̀sur sos Farisiɛl e lijru a ek’el ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi a e lís.
42012002	Low fɛŋ eke lɔl es a b’ow ɛy ɔkm, ɛtŋ low fɛŋ ek’el asre ɛm ec’a, wɛl b’ow uw any.
42012003	Low fɛŋ eke b’ow dadr saw ɛm a, wɛl b’ow dad ok ɔkm agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af; ɛtŋ yec’eke b’ow abal êl anŋn akŋ dadr ów sɛsl ɛm, okr ɔny lawlɛl ɔru ɛm a, wɛl b’ow oc uyu luw af ɛlul lebl agŋ iri."
42012004	"Ɛm lawlɛl, m’am dad ɔny, k’ùrur agŋ a eke b’ibi sos megl, ke ow e jam a k’ɔtum kokm low kaka fɛŋ ij a.
42012005	M’am ow mi yɛgm ɔny ɛgŋ eke k’urur a: ùrur Nyam eke luw e jam a, ɔny abusu ek’oc ɔwl ɔny gbre ij usu a. Ɛɛ, m’am dad ɔny, in anake ɔtur eke k’urur ir a!
42012006	Kɔ wɛl ɔ́lm yay yen íjm lɛl yony ee? Ɛbɛn yɛji Nyam íjlm ɛl ɛm e nyam es.
42012007	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɔny ec’a, ɔny e sin nuŋ bɔbɔ yɛji Nyam awl uw any. K’ùrur erŋn: ɔny, iil an akmn siyay!"
42012008	"M’am dad ɔny, ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku ec’any af eke in el ɛm eci, afr, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy yɛji b’ow dad Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af ɛsɛ: 'L’el ɛm eci.'
42012009	Kɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad dedeku ec’any af ek’in uwm im any, ɛbɛn afr, ɛgŋ ec’Iy yɛji b’ow dad Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm’n any.'
42012010	Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bi dad odad ŋuŋ ok ɛgŋ ec’Iy af a, Nyam b’ow oc ap’r; kɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke dad odad ŋuŋ ok Abŋ Lala af a, Nyam k’ow ocm apm’n.
42012011	Eke wɛl b’ot im ɔny jɛj ok ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu, ow k’ɔdm es ɛw ɛsɛl ec’any af, ke ɛrmij k’ók ɔny low yec’eke ki dadr ɛdŋnin ɔny sosi abu any a eci,
42012012	aŋke wanci ab af cɛ Abŋ Lala b’ow yɛgm ɔny low yec’eke ki dadr a."
42012013	Bieku ab ɛm, ɛgŋ nyam dad Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, dàd ɛm lisijim cɛc in lel ɛm ab ec’ob ɔny a eke ɛy ɛs ɛw ɛy es a."
42012014	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm lawl, wɛl ɛwm im eke mi ki jɛj ɔny ec’ów m’ók, ke mi cɛ́c ɔny yony a ec’ob ɔny a m’ɔŋ ɔny."
42012015	Ɛmɛny li dad wɛl fɛŋ ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ke ɔ́sur sos ob ɔny ec’erur fɛŋ e lís. Kɔ ɛgŋ ec’owr anŋ tasi a anm in ec’ob ɔny ab ɛm eke l’el gbreŋgbi yɛji."
42012016	Na sosiɛm li dad wɛl nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ninɛ: "Gbreŋgbi nyam ɔny wus eke egb ɔsu af nɔnɔ.
42012017	Ɛtŋ in ɛm n’am tutr ów li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ee? M’ɔnym usu eke mi k’ub ɛm ec’egb na fɛŋ m’ok.'
42012018	Tutr nyam ow’r ɛrm ɛm ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: 'Kin ow eke mi ki kok: mi b’ow m’ufŋ ɛm ec’egbel amua fɛŋ es, ke m’us mel ɛgbɛl ɛjeci, ke m’ás ɛm ec’egb a fɛŋ lele ob ɔny a fɛŋ ab luku ɛm yogŋ.
42012019	Ke mi dádr ɛm sosi m’ɛsɛ: M’ɔny nuŋ mamn gbɛ! M’ɔny ob nɔnɔ m’ɛw es akpo nɔnɔ eci. Ow it cɛ ke mi síg es m’am ij, ke m’ám ɛgŋ, ke m’ám kok sos ɛm iŋn!'
42012020	Kɔ Nyam dad’r ninɛ: 'Nyamb ɛgŋ! Ncok a cɛ ŋ ec’owr anŋ a b’ow uwr. Ɛtŋ sica ob na fɛŋ eke ot ok es a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ eci ow b’ow el ab ee?' "
42012021	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam ow b’ow el ɛgŋ eke b’as ob ɔny luku in obi eci, ke ɔ́lm Nyam ogŋ ec’ob ɔny es a."
42012022	Ɛmɛny li dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Na sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny: k’èbar ob eke k’ijr ɛsŋn sel oglog ob sos ɛw e low ɛrmij,
42012023	aŋke owr anŋ akpl akm ob ij, ɛtŋ sos megl akpl akm ob sos ɛw.
42012024	Ɛkan ebl kpɔm yɛji: -l’ewlmn egb, -l’ubmn egb. -N’ɔnymn oj, -n’ɔnymn egbel -l’okmn egb ɛm, gbɛkɔ Nyam bi gbagbl ɛl. Ɔny iil an nɔnɔ akmn ɔr amua!
42012025	Ɔny ɛm, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke in ec’ɛrmij ebr ɛm k’obn in ec’owr anŋ e sɛgŋ a tɛl ee?
42012026	Eke low tɛɛli ɛm ɔtumn eke ki kokr low kaka, ke bla ɛtŋ b’ebar low ɛjeci ek’anŋ a ec’ɛrmij ee?
42012027	Lɛ̀ɛr ɔgm e suw ɔdɔdɔ ec’elel eke b’ɛlil: -li kokmn juma, -l’olmn gbad. Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny eke Salomɔ ek’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a yɛji, ɔnym ob sos ɛw ek’akpl akm suw ɔdɔdɔ amua ɛm e nyam.
42012028	Nyam b’ɛw ɔgm e suw ek’anŋ yɛfɛnyna, ke efi wɛl b’ow oc ɔwl alm a ob sos. Sakp abi ɔny yɛji li k’ow l’ɛwm ɔny ob sos ɛbɛn ee? Ɔmn ufum ɔny es gbɛ!
42012029	Kì lulil es k’ɔɔl ob yec’eke k’ijr ke ɛ́gŋn a es.
42012030	Tasi ɛm a, wus na eci Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl anake sakp sakp fɛŋ b’ɔl ów amua es a. Ɔny ec’a, ɔny Ɛs uw any eke ɔnyn ow ec’es abur.
42012031	Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a e low ókr ɔny ɛrmij, ke ow e likpr a fɛŋ Nyam b’ow igŋ af ɔŋ ɔny."
42012032	"Ɔny agŋ lukuli na ek’am usr’m jam a, k’ùrur erŋn, aŋke ɔny Ɛs erur eke k’ɔŋ ɔny in ec’ es ɛw ab ɛm ec’ɔwrɔ.
42012033	Ɔ̀ɔl ɔny ec’ob ɔny a ijr, òcr ow ec’os ek’ɛŋan a apr ɔgbɔru. Ɔ̀ɔl ob eke ugŋm es a es. Àsr ɔny ec’ob ɔny a luku afr, yogŋ ow k’ɔtum iram, elu yɛji k’ɔtum itŋnm abu, ɛtŋ sisŋ yɛji k’ɔtum ŋuŋnm.
42012034	Tasi ɛm a, yogŋ eke ɔny ec’ob ɔny b’anŋ a, yogŋ cɛ ɔny ec’ɛrm a yɛji b’anŋ."
42012035	"Ɛ̀wr ob sos, gìgŋn al ám iri, ke ínymn es juma kok eci.
42012036	Ànŋn ɛsɛ juma kok ɛsɛl ek’am eku ɛl ec’akŋ ɛs eke b’ow anŋ mɛbi ec’ɛs gbɛgbl ɛm ow af, yec’ɛtŋ ke li b’ow eke li b’icm lisany abu a, ke -li fig ow.
42012037	Ehe él juma kok ɛsɛl amua eke gbugŋ ɛs a b’ow ɛŋan any owr a eci! Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: li b’ow l’ɛw ob sos, n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl ok es, ke n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl ob ij.
42012038	Eke l’ow lɛgŋ usu ɛm, oglog ow afŋ es yɛji, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋan wɛl any owr, ke ehe el ɛl eci!
42012039	Ìrir low na ow ók ɔny es sos ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn: blel akŋ ɛs b’uw wanci eke ulu k’ow ab any ana, ke blel li kí yɛbm ow ɛpirm ɛym’n akŋ.
42012040	Ɔny yɛji bɛ̀bmn sos aŋke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow wanci af eke k’ow ɔmnmn a."
42012041	Na sosiɛm Piɛr ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ɛy sɔny cɛ ec’odad am dad nyandrɛ ɛm, kɔ agŋ a fɛŋ ec’ee?"
42012042	Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ el juma kok ɛs mamn, nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs ee? L’el ɛgŋ eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs a ɔŋ abusu eke k’ɛkn juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjec’a e lís e low, ke n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl ob ij wanci a ek’ow b’it a.
42012043	Ehe él juma kok ɛs ikŋ na eci, eke in eci es ɛw ɛs a eci mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm, b’ow ɛŋan am kok juma a!
42012044	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: es ɛw ɛs a b’ow afl in ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ es ɛlul il abu ɛm.
42012045	Gbɛkɔ eke sica juma kok ɛs ikŋ na bi dadr in sosi eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs a in k’ow in owm caca, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ɔb nuŋ n’am ɔr juma kok ɛsɛl ɛjec’a, egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab, n’ám ij ob ke n’ám ɛgŋ mar ow ám ɔny’n,
42012046	es ɛw ɛs a b’ow ɛwl ow lɛgŋ eke li k’ow n’ɔmnm, wanci af eke li k’ow l’uwm any. Li b’ow l’ogŋ juma kok ɛs a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ow Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eci gbre ij a.
42012047	Juma kok ɛs yec’ek’uw low yec’eke in e es ɛw ɛs a b’erur any ke am kokm a, wɛl b’ow ɔr’r ŋgbre ɛm sakp nɔnɔ.
42012048	Gbɛkɔ juma kok ɛs yec’ek’uwm low yec’eke in e es ɛw ɛs erur ab any ke kok low ek’it eke wɛl k’ɔr’r a, wɛl b’ow ɔr’r ŋgbre abi ka ɛm cɛ. Ɛgŋ a eke wɛl ɔŋ nɔnɔ a, wɛl b’ow ibrm’n nɔnɔ; ɛgŋ yec’eke wɛl abul nɔnɔ a, wɛl b’ow ibrm’n ow ok af."
42012049	"M’ism Nyam e jɛj ok ec’al ab wus na, ɛtŋ m’am erur eke jɛj ok a k’el caca.
42012050	M’ow m’ɛy gbre ij ligbɛl ɛm ek’el mij ok nuŋ mum nyam, ɛtŋ ow am ijr’m gbre ɛrm ɛm toŋ lɛgŋ a eke low na b’ow iy nɛny a.
42012051	Kɔ am tutar ek’ɛrm es ɛy m’is wus ee? Njaŋ, m’am dad ɔny eke na ɛm bubr!
42012052	Sica jam aŋa, bosu nyam ɛm ec’agŋ yen ek’anŋ a b’ow ubr ɛm: nyahan b’ow inym es, ɛtŋ yony yɛji b’ow inym es ke -n’am ifanin.
42012053	Iy ɛs b’ow ifn jim ɛtŋ jim yɛji b’ow ifn’n. Iy lis b’ow ifn jɔw ɛtŋ jɔw yɛji b’ow ifn’n. Jim ɛy b’ow ifn ɛc lis ɛtŋ ɛc lis yɛji b’ow ifn’n."
42012054	Sica Jesu dad bieku a yɛji ninɛ: "Eke b’ɛkan afr ibr es ligbn es ɛru usu a, kpɛkŋ bi dadr eke Nyam b’ow an, ɛtŋ ow b’el ɛbɛn.
42012055	Ɛtŋ eke b’ɛkan eke lɛf gbagba igb ɛb esr a, bi dadr eke elubu b’ow ow, ɛtŋ ow b’el ɛbɛn.
42012056	Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl! Eke bi lɛɛr afr lele wus ab a, b’uwr lɛgŋ ec’elel eke ow b’ow anŋn ab any: bla ɛtŋ úwmn lɛgŋ na ek’anŋ ɔny any af a e nyandrɛ ab any ee?"
42012057	"Kɔ bla ɛtŋ ɔny obi ɛm am jɛjmn okmn kokmn yec’eke akpl ab ee?
42012058	Eke batŋ ɛgŋ ɔŋ’ŋ dedeku ɛtŋ aamn jɛj ok usu ɔny yony mum a, ke ejagb ek’aamn a, dàdr low a okar ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ócm n’iim’ŋ jɛj ok ɛs ogŋ; ke jɛj ok ɛs yɛji k’ócm ɛlum’ŋ usu ɔsu ɛsɛl abu ɛm ɛlum’ŋ sobel ɛm.
42012059	M’am dad’ŋ eke k’ow ɛym ɔkm yogŋ eke sɔgm ŋ e labm a fɛŋ ek’ɔny a uwarm."
42013001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm, agŋ bɛb ow am dad Jesu: "Es ɛw ɛs Pilat ɔŋ wɛl ibi Galile ec’agŋ ek’im am kok egb waw ɔŋ Nyam a."
42013002	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ am tutar eke Galile ec’agŋ amua eke wɛl ibi a, -l’el sikpl ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl -l’akm Galile ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ee?
42013003	Njaŋ! M’am dad ɔny; eke itŋnmn ɛrm ɛm, ɔny fɛŋ b’ow uwr ɛsɛ ɛl af.
42013004	Ɛtŋ kɔ agŋ lɛw niwn a eke Silowe yogŋ, êl gege a bubm ok af ibi a, kɔ ɛl -l’el agŋ eŋuŋ -l’akm Jerusalɛm ec’ɛb eyŋ a fɛŋ ee?
42013005	Njaŋ! M’am dad ɔny: eke itŋnmn ɛrm ɛm, ɔny yɛji b’ow uwr ɛsɛ ɛl af."
42013006	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ninɛ: "Igŋ nyam ewl babm e likŋ in ec’egb ɔgm a. Li b’ow ɔgm a eke li k’ɔw babm a, n’ɛŋnm.
42013007	Ɛtŋ li dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛ̀kn: akpo nyahan ɛtŋ eke mi b’ow e mi k’ɔw babm na, kɔ m’ɛ́ŋnm. Ùbr’r es! Kɔ bla ɛtŋ li k’eb wus n’ɔnym ab ɔfr ɔfr nɛnɛ!'
42013008	Kɔ juma ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, yɛ̀b’r n’ánŋ lakpo na yɛji; m’ow m’agbr wus mi díd’r, m’ók’r suw egŋun.
42013009	Ow k’ɔdm lakpo ek’am ow a, li b’ow l’ɔsu ey. Ek’ow elm ɛbɛn a, ke ɔ́ŋ wɛl ubr’r es.' "
42013010	Nɛnɛgŋ nyam, Jesu am yɛgm agŋ low Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu.
42013011	Yogŋ a ɔl lis nyam anŋ. Ow ij akpo lɛw niwn, eke abŋ ŋuŋ nyam ɔny ibn’n es ɛtŋ l’ɔ́tum eke li k’inym es.
42013012	Eke Jesu b’ɛkn’n a, l’ɛsŋ ow ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Wɛl eb ɛlu’ŋ es ŋ ec’ɔl na ɛm ŋ̂!"
42013013	Jesu at’r abu nuŋ, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’inym es ceŋ ɛtŋ n’am kɔklm Nyam.
42013014	Ɛbɛn a, Nyamel a ec’es ɛw ɛs a ebl ɛrm ewlm owi na eke Jesu kok nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a sosiɛm. Li dad dedeku a ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ nɔhɔn anŋ eke wɛl ki kok juma; blel ówr lɛgŋ ab ɛm wɛl éwlm ɔny, ke ow k’elm nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ!"
42013015	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eb odad ɛtŋ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl! Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam bi mɔmu in ec’id ek’anŋ ob ij usu a es ɛy ɔkm, ow k’ɔdm ni mɔmu in e gbaŋkɔ es n’im n’ɔŋ ow mij ow ɛ́gŋ. Kɔ yadŋ ee?
42013016	Ɛtŋ yɔw na ek’el Abraham e lilaw, ke Satan ɔny ibn es ij akpo lɛw niwn a, ke ow akplm eke wɛl ki mɔmu’n es éb ɛlu’l es nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ee?"
42013017	Jesu ec’odad ebl na eke dad a, ɔŋ in ec’efnu a fɛŋ ɛ́s. Kɔ dedeku a fɛŋ gbɛ sos ɛm am iŋn sijuma ɛgbɛl amamn amua eke n’am kok a sosiɛm.
42013018	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ot es ee? Bla lowi wɛl k’oc ɛbmn ab ee?
42013019	N’anŋ ɛsɛ likŋ e liy nyam eke ɛgŋ nyam oc ewl in ec’ɔgm af. L’ɛli l’agb l’el likŋ ligbɛl ɛtŋ ɔr ow us mel in ec’ál ab ɛm."
42013020	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi mi k’oc m’ɛbmn Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu ab ab ee?
42013021	Ow anŋ ɛsɛ lijru eke yɔw nyam oc wuwlm ma toy likŋ lele yen ab toŋ bake ma a nimum inŋ eb es ab af."
42013022	Jesu am ɛc baŋn ekekey lele ɛgbɛl ɛm ab yɛgm agŋ low ejagb a ek’aamn Jerusalɛm ogŋ ogŋ a.
42013023	Ɛgŋ nyam ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ agŋ tɛl cɛ b’ow ɛŋn sel ee?" Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ:
42013024	"Àtar sos es okr akŋ lisany likekli ɛm ogŋ. Kɔ low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ɛbm eke k’ok akŋ, kɔ -li k’ow -l’ɔtumn.
42013025	Eke gbugŋ ɛs a b’ow igb abl lisany a safuɛ ɛm a, ɔny b’ow anŋn gbeŋ icmn lisany abu ke dádr ɛsrɛ: 'Gbugŋ ɛs, fìg ɛy lisany!' Li b’ow li dad ɔny l’ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm yogŋ ek’anŋn am owr ab any!'
42013026	Ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow dadr ir ɛsrɛ: 'S’ij ob, s’ɛgŋ ŋ ab; yɛgm agŋ low ɛy ec’ɛb ab ɛm.'
42013027	Ɛmɛny li b’ow li dad ɔny l’ɛsɛ: 'M’uwm yogŋ ek’anŋn am owr any. Ŋ̀gbroŋn ɛm e lís, ɔny eke bi kokr ów eŋuŋ a!'
42013028	Lɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛkan Abraham, Isak, Jakɔb lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ab Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, ke wɛl b’ow ogŋ ok ɔny gbeŋ a, yogŋ anake ca b’ow ikŋn ɔŋn sasagar an ɛm a!
42013029	Agŋ b’ow anŋ susu susu fɛŋ ow ok es Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu ec’ob ij usu a.
42013030	Ɛtŋ agŋ bɛb a ek’el ajamu a, sica b’ow el ánymu. Ɛtŋ ánymu a b’ow el ajamu."
42013031	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Farisiɛl ec’agŋ bɛb ow titm Jesu ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ̀gboŋ aŋa ìm usu ɛjeci, kɔ Erɔd Antipas am erur eke k’ibi’ŋ."
42013032	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn dadr kprakpru na ɛsrɛ: 'M’ow m’ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ, m’ewlm ɔ́lu yɛfɛnyna lele efi ab, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ nyahan m’ow m’uwar ɛm e juma.'
42013033	Ow akpl eke mi k’imn anym eci ɛm ec’ejagb us ab ɛm, yɛfɛnyna, efi lele lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ab. Tasi ɛm a, ow akplm eke Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs k’uw usu ɛjeci, ke ow k’elm Jerusalɛm."
42013034	Ɛmɛny Jesu low am ɛy sos ɛm toŋ batŋ n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: "Jerusalɛm, Jerusalɛm, ŋ eke b’ibi kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ke b’ɔr agŋ eke Nyam b’ɛrm ow ŋ ogŋ a mebn ɛm a! Sakp abi m’erur eke mi k’as ŋ ec’ey luku ɛm e lís, ɛsɛ elel eke ŋgɔs ey lis b’as in ec’ey luku ɔw éw ab af, ɛtŋ ɛ́gŋmn!
42013035	Ow sosiɛm kin, Nyam b’ow digŋ ɔny ec’akŋ a ɛlu es foŋ. M’am dad ɔny: k’ow ɛknmn’m toŋ bake lɛgŋ a ow; yogŋ anake b’ow dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ ɛgŋ a ek’am ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ɔwrɔ a!' "
42014001	Nɛnɛgŋ nyam, Jesu im Farisiɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs nyam ogŋ ob ij ɛm. Agŋ ek’anŋ yogŋ a am ɛw’r nyamn.
42014002	Ɛtŋ igŋ nyam ek’ɔl ɔny bake ir ɛw fɔŋ a ow inym’n es any af.
42014003	Jesu ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ ibrm ol e low any uw ɛsɛl a lele Farisiɛl ab ab ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛy ec’ol a ɔŋ abusu eke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ wɛl k’éwlm ɛgŋ ee?"
42014004	Kɔ -l’erurm eke -li ki dad odad. Ɛtŋ Jesu itŋn ɔlu a abu, ewlm’n ɛtŋ ɛlu’l es n’im.
42014005	Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ eke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny in ec’iy, ow k’ɔdm in ec’id ek’ɛy mijɔmu ɛm, kɔ li k’ow n’iim kpɛkŋ n’ɔnym l’ocm ow es eke ow el nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ yɛji ee?"
42014006	Low na ɛm a, -l’ɔtum -li dadm ow odad kaka ij.
42014007	Jesu ɛbmn nyamn ɛkn eke agŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ ob ij a, b’erur eke ki sig es susu amamn. Na sosiɛm li dad agŋ a fɛŋ nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na:
42014008	"Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ mɛbi ec’ob ij ɛm, ke k’ìm ki sig es usu mamn a. Ow k’ɔdm ke wɛl ɛ́sŋ ɛgŋ nyam ek’ɔny any akm’ŋ a yɛji ob ij ab ɛm;
42014009	ɛgŋ a ek’ɛsŋ ɔny, ɔny yony mum a, b’ow ow dad’ŋ ɛsɛ: 'Ìgb aŋa im sig es jam a!', kpɛkŋ ɛ́s ɛm b’ow igb im sig es jam a.
42014010	Kɔ eke wɛl ɛsŋ’ŋ ob ij ɛtŋ im a, sìg es jam. Eke ow e wanci a b’ow ow a, ɛgŋ a ek’ɛsŋ’ŋ ob ij a b’ow dad’ŋ ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òw anym aŋa sig es any ɛsɛl ec’usu na.' Ow ɛm a, ow b’ow el ŋ ec’anygbeŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ob ij usu a ec’any af.
42014011	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke am igbl’l in sosi ogŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɔny is’r es, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’am is es a Nyam b’ow ɔny igbl’l ogŋ."
42014012	Ɛtŋ sica Jesu dad ɛgŋ a ek’ɛsŋ’n ob ij a ninɛ: "Eke b’ow ɛsŋ agŋ ob ij ɛm a, ke k’ɛ́sŋ awlŋɛl, esŋ jimɛl, ŋ ec’akŋ ec’agŋ lele awlŋɛl egbreŋgbi ab; ɛl yɛji -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛsŋ’ŋ ob ij, ke yec’a eke kok a e labm -n’am sɔg’ŋ a.
42014013	Kɔ ek’am kok low ɛtŋ k’ɛsŋ agŋ ob ij a, ke ɛ̀sŋ ɔgbɔru, sos ɛ́yru, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl lele ány eflu ab.
42014014	Ehe b’ow el ŋ eci aŋke agŋ amua k’ow ɔtum ɔwrm ɔɔm’ŋ. Kɔ Nyam b’ow sɔg’ŋ ow e labm lɛgŋ eke agŋ eke kok ów amamn a b’ow igb luw ɛm anŋ owr a."
42014015	Agŋ ek’anŋ ob ij usu a ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’iri odad na a, dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ehe él ɛgŋ eke b’ow ij ob Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a eci!"
42014016	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ninɛ: "Igŋ nyam ɛsŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ob ij.
42014017	Ek’ow sig ob ij e wanci a, l’ɛrm in e juma kok ɛs a im am ɛsŋ agŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ ob ij a eke k’ow, aŋke sica fɛŋ iy nɛny ŋ̂.
42014018	Kɔ ɛl fɛŋ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ am dad in ec’es abur owi. Krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛs a dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Dàd ɛgŋ gbɛl a, m’ɔl ɔgm nyam, ow it eke mi k’im m’ɛkn. M’am ŋɔŋn’n, m’ɔny es abur; mi k’ow m’ɔtum m’owm.'
42014019	Yony ɛm ɛs a dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Dàd ɛgŋ gbɛl a, m’ɔl sed lɛw eke mi k’im m’ɛbm m’ɛkn ɛl, m’am ŋɔŋn’n, m’ɔny es abur; mi k’ow m’ɔtum m’owm.'
42014020	Nyahan ɛm ɛs a yɛji dad juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Dàd ɛgŋ gbɛl a, catŋ m’ɛbi yɔw m’oc m’ow m’ɛlu akŋ. Na sosiɛm mi k’ow m’ɔtum m’owm.'
42014021	Juma kok ɛs a ɛwl mɛny im ɛŋn in ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɛtŋ dad’r agŋ a ec’odad eke dad a. Kɔ es ɛw ɛs a ebl ɛrm ɛtŋ dad in e juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ìm fafa sɛbɛrŋ ɛm, sejagb af lele susu fɛŋ ab ɛsŋ ɔgbɔru, sos ɛ́yru, ány eflu lele akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl ab!'
42014022	Eke ow b’ibn tɛl a juma kok ɛs a ow ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm ec’es ɛw ɛs, ow eke dad a, wɛl kok ɛtŋ ɛmɛny usu anŋ.'
42014023	Es ɛw ɛs a dad in e juma kok ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ìm sakp ɛm ejagb lele sebr af ab, ke átrm agŋ ów ok akŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm ec’êl a íy gbɔŋ.'
42014024	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, agŋ amua eke m’ɛsŋ ob ij ke ɛgŋm owm a, ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ijm ɛm ec’ob na!"
42014025	Agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl am us Jesu jam ejagb af. L’ɛwl mɛny l’ɔkŋ wɛl any ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ:
42014026	"Ɛgŋ ek’erur eke k’us’m jam a, l’érur’m l’akm ɛs, lis, in e yɔw, in ec’ey, lisijimɛl, lisijɔwɛl, lele in obi in obi ec’owr anŋ ab. Ek’ow elm ɛbɛn a, li k’ɔtum l’elm ɛm e jam ɛs.
42014027	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ek’ocm in obi ec’olikŋ abum usm im jam a, ɔtum eke k’el ɛm e jam us ɛs.
42014028	Ɔny ɛm a, ek’ɛgŋ erur eke k’us êl ligbɛl nyam, li b’ow li sig es l’ub os abi eke li k’ɔny ke l’úwar êl a.
42014029	Eke ow elm ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ l’ɛlu lebn nɔmu ɛm, ɛtŋ ca l’ɔtum l’usm êl a l’uwarm a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛkn êl a, b’ow kokr’r miyɛr,
42014030	dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ na am us êl ɛtŋ ca ow akm’n!'
42014031	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ek’es ɛw ɛs nyam erur eke k’ogŋ ar lawl es ɛw ɛs ɛjec’ab a, li b’ow sig es li bɛbm l’ɛkn, eke l’ɔtu eke agŋ fandi lɛw ab li b’ow l’ogŋ lawl a ek’am an es ɔbr’r agŋ fandi likŋ ab a ar.
42014032	Eke l’ɔtum ij a, ke l’ɛ́rm agŋ im ibrm es ɛw ɛs yec’a ek’anŋ akpoj am ow a ɛrm es ɛy."
42014033	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad uwar ninɛ: "Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum elm ɛm e jam us ɛs, eke l’igŋm ów fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ɛlum es."
42014034	"Mok el ob mamn. Kɔ eke l’irmn in e ded a, ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke ki kokr’r ke l’ɛwl li ded ee?
42014035	Ɛgŋ k’ɔtum ocm kokrm wus e juma kaka; kɔ lirŋ af cɛ ow it eke wɛl k’oc ɔwl’l. Ek’ɔnyn ɔru eke k’irir, ke írir sɛnyn sɛnyn!"
42015001	Wus labm eb ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab ow ɛŋn Jesu eke k’iri in ec’odad.
42015002	Kɔ Farisiɛl lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab am ebl ɛrm ɛl ɔfr ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Igŋ na b’eb sikpl ɛsɛl ɛtŋ b’ij ob ɛl ab!"
42015003	Na ɛm a, Jesu dad ɛl odad nyandrɛ ɛm ninɛ:
42015004	"Ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny mɛcɛb ekŋ yen ɛtŋ nyam irm a, kɔ li k’ow l’okm ekŋ yar lele lɛw libarm ab ab es egb ij usu yogŋ, n’iim l’ɔlm yec’a ek’irm a toŋ bake n’ɛ́ŋnm ow ee?
42015005	Eke n’ɛŋn ow a, n’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. L’oc l’ɛw ow ɔbɔw af,
42015006	ɛtŋ l’ow l’ɛy gbugŋ. L’ɛsŋ lawlɛl lele agŋ ek’ir titm’n ab ab, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Kòkr sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab, kɔ ɛm e licɛbli a ek’irm a, m’ɛŋn’n ŋ̂!'
42015007	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam m’am dad ɔny, eke sikpl ɛs nyam itŋn ɛrm ɛm a, afr yogŋ wɛl b’ow kok sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl akm agŋ ekŋ yar lɛw libarm eke b’ocr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl ke ibram ɛrm ɛm itŋn a."
42015008	"Eke yɔw nyam ɔny os lɛw, ɛtŋ nyam irm a, kɔ li k’ow l’igŋm kɛniɛ, li paplm akŋ ab es, l’ɔlm ɛrm ɛw ɛm toŋ bake n’ɛ́ŋnm l’ocm ee?
42015009	Eke n’ɛŋn l’oc a, li b’ow l’ɛsŋ lawlɛl lele agŋ a ek’ir in ab ab, ke li dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: 'Kòkr sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab, aŋke ɛm ec’os a ek’irm a, m’ɛkn m’oc ŋ̂!'
42015010	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam m’am dad ɔny, eke sikpl ɛs nyam cɛ itŋn ɛrm ɛm a, Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl sos ɛm b’ow iŋn!"
42015011	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Igŋ nyam ɔny in ec’ey yony.
42015012	Lɛgŋ nyam, jam ɛs a dad ɛs ninɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs, ɔ̀ŋ’m ɛm ec’ob ɔny ek’ɔtu eke k’ɛbm im a.' Ɛtŋ ɛs cɛc ɛl in ec’ob ɔny a.
42015013	Eke sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a, jam ɛs a oc in ec’aja ɔl ij oc ow ec’os a fɛŋ ab im usu kpekpe, ɛb ɛjec’ɛm. Yogŋ ni ŋuŋn in ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ nfaci ij ɛm.
42015014	Eke ni ŋuŋn in ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ bake ow uwr a, lek ligbɛl ɛy ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ sica n’am ɔny low fɛŋ ec’es abur.
42015015	N’im ɛb ab ɛm ec’igŋ nyam ogŋ, ɛtŋ ow ɛrm’n ɔgm eke li k’im l’ɔsu gbroko.
42015016	Namn ɔny’n toŋ batŋ n’am erur eke li k’ij gbroko a ec’ob eke b’ij a, kɔ yeci yɛji wɛl ɔɔm’n.
42015017	Eke li b’ɛkn eke low a e li kok a akplm a, ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ n’am tutr in ec’ɛrm ɛm li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Juma kok ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ɛs ogŋ a b’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ij sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ɛtŋ ɛm, m’anŋ aŋa namn am ɔny’m toŋ afŋn es!
42015018	M’ow m’igb m’im ɛm ɛs ogŋ a, ke mi dád’r m’ɛsɛ: Ɛm ɛs, mi kok sikpl Nyam ec’any af lele ŋ e lís ab.
42015019	M’itm eke k’ɛsŋ’m ŋ ec’iy ij, kɔ èb’m ɛsɛ ŋ e juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam af.'
42015020	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ l’igb n’aam ɛs ogŋ a. Eke n’im toŋ bake n’am ok yogŋ a, n’anŋ akpoj ɛtŋ ɛs ɛkn’n. Ow e low ɔny’n sɔrŋ, ɛtŋ l’uru es n’im l’ɛy ow af.
42015021	Iy a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs, mi kok sikpl Nyam ec’any af lele ŋ e lís ab. M’itm eke k’ɛsŋ’m ŋ ec’iy ij.'
42015022	Kpɛkŋ ɛs dad in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: 'Òcr mob sus ɛm mamn a owr susr ir, ɛ̀lul il kpatrowa abuli, ke ókr ir cɔkrukpɔ!
42015023	Ɔ̀nyn id igŋ mamn a owr ibir; s’íjr ob si kokr sos ɛm iŋn!
42015024	Kɔ ɛm ec’iy na ek’ɛm gbɛ m’ɛsɛ l’uw a, njɛ n’anŋ owr. L’irm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛŋn’n.' Ɛtŋ n’am kok es gbɛgbl a sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
42015025	Ke lɛgŋ a, igŋ a ec’iy kpekp a im akp ɛm. Eke n’am ow bake n’am titm gbugŋ a, n’am iri ɛj ub e likekr.
42015026	L’ɛsŋ juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow ninɛ: 'Kɔ bla lowi am ɛy ee?'
42015027	Juma kok ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Esŋ jim ɛwl ow. Eke ɛs ɛkn’n eke n’anŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn a, l’ibi id igŋ mamn a.'
42015028	Eke iy kpekp a iri ɛbɛn a, l’ebl ɛrm ɛtŋ l’erurm eke li k’ɛy gbugŋ a. Ɛs ɛy ɔkm ow am ŋɔŋn’n eke li k’ɛy gbugŋ,
42015029	kɔ li dad ɛs ninɛ: 'Kin akpo akpo eke m’anŋ ŋ ab, ke lɛgŋ fɛŋ mi bi kok yec’a eke bi dad’m a. Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka ɔɔm im cani mi kokrm sos ɛm iŋn ɛm lawlɛl ab yɛji.
42015030	Eke sica ejimŋ ow a, in eke ni ŋuŋn ŋ ec’ob afacyɔw ab a, in sosiɛm ibi id igŋ mamn a.'
42015031	Ɛs dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛm jim, anŋ ɛm ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛtŋ fɛŋ a eke m’ɔny a, ŋ eci.
42015032	Ow akpl ke si kók sos ɛm iŋn, aŋke esŋ jim na eke s’ɛsɛ l’uw a, njɛ n’anŋ owr. L’irm, ɛtŋ sica wɛl ɛŋn’n!' "
42016001	Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Gbreŋgbi nyam ɔny in ec’ob ɔsu ɛs nyam. Ɛtŋ wɛl ow dad’r eke ob ɔsu ɛs a in am ŋuŋn ŋ ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ.
42016002	Gbreŋgbi a ɛsŋ’n ɛtŋ ibrm’n ninɛ: 'Kɔ bla lowi anake m’am iri ŋ e lís ab ee? B’ow awl ob a eke m’abul’ŋ a ec’elel eke kokr a ok’m. Kɔ k’ɔtum elm ɛm ec’ob ɔsu ɛs ij.'
42016003	Eke ow ɛwar ir ɛbɛn a, ob ɔsu ɛs a am dad in ɛm ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm ɛgŋ gbɛliy am ow ogŋ’m juma ɛm; ke sica ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee? M’ijm lɛc wus ob kok owi ɛm, ɛtŋ ob sasm owi ɛm yɛji ɛ́s b’ɔny’m.
42016004	M’uw yec’eke m’ow mi kok ab any ba eke l’ogŋ’m juma ɛm a, ke agŋ éb’m ɛl ogŋ a!'
42016005	Ɛtŋ n’am ɛsŋ agŋ a fɛŋ a ek’ij in ɛgŋ gbɛliy eci labm a nyam nyam ɛm. Li dad krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛs a ninɛ: 'Kɔ os abi e labm ij ɛm ɛgŋ gbɛliy ogŋ ee?'
42016006	Ow dad’r ninɛ: 'Mun baro ekŋ yen e labm.' Ɛtŋ ob ɔsu ɛs dad’r ninɛ: 'Eke ŋ e labm a el na, ke sìg es fafa, ke nɔ́n ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab.'
42016007	Ɛmɛny li dad yony ɛm ɛs a ninɛ: 'Ɛtŋ kɔ ŋ, os abi e labm ij ee?' Ɛtŋ ow dad ninɛ: 'Egb ey eke wɛl ok fandi ɛm toŋ ij ekŋ yen.' Ɛtŋ ob ɔsu ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ek’ow el na, ke nɔ̀n ekŋ yar.'
42016008	Eke -l’awal mob a, gbreŋgbi a am aw in e juma kok ɛs a eke kok juma kprakpr ɛm a. Tasi ɛm a, wus na ec’agŋ bi kok ów kprakpr ɛm ɔŋanin akm usuayl ec’agŋ a."
42016009	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad igŋ af ninɛ: "Kɔ m’am dad ɔny, òcr wus na ec’ob ɔny a eke b’ɛju ɛgŋ a, ke ow ɛm ɛ́ŋan alawl. Sica lɛgŋ eke k’ow ɔnym os ij a, ke Afr éb ok ɔny ɛb ir usu a ek’ɔnym uwr ab ɛm.
42016010	Ɛgŋ ek’ij nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ekekey ɛm a, b’ow ij nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ɛgbɛl ɛm yɛji. Ɛgŋ ek’ijm nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ekekey ɛm a, k’ow ijm nɛnyɛmbri nyam ów ɛgbɛl ɛm yɛji.
42016011	Eke ijmn nɛny nyam wus na ec’ob ɔny e lís, ke b’ow ec’ɛgŋ anake b’ow abul ɔny ob ɔny tasi ab ee?
42016012	Ek’ijmn nɛny nyam ob ek’el ɛgŋ ec’a ec’ɔsu ɛm, ke bwo ec’ɛgŋ anake b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ob él ɔny ec’ab ee?
42016013	Aduigŋ kaka k’ɔtum kokm es ɛw ɛsɛl yony e juma; oglog li b’ow l’ifn krɛkrɛ ec’a ke l’érur yony ɛm ec’a; oglog li b’ow l’ij nɛny nyam, nyam e lís, ke li k’ɛwm nyam e low any. Ɔtumn eke ki kokr Nyam e juma ke kokr jɛtɛ yɛji eci juma."
42016014	Farisiɛl ek’am iri Jesu e sodad amua a am kokr’r miyɛr, aŋke -li b’erur os owi.
42016015	Jesu am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Agŋ ec’any af a b’ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl af, kɔ Nyam uw ɔny ec’ɛrm ab any. Yec’eke agŋ b’oc ɛw low ligbɛl a, el low eke Nyam ifn.
42016016	Mois ec’ ol a e lɛgŋ a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a ec’odad ab ab anŋ toŋ ok Jan mij ok nuŋ ɛs e lɛgŋ a. Lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ wɛl am ɔb Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’Amani Mamn a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ am atr sos es eke k’ɛy ɛm.
42016017	Afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛc gbuŋ ke ol a e mɔni nyam oc es.
42016018	Igŋ fɛŋ eke ɛlu in e yɔw es, ke im ɛbi ɛjec’a, ij nfaci ŋ̂; ɛtŋ igŋ eke ɛbi yɔw ek’ɛc ogŋ a yɛji ij nfaci."
42016019	Ɛmɛny Jesu oc nyandrɛ ɛm odad am dad ɛsɛ: "Gbreŋgbi nyam anŋ eke bi sus mob amamn eke b’il an, ɛw dandany ebl af. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ li bi kok sos, n’ám ij, n’ám ɛgŋ, n’ám kok sos ɛm iŋn.
42016020	Gbɔru nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Lasar ke abi ok a, b’anŋ’n lisany.
42016021	Li b’erur eke li k’ij gbreŋgbi a ec’ob eke b’ij ec’ekprey a eke b’ok es wus a. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mɔwr b’ow ám irm’n abi a.
42016022	Ɛbɛn ɛbɛn toŋ batŋ gbɔru a uw, ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ow oc in ec’abŋ a im sigm es Abraham e lís. Eke ow b’ibn tɛl a, gbreŋgbi a yɛji uw, ɛtŋ wɛl oc’r es.
42016023	Kɔ ɔŋnes baŋn yogŋ, gbreŋgbi a am ij gbre nɔnɔ gbɛl. Eke li b’igbl any ogŋ a, l’ɛkn Lasar akpoj ɛm eke sig es Abraham e lís.
42016024	Ɛtŋ n’am ɛlu lebl li dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs Abraham ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ, ke ɛ́rm Lasar usm abuli mij ɛm ow tat’m anm adar’m ɛrm, aŋke m’am ij gbre nɔnɔ al na ɛm.'
42016025	Kɔ Abraham dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛm jim, ɔ̀kn eke ŋ ec’owr anŋ ɛm anŋ ehe ɛm ɛtŋ Lasar anŋ gbre ɛm. Ca kin eke aŋa n’anŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm ke ŋ am ij gbre.
42016026	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛy lele ɔny ab ec’araŋn a, nɔmu ligbɛl nyam anŋ. Ek’ɛgŋ erur eke k’ow ɔny ogŋ a, oglog ow ɛy yogŋ a yɛji, li k’ɔtum.'
42016027	Ɛtŋ gbreŋgbi a dad ninɛ: 'Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ: ɛ̀rm Lasar im ɛm ɛs e gbugŋ a,
