42016028	aŋke m’ɔny ɛm lisijimɛl yen. N’ím l’ɛwar wɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl yɛji -li k’owmn gbre ij usu na.'
42016029	Abraham ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: 'Esŋ jimɛl ec’a, -n’ɔny Mois lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab eke am ɛwar ɛl. Ow akpl ke -l’iri wɛl ec’a!'
42016030	Kɔ gbreŋgbi a dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm ɛs Abraham, ow elm ow. Kɔ eke agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ b’im dad ɛl a, -li b’ow -l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm.'
42016031	Ɛtŋ Abraham dad’r ninɛ: 'Eke -l’erurm eke -li k’iri Mois lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ec’a, ɛbɛn cɛ -li k’ow -l’irimn ɛgŋ ek’uw ke b’ow igb im dad ɛl a ec’a yɛji.' "
42017001	Sica ɛmɛny Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ów eke b’ɔŋ agŋ kok sikpl a, b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Gbɛkɔ gbre él ɛgŋ a eke sikpl b’ɛcr in ɛm ow ɛŋn ɛgŋ a eci!
42017002	Ɛgŋ eke b’ɔny ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm ɛsɛ iy af ɛlu wus a, low ŋuŋ a eke li k’ɛŋn a agb nɔnɔ. Eke wɛl oc meb ucur lob ligbɛl ucu’r ɛmn ɛtŋ wɛl ɔny ɛman in okij a, ow akpl akm low ŋuŋ a eke wɛl ki kok’r a.
42017003	Ɔny obi a, ɛ̀wr ɛrm sɛnyn sɛnyn! Eke esŋ jim kok low ɔbr ŋ e lís, ke ɔ̀m’n ów mɛwl ɛm. Eke l’iri ɛtŋ l’uw in ec’ów ɔbr ab any a, òc ap’r.
42017004	Eke lɛgŋ nyam af li kok low ɔbr sakp lɔbŋ ŋ e lís ɛtŋ l’ow sakp lɔbŋ mum n’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ a, ke òc ap’r."
42017005	Ɛrm ɛsɛl a dad Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òbn ɛy ec’ɔmn a."
42017006	Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Blel ɔnyn ɔmn ɛw likekli ɛsɛ likŋ e liy af ana, ɔtur eke ki dadr likŋ gbɛl na ɛsrɛ: 'Ìil es im inym es okij ɛm!', li b’ow l’ɛlum ɔny."
42017007	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kin low nyam: ɔny ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ɔny juma kok ɛs eke bi kok ɔgm juma oglog b’ɔsu mindey. Eke li b’anŋ juma kok ɛm ba li b’ow a, kɔ in ec’akŋ ɛs a b’ow dad’r eke li k’ow fafa li sig es l’ij ob ee?
42017008	Kɔ li k’ow li dadm ow kpɛkŋ l’ɛsmɛ: 'Kòk ɛm ec’ob ij a! Ɛ̀w ob sos, ke ɔ́ŋ’m ob m’ij m’ɛgŋ gbuŋ ke ŋ yɛji íj ob ɛgŋ ee?'
42017009	Ɛkan eke n’ɔɔm in e juma kok ɛs a bia, ów a eke li dad ow, ke ow kok ɔŋ’n a ec’ab ee?
42017010	Ɛbɛn ɔny yɛji, eke kokr low fɛŋ eke Nyam ɔŋ ɔny eke ki kokr a yɛji, dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛy juma kok ɛsɛl cɛ s’el; ow ek’it eke si ki kok a, ow ana.' "
42017011	Sica Jesu eb ejagb aam Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ n’am ɛcr Samari lele Galile ab e ligber a ogŋ ogŋ.
42017012	Eke n’im bake n’am titm baŋn nyam a, kokobe ɛsɛl agŋ lɛw anŋ akpoj am ow ɔbr’r,
42017013	ɛtŋ -n’am ɛlu ow lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl Jesu, ìkŋ ɛy sɔrŋ!"
42017014	Jesu ɛkn ɛl ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn yɛgmn egb waw ɛsɛl sos!" Ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl mɛny -n’aam. Eke -n’aam a, ɛl fɛŋ -l’ewl.
42017015	Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’ɛkn eke l’ewl a, l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow yogŋ, ɛtŋ n’am kɔklm Nyam lebl gege.
42017016	L’ok ɔwrɔkp wus, l’ubu any es Jesu ec’any af, ɛtŋ n’am ɔŋ ow bia. Igŋ na elm Jwif kɔ Samari ec’ɛgŋ.
42017017	Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ɔny lɛw mum ewlmn ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ bogŋ libarm ab a ee?
42017018	Kɔ ŋ sɔny cɛ ek’el utu ɛgŋ a anake ow am ɛlu Nyam bia ab ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ ɛl a gbɛ, ɛgŋ kaka tutrm eke k’ow ɛlu Nyam bia ee?"
42017019	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb ke ím, kɔ ŋ ec’ɔmn a eb ɛlu’ŋ es."
42017020	Lɛgŋ nyam Farisiɛl ow am ibrm Jesu ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ lɛgŋ iy Nyam ec’ es ɛw a b’ow ow bake agŋ ɛkn ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Nyam ec’es ɛw a k’ow owm ɛsɛ ob eke wɛl b’ɛkn af.
42017021	Wɛl k’ow dadm ɛsmɛ: 'Kin n’anŋ aŋa, ow k’ɔdm n’anŋ yogŋ a!' Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ec’es ɛw a anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn."
42017022	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny n’am dad jam ɛsɛl a l’ɛsɛ: "Sɛgŋ am ow eke b’ow erurir eke k’ɛkan ɛgŋ ec’ Iy lɛgŋ nyam cɛ, gbɛkɔ k’ow ɛknmn in.
42017023	Wɛl b’ow dad ɔny ɛsɛ: 'N’anŋ aŋa!', ow k’ɔdm 'N’anŋ yogŋ a!', kɔ k’ùrur es k’usr jam k’ìmn!
42017024	Ɛsɛ elel eke nyam b’ɛŋn ke b’ayal afr nimum fɛŋ a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam ow b’ow ɛcr ɛgŋ ec’Iy e mowrer e lɛgŋ a yɛji.
42017025	Gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke low na ɛ́y a, ow it ke l’íj gbre nɔnɔ, ke yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ ígŋ ɛlu’l es.
42017026	Low a eke ɛy Noe e lɛgŋ a, ɛbɛn cɛ ow b’ow ɛy ɛgŋ ec’Iy e mowrer e lɛgŋ a yɛji.
42017027	Lɛgŋ a, agŋ a fɛŋ am ij ob, ɛtŋ am ɛgŋ. Egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab am ɛbirir toŋ batŋ ow it lɛgŋ a eke Noe ɛy mijɛtŋ gbɛl ab ɛm a, ɛtŋ mij gbɛl a iy ow bubur ɛl es ibi ɛl.
42017028	Ɛmɛny ow b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ Lɔt e lɛgŋ a ec’ab af: yogŋ yɛji agŋ am ij ob, am ɛgŋ, am ɔl án, am ewl egb, am us mel.
42017029	Ɛtŋ eke Lɔt anŋ Sodɔm baŋn ɛy ɔkm a, Nyam ɔŋ al lele mebn eke ler ab am an ok wus ɛsɛ mij af, toŋ ibi agŋ a fɛŋ.
42017030	Ɛbɛn cɛ ow b’ow ɛy ɛgŋ ec’Iy e mowrer e lɛgŋ a yɛji.
42017031	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ɛgŋ eke b’ow anŋ in ec’êl af e lɛf eb usu a, ke b’ow ɔny in e mob anŋ akŋ a, k’úsm es ɛym akŋ ocm ob. Ɛbɛn ɛgŋ eke b’ow anŋ ɔgm a yɛji, k’ɛ́wlm ij.
42017032	Ɔ̀kan Lɔt e yɔw a eke lɛr jam a e low a yɛji.
42017033	Ɛgŋ eke b’erur eke ki dogŋn in e sel a, b’ow irmn; kɔ ɛgŋ a eke b’ow irmn in e sel a, b’ow anŋ owr.
42017034	M’am dad ɔny, lɛgŋ a eci ncok a, agŋ yony eke b’ow ɛru es ob ɛrur ob nyam af a, wɛl b’ow oc nyam, ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.
42017035	Ek’ɔyɔw yony am bɛbm sos ob iny eci, wɛl b’ow oc nyam, ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.
42017036	[Eke agŋ yony anŋ ɔgm, wɛl b’ow oc nyam, ke wɛl ígŋ nyam ɛlu es.]"
42017037	Sica in e jam ɛsɛl a ibrm’n ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ low na bogŋ ow b’ow ɛy ee?" Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Yogŋ eke sos megl ugŋn b’ow anŋ a, yogŋ anake sikaka b’ow as luku a."
42018001	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a nyandrɛ ɛm odad yɛgm ɛl ek’ow akpl ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam, sos k’ɔ́wm ɛl es.
42018002	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛb nyam ɛm a, jɛj ok ɛs nyam anŋ eke ɛ́luam Nyam ke ám tutrm ɛgŋ yɛji.
42018003	Ɛb nyam ab ɛm cɛ, iŋnyɔw nyam yɛji anŋ eke sakp nɔnɔ b’ow ɛŋn’n ke ám ibrm’n eke ow ki jɛj in lele in ec’ifnu ab e low ok nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ɔ́ŋ’n.
42018004	Lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛm ɛtŋ, jɛj ok ɛs a ɛ́gŋm jɛjm in e low a okm, ɛtŋ n’am dad in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'Nawrɛ tasi m’ɛluam Nyam, ɛtŋ m’am tutrm ɛgŋ yɛji,
42018005	gbɛkɔ iŋnyɔw na am ijr’m gbre nɔnɔ. Mi b’ow mi jɛj in e low a m’ok, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ówm l’ijrm im gbre ij.' "
42018006	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Kɔ irir jɛj ok ɛs ŋuŋ na ec’odad eke dad ab ee?
42018007	Ɛtŋ Nyam ek’ɔny in ec’agŋ eke b’ɛlu’l lebl ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab a, li b’ow l’ɛw wɛl eci jɛj ok owi a es ow ibn ee?
42018008	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: li b’ow l’ogŋ es li jɛj wɛl e low l’ok. Kɔ lɛgŋ eke ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ow a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn ɔmn ɛsɛl wus na af ee?"
42018009	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm odad ok agŋ a eke b’ubr ɛl sosi nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl ke b’ifn agŋ ɛjec’a ninɛ:
42018010	"Agŋ yony im ok Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a Nyam ŋɔŋn eci; nyam el Farisi ɛtŋ nyam el wus labm eb ɛs.
42018011	Farisi a igb inym es am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛrm ɛm dad ɛsɛ: 'O Nyam, m’am ɛlu’ŋ bia eke m’anm ɛsɛ agŋ amua na ek’el elu, ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl, afacu, oglog ɛsɛ wus labm eb ɛs na af a.
42018012	Nɛnɛgŋ gber nyam af, mi b’ ɛnŋ nɛny sakp yony. Ɛtŋ mi b’oc ɛm ec’ob fɛŋ eke mi kok a eci lɛw ɛm m’ap’ŋ.'
42018013	Kɔ wus labm eb ɛs a gbɛ kpab es agŋ a e lís inym es saw ɛm, ɔ́tum eke k’igbl any ogŋ lɛr afr yɛji, ɛtŋ am ok sabu ɛrmni dad ɛsɛ: 'O Nyam, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ aŋke m’el sikpl ɛs.'
42018014	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: wus labm eb ɛs a, eke l’ɛwl mɛny n’aam akŋ a, Nyam oc in e sikpl a ap’r; kɔ ow elm Farisi a gbɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’igbl’l in sosi ogŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɔny is’r es; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’isr in sosi es a, Nyam b’ow ɔny igbl’l ogŋ."
42018015	Ca agŋ ot ey mɛny nɛnym yɛji ow eke Jesu k’at ɛl abu nuŋ. Eke jam ɛsɛl a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, -n’am ɛnym agŋ a abr.
42018016	Kɔ Jesu ɔŋ wɛl ot etuey a ow’r lís ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Yɛ̀br etuey ow ɛm ogŋ! Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́dŋn ɛl, aŋke tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛl af a eci.
42018017	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’ɛgŋm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ebm ɛsɛ iyli af a, ɛgŋ ikŋ na, lɛgŋ kaka li k’ow l’ɔtum l’ɛym ɛm."
42018018	Jwifɛl ec’any ɛs nyam ibrm Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs mamn, kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ke m’íj sel ek’ɔnym uwr ec’aja ee?"
42018019	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɛsŋ’m ɛgŋ mamn ee? Ɛgŋ kaka elm ɛgŋ mamn, ek’ow elm Nyam sɔny coco cɛ.
42018020	Kɔ uw sol ab any ee? K’íjm nfaci, k’íbim ɛgŋ, k’íym mil, k’íjm daŋku yadŋ ɛm ɛgŋ e nuŋ af, ɛ́lum asŋ lele esŋ ab."
42018021	Any ɛs a dad ninɛ: "Likekli ɛm ɛtŋ mi b’ɛlum sol amua fɛŋ."
42018022	Eke Jesu b’iri odad na a, li dad ow ninɛ: "Eke kok ɛbɛn ke ow akpl, gbɛkɔ ow anŋ’ŋ low nyam: ɔ̀l ŋ ec’ob fɛŋ ek’ɔny a ij, òc ow ec’os a cɛc ɔgbɔru, ke b’ow ɛŋn ob ɔny afr, ca ɛ́wl mɛny ow us’m jam."
42018023	Eke any ɛs a iri odad na a, sos ɔw’r es aŋke n’ɔny ob nɔnɔ.
42018024	Jesu is any lɛr’r ɛtŋ ɛkn eke sos ɔw’r es; li dad ninɛ: "Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛm ɛy a ɛw tuɔtuɔ agŋ a ek’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a eci gbɛ!
42018025	Gbaŋkɔ kedebnam eci fɛfn ɔmu ɛm eke k’ɛcr a ɛw fuɛfuɛ akm gbreŋgbi eci Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ɛm ɛy a."
42018026	Agŋ a eke iri odad na a am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ sica bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu ek’ɛŋn sel ee?"
42018027	Jesu ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Yec’eke ɛw tuɔtuɔ agŋ ec’a, Nyam ogŋ a ow ɛw fuɛfuɛ."
42018028	Piɛr dad ninɛ: "Ŋ obi yɛji ɛkn, s’igŋ ɛy ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ s’ɛlu es s’am us’ŋ jam!"
42018029	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ek’ɛgŋ igŋ in ec’akŋ, in e yɔw, lisijimɛl, in ec’agŋ oglog in ec’ey ab ɛlu es Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a sosiɛm,
42018030	li b’ow n’ɛŋn amua na fɛŋ bubu af lɛgŋ na ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ɛm a, li b’ow n’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr."
42018031	Jesu ɛsŋ in e jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ow ɛŋn’n saw ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ìsr any ɛkan, kin Jerusalɛm anake s’am uyu s’im a. Yogŋ anake low a fɛŋ eke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl nɔn ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e lís a b’ow iy nɛny a.
42018032	Wɛl b’ow oc ɛlu’l Nyam e low any uwm ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm. -Li b’ow -li kokr ow miyɛr, -li wɛwr ow, -l’afl ow sar any.
42018033	-Li b’ow -l’ɔr ow ŋgbre ɛm, ke ca -l’ibi ow. Ɛtŋ sɛgŋ nyahan li b’ow l’igb luw ɛm."
42018034	Kɔ jam ɛsɛl a irim odad eke n’am dad wɛl a okm ɛl es sos ɛm; odad a eci liy a k’ɛym ɔkm, ɛtŋ -l’uwm low yec’a eke Jesu am dad a e nyandrɛ ab any.
42018035	Eke -n’imn toŋ bake -n’am titm Jeriko a, any eflu nyam sig es ejagb saw am sasm ob.
42018036	N’am iri dedeku a ek’am ow a e lebl, ɛtŋ n’am ibrm l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi ee?"
42018037	Wɛl dad’r ek’ow el Nasarɛt e Jesu anake am ɛc a.
42018038	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ n’am ɔg li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu, David eci lilaw, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ!"
42018039	Agŋ ek’anŋ anym am an es im a, am ɛnym’n abr eke li ki yewal, gbɛkɔ n’am at lebl es l’ɔg li dad l’ɛsɛ: "David e lilaw, ìkŋ’m sɔrŋ!"
42018040	Eke n’am ɔg ɛbɛn a, Jesu inym es ɛtŋ ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛsŋ’n. Eke any eflu a ow titm’n a, Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ:
42018041	"Kɔ bla lowi am erur eke mi ki kok m’ɔŋ’ŋ ee?" Any eflu a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’am erur eke mi k’ɛkn es."
42018042	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ ec’ɔmn a ewlm’ŋ; ɛ̀kn es gɔŋ!"
42018043	Kpɛkŋ any eflu a am ɛkn es, ɛtŋ n’am us Jesu jam li kɔklm Nyam. Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛkn low na a yɛji am kɔklm Nyam.
42019001	Eke Jesu ɛy Jeriko baŋn am ubr im a,
42019002	gbreŋgbi nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Zashe, ke el wus labm eb ɛsɛl ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a anŋ yogŋ.
42019003	N’am ɔl eke li k’ɛkn ɛgŋ a eke el Jesu a, kɔ bieku a sosiɛm, l’ɔ́tum eke li k’ɛkn ow aŋke l’el ɛgŋ kpɛtɛŋni.
42019004	Ɛtŋ l’uru es n’im l’uyu sikomor ikŋ nyam l’ɛy ɛm eke li k’ɛkn Jesu, eke ow b’ow ɛcr yogŋ ec’a sosiɛm.
42019005	Eke Jesu ow ba b’igŋ yogŋ a, l’igbl any ogŋ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Zashe, ògŋ es fafa us es; ow it eke yɛfɛnyna mi k’ɛy ŋ e gbugŋ a."
42019006	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Zashe ogŋ es us es, oc Jesu ab im gbugŋ ɛtŋ eb’r sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
42019007	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɛkn low na a am sɛsl ów dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na gbɛ, sikpl ɛs ogŋ anake n’im n’am ij etu a!"
42019008	Kɔ Zashe igb inym es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’ow m’oc ɛm ec’ob e m’ɔny a e likpr m’ap ɔgbɔru. Ɛtŋ eke m’eb ɛgŋ nyam ec’ob dufre ɛm, mil ɛm, ke m’ɔ́wr sakp yar m’ɔŋ’n."
42019009	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna sel ɛŋn ɛy akŋ aŋa, aŋke ɛgŋ na yɛji el Abraham e lilaw.
42019010	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ow am ɔl eke k’eb agŋ ek’irm a ɛlu es."
42019011	Eke -n’am iri sodad amua a, ɛmɛny Jesu dad nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad nyam aŋke n’am titm Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ a am tutr eke Nyam ec’ es ɛw a am ow ɛy ɔkm kpɛkŋ.
42019012	Ɛtŋ kin odad eke l’oc n’am dad: "Akŋ nyam ec’any ɛs nyam aam usu kpekpe ɛb nyam ɛm eke k’eb es ɛw ec’abusu, ke ɛ́wl mɛny ow.
42019013	Gbuŋ eke li k’im a, l’ɛsŋ in eci juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e lɛw, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ os ekŋ yen, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Òcr kokar juma ɛŋan mij toŋ ke m’ɛ́wl mɛny m’ow.'
42019014	Kɔ in ec’ɛb eyŋ a ifn’n, ɛtŋ -l’ɛrm agŋ us’r jam im dad eke ɛl erurm eke ɛgŋ ikŋ na in k’ɛw ɛl es.
42019015	Eke n’im l’eb es ɛw ec’abusu a bake l’ɛwl l’ow a, l’ɛsŋ in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a eke li cɛc os n’ɔŋ a eke li k’uw ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e juma e kok a e mij ek’ɛŋn ab any.
42019016	Krɛkrɛ ɛs a ow ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ŋ e os ekŋ yen ab ɛm, m’ɛŋn os fandi.'
42019017	Es ɛw ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Juma kok ɛs mamn, ow akpl gbɛ! Eke ij nɛny nyam low likekli na ɛm a, ow sosiɛm m’am ɔŋ’ŋ abusu ek’ɛw ɛb lɛw es.'
42019018	Yony ɛm ec’a yɛji ow ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ŋ e os ekŋ yen ab ɛm, m’ɛŋn os ekŋ yen yen sakp yen.'
42019019	Li dad ow ninɛ: 'M’am ɔŋ’ŋ abusu ek’ɛw ɛb yen es.'
42019020	Nyahan ɛm e juma kok ɛs a ow ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kin ŋ e os a eke m’ucu es ɔhɔny ɛm m’ɛw’ŋ es.
42019021	M’uru’ŋ aŋke m’uw any eke ŋ el ɛgŋ tuɔtuɔ. Ɛtŋ b’oc ob yec’eke ŋ ɛwm es a, b’ub egb yec’eke ewlm a.'
42019022	Eke li dad ɛbɛn a, es ɛw ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: 'Ŋ el juma kok ɛs ŋuŋ; m’ow m’oc ŋ ec’odad ebl a m’ɔbr’ŋ low. Uw any eke m’el ɛgŋ tuɔtuɔ, ke mi b’oc ob yec’eke m’ɛwm es, ke mi b’ub egb yec’eke m’ewlm a;
42019023	ɛtŋ kɔ bla ɛtŋ ocm ɛm e os a iim ɛwm es os es ɛw usu, ow kokm juma bake, ɛsɛ elel eke m’ow ab af a, ke m’óc os a lele ow e mij ab ab ee?'
42019024	Kpɛkŋ es ɛw ɛs a ɛwl mɛny ɛtŋ dad agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ninɛ: 'Èbr ir os a abu ɛm ɔ̀ŋn ɛgŋ a ek’ɔny fandi a.'
42019025	Kɔ -li dad ow ninɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, in n’ɔny os fandi ɛtŋ, ke ɛmɛny wɛl ɔŋ’n ee?'
42019026	L’ɔdu l’eb li dad ninɛ: 'Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke ɔnym ob ab a, wɛl b’ow obn’n; kɔ ɛgŋ eke ɔnym ob kaka a, tɛl a eke n’ɔny a yɛji, wɛl b’ow ɔdu eb’r abu ɛm.
42019027	Kɔ sica ɛm ec’efnu a ek’erurm eke mi k’el ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɔ̀nyn owr ɛl aŋa, ke íbir ɛl ɛm ec’any af!' "
42019028	Eke li dad ɛbɛn a, Jesu ikŋ bieku a anym am uyu im Jerusalɛm.
42019029	Eke n’im bake n’am titm Bɛtfaje lele Betani ab ek’el Olivie lafɛny a ec’ogog a, Jesu ɛrm in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ yony,
42019030	ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn baŋn a ek’anŋ anym a. Eke b’ow okr ɛm a, b’ow ɛkan gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋni nyam eke wɛl ucur es, ke ɛgŋ kaka k’uyum af. Ɔ̀nyn mɔmun in es ocr owr ir.
42019031	Ek’ɛgŋ b’ibrm ɔny low a sosiɛm eke am mɔmun gbaŋkɔli ab es a, dàdr ir ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl a ɔny ow ec’es abur.' "
42019032	Agŋ a eke l’ɛrm a im ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn low a ɛsɛ elel eke Jesu dad ɛl ab af.
42019033	Eke -n’am mɔmu gbaŋkɔli a es a, ow ec’ɛsɛl a am ibrm ɛl ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am mɔmun gbaŋkɔli ab es ee?"
42019034	Ɛtŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl yony a dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl a ɔny ow ec’esabur."
42019035	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -l’oc gbaŋkɔ kpɛtɛŋni a -l’is Jesu. -L’oc ɛl eci sigbad -li faf ow af, ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ Jesu uyu af.
42019036	Eke -n’am an es -n’imn anym ec’a, agŋ am ot ɛl e sigbad faf ejagb.
42019037	Eke n’am titm Jerusalɛm, ejagb a ek’am us nuŋ es imn Olivie lafɛny af ec’a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am us’r jam a sos ɛm iŋn ɛm am kɔklm Nyam lebl gege, sakrowa a fɛŋ eke -l’ɛkan a sosiɛm eci.
42019038	-N’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ Ɛb Ebu ek’am ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ɔwrɔ! S’am kɔklm Nyam, ɛrm es ɛy lele anygbɛl ab ek’anŋ afr a sosiɛm eci!"
42019039	Farisiɛl bɛb ek’anŋ agŋ ab ɛm a, dad Jesu ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, ɛ̀dŋn ŋ e jam ɛsɛl a yéwal."
42019040	Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke -li yewal yɛji, mebn amua b’ow ɔg kɔklm im!"
42019041	-
42019042	Eke Jesu im titm Jerusalɛm ke b’ɛkn ɛb a, n’am ikŋ ow ec’ɔŋn li dad l’ɛsɛ: "O Jerusalɛm, blel ŋ yɛji uw lɛgŋ na ɛm ec’elel eke k’ɛŋn ɛrm es ɛy any ana! Kɔ sica ow lɔl’ŋ es any af.
42019043	Kɔ lɛgŋ am ow eke ŋ ec’efnu b’ow awŋ lakp iwr did ɛlul’ŋ ɛm, eb’ŋ susu fɛŋ, abur’ŋ es atr’ŋ sel.
42019044	-Li b’ow -ni ŋuŋn’ŋ nimum, ŋ lele ŋ ec’ɛb eyŋ ab ab. Ɛtŋ lebn kaka k’ow anm lawl lebn af ij, aŋke ŋ uwm lɛgŋ eke Nyam ow eke k’ɛlum’ŋ abu ab any!"
42019045	Sica Jesu im l’ɛy Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, l’ogŋ án ɔlu a l’ok ɔkm,
42019046	ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛm ec’êl a b’ow el Nyam ŋɔŋn ec’êl. Ɛtŋ ɔny, am ocr kokr elu eci ɛŋanin usu!"
42019047	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ Jesu b’im yɛgm agŋ low Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a, lele Jwifɛl ɛm ec’any ɛsɛl ab ab, am ɔl eke k’ibi’r.
42019048	Kɔ -l’uwmn elel eke -li k’ɛŋan ow any, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ b’iri in e low sɛnyn sɛnyn.
42020001	Lɛgŋ nyam, Jesu am yɛgm agŋ low Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ n’am dad Amani Mamn ec’odad. Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a, ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab ow
42020002	ɛtŋ am ibrm ɛsɛ: "Dàd ɛy ɔ! Kɔ bogŋ ec’abusu ɛm am kok ów amua ee? Kɔ bwo ɔŋ’ŋ na eci kok ec’abusu ee?"
42020003	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm yɛji m’am ow m’ibrm ɔny low nyam cɛ. Dàdr’m,
42020004	kɔ bwo ɔŋ Jan abusu ow ok agŋ mij nuŋ ee? Kɔ Nyam oglog agŋ ee?"
42020005	Ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Eke si dad eke Nyam ɔŋ’n l’ow, li b’ow l’ibrm ɛy l’ɛsɛ: 'Kɔ bla sosiɛm ubmn in nawrɛ ee?'
42020006	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke si dad eke agŋ ɔŋ’n abusu l’ow, ow b’ow ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ot mebn eke k’ibi ɛy, aŋke -l’uw any eke Jan el Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs tasi."
42020007	Ɛtŋ sica -li dad Jesu ninɛ: "S’uwm ɛgŋ ek’ɔŋ’n abusu l’ow l’ok agŋ mij nuŋ ab any."
42020008	Ɛtŋ in yɛji li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ɛm yɛji mi k’ow mi dadm ɔny abusu yec’ɛm eke mi bi kok ów amua fɛŋ a."
42020009	Ɛmɛny Jesu am dad agŋ a nyandrɛ odad na ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ nyam ɔgm ɛs nyam ewl viny in ec’ɔgm a, l’oc l’abul ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ n’im usu lɛgŋ kpekpe eci.
42020010	Eke egb ub e lɛgŋ ow a, l’ɛrm in ec’abu ɛlum ɛs nyam im ɛŋn juma ɛsɛl a eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n egb a, in ec’eke k’ɛbm’n a. Eke abu ɛlum ɛs a im a, juma ɛsɛl a ɔr’r, ɛtŋ -l’ogŋ ow ow ɛwl abu ɔfr.
42020011	Ɛmɛny ɔgm ɛs a ɛrm abu ɛlum ɛs ɛjeci nyam. Kɔ in yɛji juma ɛsɛl a ɔr’r, wɛwr’r, ɛtŋ -l’ogŋ ow; ow ɛwl eke -n’ɔɔm ow ob kaka.
42020012	Ɛmɛny sakp nyahan ɛm, l’ɛrm abu ɛlum ɛs nyam im. Na ec’a gbɛ, -l’ɔr ow -li kok ow mob, ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ɔwl ow lakp jam a.
42020013	Eke egb ɔgm ɛs a b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, li dad ninɛ: 'Oho! Kɔ sica ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee? Mi b’ow m’ɛrm ɛm ec’iy eke m’erur tasi a; ow k’ɔdm ke -n’ɔny ow ec’ɛlum.' Ɛtŋ l’ɛrm jim im.
42020014	Gbɛkɔ eke -l’ɛkan ow a, -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: 'Kin ɛgŋ a eke godo godo b’ow el aja ij ɛs a! S’íbi’r ke ɔgm a él ɛy eci.'
42020015	Ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ɔwl ow ɔgm a e lakp jam a, ɛtŋ -l’ibi ow." Sica Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ na, bla lowi ɔgm ɛs a b’ow kok ɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl ab ee?
42020016	Li b’ow l’ow, l’ibi juma kok ɛsɛl a, ke l’óc ɔgm a n’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjeci." Eke agŋ a iri sodad amua a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ow k’ow ɛym ɛbɛn!"
42020017	Kɔ Jesu lɛr ɛl ɛtŋ ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ Nyam odad na e nyandrɛ el ayaf ee? Lebn a eke êl us ɛsɛl a oc ɔwl a, ɛwl el êl lɔy ɛm e lebn tasi.
42020018	Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛy lebn na af a, b’ow kikn es, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke lebn a b’ow ɛy af a, b’ow piplm ɛm el siflefl."
42020019	Eke ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl lele egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ab ab uw any eke ɛl sosiɛm anake Jesu ub nyandrɛ na a, -n’am ɔl eke li k’ɔny ow ke -l’ɛdŋn ow e juma a, gbɛkɔ -n’am uru agŋ a.
42020020	Ow sosiɛm -n’am ɔsu Jesu kprakpr ɛm. -Li b’ɛrm agŋ ow ɛsɛ nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl af, eke k’ɔny Jesu in ec’odad ebl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’oc -l’ɛlu ow Jude ec’es ɛw ɛs a abu ɛm.
42020021	-N’am ibrm Jesu low ikŋ na -l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, s’uw any eke ŋ e Nyam e low eke bi dad ke bi yɛgm agŋ a el nawrɛ ɛtŋ úrum ɛgŋ any ɛ́s; Nyam ec’elel eke am ibrm eke si k’iir ɛb a, bi yɛgm ow ec’ejagb a kpɛŋ.
42020022	Kɔ dàd ɛy ɔ! Ɛy ec’ol ɔŋ abusu eke si ki sɔg wus labm s’ɔŋ Sesar ee?"
42020023	Eke -li dadr ɛbɛn a, Jesu uw ɛl e kprakpr ab any, ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ:
42020024	"Yɛ̀gmn’m os nyam." Ɛtŋ -l’oc ɛl ec’os a e nyam -n’am yɛgm ow. Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Mɛny ɛwr na lele nin na eke wɛl nɔn os na af a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ec’ow el ee?" Ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Sesare eci."
42020025	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ke ɔ̀ŋn Sesar yec’ek’el in ec’a, ke ɔ́ŋn Nyam yɛji yec’ek’el in ec’a."
42020026	Na ɛm yɛji -l’ɔtum -n’ɔnym ow odad ebl ɛm agŋ a ec’any af. Kɔ odad eke li dad wɛl a iti ɛl any, ɛtŋ -li bubur ɛnyɛmbri.
42020027	Ow e jam a, Sadusiɛl ec’agŋ bɛb ow ɛŋn Jesu. (Ke Sadusiɛl anake bi dad ɛsɛ luw ɛm anŋ igb in anm a.) -N’am ibrm Jesu low na l’ɛsɛ:
42020028	"Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, Mois nɔn ol na ɔŋ ɛy dad ninɛ: Eke igŋ nyam ɛbi yɔw ɛtŋ l’ewm iy kaka toŋ l’uw, ow akpl ke lisijim éb iŋnyɔw a ɛbi, ke éw ey in ab ɛw lisijim nin es.
42020029	Kin agŋ lisijimɛl lɔbŋ e low ek’ɛŋn: likpekp a ɛbi yɔw, l’ewm iy kaka ow ab ɛtŋ l’uw.
42020030	Li b’uw a, yony ɛm ec’a eb iŋnyɔw a ɛbi. In yɛji l’ewm iy toŋ batŋ l’uw.
42020031	Eke in yɛji li b’uw a, nyahan ɛm ec’a yɛji eb iŋnyɔw a ɛbi. Ɛbɛn ɛbɛn toŋ ɛl lɔbŋ mum -l’ɛbi iŋnyɔw a ɛtŋ -l’uw eke -l’ewm ey kaka.
42020032	Ɛtŋ ow ec’uwr ɛm a, yɔw a yɛji uw.
42020033	Kɔ sica lɛgŋ eke agŋ ek’uw a b’ow igb luw ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ e yɔw tasi li b’ow l’el ab ee? Aŋke ɛl a fɛŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛbi’r ow el in e yɔw."
42020034	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Wus na ec’egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab b’ɛbirir;
42020035	kɔ egŋ a lele ɔyɔw ab ab ek’it eke k’anŋ luw ɛm igb, ke ir ɛb afr a k’ow ɛbirm ij.
42020036	-Li k’ow -l’ɔtumn -l’uwmn ij aŋke -n’anŋ ɛsɛ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl af. Sica -l’el Nyam ec’ey, aŋke -n’anŋ luw ɛm -l’igb.
42020037	Mois dad ayal eke agŋ ek’uw a b’ow anŋ owr, aŋke kati a ek’am iri al ab ɛm a, l’ɛsŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Abraham e Nyam, Isak e Nyam, Jakɔb e Nyam.
42020038	Kɔ agŋ eke uw a e Nyam li k’el ee? Njaŋ, l’el agŋ ek’uw ke anŋ owr a e Nyam, aŋke in ec’a agŋ amua fɛŋ anŋ owr."
42020039	Ɛtŋ ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, uw dad."
42020040	Low na eke li dad wɛl ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ kaka úsm af ibram’n low ij.
42020041	Sica Jesu ibrm ol e low any uw ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad eke Mesi el David eci lilaw ee?
42020042	Aŋke Selu e lɛl ab ɛm a, David in obi am dad ɛsɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam dad ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ ninɛ: 'Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af
42020043	toŋ bake m’ót ŋ ec’efnu a m’ok’ŋ akr ew.'
42020044	Ɛkan, eke sica David b’ɛsŋ’n 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ', ke ayaf Mesi a ɔtu eke k’el David e lilaw ab ee?"
42020045	Eke agŋ dedeku a am iri in ec’odad a, Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ:
42020046	"Ɔ̀sur sos ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl e lís, ɛl eke -li b’erur eke -li ki sus mob akpakp -n’am ɛcm ab, ke -li b’erur eke dedeku ɛm wɛl k’ɛsŋn ɛl ɛlum ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a -li bi dogŋn mɛkpn anym es. Es gbɛgbl ec’ob ij owi ɛm yɛji -li b’erur susu amamn.
42020047	-Li b’ufŋ eŋnyɔw ɛb es, ɛtŋ -li bi kok nyandrɛ -l’ɔfur Nyam ŋɔŋn yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ót ɛl agŋ amamn. Na sosiɛm anake ɛl e jɛj ok a b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ a."
42021001	Ow e jam a, Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm yogŋ cɛ, eke Jesu b’is any a, l’ɛkn egbreŋgbi ek’am ɛlu Nyam bia ok ɛl ec’ob ap a kɔprɔ ebr mob ab ɛm.
42021002	Ɛmɛny l’ɛkn iŋnyɔw gbɔr yɔw nyam yɛji ek’am ɛlu os ekekey yony kɔprɔ ebr ob ab ɛm;
42021003	ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: iŋnyɔw gbɔr yɔw na ap ob akm agŋ a fɛŋ ec’a,
42021004	aŋke ɛl ec’a -n’ɔŋ ɛl ec’ob eke -n’ɔnyn a ec’ow ek’igŋ af a, kɔ iŋnyɔw a ec’a, n’ɔŋ in e gbɔr ɛm ec’a eke n’ɔny a, ow kpra kpra a eke li k’iir ɛb af a."
42021005	Sica agŋ bɛb am dad Nyamel gbɛl a e sakpl owi, mebn amamn lele mob amamn ab eke wɛl ap Nyam a e low. Eke Jesu b’iri a, li dad ninɛ:
42021006	"Lɛgŋ am ow eke mebn amua ek’am ɛkan a, kaka k’ow usrm lawl lebn af anm, aŋke fɛŋ b’ow ɛr ok wus."
42021007	Odad na eke Jesu dad ab ɛm -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ bogŋ lɛgŋ iy low na b’ow ɛy ee? Ɛtŋ bogŋ e mɛny ɛwr ɛm, wɛl b’ow uw wanci a eke ów amua b’ow ɛy ab any ee?"
42021008	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Kì yɛbr ɛgŋ k’irmn ɔny! Tasi ɛm a, agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ow ɛm e nin ɛm dad eke ɛl el Mesi a, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li dad eke lɛgŋ es abal el a in ow ŋ̂! Kɔ k’ùsr ɛl jam.
42021009	Eke batŋ am irir wɛl am dad ɔny ar owi lele ɛb e bɔbɔr owi ab a, ke erŋn k’ɔ̀ny ɔny. Ow it eke ów amua k’ɛy, kɔ ow elm wus na e nuŋ ɛdŋ.
42021010	Tasi ɛm a, ɛbr nyam ec’agŋ b’ow im ɛŋn ɛbr ɛjeci nyam ogŋ ar; es ɛw nyam b’ow im ɛŋn es ɛw ɛjeci nyam ar ogŋ eci;
42021011	wus b’ow umu tuɔtuɔ, ɛtŋ susu nɔnɔ gbɛl af lek b’ow ɛy, ɔl eŋuŋ b’ow ɔny agŋ nɔnɔ; ów erŋn erŋn b’ow ɛy ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl b’ow anŋ afr ok ɔkm.
42021012	Gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke ów amua ɛ́y a, wɛl b’ow ɔny ɔny ke wɛl ijr ɔny gbre, wɛl b’ow ot im ɔny jɛj ok ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ok ɔny sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ot ok ɔny ɛ́b ebu lele es ɛw ɛsɛl ab abu ɛm, ek’eel ɛm e jam ɛsɛl a sosiɛm.
42021013	Na anake b’ow ɔŋ ijr ɛm e daŋku.
42021014	Ow sosiɛm a èbr ɛwr es nuŋ ɛm ke ɛrmij k’íkŋm anym okm ɔny low eke b’ow dadr dogŋnin ɔny sosi a eci.
42021015	Ɛm obi m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny sodad ebl lele sɛwr ab eke b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ec’efnu a ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɔtum dadm odad akam ɔny es.
42021016	Ɔny ɛsɛl bɔbɔ yɛji, ɔny lisɛl, ɔny lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’agŋ lele ɔny lawlɛl ab b’ow ɔny ɔny ot im ɔny abusu ɛsɛl ec’any af; wɛl b’ow ɔb ɔny low, ibi ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ.
42021017	Ɛm sosiɛm agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow ifn ɔny,
42021018	kɔ ɔny e sin nuŋ bɔbɔ yɛji, kaka k’ow iram.
42021019	Ìnymn es kikri ɛbɛn cɛ; na ɛm anake b’ow ɛŋan sel a."
42021020	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ninɛ: "Eke b’ɛkan áru ek’iwr did ɛlul Jerusalɛm ɛm a, ke lɛgŋ ab anake b’ow uwr any eke wɛl b’ow ŋuŋn’n a.
42021021	Kpɛkŋ agŋ a eke b’ow anŋ Jude a, ow akpl ke -l’uru es -n’im mafɛny ɛm; agŋ eke b’ow anŋ Jerusalɛm baŋn a -n’im akpoj, ke agŋ eke b’ow anŋ sikpukpu ɛm a k’ɛ́ym baŋn a ij,
42021022	aŋke ow b’ow el jɛj ok e sɛgŋ. Yogŋ anake ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam Lɛl dad a b’ow iy nɛny a.
42021023	Sɛgŋ amua b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ molok ab lisɛl lele ɛl ek’am ɔŋ ey mɛny ab ab eci, aŋke sɛgŋ a ow b’ow el sɔrŋ ligbɛl eke b’ow ɛy ɛb ab ɛm. Ɛɛ, Nyam b’ow ɛlu in ec’ɛrm bebl ɔkm agŋ a e lís!
42021024	Wɛl b’ow ibi ɛl ar ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ot im ɛl madu ɔkr ɛm ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ɛm; ɛtŋ Nyam e low any uwm ɛsɛl b’ow eb Jerusalɛm ɔnym ab toŋ bake ɛl e lɛgŋ yɛji úwr."
42021025	Eke li dad na a, ɛmɛny Jesu ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ am ow eke mɛny ɛwr b’ow anŋ ligbn ɛm, awl ɛm lele mílɛ́l ɛm ab ok ɔkm. Eke wus na af ec’ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ b’ow iri okij lele mra ab e likekr a, -li b’ow -n’ɔny ɛrmij.
42021026	Agŋ erŋn b’ow ɔny toŋ úw, eke -li b’ow -li tutr ów a eke b’ow ɛy wus na af e low, aŋke nyam afr ec’abusu a b’ow ufŋ.
42021027	Yogŋ anake wɛl b’ow ɛkn ɛgŋ ec’ Iy eke b’ow anŋ jru ɛm ow, abusu ligbɛl lele anygbɛl ɛm ab a.
42021028	Eke ów amua b’ow ɔb nuŋ am ow a, ke átar sos es inymn es lɛɛr afr, aŋke ɔny ec’es eb ɛlu e lɛgŋ a ow titm ŋ̂."
42021029	Ɛmɛny Jesu oc nyandrɛ ɛm ec’odad na ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀kan babm e likŋ lele ekŋ ɛjec’ab ab;
42021030	eke -n’am gigŋ ɔdɔdɔ a, kpɛkŋ b’uwr any eke mewij ow titm.
42021031	Ɛbɛn nyam coco, eke b’ow ɛkan ów amua ow a, ke kpɛkŋ úwr any eke Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ow titm.
42021032	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: yɛfɛnyna ec’agŋ a fɛŋ k’ow uwm ow uwrm, ɛtŋ ów amua b’ow ɛy.
42021033	Afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛc, kɔ ɛm ec’odad ebl a k’ow ɛcm."
42021034	"Ow sosiɛm, ɛ̀wr ɛrm! K’òcar ɔny sosi k’ɛlulil es gbɛgbl owi, mar ɔny owi, lele owr anŋ ec’ɛrmij ebr owi ab ɛm, bake íjal sos es lɛgŋ a ów okr ɔny es kpru,
42021035	ɛsɛ asawa eke b’ok ob af ɔny af; tasi ɛm a, ow b’ow okr wus na ec’agŋ a fɛŋ es.
42021036	K’ɛ̀rur mɛmn, kɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́nyn lɛc akmn ów amua eke b’ow ɛy ab es, ke ɔ́tur inymn es ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ec’any af."
42021037	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ Jesu b’im yɛgm agŋ low Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ lɛgŋ uk ɛm, li b’im l’ɛru Olivie lafɛny af.
42021038	Ɛtŋ ibribr fafa agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a eke k’iri in ec’odad.
42022001	Sica Futufutu eke ejru ánm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl ek’el Pak a e lɛgŋ a ow titm.
42022002	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab am ɔl ew ew ɛm elel eke -li ki kokr bake -l’ibi Jesu, gbɛkɔ erŋn am ɔny ɛl agŋ a sosiɛm.
42022003	Ɛbɛn a, kpɛkŋ Satan ɛy Judas eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Iskariɔt, jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony a ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɛm.
42022004	Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ n’im n’ɛŋn Jwifɛl ec’ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Nyamel gbɛl a ec’ɔsu ɛsɛl ekpekp ab ab, ɛtŋ -l’iririr elel eke li k’oc Jesu l’ɛlu wɛl abu ɛm a.
42022005	Low na eke Judas dad ɛl a iŋn ɛl sos ɛm toŋ afŋn es, ɛtŋ -l’ɛwar ow eke -li b’ow -li sɔg ow labm.
42022006	Judas ɛgŋ eb, ɛtŋ sica n’am ɔl akunda sɛnyn yec’ɛm eke li k’ɔny Jesu n’ɔŋ wɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke dedeku a k’úwm any.
42022007	Lɛgŋ a ek’el Futufutu ek’ejru ánm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ eke wɛl k’ibi mɛcɛb kok Pak ec’ob ij a ow.
42022008	Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛrm Piɛr lele Jan ab dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn bɛbmn ɛy e Pak ec’ob ij a ec’usu."
42022009	Odad na eke ow dad ab ɛm, -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ erur eke si k’im si bɛbm ow e sos ee?"
42022010	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kin, eke b’imn ba b’ɛyr baŋn a, b’ow ɛŋan igŋ nyam ek’uyu mijel. Ùsr ir jam toŋ ɔny yɛji ókr gbugŋ a eke li b’ow l’ɛy a.
42022011	Eke b’okr gbugŋ a, dàdr gbugŋ ɛs a ɛsrɛ: 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs am ibrm akŋ yec’eke in k’ij Pak ec’es gbɛgbl ec’ob in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab.'
42022012	Ɛtŋ li b’ow li yɛgm ɔny êl afr a ec’akŋ gbɛl nyam ek’akŋ eci mob fɛŋ iy nɛny ɛm. Yogŋ anake b’ow bɛbmn ɛy ec’ob ij a e sos a."
42022013	Eke -n’imn a, -l’ɛkn low a fɛŋ eke Jesu dad ɛl a, ɛtŋ -li bɛbm Pak ec’ob ij a e sos -l’ɛw es.
42022014	Eke wanci ow bɛbmn ab a, Jesu lele in ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ow ok es ob ij usu a.
42022015	Eke -n’am ij ob a, Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’erur tasi eke mi k’ij Pak ec’ob na ɔny ab gbuŋ ke m’íj gbre.
42022016	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny eke mi k’ow m’ijm ob na ij, toŋ bake es gbɛgbl ikŋ na e liy a ɛ́y ɔkm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a."
42022017	Eke li dad odad na a, kpɛkŋ l’oc mij kpɔk, l’ɛlu Nyam bia ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Èbr mij kpɔk na ke ɛ́gŋn ɔny fɛŋ.
42022018	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny eke ɛmɛny mi k’ow m’ɛgŋm mar na ij toŋ bake Nyam ec’es ɛw a ów."
42022019	Ɛmɛny l’oc futufutu. L’ɛlu Nyam bia ɛtŋ n’ɔny l’ubr ɛm, n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Na el ɛm e sos megl [eke m’am ɔŋ ɔny. Kòkr low na ɛm ec’ɔkn eci."
42022020	Eke -l’ijr ob bake ow uwr a yɛji, l’oc mij kpɔk eke mar anŋ ɛm n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Mij kpɔk na el sinm owr eke Nyam kok ɛm e mebl eke ok es ɔny sosiɛm a eci.]
42022021	Gbɛkɔ kin: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’am ɔl ij’m a anŋ ob ij usu na ɛm ab!
42022022	Nawrɛ ɛm, ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow uw ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw es ab af, kɔ gbre él ɛgŋ a ek’ɔl ij’r a eci!"
42022023	Low na eke -l’irir a ɔŋ ɛtŋ -n’am bibrmn ɛl ɔfr -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ anake ki kok low na ɛy ɛm ab ee?"
42022024	Eke low na ɛc a, jam ɛsɛl a am atar ów es tuɔtuɔ eke k’uw ɛgŋ eke ɛl ɛm a k’el anymu ab any.
42022025	Ow sosiɛm Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛb ɛb ɛm eci ɛ́b ebu b’ɛw agŋ es, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’abusu ab ɛm -li bi dad wɛl eke wɛl k’ɛsŋ ɛl ów amamn kok ɛsɛl.
42022026	Kɔ ɔny ec’a, ow k’ow elm ɛbɛn. Ɛgŋ eke k’el ɔny ec’anymu a, n’ánŋ ɛsɛ iyli af; ke ɛgŋ eke k’el es ɛw ɛs a, ánŋ ɛsɛ ob oc ɔŋ ɛs af.
42022027	Tasi ɛm a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ el anymu ee? Kɔ ɛgŋ eke bi sig es am ij ob a, oglog ɛgŋ eke b’oc ob ɔŋ agŋ ab ee? Nawrɛ ɛm, ɛgŋ eke sig es am ij ob a el anymu, kɔ yadŋ ee? Ɛtŋ kin, ɛm m’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn ɛsɛ ob oc ɔŋ ɛs af.
42022028	Ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji anŋn ɛm ab, ɛm e gbre ijr fɛŋ ɛm.
42022029	Ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’ɛw agŋ es a, ɛbɛn ɛm yɛji m’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny abusu nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ.
42022030	Ɛm ec’ es ɛw ab ɛm a, b’ow ijr ob, ɛgŋn, ɛtŋ b’ow ɛcr okr es mɛkpn af ɛ́wr Israɛl ec’eb lɛw yony a es."
42022031	Eke li dad low na bake ow uwr a, Jesu am lɛr Piɛr ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Simɔ, ìgŋ lɔru es iri! Satan ibrm abusu eke b’ow ɔny ufŋ ɔny ɛsɛ egbey eke wɛl bi cic suw es ɛm af.
42022032	Kɔ mi ŋɔŋn Nyam m’ɔŋ’ŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ŋ ec’ɔmn a k’ɔ́bm mɛny. Kɔ ŋ yɛji, lɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛwl ow el ɛm ec’a, àtr esŋ jimɛl a sos es."
42022033	Low na eke li dad a, Piɛr ɔdu odad eb ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, mi bɛbm sos eke mi k’ɛy sobel ɛm ŋ ab, ke m’úw ŋ ab."
42022034	Kɔ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Piɛr m’am dad’ŋ, ncok a cɛ, ŋgɔs k’ow ikŋm ɛtŋ b’ow ɛgbr sakp nyahan dad eke uwm im any."
42022035	Ɛmɛny Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ a eke m’ɛrm ɔny ke ocmn os, ekpr lele cɔkrukpɔ ab ke imn a, kɔ ɔnyn low nyam ec’es abur ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "S’ɔnym low kaka ec’es abur!"
42022036	Ɛtŋ ninɛ: "Kɔ sica, ɔny ec’ɛgŋ ek’ɔny os a, l’óc gɔŋ. Ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ekpr a yɛji l’óc; ke ɛgŋ ek’ɔnym lab a, l’ɔ́l in e mob sus ɛm a l’ij ke l’ɔ́l lab.
42022037	Kɔ m’am dad ɔny nawrɛ ɛm, ow akpl ke Nyam Lɛl ɛm ec’odad na eke wɛl nɔn ɛm e lís a íy nɛny: Wɛl awl’l low ŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl ɛm a. Ɛɛ, ɛm e lís e low a eke wɛl nɔn a b’ow iy nɛny!"
42022038	Ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kin s’ɔnym mab ler ɛm yony ab!" Ɛtŋ Jesu ubr odad a es ninɛ: "Na cɛ ow ɛny ŋ̂!"
42022039	Sica Jesu ɛy ɔkm im Olivie lafɛny af ɛsɛ elel eke li bi kok god’ɛtŋ ab af. In e jam ɛsɛl a yɛji us’r jam ab im.
42022040	Eke -n’imn ba -li b’ok yogŋ a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɛ́ymn ɛbm ɛkn owi ɛm."
42022041	L’ɛlu wɛl es n’im anym kpekpe tɛl, ɛtŋ yogŋ l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam li dad l’ɛsɛ:
42022042	"Ɛs, eke erur, ke ɔ̀ny gbre ij e mij kpɔk na kpab’m es lís. Ke fɛŋ ɛm a, ow k’él yec’a eke m’am erur a, kɔ yec’a eke am erur a."
42022043	[Kpɛkŋ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ am atr’r sos es.
42022044	Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, Jesu am ij ɛrm ɛm e gbre ɛtŋ am ŋɔŋn Nyam lɛc ɛm toŋ law am ok’r. Ɛtŋ in e law a am sus ok wus ɛsɛ mebl ekuey af.]
42022045	Eke ni ŋɔŋn Nyam bake ow uwr a, l’igb wus ɛtŋ l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow n’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl a, kɔ sos ɔw ɛl es toŋ ow el ɛl mɛmn.
42022046	Eke n’ɛŋan wɛl mɛmn ɛru ɛm a, l’uwr wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɛrur mɛmn ee? Ìgbr wus ke ŋɔ́ŋan yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɛ́ymn ɛbm ɛkn owi ɛm."
42022047	Jesu odad anŋ nɛnym am dad, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ilm any. Ɛtŋ Judas ek’el jam ɛsɛl lɛw yony ab ɛm e nyam a anake am nyimn ɛl a. Eke -l’owr -l’okr yogŋ a, Judas im titm Jesu eke k’ɛy’raf.
42022048	Kɔ Jesu ibrm’n ninɛ: "Judas, kɔ af ɛy ɛm am ɔl ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ij ee?"
42022049	Eke jam ɛsɛl a am ɛkn low a eke am ow ɛy a, -l’ibrm Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ s’ógŋ ɛl mum ɛy e mab ler ɛm ab ab ee?"
42022050	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam iyr egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ec’abu ɛlum ɛs a lab, ɛtŋ l’ubr ow lidr e lɔru ab es.
42022051	Kɔ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ow ínym es gɔŋ!" Ɛtŋ l’itŋn igŋ a e lɔru a abu, ɛtŋ l’ewlm ow.
42022052	Sica li dad egb waw ɛsɛl a, Nyamel gbɛl a ec’ɔsu ɛsɛl ec’agŋ ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp a eke ow ɛl ab in ec’ɔny ec’a ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛm ec’ɔny a ibrm eke k’otr ekŋ ekpr lele mab ler ɛm ab owr ɛsɛ low ŋuŋ kok ɛs ɛm el af ee?
42022053	Sɛgŋ eke m’anŋ ɔny ab Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a ɔnymn’m. Kɔ sica ɔny e wanci eke k’ɔnyn’m a ow ŋ̂; catŋ ncebn ec’abusu a ow a."
42022054	Sica -n’ɔny Jesu ɛtŋ -l’oc ow ab -n’im egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a e gbugŋ a. Piɛr anŋ akpoj ɛm am us ɛl jam.
42022055	Wɛl fuf al lakp a ec’araŋn, agŋ ok es did al ɛlul ɛm a, ɛtŋ Piɛr yɛji im sig es ɛl ab.
42022056	Ob oc ɔŋ lis nyam ɛkn’n eke li sig es al saw a, l’ok ow anyamn af n’am lɛr ow gbiy, ɛtŋ ninɛ: "Igŋ na yɛji, n’anŋ Jesu ab!"
42022057	Kɔ Piɛr ɛgbr Jesu ɛtŋ dad ob oc ɔŋ lis a ninɛ: "Yɔw, m’uwm’n any."
42022058	Eke ow ibn tɛl a, ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam yɛji ɛkn’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ yɛji, el ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam." Kɔ li dad igŋ a ninɛ: "Njaŋ, m’anm ɛl ɛm!"
42022059	Ow ibn toŋ k’ij wanci nyam ka, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam at dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi ɛgŋ na yɛji el in ec’agŋ ab ɛm e nyam, aŋke l’el Galile iy."
42022060	Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "M’uwm ŋ e low yeci eke am erur eke ki dad ab any!" Odad na anŋ’n nɛnym n’am dad ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ŋgɔs ikŋ.
42022061	Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛwl mɛny ɔkŋ’n any am lɛr’r gbiy. Ow ɔŋ Piɛr ɔkn odad a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r a: "Gbuŋ ke yɛfɛnyna ŋgɔs íkŋ a, b’ow dad sakp nyahan eke uwm im any."
42022062	Ɛtŋ Piɛr ɛy ɔkm im gbeŋ am ikŋ low dudu ec’ɔŋn.
42022063	Agŋ ek’am ɔsu Jesu a am kokr’r miyɛr ɛtŋ am ɔr’r.
42022064	-N’awŋ ow any es, -n’am ɔr ow kukuta ɛm, -n’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Ek’el Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs, ke dád ɛy ɛgŋ ek’iyr’ŋ ob a!"
42022065	Ɛtŋ -n’am dad ów eŋuŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl -l’ok ow af miyɛr kokr ɛm.
42022066	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Jwifɛl ɛm ec’agŋ ekpekp a ek’el egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab as luku. -N’ɔŋ wɛl oc Jesu ow Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af,
42022067	ɛtŋ -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Dàd ɛy s’íri gɔŋ! Kɔ ŋ el Mesi ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke mi dad ɔny yɛji, k’ow ubmn nawrɛ;
42022068	ɛtŋ eke m’ibrm ɔny low yɛji, k’ow ɛgŋmn dadmn’m.
42022069	Kɔ jam aŋa ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow sig es Nyam Abusu Ɛs e lidr abu af."
42022070	Ɛl fɛŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Ke Nyam ec’Iy el a!" Ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ow kpɛŋ anake ɔny obi dadr a."
42022071	Ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Ow akplm eke si k’ibrm adaŋku ij! Sica ɛy obi yɛji s’iri’r nɛnym ŋ̂!"
42023001	Eke -li jɛjr Jesu ec’ów -l’okr bake ow uwr a, dedeku a nimum igb wus ɛtŋ oc Jesu ab im Pilat ec’any af.
42023002	Yogŋ, kpɛkŋ -n’am cicr ow -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "S’ɛbmn nyamn s’ɛkn eke ɛgŋ na am irmn ɛy ec’agŋ a; li bi dad wɛl eke wɛl kí sɔgm wus labm ɛtŋ li b’ocr in sosi Mesi, ɛb ebu nyam."
42023003	Ɛtŋ Pilat ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ nawrɛ, ŋ Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu ee?" Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ obi dad."
42023004	Ɛbɛn a, Pilat dad egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele bieku ab ab ninɛ: "M’ɛŋnm low ɔbr kaka igŋ na ɛm."
42023005	Gbɛkɔ -n’am at lebl es -li dad lɛc ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na bi dad agŋ eke k’ɔbr ɛb any. L’ɔb ow e low yɛgm nuŋ Galile ɛtŋ, toŋ l’ow l’ok Jude wus af, ɛtŋ sica l’ow aŋa yɛji."
42023006	Eke Pilat iri odad na a, l’ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ ɛgŋ na Galile ec’ɛgŋ ee?"
42023007	Eke wɛl dad’r eke Jesu el Galile ec’ɛgŋ, ke l’uw any eke yogŋ anŋ Erɔd ec’es ɛw ɛm a, n’ɔŋ wɛl oc Jesu im ow ec’any af, aŋke Erɔd in obi yɛji lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, n’anŋ Jerusalɛm.
42023008	Eke l’ɛkn ow a, sos ɛm am iŋn’n aŋke l’iri wɛl dad’r ow e lís e low, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ n’am erur eke li k’ɛŋn ow bake ow kok mɛny ɛwr nyam l’ɛ́kn.
42023009	Li bibrm ow ów nɔnɔ, kɔ Jesu ɔbm kpu kaka ɔɔm’n.
42023010	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab yɛji ek’anŋ yogŋ a am cicr Jesu lɛc ɛm.
42023011	Ɛtŋ Erɔd lele in eci srɔda eyŋ ab ab am kokr Jesu miyɛr, ɛtŋ am oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ keskes af. -L’ɛw ow mob sus ɛm mamn sos, ɛtŋ l’ɛwlm ow mɛny ow im Pilat ogŋ a.
42023012	Lɛgŋ a cɛ, Erɔd lele Pilat ab eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm ijarm a, ɛwl el agŋ lawlɛl.
42023013	Eke Pilat am ɛkn eke low ɔbr kaka anm Jesu ɛm a, l’as egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a, es ɛw ɛsɛl a lele dedeku a fɛŋ ab luku,
42023014	ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ocr ɛgŋ na isr’m ɛtŋ am dadr eke ow’n am irmn agŋ. Na sosiɛm m’ibrm’n low ɔny ec’any af. Kɔ kin, m’ɛŋnm low ŋuŋ kaka eke li kok ke ow sosiɛm am ɔŋn in dedeku a.
42023015	Ɛbɛn nyam coco, Erɔd yɛji ɛŋnm low ɔbr kaka in ɛm, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm l’ɛwlm ow mɛny. M’am ɛkn ke ɛgŋ na kokm low ɔbr kaka ek’it eke wɛl k’ibi’r.
42023016	Gbɛkɔ m’ow m’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr’r ŋgbre ɛm, ke m’ɛ́lu’l es."
42023017	[ Pak ec’es gbɛgbl fɛŋ e lɛgŋ a, ow akpl ke Pilat ɛ́lu sobel ɛm ɛs nyam eke dedeku a b’erur a es.]
42023018	Eke Pilat dad ɛl ɛbɛn a, kpɛkŋ -n’am ɔg ɛl fɛŋ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ìbi ɛgŋ na, ke ɛ́lu Barabas es ɔŋ ɛy!"
42023019	(Ke Barabas na, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke bɔbar ɛy Jerusalɛm baŋn a, in anake wɛl ɛlu’l sobel ɛm a, aŋke l’ɔbr ɛb any, ɛtŋ l’ibi ɛgŋ yɛji.)
42023020	Gbɛkɔ eke Pilat am erur eke k’ɛlu Jesu es a, ɛmɛny l’ibrm eke li k’iri dedeku a nɛnym.
42023021	Kɔ -n’am ɛlu Pilat lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af! Ɛ̀w’r olikŋ af!"
42023022	Ɛmɛny Pilat eb odad sakp nyahan ɛm ɛtŋ ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Bla low ɔbr iy li kok ee? Ɛm gbɛ m’ɛknm low ɔbr kaka in ɛm ek’it eke wɛl k’ibi’r; gbɛkɔ m’ow m’ɔŋ wɛl ɔ́r’r ŋgbre ɛm, ke m’ɛ́lu’l es."
42023023	Kɔ dedeku a nɛny anŋ ɛm cɛ am ibrm sɔ́g ɛm eke wɛl k’ɛw Jesu olikŋ af. Ɛtŋ ɛl e sɔ́g e lebl a akm Pilat es.
42023024	Ɛtŋ Pilat ɛgŋ dedeku a ec’a ek’am ibrm a eb.
42023025	L’ɛlu Barabas ek’ɔbr ɛb any, ibi ɛgŋ ke ow sosiɛm wɛl ɛlu sobel ɛm a es. Ɛtŋ l’oc Jesu n’ɔŋ dedeku a yec’ɛtŋ -li kok ow ɛl e low eke -n’am erur a.
42023026	Eke -l’ocr ow ab -n’aam a, -l’ɔbr Sirɛn baŋn iy nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ ek’anŋ akp ɛm am ow. Eke srɔda eyŋ a b’ɛkn’n a, -n’ɔny ow lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ -l’oc Jesu ec’olikŋ a -n’ɔŋ ow eke ow k’abu us ow jam.
42023027	Agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl am us’r jam, ɛtŋ ɔyɔw nɔnɔ ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm a am ikŋ ɔŋn ok sabu ɛrmni in sosiɛm.
42023028	Eke Jesu b’ɛwl mɛny a, n’am lɛr wɛl ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Jerusalɛm ec’ɔyɔw, k’ìkŋn ɔŋn ɛm sosiɛm; kɔ ìkŋn ɔny lele ɔny ec’ey ab eci!
42023029	Kɔ lɛgŋ am ow eke agŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: 'Ehe él etr yɔw eke ewm ey, ke ɔɔm ey mɛny lɛgŋ kaka a eci!'
42023030	Lɛgŋ ab anake agŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: 'Mafɛny, bùbmn okr ɛy af! Egigl, bùburir ɛy es a!'
42023031	Tasi ɛm a, eke wɛl am kok likŋ ek’anŋ owr a nɛnɛ, ke likŋ wɛwɛ ec’a ayaf wɛl b’ow kokr’r ab ee?"
42023032	Srɔda eyŋ a oc agŋ ɛjeci yony ek’el ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl yɛji ow eke wɛl k’ibi ɛl Jesu ab.
42023033	Eke -n’imn usu a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Nuŋ kpɔk ec’usu a', -l’ɛw Jesu lele ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl yony ab ab olikŋ af; Jesu anŋ araŋn, nyam anŋ’n lidr abu af, ɛtŋ nyam anŋ’n nɛmn abu af.
42023034	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, òc ap ɛl aŋke -l’uwm yec’eke -n’am kok ab any." Srɔda eyŋ a cɛc in e mob sus ɛm sɔsum oc kok ɛm.
42023035	Agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a am lɛr’r. Ɛtŋ Jwifɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a am kokr’r miyɛr dad ɛsɛ: "L’eb agŋ ɛjeci l’ɛlu es; eke l’el Mesi eke Nyam sɔsum oc a, ke l’ébr in sosi s’ɛkn!"
42023036	Srɔda eyŋ a yɛji am kokr’r miyɛr. -Li b’im -li titm ow, -l’oc ɛl e mar a -n’am ɔkŋ ow ke -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ:
42023037	"Ek’el Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu, ke ébr ŋ sosi ɛlu es gɔŋ!"
42023038	In ec’olikŋ a e nuŋ af a, -ni nɔn odad na -l’aru: 'Ɛgŋ na el Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ebu.'
42023039	Ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl a eke wɛl ok olikŋ af ab ɛm a yɛji, nyam am wɛwr Jesu dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ŋ elm Mesi ee? Ek’el Mesi, ke èbr ŋ sosi ɛlu es, bake ɛy yɛji éb ɛlu ɛy es ɔ!"
42023040	Odad na eke li dad a, lawl a am ɛym’n abr dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛ́luam Nyam ee? Ŋ yɛji am ij gbre ɛsɛ in af.
42023041	Ɛy ec’a, ow it eke si k’ij gbre, aŋke ɛy ec’ów eŋuŋ e si kok a e labm sɔg anake s’ɛŋn a. Kɔ in, li kokm low ŋuŋ kaka!"
42023042	Eke li dad odad na a, ɛmɛny li dad ninɛ: "Jesu, k’ìjl’m es lɛgŋ eke b’ow ow ŋ ec’es ɛw ab ɛm a."
42023043	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "M’am dad’ŋ nawrɛ ɛm, yɛfɛnyna cɛ b’ow anŋ ɛm ab Nyam ec’ usu mamn a."
42023044	Sica ow anŋ tɛl ke lɛgŋ úyu nuŋ, ɛtŋ ligbn a ek’am afŋ a irm es; ncebn ɛy wus na nimum af toŋ ncebles eci wanci nyahan ɛm.
42023045	Ɛtŋ Nyamel ab ɛm eci gbad gbɛl gbada a eke wɛl ɛw ɛdŋn usu lala ab any a, igŋ afr ɛm a ɛtŋ agbr ɛm araŋn didi toŋ ok esr ɛm a.
42023046	Ɛtŋ Jesu barm lebl tuɔtuɔ dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Ɛs, m’oc ɛm ec’abŋ a m’ɛlu’ŋ abu ɛm." Li dad odad na ba li b’ok es, ɛtŋ l’uw.
42023047	Eke Rom eci srɔda eyŋ a ec’anym ɛs a ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a, n’am kɔklm Nyam li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, ɛgŋ na el nɛny nyam ɛs!"
42023048	Agŋ a ek’ow yogŋ a yɛji ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a. Ɛl e mɛny ɛwl ɛm a, -n’am ok sabu ɛrmni low dudu ɛm -n’im.
42023049	Ɛtŋ Jesu lawlɛl lele ɔyɔw a ek’us’r jam Galile ɛtŋ a, inym es akpoj, ɛtŋ am ɛkn low na ek’am ɛy a.
42023050	-
42023051	Ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Josɛf, Jwifɛl eci baŋn eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Arimate ec’ɛgŋ, erur eke k’oc Jesu im oc es. L’el ɛgŋ mamn, nɛny nyam ɛs, ek’ɔmn ɛm am eku Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a e mowrer. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’el Jwifɛl e Sanedrɛn ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam, kɔ l’erurm low a eke lawlɛl a bɛbm Jesu ec’ibi ec’a.
42023052	Na sosiɛm, n’im n’ɛŋn Pilat ɛtŋ l’ibrm eke ow k’oc Jesu eci sos megl a ɔŋ’n.
42023053	Eke Pilat ɛlu abusu es a, Josɛf ɔny sos megl a usm es olikŋ ab af, l’oc gbad ufu nyam li wiwrm ow ab, ɛtŋ l’oc n’im l’oc ow es uwɔmu lob eke n’ɔŋ wɛl ur ab ɛm, ke lɛgŋ kaka wɛl ocm ɛgŋ es ɛm.
42023054	Lɛgŋ a el nɛnɛgŋ e sos bɛbm e lɛgŋ, ɛtŋ nɛnɛgŋ a yɛji ow titm.
42023055	Eke Josɛf aam oc Jesu es a, ɔyɔw a eke am us Jesu jam Galile ɛtŋ a, ow yogŋ ɛtŋ ɛkn uwɔmu a lele elel eke wɛl ɛrum’n es ab ab.
42023056	-L’ɛwl mɛny -n’im ɛl ogŋ a, ɛtŋ -li kok mun sŋɔsŋɔ lele simijey ab eke -li ki kpakp Jesu e sos megl a. Gbɛkɔ eke lɛgŋ a el nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, ow sosiɛm -n’am eb sel ɛsɛ elel eke Jwifɛl ec’ol a dad ab af.
42024001	Sica lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ a ec’ibribr fafa a, ɔyɔw a ot mun sŋɔsŋɔ eke -li kokr ab ab aam Jesu ec’ uwɔmu ab af.
42024002	Eke -li b’ok yogŋ a, -l’ɛkn eke lob a eke abl uwɔmu a ec’ɛm ɛy usu ab es a wuwl oc es,
42024003	ɛtŋ -l’ok uwɔmu ab ɛm. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛknm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e sos megl a,
42024004	ɛtŋ ca -l’uwmn elel eke -li ki dadr any. Kpɛkŋ Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yony eke sus mob ek’am jɛjn a ok ɔkm ɛl ec’any af.
42024005	Eke ɔyɔw a b’ɛkn ɛl a, erŋn am ɔny ɛl -li sis any es, ɛtŋ ow ɔdm eke -li ki lɛr wɛl. Ɛtŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɔɔl agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, ɛgŋ ek’anŋ owr ab ee?
42024006	N’anm aŋa; l’igb luw ɛm. Ɔ̀kan ow a eke li dad ɔny lɛgŋ a eke n’anŋ Galile a:
42024007	'Ow akpl ke wɛl óc ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ɛ́lu sikpl ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm, ke wɛl bábl’l ecigbrɔ olikŋ af, ke sɛgŋ nyahan n’ánŋ luw ɛm l’igb.' "
42024008	Ɛtŋ ɔyɔw a ɔkn odad a eke Jesu dad ɛl a.
42024009	-N’ŋgboŋ uwɔmu ab af, ɛtŋ -n’im -n’am dad ów a fɛŋ ek’ɛy a -l’ok jam ɛsɛl lɛw nyam a lele agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab.
42024010	Ɔyɔw a el: Mari, Magdala yɔwi a, Jana, lele Mari, Jak lis ab. Ɛtŋ ɔyɔw bɛb a ek’anŋ ɛl ab yɛji, dad odad nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ ok ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
42024011	Kɔ ɛrm ɛsɛl a am tutr eke ow el yadŋ owi, ɛtŋ -n’ɔnym ɔmn odad a eke ɔyɔw a dad ɛl ab ɛm.
42024012	Ɛbɛn a Piɛr uru es im uwɔmu ab af, l’is any li lɛr uwɔmu ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn gbad a eke wɛl oc wiwrm sos megl ab ab a cɛ ek’ɛru es. Low na eke l’ɛkn a iti’r any, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl mɛny n’im.
42024013	Lɛgŋ a cɛ, jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ yony aam baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Emayus, ke Jerusalɛm ab a, án es wanci yony gbuŋ ke ók yogŋ.
42024014	Ejagb ab af eke -n’aam a, -n’am dad low a ek’ɛy a ec’odad.
42024015	Eke -n’am dad odad -l’atar ów es a, Jesu in obi ow ɛŋn ɛl, ɛtŋ us ejagb ɛl ab aam.
42024016	-N’am ɛkn ow gɔŋ, kɔ -l’uwmn ow any.
42024017	Ɛtŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Bla ów iy am atarir es ee?" Sos ɔw ɛl es, ɛtŋ -l’uk -n’inym es.
42024018	Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kleopas dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ sɔny cɛ el ɛgŋ ek’ir Jerusalɛm aŋa, ke uwm low na ek’ɛy sɛgŋ amua ɛm ab any ee?"
42024019	Jesu ibrm ninɛ: "Kɔ bla lowi ɛy?" Ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Nasarɛt iy Jesu e lís e low. Ɛgŋ na el kokoba ɔb ɛs abusu ɛs; ɛtŋ l’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm in e juma kok ɛm lele in ec’odad ebl ɛm ab, Nyam ec’any af lele agŋ ec’any af ab.
42024020	Kɔ ɛy ec’ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele ɛy e Nyamel ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab oc im’n wɛl ɔb’r low, ɛw’r olikŋ af wɛl ibi’r.
42024021	Ɛy s’ɔmn eke in anake li b’ow li sɔg Israɛl a. Ɛtŋ kin, yɛfɛnyna ab ow ij sɛgŋ nyahan eke l’uw wɛl oc’r es.
42024022	Gbɛkɔ ɛy ɛm ec’ɔyɔw bɛb dad ɛy low any iti owi tasi. Ibribr a -l’igb fafa -n’im uwɔmu ab af,
42024023	ɛtŋ -l’ɛknm ow e sos megl a. -L’ɛwl mɛny -l’ow -li dad ɛy eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yony in ok ɔkm in dad ɛl eke Jesu in anŋ owr.
42024024	Ɛy ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb yɛji im uwɔmu ab af ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn low a ɛsɛ elel eke ɔyɔw a dad ɛy ab af. Gbɛkɔ ow gbɛ, -l’ɛknm ow."
42024025	-Li dad odad na ba -li b’ok es, ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Oy! Anyamb agŋ, úbmn kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad eke dad a nawrɛ!
42024026	Kɔ uwmn any eke Mesi a k’ij gbre ɛbɛn gbuŋ ke l’ɛ́y in ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm ee?"
42024027	Ɛtŋ n’am otar ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam Lɛl dad in e lís a e low akr l’ok wɛl. L’ɔb nuŋ Mois ec’ol ab ɛm toŋ l’igŋ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’ów a e dad ab ɛm.
42024028	Eke -n’imn bake -n’am titm baŋn a, Jesu kok ɛsɛ anym eci ow’n k’imn af.
42024029	Kɔ agŋ yony a dad’r ninɛ: "K’ìm; ànŋ ɛy ab eke lɛgŋ am uk, ke ncebn am ow a sosiɛm." Ɛtŋ n’im n’ɛŋn wɛl -n’anŋ.
42024030	Eke ow sig wanci eke -li k’ij ob a, Jesu oc futufutu a, l’ɛlu Nyam bia, l’ubr ɛm n’ɔŋ wɛl.
42024031	Kpɛkŋ jam ɛsɛl yony a anyamn ɛm ayl, ɛtŋ -l’uw ow any; kpɛkŋ l’irm wɛl ec’any af.
42024032	Ɛtŋ -n’am dadarir -l’ɛsɛ: "Eke s’us ejagb s’am ow, ke n’am otar Nyam Lɛl ɛm ec’ów akr l’ok ɛy a, lɛfr mɛnŋ am itr ɛy sos!"
42024033	Kpɛkŋ -l’ɛwl mɛny -n’im Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl lɛw nyam a eke as luku lele ɛl lawlɛl ab ab,
42024034	ke ok es am dad ɛsɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ igb luw ɛm batŋ Simɔ ɛkn’n!"
42024035	Ɛtŋ ɛl yɛji -n’am dad low a eke -l’ɛkan ejagb af a, lele elel eke -l’uwr Jesu any, futufutu a eke n’am ubr ɛm ab ɛm.
42024036	Eke odad anŋ ɛl nɛnym -n’am dad a, Jesu in obi ɛy ɔkm ɛl ec’araŋn ɛtŋ ɛsŋn ɛl: "Ɛrm es ɛy ánŋ ɔny ab!"
42024037	Kpɛkŋ erŋn ligbɛl am ɔny ɛl aŋke -n’am tutr eke ɔŋn abŋ anake -l’ɛkan a.
42024038	Kɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ bla ɛtŋ erŋn am ɔny ɔny ufŋn ee? Bla ɛtŋ úbmn nawrɛ ee?
42024039	Ɛ̀kan ɛm e sabu araŋn a lele ɛm ec’akr ab ab; ɛm obi ana! Ìtŋnin’m abu ke ɛ́kan. Ɔŋnabŋ ɛ́lim sos megl lele ew ab ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɛli am ɛkan ab af!"
42024040	Eke li dad wɛl odad na a, li yɛgm wɛl in e sabu araŋn a lele in ec’akr ab ab.
42024041	Sos ɛm am iŋn ɛl, gbɛkɔ ow am iti ɛl any ɛtŋ -li k’ubm nawrɛ tasi. Ow ɔŋ Jesu ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔnyamn ob ij tɛl ab aŋa ee?"
42024042	Ɛtŋ -l’oc ɔcn ikpr eke wɛl ɔw a -n’ɔŋ ow.
42024043	Jesu eb ɔcn a ij ɛl ec’any af.
42024044	Sica li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛ̀kan ów amua, mi dad ɔny ow e low lɛgŋ a eke m’anŋ ɔny ab a. Mi dad ɔny eke ów a fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔn ɛm e lís ke anŋ Mois ec’ ol ab ɛm, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e lɛl ɛm, toŋ igŋ Selu e lɛl ɛm a b’ow iy nɛny."
42024045	Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu eke wɛl k’iri Nyam Lɛl ɛm ec’odad a ók ɛl es sos ɛm.
42024046	Ca l’ɔkn wɛl ów a li dad ninɛ: "Kin ow eke wɛl nɔn: ow akpl ke Mesi úw, ke sɛgŋ nyahan n’ánŋ luw ɛm l’igb,
42024047	ke wɛl yɛ́gm ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ low in e nin ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ítŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke -n’ɛŋn ɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap. Ow ɔ́b nuŋ Jerusalɛm,
42024048	ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow eel ów amua ec’adaŋku.
42024049	Ɛtŋ m’ow m’awŋ ɔny Abŋ Lala a eke ɛm Ɛs ɛwar ow e low a. Gbɛkɔ ànŋn baŋn toŋ bake afr ec’abusu a ów ɛŋn ɔny."
42024050	Eke li dad wɛl ów amua bake ow uwr a, ca Jesu ot ok ɛl ɔkm, ɛtŋ ɛl ab -n’im -li titm Betani, ɛtŋ yogŋ li gbigbl sabu ogŋ l’ɛdŋ wɛl ɔwrɔ.
42024051	Eke n’am ɛdŋ wɛl ɔwrɔ a, l’ɛlu wɛl es ɛtŋ n’im afr.
42024052	Jam ɛsɛl a igŋ’n nuŋ, ɛtŋ ɛwl mɛny ow Jerusalɛm sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm.
42024053	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ -li b’anŋ Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm -li kɔklm Nyam.
43001001	Nuŋ ɔb ɛm e low fɛŋ e kok ɛm a, ke Odad anŋ ŋ̂. Ɛgŋ a eke el odad a okr af Nyam ab, ɛtŋ Odad a el Nyam.
43001002	Nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ Odad okr af Nyam ab.
43001003	Nyam oc’r kokr’r ob fɛŋ; ob kaka anm eke wɛl kok ke n’anm ɛm;
43001004	fɛŋ a eke wɛl kok a ɛŋn sel in ɛm. Sel ikŋ na el agŋ eci usuayl.
43001005	Usuayl am afŋ ncebn ɛm ɛtŋ ncebn ebm’n.
43001006	Nyam ɛrm ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jan ow.
43001007	N’am ow ɛsɛ daŋku af, ke l’íj usuayl e daŋku yec’ɛtŋ ke in ɛm agŋ a fɛŋ úb nawrɛ.
43001008	In obi a l’elm usuayl, kɔ usuayl eci daŋku cɛ l’ij.
43001009	Usuayl ikŋ na el usuayl tasi a ek’am ow wus af aŋa ayal agŋ fɛŋ a.
43001010	Odad a anŋ wus af aŋa. Nyam oc’r kokr’r wus, kɔ wus uwm’n any.
43001011	L’ow in ec’agŋ ɛm, kɔ in ec’agŋ ɛgŋm ebm’n.
43001012	Gbɛkɔ agŋ bɛb eb’r ɛtŋ ɔny ɔmn in ɛm; n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu eke wɛl k’el Nyam ec’ey.
43001013	Ow elm sos megl af e mew ab ɛm, oglog ɛgŋ ec’erur ɛm -l’elm Nyam ec’ey, kɔ Nyam ec’erur ɛm -l’el Nyam ec’ey.
43001014	Odad a ɛwl el ɛgŋ ɛtŋ ir ɛb ɛy ab; Nyam ec’erur eke ítŋnm lele nɛny nyam ij ab iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ. S’ɛkn in ec’anygbɛl a, anygbɛl eke Iy b’ɛŋn Ɛs ɛm.
43001015	Jan ij in e daŋku. L’ɛlu lebl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ a eke m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ’m jam am ow, kɔ n’ɔny any l’akm’m aŋke l’ikŋ anym n’anŋ gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’anŋ a,' ke in ec’odad anake m’am dad a."
43001016	Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ s’ɛŋn in eci aja ab ɛm eci ɔwrɔ a, tasi li yibr ɛy ow bobn.
43001017	S’ɛŋn ol Mois ɛm, kɔ Nyam ec’erur ek’ítŋnm a lele nɛny nyam ij ab a, anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow.
43001018	Lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ɛknm Nyam, kɔ Iy ekpɔbi a sɔny coco eke el Nyam ke anŋ Ɛs ab a cɛ ɛlu’l ɔkm.
43001019	Jwifɛl e nuŋ af ɛsɛl ek’el Jerusalɛm ec’a ɛrm egb waw ɛsɛl lele Leviɛl ab Jan ogŋ a eke -li k’ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ŋ bwo el ŋ ee?" Kin Jan eci daŋku ek’ij.
43001020	Jan ɔnynm sos es odad a e dad ɛm ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eci any af li dad l’ɛrum mar ninɛ: "Ɛm, m’elm Mesi a."
43001021	-L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛtŋ ŋ bwo ee? Kɔ ŋ Eli ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "Njaŋ, m’elm Eli." -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ Kokoba ɔb ɛs ab ee?" Ninɛ: "Njaŋ."
43001022	Ɛmɛny -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ke sica ŋ bwo el ŋ ee? Agŋ a ek’ɛrm ɛy a, odad si k’ɔny si dad ɛl. Kɔ ŋ ayaf am ocr ŋ sosi ee?"
43001023	Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛm, m’el ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ loj am ɛlu lebl dad ɛsɛ: Kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ejagb a ínym sɛnyn sɛnyn a!" (Kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi ec’odad eke dad ab ana.)
43001024	-
43001025	Ke ɛ́rmu ab ɛm Farisiɛl anŋ eke ɛmɛny am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Eke batŋ elm Mesi a, elm Eli, elm Kokoba ɔb ɛs a, ke bla k’ɔŋ k’am ok agŋ mij nuŋ ee?"
43001026	Jan dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm, m’am ok ɔny mij nuŋ mij ɛm; gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke uwmn any.
43001027	N’anŋ’m jam n’am ow, ɛtŋ m’itm bɔbɔ yɛji eke mi ki mɔmu in e cɔkrukpɔ meb ab es."
43001028	Ów amua fɛŋ am ɛy Betani ɛb ɛm Jurdɛn jam, yogŋ a eke Jan am ok agŋ mij nuŋ a.
43001029	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, Jan ɛkn Jesu ek’am ow in ogŋ ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Kin Nyam e licɛbli a eke b’ow ɔny wus na e sikpl oc es a.
43001030	Lɛgŋ a eke m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ’m jam am ow, n’ɔny any l’akm’m, aŋke l’ikŋ anym n’anŋ gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’anŋ a,' ke in ec’odad anake m’am dad a.
43001031	M’uwm ɛgŋ a ek’ow k’el ab any, gbɛkɔ m’ow eke mi k’ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɔ́ŋ Israɛl ec’agŋ a uw’r any."
43001032	Ɛmɛny l’ij daŋku li dad ninɛ: "M’ɛkn Abŋ Lala ek’anŋ afr us es ɛsɛ kel af ke sig’r es af.
43001033	Ke mi k’uwm ɛgŋ eke l’el ab any, gbɛkɔ Nyam eke ɛrm’m m’ow eke mi k’ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm a dad’m ninɛ: 'B’ow ɛkn Abŋ eke b’ow us es ke sig es ɛgŋ nyam af, in anake li b’ow l’ok agŋ mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm a.'
43001034	M’ɛkn low na ɛtŋ m’am ij daŋku eke ɛgŋ na el Nyam ec’Iy."
43001035	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, ɛmɛny Jan lele in e jam ɛsɛl yony ab anŋ yogŋ.
43001036	Eke l’ɛkn Jesu ek’am ɛc a, li dad ninɛ: "Kin Nyam eci licɛbli a ɔ!"
43001037	Eke Jan eci jam ɛsɛl yony a iri odad na a, -l’us ow jam.
43001038	Jesu ɛwl sos mɛny, l’ɛkn eke agŋ yony am us’r jam, ɛtŋ l’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny, bla am ɔɔl ee?" -L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Rabi, kɔ ŋ bogŋ ir ee?" (Rabi e nyandrɛ el 'Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs.')
43001039	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Òwr, b’ow ɛkan." Ke ow am titm ncebles eci wanci yar. -N’im -l’ɛkn yogŋ a eke l’ir a, ɛtŋ -n’anŋ ow ab lɛgŋ ikpr a.
43001040	Agŋ a ek’iri Jan eci sodad a ke us Jesu jam a e nyam el Andre, Simɔ Piɛr lisijim.
43001041	L’ikŋ anym n’im l’ɛkn lisijim Simɔ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "S’ɛŋn Mesi a." (Mesi a e nyandrɛ el 'Krist'.)
43001042	Andre ɛwl Simɔ Jesu ogŋ a. Jesu lɛr’r seŋ ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ Simɔ, Jan jim; wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ’ŋ Kefas." (Ow e nyandrɛ el 'Lob'.)
43001043	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, Jesu ɛw eke k’im Galile ɛtŋ l’ɔbr Filip. Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ùs’m jam!"
43001044	(Filip a Bɛtsayida ɛb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ; ɛb na anake Andre lele Piɛr ab yɛji el ow ec’agŋ a.)
43001045	Filip ɔbr Natanaɛl ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Natanaɛl, ɛgŋ a eke Mois dad in ec’odad ol e lɛl ab ɛm, ke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad ow ec’odad a, s’ɛŋn’n. Ɛgŋ a, Nasarɛt e Jesu, Josɛf jim."
43001046	Natanaɛl dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ Nasarɛt yɛji, low mamn ɔtu eke k’anŋ ow ee?" Filip dad’r ninɛ: "Òw, ke ɛ́kn."
43001047	Eke Jesu ɛkn Natanaɛl ek’am ow titm’n a, n’am dad ow e lís e low l’ɛsɛ: "Kin Israɛl iy tasi; in ɛm mɛju owi kaka anm."
43001048	Natanaɛl ibrm’n ninɛ: "Kɔ ayaf uwr’m any ee?" Li dad ninɛ: "Eke anŋ babm e likŋ a ec’ew a, gbuŋ ke Filip ɛ́sŋ’ŋ a, ke m’ɛkn’ŋ."
43001049	Af yogŋ Natanaɛl dad’r ninɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, ŋ Nyam ec’Iy tasi, ŋ Israɛl ec’ɛb ebu tasi!"
43001050	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Mi bi dad m’ɛsɛ, m’ɛkn’ŋ babm e likŋ a ec’ew a ek’anŋ a, ke kpɛkŋ úb’m nawrɛ ee? B’ow ɛkn ów ek’agb akm na!"
43001051	Ɛtŋ l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: b’ow ɛkan afr eke b’ow fig ke Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ám uyu, ke ám us es ɛgŋ ec’ Iy e nuŋ af."
43002001	Eke sɛgŋ yony ɛc a, mɛbi ec’es gbɛgbl nyam ɛy Kana ɛb ɛm, Galile wus af; Jesu lis yɛji anŋ ɛm.
43002002	Wɛl ɛw Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab yɛji abu.
43002003	Eke ow b’inŋn ebr a, mar uwr. Jesu lis am dad Jesu ɛsɛ: "Mar uwr ɛl."
43002004	Kɔ li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛm lis, bla ɛtŋ am ɛlu’m low na ɛm ee? Ɛm e wanci a k’owm."
43002005	Ɛbɛn yɛji lis dad juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Kòkr low yec’a eke li b’ow l’ibrm ɔny a."
43002006	Ke yogŋ mijel nɔhɔn eke wɛl kok lebn ɛm anŋ. Mijel amua eke nyam ɔtu eke k’ij litr ekŋ yen a anake Jwifɛl b’oc kokr ɛl eci sayl owi Nyam ec’any af a.
43002007	Jesu dad juma kok ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Òkr mij mijel amua ɛm ow íy." -L’ok ɛm ow iy ok ɛnyɛmbri a.
43002008	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Sica àwr mij a tɛl ke ócr imn ɔŋn es gbɛgbl a e nyimn ɛs a." Juma kok ɛsɛl a kok ɛbɛn.
43002009	Li tat mij a ek’itŋn el mar a anm, l’uwm yogŋ eke mar a anŋ ow ab any, gbɛkɔ juma kok ɛsɛl a ek’aw mij a gbɛ uw any. L’ɛsŋ mɛbi ɛs a,
43002010	l’igbl ow abu ogŋ ɛtŋ sica ninɛ: "Agŋ a fɛŋ mar mamn -li b’ɔb nuŋ -n’ɔŋ agŋ ɛgŋ; eke agŋ a e wɛl ɛw abu a ɛgŋ mar nɔnɔ a, ke sica -n’ɔŋ wɛl mar mij mij a gɔŋ. Gbɛkɔ ŋ ec’a, ɛw mar mamn a es toŋ it wanci na!"
43002011	Kin elel eke Kana ɛb ɛm Galile wus af, Jesu ɛlul in eci mɛny ɛwr krɛkrɛ a ɔkm. L’ɛlu in ec’any gbɛl ɔkm ɛtŋ jam ɛsɛl a ub’r nawrɛ.
43002012	Eke low na ɛy oc es a, in obi in obi, lis, lisijimɛl lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab -l’us nuŋ es -n’im Kapɛrnayum. -N’anŋ yogŋ -li kok sɛgŋ waa cɛ.
43002013	Jwifɛl eci Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a titm, ɛtŋ Jesu uyu im Jerusalɛm.
43002014	Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, l’ɛkn agŋ ek’am ɔl sed, mɛcɛb lele prɛndrɛ ab ij; n’ɛŋn jɛtɛ titŋn ɛsɛl yɛji eke ok es ɛl eci an ɔl usu a.
43002015	Li kok say ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ eke -n’anŋn Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, l’ogŋ l’ok wɛl ɔkm, ɛl e mɛcɛb lele ɛl e sed ab ab; n’ɔny jɛtɛ titŋn ɛsɛl ec’os a lele ɛl eci sitabl ab ab l’ok wus;
43002016	ɛtŋ l’ɛwar prɛndrɛ ɔl ij ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "K’òcr ɛm Ɛs ec’êl a ɛsɛ an ɔl êl af! Ɔ̀nyn mob amua fɛŋ otr es aŋa!"
43002017	In eci jam ɛsɛl a ɔkn Nyam Lɛl ab ɛm e sodad amua: O Admaga, ŋ ec’êl a ec’erur eke m’ɔny a, b’ow ɛtul’m ɛsɛ al eke b’ɛtul ob af.
43002018	Af yogŋ, Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ e mɛny ɛwr ɔtu eke ki kok, ke ow yɛgm ɛy eke low na eke kok a, ɔny ow ec’abusu eke ki kok ɛbɛn ee?"
43002019	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke ŋuŋan Nyamel na, ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan m’ow m’usr ɛm."
43002020	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Wɛl ɛw akpo ekŋ yony miy nɔhɔn us Nyamel gbɛl na, ɛtŋ ŋ am dad eke b’ow usr ɛm sɛgŋ nyahan ee?"
43002021	Ke Nyamel a eke Jesu am dad ow ec’odad a, in e sos megl ab ana.
43002022	Ow ɔŋ, lɛgŋ a eke Jesu igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, in e jam ɛsɛl a ɔkn eke l’ikŋ anym li dad odad na; ɛtŋ ow ɛm -l’ub Nyam Lɛl lele Jesu eci sodad eke dad ab ab a nawrɛ.
43002023	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a eke Jesu anŋ Jerusalɛm, Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a ec’a, agŋ nɔnɔ ub’r nawrɛ simɛny ɛwr eke n’am kok ab ɛm.
43002024	Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɔnym ɔmn ɛl ɛm aŋke ɛl fɛŋ l’uw wɛl any sɛnyn sɛnyn.
43002025	L’ibram eke wɛl k’otar ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ e lís e low akr ok’r, aŋke in obi ɛm li b’uw ɛgŋ e low eke b’anŋ ɛrm ɛm ab any.
43003001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Farisiɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Nikodɛm, l’el Jwifɛl ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam.
43003002	Ncok nyam, l’ow n’ɛŋn Jesu ɛtŋ n’am ibrm ow l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, s’uw any eke Nyam ɛrm’ŋ ow eke ki yɛgm ɛy low, aŋke ow it ke Nyam ánŋ ɛgŋ ab ab gbuŋ ke l’ɔ́tu li kok mɛny ɛwr amua ɛsɛ elel eke am kok ab af."
43003003	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ: ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛknm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, eke ow elm afr ec’abusu ɛm wɛl ewrm’n ɛm."
43003004	Nikodɛm ibrm Jesu ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ ek’usu a, ayaf wɛl ɔtu eke k’ewar ɛm ee? Kɔ l’ɔtu eke li k’im l’ɛy lis e lokm wɛl ewar ɛm ee?"
43003005	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛym Nyam eci gbreŋgbi usu a eke wɛl ewm’n mij ɛm lele abŋ ab ɛm.
43003006	L’ow yec’eke b’anŋ agŋ ɛm ow a, b’el sos megl eci; ɛtŋ low yec’eke b’anŋ Nyam ec’Abŋ ɛm ow a, b’el Abŋ eci.
43003007	Eke mi dad’ŋ eke ɔny fɛŋ wɛl k’ewr ɔny ɛm afr ec’abusu ɛm, ke ow k’íti’ŋ any.
43003008	Yogŋ eke lɛf b’erur a, li b’ɛlu n’imn; b’iri in ec’ɛlu a, gbɛkɔ úwm yogŋ eke li b’anŋ l’ow lele yogŋ eke li b’im ab any. Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke wɛl ew Nyam ec’Abŋ ɛm a, ɛbɛn ek’ow b’ɛcr ana."
43003009	Af yogŋ, Nikodɛm dad’r ninɛ: "Kɔ ayaf ow ɔtu eke k’ɛcr ee?"
43003010	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ k’el Israɛl wus af eci low yɛgm ɛs ligbɛl nyam, ke k’úwm ów amua any ee?
43003011	Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad’ŋ: low yec’a eke s’uw any a, ow ec’odad s’am dad, ɛtŋ low yec’a eke s’ɛkn a, s’am ij ow eci daŋku; gbɛkɔ ɛy eci daŋku ij a, ɛ́gŋmn ebmn.
43003012	Eke mi bi dad ɔny wus ec’ów a, úbmn’m nawrɛ; eke sica m’am dad ɔny Afr ec’ów, ke ayaf b’ow ubr’m nawrɛ ab ee?
43003013	Ɛgŋ kaka uyum afr ek’ow elm ɛgŋ ec’ Iy sɔny cɛ ek’anŋ afr us es a!
43003014	Ɛsɛ elel eke Mois oc lowi ɛm lorŋn ucu likŋ k’igbl ogŋ loj a, ɛbɛn ow it eke wɛl k’igbl ɛgŋ ec’Iy yɛji ogŋ,
43003015	yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ow ub’r nawrɛ a, ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
43003016	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam erur wus ec’agŋ a afŋn es toŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl in ec’Iy ekpɔbi a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a k’úwm, kɔ ke n’ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
43003017	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɔɔm in ec’Iy owm wus ec’agŋ ogŋ eke li k’ɔb wɛl low, kɔ ke Jim ɛm a, li sɔ́g wɛl.
43003018	Ɛgŋ ek’ub Iy a nawrɛ a, Nyam k’ow ɔbm’n low; gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ ek’ubm nawrɛ a, ke Nyam ɔb’r low ŋ̂, aŋke l’ubm Nyam ec’Iy ekpɔbi a nawrɛ.
43003019	Sica kin elel eke low ɔb a b’ɛcr: usuayl ow wus ec’agŋ ogŋ, ɛtŋ agŋ erur ncebn akm usuayl aŋke -li bi kok ów eŋuŋ.
43003020	Ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’am kok low ŋuŋ a, ɔny usuayl eci sifn ɛtŋ am kpab’r es lís, aŋke n’am uru eke in ec’ów eŋuŋ a k’ok ɔkm usuayl ɛm.
43003021	Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke bi kok Nyam ec’erur a, b’im titm usuayl, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ɛ́kn sɛnyn sɛnyn eke ɛl ec’ów a e kok a ɛcr Nyam ɛm."
43003022	Sica eke ów amua ɛc a, Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab im Jude ec’ogog a. N’anŋ yogŋ wɛl ab l’ok agŋ mij nuŋ sɛgŋ bɛb.
43003023	Jan yɛji, Ayinɔn a eke titm Salim a, n’am ok agŋ mij nuŋ aŋke yogŋ mij nɔnɔ anŋ. Agŋ am ow in ogŋ ok mij nuŋ.
43003024	Ke wɛl k’ɛlum Jan sobel ɛm.
43003025	Sica ów es atar ɛy Jan eci jam ɛsɛl bɛb lele Jwif nyam ab ec’araŋn, ów eke wɛl bi kok Nyam ec’any af sos ayal ec’a sosiɛm.
43003026	-N’im -n’ɛŋn Jan ɛtŋ -n’am dad ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, Jurdɛn jam a ec’ɛgŋ a eke anŋ ŋ ab, ke ij in e daŋku a, kɔ am ɔkn in e low ee? Aŋ! Sicaca ɛm a, n’am ok agŋ mij nuŋ ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ b’im am ɛkn’n!"
43003027	Jan dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛŋnm low ec’abusu eke Afr ɔɔm’n.
43003028	Ɔtur eke ɔny obi yɛji k’ijr daŋku; mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'M’elm Mesi a, kɔ eke wɛl ikŋ anym ɛrm’m cɛ.'
43003029	Mɛbi ɛs anake mɛbi lis b’el in ec’a; kɔ mɛbi ɛs e lawl a, mɛbi ɛs a e saw li b’anŋ ke n’ám iri ow e low; ɛtŋ eke li b’iri mɛbi ɛs a e lebl a, li b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn ab ana, ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, ow iy nɛny fɛŋ.
43003030	Ow it eke in ec’any gbɛl a ám agb, ke ɛm ec’a ís es.
43003031	Ɛgŋ ek’el Afr ec’a, anŋ fɛŋ eci nuŋ af; ɛgŋ ek’el wus ec’a el wus eci, ɛtŋ bi dad wus ec’ów. Ɛgŋ ek’ow Afr eci nin ɛm a, [anŋ fɛŋ eci nuŋ af;]
43003032	li b’ij low eke l’ɛkn ke l’iri a eci daŋku, kɔ ɛgŋ ɛ́gŋm in e daŋku ij a ebm.
43003033	Ɛgŋ eke b’ɛgŋ in e daŋku ij a eb a, am ɛgŋ eb eke Nyam el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam.
43003034	Ɛgŋ eke Nyam ɛrm a bi dad Nyam ec’odad, aŋke Nyam b’ɛlu ɛgŋ a in ec’Abŋ a nimum fɛŋ ɛm.
43003035	Nyam erur Iy a ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ow abusu a fɛŋ.
43003036	Ɛgŋ yec’eke ɔny ɔmn Iy ab ɛm a, ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr; ɛgŋ eke bi yayr Iy a k’ow ɛŋnm sel ikŋ na, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’anŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ec’any af."
43004001	-
43004003	Farisiɛl iri wɛl am dad eke Jesu am ɔŋ wɛl am ok agŋ mij nuŋ nɔnɔ akm Jan, ɛtŋ n’am ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl yɛji l’akm ow. (Tasi ɛm a, Jesu in obi l’okm ɛgŋ kaka mij nuŋ, kɔ in e jam ɛsɛl anake am ok agŋ mij nuŋ a.) Eke Jesu iri ów amua eke wɛl am dad a, n’ŋgboŋ Jude ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’im Galile.
43004004	Ke n’ím a, ow it eke li k’ɛcr Samari wus af eci.
43004005	L’ow li titm Samari eci baŋn nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Sikar. Baŋn a titm Jakɔb ec’ɔgm a ek’ɔŋ jim Josɛf a.
43004006	Yogŋ anake Jakɔb eci mijɔmu a anŋ a. Eke Jesu sos kikn es usu im ab ɛm a, li sig es mijɔmu a e saw. Ow ɔtu eke ki bɛbmn lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ab.
43004007	Samari yɔwi nyam ow am aw mij, ɛtŋ Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɔw na ee! Ɔ̀ŋ’m mij tɛl m’ɛ́gŋ."
43004008	(Ke in e jam ɛsɛl a im baŋn a eke k’ɔl ob ij.)
43004009	Samari yɔwi a dad Jesu ninɛ: "Kɔ ŋ, eke el Jwif a, ayaf tasi ɛm eke m’el Samari yɔwi a, am sus tasi ibrm im mij eke k’ɛgŋ ee?" (Tasi ɛm a, Samari eyŋ lele Jwifɛl ab nɛny ókrm af.)
43004010	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Blel uw Nyam ec’ob ap a, lele ɛgŋ a ek’am ibrm’ŋ mij eke k’ɛgŋ ab any ana, ke ŋ anake blel ɛ́wl ibrm’n mij eke k’ɛgŋ, ke blel n’ɔ́ŋ mij ewl mij a."
43004011	Yɔw a ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, mijɔmu a im ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sonu yɛji ɔnyam ab; bogŋ b’ow ɛŋn mij ewl mij ikŋ na ee?
43004012	Mijɔmu na, ɛy lagŋ Jakɔb ɔŋ ɛy, in obi l’ɛgŋ mij a, in ec’ey lele in e mɛbob ab yɛji ɛgŋ mij na. Kɔ am tutr eke agb akm Jakɔb ee?"
43004013	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛgŋ mij na a, ɛmɛny mijamn b’ow ɔny’n;
43004014	gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɛgŋ mij a eke m’ow m’ɔŋ’n a, mijamn k’ow ɔnym’n lɛgŋ kaka. Mij a eke m’ow m’ɔŋ’n a b’ow ɛwl el mij ewl mij ek’ow ɛm sel ek’ɔnym uwr b’ow jɛjn ok ɔkm."
43004015	Yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɔ̀ŋ’m mij ikŋ na yec’ɛtŋ ke mijamn k’ɔ́nym im m’owm aŋa m’awm mij ij."
43004016	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ìm ɛsŋ acŋ ke ɛ́wl mɛny ow aŋa."
43004017	Yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "M’ɔnym igŋ." Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ e low ij eke dad ek’ɔnym igŋ a,
43004018	aŋke ikŋ anym ɔny egŋ yen, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ na ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a ek’in ab ir a yɛji elm ŋ ec’igŋ. Dad low nɛnyɛmbri nyam."
43004019	Ɛtŋ yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, m’am uw any eke ŋ kokoba ɔb ɛs.
43004020	Ɛy lagŋɛl Samari eyŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ lafɛny na af, ɛtŋ ɔny Jwifɛl bi dadr eke yogŋ eke wɛl k’igŋ Nyam nuŋ a el Jerusalɛm."
43004021	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Yɔw, ùb’m nawrɛ: lɛgŋ am ow ɛtŋ yogŋ eke b’ow igŋn Ɛs Nyam nuŋ a, ow k’ow elm lafɛny na af, ow k’ow elm Jerusalɛm yɛji.
43004022	Ɔny, Samari eyŋ, ɔny e Nyam eke b’igŋn nuŋ a, uwmn in any; ɛy Jwifɛl, ɛy ec’a eke si b’igŋ nuŋ a, s’uw’r any, aŋke Jwifɛl ɛm es eb ɛlu anŋ ow.
43004023	Lɛgŋ am ow, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a ow yɛj’ŋ̂, yogŋ, Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl tasi a b’ow igŋ Ɛs nuŋ abŋ ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Jim ɛlu’l ɔkm ab af; tasi ɛm a, Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl amua anake Ɛs am ɔl es a.
43004024	Nyam el abŋ, ow sosiɛm agŋ a eke k’igŋ’n nuŋ a, -l’it eke -li k’igŋ ow nuŋ abŋ ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke Jim ɛlu’l ɔkm ab af."
43004025	Yɔw a dad’r ninɛ: "M’uw any eke Mesi a b’ow ow. (Mesi a ow e nyandrɛ el Krist.) Lɛgŋ a eke li b’ow l’ow a, li b’ow l’otar ów a fɛŋ akr l’ok ɛy."
43004026	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm eke m’am dad’ŋ odad a, ɛm ana."
43004027	Ɛtŋ wanci ab af, Jesu eci jam ɛsɛl a ɛwl ow, ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋan ow eke ow am dad odad yɔw ab; eke -l’ɛkan ow a, ow e low iti ɛl any. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum ibram’n low ɛsmɛ: "Kɔ bla am ɔl ee? Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am dad ów in ab ee?"
43004028	Yɔw a ɛw in e mijel a es yogŋ, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’im baŋn a, n’am dad agŋ l’ɛsɛ:
43004029	"Òwr ɛkan ɛgŋ eke dad’m ɛm e low fɛŋ eke mi kok a. Kɔ ow k’elm Mesi ab ee?"
43004030	Agŋ a ok ɔkm baŋn a ɛtŋ aam yogŋ a eke Jesu anŋ a.
43004031	Ke ow eci wanci ab af, jam ɛsɛl a am ŋɔŋn Jesu ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ìj ob tɛl ɔ!"
43004032	Kɔ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "M’ɔny ob ij eke uwmn any."
43004033	Jam ɛsɛl a am bibrmn in ɛl ɔfr ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ɛgŋ ka k’is’r ob ij ee?"
43004034	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Eke mi kok ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a ec’erur, ɛtŋ m’uwar juma a eke l’abul’m a, ke ɛm ec’ob ij ab ana.
43004035	Ɔny, b’ewal egb a, bi dadr ɛsrɛ: 'Ɛmɛny ow anŋ awl yar gbuŋ ke egb ub e lɛgŋ bɛ́bmn ab.' Gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny eke ki lɛɛr sɔgm a sɛnyn sɛnyn: egb a ebl, ow bɛbmn ub ab!
43004036	Ɛgŋ ek’am ub egb a, kpɛkŋ b’ɛŋn in e labm sɔg a, ɛtŋ li b’as egb a luku sel ek’ɔnym uwr eci; ow ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’am ewl lele ɛgŋ ek’am ub ab ab b’okr af kok sos ɛm iŋn.
43004037	Ɛɛ, nyandrɛ odad na ek’am dad ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ nyam b’ewl, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam b’ub a,' el low nawrɛ.
43004038	Ɔgm nyam ɛm eke kokmn juma a, m’ɛrm ɔny imn ubr egb yogŋ; agŋ ɛjeci ikŋ anym kok juma yogŋ, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛŋan gbre eke -l’ijr a e liy."
43004039	Yɔw a dad Samari eyŋ a ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na dad’m low fɛŋ eke mi kok a." Ow ɛm a, agŋ a ub nawrɛ aŋke yɔw a dad ɛl.
43004040	Ow sosiɛm, eke Samari eyŋ a im ɛŋn Jesu a, -ni ŋɔŋn ow ek’ow k’ɛgŋ anŋ ɛl ab; ɛtŋ Jesu anŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ yony.
43004041	Ɛtŋ sica Jesu, in obi ec’odad eke n’am dad a sosiɛm, agŋ a ek’am ub’r nawrɛ a am ɛny afŋn es;
43004042	ɛtŋ -n’am dad yɔw a -l’ɛsɛ: "Sica ow elm ŋ ec’odad a eke dad a sosiɛm cɛ s’ubm nawrɛ ij, kɔ ɛy obi s’iri’r nɛnym, ɛtŋ s’uw any eke l’el wus na ec’Es Eb Ɛlu Ɛs tasi."
43004043	Eke sica Jesu kok sɛgŋ yony usu a, l’igb yogŋ n’im Galile.
43004044	Tasi ɛm a, in obi l’ikŋ anym li dad ninɛ: "Kokoba ɔb ɛs ɔ́nym any in ec’ɛb tasi ab ɛm."
43004045	Gbɛkɔ sica eke n’im l’ɛy Galile wus af a, yogŋ ec’agŋ a eb’r sɛnyn sɛnyn, aŋke agŋ amua yɛji im Jerusalɛm Pak ec’es gbɛgbl ab ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn ów a fɛŋ eke Jesu kok es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ a.
43004046	Sica ɛmɛny l’ɛwl l’ow Galile Kana baŋn, yogŋ a eke l’oc mij li kokr mar a. Ɛb ebu a eci juma idr ɛs ligbɛl a anŋ yogŋ. In ec’iy ek’anŋ Kapɛrnayum a ɔl am ɔny.
43004047	Eke juma idr ɛs a iri eke Jesu anŋ Jude ow Galile a, n’im n’ɛŋn ow ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn ow ek’ow k’ow Kapɛrnayum ewlm jim ek’am uw a.
43004048	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɔny gbɛ sɛgŋ fɛŋ, eke ɛknmn mɛny ɛwr lele ów any iti owi ab a, k’ɔtumn ubmn nawrɛ."
43004049	Juma idr ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, òw ɛm ogŋ a gbuŋ ke ɛm ec’iy a úw."
43004050	Jesu dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wl im ŋ ogŋ a, kɔ ejimŋ sos ok es." L’ub odad a eke Jesu dad’r a nawrɛ ɛtŋ n’im gbugŋ.
43004051	Eke kpɛkŋ l’us ejagb n’aam a, in eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ek’am us’r jam ow a ɔbr’r ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ejimŋ sos ok es!"
43004052	Kpɛkŋ n’am ibrm wɛl wanci ab af eke in ec’iy a sos ok es a, ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Efi ncebles eci wanci nyam ɛm, lɛgŋ na af anake lɛfr a oc’r es lís a."
43004053	Odad a ok iy ɛs a es sos ɛm ek’ow el wanci ab af a cɛ eke Jesu dad’r eke ejimŋ sos ok es a, ɛtŋ in lele in ec’akŋ ab ab a fɛŋ -n’ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm.
43004054	Sakp yony ɛm e mɛny ɛwr eke Jesu kok, Jude eke n’anŋ n’im Galile ab ana.
43005001	Eke ów amua ɛc a, Jwifɛl am kok Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl nyam Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ Jesu im yogŋ.
43005002	Baŋn a e lakp a e lisany nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Mɛcɛb e lisany a, ow e saw a usu nyam anŋ eke wɛl kok ok mij ɛm, ke ɔny lɛf eb usu yen, usu a Ebre ɛm wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Betɛsda.
43005003	Yogŋ, ɔ́lu nɔnɔ gbɛl ɛsɛ ány eflu, akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl, lele sos es wɛw ɛsɛl ab lɛru es. [
43005004	]
43005005	Ɔlu nyam ek’anŋ ɔl ɛm akpo likŋ lele lɛw lele niwn ab anŋ yogŋ.
43005006	Eke Jesu ɛkn ɔlu a eke ɛgŋm es wus yogŋ, ke l’iri eke ow’n anŋ ɔl ɛm lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ a, l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ erur eke k’ewl ee?"
43005007	Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ɛm ec’a mij a b’umu a, m’ɔnym ɛgŋ eke k’ɔny ɛlu’m ɛm. Eke mi b’ɔl eke mi k’im m’ɛy mij ab ɛm a, ɛgŋ ɛjeci b’ɛc afŋ’m es ɛy ɛm."
43005008	Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ìgb, òc ŋ eci ajraŋka a ke án es."
43005009	Kpɛkŋ ɔlu a ewl, l’oc in ec’ajraŋka a ɛtŋ n’am an es. Ke low na, nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ow am ɛy.
43005010	Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a am ibrm ɛgŋ a eke wɛl ewlm a ɛsɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ, abusu ɛrum’ŋ es eke k’oc ŋ ec’ajraŋka ɔnym ab."
43005011	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ a eke ewlm im a dad’m eke mi k’oc ɛm ec’ajraŋka a ke m’án es."
43005012	Ɛtŋ -l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ dad’ŋ eke k’oc ŋ ec’ajraŋka a ke án es ee?"
43005013	Kɔ ɛgŋ a uwm ɛgŋ a ek’ewlm’n ab any, aŋke Jesu irm agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ ab ɛm.
43005014	Eke ow b’inŋn ebr a, Jesu ɛŋn’n Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Sica kin eke ewl. Kì kok sikpl ij bake ɛ́ŋn low eke agb akm na."
43005015	Ɔlu a im ɛtŋ dad Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a ek’ow el Jesu anake ewlm’n a.
43005016	Ow sosiɛm Jwifɛl a at ɛŋn Jesu, low na eke li kok nɛnɛgŋ a eci.
43005017	Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛm Ɛs abu anŋ juma kok ɛm ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji abu anŋ’m juma kok ɛm."
43005018	Odad na sosiɛm, sica ɛmɛny Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a am at tasi eke k’ibi Jesu aŋke ow elm nɛnɛgŋ ec’ol a eke l’ɔb es a cɛ, kɔ ɛmɛny n’am dad eke Nyam in el Ɛs tasi. Na ɛm a, n’am ocr in sosi ɛsɛ Nyam af.
43005019	Ow ɛm a, Jesu ɛwl eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: Iy k’ɔtum kokm low kaka in obi ɛm; yec’eke li b’ɛkn Ɛs kok a, ow li bi kok. Tasi ɛm a, low fɛŋ eke Ɛs a bi kok a, low nyam coco a cɛ Iy a yɛji bi kok,
43005020	aŋke Iy Ɛs a b’erur Iy a ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm ow in obi e low eke li bi kok a. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li b’ow li yɛgm ow ów eke b’ow agb akm amua, ɛtŋ ow b’ow iti ɔny any.
43005021	Tasi ɛm a, ɛsɛ elel eke Iy Ɛs a b’igbm agŋ ek’uw a ke b’ɔŋ ɛl sel a, ɛbɛn nyam coco Iy a yɛji b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ eke li b’erur a sel.
43005022	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ fɛŋ e lís e jɛj ok owi a, Iy Ɛs a ɛ́knm ow e low, kɔ n’ɔŋ Iy a jɛj ok owi ec’abusu a fɛŋ,
43005023	yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ɔ́ny Iy a eci sos usr ɛsɛ elel eke -li b’ɔny Iy Ɛs a eci sos usr ab af. Ɛgŋ yec’eke usrm Iy a sos a, usrm Iy Ɛs a ek’ɛrm’n a yɛji sos.
43005024	Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’iri ɛm e sodad a, ke b’ub ɛgŋ a eke ɛrm’m a nawrɛ a, n’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr ŋ̂. N’ɔnym jɛj ok ij, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ l’ubr luw ɛm l’ɛy owr anŋ ɛm.
43005025	Ɛɛ, low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: lɛgŋ am ow, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a l’ow yɛj’ŋ̂; lɛgŋ na ɛm agŋ ek’uw a b’ow iri Nyam ec’Iy e lebl, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke b’ow iri lebl a, b’ow anŋ owr.
43005026	Ɛsɛ elel eke tasi ɛm a Iy Ɛs a el sel e nuŋ a, ɛbɛn nyam coco n’ɔŋ Iy a yɛji abusu eke k’el sel e nuŋ.
43005027	Ɛtŋ eke Iy a el ɛgŋ ec’ Iy a sosiɛm a, n’ɔŋ ow jɛj ok owi ec’abusu.
43005028	Ow k’íti ɔny any. Lɛgŋ am ow, ɛtŋ ow ɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’uw wɛl ot es a b’ow iri in e lebl,
43005029	ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ b’ow anŋ uwɔmu ɛm ɛy ɔkm. Agŋ a eke kok ów amamn a b’ow igb ke ɛ́ŋn sel, gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke kok ów eŋuŋ a, b’ow igb jɛj ok eci.
43005030	Ɛm obi ɛm, mi k’ɔtum mi kokm low kaka fɛŋ. Nyam e low eke bi dad’m ab af mi bi jɛj ɛgŋ e low m’ok, ɛtŋ ɛm e jɛj ok a el nawrɛ, aŋke m’ɔlm ɛm e low eke m’am erur ab es, kɔ ɛgŋ a eke ɛrm’m a ec’a eke b’erur a, m’am ɔl es."
43005031	"Eke ɛm, m’am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku, liy k’ow anm ɛm e daŋku ij ab ɛm.
43005032	Kɔ ɛgŋ ɛjeci anake am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku a, ɛtŋ m’uw any eke daŋku ij na el nawrɛ.
43005033	Ɔny, ɛrmn agŋ Jan ogŋ, ɛtŋ l’ij low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e daŋku.
43005034	Ɛm, m’ibram eke ɛgŋ k’ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku, kɔ m’am dad ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam sɔ́g ɔny.
43005035	Jan ɛw ɛsɛ kɛniɛ eke wɛl igŋ k’am iri ayal usu af, ɛtŋ ɛgŋn ebr kokr sos ɛm iŋn in ec’usuayl ab ab wanci tɛl eci cɛ.
43005036	Kɔ ɛm e daŋku ij a eke m’ɔny a, agb akm Jan ec’a: ów amua eke m’am kok a, amua tasi eke ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m eke mi ki kok a, am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku, ɛtŋ am yɛgm eke ɛm Ɛs ɛrm’m.
43005037	Ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs eke ɛrm’m a yɛji am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku. Gbɛkɔ tasi lɛgŋ kaka irimn in e lebl ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lɛgŋ kaka ɛknmn in ec’elel eke n’anŋn a.
43005038	In eci sodad a írm ɔny ɛm, aŋke úbmn ɛgŋ a eke l’ɛrm a nawrɛ.
43005039	Bi wewar Nyam e Silɛl a mɛwl ɛm eke k’uwr any, aŋke bi tutar eke k’ɛŋan sel ek’ɔnym uwr ɛl ɛm. Ke tasi ɛm a, sodad amua anake am ij ɛm e nuŋ af e daŋku a!
43005040	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, érurmn eke k’owr ɛm ogŋ ɛŋan sel tasi a ek’ɔnym uwr a.
43005041	Ɛm, m’ɔlm agŋ ec’es susm ab es.
43005042	Kɔ ɔny ec’a, m’uw ɔny any: m’uw any eke ɔnymn Nyam ec’erur.
43005043	M’ow ɛm Ɛs e nin ɛm ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn ebmn’m. Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ow in obi e nin ɛm b’ow ebr ir!
43005044	B’erurir ɔny ɔfr ɛm ec’es susmnin owi, ɛtŋ ɔ́lmn Nyam sɔny coco ogŋ ec’es susm owi ab es; ke ayaf ɔtur eke k’ubr’m nawrɛ ab ee?
43005045	Ɛm Ɛs ec’any af a, kì tutar eke m’ow m’ok ɔny ów af; kɔ Mois anake b’ow ok ɔny ów af a, in ɛm eke ocr ɔny ec’ɔmn a ɛlul a.
43005046	Tasi ɛm a, eke ubr Mois nawrɛ ke ɛm yɛji b’ow ubr’m nawrɛ, aŋke ɛm e lís e low anake Mois nɔn a.
43005047	Kɔ eke sica yec’a eke Mois nɔn ɛm e lís a ubmn nawrɛ, ke ayaf ɔtur eke k’ubr ɛm e sodad a nawrɛ ee?"
43006001	Eke low na ɛc a, Jesu imn Galile ogog a e mij lekpl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Tiberiad yɛj’a e jam.
43006002	Agŋ nɔnɔ am us’r jam aŋke -n’am ɛkn mɛny ɛwr eke n’am kok ɔ́lu a ec’ewlm ɛm.
43006003	Ow ɔŋ Jesu uyu ligigl nyam af ɛtŋ sig es yogŋ jam ɛsɛl ab ab.
43006004	Pak ek’el Jwifɛl ec’es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ titm.
43006005	Eke Jesu b’igbl any ogŋ a, l’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ ek’am ow in ogŋ, ɛtŋ l’ibrm Filip ninɛ: "Bogŋ s’ɔtu eke si k’ɔl futufutu s’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ij ee?"
43006006	Tasi ɛm a, low a eke Jesu am ow kok a, in obi l’uw any, kɔ l’ibrm Filip low na eke li k’ɛbm ow a sosiɛm.
43006007	Filip dad’r ninɛ: "Eke ow el os ekŋ lɛw yɛji, si k’ɔtum s’ɛŋnm futufutu ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɛŋn likpr liy nyam bɔbɔ yɛji."
43006008	Andre, Simɔ Piɛr lisijim ek’el in e jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam a dad’r ninɛ:
43006009	"Aŋa, iyli nyam ɔnym futufutu yen lele ɔcn yony ab. Gbɛkɔ na yɛji ow elm low kaka agŋ bubutɛ na ec’any af."
43006010	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ɔ̀ŋn agŋ a fɛŋ ok es." (Ke usu a, suw owr anŋ nɔnɔ.) Sica ɛl fɛŋ -l’ok es; -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ij egŋ fandi yen.
43006011	Jesu ot futufutu a, l’ɛlu Nyam bia, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl cɛc ɔŋ agŋ a ek’ok es yogŋ a. Li kok ɛbɛn ɔcn ab ab yɛji, n’ɔŋ wɛl ow a fɛŋ eke -n’am ibrm a.
43006012	Eke sica agŋ a fɛŋ ij ob lok iy a, Jesu dad in e jam ɛsɛl a ninɛ: "Kɔ̀kŋn ekpr a eke wawal es a yec’ɛtŋ ke kaka k’íram."
43006013	-Li kɔkŋ futufutu yen a eke -l’ijr a ec’ekpr eke wawal es a, ɛtŋ ow iy mulu ɛgbɛl lɛw yony.
43006014	Eke agŋ a ɛkn mɛny ɛwr na eke Jesu kok a, -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na, Kokoba ɔb ɛs tasi a eke k’ow wus af aŋa ab ana."
43006015	Jesu uw any ek’agŋ a b’ow ɔny’n lɛc ɛm ɛw’r ɛb ebu. Ow sosiɛm ɛmɛny l’ɛwl mɛny n’im ligigl ab af in sɔny.
43006016	Eke lɛgŋ ew es a, Jesu e jam ɛsɛl a us nuŋ es mij nɛny a,
43006017	ɛtŋ ok mijɛtŋ nyam ɛm am ubr mij lekpl a imn Kapɛrnayum eci. Lɛgŋ yɛji am ukm ab, ɛtŋ Jesu yɛji k’iim k’ɛŋnm ɛl.
43006018	Lɛf am ɛlu lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ mra am ɛlu mij lekpl ab af.
43006019	-L’ɔr mij ba ow k’ij kilo yen oglog nɔhɔn ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -l’ɛkn Jesu ek’am an es mij ab af ow titm mijɛtŋ a, ɛtŋ erŋn am ɔny ɛl.
43006020	Gbɛkɔ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny, kɔ ɛm!"
43006021	Jam ɛsɛl a erur eke k’ɔny ɛlu’l mijɛtŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ mijɛtŋ a itr es yogŋ a eke -n’aam a e nanu a.
43006022	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, agŋ a ek’anŋ mij lekpl a e jam a, ɛkn ek’ow el mijɛtŋ nyam cɛ anake anŋ yogŋ ncebles ɛm a; -l’uw any eke jam ɛsɛl a im ɛl sɔny, eke Jesu ɛym ɛl e mijɛtŋ ab ɛm.
43006023	Gbɛkɔ simijɛtŋ ɛjeci ek’anŋ Tiberiad am ow a, ow itr es usu a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ oc futufutu ɛlu Nyam bia ke -l’ijr a.
43006024	Eke agŋ a ɛkn eke Jesu lele in e jam ɛsɛl ab ab anm yogŋ a, -l’ok simijɛtŋ ab ɛm -n’im Kapɛrnayum -n’am ɔl Jesu.
43006025	Ɛtŋ eke -n’ɛŋan Jesu mij lekpl a e jam a, -n’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Low yɛgm agŋ ɛs, kɔ bogŋ eci wanci af ɛtŋ ow aŋa ee?"
43006026	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: am ɔɔl’m ek’ijr futufutu molok iy ɔny a sosiɛm, kɔ ow elm ɛm e mɛny ɛwr a e nyandrɛ a eke irir a eci.
43006027	Kì kokr ob eke b’ugŋ es a e juma, kɔ kòkr yec’a eke b’ibn ke el sel ek’ɔnym uwr a e juma. Ɛgŋ ec’ Iy b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ob ij ikŋ na, aŋke tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Nyam in obi oc in ec’abusu a e mɛny ɛwr a ɛw’r af."
43006028	Ɛtŋ sica -n’am ibrm ow -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ juma a eke Nyam am erur a, ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?"
43006029	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Juma a eke Nyam am ibrm ɔny a el: ke ɔ́nyn ɔmn ɛgŋ a eke l’ɛrm ab ɛm."
43006030	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Bogŋ eci mɛny ɛwr ɔtu eke ki kok yɛgm ɛy ke ow af, s’úb’ŋ nawrɛ ee? Ŋ eci juma ek’am kok a el bogŋ ec’ee?
43006031	Loj yogŋ, ɛy lagŋɛl ij futufutu ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: n’ɔŋ wɛl futufutu ek’anŋ afr ow a -l’ij."
43006032	Ɛtŋ Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ, m’am dad ɔny: afr eci futufutu a, ow elm Mois ɔɔm ɔny, kɔ ɛm Ɛs anake ɔŋ ɔny afr eci futufutu tasi a.
43006033	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam eci futufutu a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ a, el ɛgŋ a eke b’anŋ afr ow, ke b’ɔŋ wus na nimum ec’agŋ a fɛŋ sel a."
43006034	Ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ̀ŋ ɛy futufutu ikŋ na."
43006035	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’el sel e futufutu. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ow ɛm ogŋ a, lɛgŋ kaka namn k’ow ɔnym’n, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka mijamn k’ow ɔnym’n.
43006036	Gbɛkɔ m’ikŋ anym mi dad ɔny: ɛkan’m ɛtŋ ubmn nawrɛ.
43006037	Ɛgŋ liy nyam nyam fɛŋ eke ɛm Ɛs b’ow ɔŋ’m a, b’ow ow ɛm ogŋ, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka mi k’ow m’ogŋm ɛgŋ eke b’ow ow ɛm ogŋ a,
43006038	aŋke m’anŋ afr m’ow wus af aŋa, ow elm ɛm ec’erur kok eci, kɔ ɛgŋ ek’ɛrm’m a ec’erur mi ki kok.
43006039	Ɛtŋ kin ɛgŋ a ek’ɛrm’m a e low ek’am erur: ke mi k’írmnm agŋ a fɛŋ a eke l’abul’m a e nyam, kɔ ke lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, m’ígbm ɛl luw ɛm.
43006040	Ɛɛ, tasi ɛm a, kin low ek’ɛm Ɛs am erur: ke agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɛkn Iy a ke ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a, ɛ́ŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr, ke lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, m’ígbm ɛl luw ɛm."
43006041	Jwifɛl a am ɛny abr ok Jesu af aŋke li dad ninɛ: "M’el futufutu ek’anŋ afr us es."
43006042	Ow sosiɛm -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm Josɛf jim Jesu ee? Ɛs lele lis ab a, s’uw ɛl any sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ke sica ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki dad l’ɛsɛ: 'M’anŋ afr m’us es' ee?"
43006043	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "K’ɛ̀nyn abr ɔny ɔfr ɛm ɔ!
43006044	Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum owm ɛm ogŋ eke ɛm Ɛs ek’ɛrm’m a nyimnm’n; ke sica ɛm, lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, m’ígbm’n luw ɛm.
43006045	Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ɛm e nyam ɛm wɛl nɔn: Nyam b’ow yɛgm ɛl fɛŋ low any uw. Ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’iri ɛm Ɛs ec’odad ke ɛgŋ in e low yɛgm a e low eb a, ke ɛm ogŋ n’am ow a.
43006046	Ow elm ke ɛgŋ ɛkn ɛm Ɛs nyamn ɛm; ɛgŋ a cɛ eke Nyam ɛrm a cɛ ɛkn Ɛs.
43006047	Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: ɛgŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, ɔny sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
43006048	Ɛm anake m’el futufutu a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a.
43006049	Ke loj yogŋ ɔny lagŋɛl ij futufutu cɛ ɛtŋ -l’uw.
43006050	Gbɛkɔ futufutu a ek’anŋ afr us es a, el futufutu ek’ɛgŋ b’ij ke úwm.
43006051	Ɛm, m’el owr anŋ eci futufutu ek’anŋ afr us es. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ij futufutu ikŋ na a, b’ow ɛŋn sel sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Futufutu a eke m’am ɔŋ ɔny a, ke ɛm eci sos megl ana; m’am oc m’ɔŋ ɔny yec’ɛtŋ ke wus nimum ɛ́ŋn sel."
43006052	Ow sosiɛm, Jwifɛl a ɛl ɔfr ɛm am atar ów es lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ayaf ɛgŋ na k’ɔŋn ɛy in eci sos megl a s’ij ee?"
43006053	Jesu dad ɛl ninɛ: "Low nawrɛ m’am dad ɔny: eke ijmn ɛgŋ ec’Iy eci sos megl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋmn in eci mebl a, sel ɛŋn k’ow anm ɔny ɛm.
43006054	Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow ij ɛm eci sos megl ke b’ow ɛgŋ ɛm eci mebl a ɔny sel ek’ɔnym uwr, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ es abal el ɛm, m’ow m’igbm’n luw ɛm;
43006055	aŋke ɛm eci sos megl a el ob ij tasi, ɛtŋ ɛm eci mebl a el mar tasi eke wɛl b’ɛgŋ.
43006056	Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ij ɛm eci sos megl a, ke b’ɛgŋ ɛm eci mebl a okr af ɛm ab, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji in yɔny s’okr af.
