44002016	Gbɛkɔ sica low a eke kokoba ɔb ɛs Joɛl dad a ɛy tasi ŋ̂.
44002017	Kin low eke Nyam dad eke b’ow ɛy sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a: Mi b’ow m’ɔmun ɛm ec’Abŋ ab es agŋ a fɛŋ af; ɔny ec’ey egŋ a lel ey ɔyɔw ab ab b’ow ɔb ɛm e kokoba, ɔny eci ŋgbafrɛ a b’ow ɛkan nuŋ ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔny ec’agŋ esu a b’ow ɛkn ów mɛmn ɛrur ɛm.
44002018	Ɛɛ, sɛgŋ amua ɛm, mi b’ow m’ɔmun ɛm ec’Abŋ ab es ɛm eci juma kok ɛsɛl a lele juma kok lisɛl ab ab af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɔb ɛm e kokoba.
44002019	Mi b’ow mi kok ów ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ afr, ɛtŋ mi b’ow mi kok mɛny ɛwr owi nɔnɔ wus aŋa. Mebl, al, lele mregbn eke anŋ ɛsɛ jru af b’ow anŋ ɛm,
44002020	ligbn b’ow irmn in ec’afŋ a, ɛtŋ awl b’ow ebl es kondoŋ ɛsɛ mebl af, gbuŋ ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lɛgŋ a ów, anygbɛl e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a.
44002021	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛsŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin a, b’ow ɛŋn sel.
44002022	Israɛl ec’agŋ, ìgŋn lɔru es irir low a eke m’am m’ow mi dad a: Nyam yɛgm ɔny eke n’ɔŋ Nasarɛt e Jesu in eci abusu a. Nawrɛ ɛm a, Nyam ɛcr in ɛm kok sakrowa nɔnɔ ɔny ec’araŋn, li kok ów ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ eke b’iti any, lele mɛny ɛwr owi ab; ɔny uwr any yɛji.
44002023	Ɛgŋ ikŋ na, wɛl ɛlu’l es ɔŋ ɔny ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam tutr ke ikŋ anym bɛbm ow e low ɛw es ab af. Ɛtŋ ɔny, ibir ir olikŋ af eke ɔŋn agŋ ek’uwm Nyam any a ɛw’r ab ɛm.
44002024	Gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm, n’ɔny l’oc ow es luw e gbre ijr ab ɛm, aŋke ow itm eke luw ec’abusu a k’ucu ɔny’n es.
44002025	Tasi ɛm a, kin yec’eke David dad in e lís: Sɛgŋ fɛŋ m’am ɛkn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm ec’any af, n’anŋ’m saw yec’ɛtŋ ke mi kí mumum.
44002026	Na sosiɛm, ɛm ec’ɛrm sos ɛm am iŋn, ɛtŋ ɛm e nɛny am ɛgŋ ehe ec’ɛj. Ɛtŋ uwɔmu ɛm yɛji, ɛm e sos megl a b’ow ɛru es am ɔmn low.
44002027	Nawrɛ tasi, k’ow igŋm ɛlum im es ɔŋnes baŋn, k’ow yɛbm ŋ e libɔwi mamn e sos megl a ugŋm es uwɔmu ɛm.
44002028	Ŋ, yɛgm’m sebr a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a, ɛtŋ ŋ e sos eke b’ow ɛlu ɔkm ɛm ec’any af a, b’ow ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn.
44002029	Agŋ lisijimɛl, abusu ɛru’m es eke mi ki dad ɔny lala ɛm ɛy lagŋ David e lís e low. L’uw, wɛl oc’r es ɛtŋ in ec’uwɔmu a yɛfɛnyna yɛji anŋ ɛy ogŋ aŋa.
44002030	Gbɛkɔ l’el kokoba ɔb ɛs ɛtŋ l’uw any eke Nyam ij nɛny ɛwar ir ek’in ec’alaw ab ɛm ɛgŋ nyam b’ow usr’r usu el ɛb ebu.
44002031	David ikŋ anym ɛkn low a eke b’ow ɛy a, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm li dad Mesi ec’uwɔmu ɛm anŋ igb a e low ninɛ: Wɛl igŋm ɛlum’n es ɔŋnes baŋn, ɛtŋ in e sos megl a ugŋm es uwɔmu ɛm.
44002032	Jesu na eke m’am dad in e low a, Nyam igbm’n agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’ij ow e daŋku.
44002033	Sica, wɛl igbl’l ogŋ Nyam e lidr abu af, ɛtŋ Ɛs ɛm n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala a eke wɛl ɛwar ow e low a, ɛtŋ n’ɔmun es ɛy af. Ow e low anake am ɛkan, ke am irir a.
44002034	Tasi ɛm a, David in obi l’uyum afr, gbɛkɔ li dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam dad ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ninɛ: 'Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af,
44002035	toŋ bake m’ót ŋ ec’efnu m’ok ŋ ec’akr ew a.'
44002036	Sica ow it eke Israɛl ec’agŋ fɛŋ k’uw any tasi eke Jesu a ek’ɛwr olikŋ af a cɛ anake Nyam oc ɛw Kɔtɔkɔ lele Mesi ab a."
44002037	Eke agŋ a iri sodad amua a, ow ɛy ɛl sos ɛm nɔnɔ. -L’ibrm Piɛr lele ɛrm ɛsɛl likpr ab ab ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?"
44002038	Piɛr ɔdu eb ninɛ: "Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm, ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́gŋ eb wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam óc ɔny e sikpl a ap ɔny, ke ɛ́ŋan Nyam ec’ob ap a ek’el Abŋ Lala a,
44002039	aŋke Nyam ec’ob ek’ɛwar a, ɔny lele ɔny eyŋɛl ab eci, ɛtŋ ow el agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji eci, agŋ a fɛŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam b’ow ɛsŋ a."
44002040	Ɛmɛny Piɛr dad ɛl sodad nɔnɔ, ɔm ɛl ów, atr ɛl sos es ninɛ: "Ɛ̀gŋn sel ɛŋn a e low ebr, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɔ́nymn abu ɛyr ɛsɛ agŋ a ek’irm ab af."
44002041	Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ ɛgŋ Piɛr e sodad a eb, ɛtŋ wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ. Lɛgŋ a, agŋ ek’ɔtu eke k’ij agŋ fandi nyahan ow obn ɛl a ek’ɔny ɔmn a.
44002042	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ari at ɛm, -li b’as luku -n’am iri ɛrm ɛsɛl a e low yɛgm a, -l’ir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ lisijimɛl af, -l’ij ob lɔfu nyam ɛm, -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam usu nyam.
44002043	Agŋ a fɛŋ am ɔny Nyam ec’ɛlum, aŋke Nyam am ɛcr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm kok mɛny ɛwr nɔnɔ lele sakrowa ab.
44002044	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn a b’okr af ɛtŋ ɛl ɔfr -li bi cɛc ob eke -n’ɔnyn a.
44002045	-Li b’ɔl ɛl ec’ob eke -n’ɔnyn a -l’ij ɛtŋ ow ɛm ec’os eke -li b’ɛŋn a, -li bi cɛc ɛl fɛŋ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’es abur ek’ɔny a e kokr eci.
44002046	Lɛgŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ, ow ɔ́pim, -li b’as luku Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm, ɛl ec’akŋ akŋ a -li b’ij ob usu nyam ɛtŋ ob ij a b’el sos ɛm iŋn ɛm lel ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm ab.
44002047	-N’am kɔklm Nyam ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ am ɔny ɛl ec’erur. Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ot agŋ eke n’am eb l’ɛlu es a, l’ok wɛl ɛm.
44003001	Lɛgŋ nyam, Piɛr lele Jan ab aam Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ncebles e wanci nyahan e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm.
44003002	Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ e lisany nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Lisany Sɔbɔ' a e saw, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke in e mew ɛm ɛtŋ bubm es. Lɛgŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ, wɛl b’oc ow’r sigm’n es yogŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɔ́tu li sism agŋ a eke b’ok Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a os.
44003003	Eke ɔlu a b’ɛkn Piɛr lele Jan ab ek’am ow ok akŋ a, n’am sism wɛl ob.
44003004	Piɛr lele Jan ab ok’r anyamn af, ɛtŋ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Lɛ̀r ɛy!"
44003005	Ɛgŋ a am lɛr ɛl gbiy, aŋke n’am tutr eke wɛl b’ow ɔŋ’n ob.
44003006	Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "M’ɔnym jɛtɛ, m’ɔnym sika, kɔ m’am ɔŋ’ŋ yec’a e m’ɔny a: Nasarɛt e Jesu e nin ɛm, ìgb ke án es."
44003007	Ɛtŋ Piɛr ucu lidr abu ɔny’n, ɛlum’n abu l’igb. Kpɛkŋ ɔlu a ec’akr a lel akr ɛmn ɛm ab ab ok ɛm fɛŋ;
44003008	l’igb l’us es, n’inym es ceŋ ɛtŋ n’am an es. L’igŋ Piɛr lele Jan ab l’ɛy Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, n’am an es, n’am igb li sus es ɛtŋ n’am kɔklm Nyam.
44003009	Agŋ a fɛŋ ɛkn’n eke n’am an es, ke n’am kɔklm Nyam.
44003010	Sica eke -l’uwr any eke ow el ɔlu a eke bi sig es Lisany Sɔbɔ a saw sism ob a, ɛl fɛŋ ow ɛw ɛl erŋn ɛtŋ ow am iti ɛl any yɛji, low a ek’ɛŋn ow a sosiɛm.
44003011	Sica ek’ɛgŋ a ɛ́lum Piɛr lele Jan ab es a, agŋ a fɛŋ anŋ low any iti ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’uru es -l’ow -n’ɛŋn wɛl Nyamel gbɛl a eci lɛf eb usu a ek’ij Salomɔ e nin a.
44003012	Eke Piɛr b’ɛkn ɛbɛn a, li dad agŋ a ninɛ: "Israɛl eyŋ, bla sosiɛm ɛgŋ na ec’ewlm a e low am iti ɔny any ee? Kì lɛɛr ɛy ɛbɛn! Ɛgŋ na, ow elm ɛy obi ec’abusu ɛm, oglog ɛy e Nyam nuŋ igŋ sɛnyn ɛm n’anm es,
44003013	kɔ Nyam a ek’el Abraham, Isak lele Jakɔb ab e Nyam, ke el ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam a, ɛlu in e libɔwi Jesu any ɔkm. Ɔny obi a ɔɔl ijr ir es ɛw ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm, ɛtŋ igŋn ɛlul il es Pilat ec’any af, ke l’erur eke li k’ɛlu ow es cɛ.
44003014	Ɔny igŋn Ɛgŋ Lala a, Nɛnyɛmbri Nyam Ɛs a ɛlul es ɛtŋ ibrmn eke Pilat k’ɛlu ɛgŋ ibiu ab es ɔŋ ɔny.
44003015	Ɛtŋ ibir Sel Ɛŋn ec’Idr Ɛs a. Gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm ɛtŋ s’el ow ec’adaŋku.
44003016	Ɛgŋ na ek’am ɛkan a, uwr ir any. Jesu e nin a ec’abusu a eke ow ɛm s’ɔny ɔmn a anake ewlm’n a. Jesu ɛm ec’ɔmn a eke s’ɔny a anake ɔŋ ɛgŋ na ewl nimum ɔny fɛŋ ec’any af a.
44003017	Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, m’uw any eke ɔny lele ɔny ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab, ow el low any uwm ɛm e low eke kokr Jesu e lís.
44003018	Gbɛkɔ Nyam kok yec’a eke likŋ anym l’ɛwar lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl fɛŋ e nɛny ɛm a. Li dad eke Mesi a k’ij gbre.
44003019	Ìtŋnin ɛrm ɛm gɔŋ, ke ɛ́wal -lɛɛr Nyam, yec’ɛtŋ ke li tɛ́tŋ ɔny e sikpl ab es,
44003020	ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny sel eb mamn e sɛgŋ, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’is ɔny Mesi a eke l’ikŋ anym li sɔsum l’oc ɔny ec’a: ke Jesu ana.
44003021	Gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, ow it eke Jesu Krist k’anŋ afr, toŋ ow ok lɛgŋ ek’ów a fɛŋ b’ow ɛwl el owr a. God’ɛtŋ Nyam ɛwar low na in e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lala a e nɛny ɛm.
44003022	Tasi ɛm a, Mois dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny e Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ɛsɛ ɛm af, eke b’ow el ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam. B’ow irir ów a fɛŋ eke li b’ow li dad ɔny a.
44003023	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke k’ow irim kokoba ɔb ɛs na e low a, wɛl b’ow ogŋ’n Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn ke wɛl íbi’r.
44003024	Ɛtŋ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ eke Samiɛl e lɛgŋ ɛm ɛtŋ dad ów toŋ ke igŋ yɛfɛnyna a, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ dad ów amua eke am ɛy sɛgŋ amua ɛm a e low.
44003025	Low a eke Nyam ɛcr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɛm ɛwar a el ɔny eci, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji anŋn sinm a eke Nyam kok ɔny lagŋɛl ab a ɛm, lɛgŋ a eke li dad Abraham ninɛ: Ŋ ec’alaw ɛm m’ow m’ɛcr m’ɛdŋ eb eb a fɛŋ ek’anŋ wus na a ɔwrɔ.
44003026	Ɛtŋ ɔny sosiɛm Nyam sɔsum in e libɔwi oc, ɛtŋ l’ikŋ anym l’oc n’ɔŋ ɔny. L’ɛrm ow ow ow eke ow k’ɛdŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam igŋ in ec’ów eŋuŋ kok a ɛlu es."
44004001	Eke Piɛr lele Jan ab odad anŋ nɛnym am dad agŋ a, egb waw ɛsɛl, Nyamel gbɛl a ec’ɔsu ɛsɛl ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a, lele Sadusiɛl ab ow ɛŋn ɛl.
44004002	Ɛrm am ebl ɛl nɔnɔ eke ɛrm ɛsɛl yony a am yɛgm agŋ a low, ke am dad ɛl Jesu e luw ɛm ek’igb a e low, ke ow ɛm am ij nɛny eke agŋ eke in b’uw a yɛji in ɔtu eke in k’igb luw ɛm.
44004003	-N’ɔny Piɛr lele Jan ab, ɛtŋ -l’ot -n’im -l’ok wɛl sobel ɛm toŋ lɛgŋ ɛny, aŋke lɛgŋ ler im nɔnɔ.
44004004	Ɛbɛn yɛji, agŋ a ek’iri ɛrm ɛsɛl a ec’amani a e nɔnɔ gbɛl ub nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ ɔmn ɛsɛl a e nɛny a obn toŋ ɔtu ek’ij agŋ fandi yen.
44004005	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, Jwifɛl ec’ es ɛw ɛsɛl, agŋ ekpekp lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab as luku Jerusalɛm.
44004006	Agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm a el: egb waw ɛs ligbɛl An, Kayif, Jan, Alesandr lel egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ab.
44004007	-N’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny Piɛr lele Jan ab ow ɛl ec’any af ɛtŋ -l’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ec’abusu ɛm oglog bwo ec’ɛgŋ e nin ɛm ewlmn ɛgŋ na ee?"
44004008	Ɛtŋ Piɛr ek’Abŋ Lala iy ɛm a dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛb ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl lele agŋ ekpekp ab,
44004009	yɛfɛnyna wɛl am ibrm ɛy low, low nimamn eke si kok s’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam eke bubm es a sosiɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl am ibrm ɛy elel ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na k’ewl a e low.
44004010	Ɛɛ, ɔny fɛŋ ow it eke k’uwr any, ke Israɛl eyŋ fɛŋ yɛji úw any: ek’ɛgŋ na inym ɔny es any af sos tuɔtuɔ ab, ke Jesu Krist, Nasarɛt iy a e nin a ec’abusu ɛm. Ɛwr ir olikŋ af kɔ Nyam igbm’n agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm.
44004011	Jesu el ɛgŋ a eke Nyam Lɛl dad in e low ninɛ: Lebn a eke ɔny, êl us ɛsɛl, waal ɛlul es a ɛwl el êl lɔy ɛm e lebn tasi.
44004012	In ɛm cɛ anake s’ɔtu eke si k’ɛŋn sel a, aŋke wus na nimum af, Nyam ɔɔm agŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci kaka ek’in ɛm si k’ɛŋn sel."
44004013	Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a low am iti any, aŋke -n’am ɛkn elel eke Piɛr lele Jan ab am dad odad ɛrm susu ɛm a, ɛtŋ ow am ok ɛl es sos ɛm eke ow el agŋ nɛnɛ cɛ eke wewrm low yɛj’a. Ɛtŋ -l’uw wɛl any eke wɛl b’anŋ Jesu ab.
44004014	Gbɛkɔ, eke -n’am ɛkn ɛgŋ a ek’ewl inym ɛl es saw a, Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ɛknm low eke ki dad.
44004015	Ow sosiɛm, -n’ɔŋ wɛl ok ɔkm luku as usu a ɛtŋ ɛl ɔfr -n’am bɛbm ów.
44004016	-N’am dadarir -l’ɛsɛ: "Ke sica bla lowi si ki kok agŋ amua ab ee? Tasi ɛm a, Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ uw any tasi ek’ow el ɛl -li kokr akrowa na; si k’ɔtum s’ɛgbrm kaka.
44004017	Gbɛkɔ, ke low na ec’amani a kí cɛcrm es dedeku ab ɛm fɛŋ a; s’ók ɛl erŋn lokm s’ɛdŋn ɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke -li ki dadmn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ odad Jesu e nin ɛm."
44004018	Eke -li bɛbmn ów a uwr a, -l’ɛsŋ Piɛr lele Jan ab ɛtŋ -l’ijl wɛl nɛny, -l’ɛdŋn wɛl eke wɛl kí dadm Jesu e nin a ec’odad, yɛgam agŋ Jesu e lís e low kaka fɛŋ.
44004019	Gbɛkɔ Piɛr lele Jan ab dad ɛl ninɛ: "Jɛ̀jr okr ɔny obi ɛm, eke tasi Nyam ec’any af ow el ɔny si k’ɛlum ɔny oglog Nyam si k’ɛlum.
44004020	Gbɛkɔ ɛy, si k’ɔtum s’ablm nɛny low yec’eke s’ɛkn ke s’iri a eci."
44004021	Ɛmɛny Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ok ɛl erŋn lokm ɛtŋ wal ok ɛl es. -L’ɛknm elel eke -li ki kokr wɛl low ŋuŋ, aŋke dedeku a nimum am kɔklm Nyam low a ek’ɛy a eci.
44004022	Ɛgŋ a eke in ec’ewlm a e low ɛw any iti a, ij akpo ekŋ yony afŋ es.
44004023	Kpɛkŋ eke wɛl ɛlu ɛl es a, Piɛr lele Jan ab im ɛŋn ɛl lawlɛl a, ɛtŋ otar ów a fɛŋ ek’ egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab dad a e low akr.
44004024	Eke -l’irir odad na a, nɛny af okr ɛm, ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ŋɔŋn Nyam dad ninɛ: "Es Ɛw, ŋ anake kok afr, wus, okij lele ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛl ɛm ab ab a.
44004025	Ŋ anake ɛcr Abŋ Lala ɛm ɔŋ ɛy lagŋ David ek’el ŋ e juma kok ɛs a am dad ɛsɛ: Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ ab ɛm likekr am ɛy ee? Ɛb eyŋ a ut ɛm ec’asre kɔ ow el ɔfr ɔfr!
44004026	Wus ec’ɛ́b ebu a bɛbm sos ar ogŋ eci ɛtŋ es ɛw ɛsɛl okr af sifn ɛm im Nyam lel in e Mesi ab ab ar.
44004027	Nawrɛ tasi, ɛb na ɛm Erɔd Antipas, Pɔns Pilat, etu agŋ lel Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab okr af ogŋ Jesu ek’el ŋ e libɔwi lala a eke sɔsum oc a ar.
44004028	Ow ɔŋ -li kok ów a fɛŋ eke ŋ ec’abusu ɛm lele ŋ ec’erur ɛm ab ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es a iy nɛny.
44004029	Sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛ̀kn ɛl e gbre e -n’am ɔl eke -li k’ijr ɛy a, ke ɔ́ŋ ŋ ec’ɔbɔwi a dád ŋ ec’odad a lokm susu ɛm tasi.
44004030	Ɛ̀lu ŋ ec’abusu a ɔkm yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl éwlm agŋ, kók sakrowa lele mɛny ɛwr ab ŋ e libɔwi lala Jesu e nin ɛm."
44004031	Eke -ni ŋɔŋan Nyam uwr a, yogŋ a eke -l’asr luku a umu. Ɛl fɛŋ Abŋ Lala iy ɛl ɛm ɛtŋ sica -n’am dad Nyam ec’odad a ɛrm susu ɛm.
44004032	Ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ okr af tasi, ɛrm ɛm lele ów tutr ɛm ab. Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ɛsmɛ in ec’ob ek’in ɔny a, in sɔny cɛ eci, kɔ ɛl ɔfr ɛm a, ob fɛŋ eke -n’ɔnyn a el dedeku a fɛŋ ec’ob.
44004033	Abusu ligbɛl ɛm, ɛrm ɛsɛl a am ij Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’uwɔmu ɛm anŋ igb a e daŋku, ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ Nyam am ɛdŋ ɛl ɔwrɔ nɔnɔ.
44004034	-
44004035	Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́nym ob kaka ec’es abur. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny sɔgm oglog mel a b’ɔl ij, ɛtŋ b’eb ow ec’os eke b’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a ow ɔŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ wɛl bi cɛc os a ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’es abur ek’ɔny a eci.
44004036	Kin low any ɔkŋn nyam: igŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Josɛf, ke ɛrm ɛsɛl a igŋ’n nin af Barnabas. (Ow e nyandrɛ el 'ɛgŋ eke b’atr ɛgŋ sos es'.) L’el Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ eke wɛl ew Sipr.
44004037	N’ɔny ɔgm nyam eke l’ɔl l’ij, ɛtŋ l’oc ow ec’os a l’is ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
44005001	Gbɛkɔ igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias, lele ɛy Safira ab, nɛny af okr ɛm, ɔl ɛl ec’ɔgm nyam ij.
44005002	-L’iririr ɛy ab ɛtŋ ɔgm a eke l’ɔl l’ij a, l’ubr ow ec’os ab es, ɛtŋ l’oc likpr a n’im n’ɔŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a. Li dad wɛl eke os a fɛŋ cɛ ana.
44005003	Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ananias, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ Satan ɔtu ɛy’ŋ ɛrm ɛm, ɔny yadŋ ɔŋ Abŋ Lala ɛtŋ ɛdŋn ɔgm a ek’ɔl ij a ec’os a e likpr ɛw es ee?
44005004	Gbuŋ ke ɔ́l ɔgm a ij a, ow el ŋ eci, ɛtŋ ek’ɔl ij a yɛji ow ec’os a el ŋ eci, kɔ yadŋ ee? Ayaf ɛtŋ ɔny tutr kok low akpasu na ee? Ow elm agŋ ɔnym yadŋ ɔɔm, kɔ Nyam."
44005005	Eke Ananias iri sodad amua a, l’ɛy wus ɛtŋ l’uw. Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’iri low na a erŋn ligbɛl am ɔny.
44005006	Ŋgbafrɛ oto ow oc sos megl a wiwrm gbad ab ɛtŋ im oc es.
44005007	Eke wanci nyahan ɛc a, Ananias e yɔw a ek’uwm low a ek’ɛy ab any a ow ɛy akŋ.
44005008	Piɛr ibrm’n ninɛ: "Dàd’m ɔ! Ɔny ec’ɔgm a ek’ɔɔl ijr a ec’os a e nɛny a, ow ow el na cɛ ee?" Ɛtŋ l’ɔdu l’eb ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, ow e nɛny a cɛ ana."
44005009	Ɛtŋ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ayaf tasi ɔtur okar nɛny af ŋ lel acŋ ab ɛbmn Nyam ec’Abŋ ab ee? Kin, agŋ a ek’oc acŋ es a ow igŋ lisany, ɛtŋ ŋ yɛji -li b’ow -l’oc -n’im’ŋ."
44005010	Wanci ab af cɛ l’ɛy wus Piɛr ec’akr esr a ɛtŋ l’uw. Ŋgbafrɛ oto a ok akŋ ɛtŋ ɛkn’n eke l’uw; -l’oc ow -n’im ɛtŋ -l’oc ow es ɛc eci saw yogŋ.
44005011	Sica Nyamel nimum lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’iri ów amua a erŋn ligbɛl am ɔny.
44005012	Ɛrm ɛsɛl a am kok mɛny ɛwr lele low any iti owi nɔnɔ gbɛl ab bieku a ec’araŋn. Ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ b’as luku Nyamel gbɛl a e lɛf eb usu a ek’ij Salomɔ e nin a.
44005013	Ɛgŋ ɛjeci kaka ɛ́gŋm owm ɛym ɛl ɛm; ke agŋ a b’aw ɛl nɔnɔ cɛ.
44005014	Kɔ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl, egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab, am ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ ɛtŋ -n’am ɛny,
44005015	toŋ wɛl am ot ɔ́lu yɛji ow ɛbɛrŋ ɛm, ɛ́rum ɛl es faja ɛm oglog sogo af yec’ɛtŋ ke ba Piɛr b’ubr ɛc a, ke in e lɔw a ɛ́cr ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ abi ka af.
44005016	Agŋ nɔnɔ am anŋ Jerusalɛm eci baŋn saw saw ab ɛm ow; -li b’ism ɔ́lu lel agŋ ek’ɔny abŋ eŋuŋ ab, ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -li b’ewl.
44005017	Ow sosiɛm, egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ in ab, ke el Sadusiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ a, ɛrm ɛsɛl a e low ɔny ɛl nyamn ɛyr afŋn es toŋ batŋ -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb eke -li ki kok ow e low.
44005018	-N’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok dedeku fɛŋ eci sobel ab ɛm.
44005019	Gbɛkɔ ncok ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow fifig sobel a e masany a, ɔny ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok ɔkm ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ:
44005020	"Ìmn Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ke ɔ́br sel ɛŋn owr a e kokoba okr bieku a nimum."
44005021	Ɛrm ɛsɛl a ɛlum ɛtŋ ibribr fafa, igb im Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a am yɛgm agŋ low. Eke egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ in ab a ow a, -l’as Sanedrɛn ek’el Jwifɛl ec’ów bɛbm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ luku, ɛtŋ -l’ɛrm Nyamel gbɛl a ec’abu af ɛsɛl a eke k’im sobel ab ɛm ɛsŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow.
44005022	Kɔ eke -n’imn -l’okr sobel ab ɛm a, -n’ɛŋnm ɛrm ɛsɛl a. -L’ɛwl mɛny -l’ow -n’ɔŋ Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a amani;
44005023	-li dad ninɛ: "Eke s’im a, s’ɛkn sobel a ek’abl anŋ tiŋ, ke usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a inym es lisany, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’usu a ek’it a. Kɔ eke si fifig masany a, s’ɛŋnm ɛgŋ kaka lokm yogŋ."
44005024	Eke Nyamel gbɛl a eci abu af ɛsɛl a ec’es ɛw ɛs a lel egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab iri amani na a, -l’uwm low yec’eke -li ki tutr ab any, ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm low yec’ek’ɛŋn ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
44005025	Kɔ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ow ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìrir ɔ! Agŋ a ek’ɔnyn okr sobel ɛm a anŋ Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ɛtŋ -n’am yɛgm bieku a low yogŋ."
44005026	Kpɛkŋ abu af ɛsɛl a ec’es ɛw ɛs a lele in ec’agŋ ab ab im ɛtŋ ot ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛwm lɛc ɛm, aŋke -n’am uru eke bieku a ki wɔwl ɛl mebn.
44005027	Sica eke -l’otr wɛl -l’owr a, -l’ot wɛl -n’im Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a am bibrm ɛl ów.
44005028	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Ɛy, s’ɛdŋn ɔny kpoŋ kpoŋ kpoŋ eke kí yɛgamn agŋ low ɛgŋ na e nin ɛm. Kɔ kin, ɔmunin ɔny e low yɛgm ab es Jerusalɛm ec’ɛb a nimum ɛm ɛtŋ am ocr in e luw a e low ɛwr ɛy af."
44005029	Kɔ Piɛr lel ɛrm ɛsɛl bɛb ab ab dad ninɛ: "Ow it eke si k’ɛlum Nyam, kɔ ow elm agŋ.
44005030	Ɔny, ɛwr Jesu olikŋ af, ibir ir, kɔ ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam a igbm’n luw ɛm.
44005031	Nyam ɔny igbl’l ogŋ in e lidr abu af ɛtŋ ɛw’r Es Ɛw Ɛs lele Sɔg Ɛs ab, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ Israɛl eyŋ abusu itŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke ɛ́ŋn ɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap.
44005032	Ɛy, s’ij ów amua e daŋku, ɛy lel Abŋ Lala a eke Nyam ɔŋ agŋ a eke b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ab ab."
44005033	Eke Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a iri sodad amua a, ɛrm ebl ɛl afŋn es, ɛtŋ -n’am erur eke -li k’ibi ɛrm ɛsɛl a.
44005034	Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm a, Farisi nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Gamaliɛl, ol e low yɛgm ɛs ligbɛl eke dedeku a b’ɛlum. L’igb Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn ɛtŋ l’ibrm eke wɛl k’ɔŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok ɔkm tɛl yɛ;
44005035	ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Israɛl ec’agŋ, low yec’eke b’ow kokr agŋ amua na a, ɛ̀wr ow e low ɛrm.
44005036	Ɔ̀kan eke ow ibnm yɛji, ɛtŋ Tedas ɛy ɔkm am ocr in sosi any ɛs ligbɛl, ɛtŋ agŋ eke k’ij agŋ duw im ɛŋn’n. Kɔ eke wɛl ibi’r a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’us’r jam a ɔmu es, ɛtŋ ɛl e low a yɛji oc es.
44005037	In e jam a, agŋ awl e lakpo ab af, Judas Galile iy a ɛy ɔkm, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ us’r jam. Kɔ in yɛji, eke wɛl ibi’r a, agŋ a fɛŋ ek’us’r jam a ɔmu es.
44005038	Ow sosiɛm a, m’am dad ɔny, k’ùsr agŋ amua e low jam ij, kɔ ɛ̀lul ɛl es -n’im. Eke ɛl e low a lel ɛl e juma ab ab el agŋ ɛm eci, ow b’ow oc es.
44005039	Gbɛkɔ ek’ow el Nyam ɛm eci tasi, k’ɔtumn ɔnymn ŋuŋnmn. Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ke ow k’elm Nyam ogŋmn ar!" Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ɛgŋ Gamaliɛl ec’odad a eb.
44005040	-L’ɛwl -l’ɛsŋ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow, -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr wɛl ɛtŋ -l’ijl wɛl nɛny eke wɛl ki dadm odad Jesu e nin ɛm ij, ɛtŋ -li wal -l’ok wɛl es.
44005041	Ɛrm ɛsɛl a ok ɔkm Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, aŋke Nyam ɛkn eke -l’el agŋ ek’it eke wɛl k’ijr gbre Jesu e nin a sosiɛm.
44005042	Ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ, Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a lel akŋ akŋ ab, abu anŋ ɛl ɛm -n’am yɛgm agŋ low ɛtŋ -n’am ɔb Mesi a ek’el Jesu a ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba.
44006001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke jam ɛsɛl a e nɛny a am bobn a, ɛl ɛm eci Jwifɛl eke b’ɛbr Grɛk a am ebl ɛrm ok ɛl a eke b’ɛbr Ebre ab af, dad eke wɛ’n ɛ́wm ɛl ec’eŋnyɔw a e low any eke ow’n bi sig ob cɛc e wanci a.
44006002	Ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a as jam ɛsɛl a nimum luku ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ow ɛbam eke si k’ɛw Nyam ec’odad a e dad es, ke s’am ɛkn ob ij e cɛc owi.
44006003	Ow sosiɛm agŋ lisijimɛl, sɔ̀sumn ɔny ec’araŋn a agŋ amamn lɔbŋ ek’Abŋ Lala lele sɛwr ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ otr, ke s’óc juma ikŋ na e low s’abul ɛl.
44006004	Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛy abusu ke s’úcu Nyam ŋɔŋn lele Nyam odad dad ab e low s’ɔny es s’am kok."
44006005	Jam ɛsɛl a nimum ɛgŋ low a eb, ɛtŋ kin agŋ a eke -li sɔsumn -l’otr a ec’en: Etiɛn ek’ɔmn lel Abŋ Lala ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ, Filip, Prokɔr, Nikanɔr, Timɔ, Parmenas lele Nikola ek’el Antiɔs ɛb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, ke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm ɛgŋ Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ a e low eb a.
44006006	Sica -l’ot -li yɛgm wɛl ɛrm ɛsɛl a ɛtŋ -l’at wɛl abu nuŋ -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam -n’ɔŋ wɛl.
44006007	Nyam ec’odad a am eb es, jam ɛsɛl a am bobn nɔnɔ Jerusalɛm ɛb ɛm, ɛtŋ egb waw ɛsɛl nɔnɔ am ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm.
44006008	Etiɛn eke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ lele lɛc ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ a, am kok low any iti owi lele mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl ab ɛb eyŋ a ec’araŋn.
44006009	Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Madu e wɛl eb ɛlu es' ec’agŋ nyam nyam am atar ów es Etiɛn ab. -L’el Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Sirɛn ɛb ɛm, Alesandri ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af lele Azi wus af ab ec’agŋ ek’ir Jerusalɛm.
44006010	-L’ɔtumn -l’akamn ow es ów es atar ab ɛm, aŋke n’am dad ów Abŋ Lala e sɛwr a ek’am ɔŋ’n ab ɛm.
44006011	Ow sosiɛm, -l’ub agŋ abu es, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a dád ɛsɛ: "S’iri -li dad ów -l’ɔbr Mois lele Nyam ab any!"
44006012	Nɛnɛ ɛm anake -n’am ok dedeku a, agŋ ekpekp a lele ol e low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab al lokm a. -L’okr Etiɛn es, -n’ɔny ow ɛtŋ -l’oc -n’im ow Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af.
44006013	-L’ot agŋ ek’am ij daŋku yadŋ ɛm ok Etiɛn af a yɛji -l’ow, ɛtŋ -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na, wanci kpaŋ nɛny b’anŋ’n ɛm n’am dad ów eŋuŋ l’ok ɛy e Nyamel gbɛl lala na lele Mois ec’ ol ab ab af!
44006014	S’iri li dad eke Nasarɛt e Jesu in b’ow in bubm ɛy e Nyamel gbɛl na in ok, ke ow’n titŋn ɛb ir a eke Mois in ɔŋ ɛy a."
44006015	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ Sanedrɛn e luku as ab ɛm a am lɛr Etiɛn gbiy ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn eke ow ec’any a anŋ ɛsɛ afr ɛrm ɛs ec’any ab af.
44007001	Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a ibrm Etiɛn ninɛ: "Ów amua eke wɛl am dad ŋ e lís a, kɔ nawrɛ ee?"
44007002	Etiɛn ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl lel agŋ ɛsɛl ab, ìgŋn lɔru es irir: eke ɛy lagŋ Abraham anŋ Mesopotami wus af a, gbuŋ eke li k’im l’ir Aran a, anygbɛl e Nyam ɛlu sos ɔkm yɛgm’n.
44007003	Li dad ow ninɛ: 'Ŋ̀gboŋ ŋ ec’ɛb na lele ŋ ec’eb na ɛm ab, ke ím ɛb a eke mi b’ow m’ɔkŋ’ŋ abu ab ɛm!'
44007004	Ow sosiɛm Abraham ŋgboŋ Kalde eyŋ ec’ɛb ab ɛm ɛtŋ im ir Aran. Sica eke ɛs uw oc es a, Nyam oc ow’r ɛb na ɛm eke iir lɛgŋ na ɛm a.
44007005	Ɛb na ɛm, Nyam ɔɔm Abraham usu kaka, l’ubrm usu logli yɛji n’ɔɔm ow; gbɛkɔ Nyam ij nɛny eke b’ow oc wus a nimum ɔŋ’n, ke in ec’alaw a eke b’ow anŋ in ɛm ok ɔkm a, ɛl yɛji idr wus a. Ke lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Abraham ɔnym iy kaka.
44007006	Kin yec’eke Nyam dad’r: 'Ŋ ec’alaw b’ow ir etu ɛb, ɛtŋ yogŋ -li b’ow -l’el madu wɛl ijr ɛl gbre toŋ akpo duw.
44007007	Gbɛkɔ ɛb a eke ŋ ec’alaw a b’ow el madu ɛl ec’abu ɛm a, mi b’ow mi jɛj ɛl e low m’ok. Ow e jam a, -li b’ow -l’igb yogŋ ke -l’ow -l’igŋ’m nuŋ aŋa na.'
44007008	Ɛtŋ Nyam kok sinm na Abraham ab ek’ow e mɛny ɛwr el likr es ubr. Ow ɛm Abraham ubr jim Isak likr es eke l’ew ow ba ow b’ij sɛgŋ niwn a; ɛbɛn nɛny nyam Isak yɛji bubr Jakɔb likr es, ɛtŋ Jakɔb yɛji bubr jimɛl ek’el ɛy lagŋɛl lɛw yony a ekr es.
44007009	Sica ɛy lagŋɛl ɔnyn Josɛf nyamn ɛyr, ɛtŋ -l’ɔl -l’ij ow eke ow k’el adu Ejipt. Gbɛkɔ Nyam anŋ in ab;
44007010	l’eb l’ɛlu ow es gbre fɛŋ ɛm. N’ɔŋ ow nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛtŋ Faraɔn ek’el Ejipt ec’ɛb ebu a ec’any af, l’akpal ow. Faraɔn ɛw Josɛf Ejipt ɛb a lel in ec’akŋ a ec’ob fɛŋ ab ec’es ɛw ɛs.
44007011	Lek ligbɛl ɛy Ejipt ɛb ɛm lele Kana ɛb ɛm ab. Ow ɔŋ gbre am afŋn es, ɛtŋ ɛy lagŋɛl ɛ́ŋnm ob kaka eke k’ij.
44007012	Eke Jakɔb iri ek’ob ij anŋ Ejipt a, l’ɛrm jimɛl ek’el ɛy lagŋɛl a im akp nyam.
44007013	Sica eke -n’imn sakp yony ɛm a, Josɛf okm sos ɔkm lisijimɛl a uw’r any, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ Faraɔn uw Josɛf ec’agŋ ab any.
44007014	Ɛtŋ Josɛf ɔŋ wɛl im oc ɛs Jakɔb lel in ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ij agŋ ekŋ nyahan agŋ lɛw yen a ow.
44007015	Jakɔb ow ir Ejipt toŋ uw yogŋ, ɛy lagŋɛl a yɛji.
44007016	Wɛl ot ɛl e sos megl a im Sikɛm, ɛtŋ uwɔmu a ek’Abraham ɔl os ɛm Amɔr jimɛl ec’abu ɛm Sikɛm baŋn a wɛl ot ɛl es.
44007017	Sica eke lɛgŋ ow titm eke Nyam ki kok ów a fɛŋ eke l’ɛwar Abraham a, ɛy ec’agŋ a am ɛny bobn Ejipt ɛb ab ɛm.
44007018	Ɛtŋ ɛb ebu ɛjeci nyam eke uwm Josɛf any a, ɛy ɔkm am nyimn ɛb a.
44007019	Ɛb ebu na ɛju ɛy ec’agŋ a ɛtŋ ɔnyn ɛy lagŋɛl milɔlu, ɔny ɛl lɛc ɛm -li digŋ ɛl ec’ey mɛny nɛnym -l’ok es eke k’uw.
44007020	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm anake wɛl ew Mois a; l’el iy ek’akpl ke Nyam erur. Wɛl gbagbl’l ɛs ec’akŋ a toŋ awl nyahan.
44007021	Sica eke wɛl igŋ ɛlu’l es a, Faraɔn jɔw a oc’r ɛtŋ gbagbl’l ɛsɛ in ec’iy lokm af.
44007022	Ow ɔŋ Mois uw Ejipt eyŋ e low fɛŋ any, ɛtŋ l’el ɛgŋ gbawru odad ebl ɛm lel ów kok ɛm ab.
44007023	Eke Mois ɔny akpo ekŋ yony a, l’erur eke li k’im l’ɛkn Israɛl eyŋ ek’el in ec’ɛbr ec’agŋ a.
44007024	L’ɛkn Ejipt iy nyam ek’am ɔnyn Israɛl iy nyam milɔlu; l’eb ow ec’usu a eke li ki dogŋn ow, ɛtŋ low a eke li ki kok l’ɔbar any ab ɛm l’ibi Ejipt iy a.
44007025	Li tutr eke lisijimɛl Israɛl eyŋ a b’ow iri eke Nyam am ow ɛcr in ɛm eb ɛlu ɛl es, kɔ -l’irim ɛbɛn.
44007026	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Mois uyum Israɛl eyŋ yony ek’am ogŋ mum ab, ɛtŋ l’erur eke li k’ɔny l’okr wɛl ɛm. Li dad wɛl ninɛ: 'Ɛm lawlɛl, ɔny agŋ lisijimɛl ɔfr eel, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ɔnyanin milɔlu ee?'
44007027	Kɔ ɛgŋ nyam a ek’am ɔnyn lawl a milɔlu a itr Mois ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: 'Kɔ ŋ, bwo ɛw’ŋ ɛsɛ ɛy ec’es ɛw ɛs af, ɛsɛ ɛy e jɛj ok ɛs af ee?
44007028	Am erur eke k’ibi’m ɛsɛ elel eke efi cɛ, ibi Ejipt iy ab af ee?'
44007029	Eke Mois iri sodad amua a, l’uru es n’im l’ir Madian ɛtŋ l’ew ey yony yogŋ.
44007030	Eke akpo ekŋ yony ɛc’a, loj a e titm Sinayi lafɛny ab ɛm, afr ɛrm ɛs nyam yɛgm Mois sos, duw luku ek’am iri al ab ɛm.
44007031	Eke Mois ɛkn ɛbɛn a, ow ɛw’r any iti. Gbɛkɔ eke l’erur e li k’ɛri n’im li titm ke l’ɛ́kn a, l’iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lebl ek’am dad’r ɛsɛ:
44007032	'M’el alagŋɛl e Nyam, Abraham, Isak lele Jakɔb ab e Nyam.' Mois erŋn am ɔny ufŋ ɛtŋ ɔ́tum igblm any ogŋ.
44007033	Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: 'Ɔ̀ny ŋ eci cɔkrukpɔ a ot es akr ɛm, aŋke usu a ek’inym es a, usu lala.
44007034	M’ɛkn ɛm ec’agŋ a e gbre ek’am ij Ejipt a, m’iri ɛl e sɔmu ikŋ a ɛtŋ m’us es eke mi ki sɔg ɛl. Òw, ke sica m’ɛ́rm’ŋ Ejipt.'
44007035	Mois nyam a cɛ eke Israɛl eyŋ ogŋ ke dad’r ninɛ: 'Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɛw’ŋ ɛsɛ ɛy ec’es ɛw ɛs lele ɛy e jɛj ok ɛs af a,' in cɛ Nyam ɛrm’n ɛsɛ es ɛw ɛs lele sɔg ɛs af, afr ɛrm ɛs a eke ɛlu sos ɔkm yɛgm’n duw luku ab ɛm a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
44007036	Mois anake ɔny Israɛl eyŋ ok ɔkm Ejipt, low any iti owi lele mɛny ɛwr owi e li kok ɛb ab ɛm, Okij Ebl a ogŋ a lele loj ab ɛm eke -n’anŋn toŋ ij akpo ekŋ yony a.
44007037	Ɛmɛny Mois na cɛ anake dad Israɛl eyŋ ninɛ: 'Nyam b’ow awŋ ɔny kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam ɛsɛ ɛm af eke b’ow el ɔny ec’agŋ ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam.'
44007038	Eke Israɛl eyŋ as luku loj a, Mois anake anŋ ɛy lagŋɛl lele afr ɛrm ɛs a eke am dad’r odad Sinayi lafɛny af a ec’araŋn a; ɛtŋ l’eb sel ɛŋn e sodad Nyam ogŋ l’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy.
44007039	Gbɛkɔ ɛy lagŋɛl ɛgŋm ɔnym in ec’ɛlum; -l’igŋ ow ɛtŋ -l’erur eke -li k’ɛwl mɛny -n’im Ejipt.
44007040	-Li dad Arɔn ninɛ: 'Kòk sinyam eke b’an es ɛy ec’any af ɔŋ ɛy, kɔ Mois ek’ɔny ok ɛy ɔkm Ejipt a, s’uwm low yec’eke ɛŋn’n ab any.'
44007041	-Li kok id ewli ɛsɛ nyàm af ɛtŋ -li waw egb -n’ɔŋ ow, -li gbɛgbl es nyàm na ek’ɛl obi -li kokr a eci.
44007042	Nyam ɔny nyamn oc ɛl es af ɛtŋ ɛgb ɛl es -l’igŋ afr e mílɛ́l nuŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e lɛl ɛm ab af: Israɛl eyŋ, tasi, ɛm apr’m mindey lele segb waw ɛjec’ab loj a eke anŋn toŋ ow ij akpo ekŋ yony ab ee?
44007043	Njaŋ! Gbɛkɔ abur ɔny e nyàm Molɔk eci nuŋ igŋ êl a lele ɔny e lɛ́l nyàm Refan e mɛny ɛwr ab ab owr, ekŋ ɛm nyàm amua eke kokr eke k’igŋn nuŋ a. Na sosiɛm anake mi b’ow m’ɛwl ɔny madu ɔkr ɛm, usu eke ibn akm Babilɔn.
44007044	Gbad ɛm êl a eke sinm a e lɛl anŋ ɛm a, ɛy lagŋɛl ɔnym ab loj a. Wɛl us’r kpɛ kpɛ kpɛ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam yɛgmn Mois ab af.
44007045	Gbad ɛm êl ikŋ na wɛl oc’r ɔŋ ey a ek’usr ɛy lagŋɛl usu a; -l’oc ab -n’im lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke Joswe am nyimn ɛl a. Nyam ogŋ ɛb ɛb a ek’anŋ ɛl anym a, ɛtŋ -l’eb sɛb a. Êl a gbɛ anŋ toŋ igŋ David e lɛgŋ ɛm a.
44007046	David ɛŋn bibm Nyam ec’any af ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow abusu eke li k’us êl nyam n’ɔŋ Jakɔb e Nyam a.
44007047	Gbɛkɔ, Salomɔ anake us êl a.
44007048	Ke Afr Kpekpe e Nyam a írm mel ek’agŋ ec’abu b’us ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke kokoba ɔb ɛs a dad ab af:
44007049	Nyam dad ninɛ: 'Afr el ɛm ec’ɛb ir usu, ɛtŋ wus el ɛm ec’akr es ok usu. Bogŋ ec’êl tasi ɔtur eke k’usr ɔŋn’m ee? Bogŋ ogŋ tasi m’ɔtu eke mi k’ir ee?
44007050	Ɛtŋ kɔ ow elm ɛm obi mi kokm mob amua fɛŋ ee?'
44007051	Ɔny agŋ és ɛfuu ek’ɔny ec’ɛrm lel ɔru ab babl Nyam ec’ɛsŋ a e lís; sɛgŋ fɛŋ am atarir Abŋ Lala ab cɛ! Ɔny anŋn ɛsɛ ɔny lagŋɛl ab af!
44007052	Bogŋ eci kokoba ɔb ɛs ɔny lagŋɛl ijrm gbre ee? -L’ibi agŋ a ek’ɔb ɛl Nɛny Nyam Ɛs nyam coco a eke k’ow a e kokoba a; ɛtŋ sica in anake ɔny ɛjur ir ke ibir ir a.
44007053	Ɔny eke Nyam ɛcr in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm ɔŋ ɔny in ec’ol a, ɔny, ɛluamn ol ikŋ na!"
44007054	Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ɛrm ebl afŋn es sodad amua eke -l’irir a sosiɛm, ɛtŋ -n’am sasagr an ɛm -l’ok Etiɛn af.
44007055	Kɔ ek’Abŋ Lala iy’r ɛm a, n’am lɛr afr, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn Nyam ec’anygbɛl a lele Jesu ek’inym es Nyam e lidr abu af ab.
44007056	Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛ̀kan, m’am ɛkn afr eke fig lele ɛgŋ ec’ Iy ek’inym es Nyam e lidr abu af ab."
44007057	Eke -li b’iri ɛbɛn a, -li babl ɔru es ɛtŋ -n’am babarm. Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ok Etiɛn af,
44007058	-l’ɔdu -l’ɛlu ow ɔkm baŋn a, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔr ow mebn ɛm eke -li k’ibi ow. Adaŋku a ok ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es ŋgbafrɛ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Sɔl a ec’anym eke k’ɔsu.
44007059	Eke wɛl am ɔr’r mebn ɛm a, Etiɛn am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛsɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu, èb ɛm ec’abŋ a!"
44007060	Ow e jam a, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ li barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, k’ɔ̀ŋ ɛl -li k’ebr ɛm e luw na e ligbɔw!" Eke li dad sodad amua ba ow b’uwr a, l’ok sel es.
44008001	Sɔl ɛgŋ Etiɛn ec’ibi a e low eb. Lɛgŋ a cɛ gbre ijr ligbɛl ɔbr Nyamel ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a. Agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn a fɛŋ uru ɔmu es Jude lele Samari ab e wus ab af; ɛrm ɛsɛl a gbɛ urum es.
44008002	Agŋ ek’ɔny Nyam e muru a oc Etiɛn im oc es ɛtŋ ikŋ in e luw a ec’ɔŋn nɔnɔ.
44008003	Kɔ Sɔl ek’erur eke ki ŋuŋn Nyamel a, aam akŋ akŋ ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn a, egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab ok sobel ɛm.
44008004	Sica agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn ke ɔmu es a, am ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba usu a fɛŋ.
44008005	Filip im Samari ec’ɛb ligbɛl ab ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛb eyŋ a Mesi a ec’odad.
44008006	Dedeku a nɛny af okr ɛm am ɛw Filip ec’odad a ɛrm af, aŋke -n’am iri ɛtŋ -n’am ɛkn mɛny ɛwr a eke n’am kok a.
44008007	Tasi ɛm a, abŋ eŋuŋ am babarm ok ɔkm ɔ́lu nɔnɔ ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ e bubm es lel akr kpɛcɛ ɛsɛl nɔnɔ ab yɛji am ewl.
44008008	Ow ɔŋ sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛy ɛb ab ɛm.
44008009	Igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ ikŋ anym anŋ baŋn a. Li bi kok cam owi ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ Samari eyŋ nimum anŋ low any iti ligbɛl ɛm. Li b’ocr in sosi any ɛs,
44008010	ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ, igŋ ŋgbafrɛ toŋ agŋ ekpekp a b’ɛw in e low ɛrm af. Wɛl bi dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na 'Nyam ec’abusu', yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Abusu Ligbɛl a.' "
44008011	-Li b’ɛw ow e low ɛrm af nɔnɔ, aŋke lɛgŋ kpekpe ɛtŋ, li kok ów any iti owi n’ɔŋ wɛl in e cam owi ab ɛm.
44008012	Gbɛkɔ sica Filip ɔb ɛl Amani Mamn a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a lele Jesu Krist e nin ab ab e kokoba. Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a, egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab, wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
44008013	Simɔ in obi yɛji ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ; li b’anŋ Filip saw ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl a lele sakrowa ab ab eke n’am ɛkn ow am kok a e low am iti’r any.
44008014	Eke ɛrm ɛsɛl ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a iri eke Samari eyŋ ɛgŋ Nyam ec’odad a eb a, -l’ɛrm Piɛr lele Jan ab im yogŋ.
44008015	Eke -n’imn -l’okr yogŋ a, -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ɛ́ŋn Abŋ Lala.
44008016	Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala k’usm es ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka af; kɔ mij nuŋ gbɛ wɛl ok ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm.
44008017	Ca Piɛr lele Jan ab at ɛl abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala.
44008018	Eke Simɔ ɛkn eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a am at agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a abu nuŋ ke -n’am ɛŋn Abŋ Lala a, n’am ɔl eke li k’ɔŋ Piɛr lele Jan ab os.
44008019	N’am dad l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛm yɛji, ɔ̀ŋn’m abusu ikŋ na, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ yec’eke mi b’at abu nuŋ a ɛ́ŋn Abŋ Lala."
44008020	Kɔ Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ke ŋ ec’os a lele ŋ obi ab úgŋn es, aŋke ŋ e tutr ɛm a, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔl Nyam ec’ob ap a os ɛm!
44008021	Low na otm’ŋ es ɛtŋ ŋ e low yɛji anm ɛm, aŋke ŋ ec’ɛrm a inyam Nyam ec’any af.
44008022	Ìgŋ ŋ ec’ów tutr eŋuŋ a ok es, ke ŋɔ́ŋn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yec’ɛtŋ ke ek’ow it, l’óc tutr na ek’ɔny a l’ap’ŋ.
44008023	Tasi ɛm a, m’am ɛkn ek’ów tutr lolo iy’ŋ ɛm gbɔŋ ɛtŋ el sikpl ec’adu."
44008024	Simɔ dad Piɛr lele Jan ab ninɛ: "Ɔny obi ŋɔ̀ŋan Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋn’m, yec’ɛtŋ ke ów amua fɛŋ eke dadr a k’ɛ́ŋnm im."
44008025	Sica eke ɛrm ɛsɛl yony a ij daŋku ke dad Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a, -l’ɛwl -n’im Jerusalɛm. Ejagb eke -l’usr -n’aam a, -l’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba Samari e sɛb nɔnɔ ɛm.
44008026	Sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam dad Filip ninɛ: "B’ow imn esr ɛm ec’a, ebr a ek’am usr mɛny es Jerusalɛm ɛtŋ imn Gaza ec’ab af, yec’a ek’ɛcr loj a."
44008027	Kpɛkŋ Filip igb im. Ɛtŋ ebr ab af, n’ɛŋn igŋ nyam; ow el Etiopi iy igŋ agbru nyam, juma ɛs ligbɛl eke b’ɔsu Etiopi ec’ɛb eb yɔw Kandas a ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ. L’ow Jerusalɛm l’igŋ Nyam nuŋ
44008028	batŋ n’am ɛwl mɛny n’im in ogŋ a. Li sig es in e lɛtŋ a eke gbaŋkɔ b’ɔdu ab ɛm n’am awl kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi e lɛl a.
44008029	Abŋ Lala dad Filip ninɛ: "Ìm toŋ ke títm lɛtŋ a."
44008030	Filip uru es im titm lɛtŋ a ɛtŋ iri Etiopi iy a ek’am awl kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi e lɛl a. L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Kɔ lɛl a ek’am awl a ow am ok’ŋ es sos ɛm ee?"
44008031	Igŋ a ɔdu eb ninɛ: "Ayaf ow ɔtu eke k’ok’m es sos ɛm ek’ɛgŋ otarm akr okm im ee?" Ɛtŋ li dad Filip eke k’ɛy lɛtŋ ab ɛm ke síg’r es saw.
44008032	Lɛl a e n’am awl a el na: Ɛsɛ licɛb eke wɛl b’oc im ibi usu af, ɛsɛ licɛbli eke baram agŋ a ek’am iri’r suw es a ec’any af ab af, li dadm low kaka.
44008033	N’ɛŋn ɛ́s ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl ɛgŋm in e low ij a ɔɔm’n. Kɔ bwo b’ow dad in ec’ey ec’odad ee? Tasi ɛm a, in e sel uwr wus na af.
44008034	Igŋ a ibrm Filip ninɛ: "M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ dad’m, kokoba ɔb ɛs a, bwo ec’ɛgŋ ec’odad n’am dad ee? Kɔ in obi e low oglog ɛgŋ ɛjeci e low n’am dad ee?"
44008035	Filip ɔb nuŋ odad ikpr na af, ɛtŋ am otar Jesu ec’Amani Mamn a ec’ów akr ok’r.
44008036	Eke -n’anŋn ejagb ab af -n’aam a, -l’ok usu nyam eke mij anŋ ɛtŋ igŋ a dad ninɛ: "Kin mij, bla lowi am ɛdŋn’m eke mi k’ok mij nuŋ ee?" [
44008037	Filip dad’r ninɛ: "Eke ɔny ɔmn ŋ ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ɔtu eke k’ok mij nuŋ." Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a dad’r ninɛ: "M’ɔny ɔmn eke Jesu Krist el Nyam ec’Iy."]
44008038	Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ lɛtŋ a inym es. Filip lele igŋ ab ab us es mij ab ɛm ɛtŋ Filip ok’r mij nuŋ.
44008039	Eke -n’anŋn mij ab ɛm -l’okr ɔkm a, kpɛkŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’Abŋ ɔny Filip oc es ɛtŋ igŋ a ɛknm’n ij; gbɛkɔ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm Etiopi iy a eb ejagb aam.
44008040	Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Filip ɛkn eke ow el Asɔt baŋn anake n’anŋ a, ɛtŋ n’am ɛc l’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba baŋn baŋn a toŋ l’ok Sesare.
44009001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Sɔl ec’ɛrmij ebr a el ke n’ám ɔɔr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e jam ɛsɛl a abr wɛl ec’ibi eci. N’im n’ɛŋn egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a
44009002	ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow eke ow k’ɔŋ’n silɛl ek’ow ɛm Damas ɛb ɛm e Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a wɛl k’uwr’r any, yec’ɛtŋ eke n’ɛ́ŋn agŋ, egŋ oglog ɔyɔw ek’am us Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a, l’ɔ́tu n’ɔny wɛl ke l’ót wɛl l’ow Jerusalɛm.
44009003	Eke Sɔl us ejagb aam Damas ke n’am titm yogŋ a, kpru ɛm, usu ayl anŋ afr ɛjn iwr ɛlul il ɛm.
44009004	L’ɛy wus ɛtŋ l’iri lebl nyam eke am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Sɔl, Sɔl, kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ijr’m gbre ee?"
44009005	L’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bwo el’ŋ ee?" Ɛtŋ lebl a ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛm Jesu ek’am ijr gbre a.
44009006	Sica ìgb wus, ìm ɛb ab ɛm, yogŋ wɛl b’ow dad’ŋ low yec’ek’it eke ki kok a."
44009007	Agŋ a ek’us ejagb Sɔl ab a uk inym es ɛtŋ -l’ɔtumn -li dadmn low kaka; -n’am iri lebl a gɔŋ, kɔ -l’ɛknmn ɛgŋ kaka.
44009008	Sɔl anŋ wus igb ɛtŋ pig pig anyamn, kɔ l’ɔtum l’ɛknm low kaka. Wɛl ɔny’n abu oc’r im Damas.
44009009	Sɛgŋ emum nyahan eke l’ɔtum l’ɛknm es, l’ijm ob kaka ke l’ɛgŋm mij yɛji.
44009010	Damas yogŋ jam ɛs nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛgm’n sos es ɛkn ɛm ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ananias!" L’ɛgŋ ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kin ɛm."
44009011	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb caca cɛ im ɛbɛrŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Nyim Nyim' ab ɛm, ke Judas ec’akŋ a, íbrm ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Sɔl, Tars iy. N’anŋ Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm wanci na af.
44009012	Ɛtŋ es ɛkn ɛm, l’ɛkn ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias ek’am ɛy akŋ at’r abu nuŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny l’ɔ́tu l’ɛkn es."
44009013	Ananias ɔdu eb dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, agŋ nɔnɔ dad’m ɛgŋ na e low ɛtŋ -li dad’m ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ eke li kok ŋ ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a e lís.
44009014	Ɛtŋ l’ow aŋa abusu a ek’egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ɔŋ’n ab ab eke li k’ɔny agŋ a eke b’ɛsŋ ŋ e nin a."
44009015	Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìm, aŋke mi sɔsum ɛgŋ na m’oc ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛcr in ɛm m’ɛlu ɛm e nin a ɔkm ɛbr ɛbr ɛjec’a ec’agŋ eci, ɛl eci ɛ́b ebu a lel Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab ec’any af.
44009016	Ɛm obi ɛm obi mi b’ow mi yɛgm’n gbre fɛŋ eke li b’ow l’ij ɛm e nin a ec’a."
44009017	Sica Ananias im ɛtŋ eke l’ɛy akŋ a, l’at Sɔl abu nuŋ ɛtŋ li dad ow ninɛ: "Ɛm lisijim Sɔl, ejagb a eke ebr am ow a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛlu sos ɔkm yɛgm’ŋ. In anake l’ɛrm’m m’ow a. L’ɛrm’m m’ow yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny ɔ́tu ɛkn es, ke Abŋ Lala íy’ŋ ɛm gbɔŋ."
44009018	Kpɛkŋ ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɔcn sel af a anŋ Sɔl ec’anyamn ab ɛm ok wus ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’ɔtu l’ɛkn es. L’igb ɛtŋ wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ;
44009019	ɛtŋ eke l’ij ob a, lɛc ow’r ɛm. Sɔl anŋ jam ɛsɛl a ek’ir Damas ab ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
44009020	Kpɛkŋ n’am ɔb kokoba Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu, li dad eke Jesu in el Nyam jim.
44009021	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am iri’r lebl a low am iti any ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kɔ ow elm ɛgŋ a eke Jerusalɛm am ijr agŋ a eke b’ɛsŋ Jesu e nin a gbre ab ee? Ɛtŋ aŋa eke l’ow a gbɛ, ow elm eke li k’ɔny wɛl ke l’ɛ́wl wɛl egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a ogŋ ee?"
44009022	Eke Sɔl am yɛgm Jwifɛl a ek’ir Damas a eke Jesu in el Mesi a, n’am dad low a lɛc ɛm toŋ Jwifɛl a ɛ́knm low eke ki dad.
44009023	Eke ow ibn a, Jwifɛl a ut asre eke k’ɔŋ wɛl ibi Sɔl,
44009024	kɔ Sɔl iri ɛl ec’asre ut a e low. Ow ɔŋ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, wɛl am ɔsu baŋn a e masany a yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl íbi’r.
44009025	Ow sosiɛm, ncok nyam Sɔl e jam ɛsɛl a ɔny ɛlu’l ulu nyam ɛm ɛtŋ ɔny usm’n es baŋn a e lakp jam a.
44009026	Eke Sɔl im ɛy Jerusalɛm a, l’ɔl eke li k’ɛy jam ɛsɛl ab ɛm, kɔ ɛl fɛŋ in e low am ɔny ɛl erŋn, aŋke -li k’ubm nawrɛ eke ow k’el jam ɛs tasi.
44009027	Barnabas oc’r ab im ɛtŋ ɛwl’l ɛrm ɛsɛl a ogŋ. Ɛtŋ l’otar elel eke Sɔl ɛkan Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ejagb af, lele elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dadr Sɔl odad ab a, e low akr l’ok wɛl. Ɛmɛny l’otar elel eke lokm susu ɛm Sɔl ɔb Jesu e nin a e kokoba Damas a yɛji e low akr l’ok wɛl.
44009028	Yogŋ ɛtŋ Sɔl anŋ ɛl ab, ɛtŋ Jerusalɛm ɛb ab ɛm n’am ɛc l’ɔb kokoba ɔmn ɛm tasi Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm.
44009029	Li bi dad odad l’ok Jwifɛl eke b’ɛbr Grɛk a yɛji, ɛtŋ wɛl ab li b’atar ów es; kɔ agŋ amua am erur eke k’ɔŋ wɛl ibi’r.
44009030	Eke agŋ lisijimɛl a iri ow e low a, -l’oc Sɔl -l’us nuŋ es -n’im Sesare ɛb ɛm ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ ow imn Tars eci.
44009031	Sica Nyamel anŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm Jude wus af nimum, Galile lele Samari ab. N’am agb ɔmn ɛm ɛtŋ n’am ir ɛb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ɛlum ɛm. Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm a, nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a am bobn.
44009032	Eke Piɛr am ɛc usu a fɛŋ a, lɛgŋ nyam n’im l’ok Lida baŋn ec’agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a ogŋ.
44009033	Yogŋ, n’ɛŋn igŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ene eke ɛru es ob ɛrur ob af toŋ akpo niwn, aŋke li bubm es.
44009034	Piɛr dad’r ninɛ: "Ene, Jesu Krist am ewlm’ŋ! Ìgb ke ár ŋ ec’ob ɛrur ob ab es ŋ obi." Kpɛkŋ Ene anŋ wus igb.
44009035	Lida baŋn ec’agŋ a fɛŋ lele Sarɔn wus pɛtɛ ab af ec’agŋ a ek’ɛkn Ene ec’ewlm owi a, itŋn ɛrm ɛm ɛtŋ el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
44009036	Jope baŋn, jam us lis nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Tabita. (Nin a Grɛk ɛm a 'Dɔrkas', ɛtŋ ow e nyandrɛ el 'ndeyɛgŋ'.) Sɛgŋ fɛŋ abu b’anŋ’n low nimamn e kok ɛm lele ɔgbɔru ec’abu ɛlum owi ɛm ab.
44009037	Lɛgŋ nyam l’ɛy ɔl ɛtŋ luw ibi’r. Eke wɛl ok’r mij bake ow uwr a, wɛl kok’r sos ɛtŋ wɛl oc’r im ɛrum’n es êl afr a ec’oj nyam ɛm.
44009038	Eke Lida titm Jope ke jam ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ Jope a iri eke Piɛr in anŋ yogŋ a, -l’ɛrm agŋ yony eke k’im ɔŋ’n amani na: "S’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, ìgbm ab kpɛkŋ ow ɛy ogŋ aŋa."
44009039	Eke Piɛr ɛŋn amani a, kpɛkŋ l’igb n’im ɛ́rmu ab ab. Eke l’ow l’ɛy yogŋ a, wɛl oc im’n êl afr a ec’oj ab ɛm. Eŋnyɔw a fɛŋ ow titm’n am ikŋ ɔŋn, ɛtŋ am yɛgm’n sikotu a lele simob af ɛw a eke Tabita kok in ec’owr anŋ ɛm a.
44009040	Piɛr ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ok gbeŋ ɛtŋ l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ni ŋɔŋn Nyam. Sica l’ɛwl l’ɔkŋ lɛgŋuw ab any ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Tabita, ìgb wus!" Lɛgŋuw a fig fig anyamn ɛtŋ eke l’ɛkn Piɛr a, l’igb li sig es.
44009041	Piɛr ucu abu ɔny’n ɛlum’n abu l’igb n’inym es. Ow e jam a, l’ɛsŋ eŋnyɔw a lele ɔmn ɔny ɛsɛl ab ab ɛtŋ li yɛgm wɛl Tabita ek’anŋ owr.
44009042	Low a eb es Jope baŋn a nimum ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ɔny ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm.
44009043	Piɛr anŋ Jope kok sɛgŋ nɔnɔ, ndey lɛl juma kok ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ a ec’akŋ.
44010001	Sesare ɛb ɛm, igŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kɔrnɛy. Rom eci srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’eb nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Itali eb a', l’el ow ec’anym ɛs.
44010002	L’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs tasi; in lel in ec’akŋ a fɛŋ ab -l’ɔpimn Nyam nuŋ igŋ. Sakp nɔnɔ li b’ɛlum Jwifɛl ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru abu ɛtŋ li bi ŋɔŋn Nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
44010003	Ncebles nyam eci wanci nyahan ɛm, l’ɛkn es, kpata Nyam ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’ɛy in ec’akŋ a ke ɛsŋ’n: "Kɔrnɛy!"
44010004	Li lɛr afr ɛrm ɛs a erŋn ab ɛtŋ l’ibrm ow ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bla lowi ee?" Afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: "Nyam ɛgŋ ŋ e ŋɔŋn a lele ɔgbɔru ec’abu eke b’ɛlum ab ab e low eb, ɛtŋ l’ijlm ŋ es.
44010005	Sica, ɔ̀ŋ agŋ ím Jope ɛsŋ ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ Piɛr a ow.
44010006	N’anŋ ndey lɛl juma kok ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ, ek’in ec’êl a anŋ okij nɛny a ogŋ."
44010007	Ek’afr ɛrm ɛs a e dad’r odad a im a, Kɔrnɛy ɛsŋ in ec’akŋ juma kok ɛsɛl ab ɛm e yony lel in e srɔda eyŋ ab ɛm e nyam eke b’anŋ’n saw, ke el Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs tasi ab ab ow.
44010008	L’otar low a fɛŋ ek’ɛy a akr l’ok wɛl ɛtŋ l’ɛrm wɛl Jope.
44010009	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny akr af, ke ɛ́rmu nyahan a ek’us ejagb a am titm Jope a, Piɛr uyu êl luw af pɛtɛ ab af Nyam ŋɔŋn eci. Ke lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ŋ̂,
44010010	ɛtŋ namn ow’r sos; eke wɛl am kok in ec’ob ij owi a, n’am ɛkan nuŋ ɛm.
44010011	L’ɛkn afr ek’agbr ɛm ɛtŋ ob nyam anŋ ɛm am us es: ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ gbad ligbɛl af eke wɛl ucu ow ec’ɛnyɛmbri yar a ɔny es ke am is es wus.
44010012	Gbad ab af mindey ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɛli akr yar, lel ɛl eke b’ɛrir es wus wus, lele ɔr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ ab anŋ ɛm.
44010013	Lebl nyam dad ninɛ: "Piɛr, ìgb, ìbi ke íj!"
44010014	Gbɛkɔ Piɛr ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, mi k’ɔtum, aŋke lɛgŋ kaka m’ijm ob eke wɛl ɛdŋn oglog ob ek’ aylm ŋ eci any af a."
44010015	Ɛmɛny lebl a ikŋn ɛm ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Kì lɛr ob yec’eke Nyam ayal a ɛsɛ ob ek’aylm af."
44010016	Low a ɛy ɔkm kpa kpa kpa sakp nyahan ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ ob a ɛwl mɛny im afr.
44010017	Piɛr am tutr low na eke l’ɛkn es ɛkn ɛm a e nyandrɛ. Kɔ wanci ab af, agŋ a eke Kɔrnɛy ɛrm a bi bibrm uw yogŋ eke Simɔ ec’êl a k’anŋ ab any, ɛtŋ sica -l’ow -l’ok lisany a.
44010018	-N’am ibrm -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ aŋa anake Simɔ Piɛr anŋ ab ee?"
44010019	Piɛr anŋ am tutr es ɛkn a e nyandrɛ, ɛtŋ Abŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Kin agŋ nyahan anŋ aŋa am ɔl’ŋ.
44010020	Ìgb, ùs es, ke ím ɛl ab; kì bɛbar aŋke ɛm m’ɛrm ɛl -l’ow."
44010021	Piɛr us es im ɛŋn agŋ a ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ɛm, ɛgŋ a ek’am ɔɔl ab ana. Kɔ bla sosiɛm owr ee?"
44010022	-Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛy, ɛy ec’anym ɛs Kɔrnɛy e nin ɛm s’ow. L’el nɛny nyam ɛs eke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ ɛtŋ Jwifɛl a fɛŋ b’aw’r. Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛs nyam ow dad’r eke li k’ɛsŋ’ŋ ow in ogŋ a, ke l’íri yec’a eke b’ow ɔny dad’r a."
44010023	Ɛtŋ sica Piɛr eb ok ɛl akŋ ncok a eci. Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, l’us ejagb wɛl ab, ɛtŋ Jope ec’agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ɛwl’l.
44010024	Eke ɛmɛny lɛgŋ ɛny akr af a, l’ɛy Sesare. Kɔrnɛy lel in ec’akŋ ec’agŋ a lele lawlɛl tasi eke l’ɛw abu ow a, anŋ ɛl ec’eku ɛm.
44010025	Wanci ab af eke Piɛr am ow ɛy akŋ a, Kɔrnɛy igb ow ɔbr’r ɛtŋ ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’any af, ɛsŋn in ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm.
44010026	Kɔ Piɛr ɔny igbm’n ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb, aŋke ɛm yɛji ɛgŋ cɛ m’el."
44010027	Ɛtŋ eke n’am ot nɛnym Kɔrnɛy ab a, l’ɛy akŋ a; yogŋ, l’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ eke as luku.
44010028	Li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Uwr any eke Jwif eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr a ɔɔm abusu eke li k’im l’ɛkn utu ɛgŋ oglog l’ɛy ow ec’akŋ a. Kɔ ɛm, Nyam yɛgm’m eke mi k’ócm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke aylm oglog ɛgŋ ek’itm eke wɛl k’im ɛkn af.
44010029	Na sosiɛm, eke ɛsŋn’m a, m’ɔnym nɛny m’ocm es ɛtŋ m’ow. Sica m’am erur eke mi k’uw low a nuŋ af eke ɛsŋ’m ab any."
44010030	Kɔrnɛy ɔdu eb dad ninɛ: "Ow ij sɛgŋ nyahan eke wanci nɛnɛ af ek’el ncebles e wanci nyahan ɛm a eke m’anŋ ɛm ogŋ a Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm a, kpru ɛm ɛgŋ nyam eke sus mob ek’am jɛjn a inym’m es anym.
44010031	Li dad’m ninɛ: 'Kɔrnɛy, Nyam iri ŋ e ŋɔŋn e lebl a ɛtŋ l’ijlm abu ɛlum ek’ɔŋ ɔgbɔru ab es.
44010032	Ɛ̀rm agŋ ím Jope ɛsŋ Simɔ Piɛr ow. N’anŋ ndey lɛl juma kok ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Simɔ a ec’êl ek’anŋ okij nɛny ab ɛm.'
44010033	Kpɛkŋ m’ɛrm agŋ ow ɛsŋ’ŋ ɛtŋ erur ow. Sica ɛy fɛŋ s’anŋ aŋa Nyam ec’any af eke si k’iri ów a fɛŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ abul’ŋ eke ki dad ɛy a."
44010034	Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Sica ow am ok’m es sos ɛm tasi eke njɛ Nyam am jɛjm agŋ es,
44010035	kɔ ɛb kaka fɛŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ke bi kok low nyim nyim a, li b’eb ow.
44010036	N’awŋ Israɛl ec’agŋ in ec’amani a: Amani Mamn a el ɛrm es ɛy a ek’anŋ Jesu Krist a ek’el agŋ fɛŋ ec’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɛm.
44010037	Eke Jan ɔb kokoba ke ok agŋ mij nuŋ bake ow uwr a, low yec’a eke ikŋ anym ɛy Galile toŋ ke eb Israɛl nimum ɛm a, uwr any.
44010038	Uwr elel eke Nyam ɔŋn Nasarɛt e Jesu in ec’Abŋ Lala a lele abusu ab ab any. Uwr elel yɛj’eke Jesu ɛcr wus nimum af kok ów amamn, ke ewlm agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ agn ec’es ɛw ab ɛm a, aŋke Nyam anŋ in ab.
44010039	Ɛtŋ ɛy s’ij ów a fɛŋ eke li kok Jerusalɛm lele Israɛl wus af ab a e daŋku. Wɛl ɛw’r olikŋ af ɛtŋ l’uw,
44010040	gbɛkɔ eke ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, Nyam ɔŋ’n n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ’n abusu eke li k’ɛlu sos ɔkm.
44010041	Ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af l’ɛlum sos ɔkm, kɔ ɛy a cɛ eke Nyam ikŋ anym sɔsum ot ɛsɛ adaŋku af a ec’any af. Eke Nyam igbm’n agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, s’ij ɛtŋ s’ɛgŋ in ab.
44010042	N’ɔŋ ɛy abusu eke si k’ɔb kokoba s’ok agŋ a, ke si dad eke in anake Nyam ɛw’r eke li ki jɛj agŋ ek’uw lel agŋ ek’anŋ owr ab ab e low l’ok a.
44010043	Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a fɛŋ dad in e low ek’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’in ub ow nawrɛ a, ɛgŋ a e sikpl a in b’ow in ɔny oc ap ow e nin a ec’abusu ab ɛm."
44010044	Eke Piɛr odad anŋ nɛnym k’uwrm a, Abŋ Lala us es agŋ a fɛŋ eke am iri in ec’odad ab af.
44010045	Ɔmn ɛsɛl a ek’el Jwifɛl ke igŋ Piɛr ab ow a, low am iti any eke Nyam ec’Abŋ Lala a eke b’ɔŋ agŋ a, k’im ɛŋn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a.
44010046	Tasi ɛm a, -n’am iri wɛl am dad sodad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl am kɔklm Nyam e sagb a. Ow sosiɛm Piɛr dad ninɛ:
44010047	"Kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛdŋn agŋ amua mij ok nuŋ, sica eke -n’ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ɛsɛ ɛy af ab ee?"
44010048	Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ok wɛl mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm. Ow e jam a, -l’ibrm eke Piɛr k’anŋ ɛl ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
44011001	Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lel agŋ lisijimɛl a ek’anŋ Jude ab ab iri ek’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji ɛgŋ Nyam ec’odad a eb.
44011002	Eke Piɛr ɛwl mɛny uyu ow Jerusalɛm a, Jwifɛl ek’ɔny ɔmn a am ok’r ów af
44011003	dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀ɛ́! Im ɛy agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ogŋ ɛtŋ ij ob ɛl ab!"
44011004	Ow sosiɛm, Piɛr otar low a ek’ɛy a akr mɛwl ɛm ok ɛl. Li dad ninɛ:
44011005	"M’anŋ Jope ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ eke m’am ŋɔŋn Nyam a, m’am ɛkn es. M’ɛkn ob nyam ek’am us es ow ɛŋn’m, ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ gbad ligbɛl af ke wɛl cucu ow ec’ɛnyɛmbri yar a ɔny es, ke anŋ afr am us es toŋ ow titm’m.
44011006	M’ok any es mi lɛr lokm a ɛtŋ m’ɛkn mindey eke b’ɛli akr yar, akp ɛm ndey, mindey eke b’ɛrir es lele ɔr ab.
44011007	Ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’am dad’m ɛsɛ: 'Piɛr, ìgb, ìbi ke íj!'
44011008	Gbɛkɔ mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Njaŋ o, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Aŋke lɛgŋ kaka ob e wɛl ɛdŋn oglog ob ek’ aylm ŋ ec’any af a ɛym’m nɛnym.'
44011009	Ɛmɛny lebl a anŋ afr ikŋ dad ninɛ: 'Ob eke Nyam dad eke ow ayl a, ŋ, kì dad k’ɛsɛ ow aylm.'
44011010	Low a ɛy ɛbɛn ɛbɛn sakp nyahan ɛtŋ ob a ɛwl im afr.
44011011	Wanci ab af cɛ, agŋ nyahan ow ok êl a eke s’anŋ ɛm a ogŋ; Sesare ɛb ɛm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛrm ɛl -l’ow ɛm eci.
44011012	Abŋ Lala dad’m eke mi k’im ɛl ab, ke bɛbar k’ánm ɛm ɛm. Agŋ lisijimɛl nɔhɔn na eke m’ot ab m’ow aŋa a, ɛwl’m Sesare, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’ok Kɔrnɛy ec’akŋ a.
44011013	L’otar elel eke l’ɛkan afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’inym es in ec’akŋ a, ke am dad’r eke li k’ɛrm agŋ im Jope ɛsŋ’m m’ów,
44011014	mi dád’r sodad eke b’ow el in lele in ec’akŋ a nimum ab e sɔg eci.
44011015	M’ɔb nuŋ m’am dad ɛl odad, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ Abŋ Lala us ɛl es af ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji l’us ɛy es af nuŋ ɔb ɛm ab af.
44011016	Kpɛkŋ m’ɔkn low yec’a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad a: 'Jan ok agŋ mij nuŋ mij ɛm, kɔ ɔny, wɛl b’ow ok ɔny mij nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm.'
44011017	Ɛl yɛji Nyam ɔŋ ɛl ob ap nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke n’ɔŋ ɛy lɛgŋ a eke s’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist nawrɛ a: sica bwo el’m eke mi k’ɛdŋn Nyam, low yec’eke l’erur eke li ki kok ab ee?"
44011018	Eke sica -l’irir sodad amua bake ow uwr a, -n’ɔny ɛrm es ɛy ɛtŋ -li kɔklm Nyam -li dad ninɛ: "Nawrɛ tasi, Nyam ɔŋ agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji abusu eke k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm ke ɛ́ŋn owr anŋ tasi a."
44011019	Etiɛn ek’uw oc es e gbre ijr ek’ɛy a, ɔŋ ɔmn ɛsɛl a ɔmu es; ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb im toŋ ok Fenisi, Sipr lele Antiɔs ɛb ɛm ab, gbɛkɔ agŋ ek’el Jwifɛl a sɔny cɛ -n’am dad Nyam ec’odad a -l’ok.
44011020	Kɔ ɔmn ɛsɛl bɛb ek’el Sipr lele Sirɛn ɛb ɛm ec’a, ow ok Antiɔs, ɛtŋ dad agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e lís ec’Amani Mamn a ec’odad.
44011021	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’abusu a anŋ ɛl ab, ow ɔŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ itŋn ɛrm ɛm el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
44011022	Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ec’agŋ a iri low na ɛtŋ -l’ɛrm Barnabas im Antiɔs.
44011023	Eke n’im l’ɛy yogŋ ke l’ɛkn elel eke Nyam eci bibm a kokr ɔmn ɛsɛl a, sos ɛm iŋn’n ɛtŋ l’atr wɛl sos es eke wɛl k’ɔny ɛrm susu, úcu Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny es.
44011024	Tasi ɛm a, Barnabas el ɛgŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn eke Abŋ Lala lele ɔmn ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ. Agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ɛgŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ owi eb.
44011025	Ow ɔŋ Barnabas im Tars eke k’ɛsŋ Sɔl.
44011026	Eke n’ɛŋn ow a, l’oc ow ab l’ɛwl l’ow Antiɔs. -N’anŋ yogŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm ɛl yony mum toŋ lakpo mum, ɛtŋ -li yɛgm agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl low. Antiɔs ɛb ɛm anake wɛl ɔg es ɛsŋ jam ɛsɛl a 'kretiɛnɛl a'.
44011027	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl anŋ Jerusalɛm ow Antiɔs.
44011028	Abŋ Lala nyimn ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Agabus ɛtŋ am ɔb amani dad eke ow’n k’ow in ibnm ɛtŋ lek ligbɛl in b’ow in ɛy wus na nimum af. (Lek a ɛy tasi, lakpo ab af eke Klod el Sesar a.)
44011029	Ow ɔŋ jam ɛsɛl a ɛgŋ eb eke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔŋ yec’a eke n’ɔny ow ec’abusu a, yec’a ek’ɔtu eke k’ɛlum lisijimɛl ek’anŋ Jude a abu a.
44011030	-Li kok ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ -l’oc abu ɛlum a -n’ɔŋ Barnabas lele Sɔl ab oc im ɔŋ Jude wus af e Nyamel a ec’ agŋ ekpekp a.
44012001	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ɛb ebu Erɔd Agripa am ijr Nyamel ec’agŋ nyam nyam gbre.
44012002	N’ɔŋ wɛl ibi Jak ek’el Jan lisijim a lab ler ɛm ɛm.
44012003	-
44012004	Sica eke l’ɛkn ek’ow akpl Jwifɛl a sos ɛm a, Futufutu eke ejru ánm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab ɛm, n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny Piɛr ɛlu sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ srɔda eyŋ eb yar yar sakp yar am ɔsu ow. N’ɔny tutr eke li ki jɛj ow e low l’ok dedeku a ec’any af eke Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a b’oc es.
44012005	Kɔ eke Piɛr anŋ sobel ɛm a, Nyamel ec’agŋ a am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔŋ’n ɔmn ɛm tasi.
44012006	Ncok a eke lɛgŋ k’ɛny ke Erɔd jɛj in e low ok dedeku a ec’any af a, Piɛr am ɛru mɛmn srɔda eyŋ yony ec’araŋn. Wɛl ok’r ŋgbraka yony ɛtŋ usu ɔsu ɛsɛl inym es, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ anŋ in ec’usu sobel lisany a.
44012007	Kpru ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ilm any ɛtŋ usuayl ɛjn ok sobel akŋ a. Afr ɛrm ɛs a iyr Piɛr abu mɛnɛgb ɛm, uwr’r ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ìgb fafa!" Ŋgbraka a ek’anŋ’n sabu a ɛr ok wus.
44012008	Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’r ninɛ: "Sùs ŋ e mob a, ke ók ŋ e cɔkrukpɔ a." Piɛr ɛlum’n ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Sùs ŋ e mob af ɛw a ke ús’m jam."
44012009	Piɛr igŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a ugŋ ɛy ɔkm sobel ab ɛm. Li k’ɔnym ɔmn eke low a eke afr ɛrm ɛs a am kok a k’el nawrɛ tasi: n’am tutr eke ow el es ɛkn ɛm.
44012010	-L’afŋ krɛkrɛ ec’usu ɔsu usu ab es, yony ɛm ec’a yɛji ɛtŋ -n’im -l’ok lowi lisany a ek’ɔkŋ baŋn ab any a ogŋ. Ɛl ec’any af lisany a fig in obi ɛtŋ -l’ok ɔkm. -N’im -l’ok ɛbɛrŋ nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ kpru ɛm afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛlu’l es.
44012011	Sica low a ek’ɛy a ok Piɛr es sos ɛm ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ca gbɛ, m’am ɛkn ek’ow el nawrɛ tasi: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake ɔŋ in ec’afr ɛrm ɛs ow eb ɛlu’m es Erɔd ec’abusu ab ɛm eke m’anŋ lele Jwifɛl e low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ek’am tutr eke ki kok ɛm e lís ab ab a."
44012012	Sica eke ow ok’r es sos ɛm a, n’im Mari ek’el Jan Mark lis ec’akŋ a. Yogŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl as luku anŋ Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm.
44012013	Piɛr cicm lisany abu, ɛtŋ akŋ juma kok lis nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Rod igb ow eke ki fig’r lisany a.
44012014	Eke l’iri lebl a ke l’uw any ek’ow el Piɛr a, sos ɛm iŋn’n toŋ l’ijl es eke li ki fig ow lisany a, kɔ l’uru es n’im li dad agŋ a eke Piɛr in anŋ lisany.
44012015	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Nuŋ ɛm am uŋ’ŋ!" Kɔ nɛny am at’r es eke ow el low nawrɛ tasi. Ɛtŋ -li dad -l’usr af ninɛ: "Ɛbɛn ke in ec’afr ɛrm ɛs ana."
44012016	Ɛbɛn yɛji Piɛr abu anŋ ɛm am cicm lisany a abu. Eke sica -li figr lisany a, -l’ɛkn ow ɛtŋ ow ɛw ɛl any iti.
44012017	Li tat wɛl abu eke wɛl ki yewal ɛtŋ l’otar elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny ɛlu’l ɔkm sobel ab ɛm a e low akr l’ok wɛl. Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Dàdr low a okr Jak lel agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab ab." Ɛtŋ l’ɛy ɔkm l’eb ejagb n’im usu ɛjeci.
44012018	Sica eke usu ot es a, bɔbar ligbɛl ɛy srɔda eyŋ a ec’araŋn ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm ɛl sosi low yec’ek’ɛŋn Piɛr a.
44012019	Erɔd ɔŋ wɛl ɔl Piɛr es, kɔ wɛl ɛŋnm’n. Li bibrm usu ɔsu ɛsɛl a low ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ibi ɛl. Ow e jam a, n’anŋ Jude n’im Sesare ɛtŋ yogŋ n’anŋ sɛgŋ bɛb.
44012020	Sica lɛgŋ nyam Erɔd ɔny ɛrm bebl ligbɛl Tir baŋn eyŋ lele Sidɔn baŋn eyŋ ab e lís. Baŋn a yony mum nɛny okr af eke k’im ɛkn’n. In e saw ec’ɛgŋ ek’el Blastus ɛm -l’ɛcr -n’im -l’ibrm Erɔd eke ɛrm es ɛy k’anŋ, aŋke ɛl e baŋn a yony mum b’ɔl ob ij ɛb ebu ec’ɛb ab ɛm.
44012021	Eke lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ɛw a ow a, Erɔd sus in ec’ɛb es ɛw ɛs e mob sus ɛm a, li sig es ɛb ebu e lɛkpn af ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl ów dedeku ɛm.
44012022	Dedeku a ɔg dad ninɛ: "Na nyàm anake am dad odad a, kɔ ow elm ɛgŋ."
44012023	Kɔ, kpru ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam kok Erɔd low, aŋke anygbɛl a ek’el Nyam ec’a l’ɛgŋm n’ɔɔm ow, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a sisŋ ij’r l’uw.
44012024	Nyam ec’odad a gbɛ am eb es obn.
44012025	Eke Barnabas lele Sɔl ab uwar ɛl e juma Jerusalɛm a, -l’oc Jan Mark -l’ɛwl mɛny ab -n’im Antiɔs.
44013001	Antiɔs e Nyamel ab ɛm, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lele low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ek’anŋ a ec’en el: Barnabas, Simeɔn (eke wɛl igŋ nin af Nijɛr), Lusius (Sirɛn baŋn iy), Manayɛn (ek’el Galile ec’es ɛw ɛs Erɔd Antipas e mew ɛm e lawl), lele Sɔl ab.
44013002	Lɛgŋ nyam, eke -n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam ke -n’am ɛnŋ nɛny a, Abŋ Lala dad ɛl ninɛ: "Òcr Barnabas lele Sɔl ab ɛwr saw yec’ɛtŋ ke -li kok juma a eke m’ɛsŋ ɛl ow ec’a."
44013003	Ow sosiɛm, eke -n’ɛnŋn nɛny, -ni ŋɔŋan Nyam toŋ ke ow uwr a, -l’at Barnabas lele Sɔl ab abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ wɛl abusu wɛl im.
44013004	Ek’Abŋ Lala ɛrm Barnabas lele Sɔl ab a, -n’im -l’ok Selesi baŋn ɛtŋ yogŋ, -l’eb mijɛtŋ -n’im Sipr lekr ɛm.
44013005	Eke -n’imn -l’okr Salamin baŋn a, -n’am dad Nyam odad Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu a. Jan Mark yɛji anŋ ɛl ab ɛl eci abu ɛlum eci.
44013006	-L’ubr lekr a kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ -l’ok Pafɔs ek’anŋ nuŋ a. Yogŋ, -n’ɛŋn cam ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Bar Jesu; l’el Jwif nyam eke b’ocr in sosi kokoba ɔb ɛs.
44013007	L’ir Sɛrgius Polus, lekr a ec’es ɛw ɛs ek’el nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs a ogŋ. N’ɔŋ wɛl ɛsŋ Barnabas lele Sɔl ab aŋke l’erur eke li k’iri Nyam odad.
44013008	Gbɛkɔ cam ɛs eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Grɛk ɛm Elimas a b’atar Barnabas lele Sɔl ab ów es ɛtŋ am ɔl eke k’irmn es ɛw ɛs a ec’ɔmn a eke k’ɔny a.
44013009	Sɔl eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Pɔl yɛji, ke Abŋ Lala iy ɛm a, ɔkŋ cam ɛs ab any
44013010	ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Yadŋ gbɛl ɛs eke low ŋuŋ kok eb sos! Agn e liy! Low mamn fɛŋ ec’ifnu! Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ów amamn a eke bɛbm ok es a, b’ɔl eke k’ɔny wuwal. Kɔ k’ow walm ow e low ɛlum es ee?
44013011	Sica ìri gɔŋ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow efal’ŋ any ɛtŋ k’ow ɛknm ligbn ec’usuayl a sɛgŋ bɛb." Kpɛkŋ Elimas any efl ɛtŋ anŋ ncebn ɛm; n’am bɔbrm l’ɔl ɛgŋ eke k’ɔny’n abu.
44013012	Eke es ɛw ɛs ɛkn low a ek’ɛy a, l’ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lís e low yɛgm a ok’r es sos ɛm nɔnɔ.
44013013	Sica Pɔl lele agŋ a ek’am us’r jam ab ab eb mijɛtŋ Pafɔs nanu ɛtŋ im ok Pɛrj, Panfili wus af. Ɛtŋ Jan Mark ɛlu ɛl es yogŋ ɛwl im Jerusalɛm.
44013014	Ɛl gbɛ, -l’igŋ Pɛrj -l’us ejagb kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ -n’im -l’ok Pisidi wus af ec’Antiɔs a. Eke nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ow a, -l’ok Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a -l’ok es.
44013015	Eke wɛl awl lɛl ol e silɛl ab ɛm lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’ab ɛm uwr a, Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a ɔŋ ɛgŋ im dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, ek’ɔnyn ów ɔm ec’odad eke ki dadr atar dedeku a sos es, ke ɔtur eke ki dadr gɔŋ."
44013016	Pɔl igb tat ɛl abu ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Israɛl ec’agŋ lele ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl ke anŋn aŋa Nyam nuŋ igŋ ec’a, ìgŋn lɔru es irir!
44013017	Nyam ek’el Israɛl ec’agŋ a e Nyam a sɔsum ɛy lagŋɛl ot. N’ɛnyn agŋ amua lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke -l’iir etuɛb Ejipt wus af a. Ɛtŋ in e lɛc ab ɛm n’ɔny l’ot wɛl es Ejipt.
44013018	Loj yogŋ, n’ɔnym wɛl ab ow ij akpo ekŋ yony.
44013019	Kana wus af a, ni ŋuŋn ɛb lɔbŋ ɛtŋ l’oc wɛl eci wus a n’ɔŋ in ec’agŋ a ɛsɛ ɛl ec’aja ob cɛ af.
44013020	Ów amua fɛŋ ɔtu eke k’ij akpo duw akpo ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab. Low na b’ɛc a, n’ɔŋ ɛy lagŋɛl jɛj ok ɛsɛl toŋ ow ok kokoba ɔb ɛs Samiɛl e lɛgŋ ɛm a.
44013021	Sica -l’ibrm ɛb ebu nyam ɛtŋ Nyam ɔŋ ɛl Saul, Kis jim, Bɛnjamɛ ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ek’ɛw ɛb ab es ow ij akpo ekŋ yony.
44013022	Eke sica Nyam igŋ Saul ɛlu es a, n’ɔŋ wɛl David ɛsɛ ɛb ebu af. N’am dad David e lís e low l’ɛsɛ: M’ɛŋn Jese jim David: l’el ɛm ec’ɛrm ec’erur, li b’ow li kok low fɛŋ e m’erur eke li ki kok a.
44013023	David ec’alaw ab ɛm e nyam el Jesu eke Nyam oc ɛw Israɛl eci Es Eb Ɛlu Ɛs, ɛsɛ elel eke l’ɛwar l’ɛw es ab af.
44013024	Gbuŋ ke Jesu ów a, Jan dad Nyam odad ibrm ek’Israɛl ec’agŋ a nimum k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm ke ók mij nuŋ.
44013025	Eke sica Jan am uwar in e juma a, n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: 'Kɔ ɔny, bwo ec’ɛgŋ am ocr’m eke m’el ee? M’elm ɛgŋ a ek’am ekur a. Gbɛkɔ ìrir, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ’m jam am ow, ɛtŋ m’itm bɔbɔ yɛji eke mi k’ɔny in e cɔkrukpɔ meb a mi mɔmu’n es akr ɛm.'
44013026	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny ek’eel Abraham ec’alaw lele ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl ke anŋn aŋa Nyam nuŋ igŋ ec’a, ɛy fɛŋ anake wɛl is ɛy es eb ɛlu ec’odad na a.
44013027	Tasi ɛm a, Jerusalɛm ec’agŋ a lele ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab uwm ɛgŋ a ek’el Jesu ab any, ɛtŋ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci silɛl eke wɛl b’awl nɛnɛgŋ fɛŋ a, -l’irim ow okm ɛl es sos ɛm. Gbɛkɔ eke -l’ɔbr Jesu low a, -n’ɔŋ sodad a fɛŋ iy nɛny.
44013028	-N’ɛŋnm low kaka ek’ow ɛm -li k’ibi ow, kɔ -li dad Pilat eke k’ibi’r.
44013029	Eke -li kokr fɛŋ a eke Nyam Lɛl ɛwar Jesu eci lís a, -l’usm ow es olikŋ af ɛtŋ -l’ɛlu ow uwɔmu ɛm.
44013030	Gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm.
44013031	Sɛgŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl, agŋ a ek’us Jesu jam Galile ɛtŋ toŋ im ok Jerusalɛm a ec’any af, l’okm sos ɔkm ɛtŋ sica agŋ a el in ec’adaŋku Israɛl ec’agŋ ec’any af.
44013032	-
44013033	Ɛy obi yɛji, s’am is ɔny Amani Mamn na. Sica eke Nyam igbm Jesu luw ɛm a, low yec’a eke l’ɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl a, li kok ow iy nɛny ɛy eke s’el ɛl ec’ey a eci, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Selu yony ɛm ab af: 'Ŋ ɛm ec’iy, yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, m’el asŋ'.
44013034	Nyam ikŋ anym ɛwar eke in b’ow in igbm Jesu luw ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke ow’n k’ɛ́wlm in ugŋm es ij. Li dad ninɛ: 'M’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny ów amamn a eke ɛm obi m’ɛwar eke mi k’ɔŋ David a, ɛtŋ ɔtur eke k’ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm.'
44013035	Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl ɛjec’ɛm n’am dad l’ɛsɛ: K’ow yɛbm ŋ e libɔwi mamn ugŋm es uwɔmu ɛm.
44013036	David e lɛgŋ ɛm a, li kok Nyam e juma e bɛbm ɛw es a toŋ batŋ l’uw, wɛl oc’r es lagŋɛl e saw ɛtŋ l’ugŋ es;
44013037	kɔ in a eke Nyam igbm luw ɛm a, l’ugŋm es.
44013038	-
44013039	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it eke k’uwr any eke Jesu ɛm anake ɔtur ɔnyn sikpl eci oc ap a. Mois ec’ol a ɔtum ebm ɛlum ɔny es ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm, kɔ agŋ fɛŋ eke ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm a, Nyam ot ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
44013040	Sica ɛ̀wr ɛrm yec’ɛtŋ ke low na eke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad a k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny:
44013041	'Ɛ̀kan, ɔny, Nyam e miyɛr kokr ɛsɛl, low a íti ɔny any, ke írmn ocr es! Aŋke ɔny ec’owr anŋ ɛm, m’ow mi kok low nyam eke k’ow ubmn nawrɛ, eke ɛgŋ am dad ɔny ow ec’odad bɔbɔ yɛji.' "
44013042	Eke Pɔl lele Barnabas ab ok ɔkm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, wɛl ibrm eke nɛnɛgŋ ek’am ow a, -li k’ɛwl mɛny -l’ow -li dad odad nyam na cɛ.
44013043	Eke luku as a uwr a, Jwifɛl nɔnɔ lele agŋ a ek’ɛgŋ ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ e low eb a, am us Pɔl lele Barnabas ab jam. -N’am dad wɛl eke -li k’inym es kikri Nyam eci lɛc a eke b’ɔŋ ɛl ab ɛm.
44013044	Eke nɛnɛgŋ ow a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛb ab ɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ cɛ in im in am iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad af.
44013045	Eke Jwifɛl ɛkn dedeku na a, ow ɔny ɛl nyamnɛyr; -n’am wɛwr Pɔl ɛtŋ -n’am ɔny odad -l’oc ow es nɛnym.
44013046	Pɔl lele Barnabas ab am dad ɛl odad tasi ɛsɛ: "Ɔny, ow it eke wɛl k’ikŋ anym dad ɔny Nyam ec’odad a yɛ; gbɛkɔ eke ebmn odad a, ke am ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ agŋ eke k’ɔtum ɛŋnm sel ek’ɔnym uwr a, sica si b’ow s’im agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ogŋ!
44013047	Kin low yec’eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ ɛy ow ec’abusu a: M’oc’ŋ ɛsɛ ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ec’usuayl af, yec’ɛtŋ ke yɛ́gm wus na nimum ec’agŋ a, elel eke -li k’ɛŋan sel a."
44013048	Eke agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a iri ów amua a, sos ɛm iŋn ɛl ɛtŋ -n’am ɛlu Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ bia odad na eci; ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke Nyam ikŋ anym ɛw sel ek’ɔnym uwr ec’a, ub nawrɛ.
44013049	Nyam ec’odad a eb es wus a nimum af.
44013050	Kɔ Jwifɛl a ok bosu amamn ɛm ec’ɔyɔw a eke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ a lele ɛb a eci nyimn ɛsɛl ab ab al lokm; -l’ijr Pɔl lele Barnabas ab gbre ɛtŋ -l’ogŋ wɛl ɛl eci wus ab af.
44013051	Pɔl lele Barnabas ab cic akr sɛc ok ɛl es ɛtŋ im Ikoniɔm.
44013052	Jam ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ Antiɔs a ec’a, sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl lele Abŋ Lala eke -n’ɛŋan ab a afŋn ɛl es.
44014001	Ɛsɛ Antiɔs ec’ab af, eke Pɔl lele Barnabas ab im ok Ikoniɔm ɛb ɛm yogŋ a, -n’im -l’ok Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ -n’am dad Nyam odad toŋ batŋ Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab e nɔnɔ ub nawrɛ.
44014002	Gbɛkɔ Jwifɛl a ek’erurm eke k’ub nawrɛ a, itr agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a toŋ -n’ɔny agŋ lisijimɛl a e tutr ŋuŋ.
44014003	Kɔ Pɔl lele Barnabas ab ubrm ɛl e lɛgŋ ab es. Eke -n’ɔnyn ɔmn nɔnɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm a, -n’am dad Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ec’odad ɛrm susu ɛm. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ am ɔŋ ɛl abusu -li kok simɛny ɛwr lele ów any iti owi ab, ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, n’am yɛgm eke wɛl ec’odad a el nawrɛ.
44014004	Ɛb ab ɛm ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm yony: agŋ likpr inym es Jwifɛl a eci, ɛtŋ bɛb inym es ɛrm ɛsɛl a eci.
44014005	Jwifɛl lele ɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl a lele ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab, am bɛbm eke k’ijr Pɔl lele Barnabas ab gbre ke íbi ɛl mebn ɛm.
44014006	Eke -li b’uw any a, -l’uru es -n’imn Likaoni wus af e sɛb ab a ek’el Lisr, Dɛrb, lele ow e saw saw ab ab eci.
44014007	Yogŋ yɛji, -n’am ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba.
44014008	Lisr yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke bi sig es cɛ aŋke li bubm es. In e mew ɛm ɛtŋ sos ɛyr’r ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka l’ɔtum n’anm es.
44014009	Lɛgŋ nyam Pɔl am dad odad ɛtŋ n’am iri. Pɔl ok’r anyamn af am lɛr’r ɛtŋ l’ɛkn eke ɛgŋ a ɔny ɔmn eke k’ewl.
44014010	Li dad ow lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Ìgb, ìnym es ceŋ!" Ɛgŋ a igb us es ɛtŋ am an es.
44014011	Eke dedeku a ɛkn low a eke Pɔl kok a, -l’ɔg -li dad ɛl ec’ɛbr ek’el Likaoni ab ɛm ninɛ: "Sinyam itŋn sos el agŋ ow ɛŋn ɛy!"
44014012	-N’am ɛsŋ Barnabas 'Zes' ɛtŋ -n’am ɛsŋ Pɔl 'Ɛrmɛs', aŋke Pɔl anake b’ɔb amani a.
44014013	Zes eci nyam ŋɔŋn usu a anŋ ɛb a ec’ɛm ɛy usu a. In ec’egb waw ɛs a ot sed lele suw amamn ab ow lisany a ec’any af; l’erur eke dedeku ab ab -li ki waw egb -n’ɔŋ Barnabas lele Pɔl ab.
44014014	Gbɛkɔ eke Barnabas lele Pɔl ab iri low na a, -n’ɔny ɛl eci mob sus ɛm a -li gbagbrm ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’uru es -l’ok dedeku ab ɛm -n’am ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ:
44014015	"Agŋ lisijimɛl, kɔ bla ɛtŋ am kokr ɛbɛn ee? Agŋ cɛ s’el ɛsɛ ɔny af. S’am is ɔny Amani Mamn a eke k’igŋn ɔny e sinyam ekekey na ek’el ob ɔfr ɔfr a okr es, ke ɛ́wal lɛɛr Nyam ek’anŋ owr ke kok afr, wus, okij lele ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ab ab a.
44014016	Godo godo a, li yɛb ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ eb ɛl obi ec’ejagb eke -l’erurir.
44014017	Gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ li b’okm sos ɔkm in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny ab ɛm: li b’ɔŋ mij anŋ afr ɛtŋ an ok ɔny wus ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ ɔny egb eke k’ubr ek’ow e lɛgŋ b’ow a; li b’ɔŋ ɔny ob ij ɛtŋ li bi yibr ɔny ec’ɛrm a sos ɛm iŋn."
44014018	Sodad amua e dad ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji, ɛrm ɛsɛl a ij gbre eke k’ɛdŋn dedeku a eke ki waw egb ɔŋ ɛl.
44014019	Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Pisidi eci Antiɔs a lele Ikoniɔm ab a ow ɛtŋ eb dedeku a. -L’ɔr Pɔl mebn ɛm ibi eci, ɛtŋ -l’ɔdu -l’ɛlu ow ɔkm baŋn a aŋke -li tutr ek’ow uw ŋ̂.
44014020	Sica eke jam ɛsɛl a ow ar ɛlul il ɛm a, l’igb wus l’ɛwl l’ɛy baŋn a. Eke lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, Barnabas ab -n’im Dɛrb.
44014021	Pɔl lele Barnabas ab im ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba Dɛrb ɛb ɛm; yogŋ, -li kok agŋ nɔnɔ el jam ɛsɛl. Sica -l’ɛwl mɛny -n’im Lisr, Ikoniɔm, lele Pisidi eci Antiɔs ab ab.
44014022	-L’usur jam ɛsɛl a ɛrm, -l’atr wɛl sos es eke wɛl k’inym es tuɔtuɔ wɛl ec’ɔmn ab ɛm ɛtŋ -n’am dad wɛl -l’ɛsɛ: "Ow it eke si k’ijr gbre nɔnɔ gbuŋ ke s’ók Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a."
44014023	Nyamel fɛŋ ɛm, -li b’ɛnm agŋ ekpekp -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛtŋ eke -li b’ ɛnŋ nɛny -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam a, -li b’afl wɛl es -n’ɔŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke agŋ amua ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a.
44014024	Ɛmɛny -l’ubr Pisidi wus a ɛtŋ -n’im -l’ok Panfili eci wus ab af.
44014025	Pɛrj ɛb ɛm yogŋ, -l’ɔb Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba ɛtŋ sica -n’im -l’ok Atali ɛb ɛm.
44014026	-L’igb yogŋ mijɛtŋ ɛm -n’aam Siri ec’Antiɔs a. Ɛb na ɛm anake wɛl ot ok ɛl Nyam eci nyimn mamn ab ɛm juma na eke sica -li kokr -l’uwarir a ec’a.
44014027	Eke -n’imn -l’okr yogŋ a, -l’as Nyamel ec’agŋ a luku -li dad wɛl ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok a, lele elel eke Nyam figr agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji ɔmn e lakp a.
44014028	-N’anŋ yogŋ jam ɛsɛl ab ab ow ibn nɔnɔ.
44015001	Agŋ bɛb anŋ Jude ow Siri eci Antiɔs a ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ lisijimɛl a low dad ɛsɛ: "Eke ubrmn likr es ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ ol a am ibrm ab af a, k’ow ɔtumn ɛŋnmn es eb ɛlu."
44015002	Pɔl lele Barnabas ab ɛgŋm low na ebm ɛtŋ -l’atar ów es ligbɛl agŋ ab ab. Wɛl ɛgŋ eb eke Pɔl, Barnabas lele Antiɔs ec’agŋ bɛb ab k’im Jerusalɛm ke ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab -li dad odad na.
44015003	Ɛtŋ Nyamel a ɛkn ɛl ec’usu im a e low. -L’ɛcr Fenisi lele Samari ab eci, ɛtŋ -n’am awl elel ek’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ocr any ɔkŋn Nyam a e low; amani na ɔŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl.
44015004	Eke -l’okr Jerusalɛm a, Nyamel a, ɛrm ɛsɛl a, lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab eb ɛl, ɛtŋ ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok a, -n’am awl -l’ok wɛl.
44015005	Gbɛkɔ Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ bɛb ek’ɔny ɔmn a, igb ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ke wɛl búbr agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn k’elm Jwifɛl a ekr es ke wɛl ɔ́ŋ ɛl -l’ɛlum Mois ec’ol a."
44015006	Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab as luku ɛtŋ am ɔny odad na igbl ogŋ ɛkn.
44015007	Eke -l’atarir ów es kpekpe a, Piɛr eb odad ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, uwr any eke lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ Nyam sɔsum oc’m ɔny ec’araŋn eke mi k’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba m’ók agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’iri ke -l’ub nawrɛ.
44015008	Ɛtŋ Nyam eke uw agŋ eci mɛrm ab any a, ɛlu ɔkm yɛgm eke l’eb wɛl; n’ɔŋ wɛl Abŋ Lala ɛsɛ ɛy af.
44015009	Ɛl lele ɛy ab ec’araŋn a, l’okm ereb kaka: l’ayal wɛl ec’ɛrm a aŋke -n’ɔny ɔmn.
44015010	Ɛtŋ sica bla sosiɛm am sismn Nyam odad agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn a ec’ɛrɛkp leg leg ec’uyul ɛm, ɛrɛkp ek’ɛy lagŋɛl lele ɛy obi ɛy obi ab, s’ɔtum s’uyum ab ee?
44015011	Ke tasi ɛm a, s’ub nawrɛ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm wɛl sɔg ɛy ɛsɛ ɛl af."
44015012	Sica dedeku a fɛŋ yewal tiŋ, ɛtŋ wɛl am iri Pɔl lele Barnabas ab dad mɛny ɛwr lele low any iti owi ab eke Nyam ɛcr ɛl ɛm kok ɔŋ agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a.
44015013	Eke Pɔl lele Barnabas ab dad odad a ok es a, Jak ɔdu eb ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, ìrir ɛm ec’odad na!
44015014	Simɔ dad elel eke kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ Nyam ɛw ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a e low any, ke ɛl ɛm a ot agŋ eb mum nyam el in eci.
44015015	Ɛtŋ low na lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad ab ab okr af, aŋke Nyam Lɛl am dad ɛsɛ:
44015016	Ow e jam a, m’ow m’ɛwl m’ow, ke David ec’êl a ek’ɛy wus a m’úsr ɛm, in e êl ek’uŋ a, mi kókr ɛm, ke m’ínymn in es.
44015017	Ɛtŋ agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ b’ow ɔl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ es; ɛɛ, ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ eke m’ɛsŋ eke k’el ɛm ec’a, b’ow ɔl’m es. Na el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad eke dad;
44015018	lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ l’ɛlu in ec’ów amua ɔkm li yɛgm."
44015019	Jak igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Na sosiɛm, m’erurm eke wɛl k’ijr agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl ke oc any ɔkŋ Nyam a gbre.
44015020	Gbɛkɔ s’áwŋ ɛl lɛl si dad ɛl eke -li k’ijmn ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ɔŋ sɛkp, -l’ijmn nfaci, -l’ijmn ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, -l’ɛgŋmn mebl;
44015021	aŋke godo godo ɛtŋ, ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ɛm, wɛl am dad Mois eci sol amua ec’odad ɛtŋ Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu yɛji sɛgŋ fɛŋ nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ wɛl b’awl."
44015022	Ow sosiɛm ɛrm ɛsɛl a, agŋ ekpekp a, lele Nyamel a fɛŋ ab ɛgŋ eb eke k’ot ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ igŋ Pɔl lele Barnabas ab af im Siri ec’Antiɔs a. -Li sɔsum Jud eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Barsabas lele Silas ab -l’ot; -l’el agŋ lisijimɛl ab ɛm ec’any ɛsɛl yony.
44015023	Kin lɛl eke wɛl ɔŋ ɛl a: "Ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab, ek’el ɔny lisijimɛl a, am ɔŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ek’elm Jwif k’ir Antiɔs, Siri lele Silisi ab a lebl.
44015024	S’iri ek’agŋ anŋ ɛy ogŋ aŋa ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛwr jeŋjeŋ, ebr ɛrmij ɛl eci sodad ebl ab ɛm. Ow elm ɛy s’ɔɔm ɛl abusu low na e kok eci.
44015025	Na sosiɛm, ɛy a fɛŋ eci nɛny af okr ɛm, si sɔsum agŋ s’ot eke si k’ɛrm ɛl ɔny ogŋ a, -l’ɛwl ɛy lawlɛl Barnabas lele Pɔl ab,
44015026	eke blel irmn ɛl ec’owr anŋ a ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛm.
44015027	S’am ɛrm Jud lele Silas ab ɔny ogŋ a eke ki dad ɔny ɛl obi ɛm, lɛl na eke s’am nɔn aŋa a e low.
44015028	Tasi ɛm a, ɛy lele Abŋ Lala ab, s’ɛgŋ s’eb eke si k’ɔɔm ɔny ɛrɛkp ɛjeci ek’ow elm sol amua ek’it a cɛ:
44015029	k’ìjr ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ɔŋ sɛkp, k’ɛ̀gŋn mebl, k’ìjr ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, k’ìjmn nfaci. Eke ɔsur ów amua, ow b’ow akpl. Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am ɛsŋn ɔny!"
44015030	Wɛl ɛlu agŋ a eke wɛl ɛrm ab es, ɛtŋ -n’im -l’ok Antiɔs. Yogŋ -l’as agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn a luku ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ wɛl lɛl a.
44015031	Wɛl awl lɛl a ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ sos ɛm am iŋn, sos es atr ec’odad ek’anŋ ɛm a eci.
44015032	Jud lele Silas ab ek’ɛl obi yɛji el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a, dad ɔmn ɛsɛl a odad kpekpe sos es atr eci; -n’ɔŋ wɛl ec’ɔmn a ij lɛc obn.
44015033	-N’anŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ bɛb, ɛtŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɔmn ɛsɛl a ɔŋ ɛl ejagb -l’ɛwl -n’im agŋ a ek’ɛrm ɛl a ogŋ. [
44015034	Silas gbɛ ɛgŋ eb eke k’anŋ yogŋ.]
44015035	Gbɛkɔ Pɔl lele Barnabas ab gbɛ anŋ Antiɔs. Agŋ ɛjeci nɔnɔ ab -n’am yɛgm agŋ low, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a ec’amani.
44015036	Eke -n’anŋn Antiɔs yogŋ toŋ ow ibn a, Pɔl dad Barnabas ninɛ: "S’ɛ́wl mɛny s’im ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm eke s’ɔb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a ec’amani a, s’ɛ́kn agŋ lisijimɛl a ek’ɔny ɔmn a, s’ɛ́kn elel eke -n’am aan es a."
44015037	Barnabas erur eke Jan Mark k’igŋ ɛl ab im,
44015038	kɔ Pɔl gbɛ erurm aŋke Jan Mark igŋ ɛlu ɛl es Panfili, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’ɛwlm wɛl juma ab ɛm ij.
44015039	-L’atar ów es sɛnyn sɛnyn toŋ -l’ɛlulil es. Barnabas oc Mark ɛtŋ eb mijɛtŋ im Sipr;
44015040	Pɔl gbɛ oc Silas, ɛtŋ eke ɔmn ɛsɛl a ot ok ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci nyimn mamn ab ɛm a, n’im.
44015041	L’ɛcr Siri lele Silisi wus af ab eci n’am atr Nyamel a fɛŋ sos es ɔmn ɛm.
44016001	Pɔl im ɛy Dɛrb ɛtŋ ɛmɛny im ɛy Lisr. Yogŋ, jam ɛs nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Timote; lis a Jwif ek’in yɛji ɔny ɔmn; ɛs a gbɛ Grɛk.
44016002	Agŋ lisijimɛl a e k’ir Lisr lele Ikoniɔm baŋn ab a, bi dad Timote e lís ec’ów amamn nɔnɔ.
44016003	Pɔl erur eke k’ɔny ɛcm’n ab; l’oc ow ab n’im ɛtŋ l’ ubr ow likr es, Jwifɛl a ek’anŋ yogŋ a eke -li b’ow -l’ɛc a sosiɛm, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke ɛs a Grɛk.
44016004	Ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm eke -n’am ɛc a, -n’am dad agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn a ów a fɛŋ eke ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele Jerusalɛm ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab dad ucu es a, ɛtŋ -n’am ibrm eke wɛl k’ɛlum ów amua.
44016005	Sinyamel a am ɛy lɛc ɔmn ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ liy nyam nyam fɛŋ agŋ am bobn.
44016006	Abŋ Lala ɛ́gbm Pɔl lele Silas ab es eke -li ki dad Nyam ec’odad a Azi ogog a; ow ɔŋ -l’ubr Friji lele Galasi ab eci wus ab af.
44016007	Eke -li titmn Misi wus af a, -n’am bɛbm eke -li k’im Bitini wus af, gbɛkɔ Jesu ec’Abŋ a yɛbm ɛl.
44016008	Ow sosiɛm -l’ubr Misi ɛtŋ -n’im Troas baŋn eci nanu a.
44016009	Ncok ɛm a, Pɔl ɛrur mɛmn: l’ɛkn Maseduan iy nyam ek’inym es ke am ŋɔŋn’n dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀c Maseduan ke ów ɛlum ɛy abu!"
44016010	Kpɛkŋ eke mɛmn ɛrur na b’oc es a, si bɛbm sos s’us ejagb Maseduan im eci, aŋke s’ub nawrɛ eke Nyam ɛsŋ ɛy eke si k’ɛwl yogŋ ec’agŋ a Amani Mamn a.
44016011	S’eb mijɛtŋ Troas, s’igb yogŋ kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ s’im s’ok Samotras lekr ɛm, ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, s’im s’ok Neapolis baŋn.
44016012	S’igb yogŋ s’im Filip, Maseduan eci wus a eci ɛb gbɛl ek’anŋ Rom ec’es ɛw ɛm a. S’anŋ ɛb ab ɛm si kok sɛgŋ wa cɛ.
44016013	Nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ a, s’ok ɔkm baŋn a s’im mij nɛny a; yogŋ si tutr eke si b’ow s’ɛŋn Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm usu nyam. S’ok es yogŋ ɛtŋ ɔyɔw a ek’as luku anŋ yogŋ a, si dad ɛl odad.
44016014	Ɔyɔw ab ɛm e nyam e nin el Lidi, Tiatir baŋn yɔwi eke b’ɔl sigbad ebl amamn ij ke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ. N’am iri ɛy ec’odad a, ɛtŋ Nyam ɔŋ’n abŋ eke li k’ɛw Pɔl e sodad a ɛrm af.
44016015	Ow ɔŋ wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ, in lele in ec’akŋ ab ab. L’ɛw ɛy abu li dad ninɛ: "Eke am ɛkan eke m’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ tasi, ke òwr anŋn ɛm ogŋ a." Ɛtŋ l’atrm ɛy s’ɛgŋ s’eb.
44016016	Lɛgŋ nyam s’aam Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, ɛtŋ adyɔwli nyam am ɔbr ɛy. In ɛm a, abŋ ŋuŋ nyam anŋ eke b’ɔŋ’n l’ɛkn efi e low ek’am ow a li dad. Ów amua eke li b’ɛkn li dad a b’ɔŋ in ec’es ɛwɛl a os nɔnɔ.
44016017	Ɛy lele Pɔl ab, n’am us ɛy jam l’ɛlu lebl li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Agŋ amua, Afr Kpekpe e Nyam a e juma kok ɛsɛl! -N’am dad ɔny ejagb a eke b’ɛwl ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm a ec’odad!"
44016018	Yɔwli a am kok ɛbɛn sɛgŋ nɔnɔ. Ow b’afŋn es a, Pɔl ɛrm ebl toŋ batŋ ɛwl mɛny dad abŋ ŋuŋ a ninɛ: "Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, ɛ̀y ɔkm in ɛm!" Ɛtŋ wanci ab af cɛ abŋ a ɛy ɔkm yɔwli ab ɛm.
44016019	Eke adyɔwli a ec’es ɛwɛl a am ɛkn eke -li k’ow -n’ɛŋnmn os ow ɛm ij a, -n’ɔny Pɔl lele Silas ab -l’ow ɛbɛrŋ ɛm es ɛwɛl ec’any af.
44016020	-L’ot wɛl -n’im Rom e jɛj ok ɛsɛl ek’anŋ yogŋ a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Agŋ amua am is odad ɛy ec’ɛb na ɛm;
44016021	ɛl Jwifɛl, ɛtŋ -n’am yɛgm agŋ ɛb ir owr. Ɛy Rom eyŋ; ɛy ec’ol a ɔɔm abusu eke si k’ɛgŋ s’eb oglog si kok ow e low."
44016022	Dedeku a yɛji ebl ɛrm ok Pɔl lele Silas ab af. Jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ɔŋ wɛl eb Pɔl lele Silas ab mob sos ɛtŋ ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɔr ɛl likŋni ɛm.
44016023	Ɛtŋ eke wɛl ɔr ɛl sɛnyn sɛnyn bake ow uwr a, wɛl ok ɛl sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ usu ɔsu ɛs eke k’ɛw ɛl nyamn af sɛnyn sɛnyn.
44016024	Eke n’ɛŋn abusu ikŋ na a, l’ot l’ok wɛl sobel ab ɛm ec’akŋni nyam ek’anŋ sobel a e nuŋ kɔkɔ a, ɛtŋ n’awŋm wɛl akr ekŋ ekpr ab.
44016025	Ncok eci lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm a, Pɔl lele Silas ab am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛgŋ ɛj kɔklm’n ɛtŋ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a am iri.
44016026	Kpru ɛm, wus umu tuɔtuɔ, ɔny sobel a mumu. Kpɛkŋ masany a fɛŋ fifig ok es ɛtŋ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a eci ŋgbraka a fɛŋ mɔmu es.
44016027	Usu ɔsu ɛs a ufŋm es, eke li b’ɛkn eke sobel a eci masany a fifig a, l’ɔdu in e lab ler ɛm a l’ɛlu ɔkm eke li k’ibir in sosi, aŋke n’am tutr eke sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a uru es im.
44016028	Kɔ Pɔl barm in e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm ninɛ: "Kì kokr ŋ sosi low ŋuŋ! Ɛy fɛŋ s’anŋ aŋa!"
44016029	Usu ɔsu ɛs a ibrm eke wɛl k’igŋ al; l’uru es l’ɛy akŋ a, sos ufŋ ɛm, erŋn ab, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus Pɔl lele Silas ab ec’any af.
44016030	N’ɔŋ wɛl ok ɔkm ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ ɛgbɛl, kɔ ayaf mi ki kokr ke m’ɛ́ŋn sel ee?"
44016031	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ùb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu nawrɛ ke ŋ lele ŋ ec’akŋ ab ɛ́ŋan sel."
44016032	Ɛtŋ -n’am dad ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad, in lele agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ’n akŋ ab ab.
44016033	Ncok a eci wanci ab af cɛ, usu ɔsu ɛs a ot ɛl ab im ɛtŋ yɔyɔg ɛl abi ɛnyɛmbri ab es. Kpɛkŋ in ec’agŋ ab ab wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ.
44016034	L’oc Pɔl lele Silas ab n’im in ec’akŋ a ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl ob ij. Ɛgŋ na lele in ec’akŋ ab ab sos ɛm am iŋn aŋke -l’ub Nyam nawrɛ.
44016035	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Rom e jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ɛrm agŋ ow dad usu ɔsu ɛs a ninɛ: "Ɛ̀lu agŋ a es."
44016036	Usu ɔsu ɛs a ow dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɛlu ɔny es. Ɔtur eke sica k’okr ɔkm imn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm."
44016037	Kɔ Pɔl dad agŋ a ninɛ: "Wɛl jɛjm ɛy e low okm, ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr ɛy dedeku ec’any af, ke ɛy Rom ec’agŋ cɛ! Ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ok ɛy sobel ɛm. Sica -n’am erur eke -li k’ok ɛy ɔkm es lɔl ɛm ee? S’ɛgŋm! -L’ow ɛl obi -l’ok ɛy es!"
44016038	Agŋ a im ɛwl jɛj ok ɛsɛl a sodad a eke Pɔl dad a. Eke -l’irir eke Pɔl lele Silas ab el Rom eyŋ tasi a, ɛrmni ɛdŋ ɛl es.
44016039	-L’ow -l’ɛgŋ low ij -n’ɔŋ wɛl, ɛtŋ -n’ɔny -l’ok wɛl ɔkm sobel ab ɛm ɛtŋ -ni ŋɔŋn wɛl eke wɛl k’ok ɔkm baŋn a.
44016040	Eke Pɔl lele Silas ab ok ɔkm sobel ab ɛm a, -n’im Lidi ogŋ a. Eke -l’ɛkan agŋ lisijimɛl a, ke -l’atar wɛl sos es a, -n’im.
44017001	Sica Pɔl lele Silas ab ɛcr Anfipolis baŋn lele Apoloni baŋn ab eci im ok Tesaloni; yogŋ, Jwifɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu anŋ.
44017002	Ɛsɛ elel eke sakp sakp fɛŋ li bi kok ab af a, Pɔl im ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. Nɛnɛgŋ kpa kpa kpa sakp nyahan, l’atar ów es Nyam odad nuŋ af agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ ab ab.
44017003	N’am ayal l’ok wɛl ɛtŋ n’am yɛgm wɛl eke Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, ow akpl eke Mesi a k’ij gbre ke ánŋ luw ɛm igb. N’am dad wɛl l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu na eke m’am dad ɔny in ec’odad a, in anake l’el Mesi a."
44017004	Jwifɛl ab ɛm e bɛb odad a ok es sos ɛm ɛtŋ -l’ow -n’ɛŋn Pɔl lele Silas ab. Grɛkɛl nɔnɔ ek’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ a lele bosu amamn ɛm ec’ɔyɔw nɔnɔ ab yɛji kok ɛbɛn.
44017005	Gbɛkɔ Jwifɛl a nyamnɛyr am ɔny. -L’as ów marɛm marɛm ɛsɛl eke -n’ɛŋan ɛbɛrŋ ɛm a luku, -n’am is odad agŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -n’am bubr agŋ ɛm baŋn a. Ca -l’igb -l’ok Jasɔn ec’akŋ a, -n’am ɔl Pɔl lele Silas ab eke -li k’ɔny -l’ot -n’im dedeku a ec’any af.
44017006	Eke -n’ɛŋnm wɛl a, -l’ɔdu Jasɔn lele agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab es -l’ow baŋn a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Agŋ amua inymn wus na nimum es afr; sica ɛy ogŋ a -l’ok a!
44017007	Ɛtŋ Jasɔn eb ok ɛl akŋ! Agŋ amua fɛŋ am kok ów ek’elm Sesar ec’ol a eci, aŋke -n’am dad eke es ɛw ɛs ɛjeci nyam in anŋ eke wɛ’n b’ɛsŋ Jesu."
44017008	Sodad amua ɔŋ dedeku a lele ɛb a ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ab sos inym es afr.
44017009	-N’ɔŋ Jasɔn lele agŋ lisijimɛl ab ab ɛw os es gbuŋ ɛtŋ -l’ɛlu wɛl es.
44017010	Kpɛkŋ eke lɛgŋ uk a, agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔŋ Pɔl lele Silas ab im Bere. Eke -l’okr yogŋ a, -n’im Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a.
44017011	Bere e Jwifɛl a b’ɛgŋ low eb akm Tesaloni ec’a; -l’eb Nyam odad a ɛl e sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ -li bi wewr Nyam Lɛl a, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɛkn eke Pɔl ec’odad eke bi dad ɛl a el nawrɛ.
44017012	Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ ub nawrɛ; ɛtŋ Grɛkɛl ab ɛm, bosu amamn ɛm ec’ɔyɔw nɔnɔ lele egŋ nɔnɔ ab yɛji ub nawrɛ.
44017013	Kɔ eke Tesaloni e Jwifɛl a iri eke Pɔl am dad Nyam odad Bere baŋn ɛm yɛj’a, -l’ow -n’am ŋuŋn dedeku a mɛrm ɛm -n’ɔŋ wɛl ɛw jeŋ jeŋ.
44017014	Ow sosiɛm, kpɛkŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔŋ Pɔl imn okij any a eci; gbɛkɔ Silas lele Timote ab gbɛ anŋ Bere.
44017015	Agŋ a ek’aam nyimn Pɔl a im ɛwl’l toŋ ok Atɛn baŋn, ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl -n’im Bere Silas lele Timote ab ec’amani a eke Pɔl ɔŋ ab ab. Amani ab ɛm, n’am ibrm eke wɛl k’ow fafa ɛŋn’n.
44017016	Eke Pɔl am eku Silas lele Timote ab Atɛn yogŋ a, low am ɛy’r sos ɛm eke ɛb na k’el sɛkp eci nuŋ igŋ ɔfr.
44017017	Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ, li b’atar ów es Jwifɛl lele agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl ke am igŋ Nyam nuŋ ab ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛrŋ ɛm yɛji sɛgŋ fɛŋ li b’atar ów es agŋ ɛjeci eke li b’ɛŋn ab ab.
44017018	Epikurɛl lele Sitoyikɛl eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl ab ab yɛji am atar ów es Pɔl ab. Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb am ibrm ɛsɛ: "Nɛnym gbɛl ɛs na, bla odad iy n’am dad gbɛ ee?" Eke agŋ bɛb am iri Pɔl dad Jesu ec’odad lele luw ɛm anŋ igb owi ab a, -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na, ɛsɛ etu e sinyam a cɛ ec’odad ow’n am dad af."
44017019	Ow sosiɛm -l’oc Pɔl ab -n’im baŋn a ec’ów bɛbm ɛsɛl a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li dad ow ninɛ: "Kɔ s’ɔtu eke si k’uw low yɛgm owr na eke am dad ow ec’odad ab any ee?
44017020	Eke am dad ɛy ów eke am iti ɛy any a sosiɛm, s’am erur eke si k’uw ow e nyandrɛ ab any."
44017021	Tasi ɛm a, Atɛn eyŋ a fɛŋ lele etu agŋ a ek’ir ɛl ab a, b’eb sɛgŋ nɔnɔ am iri oglog am dad ów owr ec’odad cɛ.
44017022	Pɔl inym es ów bɛbm ɛsɛl a ec’any af ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Atɛn eyŋ, m’am ɛbmn nyamn eke low low fɛŋ ɛm eel Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl tasi.
44017023	Tasi ɛm a, eke m’am ɛc ɔny eci baŋn ɛm a ke m’am ɛkn ɔny e sinyam nuŋ igŋ e mob a, m’ɛkn egb waw usu nyam eke wɛl nɔn: 'Nyàm eke wɛl uwm any eci'. Ɛɛ! Yec’a eke am igŋn nuŋ ke uwmn any a anake m’am ow mi dad ɔny in ec’odad a.
44017024	Nyam a eke kok wus na nimum lele mob fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ab a, anake el afr lele wus ab eci Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a, ɛtŋ l’írm Sinyamel ek’agŋ us ab ɛm.
44017025	L’ibram eke agŋ k’ɔŋ’n ob kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ow’n ɔnym ob af; tasi ɛm a, in anake li b’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ owr anŋ, sel lele mob mob fɛŋ ab a.
44017026	Ɛgŋ nyam coco ɛm, li kok ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’ok wɛl wus na nimum af. L’ok akpo n’ɔŋ wɛl, ɛtŋ susu susu a eke -li k’ir a yɛji, l’ɛdŋ ow e sereb a.
44017027	Li kok ɛbɛn yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ɔ́l’l es. Ɛtŋ eke es ɔl a am ɛw bɔbrm ɛm yɛji, k’aw ke -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛŋn ow, aŋke Nyam anm kpekpe ɛgŋ kaka eci.
44017028	Tasi ɛm a, ɔny e lɛl nɔn ɛsɛl a yɛji dad ninɛ: 'In ɛm s’anŋ owr, s’ɔtu eke si k’an es s’ɛc, ɛtŋ s’anŋ.' Ɛtŋ lɛl nɔn ɛs ɛjeci nyam yɛji dad ninɛ: 'S’el in ec’ey.'
44017029	Eke s’el in ec’ey a, si k’ɔ́nyn tutr eke Nyam anŋ ɛsɛ sika ɛm nyàm, os ɛm nyàm oglog lebn ɛm nyàm ek’agŋ ij mɛwl kok ɛl ec’ów tutr ɛm af.
44017030	Agŋ ec’any uwm ɛm ec’ów eke kok lɛgŋ a ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, Nyam ɛwm ɛrm af ij, kɔ n’am ibrm susu a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a eke k’itŋn ɛl ec’es an a.
44017031	L’oc lɛgŋ nyam l’ɛw es, eke ɛgŋ a eke li sɔsum l’oc ab ɛm, li b’ow li jɛj wus e low l’ok nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm. L’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af ɛgŋ na eke l’igbm luw ɛm ab ɛm!"
