44017032	Eke -l’irir Pɔl dad luw ɛm anŋ igb ec’odad a, agŋ bɛb am kokr’r miyɛr, ɛtŋ oglog am dad ɛsɛ: "Lɛgŋ ɛjeci ke s’íri ŋ ec’odad na."
44017033	Af aŋa anake Pɔl ɛlu ɛl es a.
44017034	Kɔ agŋ bɛb gbɛ ɛgŋ in e low a eb ɛtŋ ub nawrɛ. Ɛl ɛm a, Denis ek’el ów bɛbm ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a, yɔw nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Damaris a lele agŋ ɛjec’ab anŋ ɛm.
44018001	Eke ów amua b’ɛc a, Pɔl igb Atɛn im ɛy Korɛnt.
44018002	Yogŋ n’ɛŋn Jwif nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Akilas; wɛl ew’r Pɔŋ eci wus ab af. N’anŋ Rom, Itali wus af l’ow ɛy Prisil ab ow k’ibnm, aŋke yogŋ Sesar Klod ɔŋ abusu wɛl ogŋ Jwifɛl a fɛŋ. Pɔl im ɛŋn ɛl,
44018003	ɛtŋ eke -n’ɔnyn juma nyam ek’el ndey lɛl ɛm lɛ́f e kok a, l’ir wɛl ab ɛtŋ -li b’okr af -li kok juma.
44018004	Nɛnɛgŋ fɛŋ, Pɔl b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ eke li b’eb odad a, li b’ɔl eke li k’eb Grɛkɛl lele Jwifɛl ab.
44018005	Sica eke Silas lele Timote ab anŋ Maseduan ow a, Pɔl b’oc in e lɛgŋ a fɛŋ am dad Jwifɛl a Nyam odad am ij nɛny dad eke Mesi a Jesu.
44018006	Kɔ Jwifɛl a ɛ́gŋm in e low a ebm ɛtŋ bi wɛwr’r; ow sosiɛm l’ufŋ in e mob sus ɛm a e siflefl ab es l’ok wɛl es, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke batŋ irmn, ke ɔny obi ɛm ana; ow elm ɛm e low ij. Sicaca ɛm a, m’ow m’oc any m’ɔkŋ agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a."
44018007	Pɔl igb yogŋ im ir Titius Justus ogŋ, ek’in ec’êl a titm Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a. L’elm Jwif kɔ l’el ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛgŋ ɛl eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi a eb.
44018008	Krispus ek’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw a, lele in ec’akŋ ab ab ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ. Korɛnt baŋn eyŋ nɔnɔ ek’iri Pɔl ec’odad a yɛji ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ ok mij nuŋ.
44018009	Sica ncok nyam, Pɔl am ɛrur mɛmn ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ am dad’r ɛsɛ: "K’ùru erŋn! Nɛny ánŋ’ŋ ɛm am dad! K’àbl nɛny,
44018010	aŋke m’anŋ ŋ ab. Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum kokm’ŋ low ŋuŋ aŋke ɛb na ɛm, agŋ nɔnɔ el ɛm eci."
44018011	Pɔl anŋ Korɛnt kok lakpo nyam awl nɔhɔn ɛtŋ am yɛgm agŋ Nyam odad.
44018012	Lakpo ab af eke Galiɔn eb Rom ec’es ɛw Akayi ogog ec’a, Jwifɛl okr af irŋn Pɔl. -L’oc ow -n’im jɛj ok ec’any af
44018013	ɛtŋ -li dad ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ na am ɔl eke k’eb agŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ ek’otm ol a ec’ab es."
44018014	Eke Pɔl ɔl eke ki dad odad a, Galiɔn dad Jwifɛl a ninɛ: "Ɔny Jwifɛl, tasi ɛm a, blel ow el low ŋuŋ li kok, oglog low ligbɛl marɛm anake li kok a, ke blel m’ók sos es m’iri ɔny ec’odad a.
44018015	Kɔ ek’ow el ów es atar odad ebl owi af, en owi af lele ɔny obi e sol owi af ab a, na ɔny obi e low eke k’ɛkan ana. Sodad nɛnɛ a, m’érurm eke mi k’el ow e jɛj ok ɛs!"
44018016	Ɛtŋ l’ogŋ wɛl jɛj ok usu a.
44018017	Ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɔny Sɔstɛn ek’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ec’es ɛw ɛs a, ɛtŋ -n’am ɔr ow jɛj ok ɛsɛl a ec’any af; gbɛkɔ Galiɔn cicm sar okm ɛl es.
44018018	Pɔl anŋ Korɛnt ibn. Sica l’ɛlu agŋ lisijimɛl a es, ɛtŋ l’eb mijɛtŋ l’ot Prisil lele Akilas ab n’im Siri. Gbuŋ ke -l’eb mijɛtŋ a, Saŋkre ɛb ɛm yogŋ, Pɔl ɔŋ wɛl ɛr’r sin aŋke l’ij nɛny.
44018019	-N’im -l’ok Efɛs ɛtŋ Pɔl ɛlu ɛl es yogŋ. N’im l’ɛy Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a ɛtŋ Jwifɛl ab ab -n’am atar ów es.
44018020	-L’ibrm ow ek’ow k’anŋ ɛl ab ibn, kɔ l’ɛgŋm.
44018021	Ke l’ɛ́lu wɛl es a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Eke Nyam ɛgŋ, lɛgŋ ɛjeci m’ow m’ɛwl mɛny m’ow ɔny ogŋ aŋa." Ɛtŋ l’igb Efɛs n’imn mijɛtŋ ɛm eci.
44018022	Eke l’itr es Sesare a, l’uyu n’im Jerusalɛm l’ɛsŋn Nyamel ec’agŋ a, gbuŋ ɛtŋ n’im Antiɔs.
44018023	Li kok sɛgŋ bɛb yogŋ ɛtŋ n’im. In ec’im ɛm a, l’ɛcr Galasi lele Friji e wus ab af eci ɛtŋ n’am atr jam ɛsɛl a sos es.
44018024	Jwif nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Apolɔs ke wɛl ew Alesandri a, ow ɛy Efɛs. L’el odad ebl mamn ɛs eke uw Nyam Lɛl any sɛnyn sɛnyn yɛji.
44018025	Wɛl yɛgm’n Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a e low, ɛtŋ ari at ɛm, n’am ɔb kokoba li yɛgm agŋ Jesu e lís e low fɛŋ cɛcɛ ɛm; gbɛkɔ Jan eci mij ok nuŋ a cɛ e low l’uw any.
44018026	N’am dad ów ɔmn ɛm tasi Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu yogŋ. Eke Prisil lele Akilas ab iri’r lebl a, -l’oc ow ɛtŋ -l’otar Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a e low akr tasi -l’ok ow.
44018027	Sica eke Apolɔs am erur eke k’im Akayi wus af a, agŋ lisijimɛl a atr’r sos es, ɛtŋ -li kok lɛl -n’awŋ ɛb ab ɛm eci jam ɛsɛl a yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl éb’r sɛnyn sɛnyn. Eke n’im l’ɛy yogŋ a, agŋ a eke Nyam e bibm ɛm ɔny ɔmn a, l’ɛlum wɛl abu nɔnɔ.
44018028	Tasi ɛm a, dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af n’am ot ów tasi li yɛgm eke Jwifɛl a ɔnym low ij: Nyam Lɛl ɛm, n’am ɛlu ɔkm eke Mesi a Jesu.
44019001	Ek’Apolɔs anŋ Korɛnt a, Pɔl ebr mafɛny ɛm eci im ɛy Efɛs. N’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl bɛb yogŋ
44019002	ɛtŋ l’ibrm wɛl ninɛ: "Kɔ eke ubr nawrɛ a, ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Ek’Abŋ Lala nyam anŋ yɛji, s’irim; wɛl dadm ɛy ow e low."
44019003	Ow ɔŋ Pɔl ibrm ɛl ninɛ: "Ke sica bogŋ e mij ok nuŋ ɛŋan ee?" -Li dad ow ninɛ: "Jan eci mij ok nuŋ a eke yɛgm agŋ a."
44019004	Pɔl dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, Jan am ok agŋ a ek’ɛgŋ eb eke k’itŋn ɛrm a mij nuŋ ɛtŋ n’am dad Israɛl ec’agŋ a eke k’ub ɛgŋ a eke b’ow anŋ’n jam ow a nawrɛ, ɛgŋ a el Jesu."
44019005	Eke -l’irir ów amua a, -n’ɔŋ wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm.
44019006	Pɔl at ɛl abu nuŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala. -N’am ɛbr sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛtŋ -n’am iri Nyam ogŋ ec’odad -li dad.
44019007	Agŋ a fɛŋ ɔtu ek’ij agŋ lɛw yony.
44019008	Pɔl b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ usu a, ɛtŋ yogŋ awl emum nyahan, li bi dad ów ɔmn ɛm tasi. N’am dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad ɛtŋ n’am ɔl elel eke li k’eb agŋ a ek’am iri in ec’odad a.
44019009	Gbɛkɔ agŋ nɔnɔ am ɔny lɔru aru, ɛ́gŋm ek’ub nawrɛ ɛtŋ dedeku a ec’any af, am cak Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a e low. Ow sosiɛm Pɔl ɛlu ɛl es, ot jam ɛsɛl ab ab im, ɛtŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ am dad Nyam odad Tiranus e lɛl êl ɛm a.
44019010	Low na ibn toŋ ij akpo yony; ow ɔŋ agŋ a ek’ir Azi ogog a, Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a.
44019011	-
44019012	Pɔl ɛm, Nyam am kok sakrowa ɛgbɛl toŋ batŋ agŋ b’ot sigbad, oglog nuŋ es awŋ eke Pɔl ɛw sos a ís ɔ́lu a: ɔl a b’oc ɛl es lís ɛtŋ abŋ eŋuŋ a b’ok ɔkm ɛl ɛm.
44019013	Jwifɛl bɛb eke b’ɛc susu susu ogŋ abŋ eŋuŋ eke b’anŋ ɔ́lu ɛm a, ɛl yɛji am ɛbm oc Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin a ogŋn abŋ eŋuŋ ok ɔkm. -Li bi dad abŋ eŋuŋ a -l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu a eke Pɔl am dad in e low a e nin ɛm, m’am dad ɔny eke k’okr ɔkm!"
44019014	Ɛbɛn eke egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam, Jwif eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Seva a, ec’ey lɔbŋ a yɛji bi kok ana.
44019015	Kɔ lɛgŋ nyam, abŋ ŋuŋ nyam dad ɛl ninɛ: "M’uw Jesu any ɛtŋ m’uw ɛgŋ ek’el Pɔl ab any, ɛtŋ kɔ ɔny, bwo el ɔny ee?"
44019016	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke abŋ ŋuŋ ir ɛm a ɛy ɛl af, ɛtŋ l’ɛy lɛc l’akm wɛl fɛŋ; l’ɔr wɛl lɛc ɛm toŋ batŋ mob kok kok ɛl; -l’uru es -l’ok ɔkm akŋ a -n’im sos ɔfr.
44019017	Efɛs ec’agŋ a, Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab, iri low na; ɛl fɛŋ erŋn am ɔny ɛl ɛtŋ agŋ am ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin a ec’ɛlum ligbɛl.
44019018	Agŋ nɔnɔ a eke ub nawrɛ a ow dedeku a fɛŋ ec’any af ɛgŋ ów eŋuŋ a eke -li kokr a e low eb.
44019019	Agŋ nɔnɔ a eke kok cam owi a ot ɛl e silɛl a ow, ɛtŋ dedeku a fɛŋ ec’any af -l’ofŋ. Wɛl ub silɛl a ec’os abi ek’ɔtu eke k’ij a, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’os ab ɛm, ow ij jɛtɛ efu fandi ekŋ yony lele lɛw ab.
44019020	Elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’abusu ɛm, Nyam ec’odad a am eb es ke am ɛlu in e lɛc a ɔkm ana.
44019021	Eke ów amua ɛc ok es a, Abŋ Lala nyimn Pɔl eke k’ɛcr Maseduan lele Akayi ab eci, ke im Jerusalɛm. N’am dad eke ek’in im yogŋ, ow’n it ke in ím Rom yɛji.
44019022	Ow sosiɛm n’ɔŋ in ec’abu ɛlum ɛsɛl yony, Timote lele Eras ab ikŋ anym im Maseduan, kɔ in obi a gbɛ ɛmɛny n’anŋ Azi sɛgŋ bɛb.
44019023	Lɛgŋ na af, ɛrm bebl ligbɛl ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a sosiɛm.
44019024	Sika iny ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Demetrius b’oc jɛtɛ ufu kokr nyàm yɔw Artemis eci nyamel ekekey, ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ juma kok ɛsɛl a b’ɛŋn os nɔnɔ.
44019025	L’as in e juma kok ɛsɛl a lele agŋ ɛjec’a eke ɛl e juma a ot in ec’a es a luku ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ o, uwr any eke ow el juma na anake b’ɔŋ ɛy s’ir ɛb sɛnyn sɛnyn a.
44019026	Am ɛkan ɛtŋ am irir low eke Pɔl ikŋ na am kok a: tasi ɛm a, n’am dad eke sinyam a eke agŋ in kok a, in elm nyàm, ɛtŋ l’eb agŋ nɔnɔ, ow elm Efɛs aŋa sɔny cɛ, kɔ Azi wus nimum af yɛji.
44019027	Low na ɔtu eke ki ŋuŋn ɛy e juma a, ke ɛmɛny ow ɔ́ŋ nyàm yɔw Artemis e nyamel gbɛl a irmn in ec’any a; nyàm yɔw na eke Azi lele wus na nimum ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ab b’igŋ nuŋ a e sagb a b’ow oc es!"
44019028	Eke -l’irir sodad amua a, agŋ a ɛrm ebl afŋn es ɛtŋ am ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Efɛs eci Artemis a el ligbɛl!"
44019029	Ɛrm bebl a eb es ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm. Agŋ a ɔny Gayus lele Aritak ab, Maseduan wus af eyŋ yony eke b’ɛwl Pɔl usu, ɛtŋ dedeku ɛm -l’ub -l’ok dedeku a e luku as usu a.
44019030	Pɔl am erur eke k’okm sos ɔkm dedeku a ec’any af, kɔ jam ɛsɛl a ɛdŋn in.
44019031	Azi wus ab af eci idr ɛsɛl bɛb a ek’el lawlɛl a, ɔŋ’n bɔwl ŋɔŋn’n eke li k’iim dedeku a e luku as usu a.
44019032	Wanci ab af a, luku as a wuwal: agŋ bɛb b’ɔny na ke dad, amua b’ɔny na ke dad, ɛtŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl ec’a, -l’uwm low a sosiɛm eke -n’anŋn luku as ab ɛm ab any.
44019033	Jwifɛl a akŋ ów a ok Alesandr nɛnym ɛtŋ -l’ikŋm ow anym eke li ki dad. Alesandr igbl abu ogŋ: l’erur eke dedeku a ec’any af li k’eb odad li dad l’otar akr.
44019034	Gbɛkɔ sica eke ow ok ɛl es sos ɛm eke ow el Jwif a, ɛl fɛŋ -l’ɔg lebl nyam toŋ ow kok wanci ɔmu yony: "Efɛs eci Artemis a el ligbɛl!"
44019035	Sɔg a anŋ ɛm toŋ ɛtŋ sica ɛb a eci es ɛw ɛs a ɔtu ɛdŋn dedeku a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Efɛs ec’agŋ, yewalil ɔ! Agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke Efɛs ec’ɛb a b’ɔsu Artemis gbɛl a e nuŋ igŋ usu a lele in e lebn ɛm nyàm ek’anŋ afr ɛy wus ab ab.
44019036	Ow itim ɛgŋ kaka any. Ow sosiɛm ɔtur eke ki yewalil tiŋ, kì kokr nyamb owi.
44019037	Kin, otr agŋ amua owr aŋa, -l’iym nyamel gbɛl a e mil ɛtŋ -li wɛwrm ɛy e nyàm yɔw a yɛji.
44019038	Eke Demetrius lele in e juma kok ɛsɛl ab ab ɔny low ɛgŋ ab a, ow ɔny sɛgŋ eke wɛl bi jɛj ów ok ɛtŋ es ɛw ɛsɛl yɛji anŋ: yogŋ anake -li k’im -li jɛj -l’ok a.
44019039	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny eke ɔnyn low eke k’ibrmn a, wɛl b’ow dad ow ec’odad luku as gbɛl a eke b’an es ol af a ec’any af.
44019040	Tasi ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna e low na ek’ɛy a, af yogŋ a, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ot ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ low ɛgŋm ebm ɛsɛl af, aŋke low kaka anm ek’am ayal ɛy ec’ɛŋanin na, ɛtŋ si k’ow s’ɔnym odad ebl ek’ow af si k’otar ɛŋanin na e low akr sɛnyn sɛnyn."
44019041	Eke li dad ów amua uwr a, l’igbl luku as a ec’agŋ a sos ogŋ.
44020001	Eke ów wuwal a fɛŋ ok sel a, Pɔl as jam ɛsɛl a luku ɛtŋ am atr ɛl sos es. Ow b’uwr a, l’ɛlu wɛl es n’im Maseduan.
44020002	L’ɛcr wus ab af eci, l’atr ɔmn ɛsɛl a sos es, sodad nɔnɔ a eke li dad wɛl ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ n’im Grɛs,
44020003	n’anŋ yogŋ l’ij awl nyahan. Sica eke n’am bɛbm sos eke li k’eb mijɛtŋ n’im Siri a, l’iri eke Jwifɛl a am ut in ec’asre. Ow sosiɛm l’ɛwl mɛny l’ebr Maseduan eci.
44020004	Agŋ a ek’im am ɛwl’l a el: Sopatɛr Pirus jim, Bere iy, Aritak lele Sekundus ab ek’el Tesaloni eyŋ, Gayus, Dɛrb iy, Timote, Tisik lele Trofim ab, Azi wus af ec’agŋ.
44020005	Agŋ amua ikŋ anym im Troas am eku ɛy.
44020006	Ɛy gbɛ, eke Futufutu eke ejru anm ɛm ec’es gbɛgbl a uwr a, s’eb mijɛtŋ Filip ɛb ɛm Maseduan wus af; ɛtŋ eke sɛgŋ yen ɛc a, s’im s’ɛŋn ɛl Troas, s’anŋ yogŋ si kok sɛgŋ lɔbŋ.
44020007	Ma ɛy ncebles a, s’ɛŋanin eke si k’ubr futufutu ɛm, ɛtŋ Pɔl am dad dedeku a odad. Eke lɛgŋ b’ow ɛny ke li b’ow n’im a sosiɛm, li dad odad toŋ lɛgŋ usu ubr ɛm.
44020008	Oj ab ɛm a eke s’as luku êl afr yogŋ a, kɛniɛ nɔnɔ anŋ.
44020009	Ŋgbafrɛ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Etikus sig es finɛtr nɛny af a. Pɔl ec’odad a ek’am ɔfu nɛnym a, ɔŋ mɛmn ɛwl’l. Mɛmn a afŋn in es toŋ n’anŋ êl afr nyahan ɛm a l’ɛy wus. Wɛl ɔny igbl’l ogŋ, kɔ l’uw.
44020010	Pɔl us es, im ubu’r af, oc’r ɛtŋ dad agŋ a ninɛ: "Ɛrmij k’ók ɔny: n’anŋ owr!"
44020011	Ɛmɛny Pɔl ɛwl uyu êl afr a, l’ubr futufutu ab ɛm li cɛc, ɛtŋ in yɛji l’ij. Ɛmɛny li dad odad ibn kpekpe toŋ ligbn ɛjn ɛy ɔkm ɛtŋ n’im.
44020012	Iy a gbɛ anŋ owr, wɛl oc’r im ɛtŋ ow el agŋ a fɛŋ ec’ɛrm es ɛy.
44020013	S’ikŋ anym s’im eke si k’eb mijɛtŋ ot im ɛy Asos; yogŋ anake si k’oc Pɔl a, aŋke tasi ɛm a, li dad eke li k’ɛcr wus wus eci.
44020014	Eke l’ow n’ɛŋn ɛy Asos a, s’oc’r mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ s’im Mitilɛn.
44020015	S’igb yogŋ s’im ɛtŋ lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’ow s’ok lekr a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Kio a ec’any af. Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’ow s’ok Samɔs, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lɛgŋ b’ɛny akr af a, s’ow s’ok Mile.
44020016	Tasi ɛm a, Pɔl ɛgŋ eb eke k’inyam es Efɛs irmnm lɛgŋ Azi wus af. N’am ogŋ es yec’ɛtŋ ek’ow it ke n’ánŋ Jerusalɛm Pantekɔt e lɛgŋ a.
44020017	Pɔl anŋ Mile awŋ bɔwl Efɛs eke Nyamel ec’ agŋ ekpekp a k’ow.
44020018	Eke -l’owr -n’ɛŋan ow a, li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ eke m’anŋ ɔny ab a, uwr elel eke m’aan es ab any, lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ a ɛtŋ eke m’ow Azi wus na af a.
44020019	Es is ɛm, mi kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm, Jwifɛl eci asre eke b’ut ɛm e gbre ijr ec’a sosiɛm.
44020020	Uwr any ɛkan eke low fɛŋ ek’ɔtu eke k’akpl ɔny ec’a, m’ocm mi lɔlm es. Dedeku fɛŋ ec’any af, ɔny ec’akŋ akŋ, mi dad ɔny ɛtŋ mi yɛgm ɔny yɛji.
44020021	M’ɛsŋ Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab eke k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm, oc any ɔkŋ Nyam ke ɔ́ny ɔmn ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛm.
44020022	Sica m’aam Jerusalɛm ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala am at’m eke mi ki kok ab af. Low yec’a eke b’ow ɛŋn’m yogŋ a, m’uwm any.
44020023	Low a cɛ eke m’uw any a el: ɛb fɛŋ ɛm eke mi b’ɛc a, Abŋ Lala b’ɛwar’m ɛm e gbre ij nɔnɔ lele sobel ɛm eke m’ow m’ɛy ab ab a e low.
44020024	Gbɛkɔ m’am ɛkn eke ɛm ec’a, ɛm ec’owr anŋ a ɔnym any; low a cɛ ek’ɔny any a el ke m’ím toŋ m’igŋ ɛm eci es uru a e nuŋ, ke mi kók juma a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu abul’m a, toŋ ke m’úwar; juma a el ke m’ɔ́b Amani Mamn a ek’el Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a e kokoba.
44020025	M’ɛc ɔny fɛŋ ec’araŋn mi dad Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’odad; gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, m’uw any ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɛknm im ij.
44020026	Na sosiɛm anake yɛfɛnyna m’am igbl lebl ogŋ mi dad m’ɛsɛ: ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam am irm, ke ow elm ɛm e low ij,
44020027	aŋke mi dad ɔny Nyam e low a fɛŋ eke bɛbm ɛw es a; m’ocm kaka mi lɔlm es.
44020028	Ɔ̀surir ɔny obi lele Abŋ Lala eci mɛbob a ek’ɔŋ ɔny eke k’ɔsur ab ab. Ɛsɛ elel eke mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs b’ɛw in e mɛcɛb a nyamn af ab af a, ɛ̀wr Nyamel a eke Nyam ɔl jim lokm e mebl ab ɛm a e low ɛrm.
44020029	M’uw any tasi eke ɛm eci im ɛm a, agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mindey eŋuŋ af b’ow ok ɔny ec’araŋn ɛtŋ k’ow yɛbm mɛbob a kaka.
44020030	Ɛtŋ ɔny ɛm a yɛji, agŋ b’ow ok ɔkm am ɔny yadŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔmn ɛsɛl a ús ɛl jam.
44020031	Ɔ̀sur sos! Ke ɔ́kan ek’akpo emum nyahan, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm, m’ɔpim ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam ec’ów ɔm.
44020032	Sica m’am oc m’ɛlul ɔny Nyam lele in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ eci odad ab ab abu ɛm. N’ɔny abusu eke li k’agbr ɔny ɔmn ɛm ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny aja a fɛŋ eke l’oc l’ɛw es agŋ a ek’el in ec’a ec’a.
44020033	M’ocm nyamn m’ɛwm ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ec’os, sika, lele simob sus ɛm ab af.
44020034	Ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke ow el ɛm e sabu ab ɛm mi kok juma m’ɛŋn yec’ek’it a agŋ a ek’am ɛwl’m a, lele ɛm obi ab ec’a.
44020035	Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ mi yɛgm ɔny eke ki kokr juma ɛbɛn ke ɛ́lumn ɔgbɔru abu. Ɔ̀kan Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu eci sodad amua eke dad a: 'Eke wɛl b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ob a, wɛl b’ɛŋn sos ɛm iŋn nɔnɔ akm yec’eke wɛl b’ɛŋn ɛgŋ ɛm a.' "
44020036	Eke odad a uwr a, Pɔl ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛl fɛŋ ab ŋɔŋn Nyam.
44020037	Agŋ a fɛŋ am ikŋ ɔŋn ɛtŋ am ɛy Pɔl af es ɛlulil eci.
44020038	Sos ɔw ɛl es nɔnɔ aŋke Pɔl dad ɛl eke wɛ’n k’ow in ɛknm’n ij. Ɛtŋ -l’ɛwl ow toŋ -l’ok mijɛtŋ a e lís.
44021001	Eke sica s’ɛlu ɛl es a, s’imn mijɛtŋ ɛm eci, kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ toŋ s’ok Kɔs lekr ɛm; lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’im s’ok Rod lekr ɛm, ɛtŋ s’igb yogŋ s’im s’ok Patara baŋn.
44021002	Yogŋ, s’ɛŋn mijɛtŋ nyam ek’am ow im Fenisi ɛtŋ s’ok ɛm s’im.
44021003	S’ɛkn Sipr lekr a kpekpe ɛm, s’ɛcr ow ec’esr ɛm a, ɛtŋ s’imn Siri eci. S’itr es Tir eci nanu gbɛl a, yogŋ a eke mijɛtŋ a k’usm in ec’ɛrɛkp ab es a.
44021004	Yogŋ s’ɛŋn jam ɛsɛl ɛtŋ s’anŋ ɛl ab ow ij nɛnɛgŋ mum nyam. Eke Abŋ Lala ɛwar ɛl a, -li dad Pɔl eke k’úyum iim Jerusalɛm.
44021005	Gbɛkɔ eke nɛnɛgŋ gber mum a oc es a, s’ɛwl s’ebr ɛy ec’usu im ab ɛm. Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ow -l’ɛwl ɛy, ɛl ec’ɔyɔw lele ɛl ec’ey ab toŋ s’ok ɔkm baŋn a. Okij nɛny yogŋ, s’ok ɔwrɔkp wus si ŋɔŋn Nyam.
44021006	Eke sica s’ɛlulil es a, s’ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɛl gbɛ -l’ɛwl -n’im gbugŋ gbugŋ.
44021007	Sica eke s’igb Tir a, s’im s’ok Pitolemais, ɛtŋ s’uwar ɛy ec’usu im mij af ec’a. Yogŋ s’ɛkanin ɛb ab ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl ab ab, ɛtŋ s’anŋ ɛl ab lɛgŋ nyam cɛ.
44021008	Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’im s’ok Sesare. Yogŋ, s’ok Amani Mamn a ec’es ɔmun ɛs Filip ec’akŋ a ɛtŋ s’anŋ in ogŋ a. L’el agŋ lɔbŋ a eke wɛl sɔsum ot Jerusalɛm a e nyam.
44021009	N’ɔny ey ɔyɔw yar eke ɛbim egŋ, ke b’ɔb kokoba dad odad eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛl a.
44021010	S’anŋ yogŋ ow kok sɛgŋ nɔnɔ toŋ ɛtŋ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Agabus anŋ Jude ow.
44021011	L’ow ɛy ogŋ a, l’oc Pɔl eci meb er ɛm a, n’awŋ in ec’akr a lele sabu ab ab, ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Kin Abŋ Lala ec’odad eke am dad: ɛgŋ a eke meb er ɛm na el in ec’a, Jerusalɛm yogŋ, Jwifɛl b’ow awŋ’n ɛbɛn, ke -l’oc -l’ɛlu ow agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a abu ɛm."
44021012	Eke s’iri ów amua a, ɛy obi ɛy obi lele Sesare ec’ɛy lisijimɛl ab ab, si ŋɔŋn Pɔl eke k’úyum iim Jerusalɛm.
44021013	Gbɛkɔ li dad ninɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am ikŋn ɔŋn ɔwar’m sos es ee? Ɛm, mi bɛbm sos, ow elm ɛm ec’awŋ a cɛ eci, kɔ ke m’úw Jerusalɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu sosiɛm."
44021014	Eke s’ɔtum s’ebm’n odad ebl ɛm a, s’atram’n ij ɛtŋ si dad s’ɛsɛ: "Ke ow él yec’a ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ am erur a!"
44021015	Eke sica s’anŋ yogŋ si kok sɛgŋ bɛb a, si bɛbm sos s’am uyu s’imn Jerusalɛm eci.
44021016	Sesare eci jam ɛsɛl a ow ɛwl ɛy Jerusalɛm; -l’oc ɛy -n’im ɛgŋ nyam eke k’eb ok ɛy akŋ a ogŋ; wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Minasɔn, Sipr lekr ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ek’el jam ɛs lɛgŋ kpekpe, ke ir Jerusalɛm.
44021017	Yogŋ eke s’ok a, ɛy lisijimɛl a eb ɛy sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
44021018	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, Pɔl ot ɛy ab im Jak ogŋ a; yogŋ, Nyamel ec’ agŋ ekpekp a fɛŋ as luku.
44021019	Pɔl ɛsŋn ɛl, ɛtŋ mɛwl ɛm am dad ɛl in e juma ab ɛm ec’ów fɛŋ eke Nyam kok agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’araŋn a.
44021020	Eke -l’irir ow ec’odad a uwr a, -li kɔklm Nyam; ɛtŋ -li dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Ɛy lisijim, am ɛkn eke Jwifɛl fandi fandi ub Jesu nawrɛ, ke ɛl fɛŋ -li b’ucu ol a -n’ɔny es sɛnyn sɛnyn a.
44021021	Wɛl dad ɛl eke ŋ bi yɛgm Jwifɛl a fɛŋ ek’in ir lutu a low eke wɛ’n k’igŋ Mois ec’ ol a in ɛlu es, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ŋ bi dad wɛl eke wɛ’n k’úbrm wɛl ec’ey a ekr es, wɛ’n kí kokm Jwifɛl ec’ów a.
44021022	-Li b’ow -l’iri tasi eke ŋ ow aŋa. Ayaf si ki kokr ab ee?
44021023	Ow akpl ke kók ow a eke si b’ow si dad’ŋ a. Aŋa, s’ɔny agŋ yar ek’ij nɛny Nyam ec’any af.
44021024	Òc ɛl ab im, ànŋ ɛl ab sos ayal eci low kok ab ɛm, ke sɔ́g ɛl e low kok a e labm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -l’ɛr sin. Ow ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow uw any eke ów a fɛŋ e wɛl dad ŋ e lís a elm nawrɛ; ow b’ow yɛgm eke ŋ yɛji anŋ Mois ec’ol a ec’ɛlum ɛm.
44021025	Agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl ke ub nawrɛ a ec’a, si kok lɛl s’awŋ ɛl si dad ɛl ów yec’a eke si bɛbm a. Kin ów a: -li k’ijmn ndey eke wɛl oc wawr egb ɔŋ sɛkp, -l’ɛgŋmn mebl, -l’ijmn ndey eke wɛl okm mebl es, -l’ijmn nfaci."
44021026	Af yogŋ, Pɔl oc agŋ yar amua ab im, ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, -n’im wɛl ab sos ayal eci low kok ab ɛm. Ɛmɛny n’im Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ɛtŋ n’am dad wɛl dedeku ɛm lɛgŋ yec’af eke sos ayal eci low kok a b’ow uwr ke wɛl b’ow waw ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam ec’egb a.
44021027	Eke sos ayal eci sɛgŋ lɔbŋ a am ow uwr a, kpɛkŋ Azi ogog eci Jwifɛl a ɛkn Pɔl Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a. -L’ij abra -n’ɔŋ dedeku a fɛŋ ɛtŋ -n’ɔny ow;
44021028	-n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Israɛl ec’agŋ, ɛ̀lumn ɛy abu! Kin ɛgŋ a eke usu fɛŋ, agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af bi dad ów eŋuŋ ok Israɛl ec’agŋ af, Mois ec’ ol ab af lele Nyamel gbɛl na af ab a. Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, l’ot agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl l’ok Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm; ow ɛm a, -ni ŋuŋn usu lala a Nyam ec’any af."
44021029	Tasi ɛm a, -n’am dad ɛbɛn aŋke -l’ɛkn Efɛs iy Trofim Pɔl ab ɛb ab ɛm. -N’am tutr eke Pɔl oc ɛlu’l Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ lokm a.
44021030	Likekr a eb es ɛb ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɔy ɔy a fɛŋ ɛm agŋ am anŋ ow. -N’ɔny Pɔl -l’ɔdu -l’ɛlu ow ɔkm Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ -li babl masany a.
44021031	-N’am ɔl eke -li k’ibi Pɔl, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl im dad Rom e kumada a ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm a likekr a eke eb es ɛb a fɛŋ ɛm a e low.
44021032	Kpɛkŋ l’ot srɔda eyŋ lele ɛl ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ab ɛtŋ l’uru es n’im dedeku a ogŋ a. Eke -li b’ɛkn kumada a lele srɔda eyŋ ab ab a, -l’ɔrm Pɔl ij.
44021033	Kumada a ɛri im titm Pɔl, ɔŋ wɛl ɔny’n ɛtŋ ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc ŋgbraka yony awŋn’n; ɛtŋ l’ibrm ɛgŋ yec’a eke l’el a lele low yec’a eke n’am kok ab ab.
44021034	Gbɛkɔ dedeku ab ɛm, agŋ amua ám dad odad na, ke bɛb ám dad ɛjeci. Kumada a ɔ́tum irim low a tasi likekr na ɛm; n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc Pɔl im in eci frutu lakp ab ɛm.
44021035	Eke Pɔl anŋ êl a ec’af uyu usu a, srɔda eyŋ a oc’r abu ɛm abu ɛm, dedeku a e lɛc ek’am ɛlu ɔkm a sosiɛm,
44021036	aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ am us’r jam ɔg dad ɛsɛ: "Wɛl íbi’r! Wɛl íbi’r!"
44021037	Wanci ab af eke srɔda eyŋ a am ɔl eke k’ɔny Pɔl ɛlu frutu lakp ab ɛm a, li dad kumada a ninɛ: "Kɔ m’ɔny abusu eke mi ki dad’ŋ odad tɛl ee?" Kumada a ninɛ: "Kɔ b’ɛbr Grɛk ee?
44021038	Njɛ elm Ejipt iy a eke efnɛny a cɛ is ar ke ot áru fandi yar ab im loj ab ee?"
44021039	Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Ɛm Jwif, wɛl ew’m Tars ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af, ɛb ek’ɔny any ec’ɛgŋ. M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, ɔ̀ŋ’m abusu mi dád dedeku a odad."
44021040	Kumada a ɔŋ’n abusu. Pɔl inym es êl a ec’af uyu usu a ɛtŋ l’ɔwl wɛl abu eke -li ki yewal. Eke -li yewalil a, Pɔl am dad ɛl odad Ebre ɛm:
44022001	"Agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ ɛsɛl ab, ìgŋn lɔru es ke írir low yec’a eke sica m’am ow mi dad ɛm e dogŋn ec’a."
44022002	Eke sica -l’irir ek’ow am dad ɛl odad Ebre ɛm a, usu a irm es tiŋ ɛtŋ Pɔl dad ninɛ:
44022003	"Ɛm Jwif, wɛl ew’m Tars ɛb ɛm, Silisi wus af, gbɛkɔ Jerusalɛm aŋa wɛl gbagbl’m, ɛtŋ Gamaliɛl el ɛm e low yɛgm ɛs. Li yɛgm’m m’uw ɛy lagŋɛl ec’ol ab any sɛnyn sɛnyn. Nyam eci juma kok a eci lɛc a iy’m ɛm nɔnɔ ɛsɛ elel eke yɛfɛnyna ɔny fɛŋ ow iy ɔny ɛm ab af.
44022004	M’ijr agŋ a ek’am us Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb na a gbre luw eci. M’ɔny egŋ lele ɔyɔw ab m’ok sobel ɛm.
44022005	Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a lele Sanedrɛn a nimum ab ɔtu ek’ij daŋku ek’ow el odad nawrɛ eke m’am dad. Ɛl ec’abu ɛm, m’ɛŋn silɛl ɛy lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ek’anŋ Damas a eci eke ow ɛm -li k’uwr’m any; ɛtŋ m’im eke mi k’ɔny ɔmn ɛsɛl a ek’anŋ a, m’ók ɛl ŋgbraka ke m’ót ɛl ab m’ow Jerusalɛm ke mi kók ɛl low ŋuŋ."
44022006	"M’us ejagb m’aam ɛtŋ eke m’am titm Damas a, lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm, kpɛkŋ usuayl ligbɛl nyam eci jɛjn a anŋ afr ow ubur’m es.
44022007	M’ɛy wus ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’am dad’m ɛsɛ: 'Sɔl, Sɔl, kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ijr’m gbre ee?'
44022008	M’ibrm m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ ŋ bwo el’ŋ ee?' Lebl a dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm Nasarɛt e Jesu ek’am ijr gbre a.'
44022009	Agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛm ab a ɛkn usuayl a, kɔ -l’irim ɛgŋ a ek’am dad’m odad a e lebl a.
44022010	M’ibrm m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee?' Ɛtŋ li dad’m ninɛ: 'Ìgb wus, ìm Damas, yogŋ wɛl b’ow dad’ŋ low yec’eke Nyam am dad’ŋ eke ki kok a.'
44022011	Eke usuayl na ek’am jɛjn a efal’m any a, agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛm ab a ɔny’m abu ɛtŋ ɛwl’m Damas.
44022012	Yogŋ, ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ananias, Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs sɛnyn eke b’ɛlum ɛy ec’ol a, ke Damas e Jwifɛl a fɛŋ b’erur in e low.
44022013	L’ow n’ɛŋn’m, li titm’m ɛtŋ li dad’m ninɛ: 'Ɛm lisijim Sɔl, ɛ̀kn es!' Wanci ab af cɛ, any efl a oc es ɛtŋ m’am ɛkn’n.
44022014	L’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: 'Ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam a ikŋ anym sɔsum oc’ŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke úw low yec’a eke l’erur ab any, ɛ́kn Nɛnyɛmbri Nyam Ɛs a, ke íri in obi e nɛny ɛm ec’odad.
44022015	Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke k’ij in e daŋku yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af, dád low yec’a ek’ɛkn ke iri a.
44022016	Ɛtŋ sica bla sosiɛm k’eku ee? Ìgb, òk mij nuŋ, ke ŋ eci sikpl a fɛŋ tɛ́tŋ es in e nin a ec’ɛsŋ ɛm.'
44022017	M’ɛwl m’im Jerusalɛm, ɛtŋ eke m’am ŋɔŋn Nyam Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, m’ɛkan nuŋ ɛm.
44022018	M’ɛkn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛtŋ li dad’m ninɛ: 'Ògŋ es ɛy ɔkm Jerusalɛm fafa, aŋke ɛm e lís e low a eke am dad a, ɛb eyŋ a k’ow ɛgŋm ow e low ebm.'
44022019	Mi dad m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, -l’uw any tasi eke mi b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu m’ɔny agŋ m’ok sobel ɛm ɛtŋ mi b’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr agŋ eke b’ub’ŋ nawrɛ a.
44022020	Ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ibi ŋ e daŋku ij ɛs Etiɛn a, ɛm yɛji m’anŋ yogŋ. Agŋ a ek’am ibi Etiɛn a, m’ɛgŋ ɛl e low a m’eb ɛtŋ m’ɔsu ɛl e mob sus ɛm a.'
44022021	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad’m ninɛ: 'Ìm, aŋke m’ow m’ɛrm’ŋ usu kpekpe, agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a ogŋ.' "
44022022	Dedeku a iri Pɔl ec’odad a toŋ batŋ igŋ yogŋ a eke li dad ów amua na a; kɔ sica -n’am ɔg -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ìrmnin ɛgŋ na! Ìbir ir! L’itm eke li k’anŋ owr!"
44022023	-N’am ɔg, -n’am ufŋ ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es, ɛtŋ -n’am wɔwl sɛc afr.
44022024	Kumada a ibrm eke wɛl k’ɔny Pɔl ɛlu in eci frutu lakp ab ɛm, ke wɛl ɔ́r’r ŋgbre ɛm, ow ɔŋ’n li dád odad, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’úw low a sosiɛm eke dedeku a am ɔgr’r ab any.
44022025	Gbɛkɔ eke wɛl awŋ’n eke k’ɔr’r a, li dad srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ninɛ: "Kɔ ɔny abusu eke k’ɔr Rom iy tasi eke wɛl jɛjm in e low okm ee?"
44022026	Eke l’iri ów amua a, n’im n’am ɔŋ in eci kumada a amani li dad l’ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ e low anake blel kok ab ee? Ɛgŋ na Rom iy tasi!"
44022027	Kumada a ow ɛŋn Pɔl ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Dàd’m ɔ, kɔ ŋ Rom iy tasi ee?" Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛɛ, ɛm Rom iy."
44022028	Ɛtŋ kumada a dad ninɛ: "Ɛm labm ligbɛl mi sɔg gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’el Rom iy tasi." Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Ɛm ec’a gbɛ, mew ɛm ɛtŋ."
44022029	Kpɛkŋ agŋ a ek’am ow ɔr’r yec’ɛtŋ ke li dád odad a, ɛwl sos mɛny; kumada a in obi yɛji erŋn ɔny eke Pɔl k’el Rom iy tasi ke n’ɔŋ wɛl ɔny awŋ ow ŋgbraka ɛm a.
44022030	Kumada a am erur eke k’uw low a tasi ek’ow sosiɛm Jwifɛl a am ok Pɔl ów af ab any; na sosiɛm, eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, n’ɔŋ wɛl mɔmu Pɔl es ŋgbraka ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ibrm egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a lele Sanedrɛn a fɛŋ ab eke k’as luku. L’oc Pɔl l’ow ɛtŋ n’inymn ow es ɛl ec’any af.
44023001	Pɔl ok Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a anyamn af ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ab ec’ɛb eke m’ir toŋ ke k’it yɛfɛnyna a, ɛm tutr ɛm a, m’ɔnym low kaka eke mi kokr ɛm sosi ów af."
44023002	Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Ananias ɔŋ abusu ek’agŋ a ek’anŋ Pɔl saw a, ki bɔbm’n nɛny es.
44023003	Ow ɔŋ Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "Ŋ anake Nyam b’ow ɔr’ŋ a; ŋ, êl eke wɛl ufur! Anŋ aŋa eke ki jɛj ɛm e low ok ol ɛm, kɔ ol ibrm eke k’ɔŋ wɛl ɔr’m ee?"
44023004	Agŋ a ek’anŋ Pɔl saw a am dad’r ɛsɛ: "Nyam ec’egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a am wɛwr ee?"
44023005	Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Lisijimɛl, m’uwm any ek’ow el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ab ab ɔ! Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl am dad ɛsɛ: Kí dadm ŋ ec’ɛb ec’es ɛw a e nin ŋuŋ."
44023006	Pɔl uw any eke Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a e bɛb a el Sadusiɛl ɛtŋ likpr a Farisiɛl; na sosiɛm anake ɛl ec’any af l’agbr lebl es li dad eke: "Lisijimɛl, ɛm Farisi, Farisi ec’iy. Eke m’ub luw ɛm anŋ igb owi nawrɛ a sosiɛm anake wɛl am jɛj ɛm e low ok a."
44023007	Kpɛkŋ eke Pɔl dad ów amua a, Farisiɛl a lele Sadusiɛl ab ab ów es atar ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ luku as a ec’agŋ a ubr ɛm sakp yony.
44023008	(Tasi ɛm a, Sadusiɛl bi dad eke luw ɛm anŋ igb in anm ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lele abŋ ab yɛji in anm; gbɛkɔ Farisiɛl ɔny ɔmn ów amua fɛŋ ɛm.)
44023009	Likekr a am at es, ɛtŋ ol eci low yɛgm ɛsɛl bɛb ek’el Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’agŋ a igb ɛrm bebl ɛm am dad ɛsɛ: "S’ɛŋnm low ɔbr kaka ɛgŋ na ɛm. Ow k’ɔdm abŋ nyam oglog afr ɛrm ɛs nyam dad’r odad!"
44023010	Ów es atar a am uyu afr toŋ kumada a erŋn am ɔny bake wɛl píplm Pɔl ɛm. Na sosiɛm anake n’ɔŋ in eci srɔda eyŋ a eke k’im dedeku ab ɛm ɔny Pɔl oc es ɛl ec’araŋn, ke -l’oc -n’im ow frutu lakp ab ɛm a.
44023011	Lɛgŋ b’uk a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛlu sos ɔkm Pɔl ec’any af ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Sos át’ŋ es! Ij ɛm e daŋku Jerusalɛm aŋa, ɛtŋ ow it eke Rom yɛji ow k’el ɛbɛn."
44023012	Lɛgŋ b’ɛny eci ibribr a, Jwifɛl bɛb ut asre; -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb -l’ij nɛny eke -li k’ijmn ob, -l’ɛgŋmn mij eke -li k’ibim Pɔl.
44023013	Agŋ a ek’ut asre ikŋ na a, ij agŋ ekŋ yony afŋ es.
44023014	-N’im -n’ɛŋn egb waw ɛsɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a lel agŋ ekpekp ab ab ɛtŋ -li dad wɛl ninɛ: "S’ɛgŋ s’eb s’ij nɛny eke si k’íjm ob kaka eke si k’ibim Pɔl.
44023015	Sica ɔny lele Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ ab ab, ìbrmn kumada a eke k’oc Pɔl is ɔny; dàdr eke am erurir eke k’ɛkanin in e low ab ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn. Ɛy obi ɛm a, si bɛbm sos eke si k’ibi’r gbuŋ ke l’ów l’ok aŋa."
44023016	Gbɛkɔ Pɔl lisijɔw iyŋ nyam iri asre ut a ec’odad a. N’im l’ɛy frutu lakp ab ɛm l’ɛwar ɛyu.
44023017	Ow ɔŋ Pɔl ɛsŋ srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ɛm e nyam ɛtŋ dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛ̀wl ŋgbafrɛli na ŋ e kumada a ogŋ; n’ɔny low eke li ki dad ow."
44023018	Srɔda eyŋ ec’anym ɛs a oc’r ab im kumada a ogŋ ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Pɔl, sobel ɛm ɛs a ɛsŋ’m ɛtŋ dad’m eke mi k’is’ŋ ŋgbafrɛli na, n’ɔny low eke li dad’ŋ."
44023019	Kumada a ɔny ŋgbafrɛli a abu ab im saw ɛm, ɛtŋ am ibrm’n ɛsɛ: "Bla odad iy ki dad’m ee?"
44023020	Li dad ninɛ: "Jwifɛl nɛny okr af eke efi k’ibrm’ŋ oc Pɔl ow Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ ec’any af; -n’am iwr -li dad eke Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a in am ɔl eke in k’ɛkan low ab ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn.
44023021	Gbɛkɔ k’ùb ɛl nawrɛ! Aŋke ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ ekŋ yony ek’afŋ es b’ow lɔl es ɔny’n. -L’ɛgŋ -l’eb -l’ij nɛny eke -li k’ijmn ob, -l’ɛgŋmn mij toŋ ke -l’ibi ow. Caca ɛm a, -li bɛbm sos, -n’am eku ŋ ec’odad ebl cɛ."
44023022	Li dad ŋgbafrɛli a ninɛ: "Kì dad odad na eke dad’m a k’ok ɛgŋ kaka." Ɛtŋ kumada a ɛlu’l es n’im.
44023023	Ow e jam a, kumada a ɛsŋ in e srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛsɛl ab ɛm e yony ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ninɛ: "Àsr srɔda eyŋ agŋ ekŋ lɛw, gbaŋkɔ af uyu ɛsɛl agŋ ekŋ nyahan lele lɛw, lele mpioro ɔwl ɛsɛl agŋ ekŋ lɛw ab luku ke ɔny fɛŋ bɛ́bmn sos imn Sesare ncebles e wanci libarm ɛm.
44023024	Sigbaŋkɔ a yɛji eke k’oc Pɔl im sɛnyn sɛnyn es ɛw ɛs Felis ogŋ a, bɛ̀bmn ɛl sos."
44023025	Ɛtŋ kumada a nɔn lɛl na:
44023026	"Klod Lisias am ɛsŋn in ec’es ɛw ɛs mamn Felis.
44023027	Jwifɛl ɔny ɛgŋ na aam ibi; eke m’iri eke l’el Rom iy tasi a, m’im ɛm e srɔda eyŋ ab ab m’ɛdŋn in abu any ɛtŋ m’eb m’ɛlu’l es.
44023028	Eke m’erur eke mi k’uw low a sosiɛm eke Jwifɛl am ok’r ów af ab any a, m’oc’r m’im ɛl e Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af.
44023029	M’ɛkn eke ów a eke -n’am dad -l’ok ow af a, el ɛl obi ɛm ec’ol a ec’ów, gbɛkɔ wɛl ɔtum ɛŋnm low ɔbr ek’ow ɛm li k’ɛŋn luw oglog ke wɛl ɛlu’l sobel ɛm.
44023030	Ɛtŋ eke wɛl ɛwar’m eke Jwifɛl am ut in ec’asre a, m’erur eke mi k’oc’r m’is ŋ ɛtŋ m’ibrm agŋ a ek’am ok’r ów af a eke k’ɔŋ’n dedeku ŋ ec’any af."
44023031	Srɔda eyŋ a ɛlum ol a eke wɛl ɔŋ ɛl a: -l’oc Pɔl ɛtŋ ncok ɛm -l’ɛwl ow toŋ -l’ok Antipatris.
44023032	Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, srɔda eyŋ a ek’im lakr ɛm a, ɛwl ow frutu lakp ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɛlu gbaŋkɔ af uyu ɛsɛl ab es aam usu a Pɔl ab.
44023033	Eke -n’imn -l’okr Sesare a, gbaŋkɔ af uyu ɛsɛl a oc lɛl a ɔŋ es ɛw ɛs a ɛtŋ -l’oc Pɔl -l’ɛlu ow abu ɛm.
44023034	Es ɛw ɛs a awl lɛl a ɛtŋ ibrm Pɔl wus yec’af ec’ɛgŋ eke li k’el a. Eke l’iri ek’ow el Silisi wus af ec’ɛgŋ a,
44023035	li dad ow ninɛ: "Ŋ ec’agŋ a ek’am ok’ŋ ów af a b’ow ow a, m’ow m’ibrm’ŋ low." Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɛw Pɔl es Erɔd ec’êl gbɛl ab ɛm.
44024001	Sɛgŋ yen b’ɛc a, egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Ananias ow Sesare agŋ ekpekp bɛb ab lele awoka nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Tɛrtulus ab. -L’ow es ɛw ɛs Felis ec’any af eke -li k’ɔŋ Pɔl dedeku.
44024002	Wɛl ɛsŋ Pɔl, ɛtŋ Tɛrtulus am ok’r ów af sodad amua ɛm: "Es ɛw mamn, ŋ e nin ɛm, s’am ir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ ŋ e nyimn sɛnyn ɛm anake ów amua tititŋn akpl ɛy ec’ɛb na ec’a.
44024003	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, usu fɛŋ ec’ów eke si b’ɛŋn a, s’am ɛlu’ŋ ow e bia ɛrm nyam ɛm.
44024004	Gbɛkɔ m’erurm eke mi k’irmn’ŋ lɛgŋ nɔnɔ, na sosiɛm anake m’am ŋɔŋn ŋ ek’ɛrm k’ɛy ŋ es, ke íri ɛy ec’odad a; ow k’ow ibnm.
44024005	S’ɛkn ek’ɛgŋ na el ɛgŋ ɛm e nuŋuŋ: li b’is odad wus na nimum eci Jwifɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’el Nasariɛl ec’ogog a ec’es ɛw ɛs.
44024006	L’ɛw eke li ki ŋuŋn Nyamel gbɛl a sos; ow sosiɛm s’ɛw’r abu af. [S’erur eke si ki jɛj in e low s’ok ɛy ec’ol ab ɛm,
44024007	kɔ kumada Lisias ɛdŋn abu any ɛtŋ lɛc ɛm l’eb ow ɛy ec’abu ɛm.
44024008	N’ɔŋ abusu eke agŋ a ek’am ok’r ów af a k’ow ŋ ec’any af.] Eke ibrm’n low, ɔtu eke ŋ obi yɛji k’uw low a tasi ek’ow sosiɛm s’am ok’r ów af ab any."
44024009	Jwifɛl a akr lebl af, dad ek’ow el low nawrɛ.
44024010	Es ɛw ɛs Felis ɔwl Pɔl abu eke ki dad odad ɛtŋ Pɔl eb odad dad ninɛ: "M’uw any eke akpo nɔnɔ ɛm el ɛb na eci jɛj ok ɛs, ow anake m’ɔny ɔmn ke m’am ow ŋ ec’any af eke mi k’ayal sos a.
44024011	Ɛsɛ elel eke ɔtu eke ŋ obi k’otar akr ab af a, ow kokm sɛgŋ lɛw yony afŋm es eke m’ow Jerusalɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ eci.
44024012	Wɛl ɛŋnm im m’atarm ów es Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, ɛtŋ m’okm dedeku a al ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu oglog ɛb ab ɛm.
44024013	Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm a, agŋ amua k’ɔtum ayalm ów a eke -n’am ok’m af a e low.
44024014	Gbɛkɔ low na gbɛ, ŋ ec’any af, m’am m’ɛgŋ m’eb: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ejagb a ec’us ɛm a, ke ɛm lagŋɛl e Nyam a anake m’am igŋ nuŋ a. Jwifɛl bi dad ek’ow el ejagb yadŋ, kɔ ɛm m’ub ol e silɛl a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ab nawrɛ.
44024015	M’ɔny ɔmn ikŋ na Nyam ɛm, ɔmn a eke ɛl obi yɛji -n’ɔnyn, eke Nyam b’ow igbm agŋ amamn lele eŋuŋ ab luw ɛm a.
44024016	Na sosiɛm anake m’am atr sos es eke mi kokrm ɛm sosi ów af Nyam ec’any af lele agŋ ec’any af ab a.
44024017	Eke m’ɔpi Jerusalɛm akpo nɔnɔ a, m’ɛwl mɛny m’im eke mi k’ɛlum ɛm ec’ɛb a abu os ɛm, ke m’áp Nyam ob.
44024018	Eke -n’ɛŋan’m Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a, ke m’uwar sos ayal ec’es gbɛgbl a ŋ̂; agŋ nɔnɔ anm ɛm ab, ɛtŋ sɔ́g yɛji anm.
44024019	Gbɛkɔ Azi eci Jwifɛl nyam nyam anŋ yogŋ, ɛtŋ blel -n’ɔnyn low ɛm ab, ɛl anake blel -n’inym es ŋ ec’any af aŋa ke -l’ok’m ów af a.
44024020	Oglog ek’agŋ amua ek’anŋ aŋa a ɛkn low ŋuŋ eke mi kok lɛgŋ a eke m’anŋ Sanedrɛn ec’agŋ a ec’any af a, -l’ɔtu eke -li ki dad.
44024021	M’inym es ɛl ec’any af m’igbl lebl ogŋ mi dad eke m’ub luw ɛm anŋ igb e low nawrɛ; kɔ low na cɛ eci anake yɛfɛnyna wɛl inymn’m es ɔny ec’any af jɛj ok ec’ab ee?"
44024022	Felis ek’iri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu eci ejagb owi a ok es sos ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn a, oc jɛj ok a ɛw lɛgŋ ɛjeci ɛtŋ dad ɛl ninɛ: "Lɛgŋ eke kumada Lisias b’ow ow a, m’ow mi dad ɔny ec’odad a."
44024023	N’ɔŋ srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs a abusu eke k’ɛw Pɔl es sobel ɛm, gbɛkɔ l’ɛw ow abusu es eke ow lawlɛl a ki kok ow e lís e low.
44024024	Sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a, Felis lele ɛy Drusiy Jwif yɔwi ab ab ow. N’ɔŋ wɛl ɛsŋ Pɔl ow ɛtŋ n’am iri ɔmn eke ow ɔny Jesu Krist ɛm a ec’odad.
44024025	Gbɛkɔ eke Pɔl ɔb nuŋ am dad es an mamn ec’odad, sos es ɔnyn e low lele jɛj ok e lɛgŋ e low ab a, ow am ɔr Felis ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Sica ɔtu eke k’im gɔŋ. Lɛgŋ eke m’ow m’ɛŋn abusu a, m’ow m’ɛwl m’ɛsŋ’ŋ."
44024026	In ec’ɔmn ɛm a ke Pɔl b’ow ɔŋ’n os; na sosiɛm anake sakp nɔnɔ li b’ɛsŋ Pɔl ow ot nɛnym in ab a.
44024027	Ɛbɛn ɛbɛn a cɛ toŋ akpo yony ɛc, ɛtŋ Pɔrsius Fɛstus usr Felis usu ɛsɛ es ɛw ɛs af. Eke Felis erur eke k’eb sɔdŋ Jwifɛl ogŋ a, l’ɛw Pɔl es sobel ɛm.
44025001	Sica Fɛstus ow ɛy in eci wus ab af eb juma; kpɛkŋ ek’ow ij sɛgŋ nyahan a, l’igb Sesare l’uyu n’im Jerusalɛm.
44025002	Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ec’any ɛsɛl tasi ab ab ow in ogŋ a am ok Pɔl dedeku es. -N’am at -l’ibrm ow
44025003	eke ow k’ɛgŋ ɛl nɛnym ɔŋ Pɔl ow Jerusalɛm; tasi ɛm a, -l’ut Pɔl ec’asre ɛtŋ -l’erur eke -li k’ibi ow ejagb us ab ɛm.
44025004	Gbɛkɔ Fɛstus dad ninɛ: "Pɔl anŋ sobel ɛm Sesare ɛtŋ; ɛm obi yɛji ow k’ow ibnm m’ow m’ɛwl m’im yogŋ.
44025005	Ow akpl ke ɔny e any ɛsɛl a ów ɛwl’m Sesare ke ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na kok low ŋuŋ a, ókar ir dedeku es."
44025006	Fɛstus kok sɛgŋ niwn oglog sɛgŋ lɛw cɛ ɛl ab, ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’im Sesare. Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, n’im jɛj ok ɛm ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc Pɔl ow.
44025007	Eke Pɔl ow a, Jwifɛl a ek’anŋ Jerusalɛm ow a, ɛlul il ɛm ɛtŋ am ɔny yadŋ ɛgbɛl ok’r af ek’ɛl obi yɛji -l’ɔtumn eke -li k’ayal.
44025008	Gbɛkɔ Pɔl am dogŋn sos dad ɛsɛ: "Mi kokm low ɔbr kaka Jwifɛl ec’ol a e lís, Nyamel gbɛl a e lís lele Sesar e lís ab."
44025009	Fɛstus ek’erur eke k’eb sɔdŋ Jwifɛl ec’any af a, ibrm Pɔl ninɛ: "Erur eke k’im Jerusalɛm wɛl jɛj low na ok ɛm ec’any af ee?"
44025010	Pɔl dad ninɛ: "Aŋa eke m’inym es a, el Sesar eci jɛj ok usu nyam, ɛtŋ aŋa anake wɛl ki jɛj ɛm e low ok a. Ɛsɛ elel eke ŋ obi ŋ obi uw any ab af a, mi kokm Jwifɛl low ŋuŋ kaka.
44025011	Eke mi kok low ek’ow ɛm mi k’uw, ke m’ɛgbrm eke mi k’uw. Gbɛkɔ eke ów a eke -n’am dad -l’ok’m af a elm nawrɛ a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ocm im ɔɔm ɛl. M’am ibrm eke mi k’ɛkn Sesar!"
44025012	Sica eke Fɛstus dad ów in ec’ów ɔm ɛsɛl ab ab bake ow uwr a, li dad ninɛ: "Ibrm eke k’ɛkn Sesar, b’ow im in ec’any af."
44025013	Sɛgŋ bɛb b’ɛc a, ɛb ebu Erɔd Agripa lele lisijɔw Berenis ab ow Sesare eke k’ɛsŋn Fɛstus.
44025014	Eke -n’anŋn yogŋ -li kokr sɛgŋ nɔnɔ a, Fɛstus dad Pɔl ec’odad ok Agripa. Kin odad a: "Ɛgŋ nyam anŋ aŋa eke Felis ɛw es sobel ɛm.
44025015	Eke m’im Jerusalɛm a, egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a lele Jwifɛl ec’ agŋ ekpekp ab ab ok’r dedeku es ɛtŋ ibrm eke mi k’ɔb’r low.
44025016	Mi dad ɛl eke ow ɛcam Rom eyŋ ab eke k’ɛlu ɛgŋ eke wɛl am cicr ab es ɔŋ agŋ eke ok’r dedeku es a, eke l’ɔbarm any wɛl ab; ow it eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n abusu li dad in e cicr a ec’odad yɛ.
44025017	Ow sosiɛm -l’ow aŋa ɛm ab ɛtŋ m’irmnm lɛgŋ; eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, m’im jɛj ok usu a ɛtŋ m’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’oc ɛgŋ a ow.
44025018	In eci cicr ɛsɛl a ow, gbɛkɔ -li cicrm ow ów eŋuŋ a ek’ow ɛm m’ɔny tutr a e kaka af.
44025019	-L’atar ów es ow ab ɛl obi eci Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi ɛm lele ɛgŋ nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jesu eke uw ke Pɔl am at dad eke ow’n n’anŋ owr a e low af.
44025020	M’uwm elel eke mi ki kokr low nɛnɛ ɛm ab any; na sosiɛm anake m’ibrm Pɔl eke k’im Jerusalɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke yogŋ wɛl jɛ́j low na ok a.
44025021	Gbɛkɔ Pɔl ɛgŋm; l’ibrm eke li k’el sobel ɛm ɛs toŋ ke Sesar ɔny low dad’r. M’ɔŋ abusu eke wɛl k’ɛw’r es toŋ ke m’ɔ́ŋ’n n’im Sesar ogŋ a."
44025022	Agripa dad Fɛstus ninɛ: "M’erur tasi ek’ɛm obi yɛji mi k’iri ɛgŋ na nɛnym." Fɛstus dad ninɛ: "Efi b’ow iri’r nɛnym."
44025023	Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, Agripa lele Berenis ab ow agŋ ek’us any ab ɛtŋ ok luku as usu a ec’arabu ab ɛm kumadaɛl lele ɛb ab ɛm ec’any ɛsɛl ab. Fɛstus ibrm eke wɛl k’oc Pɔl ow.
44025024	Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Ɛb ebu Agripa lele ɔny fɛŋ eke anŋn aŋa ɛy ab a, am ɛkan ɛgŋ na: in sosiɛm Jwifɛl nɔnɔ ow ɛkn’m Jerusalɛm lele aŋa ab, ɛtŋ am dad ek’ow’n k’ánm owr ij.
44025025	Ɛm gbɛ, m’ɛkn eke li kokm low kaka ek’ow ɛm li k’uw. Gbɛkɔ eke in obi l’ibrm eke li k’ɛkn Sesar a, m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke mi k’ɔŋ’n n’im yogŋ.
44025026	M’ɔnym low tasi eke mi ki nɔn in e nuŋ af m’ɔŋ Sesar; na sosiɛm anake m’oc’r m’ow ɔny ec’any af, ŋ ɛb ebu Agripa ec’any af tasi, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl b’ibrm’n low, ke m’ɔ́ny low nyam mi nɔn.
44025027	Ow am ɛw’m es adŋ sos ɛm eke tasi ɛm a, wɛl k’oc sobel ɛm ɛs im Rom, ke wɛl k’ayalm ów a sosiɛm eke ow af wɛl am cicr’r a!"
44026001	Erɔd Agripa dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Abusu ɛru’ŋ es eke ki dad odad dogŋn sos." Ɛtŋ Pɔl igbl abu ogŋ am dogŋn sos sodad amua ɛm:
44026002	"Ɛb ebu Agripa, sos ɛm am iŋn’m eke yɛfɛnyna mi k’ow ŋ ec’any af mi dad odad mi dogŋn sos ów a fɛŋ eke ow af Jwifɛl am cicr’m a eci.
44026003	Tasi ɛm a, uw Jwifɛl ec’ɛb ir owi lele ɛl eci ów es atar ab ab any. Ow sosiɛm, m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ eke k’iri ɛm ec’odad a ɛrm es ok ɛm.
44026004	Ɛm eci ŋgbafrɛ ɛm ɛtŋ ec’es eke m’an a, Jwifɛl fɛŋ uw any; -l’uw elel eke nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ m’iir ɛm ec’ɛbr a ec’araŋn lele Jerusalɛm ab ab any.
44026005	-L’uw’m any lɛgŋ kpekpe; eke -l’erur, -l’ɔtu eke -li ki dad low nawrɛ: m’el Farisiɛl ec’ogog ec’ɛgŋ ek’ɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ owi ɛw tuɔtuɔ akm ɛl lawlɛl a fɛŋ ec’a.
44026006	Ɛtŋ sicaca ɛm m’anŋ jɛj ok ec’any af aŋke m’ɔny ɔmn Nyam e low a ek’ɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl ɛw es ab ɛm.
44026007	Ɛy ec’eb lɛw yony a ec’agŋ a yɛji am ɔmn ɛwar na eke k’ɛy ɔkm; ow sosiɛm -n’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ ari at ɛm, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab. Ɛb ebu Agripa, ɔmn ikŋ na sosiɛm ec’anake Jwifɛl am ok’m ów af a!
44026008	Ɔny Jwifɛl, ke Nyam ígbm agŋ luw ɛm a, bla ɛtŋ am ubr ek’ow el low ek’ɔtu ee?
44026009	Ɛm obi yɛji, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, m’ɔny tutr eke akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm ow akpl eke mi k’ogŋ Nasarɛt e Jesu e nin a ar.
44026010	Low na anake mi kok Jerusalɛm a. Egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ɔŋ’m abusu akpasu mum nyam eke mi k’ok ɔmn ɛsɛl nɔnɔ sobel ɛm, ɛtŋ mi b’ɛlu abusu es lɛgŋ eke wɛl b’ɔb ɛl low luw ec’a.
44026011	Sakp nɔnɔ mi b’im Nyam nuŋ igŋ susu m’ɔŋ wɛl ijr ɛl gbre yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔwr sar ɛl ec’ɔmn ɔny ab ɛm. Ɛl ec’ɛrm bebl eke m’ɔny a agb nɔnɔ, toŋ ow b’ɔŋ m’im sɛb ɛjec’ɛm m’ijr ɛl gbre."
44026012	"Ɛbɛn lɛgŋ nyam egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’im Damas mi kok juma.
44026013	Ɛb ebu Agripa, m’us ejagb ɛtŋ lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm a, m’ɛkn usuayl ek’anŋ afr am ɛjn ow; jɛjn a afŋn ligbn ec’ab es, ɛtŋ am ok ɛm lele agŋ a eke ɛl ab m’us ejagb ab ab af.
44026014	Ɛy fɛŋ s’ok wus ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’am ikŋ dad’m Ebre ɛm ɛsɛ: 'Sɔl, Sɔl, bla ɛtŋ am ijr’m gbre ee? Kɔ bla ɛtŋ am ɛlu lɛc ɔkm ɛsɛ id eke in ec’es ɛw ɛs b’iyr likŋ af ee? Lɛc ɔfr ɔfr cɛ am ij.'
44026015	M’ibrm m’ɛsɛ: 'Ɛgŋ gbɛl, kɔ bwo el ŋ ee?' Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: 'Ɛm Jesu a eke am ij gbre a.
44026016	Sica ìgb inym es. M’ɛlu sos ɔkm mi yɛgm’ŋ eke mi k’oc’ŋ el ɛm e juma kok ɛs; b’ow ij ɛm e daŋku dád ok agŋ elel eke ɛkan’m yɛfɛnyna, ke dád yec’a eke ɛmɛny m’ow mi yɛgm’ŋ a yɛji.
44026017	M’ow m’ɔsu’ŋ Jwifɛl ec’any af lele agŋ ɛjec’a eke m’ow m’ɛrm’ŋ ɛl ogŋ ab ab ec’any af.
44026018	M’am ɛrm’ŋ eke k’im fig fig ɛl anyamn, ɔny ot ɛl es ncebn ɛm ot ok ɛl usuayl ɛm, Satan ec’abusu ab ɛm eke -n’anŋn a ot ɔŋ ɛl Nyam. Eke -li b’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm a, -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn ɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap lele es sig usu nyam agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’ab ab.' "
44026019	"Ɛb ebu Agripa, ɛbɛn a, es ɛkn owi a ek’anŋ afr ow ke m’ɛkn a, m’ɛgbrm ow e low ij.
44026020	Kɔ m’ikŋ anym mi dad Nyam odad m’ok Damas ec’agŋ a lele Jerusalɛm ec’ab ab, Jude ec’agŋ a lele ɛb ɛjec’ɛm ec’agŋ ab; ɛl fɛŋ, m’ibrm ɛl eke -li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm, -l’ɛwl -li lɛr Nyam, ke -li kok ów eke bi yɛgm ɛl ec’itŋn ikŋ na tasi a.
44026021	Na sosiɛm anake Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ a eke m’anŋ a, Jwifɛl ɔny’m ke ɔl eke k’ibi’m a.
44026022	Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔsu’m toŋ it yɛfɛnyna ɛtŋ m’anŋ eke mi k’ij daŋku agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af, k’ow el agŋ ek’ɔny any, k’ow el agŋ ek’ɔnym any. Mi dadm odad ɛjeci ek’ow elm kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lele Mois ab ec’a eke dad eke b’ow ɛy a cɛ:
44026023	Mesi a b’ow ij gbre, b’ow el ɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ek’igb luw ɛm, b’ow ɔb usuayl a e kokoba ok ɛy ec’ɛb a lele ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a."
44026024	Eke Pɔl am dad ów in e sos dogŋn ec’a, Fɛstus barm’n es lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ninɛ: "Pɔl, nuŋ ɛm am uŋ’ŋ! Wewr lɛl nɔnɔ toŋ ow am ɛw’ŋ nuŋ ɛm uŋ!"
44026025	Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, nuŋ ɛm uŋm’m. Sodad a eke m’am dad a el nuŋ ɛm es ok e sodad lele low nawrɛ tasi ab.
44026026	Ɛb ebu Agripa otar ów amua akr uw any, ow sosiɛm in ec’any af m’ɔtu eke mi ki dad ɔmn ɛm. M’uw any tasi eke l’uw ów a fɛŋ any, aŋke ow elm es lɔl ɛm e low.
44026027	Ɛb ebu Agripa, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’odad a eke dad a ub nawrɛ ee? M’uw any ek’ub nawrɛ!"
44026028	Agripa dad Pɔl ninɛ: "Am tutr eke lɛgŋ tɛl na ɛm cɛ ɔtu eke k’itŋn’m m’el kretiɛn ee?"
44026029	Pɔl dad’r ninɛ: "K’ow él lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm oglog sɛgŋ nɔnɔ ɛm, m’am ŋɔŋn Nyam ek’ow k’élm ŋ sɔny cɛ, kɔ ɔny fɛŋ ek’am irir ɛm ec’odad yɛfɛnyna a anake k’anŋn ɛsɛ elel eke m’anŋn ab af a, kɔ ŋgbraka amua gbɛ k’ánm ɛm!"
44026030	Ɛb ebu a, es ɛw ɛs a, Berenis lele agŋ a eke -n’anŋn yogŋ ab ab igb,
44026031	ɛtŋ eke -n’imn saw ɛm a, -n’am dadarir ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na kokm low ɔbr owi ek’ow ɛm li k’uw, oglog k’ow ɛm wɛl ɛlu’l sobel ɛm."
44026032	Ɛtŋ Agripa dad Fɛstus ninɛ: "Blel ɛgŋ na ibram eke k’ɛkn Sesar ana, ke blel wɛl ɛ́lu’l es."
44027001	Sica wɛl ɛgŋ eb eke si b’ow s’im Itali mijɛtŋ ɛm eci. Wɛl oc Pɔl lele sobel ɛm ɛsɛl ɛjeci bɛb ab abul srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Julius. L’el Rom eci srɔda eyŋ a ec’eb a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'Sesar Ogust eci eb' a ec’anym ɛs.
44027002	S’ok Adramit eci mijɛtŋ nyam eke k’imn Azi e manu a ec’a, ɛtŋ s’im. Aritak yɛji anŋ ɛy ab; l’el Tesaloni, Maseduan wus af a ec’ɛgŋ.
44027003	Eke lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, s’ow s’ok Sidɔn. Julius eke am ɔny Pɔl sɛnyn sɛnyn a, ɔŋ’n abusu eke li k’im l’ɛkn lawlɛl yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl kók in e lís e low.
44027004	Eke ɛmɛny s’anŋ yogŋ s’igb s’aam a, s’aru Sipr lekr a eke b’ɛdŋn lɛf any a, aŋke lɛf am ɛlu ɔbr ɛy.
44027005	S’ubr okij a eke titm Silisi wus lele Panfili wus ab a, ɛtŋ s’im s’ok Mira, Lisi wus af.
44027006	Yogŋ, Julius ɛŋn Alesandri eci mijɛtŋ nyam ek’aam Itali ɛtŋ l’ot l’ok ɛy ɛm.
44027007	S’us mij pɛtɛ pɛtɛ sɛgŋ nɔnɔ ɛtŋ gbre ɛm kpa, s’im s’ok Nid baŋn any af. Eke lɛf a yɛbm ɛy eke si k’ɔkŋ any s’im kpekpe a, s’ɛcr wus a ek’usm owr Salamone ɛb a ec’a s’ok Krɛt lekr a ec’esr ɛm a eke b’ɛdŋn lɛf any a.
44027008	Gbre ɛm ɛbɛn, s’aru ligigl a s’im s’ok usu nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Manu Amamn, ek’anŋ Lase baŋn saw.
44027009	S’irmn lɛgŋ nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ mij us a yɛji am ɛw tuɔtuɔ aŋke lakpo am uwr. Ow sosiɛm Pɔl am ɛwar ɛl dad ɛsɛ:
44027010	"Agŋ lawlɛl, m’am ɛkn eke usu im a b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ: mijɛtŋ a lele sɛrɛkp ab ab b’ow uŋ, ɛtŋ ɛy obi yɛji s’ɔtu eke si k’uw."
44027011	Gbɛkɔ srɔda eyŋ ekŋ yen ec’anym ɛs a ɔny ɔmn mijɛtŋ nyimn ɛs a lele mijɛtŋ ɛs ab ab ɛm akm Pɔl e sodad a.
44027012	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny nanu a akplm eke lɛtŋ k’anŋ yogŋ lɛfr lɛgŋ iy na ɛm. Na sosiɛm agŋ nɔnɔ a ek’anŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a erur eke k’igb yogŋ: -l’erur eke -l’ɔtu, ke -n’im -l’ok Fenis, Krɛt eci nanu nyam eke ɔkŋ esr ɛm eci nɛmn ogog a lele afr ɛm eci nɛmn ogog ab ab. Yogŋ anake -li k’anŋ -l’uwar lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a.
44027013	Esr ɛm eci lɛf a am ɛlu pɛtɛ pɛtɛ, ɛtŋ -n’am tutr eke ɛl eci tutr a b’ow ɛy af. -N’ɔŋ mijɛtŋ a aam ɛtŋ am aru Krɛt eci ligigl a saw saw.
44027014	Gbɛkɔ wanci ab af cɛ lɛf ligbɛl nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ 'afr ɛm e lidr ogog e lɛf' anŋ lekr a e mafɛny ab ɛm am ɛlu ow.
44027015	Lɛf a oc mijɛtŋ ab ab aam: ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ eke wɛl k’ɔny mijɛtŋ ab es, ɛtŋ si yɛb ow oc ɛy ab im.
44027016	S’ɛcr esr ogog eci lekr liy nyam eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Koda a, ɛtŋ ow ɛdŋn ɛy abu any. Gbre ij kpa ɛm, s’ɔtu s’ɔny es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ likekli a ek’ucur mijɛtŋ gbɛl a.
44027017	Mij ɛsɛl a ɛwl oc ɛlu’l mijɛtŋ ab ɛm. Sica -l’oc meb -li cucu mijɛtŋ gbɛl a -l’ɛlul ɛm. Eke -n’am uru eke li k’im -l’itr es mrici af Libi ogog a, -l’ɛlu dondo nuŋ a erŋ ɛtŋ -li yɛb lɛf a am oc ɛl ab im.
44027018	Lidgbegb a abu anŋ ɛm am ɛlul ɛy tuɔtuɔ toŋ lɛgŋ ɛnyn ɛy ɛtŋ -n’am ot sɛrɛkp a -l’ok erŋ.
44027019	Lɛgŋ b’ɛny akr af a, ɛl obi ec’abu ɛm -l’ot mijɛtŋ a e mob a -li wɔwl erŋ.
44027020	Sɛgŋ nɔnɔ eke wɛl ɛknm ligbn, ɛknm mílɛ́l ɛtŋ lidgbegb a abu anŋ ɛm am ɛlu lɛc ɛm cɛ. S’ɔnym ɔmn kaka eke si b’ow s’ɔtu s’anŋ owr.
44027021	Lɛgŋ kpekpe ek’agŋ a ek’us mij a ijm ob kaka. Pɔl igb ɛl ec’any af ɛtŋ am dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Agŋ lawlɛl, blel irir ɛm ec’odad a eke m’am dad eke si k’ókmn ɔkm Krɛt a, ke blel s’ɔbrmn es abur na, s’irmnmn mob.
44027022	Gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, m’am ibrm eke k’ɔnyn ɛrm susu, aŋke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow irmnm in e sel a, kɔ mijɛtŋ a sɔny coco cɛ b’ow uŋ.
44027023	Tasi ɛm a, ncok a ɛm e Nyam a eke mi bi kok in e juma a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ow’m saw
44027024	ɛtŋ dad’m ninɛ: 'Pɔl, erŋn k’ɔ́ny’ŋ! Ow it eke k’im Sesar ec’any af, ke Nyam ec’erur a eke ɔny ŋ ec’a sosiɛm, li sɔ́g agŋ a ek’us mij ŋ ab a.'
44027025	Na sosiɛm, agŋ lawlɛl, ɔ̀nyn ɛrm susu aŋke m’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm: ow b’ow el ɛsɛ elel eke li dadr’m ab af.
44027026	Gbɛkɔ si b’ow s’uŋ s’inym es lekr nyam af."
44027027	Ncok lɛw yar ɛm eke s’anŋ mij af ke lidgbegb a am oc ɛy ab im Mediterane eci okij ab af ana. Ncok eci lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ ɛm, mij ɛsɛl a am ɛkn ɛsɛ wus cɛ wɛ’n am titm af.
44027028	-L’ɛlu meb eke wɛl ucu ob leg leg erŋ eke -li ki bɛbmn ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn eke mij a eci sibn a ij abu likŋ lele lɛw lɔbŋ ab; -li b’im kpekpe tɛl a, ɛmɛny -l’ɛlu meb a erŋ ɛtŋ yogŋ ow ij abu likŋ lele niwn ab.
44027029	-N’am uru eke mijɛtŋ a k’ɔb lob, ow sosiɛm, lɛtŋ jam a -l’ɛlu magbis yar ɛrŋ eke -li k’ɔny lɛtŋ ab es, ɛtŋ -n’am eku es ogŋ ɛm eke lɛgŋ k’ɛny.
44027030	Mij ɛsɛl a am ɔl eke k’ok ɔkm lɛtŋ ab ɛm; -l’usm es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ ab es erŋ ɛtŋ -n’am ub nyandrɛ -l’ɛsɛ: "S’aam lɛtŋ a ec’anym a s’ucur lɛtŋ es ɔnyn ob ab es."
44027031	Gbɛkɔ Pɔl dad Julius lele srɔda eyŋ a ab ab ninɛ: "Eke agŋ amua anm mijɛtŋ ab ɛm, k’ow ɔtumn anmn owr."
44027032	Ow sosiɛm, srɔda eyŋ a bubr simeb a ek’ɔnyn es eb ɛlu e lɛtŋ ab es a ɛtŋ -li yɛb ow im.
44027033	Gbuŋ ke usu ót es a, Pɔl ibrm ek’agŋ a fɛŋ k’ij ob ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Kin, yɛfɛnyna ab a, sɛgŋ lɛw yar eke am ekur ɛrm mij ab ke k’ijmn ob kaka.
44027034	M’am ibrm eke k’ijr ob aŋke ow el ɔny e sel ɛŋn eci. Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ow irmnm in e sin nuŋ a e nyam."
44027035	Eke li dad ów amua uwr a, l’oc futufutu, l’ɛlu Nyam bia wɛl ec’any af, l’ubr ɛm ɛtŋ n’am ij.
44027036	Agŋ a fɛŋ sos at es ɛtŋ ɛl yɛji -l’ij ob a.
44027037	Ɛy fɛŋ eke s’anŋ mijɛtŋ ab ɛm a, s’ij agŋ ekŋ yen yen sakp yony agŋ ekŋ nyahan agŋ lɛw nɔhɔn.
44027038	Eke -l’ijr ob molok iy ɛl a, -l’ot egb a eke -l’otr ab -n’aam a -l’ok erŋ eke mijɛtŋ a k’ɛw fuɛfuɛ.
44027039	Eke lɛgŋ ɛny a, mij ɛsɛl a uwm wus a eke -li titmn ab any, gbɛkɔ -n’am ɛkn wus ek’usm ɛw lɔy k’ɛlu mrici ɛtŋ -l’erur ek’abusu ɛru es, -l’itr mijɛtŋ ab es yogŋ.
44027040	-Ni mɔmu magbis ab es -l’ok erŋ, ɛtŋ -ni mɔmu mɛtŋbar eke wɛl bi nyiman lɛtŋ a e simeb a yɛj’es. Ɛbɛn a, -l’ɛw gbad lɛtŋ nɛny a eke lɛf k’itr lɛtŋ a, ɛtŋ -n’imn mrici a ogŋ.
44027041	Kɔ -n’im -l’ɔbr sɛc ek’anŋ mij any yony ec’araŋn ɛtŋ mijɛtŋ a abal inym es yogŋ. Lɛtŋ anym a ɛmn mrici ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɔtum iim ij, ɛtŋ mra am bɔbm lɛtŋ jam ab es lɛc ɛm.
44027042	Srɔda eyŋ a am erur eke k’ibi sobel ɛm ɛsɛl a yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ábŋm mij ɛym ɔkm.
44027043	Gbɛkɔ Julius a am erur eke k’eb Pɔl ɛlu es, ɛtŋ l’ɛdŋn wɛl eke -li ki kokmn low a eke -n’ɔnyn ow e tutr a. N’ɔŋ agŋ a eke b’abŋ mij a abusu eke k’ikŋ anym ok erŋ im ákpaf;
44027044	agŋ likpr a ot ɔgɔg og oglog mijɛtŋ a eci mob ekpr a us ɛl jam. Ɛbɛn ek’agŋ a fɛŋ im itr es ke sos irm es ana.
44028001	Eke sica s’ok ɔkm es abur na ɛm a, s’iri eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ lekr a Malt.
44028002	In ec’ɛb eyŋ a eb ɛy sɛnyn sɛnyn, ɛtŋ eke mij am an ok wus ke lɛfr yɛji am ow a, -li fuf al ligbɛl nyam ek’ɛy fɛŋ s’iwr s’ɛlul ɛm.
44028003	Pɔl oc milɛl eke wɛl abal eke k’ok al, kɔ al a ɔŋ lorŋn ɛy ɔkm arum’n abu ab.
44028004	Eke lekr a ec’agŋ a ɛkn lorŋn ek’arum Pɔl abu ab a, -n’am dad ɛl ɔfr ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ na ɛgŋ ibiu tasi; l’ɛy ɔkm okij ab ɛm, kɔ Nyam ɛm e jɛj ok a ɔɔm abusu eke li k’anŋ owr."
44028005	Gbɛkɔ Pɔl ufŋ abu es ɔwl lorŋn a alm, ɛtŋ ob kaka kokm’n.
44028006	Agŋ a am eku eke k’ɛkn’n l’ew oglog l’ɛy luw kpru ɛm. Gbɛkɔ eke -l’ekur ow ibn ke -l’ɛkan eke ob kaka kokm Pɔl a, -l’itŋn tutr ɛtŋ -n’am dad ek’ow el nyàm mum nyam.
44028007	Saw yogŋ, lekr a ec’es ɛw ɛs gbɛl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Publius a ec’usu anŋ. Ɛgŋ ikŋ na eb ɛy erur ɛm ɛtŋ ɔŋ ɛy es ɛru usu toŋ sɛgŋ nyahan.
44028008	Publius ɛs a ɛru es aŋke lɛfr ɔl am ɔny’n ɛtŋ n’am ɔs sob yɛji. Pɔl im ɛkn’n, at’r abu nuŋ, ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔŋ’n ɛtŋ ewlm’n.
44028009	Na b’ɛc a, lekr a ec’ɔ́lu ɛjec’a yɛji ow ɛtŋ -l’ewl.
44028010	Agŋ a ɛlu ɛl ec’ɛlum fɛŋ ɔkm ɛy e lís, ɛtŋ wanci a eke s’am ow s’igb s’im a, -n’ɔŋ ɛy ob fɛŋ ek’it usu imn ec’a.
44028011	Eke ow kok awl nyahan a, s’eb Alesandri eci mijɛtŋ nyam eke anŋ lekr ab ɛm lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a nimum a s’im. Wɛl b’ɛsŋ mijɛtŋ a 'Sinyam Oli'.
44028012	S’ow s’ok Sirakus ec’ɛb ab ɛm, s’anŋ yogŋ sɛgŋ nyahan.
44028013	Yogŋ s’ɛcr ligigl a eci s’im s’ok Rejio ɛb ɛm. Lɛgŋ b’ɛny a, esr ɛm eci lɛf a ɔb nuŋ am ɛlu ɛtŋ s’eb sɛgŋ yony s’im s’ok Pusɔl.
44028014	Ɛb ab ɛm, s’ɛŋn agŋ lisijimɛl ek’ibrm eke si k’anŋ ɛl ab sɛgŋ lɔbŋ, ɛtŋ sica s’igb s’aam Rom.
44028015	Rom ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a iri ɛy ec’amani ɛtŋ ow toŋ ok usu eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Apius ec’An Ɔl Usu a ɛy ec’ɔbr eci. Agŋ ɛjeci ɛŋn ɛy usu eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Ɛŋanin Usu Nyahan a. Eke Pɔl ɛkn ɛl a, l’ɛlu Nyam bia ɛtŋ sos at’r es.
44028016	Eke s’ow s’ok Rom a, wɛl ɔŋ Pɔl abusu eke k’ir in ogŋ a ke srɔda iy nyam am ɔsu’r.
44028017	Ow bi kok sɛgŋ nyahan a, Pɔl ɛw Rom eci Jwifɛl ec’es ɛwɛl a abu in ogŋ a. Eke -l’asr luku a, Pɔl dad ɛl ninɛ: "Agŋ lisijimɛl, mi kokm low ŋuŋ ɛy ec’agŋ a e lís, ɛy lagŋɛl a ec’ɛb ir owi e lís ɛtŋ wɛl ɛw’m abu af Jerusalɛm, oc’m ɔŋ Rom eyŋ.
44028018	-L’ibrm im ów ɛtŋ -l’erur eke -li k’ɛlu’m es aŋke ɛm ɛm a, -n’ɛŋnm low ek’ow af -li k’ɔb’m low luw eci.
44028019	Gbɛkɔ Jwifɛl a erurm ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ m’ibrm eke mi k’ɛkn Sesar ke wɛl ebr ɛm ec’odad ab ɛm, kɔ ow elm ɛm ec’ɛb a eke mi k’ɔŋ dedeku eci.
44028020	Kin low a sosiɛm eke m’erur eke mi k’ɛkn ɔny ke mi dad ɔny odad a. Tasi ɛm a, m’anŋ ŋgbraka na ɛm ɛgŋ a eke Israɛl ec’agŋ a b’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a sosiɛm."
44028021	-Li dad ow ninɛ: "S’ɛŋnm ŋ e lís e lɛl kaka eke k’anŋ Jude ow ɛtŋ ɛy lisijimɛl kaka anm yogŋ owm tɔkŋm ów okm ɛy oglog dadm ɛy ŋ ec’odad ŋuŋ.
44028022	Kɔ s’am erur eke ki dad low yec’a ek’am tutr a s’iri, aŋke s’uw any ek’usu a fɛŋ agŋ erurm Nyam eb na ek’anŋ ɛm a e low."
44028023	-L’ɛw lɛgŋ nyam Pɔl ab ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a b’ow a, -l’ow nɔnɔ -n’ɛŋn ow yogŋ a eke l’ir a. Ibribr toŋ ncebles, Pɔl am otar ów a akr ok ɛl: n’am dad wɛl Nyam ec’ es ɛw a ec’odad ɛtŋ Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl a eke n’am dad ow ec’odad ab ɛm, n’am ɔl eke li k’eb wɛl Jesu eci.
44028024	Agŋ bɛb ów a ok es sos ɛm, kɔ likpr a ɛgŋm eke k’ub nawrɛ.
44028025	Ɛl ɔfr ɛm a nɛny okrm ɛl af, ɛtŋ -l’igb -n’aam. Pɔl dad ɛl odad na ninɛ: "Abŋ Lala ɔny low ij tasi lɛgŋ a eke n’am dad ɔny lagŋɛl odad kokoba ɔb ɛs Esayi e nɛny ɛm l’ɛsɛ:
44028026	Ìm dad agŋ amua a: Ow b’ow ok ɔny ɔru ɛm sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow irimn; b’ow lɛɛr sɛnyn sɛnyn, kɔ k’ow ɛknmn.
44028027	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua itŋn ɛw tuɔtuɔ; -li babl ɔru es, -li bubur anyamn, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl eci anyamn a k’ɛ́knm es, ɛl ec’ɔru a k’írim ów, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a k’ánm es, -l’ɛwlmn -l’owmn ɛm ogŋ bake m’éwlm ɛl."
44028028	Pɔl igŋ af dad ninɛ: "Sica úwr any eke Nyam eci sel ɛŋn ec’odad a ow agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci: ɛl gbɛ, -li b’ow -l’iri!" [
44028029	Eke Pɔl dad ów amua a, Jwifɛl a ɛl ɔfr am atar ów es im lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm.]
44028030	Pɔl anŋ êl a eke l’eb ab ɛm akpo yony. Li b’eb agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛkn’n a.
44028031	Li bi dad Nyam eci es ɛw a ec’odad ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm agŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist owi ɔmn ɛm tasi, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛdŋnm’n.
45001001	Ɛm Pɔl Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs, ɛm m’am awŋ ɔny lɛl na. Nyam ɛsŋ’m eke mi k’el ɛrm ɛs ɛtŋ l’oc l’ɛw’m saw eke mi k’ɔb in ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba.
45001002	Amani Mamn na, Nyam ɛcr in e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɛm ɛwar ow e low god’ɛtŋ in eci Silɛl lala ab ɛm.
45001003	Amani Mamn a am dad Jim Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad. Yec’ek’el in e mew ɛm ec’a, wɛl ew’r ɛb ebu David, lagŋ ec’eb ab ɛm.
45001004	Eke Abŋ Lala igbm’n luw ɛm a, Nyam yɛgm eke l’el Nyam ec’Iy ek’ɔny abusu fɛŋ.
45001005	Jesu Krist kok’m bibm m’el ɛrm ɛs, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e nin a e sos usr sosiɛm a, m’ɔ́ŋ ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ec’agŋ eke uwm Nyam any a, úb’r nawrɛ ke ɔ́ny in ec’ɛlum.
45001006	Ɔny yɛji, anŋn agŋ amua ɛm, eke Jesu Krist ɛsŋ ɔny a sosiɛm.
45001007	Ɔny fɛŋ eke anŋn Rom a, ɔny eel Nyam ec’ɛrm erur ɛtŋ l’ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’ow anŋn in ec’agŋ ab ɛm, ke íir ɛb in eci. Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy!
45001008	M’am ikŋ anym m’ɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm m’ɛlu Nyam bia, ɔny fɛŋ eci, aŋke wɛl am dad ɔny ec’ɔmn a ec’odad wus nimum af.
45001009	Tasi ɛm a, eke mi b’ɔb Nyam Jim ec’Amani Mamn a, ke Nyam eci juma anake m’am kok ɛm ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm a. Ɛtŋ in, l’ij ɛm e daŋku eke m’ɔ́pim ɔny ec’ɔkn ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn fɛŋ ɛm.
45001010	Mi b’ibrm’n sɛgŋ fɛŋ eke li k’ɔŋ’m abusu m’ow ɔny ogŋ a, eke ow el in ec’erur tasi,
45001011	aŋke ɔny ec’ɛkn am aw’m tasi yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ísm ɔny Abŋ Lala eci ob ap ab, ke ínymn es kikri.
45001012	Nawrɛ tasi ɛm a, k’aw ke mi b’ow m’ɛŋn ɔny a, ɔmn a eke ɔny lele ɛm ab s’ɔny a, ɔ́ŋ ke s’átarir sos es.
45001013	Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’erur eke k’uwr any eke sakp nɔnɔ mi tutr eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, kɔ toŋ sicaca ɛm a, m’ɔtum m’ɛŋnm ow ec’abusu. M’am ɔmn eke ɛm e juma a, ɔny ogŋ yogŋ yɛji b’ow ɔsu ey amamn ɛsɛ ɛbr ɛjec’ɛm ec’ab af.
45001014	Ow it eke mi ki kok agŋ fɛŋ e juma, Grɛkɛl lele Barbarɛl ab, agŋ ek’uw low any lele agŋ eke uwm low any ab ab.
45001015	Ow sosiɛm anake, ow am aw’m tasi eke mi k’ɔb ɔny Amani Mamn e kokoba, ɔny yɛji eke iir Rom a.
45001016	Tasi ɛm a, Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb a ɔ́nym im ɛ́s, aŋke l’el Nyam e lɛc ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a e sɔg eci: krɛkrɛ ɛm a Jwifɛl, ke sica agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
45001017	Amani Mamn a bi yɛgm elel eke Nyam b’ocr agŋ nyim nyim in ec’any af a: ow b’ɔb nuŋ ɔmn a eke -li b’oc -l’ɛlu ow ɛm ab ɛm ɛtŋ ow b’uwr ɔmn ab ɛm cɛ. Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl ɛm a wɛl b’awl: Ɛgŋ yec’ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a b’ow anŋ owr in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu ow ɛm a sosiɛm.
45001018	Afr kpekpe ɛtŋ Nyam am ɛlu in ɛc’ɛrm bebl a ɔkm aŋke agŋ el sikpl ɛsɛl ɛtŋ -li bi kok low ŋuŋ. Ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ kok ab ɛm, -li b’ɛdŋn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke ki kok low.
45001019	Ɛɛ, low eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’uw any Nyam e lís a, ayl ɛl eci, aŋke Nyam in obi ayal ɔŋ ɛl.
45001020	Nyam ec’abusu a ek’ɔnym nuŋ a lele fɛŋ a eke in obi in obi a l’el ab ab a, el ów nawrɛ eke wɛl ɛ́knm. Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke wɛl kok wus a, ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔtu eke k’ɛkn ɛl eke li bi lɛr ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a. Ow sosiɛm a, agŋ ɔnym sos dogŋn eb kaka ij.
45001021	Tasi ɛm a, -l’uw Nyam any, kɔ -l’usrm ow sos ɛtŋ -n’ɔɔm ow bia. Ke ow tasi ek’ow it eke wɛl ki kok Nyam ec’ana. Kɔ ɛl e sow tutr a itŋn el nyamb e sow tutr, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’ɛrm a eke low any uw anm ɛm a, irmn usuayl a.
45001022	-Li b’ocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛwru, kɔ -l’el eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl.
45001023	Ow a eke -li k’igŋ anygbɛl e Nyam a ek’úwm a nuŋ a, -l’igŋ ekŋ ekpr nuŋ. Ekŋ ekpr amua wɛl aku ɛl n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke b’uw, oglog ɔr, oglog mindey ek’ɛli akr yar lele morŋn ab af.
45001024	Ow sosiɛm a, Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -li kok ɛl ec’ɛrm ɛm ec’ów eke b’aw ɛl a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ɛl obi ɛm, -li b’ibar ɛl eci sos megl a ɛ́s ɛm.
45001025	-N’ɔny Nyam e lís e low nawrɛ a -l’itŋn ów yadŋ ɛm, yec’a eke Nyam kok a -l’igŋ ow nuŋ ɛtŋ -li kok ow e lís owi Kok Ɛs a ec’usu a. Anygbɛl él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
45001026	Na sosiɛm anake Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -l’usr ów aw a eke b’ɔŋ ɛl ɛ́s a jam a. Ɛl ec’ɔyɔw a ɛ́ruam egŋ ab ij, kɔ ɔyɔw ɛjec’ab -li b’ɛru, ɛtŋ ow el low eke wɛl am kokm agŋ ɛm.
45001027	Egŋ yɛji bi kok low nyam a cɛ. -L’ɛruamn ɔyɔw ab ij, kɔ ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ec’erur b’aw ɛl. -Li b’ɛru ɛl egŋ ɔfr ɛtŋ ow el ɛ́s! Ow ɔŋ -li b’ɛŋn ɛl obi ɛm a es abur eke ɛl eci es an ŋuŋ a ism ab.
45001028	Eke -l’erurm eke -li k’uw Nyam any a, Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -l’us ɛl eci sow tutr yadŋ a jam, ɛtŋ -n’am kok yec’ek’itm eke wɛl ki kok a.
45001029	Ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony iy ɛl ɛm gbɔŋ. -Li bi kok low ŋuŋ, -li b’erur ob ek’el ɛl lawlɛl ec’a, -l’el agŋ eŋuŋ ɛtŋ nyamnɛyr iy ɛl ɛm gbɔŋ. -Li b’ibi agŋ, -li b’atar ów es, -li b’ɛju ɛl lawlɛl ɛtŋ -li bi kok low mɛju ec’abŋ ab. -Li bi dad ów eŋuŋ -l’ok agŋ af,
45001030	ɛtŋ -li bi cacak wɛl. -L’el Nyam ec’efnu, -li bi wɛwr ɛl lawlɛl, es ɛfu iy ɛl ɛm, -li b’ij nɛny, ɛtŋ -li b’ɛcr akunda fɛŋ ɛm -li kok low ŋuŋ. -L’ɛluamn agŋ a eke ew ɛl a.
45001031	-L’el anyambu, -l’ɛluamn ɛl eci nɛny eke -li b’ij a, ɛtŋ -l’el agŋ eke ɔnym ɛrm lele sɔrŋ ikŋ ab.
45001032	Ke -l’uw Nyam eci jɛj ok ab any tasi cɛ. Agŋ a eke bi kok nɛnɛ a it eke k’uw. Sica -li bi kok ów amua, kɔ ɛmɛny, -li b’erur agŋ a eke bi kok a yɛji.
45002001	Ow sosiɛm anake, ŋ eke bi jɛj awlŋɛl ec’ów ok a, ke él Jwif, ke k’élm Jwif, ŋ ec’a ɔnym sos dogŋn eb kaka, aŋke ŋ bi jɛj awlŋɛl ec’ów ok, kɔ bi kok ɛsɛ ɛl af! Na sosiɛm, eke bi jɛj ɛl ec’ów ok a, ow el ŋ sosi eke am ɔbr low.
45002002	Ɛɛ, ɛy s’uw any eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a el tasi agŋ eke bi kok nɛnɛ a e lís.
45002003	Ŋ bi jɛj agŋ a eke bi kok ów amua a ok, gbɛkɔ bi kok ɛsɛ ɛl af! Ŋ am ɔny ɔmn tasi eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a k’ow ɔbm’ŋ low ee?
45002004	Nyam ɔny ɛrm mamn, li b’ɛgŋ low l’eb, ɛtŋ li b’eku low. Kɔ na anake erurm ab ee? Kɔ ŋ, uwm any eke Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn na am ɔŋ abusu eke k’itŋn ŋ ec’es an ab ee?
45002005	Gbɛkɔ k’erurm eke k’iri, k’erurm eke k’itŋn. Na sosiɛm anake am eb ɛrm bebl ligbɛl ɛw es ŋ e lís ɛrm bebl e lɛgŋ a ec’a. Lɛgŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɛlu ɔkm eke nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm li bi jɛj agŋ ec’ów l’ok.
45002006	Ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ów eke kok a e yec’a ek’it a.
45002007	Agŋ bɛb b’ucu ɔny es kok low mamn, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’anŋ Nyam ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm. -Li b’ɔl yɛj’eke Nyam ki susm ɛl es, ɛtŋ -li b’ɔl owr anŋ a eke úwrm ab es. Agŋ amua, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɛl -n’anŋ owr in ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
45002008	Agŋ bɛb b’ɔbr’r any, -l’ɛluamn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam kɔ -li bi yɛb low ŋuŋ am nyimn ɛl. Agŋ amua ec’a, Nyam b’ow yɛgm ɛl in ec’ɛrm bebl ligbɛl a.
45002009	Gbre lele erŋn ab b’ow ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ eke bi kok low ŋuŋ a, ow b’ow ɔb nuŋ Jwifɛl ɛm, ke ow ɛ́ŋn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
45002010	Sica Nyam ec’anygbɛl a, es susm a lele ɛrm es ɛy ab ab, li b’ow n’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke bi kok low mamn a, ow b’ow ɔb nuŋ Jwifɛl ɛm, ke ow ɛ́ŋn agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji.
45002011	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam okm ereb agŋ ɛm.
45002012	Agŋ a fɛŋ eke am kok sikpl ke úwm Mois e sol ab any a, b’ow uw eke -l’uwm ol ab any yɛji. Gbɛkɔ agŋ a fɛŋ eke uw Mois ec’ol ab any ke ɛbɛn yɛji am kok sikpl a, ol a b’ow jɛj ɛl e low ok.
45002013	Bwo ec’ɛgŋ Nyam b’oc ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af ee? Ow elm agŋ a eke b’iri Mois ec’ol a nɛnɛ cɛ a. Njaŋ, kɔ agŋ eke b’ɛlum ol a.
45002014	Agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl a uwm Mois ec’ol ab any. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb bi kok ɛsɛ elel eke ol a bi dad ab af. Agŋ amua -l’uwm ol any, gbɛkɔ ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ol a cɛ wɛl yɛji wɛ’n uw any af.
45002015	Aŋa ɛm a, -li bi yɛgm low nyam: ów a eke ol bi dad a nɔn ɛl ec’ɛrm ab ɛm, sow tutr eke -li b’ɔny ɛl obi ɛm a b’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm. Sakp oglog ɛl e sow tutr a bi dad eke -l’uwm kok, ke sakp bɛb ec’a wɛl dad eke -l’uw kok.
45002016	Ów amua fɛŋ eke mi dad a b’ow ok ɔkm kpata jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, ɛsɛ elel eke Amani Mamn na eke m’am ɔb a am dad ab af. Lɛgŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm jɛj fɛŋ a eke lɔl es agŋ ec’ɛb ir ɛm a e low ok.
45002017	Ŋ eke b’ij en ɛsɛ in Jwif a, ol af anake b’eb lɛc a ɛtŋ ntotŋ b’ok’ŋ ŋ e Nyam a eci.
45002018	Ŋ uw yec’a eke li b’erur ab any, ɛtŋ ol b’ɛlum’ŋ abu sɔsum yec’a eke akpl a oc.
45002019	Ŋ bi tutr eke ɔtu eke ki nyimn ány eflu, ke él agŋ ek’anŋ ncebn ɛm a ec’usuayl,
45002020	agŋ ek’uwm low any a lel ɛl ek’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm ab ab eci low yɛgm ɛs. Ɛɛ, ŋ bi tutr eke ol eke ɔny a ɔŋ’ŋ ɔny low any uw lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam tasi ab.
45002021	Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ŋ eke bi yɛgm awlŋɛl low a, ám yɛgmnm’ŋ sosi low! Ŋ bi dad eke ɛgŋ k’iy mil, ke ŋ ám iy!
45002022	Ŋ b’ɛdŋn nfaci ij, ke ŋ ám ij. Ŋ b’ɔny sinyam yadŋ eci sifn, kɔ b’iy ɛl e Sinyamel ab ɛm e simob a!
45002023	Ŋ ntotŋ b’ok’ŋ ol ek’ɔny a eci, gbɛkɔ ɛ́luam ol, ow b’ɔŋ ɔny Nyam ec’any a oc es.
45002024	Tasi ɛm, kin yec’eke wɛl b’awl Nyam Lɛl ɛm: ɔny sosiɛm, agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl a bi yayr Nyam e nin a.
45002025	Eke bi kok low yec’a eke ol bi dad a, ke nawrɛ tasi likr es ubr el low akplu. Kɔ eke ɛ́luam ol, ɛtŋ ubr likr es bɔbɔ yɛji, anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke ubrm es ab af.
45002026	Kin low nyam: ɛgŋ nyam ubrm likr es, gbɛkɔ li b’ɛlum Nyam ec’ol a. Kɔ Nyam k’ow ɛgŋm ebm’n ɛsɛ likr cɛ ow’n ubr es af ee?
45002027	Ɛgŋ ikŋ na ubrm sos megl af e likr es, gbɛkɔ li b’ɛlum ol. Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, in anake li b’ow li jɛj ŋ owi l’ok, ŋ eke ɛluam ol a. Ke ŋ nana ɔny ol a eke wɛl nɔn a lele likr es ubr ab!
45002028	Tasi ɛm a, Jwif tasi a, elm ɛgŋ a eke b’an es sos megl af ɛsɛ Jwif af a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr tasi a yɛji, elm sos lɛl a eke wɛl b’ubr es a.
45002029	Kɔ Jwif tasi a, in l’el ɛgŋ a eke el Jwif ɛrm ɛm a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr tasi a, el ɛrm ɛm ec’a. Likr es ubr na, Nyam ec’Abŋ ab ɛm li b’anŋ l’ow, kɔ ow elm ol eke wɛl nɔn ab ɛm. Jwif tasi a ɛ́ŋnm in ec’aw a agŋ ɛm, kɔ Nyam ɛm li b’ɛŋn.
45003001	Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke bla lowi Jwifɛl ɔny eke agŋ likpr a ɔnym ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ ob nyam anŋ eke wɛl b’ɛŋn likr es ubr ab ɛm ee?
45003002	Ɛɛ, wɛl bi lɛr ɛkn a, ob ligbɛl anŋ ɛm! Aŋke Jwifɛl anake Nyam ikŋ anym abul in e sodad ebl a.
45003003	Kɔ sica, eke Jwifɛl bɛb ijm nɛny nyam, ke ow b’ow ɛdŋn Nyam eke k’ij nɛny nyam ee?
45003004	Njaŋ ow k’ow elm ɛbɛn! Kin yec’ek’it eke si k’uw any: Nyam el nɛny nyam ɛs, kɔ agŋ a fɛŋ anake el ayadŋu a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad Nyam e lís ninɛ: Ow it eke wɛl k’uw’ŋ any nyim nyim ŋ e sodad ebl ɛm. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl bi jɛj ŋ owi ok, ke ɔ́ny low ij jɛj ok ab ɛm.
45003005	Kɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam bi tutr eke low ŋuŋ eke s’am kok a am ɛlum abu wɛl ɛkn eke Nyam el nɛny nyam ɛs, wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad ɛsɛ Nyam ijm nɛny nyam eke li b’ɔr ɛy in ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm ab ee? (Aŋa m’am dad odad ɛsɛ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ af.)
45003006	Njaŋ ow k’ow elm ɛbɛn! Tasi ɛm a, blel Nyam ijm nɛny nyam, ke ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki jɛj wus e low l’ok ee?
45003007	Ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu eke ki dadr in sosi ɛsɛ: eke ɛm eci yadŋ ab ɛm Nyam e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a b’ɛy ɔkm kpata in ec’anygbɛl a eci, ke sica bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ, ɛm, ɛmɛny m’ɔny es abur ɛsɛ sikpl ɛs af ee?
45003008	Ow otarir es eke wɛl ki dad ɛsɛ: "Si kók low ŋuŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke low nimamn ánŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm!" Agŋ bɛb b’ok ɛy ów af ɛtŋ bi dad ɛsɛ low na anake ɛs bi yɛgm a. Ow it eke agŋ amua na k’ɛŋn gbre.
45003009	Sica ayaf s’ɔtu eke si ki dadr a? Kɔ ɛy Jwifɛl, s’agb s’akm agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ee? Njaŋ ow elm ɛbɛn! M’ikŋ anym m’ɛlu low nyam ɔkm: Jwifɛl lele agŋ a fɛŋ eke elm Jwifɛl ab ab anŋ sikpl ec’abu ɛm.
45003010	Ɛtŋ kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Ɛgŋ kaka anm eke el nyim nyim, ɛgŋ nyamni bɔbɔ yɛji anm!
45003011	Ɛgŋ kaka ɔnym nuŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́lm Nyam es!
45003012	Ɛl fɛŋ -n’ŋgboŋ ejagb mamn ab af, ɛtŋ -n’uŋ ɛl fɛŋ. Ɛgŋ kaka am kokm low mamn, ɛgŋ nyamni bɔbɔ yɛji!
45003013	Ɛl eci ɛmn geg a el uwɔmu eke anŋ foŋ; ɛl eci anm ab ɛm li b’ewl mɛju, ɛtŋ ɛl eci nɛnym lokm a, labŋ eci sar a anŋ.
45003014	Ɛl e nɛny ab ɛm ofn e sodad lele sodad eke bi bubm ɛgŋ ew es ab iy gbɔŋ.
45003015	Ɛgŋ ibi ec’a, -li b’uru es fafa -n’im -l’ibi.
45003016	-Li bi ŋuŋn ob fɛŋ ɛl eci ejagb ab af ɛtŋ -li b’ewl gbre usu a fɛŋ.
45003017	Ɛl, -l’uwm ɛrm es ɛy eci ejagb ab any,
45003018	ɛtŋ -l’el agŋ eke ɔnym Nyam ec’ɛlum kaka.
45003019	Gbɛkɔ s’uw any eke low fɛŋ eke ol am dad a, ow el agŋ a eke k’ɛlum ol a n’am dad. Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum dogŋnm sos, kɔ wus nimum ɛy udu Nyam ec’any af.
45003020	Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ yec’eke k’ɛlum Nyam ec’ol a e low fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm a, ke ow sosiɛm Nyam óc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af a, ɛgŋ kaka k’anm eke k’ɔtu kok ɛbɛn a. Tasi ɛm a, ol, low nyam cɛ li bi kok: li b’ɔŋ agŋ abusu uw any eke -n’ɔny sikpl.
45003021	Sica gbɛ, Nyam ɛlu elel eke li b’ɔŋ ɛy s’el nyim nyim in ec’any af ke ow élm ol eci ɛlum ɛm a ɔkm. Ɛtŋ Mois ec’ ol a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab yɛji dad ow e low.
45003022	Nyam b’ɔŋ agŋ él nyim nyim in ec’any af ɛl ec’ɔmn a eke -li b’oc -l’ɛlu Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm. Li bi kok low na n’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɔny ɔmn Krist ɛm a, aŋke ɛl fɛŋ -l’el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ:
45003023	ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɔny sikpl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́tum kokm low sɔbɔ a eke Nyam am ibrm a iym nɛny.
45003024	Gbɛkɔ Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, b’ɛcr Jesu Krist eke bi sɔg ɛl sikpl ec’abu ɛm a, ɔŋ ɛl -l’el nyim nyim ɔfr ɛm.
45003025	-
45003026	Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es eke Jesu k’ok in e mebl ab es egb waw ɛm. Ɛtŋ in ec’egb waw ab ɛm, Jesu ɛŋn agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a e sikpl a ec’oc ap. Nɛnɛ a, Nyam erur eke ki yɛgm elel eke l’el nyim nyim sɛgŋ fɛŋ a: lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, l’eku low ɛtŋ l’ɛwm low n’ɔɔm agŋ ɛl e sikpl a eci. Kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, Nyam am yɛgm elel eke li b’ɔŋ agŋ el nyim nyim in ec’any af a. Tasi ɛm a, n’am erur eke li k’el nyim nyim ke n’ɔ́ŋ agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm a yɛji él nyim nyim.
45003027	Sica, kɔ s’ɔny ów ɛjeci eke ow ɛm si k’ɛw sos ee? Njaŋ, ow anm ij! Bla sosiɛm ec’ee? Aŋke yec’eke el ow tasi a, ow elm ol ec’ɛlum a, kɔ ke ɔ́ny ɔmn.
45003028	Ɛɛ, kin ow eke s’am tutr a: agŋ b’el nyim nyim aŋke -li b’ɔny ɔmn, kɔ ow elm eke -li bi kok ol ec’ów a fɛŋ ek’am ibrm a sosiɛm.
45003029	Sica Nyam na, kɔ Jwifɛl sɔny cɛ eci Nyam l’el ee? Kɔ l’elm agŋ ɛjec’a gbɛ e Nyam ee? Kaka! L’el ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ a yɛji e Nyam,
45003030	aŋke Nyam nyam coco cɛ anŋ. In anake li b’ow n’ɔŋ Jwifɛl eke wɛl bubr ekr es a, él nyim nyim ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny in cɛ anake li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ a eke wɛl bubrm ekr es a yɛji él nyim nyim ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a.
45003031	Nɛnɛ a, eke si b’ɔny ɔmn, ke ol ob ɔfr ɔfr s’am ɔŋ’n l’el ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Kɔ ol ec’any a nana anake s’am ɛlu ɔkm tasi a.
45004001	Sica bla lowi s’ɔtu eke si ki dad Abraham ɛy lagŋ eci lís ab ee? In obi e lɛc ɛm, bla obi l’ɔtu n’ɛŋn ee?
45004002	Blel ow el in ec’ów eke li kok a sosiɛm Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ana, l’ɔtu eke li k’ij nɛny, kɔ ow elm Nyam ec’any af gbɛ.
45004003	Tasi ɛm a, bla Nyam Lɛl dad ee? Abraham ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
45004004	Eke ɛgŋ bi kok juma a, wɛl bi sɔg’r labm. Labm sɔg na elm ob ap, kɔ ob ek’it eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n.
45004005	Sica, ɛgŋ nyam kí kokm juma kaka, ke n’ɔ́ny ɔmn Nyam eke b’ɔŋ sikpl ɛs él nyim nyim ab ɛm, ɛgŋ ikŋ na, Nyam b’oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, in ec’ɔmn a eke n’ɔny a sosiɛm.
45004006	Na sosiɛm anake David am dad ɛgŋ a eke Nyam b’oc ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, ke ow élm in ec’ów kok sosiɛm a e low ɛsɛ:
45004007	Ehe ɛsɛl a el agŋ a eke Nyam ɔny ɛl ec’ów ɔbr oc es, ke tɛtŋ ɛl eci sikpl ab es a.
45004008	Ehe el ɛgŋ a eke Nyam úsm in e low ɔbr e low jam a eci.
45004009	Kɔ ehe na, Jwifɛl eke bi bubr ekr es a sɔny cɛ ec’ee? Agŋ ɛjec’a eke am bubrm ekr es a ɛl gbɛ ow elm ɛl ec’ee? M’ikŋ anym mi dad m’ɛsɛ: Abraham ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
45004010	Ɛtŋ kɔ bogŋ e lɛgŋ ɛm Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ee? Kɔ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke l’ubr likr es a, oglog ow a eke li k’ubrm es ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke l’ubr likr es a, kɔ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke li k’ubrm es a.
45004011	Gbuŋ ke l’úbr likr es a, ke Abraham el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af ŋ̂, in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu ow ɛm a sosiɛm, ɛtŋ sica ow e jam a, n’ɛŋn likr a eke l’ubr es a eci mɛny ɛwr. Ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr na bi yɛgm eke in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm a sosiɛm ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af. Nɛnɛ a ow ɔŋ Abraham el agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm a ec’ɛl ɛs, eke -l’ubrm likr es yɛji. Ɛtŋ agŋ amua ek’ubrm likr es a, Nyam b’oc ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
45004012	Ɛtŋ Abraham cɛ, el Jwifɛl eke bubr ekr es a ec’ɛl ɛs. Aŋa m’erur eke mi ki dad agŋ eke ɛl eci likr es ubr a elm sos af eci cɛ, kɔ ke ɛmɛny b’ucu ɛy ɛs Abraham eci sɛwl a ɔny es a e low: in, l’ikŋ anym l’oc ɔmn l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm gbuŋ ɛtŋ l’ow l’ubr likr es.
45004013	Nyam ɛwar Abraham lel in ec’alaw a eke b’ow ok ɔkm in ɛm a, eke -li b’ow -l’ij wus aja. Gbɛkɔ low ɛwar na, ow elm eke Abraham ɛlum ol a sosiɛm Nyam dadm ɛwm es. Li dad aŋke l’oc Abraham ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ow ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
45004014	Sica eke aja a eci ij a el ke kók ol ec’ów a eke am ibrm a, ke ɔmn elm low kaka, ɛtŋ Nyam eci low a eke ɛwar a yɛji elm low ij.
45004015	Tasi ɛm a, ol ec’ɛluam a b’ɛsŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl, kɔ eke ol anm a, wɛl k’ɔtum ɔbm ol es.
45004016	Ow sosiɛm a, ɔmn eke wɛl b’oc ɛlu Nyam ɛm a anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ij aja a, ɛtŋ ow el bibm eke wɛl b’ɛŋn ɔfr ɛm tasi. Na sosiɛm ob a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es a el agŋ a fɛŋ eke el Abraham ec’alaw a eci. Ɛtŋ ow elm agŋ a eke b’ɛlum ol a sɔny, kɔ agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ Abraham eke el ɛy fɛŋ eci ɛy ɛs af a yɛji.
45004017	Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Mi kok’ŋ el bieku nɔnɔ ec’ɛl lagŋ. Abraham el ɛy ɛs Nyam ec’any af. Ow ɛm anake n’ɔny ɔmn a, Nyam a eke b’ɔŋ agŋ eke uw a igb anŋ owr, ke ɔny abusu eke ob ek’anm wɛl ɛ́knm a, kok ow anŋ wɛl am ɛkn a.
45004018	Low ɔmn kaka anm low a eke Nyam ɛwar a eci lís ij, gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji Abraham ɔmn cɛ. L’oc in ec’ɔmn a l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm, l’el bieku nɔnɔ ec’ɛl ɛs. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Agŋ eke b’ow anŋ ŋ ɛm ok ɔkm a b’ow ɛny nɔnɔ.
45004019	Ɛtŋ eke ow anŋ akpo tɛl cɛ ke n’ɔny akpo ekŋ yen a yɛji, in ec’ɔmn a digrm kaka. Ɛtŋ l’uw any yɛj’eke in e sos megl a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke uw af, ɛtŋ ɛy Sara yɛji k’ɔtum ewm iy ij.
45004020	Ɛbɛn yɛji, Abraham irmnm in ec’ɔmn a ɛtŋ bɛbarm kaka, Nyam e low ɛwar a e lís. Catŋ nana anake in ec’ɔmn a obn ke li kɔklm Nyam a.
45004021	L’uw low nyam gbɛ any tasi: yec’a eke Nyam ɛwar a, n’ɔny abusu nɔnɔ eke li ki kok.
45004022	Na sosiɛm Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af.
45004023	Ba Nyam Lɛl bi dad ɛsɛ: Nyam oc Abraham ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, ke sodad amua elm Abraham cɛ eci.
45004024	Kɔ ɛy yɛji ow ot ɛy es, ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow lɛr ɛy ec’ɔmn a. Tasi ɛm a, in eke l’igbm ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu luw ɛm a, in ɛm s’ɔny ɔmn.
45004025	Ɛy e sikpl a sosiɛm Nyam ɔŋ wɛl ibi Jesu, gbɛkɔ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke s’él agŋ nyim nyim.
45005001	Nɛnɛ anake Nyam oc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a; ɛtŋ sica s’anŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm in ab, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
45005002	Jesu anake kok ke s’ɔtu s’ucu ɔmn ɛm, bibm eke s’ɛŋn a s’ɔny es a. Ɛtŋ s’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm aŋke s’am ɔmn eke si b’ow s’anŋ Nyam ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm.
45005003	Ow eke akpl tasi a el, si b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm eke ow el gbre s’am ij yɛji. Ɛtŋ s’uw any tasi eke gbre ij b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɔny ɛrm susu,
45005004	ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ɔny ɛrm susu a, li b’ij lɛc eke ses babur b’anŋ yɛji. Ɛgŋ eke b’ij lɛc es abur ɛm a, li b’ɔny low ɔmn,
45005005	ɛtŋ low ɔmn na ɛ́jum ɛgŋ. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala ɛm Nyam ɛcr yibr ɛy e mɛrm a in ec’erur a.
45005006	Tasi, eke s’anŋ ke s’ɔnym lɛc kaka sikpl ec’any af a, yogŋ anake Krist ɛgŋ eb uw ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl eci, lɛgŋ ab af eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw es a.
45005007	S’uw any eke ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ eke ɛgŋ k’ɛgŋ eb uw ɛgŋ nyim nyim eci. Sica ów amamn kok ɛs ec’a, k’aw ke ɛgŋ átr sos es ɛgŋ eb uw.
45005008	Gbɛkɔ kin elel eke Nyam yɛgm ɛy in ec’erur eke n’ɔny ɛy ec’a: n’ɔŋ Krist ow uw ɛy eci, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke s’el sikpl ɛsɛl a.
45005009	Sica, eke in ec’egb waw a ɔŋ ɛy s’el agŋ nyim nyim, ow ayl tasi yɛj’eke li b’ow li sɔg ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a e lís.
45005010	Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke s’el Nyam ec’efnu a, n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm in ab Jim eci luw ab ɛm. Sica eke n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm a, ow ayl tasi yɛji eke li b’ow li sɔg ɛy Jim eci sel ab ɛm.
45005011	Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ! Ɛy si b’oc ɛy eci sos ɛm iŋn a s’ɛlu Nyam ɛm ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm, in eke sica n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm Nyam ab a.
45005012	Ɛgŋ nyam sosiɛm anake sikpl ow wus af aŋa a. Ɛgŋ a el Adam. Ɛtŋ sikpl ism luw ab. Ɛtŋ luw ɛbmn agŋ fɛŋ es, aŋke agŋ fɛŋ ɔny sikpl.
45005013	Gbuŋ ke Nyam ɔ́ŋ Mois ol a, ke sikpl ikŋ anym anŋ wus na ŋ̂. Gbɛkɔ eke ol anm a, Nyam usm sikpl e low jam tasi.
45005014	Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, igŋ Adam e lɛgŋ ab ɛm toŋ Mois a, luw eb wus nimum ɔnym ab. Ɛtŋ agŋ eke kokm sikpl eke otarir es Adam ec’a eke ɛgŋm ɛluam Nyam ec’odad a yɛji, luw b’ibi ɛl. Adam anake el ɛgŋ a eke k’ow a eci any ɔkŋnin a.
45005015	Gbɛkɔ ereb ligbɛl anŋ Nyam ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a lele Adam eci sikpl ab ab ec’araŋn. Ɛɛ, Adam, ɛgŋni nyam a eci sikpl a sosiɛm cɛ anake agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl uw a. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a leg nɔnɔ ligbɛl. Ob ap na, Nyam ɛcr ɛgŋ nyam ɛm ɛlu’l ɔkm. Ɛgŋ a in l’el Jesu Krist. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, n’ɔmun in eci ów amamn ab es ɔfr ɛm agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl af.
45005016	Nyam ec’ob ap a bi kok low eke otarm es ɛgŋ nyam a eci sikpl a ec’ab ab. Tasi ɛm a, Adam ɛgŋni nyam a eci sikpl a e jam a, Nyam eci jɛj ok a el ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ úw. Gbɛkɔ, kin eke ɛl e sikpl nɔnɔ gbɛl a e jam a, Nyam ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a ɔŋ ɛl -l’eel agŋ nyim nyim.
45005017	Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ nyam cɛ kok sikpl ɛtŋ luw ibi agŋ fɛŋ ɛgŋ nyam a cɛ e sikpl a sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ, Jesu Krist ɛgŋ nyam sosiɛm cɛ agŋ fɛŋ ɛl yɛji b’ɛŋn ów nɔnɔ Nyam e lís: -li b’ɛŋn Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ligbɛl a, ɛtŋ ow eci ob ap ɔfr ɛm a b’ɔŋ ɛl -l’el agŋ nyim nyim ow ec’any af. Krist sosiɛm, -li b’ow -n’anŋ owr ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɛw es ow ab.
45005018	Ow eke si ki dad s’uwar a el, s’am ɛkn eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ eci sikpl a eke kok a anake is agŋ fɛŋ e luw a. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛgŋ nyam eci low nyim nyim e kok a, ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam oc agŋ fɛŋ ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af, ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ wɛl sel.
45005019	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ɛgŋm eke k’ɛlum Nyam, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl el sikpl ɛsɛl. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛlum Nyam a sosiɛm, agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af.
45005020	Sica ol ow, ɛtŋ sikpl ɛny eb es nɔnɔ ligbɛl. Gbɛkɔ yogŋ a eke sikpl ɛny eb es a, Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a b’ɛny bubu af.
45005021	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, sikpl ɔny abusu fɛŋ eke k’ɔŋ agŋ uw. Ɛbɛn lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ɔny abusu fɛŋ eke k’ɔŋ agŋ el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, s’ɔtu eke si k’ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym uwr Nyam ab, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
45006001	Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kɔ sikpl ow it eke abu k’anŋ ɛy ɛm s’am kok yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a ám ɛny bobn ee?
45006002	Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Ɛy s’ɛcr luw eke ɔny kpab ɛy es sikpl e lís ab ɛm. Ayaf ɛmɛny s’ɔtu eke si k’ir sikpl ec’ɛb ee?
45006003	Ɔny uwr any tasi eke: eke wɛl ok ɛy mij nuŋ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm a, yogŋ ɛtŋ s’okr af in e luw ab ab.
45006004	Ow sosiɛm, eke wɛl ok ɛy mij nuŋ a, s’uw ɛtŋ wɛl oc ɛy es in ab. Gbɛkɔ, Nyam ec’anygbɛl ec’abusu ligbɛl a igbm Krist agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy yɛji, s’ɔ́ny ɛb ir owr.
45006005	Tasi ɛm a, s’okr af nimum in ab lɛgŋ a eke s’uw in ab a. Ɛbɛn cɛ, si b’ow s’okr af in ab lɛgŋ a eke ɛy yɛji si b’ow s’igb luw ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke l’igb ab af a.
45006006	S’írir low na sɛnyn sɛnyn: ɛy ec’elel eke s’anŋn anym ɛm a, wɛl oc lele Krist ab ɔbm olikŋ. Ow ɔŋ, sikpl a eke anŋ ɛy ɛm a uŋ, ɛtŋ s’elm in eci madu ij.
45006007	Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ eke uw a anm sikpl e low ɛm ij.
45006008	Eke sica s’uw Krist ab a, s’ub nawrɛ eke ow el in ab si b’ow s’anŋ owr.
45006009	S’uw any tasi eke lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke Krist igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, li k’ow l’uwm ij, ɛtŋ luw ɔnym abusu kaka in af.
45006010	Krist uw, ɛtŋ in e luw a ɔny kpab’r es sikpl e lís nimum nimum, akp nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Sica n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ in ec’owr anŋ a nimum el Nyam eci.
45006011	Ɔny yɛji, ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ agŋ eke sikpl ec’abusu a ɛwm es ij, ke Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm am ir ɛb Nyam ec’af.
45006012	Ɔny, sikpl ɔtum eke k’ɔny abusu ɔny af ij. Ɔny eci sos megl a b’ow uw lɛgŋ nyam. Ow sosiɛm, ow itm eke k’ɛlumn in ec’ów eŋuŋ a eke b’aw’r a ij.
45006013	K’òcr ɔny eci sos a eci susu susu a k’ɛwr es sikpl eci, ɛsɛ ejagb eke ɛru es low ŋuŋ kok ec’af. Kɔ nana, òcr ɔny nimum kokr Nyam e low, ɛsɛ agŋ ek’anŋ luw ɛm igb anŋ owr af. Òcr ɔny eci sos a eci susu susu a ɛwr es ɛsɛ ejagb eke ɛru es low nyim nyim e kok ec’af.
45006014	Sica eke ow elm ol ɛwm ɔny es ij, ke ow el Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab anake ɛw ɔny es a, sikpl k’ɔtum ɔnym abusu ɔny af ij.
45006015	Nawrɛ, ɛy ow elm ol ɛwm ɛy es ij, kɔ Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ɛw ɛy es. Ow sosiɛm a, kɔ abusu ɛ́ru ɛy es eke si ki kok sikpl ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!
45006016	Ɔny uwr any tasi eke, eke b’ɛgŋn ebr am kokr ɛgŋ eci juma ɛsɛ madu af a, ɔny eel ɛgŋ a eke am ɛlumn a eci madu. Ow sosiɛm a, oglog ɔny eel sikpl e madu, ke sikpl óc im ɛlu ɔny luw ɛm, oglog ɔny eel Nyam e madu, ke ɔ́nyn ɛb ir nyim nyim in ec’any af, aŋke b’ɔnyn in ec’ɛlum.
45006017	S’ɔ́ŋ Nyam bia! Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɔny eel sikpl eci madu. Jam aŋa ɛm a, ɔny ɛgŋn ebr eke k’ɛlumn ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, Amani Mamn a eke wɛl babul agŋ fɛŋ a.
45006018	Ɔny dogŋnin sos ebr sikpl ec’abu ɛm ɛtŋ am kokr low nyim nyim eci juma.
45006019	M’am oc agŋ ɛm e low mi bɛbmn aŋke ɔny eci low iri a b’ɔtu nɔnɔ. Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛsɛ madu af, ɔny ocr ɔny eci sos megl a ɛwr es ɛb ir eke el sikpl lele suksuk ab eci, ɛtŋ ow eci low ek’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, el Nyam eci any ɔbr. Ɛbɛn, yɛfɛnyna yɛji ɛsɛ madu af, òcr ɔny eci sos megl a ɛwr es ɛb ir eke el low nyim nyim eci, ɛtŋ ow eci low eke b’ow anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, b’ow el ɛb ir lala eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm.
45006020	Ow a eke eel sikpl eci madu a, low nyim nyim eci kok a áwm ɔny.
45006021	Ow e lɛgŋ ab af a, bogŋ ec’ey ɔsur ee? Yɛfɛnyna, ow am ɔny ɔny ɛ́s, aŋke ow eci ey eke ow ɔsu a el luw.
45006022	Sica jam aŋa, wɛl sɔg ɔny sikpl e lís ɛtŋ ɛwal eel Nyam eci madu. Na sosiɛm am ir ɛb eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ ow eci low ek’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, el Nyam ab ec’ɛb ir sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
45006023	Nawrɛ, aŋke sikpl eci labm sɔg ek’anŋ ɛm a el luw; kɔ Nyam eci ob ap a el sel a ek’ɔnym uwr, ke li b’ɔŋ ɛy, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm a.
45007001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm m’uw any eke ow el agŋ eke uw Nyam ec’ ol ab any a, m’am dad odad. Ol ɔny abusu ɛy af eke s’anŋ owr a cɛ. Ɛtŋ ow el low eke uwr any tasi.
45007002	Kin low ɛbmn nyam: ol ɛm a, yɔw eke ɛbi igŋ a okr af in ec’igŋ ab ab eke igŋ a anŋ owr a. Kɔ eke igŋ a b’uw a, yɔw a sos b’ok es ol a ek’ɔny okr’r af ɛc ab a e lís.
45007003	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke ɛc anŋ owr a, eke n’im l’ɛbi igŋ ɛjeci, ke nfaci l’ij a. Kɔ eke ɛc uw a, ol ɛm a abusu ɛru’r es; l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛbi igŋ ɛjeci gɔŋ, li k’ow l’elm facyɔw.
45007004	Ɛm lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ. Ɔny okar af Krist eke uw ɛy sosiɛm olikŋ af ab ab; ow sosiɛm, ɔny kpabr es nimum Mois ec’ol a e lís. Sica eel ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam eci; ɛgŋ ɛjec’a, in l’el ɛgŋ a ek’igb luw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn ɛm a s’ɔtu eke ɛy fɛŋ si k’ɔsu ey Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm.
45007005	Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke s’am kok ów eke b’akpl ɛy sos ɛm a, Mois ec’ol a ec’ów a tasi eke bi dɛdŋn a b’itr ów aw eŋuŋ a eke ki kok low ɛy e sos ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ow e low ek’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, el luw.
45007006	Gbɛkɔ sica, si kpab es nimum nimum Mois ec’ol a eke ɔny awŋ ɛy es a e lís; s’ɔtu eke sica si ki kok Nyam e low a sɛwl owr ɛm, s’ám ɛlum Abŋ Lala, ke si kí kokm Nyam e low a ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’a eke s’anŋ ol a eke wɛl nɔn a eci es ɛw ɛm ab af.
45007007	Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kɔ Mois ec’ ol na, sikpl eci juma n’am kok ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Gbɛkɔ ol anake ɔŋ m’uw sikpl any a. Tasi ɛm a, blel ol dadm ɛsmɛ: K’ow ocm nyamnɛyr ɛm erurm awlŋ ec’ob, blel mi k’uwm any eke ow el low ŋuŋ.
45007008	Gbɛkɔ sikpl ɛcr ol na ɛm ɛtŋ ɔsu ɛm ɛm ów aw eŋuŋ ɔrŋ ɔrŋ a fɛŋ, aŋke blel ol anm ana, sikpl blel ɔnym abusu kaka.
45007009	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke m’uwm ol any a, m’el ɛgŋ ek’anŋ owr. Kɔ sica eke m’uw ol any a, sikpl anake ɛwl mɛny anŋ owr a,
45007010	ɛtŋ ɛm, m’el ɛgŋ eke uw. Ɛtŋ ol a eke ki nyimn’m m’anŋ owr a, nyimn’m luw ɛm.
45007011	Ɛɛ, sikpl ɛcr ol ɛm ɛlu’m wus ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, n’ɔŋ’m m’uw.
45007012	Gbɛkɔ ol, in obi a l’el lala, ɛtŋ ów ey nyam nyam eke anŋ’n ɛm a yɛji el lala, nyim nyim lele nimamn ab.
45007013	Sica eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke ob mamn ɔtu eke k’ism’m luw ab ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn! Gbɛkɔ sikpl ɛcr ob mamn ɛm ɔŋ’m luw. Nɛnɛ anake ol ɔŋ wɛl ɛkn elel eke sikpl e lɛc a el ob ŋuŋ kɔ kɔ kɔ a.
45007014	Ɛɛ, ɛy s’uw any eke ol, Nyam ogŋ ow anŋ ow, gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’el ɛgŋ fuɛfuɛ eke wɛl ɔl ij ɛsɛ adu af sikpl ogŋ.
