45007015	Nawrɛ tasi, yec’a eke m’am kok a mi k’irim, aŋke yec’a eke m’am erur a, mi kókm, ɛtŋ mi bi kok yec’a eke m’érurm a.
45007016	Eke mi bi kok yec’a eke m’érurm a, mi b’ɛgŋ m’eb eke ol el ob mamn.
45007017	Sica m’uw any eke ow elm ɛm mi kókm ɛbɛn, kɔ sikpl a eke ir ɛm ɛm a anake b’itr’m mi kok ɛbɛn a.
45007018	Ɛɛ, m’uw any eke low mamn irm ɛm ɛm, ɛm e sos ɔnym ab ɛm. Ɛm ec’a, mi b’erur eke mi ki kok ów eke akpl a, kɔ m’ɔ́tum mi kokm.
45007019	Tasi ɛm a, low nimamn eke mi b’erur a, m’ɔ́tum mi kokm, ɛtŋ low ŋuŋ eke m’érurm a, mi bi kok.
45007020	Sica, eke mi bi kok low eke m’érurm a, ke ow elm ɛm mi kokm ɛbɛn, kɔ sikpl a eke ir ɛm ɛm a anake b’itr’m mi kok ɛbɛn a.
45007021	Ɛtŋ kin ol ɛjeci nyam eke m’uyum ab: eke mi b’erur eke mi ki kok low mamn a, ke low ŋuŋ kpɛkŋ inym’m es any af.
45007022	Ɛm ec’ɛrm ab ɛm, mi b’erur Nyam ec’ol a.
45007023	Gbɛkɔ ɛm obi ɛm a, mi b’uyum ol ɛjeci nyam ab, eke b’atarir Nyam ec’ol a eke in ab nɛny okr ɛy af ab ab. Ɛtŋ ol na, in l’el sikpl ec’ol a eke bi kok juma ɛm ɛm, ke b’ɔny’m ɛsɛ in eci sobel ɛm ɛs af a.
45007024	Kin eke m’el gbre ec’ɛgŋ! Bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow sɔg’m sos megl na eke b’oc im ɛlu’m luw ɛm a e lís ee?
45007025	S’ɛ́lu Nyam bia, aŋke Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sɔg’m! Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɛm eci tutr ab ɛm, mi b’ɛgŋ Nyam ec’ol a m’eb, gbɛkɔ ɛm eci sos ɔnym ɛm a, mi b’ɛlum sikpl ec’ol a.
45008001	Sica low ɔb kaka anm agŋ a eke okr af Jesu Krist ab a eci ij.
45008002	Nawrɛ tasi, eke wɛl okr af Jesu Krist ab a, ke Abŋ Lala ec’ol a anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a, ɛtŋ ol na sɔg’m sikpl ec’ol a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ luw a ec’abu ɛm.
45008003	Mois ec’ol a ɔtum eke ki kok ɛbɛn, aŋke agŋ eci sos ɔnym a ɔɔm’n ow e kok ec’abusu. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔtu kok: l’ɛrm Jim ɛli sos eke otarir es sikpl ɛsɛl ec’ab ab ow sɔg ɛl sikpl ec’abu ɛm. Ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, Nyam ɔŋ sikpl a eke am kok juma agŋ e sos ɛm a abur es.
45008004	Li kok nɛnɛ, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́ny abusu s’ir ɛb nyim nyim a eke ol am ibrm a. Sica, ow elm elel eke agŋ b’ir ɛb a s’irm ij, kɔ ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala b’erur ab af.
45008005	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a eke b’ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke -n’am ɛkan ab af a, b’ɛlum ɛl ec’ów eke b’akpl ɛl sos ɛm a, gbɛkɔ agŋ eke b’ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala b’erur ab af a, b’ɛlum yec’a eke Abŋ Lala b’erur a.
45008006	Ɛgŋ eke b’us ów eke li b’erur a jam a, li b’im luw ɛm, kɔ eke li b’us Abŋ Lala jam a, li b’im sel eke ɔnym uwr lele ɛrm es ɛy ab ogŋ.
45008007	Tasi, ɛgŋ ec’ów eke b’erur a ókrm af Nyam ec’ab ab, -l’ɛluamn Nyam ec’ol a. Ɛl ec’a, ow el low eke -li k’ɔtumn -li kokmn.
45008008	Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke b’us ów aw amua jam a, e low k’ɔtum akplm Nyam sos ɛm ij.
45008009	Gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’a, írmn ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke b’erurir ab af, kɔ ɛsɛ Abŋ Lala ec’elel eke b’erur ab af, aŋke Nyam ec’Abŋ a anŋ ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm. Eke Krist ec’Abŋ a anm ɛgŋ ɛm, ɛgŋ ikŋ a, l’elm Krist eci.
45008010	Nawrɛ eke ɔny e sos megl a b’ow uw sikpl sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ eke Krist anŋ ɔny ɛm a, Abŋ Lala b’ow ɔŋ ɔny sel, aŋke Nyam oc ɔny ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
45008011	Nyam igbm Jesu luw ɛm. Eke in ec’Abŋ a anŋ ɔny ɛm, in a cɛ eke l’igbm Jesu agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm a, li b’ow l’ɛcr Abŋ Lala ɛm n’ɔŋ ɔny e sos megl a eke b’ow uw a bɔbɔ yɛji sel.
45008012	Na sosiɛm agŋ lisijimɛl, s’ɔny labm. Gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛy ec’ów a eke b’aw ɛy a e labm s’ɔnym. Ow sosiɛm, ow itm eke si k’ir ɛb eke ɛy ec’ów aw a b’erur a.
45008013	Eke am iir ɛb ów a eke b’aw ɔny ke b’erurir a e kok eci, b’ow uwr; kɔ eke Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm waal ɔny e sos megl ec’ów a e b’erur e ki kok a ɛlul es a, b’ow anŋn owr.
45008014	Nawrɛ ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a bi nyimn a, el Nyam ec’ey.
45008015	Ɛtŋ Abŋ a eke ɛŋan a, ɔ́ɔm ɔny elmn madu eke ɛmɛny am uru Nyam, kɔ li b’ɔŋ ɔny eel Nyam ec’ey. Ɛtŋ Abŋ na eci abu ɛlum ɛm, si b’ɛlu Nyam lebl si dad s’ɛsɛ: "Aba! Ɛs!"
45008016	Abŋ Lala in obi b’ij daŋku dad ɛy ec’abŋ a eke s’el Nyam ec’ey.
45008017	Ow sosiɛm, eke s’el Nyam ec’ey a, si b’ow s’ij aja a eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw in ec’agŋ es a, ɛtŋ aja na, Krist ab si b’ow s’ij. Ɛɛ, eke s’anŋ in e gbre ij a e low ɛm, si b’ow s’anŋ in ec’anygbɛl a yɛji e low ɛm.
45008018	Ayaf s’ɔtu eke si k’oc yɛfɛnyna e gbre a si bɛbmn lɛgŋ ek’am ow ab ɛm eci anygbɛl a eke Nyam b’ow yɛgm ɛy kpata ab ab ee? Ɛm e sos ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna e gbre a elm low kaka.
45008019	Am ɛkan eke wus nimum a eke Nyam kok a am eku lɛgŋ a eke Nyam b’ow ɛlu in ec’ey ec’anygbɛl ɔkm a.
45008020	Mob amua fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a, itŋn el mob ɔfr ɔfr. Ow elm mob a eke Nyam kok a erurm ɛbɛn, kɔ Nyam anake ɔŋ ɛl -n’anŋn nɛnɛ a. Gbɛkɔ wus nimum a eke Nyam kok a ɔtu eke ɛmɛny k’ɔmn low.
45008021	Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke adu b’ŋgboŋ adu el ɛm a, mob mob a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a b’ow ŋgboŋ ɛl e mob ek’am ugŋn ɛl es ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’anŋ Nyam ec’ey a e lewi ij a lele anygbɛl ab ab e low ɛm.
45008022	S’uw any tasi eke mob mob a fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a am ikŋ sɔmu ɛtŋ ɛmɛny am ij gbre caca ɛm a, ɛsɛ yɔw eke b’ew iy ab af,
45008023	gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛl sɔny cɛ. Ɛy obi yɛji, s’am ikŋ sɔmu ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm, ɛtŋ s’am eku eke Nyam k’eb ɛy ɛsɛ in ec’ey tasi af, ke s’él ewi kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ. Gbɛkɔ s’ikŋ anym s’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala, ɛsɛ ob ap a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es ab ɛm eci krɛkrɛ af.
45008024	Tasi ɛm a, s’ɛŋn sel, kɔ ow el low ɔmn ɛm cɛ. Eke wɛl b’ɛkn ob eke wɛl am ɔmn a, ke wɛl úbm’n ɛsɛ low ɔmn ob af ij. Ob eke wɛl am ɛkn a, kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke ɛmɛny wɛl k’ɔmn’n ee?
45008025	Gbɛkɔ eke s’am ɔmn ob eke s’ɛknm a, si b’anŋ ow eci eku ɛm ɛrm susu ɛm.
45008026	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ɛy eke s’ɔnym sos a, Abŋ Lala b’ɛlum ɛy abu. S’úwm any si ŋɔŋnm Nyam ɛsɛ elel eke ow it ab af. Ow b’ɔŋ Abŋ Lala in obi bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛy usu iy, íbrm ów sɔmu ikŋ ebl ɛm eke ɛgŋ e nɛny k’ɔtum dadm.
45008027	Gbɛkɔ Nyam eke b’ɛkn mɛrm lokm a, b’uw yec’eke Abŋ Lala erur eke k’ibrm ab any. Ɛɛ, Abŋ Lala bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam b’erur ab af ɔŋ agŋ a eke el Nyam ec’a.
45008028	Ɛmɛny s’uw any eke agŋ a ek’ɔny Nyam ec’erur ec’a, low fɛŋ eke b’ɛŋn ɛy a, Nyam anake bi kok a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɛ́lum ɛy abu s’ɛŋn low nimamn. Ow el agŋ a eke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm wɛl ec’ɛsŋ e low l’ɛw es a.
45008029	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua eke Nyam ikŋ anym sɔsum ot ec’a, l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm yɛji eke li ki kok wɛl, wɛl ot in ec’ Iy ab es, ke ow ɔ́ŋ in ec’Iy a el bosu ligbɛl a e liy likpekp.
45008030	Sica agŋ a eke Nyam ikŋ anym sɔsum ot a, l’ɛsŋ wɛl yɛji. Agŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ a, l’ot wɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke l’ot ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af a, l’ot l’ok wɛl in ec’anygbɛl a yɛji ɛm.
45008031	Bla odad iy si ki dad s’igŋ af ee? Eke Nyam anŋ ɛy ec’ogog, ke bwo ɔtu eke ki kok ɛy low ŋuŋ ee?
45008032	In eke l’ɛdŋnm in ec’Iy lokm a abu any, ke n’ɔŋ ow uw ɛy fɛŋ e sel ɛŋn sosiɛm ec’a, ayaf eke s’okr af ow ab, li k’ow n’ɔɔm ɛy ɔfr ɛm, ów amamn fɛŋ ee?
45008033	Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ok agŋ a eke Nyam sɔsum ot a ów af ee? Ɛgŋ kaka anm! Aŋke Nyam in obi ot ɛl ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
45008034	Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’ɔb agŋ low luw ec’ee? Ɛgŋ kaka anm! Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist uw, gbɛkɔ n’anŋ luw ɛm l’igb, n’anŋ Nyam e lidr abu af a ɛtŋ n’am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛy eci.
45008035	Bla obi ɔtu eke k’ɔny kpab ɛy es Krist ec’erur ek’ɔny ɛy ec’a e lís ee? Kɔ es abur oglog ɛrmij ebr ee? Kɔ agŋ eci milɔlu e b’ɔnyn ɛy ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm ab ee? Kɔ namn oglog gbɔr ee? Kɔ low ɛyr eke b’okr ɛy es a oglog luw ee?
45008036	Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: ŋ sosiɛm anake sɛgŋ fɛŋ s’am uw, ke wɛl am kok ɛy ɛsɛ mɛcɛb eke wɛl b’ɔny im ibi usu af a.
45008037	Gbɛkɔ fɛŋ ɛm a, si b’ok ɔkm agbawru, ɛgŋ a eke erur ɛy a eci abu ɛlum ɛm.
45008038	-
45008039	Ɛɛ, m’ɔny ɔmn tasi, eke ob kaka k’ɔtum ɔnym kpabm ɛy es erur a eke Nyam ɛlu ɔkm, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm a e lís. Ke ow él luw oglog owr anŋ, ke ow él afr ɛrm ɛsɛl oglog es ɛw ɛsɛl oglog lɛc ek’anŋ lɛf ɛm, ke ow él lɛgŋ na ɛm, lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ɛm, ke ow él afr e lɛc oglog wus aŋa e lɛc, ke ow él mob mob fɛŋ eke wɛl kok, ob kaka k’ɔtum ɔnym kpabm ɛy es Nyam ec’erur ek’ɔny ɛy ec’a e lís!
45009001	Ɛm m’el Krist eci, ow sosiɛm, low a eke m’am m’ow mi dad a el low nawrɛ, mi k’ɔtum m’ɔnym yadŋ. Ɛm e tutr a eke Abŋ Lala am nyimn a yɛji am dad’m eke ow el low nawrɛ.
45009002	Ɛm ec’ɛrm a sos ɔw es nɔnɔ ligbɛl ɛtŋ m’am ij gbre eke úwrm.
45009003	Mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke Nyam k’igŋ ɔwl’m ke mi kpáb es Krist e lís, eke ow ɔtu cɛ eke k’eb ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ɛlu es.
45009004	Bla ec’ee? -L’el Israɛl eyŋ, Nyam ot ɛl -l’el ow ec’ey. Wɛl ec’araŋn n’anŋ in ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm, l’ɛgŋ sinm wɛl ab, n’ɔŋ wɛl in ec’ol a, li yɛgm wɛl sɛwl yec’ɛm eke wɛl k’igŋ’n nuŋ a, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl ów eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es wɛl ec’a.
45009005	Ɛl -l’el ɛl lagŋɛl ekpekp a eci alaw. Ɛl ec’araŋn anake wɛl ew Krist ɛsɛ ɛgŋ owr af, in eke l’el Nyam ek’anŋ ob fɛŋ e nuŋ af a! Kɔklm él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
45009006	Ow elm ke wɛl dad ɛsɛ Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ɛw es a ɛlu ok es. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a eke wɛl ew ɛy lagŋ Israɛl ɛm a, ɛl fɛŋ -l’elm Israɛl eyŋ tasi.
45009007	Ɛtŋ agŋ a bɔbɔ eke wɛl ew ɛy lagŋ Abraham ec’eb ab ɛm a yɛji, ow elm ɛl fɛŋ -l’elm ow ec’ey tasi, aŋke Nyam dad Abraham ninɛ: Isak ɛm anake b’ow ɛŋn alaw eke b’ow ɛlu ŋ e nin a ɔkm a.
45009008	Kin sodad na ec’iri tasi a: ow elm ey a eke wɛl ew igŋ nyam lele yɔw nyam ab ec’erur ɛm a elm Nyam ec’ey. Kɔ ey tasi a, ɛl -l’el Nyam ec’ɛwar ec’ey a.
45009009	Kin ɛwar a e sodad a: m’ow m’ɛwl mɛny m’ow ŋ ogŋ a lakpo yec’a, lɛgŋ nɛnɛ af, ɛtŋ ayŋ Sara b’ow ew iy igŋ nyam.
45009010	Ɛtŋ ow elm na sɔny cɛ: kɔ Rebeka ec’a yɛji. L’ew ey yony ɛy lagŋ Isak ab.
45009011	-
45009013	Ey yony a, wɛl k’ewm kokm ɛl wus, -li ki kokm low ŋuŋ oglog low nimamn. Gbɛkɔ Nyam dad Isak ɛw es eke: likpekp a b’ow anŋ jam ɛs a eci es ɛw ɛm. Ɛtŋ usu ɛjec’ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: m’erur Jakɔb m’oc ɛtŋ mi wal Esayu m’ɛlu es. Low na ɛcr nɛnɛ, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es a ɛ́li any. Nyam bi sɔsum agŋ ot ɛsɛ elel eke li b’erur ab af, ɛtŋ sɔsum oc a elm agŋ a ec’ów e bi kok a sosiɛm, kɔ Nyam cɛ eke b’ɛsŋ ɛgŋ ab ɛm ow b’anŋ ow.
45009014	Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Kɔ Nyam ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs l’el ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!
45009015	Tasi ɛm a, li dad Mois ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ikŋ ɛgŋ e m’erur eke mi k’ikŋ sɔrŋ a sɔrŋ, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɔnyn ɛgŋ eke m’erur eke mi k’ɔnyn ɛrm mamn a ɛrm mamn.
45009016	Ow sosiɛm a, Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a ánm agŋ e low e b’erur ab ɛm, oglog sos eke b’atr es ab ɛm, kɔ Nyam cɛ eke ɔny sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm ow b’anŋ ow.
45009017	Nyam Lɛl ɛm, Nyam dad Ejipt ec’ɛb ebu a ninɛ: M’ɛw’ŋ ɛb ebu, yec’ɛtŋ ke ŋ ɛm m’ɛ́lu ɛm ec’abusu a ɔkm, ke mi kók ɛm e nin a eb es wus na nimum af.
45009018	Wɛl b’ɛkn eke Nyam b’ikŋ ɛgŋ eke l’erur eke li k’ikŋ sɔrŋ a sɔrŋ, ɛtŋ li b’ɔtur ɛgŋ eke l’erur eke li k’ɔtur ɛrm a ɛrm.
45009019	Gbɛkɔ, k’aw ke ɛgŋ íbrm im ɛsɛ: sica, eke ow el nɛnɛ, bla sosiɛm ɛmɛny Nyam k’ɛnym ɛy abr ee? Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke ki dogŋn low eke li b’erur ab ee?
45009020	Kɔ ŋ gbɛ, bwo el’ŋ eke k’atar Nyam ab ee? Kɔ mijel b’ibrm ɛgŋ a eke kok’r a ɛsɛ: bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ kok’m mijel ee?
45009021	Kɔ mijel kok ɛs ɔtum eke ki kok low e l’erur kpeŋ ab ab ee? Kɔ l’ɔtum eke kpeŋ nyam a cɛ, li k’itl li kok lɛ́w sɔbɔ nyam oglog lɛ́w kprakasa nyam ee?
45009022	Nyam erur eke k’ɛlu in ec’ɛrm bebl ɔkm ke yɛ́gm in ec’abusu a. Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke n’ɔny ɛrm bebl wɛl ab, ke it eke k’irm ɔgbu es a, l’ɛgŋ wɛl e low l’eb low eku ligbɛl ɛm.
45009023	L’ɛgŋ low nɛnɛ l’eb, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́lu in eci anygbɛl a e sagb a ɔkm agŋ eke l’erur eke li ki yɛgm in e sɔrŋ ikŋ a e lís. Ow el agŋ a eke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm l’ɛw es eke k’ɛŋn anygbɛl na a.
45009024	Ɛtŋ ɛy s’el agŋ amua eke l’ɛsŋ a. Ow elm Jwifɛl ec’araŋn cɛ l’ɛsŋm ɛy, kɔ agŋ eke elm Jwifɛl ec’araŋn ec’agŋ a yɛji.
45009025	Nyam dad low na kokoba ɔb ɛs Ose e lɛl ab ɛm: Agŋ a eke elm ɛm ec’agŋ a, mi b’ow m’ɛsŋ ɛl 'ɛm ec’agŋ'. Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke m’érurm a, mi b’ow m’ɛsŋ ɛl 'agŋ e m’erur'.
45009026	Ɛtŋ yogŋ a eke wɛl dad agŋ eke: "Ɔny elmn ɛm ec’agŋ a," wɛl b’ow ɛsŋ ɛl Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’ey.
45009027	Esayi, in am ɛlu lebl Israɛl ec’agŋ e lís ɛsɛ: Eke batŋ Israɛl eyŋ ɛny nɔnɔ ɛsɛ okij any e mirici af yɛji, agŋ tɛl a eke wal es a cɛ b’ow ɛŋn sel.
45009028	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Admaga b’ow kok low a eke li dad a wus af aŋa, li b’ow li kok fafa toŋ l’igŋ nuŋ.
45009029	Ɛtŋ low na anake Esayi yɛji ikŋ anym dad a: blel Nyam Abusu Ɛs okm ɛy alaw bɛb es, ke blel s’ánŋ ɛsɛ Sodɔm eyŋ af, ke s’ótarir es Gomɔr eyŋ ab.
45009030	Ke ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Nawrɛ, agŋ eke elm Jwifɛl a, ɔ́lm eke k’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛkn eke Nyam ɛgŋ eb ɛl, ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
45009031	Ke Israɛl ec’agŋ a am ɔl eke k’el nyim nyim eke -li b’ɛlum Nyam ec’ol a sosiɛm. Kɔ ɛl -l’ɔwl -l’ok es.
45009032	Bla sosiɛm ee? -l’ɔwl -l’ok es, aŋke -l’ɔlm nyim nyim el na es ɔmn ɛm, -li tutr eke ɛl ec’ów kok ɛm -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn. Ɛbɛn a, -l’uyum lebn a eke b’ɛlu ɛgŋ wus ab ab.
45009033	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Siɔn ɛb ɛm, m’am ɛw lebn nyam eke b’eb agŋ akr, lob eke b’ɛlu ɛgŋ wus es. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’oc ɔmn ɛlu’l ɛm a, sos k’ow ɔwm es lɛgŋ kaka.
45010001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am erur ɛm ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm eke Jwifɛl k’ɛŋn sel, ɛtŋ m’am ibrm Nyam low na ɛl eci.
45010002	Nawrɛ, m’ɔtu eke mi k’ij ɛl e lís e daŋku m’ɛsɛ: Nyam e kok owi anŋ ɛl ɛrm ɛm tasi, kɔ -l’uwm ow ec’ejagb ab any tasi.
45010003	-L’irim elel eke Nyam b’ocr agŋ nyim nyim a, ɛtŋ -l’ɔl ɛl ec’elel eke agŋ b’eel nyim nyim ab es. Ow ɔŋ -l’ɛgŋm -l’ebm elel a eke Nyam b’ocr agŋ ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af a.
45010004	Tasi ɛm a, Krist kok Mois ec’ol a e low iy nɛny, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam óc agŋ fɛŋ eke b’ub Krist nawrɛ a agŋ nyim nyim.
45010005	Mois in obi nɔn elel eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’eel nyim nyim ol ec’ɛlum sosiɛm a ninɛ: ɛgŋ yec’eke bi kok ol ec’ów a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm a, b’ow anŋ owr in ɛm.
45010006	Gbɛkɔ kin yec’eke li dad agŋ a eke Nyam b’oc ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm a e lís: kì dad ŋ ec’ɛrm ab ɛm k’ɛsɛ: bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow uyu afr ee? Ɛsɛ ɛbɛn eke wɛl am ibrm, kɔ bwo b’ow uyu afr ɔny Krist usm es ee?
45010007	Ɛmɛny kì dad k’ɛsɛ: bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow us es wus lokm ee? Ɛsɛ ɛbɛn eke wɛl am ibrm, kɔ bwo b’ow us es yogŋ ɔny Krist ɛlu ɔkm agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm ee?
45010008	Ow elm ɛbɛn, aŋke wɛl nɔn: odad a anŋ’ŋ saw, ŋ e nɛny ab ɛm lele ŋ ec’ɛrm ɛm ab ab. Ɛtŋ odad na, in anake l’el ɔmn ec’amani a eke s’am ɔb a.
45010009	Eke ŋ e nɛny bi dad agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af ɛsɛ Jesu el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛtŋ ub nawrɛ ŋ ec’ɛrm ab ɛm eke Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm a, ow b’ow ɔŋ’ŋ ɛŋn sel.
45010010	Tasi ɛm a, eke si b’ub nawrɛ ɛy ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm a, Nyam b’oc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛtŋ eke si b’ɛlu ɛy ec’ɔmn a ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af a, li bi sɔg ɛy.
45010011	Ɛɛ, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’oc ɔmn ɛlu’l ɛm a, sos k’ow ɔwm es lɛgŋ kaka.
45010012	Ow sosiɛm a, ereb anm Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab ec’araŋn ij. Ɛl fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyam cɛ -n’ɔny, ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛlu’l lebl a in ec’ów amamn a.
45010013	Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow sɔg agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛlu’l lebl a.
45010014	Sica ayaf -li b’ow -l’ɛlul Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lebl, eke -l’ubm ow nawrɛ ee? Ɛtŋ ayaf -li b’ow -l’ub ow nawrɛ, eke -l’irim ow e lís owi ee? Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ayaf -li b’ow -l’iri ow e lís owi, eke ɛgŋ ɔbm ɛl ow ec’amani ee?
45010015	Ɛtŋ ayaf ɛgŋ k’ɔbr ow ec’amani, eke wɛl ɛram ɛgŋ ow ec’ee? Ow sosiɛm wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm: Ɛbɛn tasi eke ow akpl eke wɛl ki lɛr agŋ a eke b’ɔb samani amamn a eci mowrer ana!
45010016	Gbɛkɔ, ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ɛluam Amani Mamn a. Tasi ɛm a, Esayi dad ow e low ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ ub ɛy e Nyam odad a nawrɛ ee?
45010017	Njɛ, eke ɛgŋ b’iri amani a, ow anake li b’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ a, ɛtŋ amani na, ow ow el Krist e lís ec’odad a.
45010018	Ow sosiɛm m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: kɔ Jwifɛl amua, -l’irim odad na e low ee? Yadŋ, -l’iri! Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Wɛl iri ɛl e lebl wus nimum af ɛtŋ ɛl e sodad ebl im toŋ ok wus e nuŋ.
45010019	Ow sosiɛm ɛmɛny m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: Kɔ Israɛl ec’agŋ na, -li k’irim low a k’okm ɛl es sos ɛm ee? Ke Mois ikŋ anym dad ɛl Nyam ec’odad a ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ nyamn ɛyr ɔny ɔny agŋ na ek’el agŋ ek’ɔnym any a e lís. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛrm ebl ɔny agŋ ek’ɔnym low any uw kaka a e lís.
45010020	Ɛtŋ Esayi oc lokm susu ɛm dad ninɛ: kin low eke Nyam dad: Agŋ a eke ɔlm’m es a, ɛl -n’ɛŋn’m. Ɛtŋ m’ɛlu sos ɔkm mi yɛgm agŋ a eke ibram im low kaka a.
45010021	Gbɛkɔ Israɛl ec’agŋ a e lís a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Lɛgŋ nimum a, m’ɛgŋm abu es bieku nyam eke ɛ́luam low, ke ɛ́gŋm ɛm e low ebm a e lís.
45011001	Sica m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: kɔ Nyam in ec’agŋ na es l’igŋ l’ok wɛl ee? Njaŋ! Aŋke ɛm m’el Israɛl iy, Abraham e lilaw lele Bɛnjamɛ ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ab.
45011002	Nyam igŋm in ec’agŋ a eke in obi l’ikŋ anym li sɔsum l’ot a, l’ɛlum es. Eke m’ɔnym yadŋ, ke uwr Eli e sodad eke anŋ Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab any, yogŋ a eke n’am ok Israɛl eyŋ dedeku es Nyam ogŋ a.
45011003	Ɛtŋ kin odad a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, -l’ibi ŋ eci kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a, -ni ŋuŋn ŋ e segb waw usu a. Ɛm sɔny cɛ anake m’anŋ a, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji -n’am erur eke -li k’ibi’m.
45011004	Ɛtŋ Nyam ec’eke dad ɔŋ’n a el bogŋ ec’ee? Anm ŋ sɔny! M’ɛdŋn agŋ fandi lɔbŋ m’ɛw es ɛm eci, agŋ a eke ókm ɔwrɔkp wus igŋm Baal nuŋ a.
45011005	Yɛfɛnyna yɛji low nyam a cɛ. Agŋ tɛl anŋ eke Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ɛdŋn ɛw es.
45011006	Eke Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm sɔsum ot ɛl, ke ow elm ɛl ec’ów eke -li kokr a sosiɛm. Blel ow el ɛbɛn, ke Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ɛm ec’ob ap a elm bibm ɔfr ɛm ij.
45011007	Sica ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Israɛl eyŋ ɛŋnm ob a eke -n’am ɔl es a, kɔ agŋ a cɛ eke Nyam sɔsum ot a ɛŋn ob a; agŋ likpr a ɔny ɛrm tuɔtuɔ,
45011008	ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: toŋ ke igŋ yɛfɛnyna a, Nyam ɔŋ ɛl eci low iri a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke uw af, n’ɔɔm abusu eke ɛl ec’anyamn a k’ɛkn es, ke ɛl ec’ɔru a íri ów.
45011009	Ɛb ebu David yɛji dad ninɛ: Ke ɛl eci ob ij ɛgbɛl a ítŋn el meb eke wɛl uk ɛl, nɔmu e wɛl ɛdŋ, ɛl e wus ok eci, ke Nyam kók ɛl ow e low.
45011010	Ke -l’el ány eflu, -li k’ɛknmn low kaka fɛŋ! Ke Nyam úyul ɛl ɛrɛkp leg leg ɔny ibn ɛl es sɛgŋ fɛŋ!
45011011	Sica m’am ibrm m’ɛsɛ: kɔ Jwifɛl na wus -l’ok kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ ab ee? Njaŋ! Gbɛkɔ ɛl eci low any ɔbr a ɔŋ ɛtŋ bieku ɛjeci ec’agŋ a ɔtu ɛŋn sel. Ɛbɛn a, ow ɔŋ Israɛl eyŋ am ogŋ ɛl ŋkre.
45011012	Israɛl eci low any ɔbr a ism wus ów amamn ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl ab, ɛtŋ in eci wus ɛy a ism agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ów amamn ɛgbɛl ɛgbɛl ab. Sica, lɛgŋ a eke Jwifɛl a fɛŋ b’ow ɛwl ɛgŋ Nyam e low eb a, ow ayl tasi eke Nyam ec’ów amamn ɛgbɛl a ɛmɛny b’ow agb bobn.
45011013	Sica, ɔny eke elmn Jwifɛl a, ɔny anake m’am dad ɔny odad a. Ɛm m’el Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci, ɛtŋ m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ɛm e juma na ɛm.
45011014	Juma na eci kok ɛm a, m’am ɔny tutr eke mi b’ow m’obn ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl eci ŋkre ogŋ a, ke ow ɔ́ŋ m’eb agŋ nyam nyam ɛl ɛm.
45011015	Tasi ɛm a, eke Nyam ɛw ɛl saw a, l’okr ɛm wus ab. Sica, lɛgŋ a eke li b’ow l’ɛwl l’eb wɛl a, bla lowi b’ow ɛy ab ee? Agŋ eke uw a b’ow ɛwl anŋ owr.
45011016	Eke futufutu ec’ogog nyam el Nyam eci, ke futufutu a nimum yɛji in ec’ana. Ɛtŋ eke likŋ nyam eci min a fɛŋ el Nyam eci, ke ál a yɛji in ec’ana.
45011017	Israɛl eyŋ anŋ ɛsɛ olivie ikŋ eke wɛl ewl ɔgm, ke Nyam bubr in ec’ál bɛb es af. Ɛtŋ ŋ, eke elm Jwif ke anŋ ɛsɛ akp ɔfr ɛm ec’olivie ikŋ af a, l’oc l’ujr’ŋ likŋ lis ab ɛm, wuwlm ekŋ ál tasi a eke cucu likŋ lis a eke wɛl ewl ab ab. Ɛtŋ sica, ɔtu eke in ec’ekŋ ál ab ab k’ɛ́ŋn mij a eke b’anŋ in e min ab ɛm ow a.
45011018	Ow sosiɛm, k’ìm ekŋ ál a ec’any af k’íj en! Eke erur eke k’ij en, ɔ̀kn eke ow elm ŋ ec’abu ɛm likŋ a e min a anm, kɔ ŋ likŋ a e min a ec’abu ɛm anŋ.
45011019	Ŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: wɛl bubr ekŋ ál es ɛtŋ ɛm, wɛl oc ujr’m likŋ lis ab ɛm.
45011020	Na low nawrɛ! Wɛl bubr ɛl es aŋke -n’ɔnym ɔmn, ɛtŋ ŋ akŋm likŋ lis ab ab, aŋke ɔny ɔmn. Ŋ k’ɛ̀w sos, kɔ erŋn anake k’ɔny’ŋ a.
45011021	Ɛɛ, aŋke eke Nyam ɛgbm Jwifɛl eke el likŋ caŋ a ec’ál ab es, ŋ yɛji li k’ow l’ɛgbm’ŋ es.
45011022	Ɛ̀bmn nyamn ɛkn elel eke Nyam b’ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny lel in e tuɔtuɔ el ab ab ɔkm a: l’ɛlu in e tuɔtuɔ el a ɔkm agŋ eke ok wus a e lís, ɛtŋ l’ɛlu ɛrm mamn ɔkm ŋ e lís. Gbɛkɔ ow it eke k’anŋ in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny ab ɛm, ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, ŋ yɛji li b’ow l’ubr’ŋ es ɛsɛ likŋ lal af.
45011023	Eke batŋ Jwifɛl igŋ ɛl eci ɛrm tuɔtuɔ a ɛlu es, Nyam b’ow ɛwl oc ujr ɛl yogŋ a eke anym ɛm a -n’anŋn a, aŋke n’ɔny abusu eke li k’ujr wɛl ɛm.
45011024	Tasi ɛm a, ŋ, akp ɔfr ɛm e likŋ lal el. Nyam ubr’ŋ es ɛtŋ oc ujr’ŋ likŋ eke wɛl ewl ɛm, ŋ ec’a ow elm elel eke wɛl ki kokr a. Jwifɛl ec’a, ɛl -l’el likŋ a eke wɛl ewl a ec’ál. Ow sosiɛm, ow b’ow ɛw fuɛfuɛ eke Nyam k’ujr ɛl likŋ na eke ow el ow ɛm -l’ɛlil -l’okr ɔkm a.
45011025	Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin Nyam e lís e low e lɔl es ke m’erur eke mi ki yɛgm ɔny uwr any, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny eke elmn Jwifɛl a, k’ócrmn ɔny sosi eke eel ɛsɛwru. Israɛl eyŋ ec’ogog nyam k’ow ɛgŋm eke k’iri low, ɛtŋ ow b’ow anŋ ibn toŋ bake ɛb ɛb ɛjec’a e nɛny a nimum ɛwl ow Nyam ogŋ.
45011026	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a Israɛl eyŋ tasi a fɛŋ b’ow ɛŋn sel, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: Es Eb Ɛlu Ɛs a b’ow anŋ Jerusalɛm ow. Li b’ow n’ɔny Jakɔb ec’eb a eci low any ɔbr a l’oc es.
45011027	Ɛtŋ Admaga igŋ af dad ninɛ: kin sinm a eke mi b’ow mi kok ɛl ab lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ɔny ɛl e sikpl a m’oc es a.
45011028	-L’ɛgŋm Amani Mamn a -l’ebm, ow ɔŋ -l’ɛwl -l’el Nyam ec’efnu ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɔny, ow akpl ɔny eci. Ke Nyam eke sɔsum ot ɛl a, in ec’agŋ eke wɛl k’el eci. Li b’erur wɛl ɛl lagŋɛl sosiɛm.
45011029	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka Nyam ɛwlm ébm ob eke li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ a, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke li bi sɔsum l’ot a, l’ígŋm l’ɛlum wɛl es lɛgŋ kaka.
45011030	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɔny ɔbar Nyam any, kɔ caca ɛm a, Jwifɛl anake ɔbr Nyam any, ke ow ɔŋ, ɔny ɛŋan Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a.
45011031	Ɛtŋ ɛl ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ ow b’ow el: sica ɛl yɛji, -li b’ow -l’ɔtu -n’ɛŋn Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a, ɔny eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a eke Nyam ɔny a sosiɛm eci.
45011032	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ ɔnym ɛlum, ow sosiɛm Nyam ɛgb ɛl es -li kok ów eke -l’erurir a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm wɛl fɛŋ in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a.
45011033	Nyam ec’ob ɔny a agb nawrɛ tasi! In e sɛwr a lel in e low any uw ab ab ɔtu nɔnɔ, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum uwm in ec’ów eke li bi dad l’ucu es ab any, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum irim in ec’ów eke li bɛbm l’ok es a. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ:
45011034	Bwo uw Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci tutr ab any ee? Bwo ɔtu eke k’ɔm’n ów ee?
45011035	Bwo ikŋ anym ɔŋ Nyam ob, eke sica Nyam yɛji k’ɔwr ɔŋ’n ee?
45011036	Ɛgŋ kaka, aŋke in ɛm fɛŋ b’anŋ ow, in ɛm fɛŋ ɛcr anŋ ɛtŋ el in eci. Anygbɛl él Nyam eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
45012001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ɔny ɛy eci sɔrŋ ikŋ. Ow sosiɛm, m’am ɔm ɔny ów eke k’ocr ɔny ec’ɛgŋ el a nimum lele ɔny ec’owr anŋ ab ab ápr ir, ɛsɛ egb waw ek’ayl ke akpl af. Na anake el nuŋ igŋ tasi a ek’it eke k’ɔŋn in a.
45012002	K’ùsr wus eke s’ir af a ec’agŋ ɛm ec’ów a jam, kɔ yɛ̀br Nyam itŋn ɔny e tutr a nimum. Ɛbɛn ke ɔ́tur uwr yec’eke l’erur ab any: yec’eke akpl, yec’eke akpl’l sos ɛm lele yec’eke iy nɛny bɛbmn ab ab.
45012003	Bibm ɛm ec’ob ap ɔfr ɛm a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m a sosiɛm, m’am dad ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ eke k’ocrm in sosi ɛgŋ ligbɛl. Kɔ òkr nuŋ ɛm es, ke jɛ́jr ɔny sosi okr ɔmn a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛy ab ɛm.
45012004	Tasi ɛm a, ɛy e sos megl ab ɛm susu ogog nɔnɔ anŋ, kɔ ɛl fɛŋ -li kokmn juma nɛnyɛmbri nyam a.
45012005	Nɛnɛ anake s’anŋ Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm a. S’ɛny nɔnɔ, kɔ ɛy fɛŋ a s’el sos megl nyam. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’okr af ɛy ɔfr ɛm, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’usu ek’anŋ a, ɛsɛ sos megl nyam ec’ogog ogog ec’ab af.
45012006	Bibm ɛm, Nyam ɔŋ ɛy sob ap ɔfr ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛŋn in eci. Ow sosiɛm, ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ek’el odad dad eci ɛsɛ kokoba ɔb ɛs af a, ke li dád yec’a eke okr af ɛy ec’ɔmn ab ab a.
45012007	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ek’el juma ec’abu ɛlum eci, ke n’ám kok abu ɛlum ɛs e juma, ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɛŋn bibm ek’el low yɛgm eci, ke n’ám yɛgm agŋ low,
45012008	ke ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn bibm ɛgŋ e sos es atr ec’a, ám atr agŋ sos es. Ɛgŋ ek’am ɔŋ agŋ ob a, ɔ́ŋ ɛrm nyam ɛm, ɛgŋ ek’am nyimn agŋ a, nyímn ɛl gbragbra kok ɛm. Ɛgŋ ek’am ɛlum ɔgbɔru abu a, ɛ́lum ɛl abu sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
45012009	Ke ɔny ec’erur a él nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm; ìfan low ŋuŋ kok, ke úcur low mamn e kok ɔnyn es.
45012010	Èrurir ɔny ɔfr ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm, ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl af. Èel agŋ eke b’ogŋ es ɛlum ɛl lawlɛl.
45012011	Kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma gbragbra kok ɛm, ke sos am kaka k’ánm ɛm, ke ow él ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm.
45012012	Ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ɔny e low ɔmn a sosiɛm. Ɔ̀nyn ɛrm susu gbre ij ɛm, ùcur Nyam ŋɔŋn ɔnyn es.
45012013	Ɛ̀lumn Nyam ec’agŋ ek’ɔny es abur a abu, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ bɛ́bmn sos ebr agŋ a eke b’ow ɔny ogŋ a sɛnyn sɛnyn.
45012014	Ìbrmn Nyam e low mamn ɔŋn agŋ eke b’ijr ɔny gbre a, ìbrmn low mamn, kɔ ow k’él low ŋuŋ.
45012015	Ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm agŋ a eke b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ab ab, ke íkŋn ɔŋn, agŋ a eke am ikŋ ɔŋn ab ab.
45012016	Nɛny ókr ɔny af ɔny ɔfr ɛm. K’èel es ɛfuu, kɔ ɛ̀gŋn es is ɛm e juma kok ebr. K’ɔ̀nyn tutr eke ɔny eel agŋ eke uw low fɛŋ any.
45012017	Low ŋuŋ eke ɛgŋ kok ɔny a, kì kokr k’ɔbar ir any, kɔ ɔ̀ɔl low mamn kok es agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af.
45012018	Eke ow el ɔny obi ɛm, ɛtŋ ow ɔtu eke ow k’el ɛbɛn, ìir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm agŋ fɛŋ ab.
45012019	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl, low eke ɛgŋ kok ɔny a, ɔny obi kì kokr ir, kɔ ɛ̀gbr Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab es kok ow e low. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛm mi b’usr ɛgŋ usu mi kok low eke wɛl kok’r a! Ɛm mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ek’it eke k’ɛbm a!
45012020	Gbɛkɔ li dad yɛj’eke: Eke ŋ ec’ifnu namn am ɔny, ɔ̀ŋ’n ob l’íj, eke mij amn am ɔny’n, ɔ̀ŋ’n mij l’ɛ́gŋ. Eke batŋ bi kok ɛbɛn a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ almali ek’am ot ok’r nuŋ af.
45012021	Kì yɛb low ŋuŋ k’akm’ŋ es, kɔ òc low mamn akmn low ŋuŋ es.
45013001	Ow it ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ɛlum agŋ ek’ɔnym es ɛw ab a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɛm es ɛw fɛŋ b’anŋ ow, ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’ɔnym es ɛw ab a, b’ɛw agŋ es aŋke Nyam ɔŋ abusu.
45013002	Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋ nyam am ɔny low es ɛw ɛsɛl ab a, ke Nyam e low a eke ɛgŋ eb ab ab anake n’ɔny low a, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke ɛ́gŋm ɛluam ɛl a, ɛl obi ɛl obi am eb jɛj ok ɛw sos.
45013003	Eke wɛl am kok low mamn, wɛl ɔtum eke k’uru agŋ ek’ɛw ɛy es a, kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke k’uru ɛl eke wɛl am kok low ŋuŋ. Erurm eke k’uru es ɛw ɛsɛl ee? Ek’ow el ɛbɛn a, kòk low mamn, -li b’ow -l’aw’ŋ.
45013004	Tasi ɛm a, es ɛw ɛsɛl am kok Nyam eci juma yec’ɛtŋ ke -ni nyimn’ŋ ɛy low mamn ɛm. Gbɛkɔ eke am kok low ŋuŋ, ow it eke erŋn k’ɔny’ŋ. Tasi ɛm a, es ɛw ɛsɛl ɔny abusu eke k’ɛw low ɔŋ’ŋ, ɛtŋ ow elm ɔfr ɔfr nɛnɛ cɛ! Eke es ɛw ɛsɛl b’ɛw low ɔŋ ɛgŋ, ke -n’am kok Nyam e juma, -n’am ɛlu Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ɔkm ɛgŋ eke bi kok low ŋuŋ a e lís.
45013005	Na sosiɛm ow it eke si k’ɛlum es ɛw ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ow elm Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a eke si k’aru s’ɛgb es a cɛ eci, kɔ eke ɛy e tutr ɛm a, s’uw any eke ow el low mamn a sosiɛm.
45013006	Ɛtŋ low na sosiɛm yɛji anake b’ɛnmn nɛmpo a. Tasi ɛm a, juma kok ɛsɛl a eke b’ibr ow eci labm a, Nyam in obi abul ɛl ow e juma.
45013007	Ɔ̀ŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ yec’a ek’it eke ki kokr ɔŋn in a: nɛmpo fɛŋ ek’it eke ki sɔgr ɔŋn in a, sɔ̀gr ɔŋn in; ke kɔprɛ ek’it eke ki sɔgr ɔŋn in a, sɔ̀gr ɔŋn in. Eke ow el ɛlum k’ɛlumn ɛgŋ, ɛ̀lumn in. Ɛtŋ ek’ow el sos k’usar ɛgŋ, ùsar ir sos.
45013008	K’ɔ̀nymn ɛgŋ kaka ec’ob ab, ek’ow elm erur eke k’ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm a cɛ e labm. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur agŋ ɛjec’a, kok ol a e low fɛŋ iy nɛny.
45013009	Tasi ɛm a, sol a fɛŋ eke uwr any ɛsɛ: K’ɛ́jum ŋ e yɔw oglog ŋ ec’igŋ. K’íbim ɛgŋ. K’íym mil. K’ócm nyamn ɛyr ɛm erurm ob ek’elm ŋ ec’a, lele ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab, ɔb okr af anŋ ol nyam na ɛm: B’ow erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af.
45013010	Eke ɛgŋ ɔny erur, li k’ɔtum li kokm ɛgŋ ɛjeci low ŋuŋ, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ow b’ɔŋ wɛl kok ol a e low fɛŋ iy nɛny.
45013011	Ɔny uwr lɛgŋ eke s’anŋ ɛm ab any: ow el wanci eke k’ufŋmn es ɔny e mɛmn ɛru ab ɛm! Tasi ɛm a, sel ɛŋn a titm ɛy akm lɛgŋ a eke s’ub Krist nawrɛ a.
45013012	Ow k’ow ibnm, lɛgŋ uk b’ow uwr ɛtŋ lɛgŋ owr b’ow ɛy ɔkm. Ow sosiɛm, s’íil ɛy ec’ów eŋuŋ a fɛŋ eke si bi kok ncok ɛm ab es. Ke si bɛ́bm sos usuayl ɛm ec’ɛb ir eci.
45013013	S’íir ɛb low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ɛsɛ lɛgŋ owr fitaŋ af: s’áru ob ij nɔnɔ lele mar ɛgŋ nɔnɔ ab s’ɛgb es. Si k’ágbr lɔsŋn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, si k’ír ɛb suksuk kok owi ɛm, ke si k’ánm ów es atar lele uwerŋ ogŋ ab e low ɛm.
45013014	Ànŋn ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist anŋ ab af. Eke ów aw eŋuŋ a ek’anŋ ɔny ɛm a b’erur eke k’ɔdu im ok ɔny low ŋuŋ ɛm, k’ɔ̀ŋan in abusu.
45014001	Ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a ebr, ke kí dadmn low ŋuŋ in e tutr eke li b’ɔny ab af.
45014002	Oglog ke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny tutr eke l’ɔtu e li k’ij ob fɛŋ, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a, k’íjm ndey ke n’am ij suw obi.
45014003	Ɛgŋ a eke b’ij ob fɛŋ a itm eke k’ifn ɛgŋ a eke íjm ob bɛb a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke íjm ob bɛb a itm eke ki jɛj ɛgŋ a eke b’ij ob fɛŋ a e low ok, aŋke Nyam in obi ɛgŋ eb’r.
45014004	Ŋ, bwo el’ŋ eke ki jɛj Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma kok ɛs e low ok ee? Ke n’ínym es afr oglog ke l’ɛ́y wus, na in ec’Es Ɛw Ɛs a e low. Ɛtŋ li b’ow n’inym es afr, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔny abusu eke k’ucu ɔny’n es.
45014005	Ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu ek’am tutr eke sɛgŋ bɛb ɔny any akm sɛgŋ ɛjec’a, ke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam in am tutr eke -li bɛbmn ɛl fɛŋ. Ow akpl cɛ ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔny ɔmn tasi ow eke n’am tutr ab ɛm.
45014006	Ɛgŋ a ek’am ok ereb sɛgŋ ec’araŋn a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci. Ɛgŋ a ek’am ij ob fɛŋ a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci, aŋke li b’ɔŋ Nyam bia in ec’ob ij a eci. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’íjm ob fɛŋ a, am kok ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci, aŋke in yɛji li b’ɔŋ Nyam bia.
45014007	Ɛy ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka ánm owr in obi eci, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka úwm in obi eci.
45014008	Eke s’anŋ owr, ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci s’anŋ owr, eke s’am uw, ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci s’am uw. Fɛŋ ɛm a, s’el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
45014009	Ɛɛ, Krist uw ɛtŋ n’anŋ luw ɛm l’igb, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́w agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub’r nawrɛ ab es, ɛl a eke uw lele ɛl a eke anŋ owr ab ab.
45014010	Kɔ ŋ, bla sosiɛm am jɛj esŋ jim e low ok ee? Ɛtŋ ŋ gbɛ, bla sosiɛm am ifn esŋ jim ee? Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ si b’ow s’im Nyam ec’any af, ke li jɛ́j ɛy e low l’ok.
45014011	Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl nɔn: Ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’anŋ owr, m’am ij nɛny m’ɛsɛ: ob ob pupukpaŋ b’ow ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛm ec’any af ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -li b’ow -li kɔklm ɛm ec’anygbɛl a.
45014012	Ow sosiɛm, ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ b’ow jɛj in e lís e low ok Nyam ec’any af.
45014013	Sica s’ɛ̀wr ɛy ɔfr eci jɛj ok owi ab es. Ke ow tasi eke k’ɛgŋn ebr a el: k’ócmn ob kaka ɛwmn es ɔny lisijim anym in eci wus ɛlu eci oglog in e low ŋuŋ ɛm ɛy eci.
45014014	M’uw any ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛm ow ayl’m sos ɛm eke ob kaka in obi ɛm a elm ob ek’ aylm. Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam am tutr ek’ob nyam el ob ek’aylm, ke ow el ob ek’aylm in eci.
45014015	Eke am ɔŋ esŋ jim ij gbre ob ek’am ij a sosiɛm, ke irm ɛb erur ɛm ij. Ob ij owi nuŋ af, kì ŋuŋn esŋ jim nyam eke in sosiɛm Krist uw a!
45014016	Ob yec’eke am ɛkan ɛsɛ ɔny ec’ob mamn af a, ɔtum eke k’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a abusu cak ɔny.
45014017	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a elm ob ij lele mar ɛgŋ ab e low. Kɔ Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a, nyim nyim el, ɛrm es ɛy lele sos ɛm iŋn a eke wɛl b’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala ɛm a e low.
45014018	Ɛgŋ a eke b’igŋ Krist nuŋ ɛbɛn a e low b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ yɛji b’aw’r.
45014019	Ow sosiɛm, s’ɔ́ɔl low yec’a eke b’is ɛrm es ɛy, ke b’ɛlum ɛy abu s’okr af s’imn anym eci ɔmn ɛm ab es.
45014020	Kì ŋuŋn Nyam eci juma a ob ij owi nuŋ af! Tasi, ob a fɛŋ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ij, gbɛkɔ ow akplm eke wɛl k’ij ob, eke ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ɛy low eke n’am ɛkn ɛsɛ sikpl af ab ɛm.
45014021	Ow akpl eke k’íjm ndey, k’ɛ́gŋm mar, s’úbr es s’ɛsɛ: kí kokm low kaka fɛŋ ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ esŋ jim ɛy wus a.
45014022	Yec’eke am tutr low na af a, ow ánŋ’ŋ ɛrm ɛm Nyam ec’any af. Ehe él ɛgŋ a eke low ɛ́ym sos ɛm wanci ab af eke li b’ucu low n’ɔny eke li ki kok a eci.
45014023	Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ nyam ek’am ij ob ke am bɛbar in ɛm eke ow akplm a, ɛgŋ ikŋ a, Nyam b’ow ɔb’r low. Tasi ɛm a, l’el ɛgŋ eke nɛny okrm af in ec’ɔmn ab ab, ɛtŋ low fɛŋ eke wɛl am kok ke elm ɔmn ɛm a, el sikpl.
45015001	Sica, ɛy a eke s’ij lɛc ɔmn ɛm a, ow it eke si k’ɛgŋ ɛl a ek’ɔnym lɛc na a ec’elel eke b’ɛkan ów a s’éb, ke si k’ɔ́lmn ɛy e low eke si b’erur a cɛ es.
45015002	Ow it eke ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ ki kok low eke b’akpl lawl sos ɛm in e low nimamn eci, ke ow ɛ́lum ɛy abu s’okr af s’imn anym eci ɔmn ɛm.
45015003	Krist ɔlm low eke l’erur ab es. Kɔ ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm a: Wɛwr a eke wɛl wɛwr’ŋ a ɛwl mɛny ok’m af.
45015004	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ sig ɛm e Nyam e Silɛl a fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔn a, el ɛy e low yɛgm eci. -L’it eke -li k’ɔŋ ɛy ɛrm susu lele sos es atr ab, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́ny low ɔmn.
45015005	Ke Nyam ek’in ɛm ɛrm susu lele sos es atr ab anŋ a, ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɔtur ɔny ɔfr ɛm a iir ɛb nɛny af okr ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Jesu Krist yɛgm ɔny sɛwl ab af.
45015006	Ɛtŋ ɛrm nyam ɛm lele lebl nyam ɛm ab, b’ow ɔtur kɔklmn Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs ec’anygbɛl a.
45015007	Ow sosiɛm a, ɛ̀gŋn ebarir ɔny ɔfr, ɛsɛ elel eke Krist eb ɔny Nyam ec’anygbɛl a ec’ab af.
45015008	M’am dad ɔny, Nyam ij nɛny nyam. Ow sosiɛm Krist ow el Jwifɛl e juma kok ɛs, yec’ɛtŋ ke ów a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛy lagŋɛl a, li kók ow iy nɛny.
45015009	Ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a am kɔklm Nyam ec’anygbɛl a, in e sɔrŋ ikŋ a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e Silɛl ab ɛm wɛl nɔn: Na sosiɛm, mi b’ow mi kɔklm’ŋ ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ec’araŋn ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ ŋ e nin a ec’ɛj.
45015010	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Nyam e Silɛl a dad ninɛ: Ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ, kòkr sos ɛm iŋn Nyam ec’agŋ ab ab.
45015011	Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ, kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Ke agŋ a fɛŋ kɔ́klm’n!
45015012	Ɛtŋ Esayi yɛji dad ninɛ: Jese eci bosu ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam b’ow ow. Li b’ow l’igb l’ɛw ɛbr ɛbr ab es, ɛtŋ ɛbr ɛbr a b’ow oc ɛl eci low ɔmn a ɛw’r af.
45015013	Ke Nyam eke b’ɔŋ agŋ low ɔmn a yíbr ɔny ɛrm es ɛy lele sos ɛm iŋn ab, ɔny ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm. Ɛbɛn ke ow ɔ́ŋ low ɔmn iy ɔny ɛm Abŋ Lala e lɛc ab ɛm.
45015014	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm obi ɛm a, m’uw any tasi eke ɔny, ɔnyn low erur tasi ɔny obi ɛm, uwr ów nɔnɔ any ɛtŋ ɔtur eke k’ɔmnin ów ɔny ɔfr ɛm.
45015015	Gbɛkɔ lɛl na e susu bɛb ɛm a, m’ɔtu mi dad ɛrm susu ɛm ów bɛb ek’it eke mi ki kɔkn ɔny a. Mi kok ɛbɛn, aŋke Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm
45015016	ɛw’m Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs, agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a eci. L’oc l’ɛw’m saw eke mi k’ɔb Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a él egb waw ek’apkl Nyam sos ɛm, ɛtŋ Abŋ Lala anake bi kok ke ob ap na b’el Nyam ec’a.
45015017	Na sosiɛm, eke m’okr af Jesu Krist ab a, ntotŋ ɔtu eke k’ok’m, juma a eke mi kok m’ɔŋ Nyam a eci.
45015018	Tasi ɛm a, eke ɛrm susu ɛm m’ɔtu mi dad low nyam, ke ow el yec’a cɛ eke Krist ɛcr ɛm ɛm kok a. L’ɛcr ɛm ɛm, n’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ɔny Nyam ec’ɛlum. Li kok low na sodad ebl ɛm lele ów kok ɛm ab,
45015019	li yɛgm in e lɛc a simɛny ɛwr ɛm lele ów any iti owi ɛm ab, Nyam ec’Abŋ a e lɛc ab ab. Ɛtŋ ow igŋ Jerusalɛm im toŋ ok Iliri e wus ab af, mi cɛcr Krist ec’Amani Mamn ab es nimum.
45015020	Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke mi ki cɛcr Amani Mamn ab es susu a cɛ eke agŋ k’uwm Krist any a. Mi kok ɛbɛn eke mi k’úsm êl ɛgŋ ɛjeci ec’êl lebn eke ɛlu nɔmu ɛm ab af.
45015021	Mi kok ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm ab af: Agŋ a eke wɛl ɔbm in ec’amani a okm a b’ow ɛkn’n, ɛtŋ agŋ ek’irim in e lís owi kaka a b’ow iri.
45015022	Sica susu nɔnɔ eke m’im m’ɔb Nyam e kokoba a, el low a eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ́ɔm im abusu eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ a.
45015023	Caca ɛm a, m’uwar ɛm e juma ogog aŋa. Ɛtŋ eke akpo nɔnɔ ɛm m’erur eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ a,
45015024	ɛm eci Ɛspany wus af eci ɛc im ɛm a, mi b’ow m’ow yogŋ. Ɛɛ, m’ɔny ɔmn eke mi k’ɛkn ɔny, ɛm e yogŋ eci ɛc im ɛm a, ɛtŋ m’am ɔmn ɔny ec’abu eke k’ɛlumn’m ke m’im a. Kaka fɛŋ yɛji, m’erur eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ bɛb.
45015025	Gbɛkɔ caca ɛm a, m’aam Jerusalɛm, Nyam ec’agŋ a ek’anŋ yogŋ a ec’abu ɛlum eci.
45015026	Tasi ɛm a, Maseduan lel Akayi ab eci ɔmn ɛsɛl a bɛbm eke k’ɔkl os ɔ́ŋ Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ab ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru ek’anŋ a.
45015027	-Li bɛbm eke -li k’ɛlum wɛl abu, gbɛkɔ nawrɛ ɛm a, ow el labm ek’anŋ ɛl af. Maseduan lel Akayi ab eci ɔmn ɛsɛl a elm Jwifɛl, gbɛkɔ, -n’ɛŋn Jerusalɛm e Jwifɛl eke b’us Krist jam a ec’abu ɛm, ob ɔny a ek’el Nyam ec’a. Sica ɛl yɛji, ow akpl eke ɛl e wus af aŋa ec’ob eke -n’ɔnyn a, -li ki cɛc wɛl ab.
45015028	Mi b’oc os a eke -l’ɔkal a m’ɛlu Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ec’agŋ a abu ɛm a, sica ow e jam a, mi b’ow m’im Ɛspany a, mi b’ow m’ɛcr ɔny ogŋ a.
45015029	Ɛtŋ m’uw any eke lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ a, mi b’ow m’ow lele Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a nimum ab.
45015030	Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yec’eke m’am ibrm ɔny a, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist sosiɛm lele Abŋ Lala ec’erur a eke b’ɔŋ ɛy ab ab sosiɛm: dògŋnin ɛm ab Nyam eke b’ow ŋɔŋan ɔŋn’m ab ɛm.
45015031	Ŋɔ̀ŋan, yec’ɛtŋ ke mi k’ɛ́ym Jude wus ab af ec’agŋ a eke úbm Krist nawrɛ a ec’abu ɛm. Ŋɔ̀ŋan, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ec’agŋ a ɛ́gŋ abu ɛlum a eke m’am oc m’im Jerusalɛm a eb,
45015032	ow ɔ́ŋ ke m’ɔ́tu m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, ɛtŋ eke Nyam erur, ke m’ɔ́tu m’eb sel bɛb ɔny ab.
45015033	Ke ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab! Amɛn!
45016001	Ɛm obi m’am ɛrm ɛy lisijɔw sɛnyn Febe, eke el abu ɛlum lis Saŋkre e Nyamel ab ɛm a.
45016002	Èbr ir Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it Nyam ec’agŋ ec’araŋn ab af. Ɛ̀lumn in abu sakp sakp fɛŋ eke li b’ɔny ɔny ec’es abur a, aŋke l’ɛlum agŋ nɔnɔ abu ɛtŋ ɛm obi yɛji l’ɛlum im abu.
45016003	Ɛ̀sŋnin Prisil lele ɛc Akilas ab, eke s’am kok juma nyam Jesu Krist ec’a.
45016004	-L’ow eke -li k’irmn ɛl e sel a ɛm ec’a e sɔg sosiɛm eci, ɛtŋ ow elm ɛm sɔny cɛ ow itm eke mi k’ɛlu ɛl bia. Sinyamel a fɛŋ ec’agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji it eke k’ɔŋ ɛl bia.
45016005	Ɛ̀sŋnin Nyamel a yɛj’eke b’as luku ɛl ec’akŋ igŋ Nyam nuŋ a. Ɛ̀sŋnin ɛm lawl Epenɛt yɛji. In l’el ɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ek’itŋn ɛrm ɛm el Krist eci Azi wus ab af.
45016006	Ɛ̀sŋnin Mari eke kok juma nɔnɔ ɔny ec’a.
45016007	Ɛ̀sŋnin Andronikus lele Junias ab. -L’el ɛm ec’agŋ ɛtŋ ɛl ɛrŋ ɛm anake lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm s’anŋ sobel ɛm a. -L’el ɛrm ɛsɛl eke leg nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ -l’ikŋ anym -l’ub Krist nawrɛ gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’anŋ jam.
45016008	Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ amua fɛŋ yɛji: Ampliatus ek’el ɛm lawl sɛnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm.
45016009	Urbɛn ek’am kok Krist eci juma ɛy ab a lele ɛm lawl Sakis ab.
45016010	Apelɛs ek’ɛlu in e cɛcɛ kok ɔkm Krist e nawrɛ ub ɛm, lele Aristobul ec’akŋ ec’agŋ ab ab.
45016011	Erodiɔn ek’el ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a, lele Narsis ec’akŋ ec’agŋ ek’ub Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nawrɛ ab ab.
45016012	Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ lisijɔwɛl a ek’el Trifɛn lele Trifɔs ab a. -N’am kok juma nɔnɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci. Ɛ̀sŋnin agŋ ɛsɛ: ɛm lisijɔw sɛnyn Pɛrsida eke in yɛji kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma nɔnɔ a.
45016013	Rufus ek’el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ɛgŋ sɛnyn eke sɔsum oc, lele lis ek’ɛm yɛji anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm lis af a.
45016014	Asɛnkrit, Flegɔn, Ɛrmɛs, Patrobas, Ɛrmas lele agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijɔwɛl ek’anŋ ɛl ab a.
45016015	Filolɔg lel ɛy Juli ab, Nere lele lisijɔw ab, Olɛmpas lele Nyam ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛl ab a.
45016016	Ɛ̀sŋnin ɔny ɔfr ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijɔwɛl ab af. Krist e Sinyamel a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ɔny.
45016017	Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin low yec’eke m’am dad ɔny: ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm agŋ a eke bi bubr Nyamel ec’agŋ ɛm a e lís. -L’ɔtu eke -li k’ɔny ɔmn ɛsɛl a -l’ok wus, sodad a eke -li b’ow -li dad -l’ok low yɛgm a eke ɛŋan ab af a. Kpàbr es ɛl e lís,
45016018	aŋke agŋ amua am kokm Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma ij. Ɛl obi e lok a e juma nana -li bi kok. Ɛl e sodad ebl eke -li b’ok mij ab ɛm lele ɛl e nɛnym ɔb e sodad eke b’iŋn sos ɛm ab ab, -li b’ɛju agŋ a ek’uwm low ŋuŋ any a.
45016019	Nawrɛ, ɔny ec’ɛlum a, agŋ a fɛŋ uw any; ow ɔŋ, ɔny sosiɛm, m’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Gbɛkɔ m’am erur eke sɛwr k’iy ɔny ɛm gbɔŋ low mamn kok eci, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́wr ɛrm arur low ŋuŋ ɛgbr es.
45016020	Ow k’ow ibnm, ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam a b’ow kikn Satan es ɔny ec’akr ew.
45016021	Timote ek’am kok juma ɛm ab a, am ɛsŋn ɔny. Lusius, Jasɔn, lele Sosipatɛr ab ek’el ɛm ec’agŋ a, ɛl yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny.
45016022	Ɛm, Tɛrsius eke mi nɔn lɛl na a, m’am ɛsŋn ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’ɔny okr ɛy af ab ɛm.
45016023	Gayus am ɛsŋn ɔny, m’ij utu in ogŋ yogŋ ɛtŋ Nyamel nimum b’as luku in ec’akŋ a. Eras ek’el ɛb ec’os es ɛw ɛs a lele ɛy lisijim Kartus ab am ɛsŋn ɔny. [
45016024	Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab. Amɛn.]
45016025	Anygbɛl él Nyam eci! N’ɔny abusu eke li k’ɔŋ ɔny ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke m’am dad Amani Mamn ab ɛm Jesu Krist e lís ab af. Amani Mamn na ɛm, Nyam ɛlu low a eke lɔl es god’ɛtŋ a ɔkm,
45016026	ɛtŋ sica, ow ɛru es usuayl ɛm. Sica agŋ a fɛŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ɔtu eke k’uw’r any kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e silɛl ab ɛm. Nyam a ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a ɛlu abusu na es, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ úb’r nawrɛ ke ɛ́lum’n.
45016027	Anygbɛl él Nyam ek’in sɔny coco ɔny sɛwr a eci! Anygbɛl él in eci Jesu Krist ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci! Amɛn!
46001001	Ɛm Pɔl, Nyam ɛsŋ’m aŋke l’erur eke mi k’el Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs. Ɛy lisijim Sɔstɛn ab e nin ɛm,
46001002	m’am awŋ Nyamel ek’anŋ Korɛnt, agŋ a eke el Nyam eci ɛl ec’ɔmn a eke okr af Krist ɛm a, lɛl na. Nyam am ɛsŋ ɛl eke -li k’ir ɛb ow eci, ɛsɛ agŋ a eke usu fɛŋ bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm ab af. L’el wɛl eci Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛs’elel eke ɛy yɛji l’el ɛy ec’ab af.
46001003	Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy!
46001004	M’ɔ́pim eke mi k’ɛlu Nyam bia ɔny eci, ów amamn a eke Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm n’ɔŋ ɔny a eci.
46001005	Ɛɛ, Nyam ɛcr Krist ɛm ɔŋ ɔny ów amamn fɛŋ in e juma a eci, ke ow el in ec’ejagb a ec’any uw, ke ow el lɛc eke wɛl k’ɔny ɔb mɛwl ɛm in ec’odad a e kokoba.
46001006	Low nawrɛ, aŋke wɛl ɔb Krist ec’amani ok ɔny ɛtŋ ucur ow e low ɔnyn es kikri.
46001007	Ow ɔŋ caca ɛm a, Nyam ec’ob ap kaka anm ek’akm ɔny, lɛgŋ na eke am ekur eke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu k’ɛlu sos ɔkm a.
46001008	In anake li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny ínymn es kikri toŋ ókr nuŋ a. Ɛbɛn a k’ow ɔnymn low ɔbr kaka, lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist b’ow ow a.
46001009	Nyam el cɛcɛ, in anake l’ɛsŋ ɔny eke ki cɛcr sel ɛŋn Jim ek’el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab a.
46001010	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny eke nɛny k’okr ɔny af, ke ɛm bubr owi k’ánm ɔny ec’araŋn a. Òkar af tasi abŋ ɛm lele tutr ɛm ab.
46001011	Ɛɛ, agŋ lisijimɛl, Klowe ec’akŋ ec’agŋ a dad’m eke irirm in anŋ ɔny ɛm.
46001012	Kin low a eke m’erur eke mi ki dad a: ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ am dad in ec’ek’erur. Ɛgŋ na b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Pɔl eci." Ɛjeci na b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Apolɔs eci." Ɛjeci na b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Piɛr eci." Ɛjeci nyam yɛji b’igb ke dád ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Krist eci."
46001013	Kɔ Krist e li cɛc ee? Kɔ Pɔl wɛl ɛw olikŋ af ɔny ec’ee? Kɔ Pɔl e nin ɛm wɛl ok ɔny mij nuŋ ee?
46001014	M’am ɔŋ Nyam bia, aŋke m’okm ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka mij nuŋ, ek’ow elm Krispus lele Gayus ab cɛ.
46001015	Nɛnɛ a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum dadm eke ɛm e nin ɛm wɛl ok ɔny mij nuŋ.
46001016	Ɛɛ! Nawrɛ, m’am ɔkn eke m’ok Stefanas ec’akŋ a yɛji mij nuŋ. Ow e jam a, mi k’ɔnym ɔmn eke mi k’ok ɛgŋ ɛjeci mij nuŋ.
46001017	Krist ɛram im mij ok nuŋ owi ɛm, kɔ Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb eci l’ɛrm’m, ɛtŋ ow elm agŋ e 'sɛwr' e sodad a n’ɔɔm im abusu eke mi k’oc mi kokr juma, yec’ɛtŋ ke Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a k’írmnm in ec’abusu a.
46001018	Tasi ɛm a, Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a ec’odad a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi, agŋ a ek’am irm kpab es Nyam e lís a eci. Gbɛkɔ ɛy a eke s’anŋ sel ɛŋn ec’ejagb af a ec’a, si b’ɛkn Nyam ec’abusu ɔny a.
46001019	Kin yec’eke wɛl nɔn Nyam Lɛl ɛm: M’ow m’ɔŋ ɛsɛwru e sɛwr a sel at ɛtŋ m’ow m’ɔny nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛsɛl eci nuŋ ɛm ɔny a m’oc es.
46001020	Sica bla lowi ɛsɛwru ɔtu eke ɛmɛny ki dad ee? Bla low any uw ɛsɛl ɔtu eke ki dad ee? Ɛtŋ bla ów ɛm apl ɛsɛl ɔtu eke ki dad ee? Bla lowi tasi -l’ɔtu eke ɛmɛny -li ki dad ee? Nyam yɛgm eke wus na eci sɛwr a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ.
46001021	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam in e sɛwr ab ɛm kok eke wus na ec’agŋ a ɔtum uwm’n any ɛl obi e sɛwr ab ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, Nyam ɛgŋ eb sɔg agŋ a eke b’ub amani a eke s’am ɔb a nawrɛ a, eke agŋ am tutr eke amani a el nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi bɔbɔ yɛji.
46001022	Jwifɛl am ibrm simɛny ɛwr eke b’iti any, ɛtŋ Grɛkɛl am ɔl yec’a eke -li b’ɛsŋ 'sɛwr' ab es.
46001023	Ɛy ec’a gbɛ, Mesi a eke wɛl ɛw olikŋ af ec’amani s’am ɔb. Na, low eke Jwifɛl k’ɔtum ɛgŋm ebm, ke Grɛkɛl b’ɛkn ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi af.
46001024	Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ a, Jwifɛl lele agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ec’a, -l’uw any eke Krist el Nyam ec’abusu ɔny a lele sɛwr ab ab.
46001025	Ɛɛ, yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛkn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ 'nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ' af a, ɔny sɛwr akm agŋ eci sɛwr a; ɛtŋ yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛkn Nyam ɛm ɛsɛ 'sos ɔnym' af a, ɔny lɛc akm agŋ e lɛc a.
46001026	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny eke ɛgŋn Nyam ec’ɛsŋ a ebr a, ɛ̀kan ɔny ec’ob eke eel. Ɔny ɛm a, 'ɛsɛwru' ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ b’ɛkan ab af a, nɔnɔ anm, lɛc ɛsɛl nɔnɔ yɛji anm, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ eke wɛl ew bosu amamn ɛm a yɛji anm.
46001027	Gbɛkɔ Nyam sɔsum yec’a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ af wus aŋa a, kokr ɛsɛwru ɛ́s. Nyam sɔsum yec’a ek’ɔnym sos wus na a, kokr agŋ a ek’ɔny lɛc a ɛ́s.
46001028	Ɛtŋ Nyam sɔsum yec’a eke ɔnym any a oc, yec’a eke ɔny sifn, elm ob kaka a, ŋuŋn yec’a eke agŋ b’ɛkn ɛsɛ ob ek’ɔny any af a.
46001029	Nyam kok ɛbɛn, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́lum mɛgŋel ɔkm in ec’any af.
46001030	In anake l’okr ɔny af Jesu Krist ab a, ɛtŋ ɛy ec’a, Krist el sɛwr a eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a. Nyam b’ɛcr in ɛm, óc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af. Krist ɛm, li b’ayal ɛy s’ir ɛb in eci, ɛtŋ li bi sɔg ɛy sikpl ec’abu ɛm.
46001031	Ow sosiɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af: Eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’ɛw sos, ke l’ɛ́w sos Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sosiɛm.
46002001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, lɛgŋ a eke ɛm obi m’ow ɔny ogŋ a eke mi k’ɔb ɔny Nyam e low a eke lɔl es ec’amani a, ow elm sodad ebl amamn m’otm oglog agŋ e 'sɛwr' a m’ocm.
46002002	Tasi ɛm a, ɔny ec’araŋn eke m’anŋ a, low nyam cɛ m’ɛgŋ m’eb eke mi k’ɔb ow ec’amani: Jesu Krist lel in ec’olikŋ af e luw ab ab.
46002003	Ɛtŋ eke m’ow yogŋ a, m’ɔnym sos, erŋn am ɔny’m ɛtŋ ɛrm mij am ok’m.
46002004	Ɛm ec’odad a lele low yɛgm ab ab ɔnym low kaka agŋ e 'sɛwr' a e sodad ebl amamn ab ab. Gbɛkɔ Abŋ Lala ec’abusu ɛm anake irir yec’a eke mi dad a ayl ɔny sos ɛm a.
46002005	Nɛnɛ a, ɔny ec’ɔmn a k’ɔtum anm agŋ e 'sɛwr' ab af, kɔ tasi a, Nyam ec’abusu ɔny ab af.
46002006	Sica ɛy, sɛwr tasi nyam s’am yɛgm agŋ a eke iy nɛny ɔmn ɛm a, gbɛkɔ sɛwr na elm wus na ec’a; ow elm wus na ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl e 'sɛwr' a eke wɛl b’ow ŋuŋn a.
46002007	Ɛy, s’am yɛgm agŋ sɛwr a eke am dad Nyam e low a e lɔl es agŋ ec’any af a e low. Gbɛkɔ gbuŋ ke wus ánŋ a, ke Nyam kok sɛwr na ŋ̂, yec’ɛtŋ ke si cɛ́c in ec’anygbɛl a in ab.
46002008	Wus na ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl ab ɛm e kaka uwm sɛwr ikŋ na any, aŋke blel -l’uwr ow any ana, blel -n’ɔɔm wɛl ɛwm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ a eke anygbɛl fɛŋ el in ec’a olikŋ af.
46002009	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ów anŋ ek’ɛgŋ ɛknm ke irim lɛgŋ kaka, ów eke n’ɔnym ow e tutr kaka; ów amua tasi anake Nyam bɛbm ok agŋ a ek’ɔny in ec’erur ab es a.
46002010	Ɛtŋ ɛy anake Nyam ɛcr in ec’Abŋ Lala ab ɛm yɛgm ɛy ów amua a. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala uw fɛŋ any, toŋ yec’eke lɔl es Nyam e tutr ɛm a yɛji, l’uw any.
46002011	Kɔ ɛgŋ e lokm e tutr e lɔl es a, bwo b’uw any ek’ow elm ɛgŋ a in obi ec’abŋ a cɛ ee? Ɛbɛn nyam coco, Nyam e tutr e b’ɔny a yɛji, ow b’el Abŋ Lala cɛ b’uw any.
46002012	Gbɛkɔ ɛy, Nyam ɔŋ ɛy in ec’Abŋ a. Na sosiɛm anake s’am tutrm ów ɛsɛ wus ec’agŋ ec’ab af a. Ɛtŋ na sosiɛm yɛji anake s’ɔtu eke si k’uw sob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛy ab any a.
46002013	Ɛtŋ s’am dadm sob ap amua e low agŋ e 'sɛwr' e sodad ebl eke s’uw any ab ɛm; si bi dad ɛl e low sodad ebl eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a bi yɛgm ɛy ab ɛm. Nɛnɛ a, si b’otar Nyam ec’Abŋ a ec’ów akr sodad ebl eke b’anŋ Abŋ ikŋ na ɛm cɛ ow a.
46002014	Ɛgŋ eke b’us in ec’ów eke b’aw’r a cɛ jam a, ɛ́gŋm yec’a eke b’anŋ Nyam ec’Abŋ a ogŋ ow a ebm. In ec’a, na nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi, ɛtŋ li k’ɔtum l’irim kaka. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ Lala cɛ b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ uw ów amua e jɛj ok owi any.
46002015	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yec’eke Abŋ Lala anŋ ɛm a, ɔtu eke ki jɛj ów fɛŋ ok, kɔ in, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum jɛjm in e low okm.
46002016	Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Bwo uw Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci tutr ab any ee? Bwo ɔtu eke k’ɔm’n ów ee? Gbɛkɔ ɛy, s’ɔny Krist e tutr a anŋ ɛy ɛm.
46003001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛm ec’a, m’ɔtum mi dadm ɔny odad ɛsɛ agŋ eke Nyam ec’Abŋ Lala a am nyimn af. Kɔ mi dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ agŋ eke erur eke k’ir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ ek’ɔnym Abŋ Lala af. Ɔny anŋn ɛsɛ ey abu ɛm af yec’ek’el ɔny ec’ɔmn Krist ɛm a.
46003002	M’ɔŋ ɔny mɛny mij ɛgŋn, ow eke ow k’el ob ij leg leg a, aŋke k’ɔtumn ijmn ob leg leg. Ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, k’ɔtumn cɛ,
46003003	aŋke am erurir eke k’iir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ ek’ɔnym Abŋ Lala af. Tasi ɛm a, ek’ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, nyamnɛyr lele ów ɛsu ab b’anŋ, ke anmn ɛsɛ agŋ ɛjec’ab af ee? Ke ɔny ec’ɛb ir a anm sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛsɛ agŋ a ek’ɔnym Abŋ Lala ec’ab af ee?
46003004	Eke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, Pɔl eci m’el," ɛtŋ ɛjeci nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm gbɛ Apolɔs eci m’el a," ke ki dadmn odad ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ ɛjec’a bi dad ab af ee?
46003005	Apolɔs, ke bwo ee? Ɛtŋ Pɔl, ke bwo ee? Ɛy Nyam e juma kok ɛsɛl cɛ. Ɛy ɛm Nyam ɛcr ɔŋ ɔny eel ɔmn ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam kok juma in ec’ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ’n ab ɛm.
46003006	Ɛm, m’ewl egb a, ɛtŋ Apolɔs ok’r mij, kɔ Nyam anake ɔŋ’n l’agb a.
46003007	Ow anake ɛgŋ a ek’ewl egb a lele ɛgŋ a eke ok’r mij ab ab elm low kaka a. Kɔ ɛgŋ a ek’ɔŋ’n l’agb a anake kok low a fɛŋ a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a, in l’el Nyam.
46003008	Ɛgŋ a eke b’ewl a lele ɛgŋ a eke b’ok mij ab ab el kpɛŋ. Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e juma a eke kok a e labm sɔg.
46003009	Tasi ɛm a, ɛy fɛŋ Nyam ab s’am kok juma, ɛtŋ ɔny eel Nyam eci ɔgm a. Ɔny cɛ ɛmɛny eel in ec’êl a eke l’us a.
46003010	Ɛm ec’ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m ab ɛm, mi sigm lebn nɔmu ɛm ab es ɛsɛ êl us ɛs mamn af, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci fɛŋ am us af yogŋ. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́w ɛrm, af yogŋ ec’us ab ɛm.
46003011	Lebn nɔmu ɛm a anŋ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ: ow ow el Jesu Krist. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛlum lebn ɛjeci nɔmu ɛm.
46003012	Ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’oc sika, jɛtɛ, mebn ey amamn, oglog likŋ, bɛny oglog papo, us lebn nɔmu ɛm na af.
46003013	Gbɛkɔ, ɛgŋ fɛŋ e juma a b’ow ɛru es kpata wɛl ɛkn jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, aŋke lɛgŋ a, al ligbɛl nyam b’ow anŋ eke b’ow ɛlu ɛgŋ fɛŋ e juma e kok a e sakpl a ɔkm.
46003014	Eke ɛgŋ nyam us êl ek’ij lɛc al a ec’any af, li b’ow n’ɛŋn ob ap.
46003015	Eke ow ɛcrm ɛbɛn, ɛtŋ in e juma a ɛtu al ab ɛm a, li b’ow l’irmn fɛŋ. In, li b’ow n’ɛŋn sel, gbɛkɔ ow b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uru es ubr al ɛm af.
46003016	Ɔny uwmn any eke eel Nyam ec’êl a, ke Nyam ec’Abŋ a ir ɔny ɛm ee?
46003017	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ŋuŋn Nyam ec’êl a, Nyam b’ow ŋuŋn’n, aŋke in ec’êl a el lala ɛtŋ êl a, ow ow el ɔny.
46003018	Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́jur in sosi. Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny ec’araŋn a am ocr in sosi sɛwru, ɛsɛ wus ec’agŋ ec’elel eke bi tutar ab af, ow akpl eke 'nuŋ ɛm k’uŋ’n' ke l’él sɛwru tasi.
46003019	Tasi ɛm a, wus ec’agŋ e sɛwr a, Nyam ec’a nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ. Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Nyam b’ɔny ɛsɛwru, ɛl obi eci kprakpr ab ɛm.
46003020	Ɛtŋ Nyam Lɛl cɛ ɛmɛny dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ uw ɛsɛwru e tutr ab any, l’uw any eke ow elm low kaka.
46003021	Ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum eke k’ɛw sos eke n’am us any ɛs kaka fɛŋ jam a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, fɛŋ el ɔny eci:
46003022	Pɔl, Apolɔs oglog Piɛr, wus na, sel, luw, caca ɛm lele lɛgŋ ek’anŋ anym am ow ab ab.
46003023	Fɛŋ el ɔny eci, gbɛkɔ ɔny, eel Krist eci ɛtŋ Krist el Nyam eci.
46004001	Ow akpl cɛ eke ki lɛɛr ɛy ɛsɛ Krist e juma kok ɛsɛl lele ob nyamn af ɛw ɛsɛl eke l’abul Nyam ec’ów nawrɛ eke lɔl es ab af.
46004002	Low cɛ eke wɛl b’ibrm ob nyamn af ɛw ɛsɛl a el: ke -l’el cɛcɛ.
46004003	Ɛm ec’a, ɔtur eke ki jɛjr ɛm e low okr, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɔtu eke ki jɛj ɛm e juma a ok, ow ɔnym any kaka; tasi a, mi jɛjm ɛm obi e juma m’okm.
46004004	Tasi ɛm a, m’am ɛkn eke ɛm e tutr ɛm a, m’ɔnym low kaka eke mi k’okr ɛm sosi ów af, gbɛkɔ ow elm ke ɛbɛn a mi k’ɔ́nym low ɔbr eci. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake bi jɛj ɛm e low ok a.
46004005	Ow sosiɛm a, gbuŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lɛgŋ a k’ow a, kì jɛjr k’okr. In anake li b’ow l’ɛlu yec’a eke lɔl es ncebn ɛm a ɔkm a, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔny sow tutr ek’anŋ mɛrm ɛm a l’ok ɔkm usu ayl ɛm. Ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow aw ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af.
46004006	Agŋ lisijimɛl, low a eke mi dad a ec’a, ɔny sosiɛm m’oc Apolɔs lele ɛm obi ɛm obi ab m’ɔkŋn any. M’erur eke mi ki yɛgm ɔny nyandrɛ na e liy a: "K’àfŋ ow a eke wɛl nɔn ab es k’im." Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́w sos ki dad k’ɛsɛ low yɛgm ɛs na ɔny any akm lawl nyam a.
46004007	Tasi ɛm a, bwo am ɔŋ agb akm awlŋɛl ɛjec’a jɛj ɛl owi ok ee? Kɔ fɛŋ a ek’ɔny a, ow elm Nyam ɔɔm’ŋ ee? Ɛtŋ ek’ow el Nyam ɔŋ’ŋ, bla sosiɛm k’ɛw sos, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ow’n elm ob eke ŋ ɛŋn ɔfr ɛm af ee?
46004008	Am kokr ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ów a fɛŋ cɛ ɔny uwr any af. Am ocar ɔny sosi ób ɔnyu! Ɔbr nuŋ kpɛkŋ am eel ɛ́b ebu ek’ɛy s’anm ɛm yɛji! Ow akpal ɔny gbɛ! Blel ɔny eel ɛ́b ebu ana, ɛy yɛji, blel s’el ɔny ab!
46004009	Ɛm e tutr ɛm a, ɛy ɛrm ɛsɛl a, Nyam ot ok ɛy agŋ a ek’ɔsŋ es a e jam, ɛsɛ agŋ eke wɛl ɔb low luw ec’af. Ɛtŋ wɛl ɛw ɛy an wus nimum ec’any af lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af ab.
46004010	Ɛy, wɛl am ot ɛy ɛsɛ 'eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ' ɛsɛl af Krist sosiɛm, kɔ ɔny, am otar ɔny sosi ɛsɛ 'ɛsɛwru' af ɔny lel Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm. Ɛy, wɛl am ot ɛy agŋ fuɛfuɛ, kɔ ɔny, am otar ɔny sosi lɛc ɛsɛl. Ɔny, wɛl b’ɛlum ɔny nɔnɔ, kɔ ɛy, wɛl úbm ɛy.
46004011	Toŋ sicaca ɛm, ɛmɛny namn am ɔny ɛy, mij amn am ɔny ɛy, s’ɔnym mob sus ɛm. Wɛl am ijr ɛy gbre ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ s’am adŋ es s’ɛc.
46004012	S’am ij gbre si kok juma ɛy obi ec’abu ɛm. Wɛl bi wɛwr ɛy, ke s’ám ibrm Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ s’ɔŋ agŋ a. Wɛl b’ijr ɛy gbre, ke s’ám ɛgŋ s’eb.
46004013	Wɛl bi cak ɛy, kɔ si b’atr agŋ ɛjec’a sos es. Toŋ yɛfɛnyna, agŋ ec’a, s’anŋ ɛsɛ lirŋ af suw egŋun eke agŋ papl es ɔwl ab af.
46004014	Mi nɔnm ów amua m’awm ɔny ɛ́s eke mi k’ɔŋ ɔny eci. Kɔ eke eel ɛm ec’ey amamn eke mi b’erur a, ow sosiɛm anake m’am ɛwar ɔny a.
46004015	Tasi ɛm a, eke agŋ fandi lɛw am ow yɛgm ɔny Krist ab ec’ɛb ir owi yɛji, ɔnymn ey ɛsɛl nɔnɔ. Kɔ ow elm ɛm anake ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ɛs af, m’ɔŋ ɔny sel ɛŋn a ek’anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke m’is ɔny Amani Mamn ab ee?
46004016	Ow sosiɛm a, m’am ibrm ɔny eke k’ebr ɛm e sɛwl a.
46004017	Ɛtŋ ow nuŋ af, m’ɛrm Timote ɛm ec’iy e m’erur tasi ke el cɛcɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm a ɔny ec’araŋn. Li b’ow li kɔkn ɔny sebr a eke bi nyimn’m ɛm lele Krist ab ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm a, yec’a eke mi bi yɛgm susu fɛŋ lele Sinyamel fɛŋ ɛm ab a.
46004018	Ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb tutr eke mi k’ow m’ɛwlm m’owm ɔny ogŋ a ij, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm am ɛw sos.
46004019	Gbɛkɔ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur, waa na ɛm cɛ, mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛkn tasi sós ɛwu amua e sodad ebl a, ke m’ɛkn tasi ɛl ec’abusu a yɛj’eke -n’ɔnyn eke -li ki kokr Nyam e juma a.
46004020	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a elm sodad ebl e low, kɔ abusu ɔny e low.
46004021	Lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ a, bla lowi am erurir ee? Kɔ m’ábu likŋni ab m’ow oglog kɔ m’ów ɛrm ek’erur iy ɛm gbɔŋ lele ɛrm frɔrɔ ab ee?
46005001	Wɛl am iri usu a fɛŋ ek’ɔny ec’araŋn a, nfaci ij owi nyam in anŋ, ɛtŋ low ikŋ a, in el low ŋuŋ kɔ kɔ kɔ eke Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ec’araŋn bɔbɔ yɛji in anm. Ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam in am ɛrum ow ɛs ɛy ab.
46005002	Ɔny, low nɛnɛ na am ok ɔny ntotŋ! Sos nana ow it eke ow k’ɔwr ɔny es; ɛgŋ nɛnɛ na, ow it eke ki kokr elel eke ɔtur eke ki kokr bake ógŋn in ɔny ec’araŋn a!
46005003	Ɛm ec’a, eke m’anŋ kpekpe yɛji, abŋ ɛm a m’anŋ ɔny ab. Ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ a eke kok low nɛnɛ a, mi jɛj in owi m’ok god’ɛtŋ, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn ɔny ec’araŋn cɛ ɛm anŋ af.
46005004	Àsr luku Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm, m’ow m’anŋ ɔny ab abŋ ɛm. Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’abusu ab ab,
46005005	ócr ɛgŋ ikŋ na ɛlul Satan abu ɛm eke li k’ij gbre in e sos megl ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e liy a ɛ́ŋn sel, lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ow a.
46005006	Sica ɔny, eke am ɛwr sos ke ɔnyn low ɔbr! Ɔny, uwr elel eke lijru tɛl cɛ b’ɔŋ farin a nimum inŋ ab any;
46005007	ɔ̀nyn sikpl e lijru sig a ocr es, ke éel agŋ ek’ ayl. Ɛbɛn a b’ow anŋn ɛsɛ futufutu owr eke wɛl kok ke lijru anm ɛm ab af, aŋke Nyam yɔyɔg ɔny es ɛtŋ Krist ec’egb waw e luw a anŋ ɛsɛ ɛy e Pak e licɛbli ab af.
46005008	Ow sosiɛm, si kókr Pak a futufutu eke lijru anm ɛm lele ɛrm ek’ayl ke ij nawrɛ ab. Si k’íjr futufutu eke wɛl kok lijru sig ab a ij, lijru ek’el ów eŋuŋ lele ɛrm suŋ ab ec’a.
46005009	Ɛm e lɛl a eke m’ikŋ anym m’awŋ ɔny ab ɛm, mi nɔn eke k’ɔ́nymn mɛcrer agŋ a eke b’ij nfaci ab ab.
46005010	Gbɛkɔ lɛl ab ɛm a, mi dadm ɔny eke ki kpabr es wus ec’agŋ a fɛŋ e lís! Nawrɛ, agŋ anŋ eke b’ij nfaci, b’erur os owi nɔnɔ, b’ɛju agŋ eb ob ij, ke b’igŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ. Blel ow el agŋ amua ana, ke wus na af k’ŋgbroŋn nimum nimum a!
46005011	Njaŋ, m’erur cɛ e mi ki dad ɔny eke k’ɔnymn mɛcrer agŋ a eke b’ij nin ek’el Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ke b’ij nfaci, b’iy mil, b’igŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ oglog bi cak ɛl lawlɛl a. Agŋ a eke b’ɛgŋ mar afŋn es oglog b’ɛju agŋ eb ob ij a, k’ùsr abu agŋ nɛnɛ ab, k’ìjr ob bɔbɔ yɛji!
46005012	-
46005013	Tasi ɛm a, kɔ ɛm ow it eke mi ki jɛj agŋ a ek’ubm Nyam nawrɛ a e low m’ok ee? Ɛl ec’a, Nyam anake b’ow jɛj ɛl owi ok a. Ɔny, agŋ a ek’el ɔny ec’araŋn ec’agŋ a e low ki jɛjr okr. Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ògŋn ɛgŋ ŋuŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a.
46006001	Eke odad b’anŋ ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ b’ocr low a im ɔŋn jɛj ok ɛsɛl eke uwm Nyam any a jɛj ok, ow a eke k’oc imn agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a ogŋ ab ee?
46006002	Ɔny, uwmn any eke agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a b’ow jɛj wus e low ok ee? Ɛtŋ eke b’ow jɛjr wus e low okr, ke ów ekekey nɛnɛ anake k’ɔtumn jɛjmn okmn ab ee?
46006003	Ɔny, uwmn any eke si b’ow si jɛj afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ów s’ok ee? Sica ayaf si k’ɔtum si jɛjm wus aŋa ec’ów s’okm ee?
46006004	Gbɛkɔ, eke b’ɔnyn jɛj ok owi ów amua ec’a, b’imn otr jɛj ok ɛsɛl eke ɔnym low kaka Nyamel ab a!
46006005	Ɛtŋ na eke m’am dad a, ɔny ec’ɛ́s. Ɔny ec’araŋn aŋa, ɛgŋ nyamni yɛji anm elm sɛwru eke k’ɔtu jɛj low eke b’anŋ agŋ lisijimɛl ɔfr ec’araŋn a ok ee?
46006006	Kɔ ow akpl tasi eke Krist ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim nyam k’ɔŋ lawl nyam dedeku jɛj ok ɛsɛl ek’uwm Nyam any a ogŋ ee?
46006007	Ɔny ec’a, ow akpl ek’uwr any eke ɔny ɔfr e dedeku ɔŋanin a el low ek’ɛlu ɔny wus! Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ k’ɛ́gŋmn ɛnyɛmbri yony e jɛj ok a nana ebmn ee? Bla sosiɛm k’ɛ́gŋmn eke ɔny lawlɛl ɛjec’a k’iy ob ek’el ɔny ec’a nana ee?
46006008	Ɔny nana anake eel ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl a, ɔny anake am iyr agŋ ɛjec’a mil a! Ke agŋ ɛjec’a, Krist ɛm ec’ɔny lisijimɛl cɛ.
46006009	Ɔny uwmn any eke ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl k’ow ijm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’aja ab ee? Ɛgŋ k’ɛ́ju ɔny! Agŋ a eke b’ij nfaci, b’igŋ sinyam yadŋ nuŋ, igŋ oglog yɔw eke b’ɛju lawl mɛbi owi ɛm, egŋ a eke b’ɛrum ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ab ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ɔyɔw af a lele egŋ a eke b’agbr lɔsŋn ŋgbafrɛ oto ab a, k’ow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.
46006010	Ɛbɛn nyam coco elu, agŋ a eke b’erur os owi nɔnɔ, már ɛgŋu, agŋ a eke bi cak ɛl lawlɛl lele agŋ a eke b’ɛju agŋ eb ob ij ab ab yɛji, k’ow okm Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a!
46006011	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, nɛnɛ anake ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb anŋ a. Gbɛkɔ ɛy e Nyam a yɔyɔg ɔny e sikpl ab es, l’ayal ɔny eke k’ir ɛb in ab, n’ɔŋ ɔny eel nyim nyim in ec’any af. Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm lele Abŋ Lala ab ec’abusu ɛm li kok.
46006012	Ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam bi dad ɛsɛ: "Fɛŋ e kok ec’abusu ɛru’m es." Nawrɛ, gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’am dad eke ow elm fɛŋ akplm ɛy eci. Mi k’ow mi yɛbm ob kaka fɛŋ ɔɔm im m’elm in ec’adu.
46006013	Bi dadr yɛji ɛsrɛ: "Ob ij, lok eci n’anŋ, ɛtŋ lok yɛji anŋ ob ij eci." Nawrɛ, gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ nyam, Nyam b’ow ŋuŋn ɛl a yony mum. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake kok ɛy e sos megl a, ɛtŋ ɛy e sos megl a el in eci. Li kokm ow nfaci ijr eci.
46006014	Nyam eke igbm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ luw ɛm a, b’ow oc in ec’abusu ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji igbm ɛy luw ɛm.
46006015	Ɔny uwmn any eke ɔny e sos a el Krist e sos ogog ogog ab ee? Kɔ m’ɔtu eke mi k’oc Krist e sos ogog nyam m’okr af facyɔw ab ee? Njaŋ, mi k’ɔtum!
46006016	Uwmn any eke ɛgŋ nyam eke okr af facyɔw ab a el sos megl nyam in ab ee? Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ke -l’okr af -l’el sos megl nyam.
46006017	Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’okr af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a, b’el nyam coco in ab abŋ ɛm.
46006018	K’òcr ɔny e sos megl a k’ijmn nfaci ab. Sikpl ɛjeci fɛŋ eke agŋ ɔtu eke ki kok a, elm sikpl eke wɛl bi kokm sos megl ab. Kɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam oc in e sos megl a am ijm nfaci ab, ow el low ŋuŋ eke n’am kok l’ɔbr in e sos megl a.
46006019	Uwmn any eke ɔny e sos megl a el usu lala a ek’el Abŋ Lala ec’ɛb ir usu ab ee? Abŋ Lala na anŋ ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ l’el Nyam ec’ob ek’ɔŋ ɔny. Ow sosiɛm a, ɔny, elmn ɔny obi ɔny obi ec’ij.
46006020	Nyam ɔl ɔny an ligbɛl ɛm eke k’eel ewi. Ow sosiɛm, òcr ɔny e sos megl a ɛlul in ec’anygbɛl a ɔkm.
46007001	Sica, m’am m’ow mi dad ɔny ów a eke bibrmn’m ɔny e lɛl ab ɛm a e low. Ɔny bi dadr eke ow’n akpl eke ɛgŋ igŋ in k’ɔ́nym yɔw.
46007002	Gbɛkɔ agŋ eke b’ij nfaci a sosiɛm, ke igŋ fɛŋ ɔ́ny in e yɔw, ke yɔw fɛŋ ɔ́ny in ec’igŋ.
46007003	Ke igŋ fɛŋ kók low yec’ek’el igŋ ec’eke ki kók in e yɔw e lís a, ke yɔw fɛŋ yɛji kók in ec’igŋ e lís ec’ek’it a,
46007004	aŋke yɔw k’ɔtum ocm in e sos a kokrm low yec’eke l’erur a: in e sos a, in ec’igŋ a eci. Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, igŋ yɛji k’ɔtum ocm in e sos a, kokrm low yec’eke l’erur a: in e sos a in e yɔw a eci.
46007005	Ɛgŋ lawl k’ɔ́nyn sos es lawl e lís, ek’ow elm Nyam eke k’ɔnyn abusu ŋɔŋan eci cɛ. Eke b’ow kokr ɛbɛn lɛgŋ tɛl eci yɛji, ke ow él nɛny af okr ɛm ki kokr. Kɔ ow e jam a, ɛ̀wal am ɛrur usu nyam; ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, k’ɔtumn ɔnynmn sos es ij, ɛtŋ Satan ɔtu eke k’ebr ow ɛm ɛju ɔny.
46007006	Low na eke m’am dad a, elm ol eke m’am ɔŋ ɔny, kɔ low cɛ eke m’am ɛw es m’ɔŋ ɔny.
46007007	M’am erur tasi eke agŋ a fɛŋ k’anŋ ɛl sɔny ɛsɛ ɛm af, gbɛkɔ Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ bibm nyam eke k’el in sɔny cɛ eci.
46007008	Gbɛkɔ agŋ a ek’anŋ ɛl sɔny a lele eŋnyɔw ab ab, m’am dad ɔny m’ɛsɛ: eke b’anŋn ɛsɛ ɛm af, ow el low nimamn ɔny eci.
46007009	Gbɛkɔ eke k’ɔtumn ɔnynmn sos es a, ɛ̀birir! Ow akpl eke k’ɛbirir, ow a eke k’anŋn low ám aw ɔny ijr ɔny gbre a.
46007010	-
46007011	Agŋ a eke ɛbirir a, m’am dad eke k’anŋn usu nyam, ɛs’elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in obi dad ab af. Igŋ itm eke k’ogŋ in e yɔw a, ɛtŋ yɔw itm eke k’ɛlu in ec’igŋ ab es. Eke l’ɛlu in ec’igŋ ab es a, ke n’ánŋ in sɔny oglog ke l’ɛ́gŋ l’eb l’okr ɛm ow ab.
46007012	Agŋ a eke ɛbirir ke ɛl e yɔw a oglog igŋ a ubm Nyam nawrɛ a, m’ɔny ów eke ɛl yɛji mi k’ɔm ɛl, ɛtŋ na ec’a, ow elm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dadm, kɔ ɛm m’am dad. Eke Krist ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ɔny yɔw eke ubm Nyam nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow erur eke ow k’ir ɛb in ab a, ow itm eke li k’ogŋ ow, ek’ow elm nawrɛ ub lis a sosiɛm.
46007013	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, eke nawrɛ ub lis nyam ɔny igŋ ek’ubm Nyam nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow erur eke ow k’ir ɛb in ab a, ow itm eke li k’ŋgboŋ ow ab, ek’ow elm nawrɛ ub ɛs a sosiɛm.
46007014	Tasi ɛm a, yɔw ɛc na ek’elm nawrɛ ub ɛs a titm Nyam nɔnɔ, in e yɔw a eke l’ɛbi a sosiɛm. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, igŋ ɛy a ek’elm nawrɛ ub lis a yɛji titm Nyam nɔnɔ, in ec’igŋ a eke l’ɛbi a sosiɛm. Blel ow elm nɛnɛ ana, ɔny ec’ey a blel anŋ ɛsɛ ey ek’itm eke Nyam k’ɛgŋ eb af, kɔ nawrɛ ɛm a, -l’ɛbm eke Nyam k’ɛgŋ eb ɛl.
46007015	Gbɛkɔ, ek’ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’ubm Nyam nawrɛ a am erur eke k’im a, l’ɔtu eke li k’im. Eke ow ɛcr nɛnɛ a, ɛgŋ lisijim a oglog ɛgŋ lisijɔw a ɔnym low kaka ɛgŋ yec’ab ab ij. Ùwr any cɛ eke Nyam, in ec’a ɛrm es ɛy ec’ɛb ir ɛm l’ɛsŋ ɔny.
46007016	Kɔ igŋ ɛy, ɔtu eke k’uw any eke b’ow sɔg ŋ ec’igŋ ab ee? Ɛtŋ kɔ yɔw ɛc, ɔtu eke k’uw any eke ŋ yɛji b’ow sɔg ŋ e yɔw ab ee?
46007017	Lɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny a, ɔny ec’elel a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛwr ɔny anŋn ab ɛm, am iir ɛb. Sica, eke ow elm mɛbi e low na eke mi dad a, ow it ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ir ɛb elel eke n’anŋn ab ɛm. Ol na anake m’am ɛw es Sinyamel a fɛŋ ɛm a.
46007018	Lɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ a, ke ubr likr es ŋ̂ ee? Ek’ow el ɛbɛn, ànŋ elel a ek’anŋn a! Eke l’ɛsŋ’ŋ a, ke k’ubrm likr es ee? Ek’ow el ɛbɛn, k’ìm catŋ k’ubr es!
46007019	Ke wɛl úbr likr es oglog ke wɛl k’úbrm es, elm low a eke el low tasi a. Low tasi a eke wɛl ki kok a el Nyam e low a eke dad a ec’ɛlum a.
46007020	Ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ánŋ in ec’elel a eke n’anŋn ke Nyam ɛsŋ’n a.
46007021	Eke Nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ a, kɔ adu el ee? Eke ow el adu el ke k’èbr ow e low ɛrm mij! Kɔ ek’ɔtu ek’el lewi, ke él kpɛkŋ.
46007022	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ nyam ek’el adu ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛsŋ a, el lewi ɛtŋ el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, ɛgŋ nyam ek’el lewi ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛsŋ a, el Krist ec’adu.
46007023	An ligbɛl Nyam ɛnm ɔŋ ɔny eel ewi. Ow sosiɛm, k’èel ɛgŋ ɛjeci e madu.
46007024	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ánŋ in ec’elel a eke n’anŋn ke Nyam ɛsŋ’n a.
46007025	Ibrmn ɛm ec’elel eke m’am ɛkan ededyɔw oto eke ɛbim egŋ a e lís owi. M’ɛŋnm ol kaka anm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ owm low na eci. Gbɛkɔ m’am dad ɔny ɛm ec’elel eke m’am ɛkan low a. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a ek’ɔny ɛm e lís a sosiɛm, ɔtur eke k’ɔnyn ɔmn ɛm ɛm.
46007026	Kin yec’eke m’am tutr a: lɛgŋ na ɛm e ses babur a sosiɛm, ek’agŋ ɛbirm, ow akpl ɛbɛn. Ɛɛ, ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke n’anŋn ab af.
46007027	Kɔ ɛbi yɔw ee? Ek’ɛbi yɔw ke k’ɔ̀l in ec’es ɛlu ij. Ɛbim yɔw ee? Ek’ɛbim yɔw ke k’ɔ̀l e k’ɛbi ij.
46007028	Gbɛkɔ, eke am ɛbi yɔw, ow elm sikpl kokm. Ɛtŋ eke dedyɔwli nyam ɛbi igŋ, in yɛji ow elm sikpl li kokm. Gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke ɛbirir a b’ow ij gbre nɔnɔ ɛl e sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛm, m’erur eke low nɛnɛ k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny.
46007029	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am dad ɔny eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mowrer e sɛgŋ a ɔfum ij. Caca ɛm ec’agŋ ek’ɛbi ɔyɔw a, kók ɛsɛ wɛ’n ɛbim af.
46007030	Ɛl a ek’am ikŋ ɔŋn a, kók ɛsɛ wɛ’n ikŋm ij af. Ɛl a ek’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a, kók ɛsɛ ow’n iŋnm wɛl af. Ke ɛl a ek’am ɔl mob a, kók ɛs’ɛbɛn mob a eke wɛ’n ɔl a in elm wɛl ec’af.
46007031	Ɛl a eke am ɛŋn ob ij wus ec’ɛb ir na ɛm a, kók ɛs’ɛbɛn wɛ’n ɛŋnm in ijm af. Ɛɛ, wus na ec’ów a ec’elel eke anŋn yɛfɛnyna a, k’ow anm ɛbɛn sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
46007032	M’am erur eke k’ɔnymn ɛrm mij kaka. Ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛbim yɔw a, b’ebr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ów ɛrm mij nɔnɔ, kok elel eke in owi k’awr ow.
46007033	Kɔ ɛgŋ nyam eke ɛbi yɔw a, b’ebr wus ec’ów ec’ɛrm mij nɔnɔ, kók elel eke in owi k’awr in e yɔw a,
46007034	ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ów yony a ec’araŋn li bi cɛc. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, yɔw nyam oglog dedyɔwli nyam eke ɛbim igŋ a, b’ebr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ów ɛrm mij nɔnɔ. -Li b’erur eke -li k’el ow eci nimum nimum, -l’oc ɛl ec’ɛgŋ el a pupukpaŋ -n’ɔŋ ow. Kɔ yɔw nyam ek’ɛbi igŋ a, b’ebr wus ec’ów ɛrm mij nɔnɔ, kók elel eke in owi k’awr in ec’igŋ a.
46007035	M’am dad low na ɔny e nimamn eci, kɔ ow elm gbre eke mi k’ɔŋ ɔny ijr eci. M’am erur eke ki sɔsumn yec’eke akpl a ocr, ow ɔ́ŋ ke úcur Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔnyn es, éel in sɔny coco eci.
46007036	Sica, eke igŋ nyam ek’ɛsu yɔw a, ow ec’erur a am afŋn in es, ɛtŋ n’am uru eke li ki kok low ɔbr ow e lís eke -li k’anm ow yony a, ow akpl eke igŋ a ki kok low e n’am ɛkn ek’el low tasi a. -L’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛbirir -l’ok es. Eke -l’ɛbirir a, ke na elm sikpl eke -li kokr.
46007037	Gbɛkɔ l’ɔtu eke li dad n’ɔŋ in ec’ɛrm a eke li k’ow l’ɛbim in e dedyɔw a, l’ɛruam ow ab yɛji. Eke li dad tasi n’ɔŋ in ec’ɛrm a, ek’ow elm atrm ɛm ɛtŋ l’ɔtu eke li k’ɔnyn sos es ow ec’erur a eke b’aw’r afŋn es a e lís, eke l’ɛbim ow ke ow akpl ɛbɛn.
46007038	Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ a ek’ɛbi in e dedyɔw a kok low mamn, gbɛkɔ in a ek’ɛgŋm eke k’ɛbi in e dedyɔw a kok ow akpl nɔnɔ.
46007039	Igŋ ɛy fɛŋ b’anŋ in ec’igŋ ab sɛgŋ a nimum eke n’anŋ owr a. Eke in ec’igŋ a b’uw a, n’ɔny abusu eke li k’ɛbi igŋ eke l’erur a, gbɛ ke l’él igŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm cɛ.
46007040	Gbɛkɔ ɛm ɛm ec’a, m’am ɛkn eke li b’ow n’anŋ ehe ɛm eke n’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke n’anŋn ab af. Ɛtŋ m’ɔny tutr eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a anŋ’m ɛm.
46008001	Sica ɔny e lɛl ek’awŋn’m ab ɛm, ibrmn’m eke wɛl ɔtu ek’ij mindey eke wɛl bi kokr egb waw ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ a. Ow a eke am dadr a, low nawrɛ: "Ɛy fɛŋ s’ɔny low na ec’any uw tasi." Gbɛkɔ low any uw na b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛw sos. Kɔ erur b’ɔŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a agb ɔmn ɛm.
46008002	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am ɔny tutr eke in uw low nyam any, ke li k’uwm elel eke wɛl b’uwr low any a.
46008003	Gbɛkɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam b’erur Nyam, ɛgŋ a, in yɛji Nyam b’uw’r any.
46008004	Low a ek’ibrmn’m a el: "Kɔ wɛl ɔtu eke k’ij ndey eke wɛl wawr egb ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ ab ee?" Ɛy s’uw any tasi eke Nyam nyam cɛ anŋ, ɛtŋ sinyam yadŋ a elm low kaka.
46008005	Nawrɛ, agŋ bɛb bi dad eke sinyam in anŋ afr lele wus aŋa ab. Ɛl ec’a, sinyam a nɔnɔ gbɛl ɛtŋ -li b’oc wɛl ɛsɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ af.
46008006	Gbɛkɔ ɛy ec’a, s’uw any eke Nyam nyam coco cɛ anŋ, ek’el ɛy Ɛs. In anake li kok ob ob fɛŋ a, ɛtŋ in eci anake s’anŋ owr a. Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛji, nyam cɛ anŋ, in l’el Jesu Krist. In e sabu ɛm li kok ob ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ ɛy yɛji, in ec’abu ab ɛm s’anŋ owr.
46008007	Gbɛkɔ ow elm ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ uwm low nawrɛ na any! Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, agŋ bɛb sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ a ɛcm ab. Ow ɔŋ caca ɛm a, eke -li b’ij ndey eke wɛl kokr egb waw a, ke -n’am ɔny tutr eke ndey a, sinyam nawrɛ tasi wɛl oc kokr egb waw ɔŋ. Ɛtŋ eke -l’eel fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a, -li bi tutr eke ndey a b’ɔŋ -l’el agŋ ek’aylm Nyam ec’any af.
46008008	Ke ow elm ob ij k’ow ɔɔm ɛy si titam Nyam. Eke s’ijm yɛji, s’irmnm ob kaka, ɛtŋ eke s’ij yɛji, si k’ow s’ɛŋnm ob kaka.
46008009	Abusu ɛru ɔny es low fɛŋ ek’erurir e kok eci. Gbɛkɔ ɛ̀wr ɛrm, abusu na ek’ɛru ɔny es a itm eke k’ɔny agŋ a ek’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a ok wus!
46008010	Tasi ɛm a, ŋ ek’ɔny 'low any uw' a, eke ɛgŋ nyam ek’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a ɛkn’ŋ ek’anŋ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ usu am ij ob, kɔ ow k’ow atrm’n sos es eke li k’ij ndey eke wɛl kokr egb waw ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ ab ee?
46008011	Ŋ e low any uw a sosiɛm, esŋ jim a eke ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɔmn ɛm a, b’ow ɛy wus, in eke Krist uw in sosiɛm a!
46008012	Eke bi kokr sikpl ɛrŋ na ɔbar ɔny lisijimɛl, ɔ́ŋn ɛl ec’ɔmn fuɛfuɛ a abur es, ke Krist anake am kokr sikpl ɔbar a.
46008013	Na sosiɛm anake ob nyam eke mi b’ow mij, ke b’ow ɔny ɛm lisijim nyam ɛlu sikpl ɛm a sosiɛm, mi k’ow m’ijm ndey ij, yec’ɛtŋ ke mi k’ɛ́lum’n wus a.
46009001	Ɛm yɛji, abusu ɛru’m es eke mi ki kok low eke m’erur. Kɔ m’elm ɛrm ɛs ee? Kɔ m’ɛknm ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ee? Kɔ elmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma eke m’am kok a ec’ey ek’ɔsu ee?
46009002	Eke agŋ bɛb ec’a m’elm ɛrm ɛs yɛji, ɔny ec’a gbɛ, m’el. Tasi ɛm a, ɔny anake eel ɛm e juma eke m’uw kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a, ec’ey eke ɔsu a.
46009003	Kin odad eke m’am dad agŋ a eke am ok’m ów af a:
46009004	Kɔ ɛy s’ɔnym abusu eke si k’ɛŋn ob ij lele mar ab ɛy e juma a ec’ee?
46009005	Kɔ ɛy s’ɔnym abusu eke si k’ɛbirir nawrɛ ub lís nyam ab ee? Ɛrm ɛsɛl bɛb a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lisijimɛl a lele Piɛr ab kok ɛbɛn!
46009006	Kɔ ɛm lele Barnabas ab cɛ anake ow it eke si ki kok juma ɛjeci gbuŋ ke s’ɛ́ŋn ob s’ij ab ee?
46009007	Eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ ɛgŋ aŋgase a, ɛgŋ a am sɔgm labm kokm aŋgase e juma. Eke wɛl b’ewl likŋni a, wɛl b’ij in ec’ey a. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl b’ɔsu mɛbob a, wɛl b’ɛgŋ ɛl e mɛny mij a.
46009008	Kɔ ów amua eke m’am dad a, agŋ ec’ɛb ir ɛm cɛ ow anŋ ee? Kɔ Mois ec’ ol a am dadm low nyam coco ab ee?
46009009	Tasi ɛm a, Mois ec’ol ab ɛm wɛl nɔn: K’ow ocmn meb ɔnynmn id eke wɛl ucu meb am kikn may es a nɛny es. Am tutar eke Nyam, sed ec’ɛrmij n’am ebr ee?
46009010	Oglog ɛy e low n’am tutr sodad na ɛm ee? Nawrɛ ɛm a, ɛy sosiɛm wɛl nɔn sodad amua. Ɛgŋ eke b’ewl egb a, b’ɔmn egb ey eke li k’ɛŋn l’ub. Ɛtŋ in a eke egb ub e lɛgŋ a, bi kok juma a yɛji b’ɔmn egb ey a eke k’ɛbm’n a.
46009011	Ɛsɛ agŋ eke b’ewl egb af, s’ewl Abŋ Lala ec’ów amamn a ek’anŋ afr ow a ɔny ɛm. Eke s’am ub ɔny e wus af aŋa e mob a ek’ɔnyn a e tɛl, ke ow ɛny nɔnɔ gbɛl ee?
46009012	Eke agŋ bɛb ɔny abusu kok ɛbɛn ɔny af, ke ɛy tasi anake s’ɔny abusu na s’akm ɛl a! Gbɛkɔ ɛy s’ɛgŋm s’ɛlum abusu na e s’ɔny a e low ɔkm. Kɔ s’ɛgŋ nana low fɛŋ s’eb, Krist ec’Amani Mamn a e wus eke k’ɛym eci.
46009013	Ɔny, uwr any ek’agŋ a e bi kok juma Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a, b’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ij, mob a eke wɛl b’is Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm a. Ke ɛl a eke bi kok segb waw a, b’ɛŋn ow eke k’ɛbm ɛl a segb waw a eke -li bi kok ow e low ab ɛm.
46009014	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ abusu eke agŋ ek’am ɔb Amani Mamn a, k’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ij juma na eke -n’am kok ab ɛm.
46009015	Gbɛkɔ ɛm, abusu na eke m’ɔny a, m’ibram ow e low kaka, ɛtŋ eke mi nɔn ow e low aŋa, ke ow elm ow ec’ibrm eci. Njaŋ, m’átm m’ibram ɛm ec’abusu na e m’ɔny a, ɛtŋ ow b’ok’m ntotŋ. Mi b’ow m’erur e mi k’uw, ow a eke mi ki yɛb ɛgŋ ɔny ɛm eci ntotŋ na oc es a.
46009016	Ow elm ów m’erurm eke mi k’ɔpr Amani Mamn a eke m’am ɔb a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, ow el low ek’it eke mi ki kok. Gbre él ɛm eci eke m’ɔbm Amani Mamn a e kokoba!
46009017	Blel ow el ɛm obi mi sɔsum juma na m’oc m’am kok, m’ɔ́ny ow e labm sɔg. Kɔ ek’ow el juma ek’it eke mi ki kok a, m’am kok yec’a cɛ ek’it a.
46009018	Ɛtŋ ɛm e labm sɔg el bogŋ ec’ee? Ɛm e labm sɔg a el ke m’ɔ́b Amani Mamn a ɔfr ɛm, ke mi k’úsm ɛm ec’abusu ec’ów ek’anŋ ɛm a e low jam.
46009019	Ɛm, m’elm ɛgŋ kaka ec’adu; gbɛkɔ m’erur eke mi k’el agŋ fɛŋ ec’adu, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’éb agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl m’ɔŋ Krist.
46009020	Eke m’anŋ Jwifɛl ab, m’ám ir ɛb ɛsɛ Jwif af, ɛl ec’eb sosiɛm eci. Ow elm ke m’anŋ ɛl ec’ol a ec’es ɛw ɛm, kɔ eke m’anŋ ɛl ab, mi b’ɛlum ol a yec’ɛtŋ ke m’éb agŋ a eke b’ɛlum ol a.
46009021	Gbɛkɔ eke mi b’anŋ ɛl a eke uwm Mois ec’ol ab any ab ab a, m’ám ir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛm anm ol ec’es ɛw ɛm af, agŋ a ek’uwm ol ab any a ec’eb eci. Gbɛkɔ ow elm ke mi k’ɛ́luam Nyam ec’ol a, aŋke mi b’ɛlum Krist ec’ol a.
46009022	Eke m’anŋ ɔmn fuɛfuɛ ɛsɛl ab, m’ám ir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛm yɛji ɔmn fuɛfuɛ ɛm ɔny af, ɛl ec’eb sosiɛm eci. Mi bi kok fɛŋ a eke m’ɔtu eke mi ki kok a, yec’ɛtŋ ke saaŋ agŋ nyam nyam ɛ́ŋn sel.
46009023	Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ, Amani Mamn a sosiɛm cɛ mi bi kok, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm yɛji m’ánŋ in e bibm a e low ɛm.
46009024	Uwr any eke es uru usu, ow el es uru ɛsɛl a fɛŋ b’uru es, gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ nyam cɛ b’ɛŋn ow e nin awr ob a. Ow sosiɛm, ùrur es nin awr ob a ec’ɛŋn eci!
46009025	Es uru ɛsɛl fɛŋ, sos bɛbm ɛm a, bi dɛdŋn ɛl sosi ów nɔnɔ e kok. -Li b’ɔnyn ɛl sosi milɔlu nin awr ob nyam eke íbnm sosiɛm eci. Kɔ ɛy, s’am atr sos es eke si k’ɛŋn nin awr ob nyam eke b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
46009026	Na sosiɛm, ɛm, m’am uru es, kɔ ow elm marɛm marɛm. M’anŋ ɛsɛ mum ogŋ ɛs af, kɔ mi wɔ́wlm kukuta marɛm marɛm.
46009027	Ɛm, m’am ɔnyn ɛm e sos a milɔlu, m’akm’n es nɔnɔ, yec’ɛtŋ ke mi k’ɔ́bm Amani Mamn eci kokoba m’okm agŋ, ke ɛm wɛl k’ébm im.
46010001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’erur eke mi k’ɔkn ɔny low yec’a eke ɛŋn ɛy lagŋɛl Mois e lɛgŋ ɛm a. Jru a ek’anŋ afr ow a nyimn ɛl, ɛtŋ -l’ubr okij ebl a,
46010002	ɛtŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ mij nuŋ eke wɛl ok ɛl af, Mois e jam us eci.
46010003	-
46010004	Ɛl fɛŋ -l’ij ob nyam a ɛtŋ -l’ɛgŋ mar nyam a ek’anŋ Nyam ɛm ow a. Tasi ɛm a, lob a ek’anŋ Nyam ɛm ow am us ɛl jam ab ɛm -l’ɛgŋ mij ɛl fɛŋ, ɛtŋ lob a, in anake l’el Krist a.
46010005	Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ kokm Nyam ec’erur, ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm -l’uw loj ab ɛm.
46010006	Ów amua fɛŋ ɛy eke k’el sɛwl ɛy eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke si kí kokm ów eŋuŋ eke b’aw ɛy a ɛsɛ ɛy lagŋɛl ec’ab af.
46010007	K’ìgŋn sinyam yadŋ nuŋ, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok ab af. Kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Dedeku a nimum sig es ob ij lele mar ɛgŋ ab eci. Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, -l’igb ɛl fɛŋ -n’am gbɛgbl es.
46010008	Si k’ócr ɛy e sos a si kí kokr nfaci ij owi, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok, ke agŋ fandi likŋ lele nyahan ab uw lɛgŋ nyam coco ab af.
46010009	Si k’ɛ́bmn Krist, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok, ke morŋn gúgŋ ɛl -l’uwr ab af.
46010010	Ow ec’uwr ɛm a, m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: si k’ɛ́nyn abr, ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb kok, ke afr ɛrm ɛs a ek’ism luw ab a, ibi ɛl ab af.
46010011	Ów amua ɛŋn ɛy lagŋɛl, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow él sɛwl ɛy eci. Wɛl nɔn ɛw es ɛy ec’ɛwar eci, ɛy eke s’anŋ sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a.
46010012	Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ yeci ek’am tutr eke n’inym es kikri a, ɛ́w ɛrm ke li k’ɛ́ym wus.
46010013	Ɛbm ɛkn a fɛŋ eke ɔbar a el ow a eke b’ɛŋn agŋ fɛŋ a. Nyam el cɛcɛ ɛtŋ li k’ow li yɛbm eke wɛl k’ɛbm ɔny toŋ ow afŋ ɔny e lɛc ab es. Eke ɛbm ɛkn b’ow owr ɔny a, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny lɛc inymn es kikri ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny sos dogŋn ec’abusu.
46010014	Ow sosiɛm a, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl, àrur sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ owi ɛgbr es!
46010015	M’am dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm es ok ɛsɛl af. Ɔny obi yɛji ɔ̀nyn odad eke m’am dad a igbal ogŋ ɛkan.
46010016	Ob ij lala ab ɛm, eke si b’ɔŋ Nyam bia mij kpɔk a e si b’ɛgŋ a ec’a, ke ow elm af s’okrm Krist eci mebl ab ab a ee? Kɔ futufutu a eke si bi cɛc s’ɔŋanin ob ij ɛm a, ɔ́nym okrm ɛy af Krist e sos megl ab ab ee?
46010017	Futufutu a, nyam coco. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ s’okr af s’el sos megl nyam coco, aŋke futufutu nyam coco a ɛy fɛŋ si b’ij.
46010018	Lɛ̀ɛr Israɛl eyŋ: ɛl a eke b’ij mindey eke wɛl bi wawr egb anŋ egb waw usu a, okr af Nyam ab.
46010019	Nɛnɛ a, bla lowi m’am erur eke mi ki dad ee? Kɔ mindey eke wɛl bi wawr egb ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ a lele sinyam yadŋ a ɛl obi ab a el low tasi ee?
46010020	Njaŋ! M’erur cɛ eke mi ki dad eke segb waw amua, abŋ eŋuŋ a wɛl bi kok ɔŋ, kɔ ow elm ɛy e Nyam a. Ɛtŋ m’erurm eke k’okar af abŋ eŋuŋ ab ab.
46010021	K’ɔtumn am ɛgŋn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mij kpɔk a, ke ám ɛgŋn abŋ eŋuŋ e mij kpɔk a yɛji. K’ɔtumn am ijr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ob ij lala a, ke ám ijr abŋ eŋuŋ ec’ob a yɛji.
46010022	Kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ s’am erur eke si k’ɔŋ nyamnɛyr ɔny ee? Kɔ s’ɔny lɛc s’akm’n ee?
46010023	Ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ: "Fɛŋ e kok ec’abusu ɛru es." Nawrɛ, gbɛkɔ ɛm, m’am dad eke ow elm fɛŋ akplm ɛy eci. "Fɛŋ e kok ec’abusu ɛru es." Nawrɛ, kɔ ow elm fɛŋ ɔɔm Nyamel agbm ɔmn ɛm.
46010024	Ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔ́l in obi cɛ e low mamn es, kɔ ke l’ɔ́l agŋ ɛjec’a nana ec’es.
46010025	Ndey fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ɔl ij an ɛjɛm a, ìjr ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke ów awl kaka k’ánm ɛm.
46010026	Tasi ɛm a, ob a fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci: wus lele ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ’n ɛm ab ab.
46010027	Kin low ɛbmn nyam: eke Nyam any uwm ɛs nyam ɛsŋ ɔny ob ij ɛm ɛtŋ ɛgŋn ebr imn a, ow akpl eke k’ijr ob a eke wɛl ɔŋ ɔny a ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke ów awl k’ánm ɛm.
46010028	Gbɛkɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam dad ɔny ninɛ: "Ndey a ek’am ijr a sinyam yadŋ ec’egb waw," ow akpl eke k’íjmn ɛgŋ a e dad ɔny odad a e sos keskes eke ow k’ɛwm lele in ec’elel eke li b’ɛkan ów ab ab sosiɛm.
46010029	Eke batŋ fɛŋ akpl ɔny eci yɛji, ow ɔtu eke k’ákplm ɛgŋ a eci. Sica bla sosiɛm ɛgŋ ki yɛb ɛgŋ ɛjeci, in ec’elel eke li b’ɛkan ów ab ɛm, jɛj in ec’abusu a ek’ɛru’r es a e low ok ee?
46010030	Eke l’ɔtu eke li k’ɔŋ Nyam bia ob a eke n’am ij a eci, bla sosiɛm wɛl ki cacak’r ob ij a sosiɛm ee?
46010031	Ow cɛ eke mi ki dad a: eke am ijr ob, am ɛgŋn mar ɛtŋ am kokr low fɛŋ yɛji, kòkr fɛŋ Nyam ec’anygbɛl a eci.
46010032	K’ɛ̀lul ɛgŋ kaka wus ɔny ec’elel eke bi kokr ab ɛm: ke ow el Jwifɛl, ke ow el agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl, ke ow el Nyamel; k’ɛ̀lul ɛgŋ kaka wus.
46010033	Kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af! Mi bi kok eke ɛm e low kok fɛŋ ɛm, ɛm e low k’akpl agŋ a fɛŋ sos ɛm. M’ɔ́lm ɛm obi e low mamn es, kɔ agŋ fɛŋ e low mamn mi b’ɔl es yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɛŋn sel.
46011001	Wèwrmn’m ów, ɛsɛ elel eke m’am wewrm Krist ów ab af.
46011002	M’am aw ɔny eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ b’ɔkan ɛm e low, ke b’ɔsur ɛm e low yɛgm a ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɔŋn ɔny ab af.
46011003	Gbɛkɔ kin low e m’am erur eke k’irir sɛnyn sɛnyn: igŋ fɛŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs el Krist, yɔw fɛŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs el igŋ, ɛtŋ Krist ec’es ɛw ɛs a el Nyam.
46011004	Eke igŋ nyam bubur nuŋ es am ŋɔŋn Nyam oglog am dad odad eke Nyam ɔŋ’n a, l’ɛluam Krist ek’el in ec’es ɛw a.
46011005	Sica eke yɔw nyam buburm nuŋ es in e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm oglog odad eke Nyam ɔŋ’n a e dad ɛm a, l’ɛluam in ec’es ɛw ɛs a ek’el in ec’igŋ a. Ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn nuŋ kprokpro cɛ ow’n ɛr af.
46011006	Eke yɔw nyam erurm eke ki bubur nuŋ es, l’ɛ́gŋ l’eb l’ɛr nuŋ kprokpro cɛ gɔŋ! Gbɛkɔ ow el ɛ́s owi yɔw nyam eke bubr sin es oglog ɛr nuŋ kprokpro a eci; ow sosiɛm li búbur nuŋ es cɛ gɔŋ!
46011007	Igŋ ec’a ow ibram eke li ki bubur nuŋ es eke l’el Nyam ec’es otarir lel ow ec’anygbɛl ab a sosiɛm. Kɔ yɔw, in igŋ ec’anygbɛl l’el.
46011008	Tasi ɛm a, ow elm yɔw ɛm Nyam kokm igŋ, kɔ igŋ ɛm li kok yɔw.
46011009	Ɛtŋ Nyam kokm igŋ yɔw sosiɛm eci, kɔ yɔw li kok igŋ sosiɛm eci.
46011010	Low na sosiɛm lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eke bi lɛr ɔny e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ab ab sosiɛm, ow it eke yɔw k’ɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam nuŋ af yɛgm eke n’ɔny abusu Nyam ŋɔŋn eci.
46011011	Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af a, yɔw anŋ igŋ eci ɛtŋ igŋ yɛji anŋ yɔw eci,
46011012	aŋke ek’ow el igŋ ɛm Nyam ɛcr kok yɔw, ke yɔw ɛm anake igŋ b’ɛcr wɛl ew’r a; ów a fɛŋ Nyam ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow.
46011013	Ɔny obi ɛm yɛji, ɔ̀nyn igbal ogŋ ɛkan: eke yɔw nyam am ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛtŋ li buburm nuŋ es ke ow akpl gbɛ ee?
46011014	Eke igŋ nyam ɔfur sin nuŋ, ow el ɛ́s owi! Wus ec’ów a bɔbɔ yɛji am yɛgm eke ow el ɛ́s owi.
46011015	Gbɛkɔ yɔw ec’a eke sin ɔfu’r nuŋ, ke anygbeŋ ana! Tasi ɛm a, yɔw sin b’ɔfu nuŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke ow él in e nuŋ es bubur ob.
46011016	Ɛtŋ ek’ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’atar ów es low na af a, l’úw any eke ɛy e Sinyamel a fɛŋ ɛm ow ɛcam ɛy ab eke yɔw nyam kí buburm nuŋ es ke ŋɔ́ŋn Nyam.
46011017	Eke ow el ɔny e siluku as a ec’ów m’am dad a, low nyam anŋ eke ow sosiɛm mi k’ɔtum m’awm ɔny. Tasi ɛm a, ɔny e siluku as a bi kok ɔny low ŋuŋ akm low mamn.
46011018	Eke b’asr luku usu nyam a, b’inymn es eb eb a eke bubar ɛm a. M’iri ow e low wɛl ɛsɛ ɛm, ɛtŋ m’ɔny ɔmn eke low nawrɛ tɛl anŋ ɛm.
46011019	Tasi ɛm a, ɛm bubr ɔtu eke k’anŋ ɔny ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ɔ́tu ɛkn kpata agŋ a eke el cɛcɛ tasi ɔny ec’araŋn a.
46011020	Eke b’asr luku usu nyam a, ow elm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ob ij lala a íjmn.
46011021	Ɛɛ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ b’ogŋ es eke k’ij in obi eci ob a, ɛtŋ eke agŋ bɛb, ɛl namn b’ɔny a, likpr ɛl b’ɛgŋ mar am ɔny.
46011022	Ɔny na, ɔnymn mel eke k’anŋn yogŋ ijr ke ɛgŋn ee? Kɔ Nyamel am erurir eke ki kokar miyɛr ee? Kɔ agŋ a ek’el ɔkɔpm agŋ a erurir eke ki kokr ɛ́s ee? Bla am ekur eke mi ki dad ɔny ee? Kɔ aw mi k’aw ɔny ee? Njaŋ, low na af gbɛ mi k’áwm ɔny!
46011023	Tasi ɛm a, kin low yɛgm a eke m’eb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ ke m’ɔŋ ɔny a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ncok a eke wɛl ɔl ij’r a, l’oc futufutu,
46011024	l’ɛlu Nyam bia, ɛtŋ ow e jam a, l’ubr futufutu ab ɛm li dad ninɛ: "Futufutu na el ɛm e sos megl. L’el ɔny eci. Ìjr ke ám ɔkan ɛm owi."
46011025	Ɛbɛn nyam coco, eke -l’ijr ob uwr a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ oc vɛn kpɔk a ɛtŋ dad ninɛ: "Vɛn kpɔk na el ɛm e mebl a, ɛtŋ Nyam oc’r am kok in e sinm owr a ɔny ab. Sakp sakp fɛŋ eke b’ow ɛgŋn a, ɔ́kan ɛm owi."
46011026	Tasi ɛm a, sakp sakp fɛŋ eke b’ijr futufutu na ke b’ɛgŋn vɛn kpɔk na a, ow el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e luw a ec’amani ek’am ɔbr toŋ ke l’ɛ́wl l’ow.
46011027	Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ ek’am ij Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci futufutu na, oglog am ɛgŋ in e kpɔk na ke ow elm elel ek’ow it a, el ɛgŋ ek’am eb sikpl ok sos Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci sos megl a lel in e mebl ab ab ec’any af.
46011028	Ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’otar in sosi akr gbuŋ ke l’íj futufutu na, ke l’ɛ́gŋ kpɔk na.
