46011029	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ yec’ek’am ij futufutu na ke am ɛgŋ kpɔk na, ke uwm low ek’anŋ ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci sos ab ab ec’araŋn a, el ɛgŋ ek’am eb jɛj ok ɛw es in e lís.
46011030	Low na sosiɛm anake ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɔ́lu nɔnɔ lele sos ɛ́yru ab anŋ, ke agŋ nɔnɔ uw a.
46011031	Eke si b’ɛkan ɛy ec’es an ab ɛm, Nyam k’ow jɛjm okm ɛy.
46011032	Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ bi jɛj ok ɛy ɛtŋ bi nyimn ɛy e low, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl k’ɔ́bm ɛy low wus nimum ab.
46011033	Ow sosiɛm erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, lɛgŋ eke b’asr luku usu nyam ob ij ec’a, èkurir ɔny ɔfr.
46011034	Eke ɛgŋ nyam namn am ɔny nɔnɔ, ow akpl eke li k’ij ob in ogŋ a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny e luku as usu nyam a k’ɛ́sŋm Nyam e jɛj ok a ism ɔny. Ów likpr a eke bibrmn’m a ec’a, lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ a, mi b’ow m’ɛkn ow e low.
46012001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, yec’ek’el Abŋ Lala e sob ap ec’a, m’erurm eke k’úwmn ow e lís e low kaka any.
46012002	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke k’uwmn Nyam any a, wɛl b’ɔdum ɔny ab imn sinyam yadŋ ek’am dadm odad ogŋ, ɛtŋ am dogŋnmn sos kaka.
46012003	Ow sosiɛm m’erur eke mi ki dad ɔny low nyam: eke ɛgŋ nyam dad: "Ke abu ɛyr ɛ́ŋn Jesu!", ow k’ɔtum elm Abŋ Lala ɔɔm’n eke li ki dad ɛbɛn. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ k’ɔtum dadm: "Jesu el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ!", eke ow elm Abŋ Lala nyimnm’n.
46012004	Sica yec’ek’el Abŋ Lala e sob ap ec’a, Nyam ɔŋ agŋ in e bibm ab ɛm sob ap ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, gbɛkɔ Abŋ nyam a cɛ b’ɔŋ agŋ sob ap a.
46012005	Ow ɔny juma ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke wɛl bi kok, gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyam a cɛ e juma.
46012006	Ów ɛrŋ ɛrŋ anŋ eke wɛl bi kok, gbɛkɔ Nyam nyam a cɛ bi kok juma ɛy fɛŋ ɛm, ɛtŋ b’ɛlum ɛy abu fɛŋ a eke si bi kok ab ɛm.
46012007	Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ bibm nyam in sɔny cɛ eci, agŋ likpr a e nimamn eci.
46012008	Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam odad sɛwr ɛm eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e bibm, ke Abŋ nyam a cɛ, n’ɔ́ŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam low any uw a eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e bibm.
46012009	Abŋ nyam a cɛ b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɔmn leg leg e bibm, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam agŋ ewlm ec’a.
46012010	Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam akrowa kok e bibm, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a e dad ec’a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam yɛji eke k’uw ów yec’ek’el Nyam ec’Abŋ ec’ów ab any lele ɛl ek’elm ab ab e bibm. Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam am ɔtu ɛbr sɛbr e wɛl uwm any e bibm, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɛjeci nyam ow ec’itŋn e bibm.
46012011	Gbɛkɔ amua fɛŋ a, Abŋ Lala nyam coco a cɛ bi kok ow e low. Li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ in e sob ap a ɛsɛ elel eke li b’erur ab af.
46012012	Aŋa s’óc low nyam s’ɛbmn. Ɛgŋ e sos megl a el ob nyam coco, gbɛkɔ n’ɛnyn susu nɔnɔ cɛ. Ɛtŋ eke n’ɛnyn susu yɛji, susu susu a fɛŋ okr af el sos megl nyam; Krist ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ.
46012013	Ɛy fɛŋ, Jwifɛl, agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl, madu lele ewi ab, Abŋ Lala nyam ab ɛm cɛ s’ɛŋn mij ok nuŋ, sos megl nyam coco eke si k’okr af s’el Krist ɛm a eci. Ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ, s’ɛŋn Abŋ nyam coco na anŋ ɛy ɛm.
46012014	Tasi ɛm a, sos megl nimum a ɔ́nym sos ogog nyam cɛ, kɔ sos ogog nɔnɔ li b’ɛli.
46012015	Lakr ɔtu e ki dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, eke m’elm abu a, m’elm sos megl ec’ogog nyam." Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, l’el sos ogog nyam cɛ.
46012016	Lɔru ɔtu e ki dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm, eke m’elm nyamn a, m’elm sos megl ec’ogog nyam." Kɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, l’el sos ogog nyam cɛ.
46012017	Blel sos megl a nimum el anyamn, ayaf s’ɔtu e si k’irir low ee? Ɛtŋ blel ow el ɔru ɔfr cɛ, ke ayaf s’ɔtu eke si k’ɔdur ob sɔsŋ s’eb ee?
46012018	Gbɛkɔ, Nyam sisigm sos ogog ogog fɛŋ es sos megl a nimum ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke l’erur ab af.
46012019	Eke sos megl a nimum el sos ogog nyam cɛ, ke l’elm sos megl ij.
46012020	Sos ogog ogog a anake b’okr af el sos megl nimum nyam a.
46012021	Nyamn k’ɔtum dadm abu ɛsmɛ: "Ɛm, m’ɔnym ŋ ec’es abur!" Ɛtŋ nuŋ k’ɔtum dadm akr ɛsmɛ: "Ɛm, m’ɔnym ɔny ec’es abur!"
46012022	Nawrɛ ɛm a, sos ogog ogog a ek’ɔnym any nɔnɔ a bɔbɔ yɛji, ɔny low e bi kok sos a nimum ɛm.
46012023	Susu a eke si b’ɛkn ɛsɛ ɛl ek’elm low kaka af a, si bi tat ɛl abu af nɔnɔ. Ɛtŋ ɛl a eke wɛl ɔtum eke k’ɛkn a, si b’ɔny mɛwl si sus ɛl mob.
46012024	Ɛy e sos a e susu susu a e wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛkn a, ibram mob sus na fɛŋ. Gbɛkɔ Nyam eke kok sos megl a, n’ɔŋ susu a eke wɛl b’ɛkn ɛsɛ susu eke elm low kaka af a ɛlum nɔnɔ.
46012025	Ɛbɛn a, sos megl a ow elm ɛm ow bubrm. Kɔ nana, sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ b’ebr ɛl ɔfr ec’ɛrm mij.
46012026	Eke sos ogog nyam am ij gbre, sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ am ij gbre in ab. Eke wɛl kok sos ogog nyam anygbeŋ, sos ogog likpr a fɛŋ am kok sos ɛm iŋn in ab.
46012027	Ɔny ec’a, eel Krist e sos megl a, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam el sos megl a ec’ogog nyam.
46012028	Ow sosiɛm anake Nyamel ɛm, Nyam ikŋ anym krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛw: ɛrm ɛsɛl, yony ɛm: kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, nyahan ɛm: low yɛgm ɛsɛl. Ke sica ow e jam a, wɛl b’ɛŋn sakrowa kok ɛsɛl lel ɛl a ek’ɛŋn ɛgŋ ewlm e bibm ab a. Sica ow ɔny abu ɛlum ɛsɛl lele agŋ nyimn ɛsɛl ab, ɛtŋ ɛl a eke ɛŋn sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ec’ɛbr e bibm a yɛji anŋ.
46012029	Kɔ ɛl fɛŋ -l’el ɛrm ɛsɛl ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -l’el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -li bi yɛgm agŋ low ee? Ɛl fɛŋ -li bi kok sakrowa ee?
46012030	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ow elm ɛl fɛŋ yɛji -l’ewlamn ɔ́lu, -li dadmn odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, -l’itŋnmn sodad a.
46012031	Ow sosiɛm a ɔ̀ɔl sob ap ek’ɔny any a ec’ɛŋn es! Gbɛkɔ sica, m’am ow mi yɛgm ɔny ejagb nyam ek’el sɔbɔ akm bɛb a fɛŋ.
46013001	Tasi ɛm a, blel m’ɔtu eke mi k’ɛbr agŋ e sɛbr a fɛŋ lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ab ab yɛji, eke m’ɔnym erur agŋ ɛjec’a eci, ke m’anŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo ɔbr cɛ eke wɛl am ar ke am ikŋ, baŋ kpakpaca ek’am bɔbar af.
46013002	Blel m’ɔtu eke mi k’eb odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a m’ɔŋ agŋ, m’ɛ́ŋn low any uw a fɛŋ eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, m’íri ów a eke lɔl es Nyam ɛm a ok’m es sos ɛm, ke m’ɔ́ny ɔmn a ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔny mafɛny fafŋn susu a yɛji, eke m’ɔnym erur agŋ ɛjec’a eci, m’elm low kaka!
46013003	Ɛtŋ blel m’ɔtu eke mi ki cɛc ɛm ec’ob fɛŋ eke m’ɔny a m’ɔ́ŋ agŋ a eke namn am ɔny a, ke m’óc ɛm e sos a m’ɛw awoba ke ow íŋn’m sos ɛm yɛji, eke m’ɔnym erur agŋ ɛjec’a eci, ow elm im low kaka!
46013004	Erur b’eku low, ɛrm mamn iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ, l’ógŋm uwerŋ, l’ɛ́wm sos, l’ɛ́lum mɛgŋel ɔkm.
46013005	Erur am kokm ɛ́s owi. L’ɔ́lm in e low mamn cɛ es, l’éblm ɛrm ɛtŋ l’ébm low ŋuŋ l’ɛwm es lokm.
46013006	Erur sos ɛm íŋnm ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony eci, kɔ sos ɛm gbɛ b’iŋn’n low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eci.
46013007	Erur b’ɛgŋ low fɛŋ eb, b’ub low fɛŋ nawrɛ, b’ɔmn low fɛŋ ɛtŋ b’usur ɛrm low fɛŋ ɛm.
46013008	Lɛgŋ nyam sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ke si b’eb s’ɔŋ agŋ a b’ow ɛc. Sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ke wɛl b’ɛbr e bibm a b’ow irm, ɛtŋ Nyam e lís e low fɛŋ eke wɛl uw any a yɛji b’ow uwr. Gbɛkɔ erur ɔnym uwr.
46013009	Tasi ɛm a, s’uwm ów a fɛŋ any, ɛtŋ sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow si dad a yɛji iym nɛny igŋm nuŋ.
46013010	Gbɛkɔ, lɛgŋ a eke fɛŋ b’ow iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ a, yec’a fɛŋ ek’iym nɛny igŋm nuŋ a, b’ow oc es.
46013011	Sica, kin low a eke m’am ow mi dad a: ow a eke m’el iy likekli a, mi bi tutr ów ɛtŋ mi bi dad ów ɛsɛ iy likekli af. Sica eke m’el any es ɛdŋu a, mi kókm ɛsɛ iy likekli af ij.
46013012	Lɛgŋ na ɛm, si k’ɛknm Nyam ec’ów a lala ɛm tasi, s’am ɛkn ɛl ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ flaŋ ɛm af, gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, si b’ow s’ɛkn any af any af. Sicaca ɛm a, m’uwm fɛŋ any, kɔ lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, mi b’ow m’uw Nyam any m’igŋ nuŋ ɛsɛ elel eke l’uwr’m any ab af.
46013013	Lɛgŋ na ɛm a, ów nyahan anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ: ɔmn, low ɔmn lele erur ab. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ɛm e ligbɛl tasi a el erur.
46014001	Ow sosiɛm a, ìkŋn anym ɔɔl erur es. Ɔ̀ɔl ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm Abŋ Lala e sob ap ab es, ab brobro sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ke si b’eb s’ɔŋ agŋ a, ec’ob ap a.
46014002	Eke batŋ ɔny ɛm a ɛgŋ nyam am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ow elm agŋ li dadm odad, kɔ Nyam n’am dad, aŋke ɛgŋ kaka irim. Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm, li bi dad ów ek’ɔtu nɔnɔ ke lɔl es.
46014003	Gbɛkɔ eke ɛgŋ nyam am dad odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, ke agŋ n’am dad l’ok, l’ɛ́lum abu agb ɔmn ɛm, l’átr sos es ke l’ɛ́yr ɛrm es.
46014004	Ɛgŋ a eke am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, am ɔtur in sosi cɛ sos. Kɔ ɛgŋ a ek’in am dad odad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow ok agŋ a, am ɔtur Nyamel a nimum sos.
46014005	M’erur eke ɔny fɛŋ k’ɛbar sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any a, gbɛkɔ yec’eke m’erur tasi a el ke ám dadr sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a. Dád sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, akpl nɔnɔ akm sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ec’ɛbr a. Sica ek’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke k’itŋn ɛbr a eke wɛl uwm any ec’odad a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ Nyamel a nimum agb ɔmn ɛm a, ke ow akpl.
46014006	Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’ócr low nyam s’ɔbar any: eke m’ow m’am ɛkn ɔny ɛtŋ m’am dad ɔny odad ɛbr nyam eke írimn ɛm, ke mi kok low nyam m’ɔŋ ɔny ee? Gbɛkɔ eke m’otar ów a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m a akr sɛnyn sɛnyn irir, oglog eke mi dad ɔny Nyam e lís ec’any uw e low ayl, oglog mi dad ɔny odad eke b’anŋ in ogŋ ow a, oglog eke mi yɛgm ɔny low, ow ɔtu eke k’ɛlum ɔny abu.
46014007	Simob eke wɛl b’ot ɛgŋn ɛj a yɛji, am ɔŋ ɛy low any ɔbar nyam: ɛsɛ kete af oglog saŋgo af, eke ɛl ec’ikŋ a kpakpabm es aylm, ayaf wɛl k’uwr ɛj yec’eke -n’am afl ab any ee?
46014008	Ɛtŋ eke kɔkr a ec’ikŋ a aylm okm es, bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow bɛbm ar ogŋ e sos ee?
46014009	Ɔny ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn! Eke am dadr ów sodad ebl eke wɛl írim ab, ayaf wɛl k’uwr yec’a ek’am dadr ab any ee? Ow anŋ ɛsɛ odad ek’am dadr okr wus af.
46014010	Sɛbr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ anŋ wus af aŋa, ɛtŋ -li bi dad ów eke b’ok agŋ a e b’iri a es sos ɛm.
46014011	Eke m’uwm ɛgŋ a ek’am dad’m odad a ec’ɛbr ab any, m’el utu ɛgŋ in ec’any af ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji l’el utu ɛgŋ ɛm ec’any af.
46014012	Ɔny yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ! Sica eke am erurir Abŋ Lala eci sob ap a, ìbrmn Nyam atrm ɛm ɛl a ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ Nyamel agb a.
46014013	Na sosiɛm anake ɛgŋ a eke am dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, ki ŋɔŋn Nyam, ow ɔ́ŋ’n odad itŋn e bibm a.
46014014	Eke mi bi ŋɔŋn Nyam sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm a, ɛm ec’abŋ a bi ŋɔŋn Nyam a, kɔ ɛm e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a am kokm low kaka.
46014015	Ayaf mi ki kokr ab ee? Mi b’ow mi ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛm ec’abŋ ab ab, gbɛkɔ mi b’ow mi ŋɔŋn sodad ebl eke b’ok es ɛm. Mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ ɛj ɛm ec’abŋ ab ab, gbɛkɔ mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ ɛj a sodad ebl e b’ok es ɛm.
46014016	Sica ek’ow el abŋ ɛm b’ɔŋ Nyam bia, ɛgŋ a eke irim low a ɛwm es, ke uwm yec’eke am dad ab any a, ayaf li k’ɔtu li dad "amɛn", ŋ e Nyam bia ɛlu e ŋɔŋn a ec’ee?
46014017	Eke ŋ e Nyam bia ɛlu e ŋɔŋn a akpl nɔnɔ yɛji, ow ɛ́luam agŋ ɛjec’a abu agbm ɔmn ɛm.
46014018	M’am ɔŋ Nyam bia eke mi b’ɛbr sɛbr nɔnɔ eke wɛl uwm any m’akm ɔny fɛŋ.
46014019	Gbɛkɔ Nyamel b’as luku a, m’erur eke mi ki dad sodad ebl yen eke ayl wɛl b’iri mi yɛgmn agŋ low, ow a eke mi ki dad sodad fandi lɛw eke wɛl írim kaka a.
46014020	Agŋ lisijimɛl, kì tutar ów ɛsɛ etuey af, kɔ tùtar ów ɛsɛ agŋ any es ɛdŋu af. Sica low ŋuŋ ec’a gbɛ, ànŋn ɛsɛ etuey eke ɛknm low ɛm af.
46014021	Nyam ec’ol ab ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ɛcr agŋ eke b’ɛbr etu ec’ɛbr ɛm, mi dad Israɛl eyŋ odad, mi b’ow m’oc etu agŋ e nɛny mi dadr ɛl odad. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, -li k’ow -l’irimn ɛm owi.
46014022	Ow am yɛgm eke sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ec’ɛbr a, el mɛny ɛwr agŋ a ek’ubm nawrɛ a eci, gbɛkɔ ow elm low kaka nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a eci. Ɛbɛn nɛny nyam, sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, el mɛny ɛwr agŋ a ek’el nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a eci, gbɛkɔ ow elm low kaka agŋ ek’ubm nawrɛ a eci.
46014023	K’aw ke Nyamel nimum ás luku, ke agŋ a pupukpaŋ ám dad odad sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm. Eke agŋ ek’irim ɛy e low a oglog agŋ eke ubm nawrɛ ow ok ɔny ɛm, -li b’ow -li tutr eke nuŋ ɛm uŋ ɔny!
46014024	Gbɛkɔ eke agŋ a fɛŋ am dad sodad ek’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam ek’ubm nawrɛ oglog irim ɛy e low a kaka ow ɛy ɔny ɛm, li b’ow l’itŋn ɛrm ɛm sodad eke n’am iri a sosiɛm.
46014025	Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ ów a eke lɔl es in ec’ɛrm ab ɛm a b’ow ayl, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus, l’ubu any es. Li b’ow l’igŋ Nyam nuŋ ke li dád l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛɛ, Nyam anŋ ɔny araŋn tasi!"
46014026	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl ayaf si ki dadr ab ee? Eke b’asr luku Nyam nuŋ igŋ ec’a, ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu eke k’ɛgŋ ɛj nyam, ɛjeci nyam ɛ́ŋn low e ki yɛgm agŋ, ɛjeci nyam ɛ́lu Nyam e lís e low nyam ɔkm, ɛjeci nyam dád odad ɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, ke ɛjeci nyam, in ítŋn odad a eke wɛl dad a. Gbɛkɔ ke fɛŋ ɛ́lum Nyamel a abu agb ɔmn ɛm.
46014027	Eke wɛl am dad ów sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any ɛm, agŋ yony oglog nyahan ɔtu eke ki kok, kɔ ke ow él ɛgŋ nyam nyam, ke ɛgŋ ánŋ am itŋn yec’a eke -n’am dad a.
46014028	Sica ek’ɛgŋ anm yogŋ eke k’itŋn ɛl e sodad a, ow akpl eke -li ki yewal tiŋ agŋ a ec’araŋn, ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ dad odad a lokm ɛm in obi in obi lele Nyam ab eci.
46014029	Agŋ a eke ɛl, bi dad sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a ec’a, agŋ yony oglog nyahan ɔtu eke ki dad ów a eke -n’ɛŋan a, ke agŋ likpr a ɔ́ny ɛl e dad ebl a igbl ogŋ ɛkn.
46014030	Eke agŋ ab ɛm, Nyam ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam odad eke ki dad, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam odad anŋ nɛnym am dad a, l’ók odad ab es ke yec’a yɛji dád.
46014031	Nawrɛ, ɔtur eke ɔny fɛŋ k’ɛŋan sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, gbɛkɔ ke ow él ɛgŋ nyam nyam ki dad, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ íri low yɛgm ek’anŋ ɛm a, ke ɔ́ny sos es atr.
46014032	Agŋ a eke b’ɛŋn sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a, ɔtu eke k’ɔnyn sos es bibm a eke -n’ɛŋan a e low kok ɛm.
46014033	Nyam elm ów wuwal ɛs, kɔ ɛrm es ɛy e Nyam. Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke ow b’ɛcr Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl fɛŋ ec’araŋn ab af,
46014034	ow it eke ɔyɔw ki yewal tiŋ agŋ araŋn. -N’ɔnym abusu eke -li k’igb -l’eb odad -l’ibrm low, kɔ -l’ok es tiŋ ke -l’iri low, ɛsɛ elel eke Jwifɛl ec’ ol a am dad ab af.
46014035	Eke -n’ɔny low eke -li k’ibrm -l’iri a, -l’ibrm ɛl ɛcɛl akŋ ɛm. Ow akplm eke yɔw k’igb agŋ araŋn eb odad.
46014036	Ɔny bi tutar a ke Nyam odad a, ɔny ogŋ yogŋ ow anŋ ow ee? Ɔny sɔny cɛ eel agŋ ek’ɛŋn’n ee?
46014037	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am ocr in sosi Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛs, oglog ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala ec’ob ap ab ɛm e nyam, ke l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛkn odad na eke m’am nɔn m’awŋ ɔny a ɛsɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ol af.
46014038	Gbɛkɔ eke l’uwm any ɛbɛn a, in yɛji Nyam k’ow uwm’n any.
46014039	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow ec’uwrm ɛm a, m’am dad m’ɛsɛ: ow akpl eke k’erurir ɛŋan sodad eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow a; ke k’ɛ́dŋnmn agŋ a eke b’ɛbr sɛbr eke wɛl uwm any a.
46014040	Gbɛkɔ, ke ɔny ec’araŋn a, ów a fɛŋ él sɛjɛm sɛjɛm lele sisigm ɛm ab.
46015001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am ɔkn ɔny Amani Mamn a eke m’ɔb ɔny in e kokoba a. Ɛgŋn ebr ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, ucur ɔnyn in es.
46015002	Amani Mamn na b’eb ɛlu ɔny es, eke b’ɛgŋn ucur ɔnyn in es ɛsɛ elel eke m’ɔŋn ɔny ab af cɛ. Ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, nawrɛ ɔfr ɔfr cɛ am ubr.
46015003	M’ikŋ anym m’ɔŋ ɔny low yɛgm a eke ɛm obi yɛji m’ɛŋn a: ɛy e sikpl a sosiɛm Krist uw, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad ab af.
46015004	Wɛl ɛlu’l uwɔmu ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm sɛgŋ nyahan ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad ab af.
46015005	L’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm Piɛr ɛtŋ ow e jam a ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony a yɛji ɛkn’n.
46015006	Ɛmɛny, l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm in e jam ɛsɛl ekŋ yen yen sakp yen ek’anŋ usu nyam a ɛkn’n wanci nyam af. Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam uw, gbɛkɔ nɔnɔ gbɛl anŋ owr cɛ.
46015007	Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm Jak lele ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ab ɛkn’n.
46015008	Sica eke l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm agŋ likpr a fɛŋ toŋ bake ow uwr a, ɛm yɛji l’okm sos ɔkm li yɛgm’m, ɛm eke m’itm tasi a.
46015009	Tasi ɛm a, ɛm, ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ɛm e likekli tasi. M’itm yɛj’eke wɛl k’ɛsŋ’m ɛrm ɛs, aŋke m’ijr Nyamel gbre nɔnɔ.
46015010	Gbɛkɔ Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a anake ɔŋ ke m’el ɛgŋ na eke m’el a, ɛtŋ in e bibm na eke m’ɛŋn a ɔsu ey amamn ɛm ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, mi kok juma m’akm ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ. Gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛm obi tasi mi kokm juma a, Nyam e bibm a ek’anŋ ɛm ab a kok.
46015011	Amua fɛŋ a, ek’ow el ɛm m’ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba oglog ɛm lawlɛl likpr a ɔb yɛji, ow elm na elm low a. Nɛnɛ anake si b’ɔb Amani Mamn e kokoba a, ɛtŋ nɛnɛ anake ubr nawrɛ a.
46015012	Ɛy s’am ɔb amani si dad s’ɛsɛ: Krist igb luw ɛm. Gbɛkɔ ɔny ɛm a, agŋ bɛb am dad ɛsɛ: agŋ ek’in uw a, in ɔnym igb ij. Ayaf -l’ɔtu eke -li ki dad low nɛnɛ ee?
46015013	Eke agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, ke Krist in obi yɛji igbm luw ɛm.
46015014	Ɛtŋ eke tasi Krist igbm luw ɛm, ke ɛy e Nyam odad eke s’am dad a ɔnym liy kaka, ɛtŋ low a ek’ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm a yɛji, ɔnym liy kaka.
46015015	Ɛmɛny eke agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, ow am yɛgm yɛj’eke s’el Nyam ec’adaŋku ayadŋu. S’el adaŋku ayadŋu, aŋke l’igbam Krist luw ɛm ɛtŋ si dad eke l’igbm ow.
46015016	Ɛɛ, ek’agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, ke Krist in obi yɛji igbm luw ɛm.
46015017	Ɛtŋ eke Krist igbm luw ɛm ke ɔmn ɔfr ɔfr cɛ ɔnyn, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny anŋn ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm cɛ.
46015018	Ow am yɛgm yɛj’eke agŋ a ek’oc ɛl ec’ɔmn a nimum ɛlu Krist ɛm gbuŋ ke ca uw a irm.
46015019	Ɛtŋ ek’ow el owr anŋ na cɛ eci s’oc ɛy e low ɔmn a s’ɛlu Krist ɛm, ke s’el agŋ fɛŋ ɛm e gbre ɛsɛl tasi!
46015020	Gbɛkɔ nawrɛ ɛm a, Krist igb luw ɛm. Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, Krist anake ikŋ anym igb a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ow yɛgm eke agŋ likpr a ek’ɔny ɔmn ke uw a yɛji b’ow igb.
46015021	Low na wɛl am ɛkn ɛbɛn, aŋke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ, ek’el Adam ab ɛm anake luw anŋ ow a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam cɛ, ek’el Krist ab ɛm anake agŋ b’ow igb luw ɛm a.
46015022	Agŋ fɛŋ b’uw, aŋke -l’okr af Adam ab. Ɛbɛn nyam coco, agŋ fɛŋ b’ow ɛŋn sel, aŋke -l’okr af Krist ab,
46015023	gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’elel eke ow ɔsŋ es anŋ ab ɛm: Krist anake ikŋ anym igb luw ɛm a. Ow e jam a, lɛgŋ a eke li b’ow l’ɛwl mɛny l’ow a, agŋ a ek’el in ec’a, ɛl yɛji b’ow igb gɔŋ.
46015024	Sica nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a, Krist b’ow ŋuŋn es ɛw eŋuŋ fɛŋ, abusu eŋuŋ fɛŋ lele lɛc eŋuŋ fɛŋ ab ɛy af. Ɛtŋ li b’ow l’oc in ec’es ɛw a n’ɔŋ Ɛs Nyam.
46015025	Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke Krist k’ɔnym es ɛw ab ab toŋ ke Nyam ót in ec’efnu a fɛŋ ok’r akr ew.
46015026	Es abal el ɛm ec’ifnu eke wɛl b’ow ŋuŋn a el luw.
46015027	Nyam Lɛl ɛm, kin ow eke wɛl b’awl: Nyam ot fɛŋ ok’r es akr ew. Gbɛkɔ eke Lɛl a bi dad eke Nyam in ot 'fɛŋ' in ok ow es akr ew, ow ayl tasi eke Nyam anm 'fɛŋ' ab ɛm, aŋke Nyam, in anake li b’ɔŋ Krist abusu ów a fɛŋ af a.
46015028	Ɛtŋ eke Iy a b’ow ɔny abusu ów a fɛŋ af a, in obi in obi a, li b’ow l’is es Nyam ek’ɔŋ’n abusu na a ec’any af. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, Nyam b’ow ɛw fɛŋ es nimum nimum.
46015029	Sica eke ow elm nɛnɛ, bla sosiɛm agŋ bɛb b’ɛgŋ eb wɛl ok ɛl mij nuŋ agŋ ek’uw a ec’ee? Bla ow b’ow eel ɛl eke agŋ ek’uw a ígbm luw ɛm ee?
46015030	Ɛtŋ ɛy obi gbɛ, bla sosiɛm sɛgŋ a fɛŋ s’am ir ɛb ek’ɔtu eke k’ibi ɛy ee?
46015031	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, luw anŋ’m saw. Agŋ lisijimɛl na low nawrɛ. Ɛtŋ ow el low nawrɛ yɛj’eke ntotŋ b’ok’m ɔny eci, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm.
46015032	Efɛs ɛb ɛm, m’ogŋ mum agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ mindey eŋuŋ af ab. Eke ow el agŋ ɛm ec’ów cɛ eci, ke bla m’ɛŋn ɛm tasi ee? Eke agŋ e b’uw a ígbm luw ɛm, si dád s’ɛsɛ: s’íjr ke s’ɛ́gŋn, aŋke efi si b’ow s’uwr.
46015033	Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ɔny ec’ów e dad ɛm! Mɛcrer ŋuŋ bi ŋuŋn ɛgŋ ek’am ir ɛb sɛnyn a.
46015034	Ɛ̀wal ebar ɔny e nuŋ ɛm es ok ab ɛm ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af, ke kí kokmn sikpl ij! Ɛɛ, ɔny ɛm a agŋ anŋ ek’uwm Nyam any. Ɛtŋ na eke m’am dad a, ɔny ec’ɛ́s.
46015035	Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ nyam ɔtu eke k’ibrm ɛsɛ: ayaf agŋ ek’uw a b’igbr luw ɛm ee? Bogŋ e sos megl -li b’ow -l’ɛli ee?
46015036	Kì tutr ów ɛs’ɛgŋ ek’ɔnym nuŋ ɛm af! Eke b’ewl egb liy a, ow elm eke li b’uw yɛ, gbuŋ ɛtŋ li b’ɛli l’el likŋ ek’anŋ owr ee?
46015037	Ɛtŋ bla b’ewl ee? Ow elm likŋ a eke b’ow agb a éwlm, kɔ egb liy nyam cɛ b’oc ɛlu wus ɛm, ow ɔtu eke k’el ble liy oglog egb liy kaka fɛŋ.
46015038	Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, Nyam b’ɔŋ egb liy a sos yec’eke l’erur e li k’ɔŋ ow a, ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ egb liy fɛŋ sos eke k’el ow ec’a.
46015039	Mob fɛŋ ek’anŋ owr a ɛ́lim sos nɛny nyam. Agŋ e sos a lele mindey ec’ab ab elm nɛny nyam; ɛtŋ ɔr lele sɔcn ab ec’a yɛji bɛbmnm.
46015040	Eke wɛl ɔtu e ki dad ɛsɛ mob ek’anŋ afr a ɛli 'sos' ɛsɛ wus aŋa ec’a ek’anŋ ab af yɛji, ɛl e jɛjn a elm nɛny nyam.
46015041	Ligbn e jɛjn a elm kpɛŋ awl ec’ab ab, ɛtŋ ɛl yony mum e jɛjn elm kpɛŋ mílɛ́l ec’ab ab. Ɛtŋ lɛ́l nyam nyam e jɛjn a bɔbɔ yɛji elm kpɛŋ mílɛ́l ɛjec’a ec’ab ab.
46015042	Lɛgŋ a ek’agŋ b’ow igb luw ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke ow b’ow ɛcr ana. Yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm ɛsɛ likŋ liy af a, el sos megl ek’it eke k’ugŋ es. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, li k’ɔtum l’ugŋm es ij.
46015043	Yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm a, el sos megl ek’elm low kaka. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, anygbɛl b’iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ. Yec’a eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm a, el sos megl ek’ɔnym sos kaka. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, lɛc b’iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ.
46015044	Sos megl eke wɛl b’ɛlu nɔmu ɛm ɛsɛ likŋ liy af a, el sos megl nɛnɛ cɛ. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’igb luw ɛm a, Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ’n n’anŋ owr. Ow ɔny sos megl nyam ek’el sos megl nɛnɛ cɛ. Gbɛkɔ ow ɔny sos megl nyam yɛji eke b’ɛŋn owr anŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm.
46015045	Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl dad ninɛ: Adam ek’el krɛkrɛ ec’ɛgŋ a, el ɛgŋ nɛnɛ cɛ ek’ɛŋn owr anŋ. Gbɛkɔ Adam es abal el a, in ɛŋn owr anŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a owr anŋ.
46015046	Gbɛkɔ ów a ec’es ɔsŋm ɛm a, Adam a eke b’ikŋ anym ow a elm in a eke Abŋ Lala ɔŋ anŋ owr a, kɔ Adam a ek’el ɛgŋ nɛnɛ cɛ a. In e jam a gbuŋ ɛtŋ Adam es abal el a eke Abŋ Lala ɔŋ anŋ owr a b’ow.
46015047	Nyam kok krɛkrɛ ec’ɛgŋ a wus e siflefl ab, gbɛkɔ yony ɛm ec’ɛgŋ a afr n’anŋ l’ow.
46015048	Wus ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ɛli sos megl ek’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm ec’ab ab. Afr ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ a ɛli sos megl ek’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ afr ow ec’ab ab.
46015049	Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke si b’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab ab a, lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, si b’ow s’otarir es ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ afr ow ab ab yɛji.
46015050	Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin low tasi eke m’am dad: ob yec’eke wɛl kok sos megl lele mebl ab ɛm a, k’ɔtum ɛym Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a. Ɛtŋ yec’a eke b’ugŋ es a, k’ɔtum ɛŋnm owr anŋ ek’ɔnym uwr a.
46015051	Sica m’am ow mi dad ɔny low nyam eke lɔl es: si k’ow s’uwm ɛy fɛŋ, gbɛkɔ Nyam b’ow itŋn ɛy fɛŋ e sos megl a.
46015052	Low na b’ow ɛc fafa, ow b’ow ɛc fafa marɛm, wanci ab af eke kɔkr es abal el a b’ow ikŋ a. Ɛɛ, kɔkr a b’ow ikŋ ɛtŋ agŋ a ek’uw a b’ow igb owr anŋ ek’ɔnym uwr a eci, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ si b’ow s’itŋn.
46015053	Tasi ɛm a, ow it eke ɛy e sos megl a eke b’uw ke b’ugŋ es a, k’itŋn el sos megl eke k’ow uwm lɛgŋ kaka ke k’ow ugŋm es ij.
46015054	Sica ɛy e sos megl a ɔtu eke k’uw ke ugŋ es, gbɛkɔ, -li b’ow -l’itŋn -l’el sos megl eke b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Eke low na b’ow ɛy a, ow b’ow ɔŋ ów a fɛŋ ɛy ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af: any eb ɔny luw ɛmn nimum nimum.
46015055	Luw, bogŋ ŋ ec’any eb ab a ee? Luw, bogŋ ŋ eci mbe ab a ee?
46015056	Luw eci mbe a, sikpl ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow, ɛtŋ sikpl b’ɛŋn in ec’abusu a ol ogŋ.
46015057	Gbɛkɔ s’ɔ́ŋ Nyam eke b’ɛcr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm ɔŋ ɛy any eb a bia.
46015058	Ow sosiɛm, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛ̀lul lɛc ɔkm, ìnymn es kikri! Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma a mɛwl ɛm. Ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke in e juma eke am kokr a, elm gbre ɔfr ɔfr ek’am ijr.
46016001	Sica si dádr os a eke wɛl am ɔkl eke k’ɛlum Jerusalɛm e Nyamel a ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a abu a e low. Kòkr low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ eke mi dad m’ɔŋ Sinyamel ek’anŋ Galasi wus af a:
46016002	dimas fɛŋ, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ akŋ ɛtŋ, b’ow oc os am ɛw es saw; ow ɔ́ŋ ke wɛl k’ékum eke mi k’anŋ m’ow gbuŋ ke wɛl ás os a luku.
46016003	Lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow a, agŋ a eke sɔsumn otr a, mi b’ow m’ɛrm ɛl Jerusalɛm. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl abusu e lɛl, ke -l’oc ɔny ec’ob ap a -n’im.
46016004	Sica ek’ow it ek’ɛm obi yɛji mi k’im a, ke -n’im lel ɛm ab.
46016005	Mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ eke mi b’ɛc Maseduan a, aŋke mi b’ow m’ɛcr yogŋ eci.
46016006	K’aw ke m’ánŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ bɛb, oglog ke ow él lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a nimum. Ow ɔ́ŋ ke ɛ́lumn’m abu m’ɔkŋ any m’im ɛm ec’usu a.
46016007	Tasi ɛm a, m’erurm eke ow k’el ɛkn cɛ mi k’ɛkn ɔny ke m’áfŋ es m’aam. M’am ɔny tutr eke mi k’anŋ ɔny ab sɛgŋ bɛb eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛgŋ cɛ.
46016008	Gbɛkɔ mi b’ow m’anŋ Efɛs toŋ ke Pantekɔt ec’es gbɛgbl a ów,
46016009	aŋke ɛm e juma kok ec’abusu nɔnɔ ɛru’m es aŋa, eke agŋ nɔnɔ am atar ɛm ab yɛji.
46016010	Eke Timote ow a, ɛ̀wr in e lís e low ɛrm, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ɛ́kn eke ebr ir sɛnyn sɛnyn ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, aŋke in yɛji Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma n’am kok ɛsɛ ɛm af.
46016011	Ɛgŋ kaka ɔny ɛm a k’íir ir es. Kɔ ɔ̀ŋan in ob eke k’ɛlum’n abu, l’ɛ́wl l’ow n’ɛŋn’m ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, aŋke m’am eku’r in lele agŋ lisijimɛl a eke b’ow ɛwl’l ab ab.
46016012	Sica ɛy lisijim Apolɔs e lís ec’a, m’atr’r sos es sakp nɔnɔ eke li k’ow l’ɛkn ɔny agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb ab ab, gbɛkɔ sicaca ɛm a, li k’erurm eke li k’im usu. Eke abusu b’ow ɛru’r es a, li b’ow l’ow.
46016013	Ànŋn any owr, ìnymn es kikri ɔmn ɛm! Àtar sos es, ɔ̀nyn lɛc!
46016014	Kòkr fɛŋ erur ɛm.
46016015	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛmɛny kin low ɔm nyam: ɔny uwr any eke Stefanas lel in ec’akŋ ab ab el Akayi wus ogog ec’agŋ krɛkrɛ eke itŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke ɛgŋ ɔmn ɛsɛl ɛjec’a e juma eke -li ki kok -n’ɔŋ a e low -l’ebr.
46016016	Ow sosiɛm, ɛ̀lumn agŋ nɛnɛ a lele agŋ a fɛŋ eke am atr sos es kok juma ɛl ab a.
46016017	Sos ɛm am iŋn’m Stefanas, Fɔrtunatus lele Akayikus ab ec’ow na eke ow am ɛkn’m a eci. Ɛl eci saw eke -n’anŋn’m a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɔny yɛji saw cɛ ɔny anŋn’m af.
46016018	Ɛɛ, -n’ɔŋ’m ɛrm es ɛy ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji -n’ɔŋ ɔny. Ow akpl eke k’uwr agŋ nɛnɛ a e leg ab any.
46016019	Azi wus af e Sinyamel a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ɔny. Akilas, Prisil lele agŋ a eke b’as luku ɛl ec’akŋ a, am ɛsŋn ɔny sɛnyn sɛnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm.
46016020	Ɔmn ɛsɛl a fɛŋ ek’anŋ aŋa a am ɛsŋn ɔny. Ɛ̀sŋninin ɔny ɔfr ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl lele lisijɔwɛl ab af.
46016021	Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm mi nɔn ɛsŋn na.
46016022	Eke ɛgŋ nyam érurm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ke Nyam ígŋ ɔwl’l! Marana ta! Ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ òw.
46016023	Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ!
46016024	M’erur ɔny fɛŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm.
47001001	Ɛm Pɔl, m’el Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur. Ɛy lisijim Timote ab e nin ɛm, m’am awŋ Nyamel ek’anŋ Korɛnt a lele Nyam ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ Akayi nimum ab a lɛl na.
47001002	Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy!
47001003	Si kɔ́klm Nyam ek’el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs a! L’el ɛgŋ Ɛs ek’ij gbreŋgbi sɔrŋ ikŋ ɛm ɛtŋ l’el Nyam eke b’atr ɛy sos es low low fɛŋ ɛm.
47001004	Li b’atr ɛy sos es ɛy e ses babur fɛŋ ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy yɛji s’átr agŋ ek’am ij gbre a sos es. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, si b’ɔŋ ɛl yec’a eke ɛy obi yɛji si b’eb Nyam ogŋ a.
47001005	Tasi ɛm a, elel a eke si b’ij gbre nɔnɔ Krist e nin a ec’a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam si b’ɛŋn sos es atr nɔnɔ in ɛm.
47001006	Eke s’anŋ es abur ɛm, ke ɔny e sos es atr lele ɔny e sɔg ab eci. Eke s’am ɛŋn sos es atr, ke ɔny e sos eke si k’atr ɔny es ɛ́gŋn gbre nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke s’am ij ɛsɛ ɔny af a ebr eci.
47001007	S’ɔny ɔmn tasi ɛy ɛm eke si bi tutr ɔny e lís owi a, aŋke s’uw low nyam any: ek’am ijr gbre ɛy ab a, ɔny yɛji sos es atr eke s’ɛŋn a el ɔny eci.
47001008	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow it e k’uwr any eke Azi wus af a, s’ɛgŋ gbre ijr ɛgbɛl nɔnɔ s’eb, gbre ijr ek’ɛl e leg a agb afŋn ɛy e lɛc ab es, toŋ ke s’irmn owr anŋ ec’ɔmn fɛŋ.
47001009	Ɛtŋ ɛy obi yɛji s’uw any tasi eke si b’ow s’uw. Ɛbɛn a, si k’ɔtum s’ocm ɛy ec’ɔmn s’ɛlum ɛy obi ɛm ij, kɔ Nyam eke b’igbm agŋ luw ɛm a sɔny coco ɛm si k’oc s’ɛlu.
47001010	Nyam anake ɔny oc ɛy es luw na ɛm a ɛtŋ ɛmɛny li b’ow n’ɔny l’oc ɛy es. Ɛɛ, s’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm eke ɛmɛny li b’ow n’ɔny l’oc ɛy es.
47001011	Ɔny yɛji, eke bi ŋɔŋan Nyam ɔŋn ɛy, ke abu ɛlumn ɛy a. Ɛtŋ si b’ow s’ɛŋn bibm Nyam ɛm, agŋ nɔnɔ eci ŋɔŋn a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ na sosiɛm agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ɔtu ɔŋ Nyam bia ɛy eci.
47001012	Eke low nyam anŋ eke k’ɔŋ ntotŋ ok ɛy, ke ɛy ec’ów tutr a ec’ów eke ókm ɛy af a. N’am dad ɛy tasi eke si kok low ɛlum ɛm lele nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ab agŋ fɛŋ ab, ab brobro ɔny e lís. Na low ek’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow, Nyam eci ɛrm mamn a anake nyimn ɛy a, kɔ ow elm agŋ e sɛwr a gbɛ.
47001013	-
47001014	Tasi ɛm a, awal yec’a eke si nɔn ɛy e silɛl ab ɛm a, irir ɛtŋ si lɔlam ɔny low kaka es ɛm yogŋ. Low nyam gbɛ anŋ eke irimn okm ɔny es sos ɛm, kɔ m’am ɔny ɔmn eke ow b’ow ok ɔny es sos ɛm tasi: lɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu b’ow ow a, ntotŋ b’ow ok ɔny ɛy eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji ow b’ow ok ɛy ɔny ec’ab af.
47001015	-
47001016	Eke m’uw ɔny eci ntotŋ ab any tasi a, mi bɛbm eke mi k’ikŋ anym m’ɛc ɔny ogŋ a, ke m’anŋ yogŋ m’im Maseduan, ba ɛm e mɛny ɛwl ow ɛm a, ke mi gbár es ɔny ogŋ yogŋ. Ɛbɛn a, ow b’ow ɔŋ ɔny abusu kokr sos ɛm iŋn sakp yony ɛtŋ b’ow ɛlumn’m abu m’im Jude.
47001017	Eke mi bɛbm low na a, kɔ mi tutrm ów ee? Oglog eke mi bi bɛbm ów a, kɔ ɛm obi ec’erur a eke mi ki kok a sosiɛm mi b’ɛgŋ 'ɛɛ', ke ɛmɛny m’ítŋn m’ɛsɛ 'njaŋ' ee?
47001018	M’am eb Nyam daŋku, odad eke s’am dad ɔny a, elm 'ɛɛ' lele 'njaŋ' ab.
47001019	Silas, Timote lele ɛm ab, s’ɔb ɔny Nyam Jim Jesu Krist ec’amani a. Ow akpl ke úwr any eke Jesu elm 'ɛɛ' lele 'njaŋ' ab, kɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ 'ɛɛ' cɛ li b’el.
47001020	Tasi ɛm a, Jesu el ów a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛwar ɛy ɛw es a eci 'ɛɛ'. Ɛtŋ Jesu ɛm anake si bi dad ɛy eci 'amɛn' a, ke si bi kɔklm Nyam ec’anygbɛl a.
47001021	Nyam in obi anake b’ɔŋ ke ɔny lele ɛy ab, si b’ɔny lɛc Krist ɛm a. In anake li sɔsum l’ot ɛy,
47001022	ke l’ɛw ɛy in e mɛny ɛwr a ek’am yɛgm eke s’el in ec’a af a. L’oc Abŋ Lala l’ɛlu ɛy ɛrm ɛm, eke k’el aja a eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a eci asmanu.
47001023	Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ mi k’ɛwlm mi k’owm Korɛnt ee? M’am eb Nyam daŋku, l’uw’m any ɛtŋ l’uw any eke m’ɔnym yadŋ. Mi k’owm, aŋke m’erurm eke mi k’ijr ɔny gbre.
47001024	S’ɔlm eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny low lɛc ɛm ubr nawrɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm, gbɛkɔ s’am erur eke si k’okr af si kok juma ɔny e sos ɛm iŋn a eci.
47002001	Kin low yec’eke mi bɛbm a: m’erurm eke mi k’ɛwl m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, eke ɛmɛny ow b’ow ɔwr ɔny sos es.
47002002	Eke ɛm m’ɔwr ɔny sos es, ke bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn, eke ow elm ɔny a cɛ eke m’ɔwr ɔny sos es ab ee?
47002003	M’erurm eke mi k’ow m’ɛkn ɔny, ke m’ɔwr ɔny sos es. Ow akplm ek’agŋ a ek’it eke k’ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn a, k’el agŋ a eke b’ɔwr’m sos es a. Na ec’anake m’awŋ ɔny lɛl es abal el a. M’uw any tasi eke low yec’eke b’ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn a, ɔny yɛji b’ɔŋ ɔny sos ɛm iŋn.
47002004	Ɛɛ, mikŋ ab mi nɔn lɛl a m’awŋ ɔny, sos es ɔw lel ɛrm mij ab iy’m ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ. Gbɛkɔ m’awŋm ɔny lɛl a eke mi k’ɔwr ɔny sos es, m’awŋ ɔny yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛ́kan erur ligbɛl a eke m’ɔny ɔny ec’a.
47002005	Nawrɛ, ɛgŋ na eke is sos es ɔw owi na a, ow elm ów a m’erurm eke mi k’agbr gbɛ, kɔ m’am dad m’ɛsɛ li kok Nyamel low ŋuŋ l’akm ɛm obi a. Ɛtŋ ek’ow elm ɔny fɛŋ yɛji, ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb gbɛ low a ɔn es.
47002006	Ɛgŋ ikŋ a ec’a, abr a cɛ eke ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ ɛnym’n a ɔdŋ cɛ ŋ̂.
47002007	Ow sosiɛm, caca ɛm a, ow akpl eke k’ocr apr ir ke atar ir sos es; ek’ow elm ɛbɛn, sos es ɔw ligbɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔwr’r sos es nimum nimum.
47002008	Sica m’am ibrm eke k’ɛlul erur ɔkm in e lís.
47002009	Tasi ɛm a, kin low a nuŋ af eke m’awŋ ɔny lɛl a: m’erur eke mi k’ɛkn eke b’ow ɔnyn ɛlumn low low fɛŋ ɛm.
47002010	Eke b’apr ɛgŋ low, ɛm yɛji mi b’ap’r. Eke low anŋ eke mi k’ap yɛji, mi b’oc m’ap ɔny sosiɛm, Krist ec’any af.
47002011	Ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, Satan ɔ́tum ɛjum ɛy. Ɛɛ, s’uw in e sow tutr ab any tasi.
47002012	Eke m’im m’ɛy Troas ɛb ɛm, Krist ec’Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb ec’a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ’m m’ɛŋn juma na e kok ec’abusu mamn.
47002013	Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny ɛrmij nɔnɔ, aŋke m’ɔtum m’ɛŋnm ɛy lisijim Tit. Na sosiɛm m’ibrm Troas ec’agŋ a abusu ɛtŋ m’eb ejagb m’im Maseduan wus af.
47002014	S’ɔ́ŋn Nyam bia! Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, li b’ɛcr Krist ɛm l’ot l’ok ɛy in ec’agŋ a ek’eb any ke am ij facue ab ɛm, ɛtŋ li b’ɛcr ɛy ɛm n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl uw Krist any usu a fɛŋ. Ow anŋ ɛsɛ sɔsŋ mamn eke b’eb es usu a fɛŋ af.
47002015	Ɛɛ, ɛy s’anŋ ɛsɛ mijey sŋɔsŋɔ eke Krist am ɔŋ Nyam af. Ɛtŋ ow eci sɔsŋ a ok sakp yony: agŋ a ek’anŋ sel ɛŋn ec’ejagb ab af a lele ɛl a ek’am irmn ɛl e sel ab ab eci.
47002016	Agŋ a ek’am irm ec’a, ow el luw e sɔsŋ eke b’ism luw ab. Kɔ agŋ likpr a ec’a, ow el owr anŋ e sɔsŋ eke b’ism owr anŋ ab. Ɛtŋ kɔ bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔny abusu eke ki kok juma nɛnɛ ee?
47002017	Ɛy s’anm ɛsɛ agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl eke b’oc Nyam odad am ɔɔl an, os eke -li k’ɛŋn sosiɛm ec’ab af. Ɛy, Nyam am ɛkn eke s’am dad odad eke b’anŋ in ogŋ ow a nɛny nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ s’am dad lele Krist ec’abusu ab ab.
47003001	Nɛnɛ eke s’am dad a, kɔ ɛy obi ɛy obi s’am aw abusu s’eb ab ee? Agŋ bɛb ec’a ow it eke -li ki yɛgm ɔny ɛl ec’abusu ɔny e silɛl oglog -l’ibrm ɔny e lís. Kɔ ɛy yɛji ɛbɛn si ki kok ab ee?
47003002	Ɛy e lɛl a, ow ow el ɔny. Ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm wɛl nɔn, agŋ a fɛŋ uw any ɛtŋ b’awl.
47003003	Ɛɛ, ow ayl, Krist in obi nɔn lɛl na, ɛtŋ ɛy anake s’oc s’ow a. N’anm ɛsɛ lɛl eke wɛl oc lɛl mij nɔn ab af, kɔ Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’Abŋ a l’oc ni nɔn. Ow elm lebn af ni nɔnm, kɔ agŋ e mɛrm ab ɛm ni nɔn.
47003004	Nyam ec’any af a, s’ɔny ɔmn low na ɛm, aŋke Krist ɔŋ ɛy ɔmn ɔny ligbɛl.
47003005	Si kí tutrm eke si k’ɔny abusu si kok low ɛy sɔny coco, kɔ Nyam anake ɔŋ ɛy s’ɔny abusu si kok low a eke s’am kok a.
47003006	In anake n’ɔŋ ɛy s’ɔny abusu s’am kok sinm owr na e juma a. Sinm na anm ol eke wɛl nɔn a e low ɛm, kɔ Abŋ Lala e low ɛm n’anŋ. Ol eke wɛl nɔn a b’ism luw ab, kɔ Abŋ Lala, in, b’ism sel ab.
47003007	Ol a eci sodad a lebn af wɛl nɔn, ɛtŋ luw cɛ l’ism ab. Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam ec’anygbɛl a jɛjn Mois ec’any ab af. In ec’any a am jɛjn afŋn es toŋ Israɛl ec’ey a ɔ́tum eke ki lɛr’r, eke jɛjn a ɔb nuŋ am is es a bɔbɔ yɛji.
47003008	Gbɛkɔ Abŋ Lala e juma a eke am kok a b’ow ɛŋn anygbɛl agb akm na.
47003009	Eke ol eke b’ism agŋ luw ab a e juma a ɛŋn anygbɛl ligbɛl, ow ayl tasi eke Abŋ Lala eke b’ɔŋ agŋ el nyim nyim a eci juma a, b’ow ɛŋn anygbɛl eke b’ow agb nɔnɔ ligbɛl.
47003010	Ow ɔŋ a, anygbɛl a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a jɛjn a, elm low kaka ij anygbɛl liplemu na ec’any af.
47003011	Eke ów a eke íbnm a anygbɛl iy ɛm gbɔŋ, ɛbɛn ke ɛl a eke bibn a, b’ow ɛŋn anygbɛl ek’agb nɔnɔ ligbɛl.
47003012	Low ɔmn na ab, s’ɔny ɔmn iy ɛy ɛm gbɔŋ.
47003013	Ɛy si kókm ɛsɛ Mois eke oc gbad bubur any es, yec’ɛtŋ ke Israɛl ec’ey a k’ɔ́nym abusu ɛknm anygbɛl a e jɛjn a eke ibnm, ke am uwr a.
47003014	Gbɛkɔ ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a ɔ́tum irim low kaka. Ɛtŋ toŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, eke -li b’awl sinm sig e silɛl a, gbad nyam a cɛ ɛmɛny bi bubur ów a es, aŋke gbad a, Krist ab ec’af okr a cɛ b’ɔny oc’r es.
47003015	Tasi ɛm a, toŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, sakp sakp fɛŋ eke Israɛl eyŋ b’awl Mois e silɛl a, gbad nyam bi bubur ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny ab es.
47003016	Gbɛkɔ sakp sakp fɛŋ eke ɛgŋ nyam b’ɛwl ow Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ogŋ a, gbad a b’oc es.
47003017	Odad na eke el 'Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ' a, ke Abŋ Lala ana. Ɛtŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’Abŋ a anŋ usu nyam, in anake li b’ɔŋ ɛy s’ŋgboŋ ɛy e madu el ab ɛm a.
47003018	Ɛy fɛŋ ec’any a gbɛ gbad anm buburm es, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’anygbɛl a am ɔŋ’n li jɛjn ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ ɛm ɛs am lɛr af. Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’el Abŋ a b’itŋn ɛy. Li b’ɔŋ s’anŋ ɛsɛ in af, anygbɛl ligbɛl nyam eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ anŋ ɛsɛ in ec’ab af ab ɛm.
47004001	Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, abul ɛy juma na; ow sosiɛm anake sos ɔwm ɛy es a.
47004002	Ɛy si wal yadŋ owi fɛŋ eke wɛl b’oc kokr ɛ́s owi es lɔl ɛm a s’ɛlu es. S’am kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ɛtŋ s’ɔ́nym Nyam ec’odad ebl a s’itŋnm. Kɔ nana, si b’ɛlu low nawrɛ ɔkm kpata, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ow b’ɔŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛl e tutr ab ɛm, b’uw agŋ yec’eke s’el ab any.
47004003	Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, ɛy ec’Amani Mamn a b’el ob eke lɔl es agŋ bɛb a eke am irmn ɛl e sel a eci.
47004004	-N’ɔnymn ɔmn aŋke Satan, wus na e nyàm ŋuŋ a efal ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a any, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ -l’ɛknmn Amani Mamn ab ɛm ec’usuayl a eke am jɛjn ow a. Amani Mamn a am dad Krist ek’in obi a el Nyam ec’es otarir kpɛŋ ec’anygbɛl a ec’odad.
47004005	Tasi ɛm a, amani a eke s’am ɔb a, ow elm ɛy obi, kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist s’am ɔb. Ɛtŋ ɛy, s’el ɔny e juma kok ɛsɛl Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
47004006	Nyam dad ninɛ: ke usuayl áfŋ ncebn ec’araŋn! Ɛtŋ ow el in obi eke l’afŋ ɛy e mɛrm ab ɛm ɛy ec’es ɛkan eci, ke n’ɔŋ ɛy s’ɛkn in ec’anygbɛl a ek’am jɛjn Krist ec’any a.
47004007	Gbɛkɔ ɛy eke s’am abu ob ɔny na a, s’anŋ ɛsɛ kpeŋ ɛm mɛw af. Ow b’ɔŋ wɛl b’uw any sɛnyn sɛnyn eke abusu gbɛl na ow elm ɛy ɛm ow ánm ɛym ɔkm, kɔ Nyam ogŋ a ow b’anŋ ow.
47004008	Ses babur b’eb ɛy susu fɛŋ, gbɛkɔ -li kiknmn ɛy es. Ɛtŋ eke si b’anŋ sel at ɛm a bɔbɔ yɛji, s’ígŋm low a s’ɛlum es.
47004009	Wɛl b’ijr ɛy gbre ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ Nyam ígŋm ɛlum ɛy es. Wɛl b’ɔny ok ɛy wus, kɔ s’úwm gbɛ.
47004010	Gbre ij na ɛm, si b’uw Jesu e luw a ek’anŋ ɛy sos megl ɛm ab any, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́tu s’uw in ec’owr anŋ a ek’anŋ ɛy sos megl ɛm a yɛji any.
47004011	Tasi ɛm a, s’anŋ owr, gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ si b’ɔny low luw ab eke s’am us Jesu jam a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a yɛji, ow b’ɔŋ wɛl b’ɛkn eke Jesu anŋ owr ɛy e sos megl a eke b’uw ab ɛm.
47004012	Low eke wɛl b’ɛkn ɛm a el: luw eke am kok low ɛy ɛm, ke owr anŋ in am kok low ɔny ɛm a.
47004013	Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: M’ɔny ɔmn, ow sosiɛm mi dad. Ɔmn nyam a cɛ b’ɔŋ ɛy si kok low. Ɛy yɛji s’ɔny ɔmn, ow sosiɛm s’am dad.
47004014	Ɛɛ, s’uw any eke Nyam ek’igbm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu luw ɛm a, ɛy yɛji b’ow igbm ɛy luw ɛm in ab, ɛtŋ ɔny lel ɛy ab, li b’ow l’ot l’ok ɛy es ow e saw.
47004015	Gbre fɛŋ eke s’am ij a ɔny sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ec’ów amamn a eke am agb eb es a, ɔ́ŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ am ɛnyn nɔnɔ ɔŋn in bia, ke ókar af ɔny fɛŋ kɔklmn in.
47004016	Na sosiɛm anake sos ɔ́wm ɛy es a. Ɛtŋ eke ɛy e sos megl a am uŋ tɛl tɛl yɛji, yec’a ek’el ɛy ec’abŋ ɛm ec’a, lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ b’el owr.
47004017	Ɛɛ, ɛy e yɛfɛnyna ɛm e gbre ij nɔnɔ a ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɛtŋ bibn sɛgŋ tɛl cɛ, gbɛkɔ ow bi bɛbm anygbɛl liplemu nyam ɛy eci. Anygbɛl ikŋ a b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛtŋ l’agb nɔnɔ l’akm ɛy e yɛfɛnyna e gbre ij a fɛŋ.
47004018	Ɛy, s’ɔ́lm yec’a eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛkn ab es, kɔ yec’a eke wɛl ɛ́knm a s’am ɔl es. Tasi ɛm a, yec’a eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛkn a íbnm nɔnɔ, kɔ yec’a eke wɛl ɛ́knm a b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
47005001	Wus af aŋa, s’ir sos megl nyam ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ndey lɛl ɛm êl eke lɛgŋ nyam b’ow ufŋ es ab ɛm. Gbɛkɔ s’uw any eke afr Nyam ɛw ɛy êl nyam eke b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab es. Êl eke Nyam us in obi, ke ow elm agŋ ec’abu usm.
47005002	Sicaca ɛm a, s’am ikŋn sɔmu, ɛtŋ s’am ɔɔl ɛy e lɛc fɛŋ ɛm eke si k’oc mob sus ɛm ɛjec’a s’ɛw sos af, mob sus ɛm a ek’el ɛy ec’afr ec’êl a.
47005003	Ɛɛ, low na anake s’am ɔɔl es a, yec’ɛtŋ ke si k’élmn abŋ eke ɔnym sos megl.
47005004	Lɛgŋ na ɛm eke s’iir ɛy e wus aŋa ec’êl ab ɛm a, s’am ikŋn sɔmu ɛsɛ ɛrɛkp leg leg ec’ew ɛs anŋ af. Ow elm ke s’am erur eke si k’uw ke si k’ɔnymn sos megl eci. Njaŋ, s’am erur eke si ki sus ɛy ec’afr e sos megl a ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af, yec’ɛtŋ ke sel ek’ɔnym uwr a ɔ́ny ɛy e sos megl a eke b’uw a ɛmn.
47005005	Nyam in obi anake bɛbm ɛy ɛb ir na eci sos a. Ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɛy Abŋ Lala eke el aja a eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a eci asmanu.
47005006	Ow sosiɛm a, sɛgŋ fɛŋ sos es atr iy ɛy ɛm gbɔŋ. Gbɛkɔ ɛy s’uw any, lɛgŋ na ɛm eke s’iir ɛy e sos megl na ɛm a, si kpab es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lís.
47005007	Tasi ɛm a, ɔmn ɛm s’am ir ɛb, kɔ ow elm es eke s’am ɛkn ab ɛm.
47005008	Ɛɛ, sos es atr iy ɛy ɛm gbɔŋ ɛtŋ s’am erur tasi eke si k’ŋgboŋ sos megl na ɛm, s’im s’ir ɛb Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci saw.
47005009	Gbɛkɔ low krɛkrɛ eke s’am erur a el ke ɛy owi aw’r, eke s’anŋ sos megl na ɛm ɛtŋ s’anm ɛm yɛji.
47005010	Ɛy fɛŋ ow ibrm eke si b’ow s’imn Krist e jɛj ok a ec’any af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɛ́ŋn yec’a ek’it eke k’ɛbmn, in ec’ów amamn lel eŋuŋ eke li kok in e wus aŋa ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm a.
47005011	Ɛ́lum Nyam ɔmn ɛm a, s’uw low yec’eke ow am dad ab any. Na sosiɛm anake s’am ɔl elel eke si ki dadr ow e low ok agŋ es sos ɛm a. Nyam uw ɛy any igŋ nuŋ ɛtŋ l’uw any eke s’ɔny nɛny nyam, ɔny yɛji m’am ɔmn eke ɔny e mɛrm ab ɛm, uwr any ɛbɛn.
47005012	Ɛy, ɛmɛny si k’ow s’ɔlm eke si k’aw abusu s’eb, kɔ s’am erur eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny abusu ntotŋ ok ɔny ɛy eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́nyn low dadr ɔŋn agŋ a eke b’ɛw sos ów eke wɛl b’ɛkn nyamn ɛm a eci, ke ow elm ów a eke b’anŋ ɛgŋ ɛrm ɛm ec’a.
47005013	Eke agŋ am dad eke eŋ ɛm in uŋ ɛy, ke Nyam sosiɛm eci. Ɛtŋ eke wɛl am ot ɛy ány es oku, ke ɔny e low nimamn eci.
47005014	Erur eke Krist ɔny ɛy ec’a am ucu ɔny ɛy es, aŋke s’uw any tasi eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ uw agŋ fɛŋ eci; ɛgŋ a el Krist, ɛtŋ ɛy fɛŋ in e luw a el ɛy eci.
47005015	L’uw ɛy fɛŋ eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ek’anŋ owr a k’írm ɛb ɛl obi ɛl obi ec’ij, kɔ ke -l’ir ɛb Krist ek’uw ke igb luw ɛm ɛl ec’a eci.
47005016	Low na sosiɛm anake jam aŋa, si k’ow si lɛrm ɛgŋ ɛsɛ elel ek’agŋ bi lɛɛr ɛgŋ ab af a. Ɛtŋ ek’ow el ɛbɛn anake si lɛr Krist a, ke jam aŋa, ow elm ɛbɛn s’am lɛrm’n ij.
47005017	Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋ nyam okr af Krist ab, n’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke Nyam kokr ɛm af. Low yec’eke el lisig a uwr, ɛtŋ yec’a ek’el owr a eb usu.
47005018	Amua fɛŋ Nyam ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow. L’ɛcr Krist ɛm n’ɔny l’okr ɛy ɛm in obi in obi ab, ɛtŋ l’abul ɛy agŋ ɛjec’a lele in ab ec’ɛm okr a e juma.
47005019	Nawrɛ, Nyam ɛrm Krist ow in lele agŋ ab ec’ɛm okr a eci, ɛtŋ l’úsm wɛl ec’ów ɔbr in e lís a e low jam ij. Ɛtŋ l’abul ɛy in ec’ɛm okr ec’amani ɔb a.
47005020	Ɛy s’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛ́rmu eke Krist am ɛrm af. Ɛtŋ Nyam b’ɛcr ɛy ɛm dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ: "Krist e nin ɛm, s’am ok ɔny mɛrm sabu af, yɛ̀br Nyam ɔny ɔkr ɔny ɛm in ab!"
47005021	Krist ɔnym sikpl kaka, gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔb’r low luw eci ɛsɛ sikpl ɛs af ɛy usu iy, yec’ɛtŋ ke si b’okr af Krist ab a, Nyam ót ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af.
47006001	Sica ɛy eke s’am kok juma Nyam ab a, s’am dad ɔny eke k’ocr bibm a ek’ɛŋan in ec’abu ɛm a kokar low sɛnyn.
47006002	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam dad ninɛ: Lɛgŋ mamn ɛm a, m’ɛgŋ’ŋ nɛnym, ɛtŋ sel ɛŋn e lɛgŋ a yɛji, m’eb m’ɛlu’ŋ es. Sica yɛfɛnyna tasi anake el lɛgŋ mamn a, yɛfɛnyna anake el sel ɛŋn e lɛgŋ a.
47006003	Eke s’erurm ek’agŋ ki cak ɛy e juma a, ow ɔŋ ɛy e low fɛŋ ɛm, si kok elel eke si k’elm lirikp ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eci.
47006004	Kɔ nana, si bi yɛgm low fɛŋ ɛm eke s’el Nyam e juma kok ɛsɛl. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, si b’ɛgŋ ɛrm susu ɛm sos es ɔw, ses babur, ɛrm mij ebr,
47006005	ɔr eke wɛl b’ɔr ɛy, sobel ɛm eke wɛl b’ok ɛy lele dedeku ec’af eke b’ok ɛy ab ab e low s’eb. Si b’ɛgŋ sos es kikn ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, mɛmn ɛrum lele namn ab s’eb.
47006006	Si b’ir ɛb lala ɛm si yɛgm eke s’uw Nyam e lís ec’ów any; s’ɔny low eku, s’el ɛrm mamnu, Abŋ Lala anŋ ɛy ab, s’ɔny erur tasi,
47006007	ɛtŋ si b’ɔb low nawrɛ e kokoba, Nyam ec’abusu ab ɛm. Si b’oc yec’a ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a, ɛsɛ ar ogŋn ob af, s’im agŋ ar oglog si dogŋn sos.
47006008	Wɛl b’usr ɛy sos oglog wɛl bi kok ɛy ɛ́s. Wɛl bi dad ɛy e low ŋuŋ lel ɛy e low mamn ab. Wɛl b’ot ɛy ayadŋu, ke low nawrɛ cɛ si bi dad.
47006009	Wɛl bi kok ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ eke wɛl uwm any af, ke wɛl uw ɛy any sɛnyn sɛnyn cɛ. Wɛl bi lɛr ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ ek’am uw af, gbɛkɔ si b’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Wɛl b’ɔr ɛy ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ wɛl íbim ɛy.
47006010	Wɛl b’ɛkn ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ eke sos ɔw es af, gbɛkɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ si b’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Wɛl b’ot ɛy ɔgbɔru, gbɛkɔ si b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a ɔny ob. Wɛl bi tutr eke s’ɔnym ob kaka, ke ɛy nana anake s’ɔny ob fɛŋ a.
47006011	Korɛnt ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm si fig ɛy ec’ɛrm a si dad ɔny odad.
47006012	S’ablm ɛy ec’ɛrm a ɔny e lís, kɔ ɔny anake b’abal ɔny ec’a ɛy e lís a.
47006013	Sica m’am dad ɔny odad ɛsɛ iy ɛs lel in ec’ey ab af m’ɛsɛ: kòkr ɛsɛ ɛy af, ɔny yɛji fìgr ɛy ɔny e mɛrm a foŋ.
47006014	K’ɛ̀wr mɛcrer agŋ a ek’ɔnym ɔmn Nyam ɛm ab ab, k’ɔtumn okrmn ɛb ir af ɛl ab. Kɔ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɔtu eke k’okr af ɛnyɛmbri yony owi eke Nyam érurm ab ab ee? Kɔ usuayl lele ncebn ab b’ɔtu okr af ee?
47006015	Kɔ Krist nɛny ɔtu eke k’okr af Satan ab ee? Kɔ nawrɛ ub ɛs nyam lele nawrɛ ubm ɛs nyam ab ec’araŋn a low ɔtu eke k’anŋ ee?
47006016	Bogŋ ec’iririr k’anŋ Nyam ec’êl a lele sinyam yadŋ ec’ab ab ec’araŋn ee? Ɛy anake s’el Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’êl a, ɛsɛ elel eke in obi li dad ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’anŋ ɛl araŋn ke m’ír ɛb ɛl ab. Mi b’ow m’el ɛl e Nyam ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el ɛm ec’agŋ.
47006017	Ow sosiɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: Ŋ̀gbroŋn agŋ amua ec’araŋn ke kpábr ɛl es lís! K’ìtŋnin ob yec’eke aylm a abu, ɛtŋ ɛm, mi b’ow m’eb ɔny.
47006018	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny Nyam Abusu Ɛs dad ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’el ɔny Ɛs, ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow el ɛm ec’ey egŋ lel ɔyɔw ab.
47007001	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ów ɛwar amua fɛŋ el ɛy eci. Ow sosiɛm a, si yɔ́yɔg ob fɛŋ eke b’ibar ɛy e sos a lel ɛrm ab ab a es, ke s’éel Nyam eci nimum nimum ɛlum ɛm.
47007002	Kòkr ɛy usu ɔny e mɛrm ab ɛm! Si kokm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi ɛgŋ kaka e lís, si ŋuŋnm ɛgŋ kaka ec’ɔmn, ɛtŋ s’ebm ɛgŋ kaka ec’ob s’ijm.
47007003	Mi dadm odad nɛnɛ low e mi k’ɔb ɔny eci. Ɛsɛ elel eke m’ikŋ anym mi dad ab af: ɔny owi anŋ ɛy ɛrm ɛm, ɛtŋ s’okr af owr anŋ ɛm toŋ luw ɛm.
47007004	M’ɔny ɔmn ligbɛl ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ ntotŋ b’ok’m ɔny eci. Eke s’ɔny ses babur nɔnɔ yɛji, m’ɔny sos es atr nɔnɔ ɛtŋ sos ɛm iŋn iy’m ɛm gbɔŋ.
47007005	Tasi ɛm a, eke s’im s’ok Maseduan a, s’ɛŋnm sel es ok kaka. Kɔ nana, gbre ɛrŋ ɛrŋ s’ɛŋn ɛsɛ: agŋ eke ok ɛy af lele ɛrm ɛm ec’erŋn ab.
47007006	Gbɛkɔ Nyam eke b’atr agŋ eke sos b’ɔw es a sos es a, atr ɛy sos es Tit ec’ow a ek’anŋ ow ab ɛm.
47007007	Ɛtŋ ow elm Tit ec’ow a sɔny cɛ atrm ɛy sos es, kɔ ɔny e sos a eke atar ir es ec’amani a eke n’ɔŋ ɛy a yɛji. Li dad eke ɔny ɔnyn ɛm ec’ɛkn ec’erur nɔnɔ. Ɛtŋ li dad ɛy ɔny e sos ɛm ɛy owi low a ek’ɛy a eci lele ɛm e dogŋn eke dogŋnin’m gbragbra kok ɛm ab ab. Ów amua anake ɔŋ ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn a agb nɔnɔ a.
47007008	Tasi ɛm a, eke ɛm e lɛl es abal el a ɔwr ɔny sos es, ke ɛm, ow e low ɛym im sos ɛm ij. Ɛɛ, m’uw any tasi eke lɛl a ɔwr ɔny sos es lɛgŋ tɛl eci, ɛtŋ nawrɛ ow e low ɛy’m sos ɛm,
47007009	gbɛkɔ caca ɛm a, m’anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ow elm ɔny e sos es ɔw a sosiɛm, kɔ eke ɔny e sos es ɔw a ɔŋ ɔny itŋnin es an a sosiɛm. Sos es ɔw a eke Nyam b’erur in ec’agŋ ec’ab ana, ɛtŋ nɛnɛ a, ow am yɛgm eke si kokm ɔny low ŋuŋ.
47007010	Tasi ɛm a, sos es ɔw a eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm a, b’ɔŋ ɛy s’itŋn es an ɛtŋ bi nyimn ɛy sel ɛŋn ɛm. Sos es ɔw nɛnɛ a ɔtum eke k’ɛy ɛy sos ɛm. Gbɛkɔ wus ec’ów ec’ɛrm mij ebr a eci sos es ɔw a, ek’ítŋnm ɛgŋ ec’es an a, bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm.
47007011	Ɔny eci sos es ɔw a akpl Nyam sos ɛm. Sica lɛ̀ɛr ow ec’ey eke ow ɔsu: ow ɔŋ ɔny low es ogŋ kok lele low oc ap ec’ibrm ab! Ow ɔŋ ɔny low sos ɛm ɛy lele low uru low kok ɛm ab! Ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛkn ec’aw lele ɛm e dogŋn gbragbra kok ɛm ab! Ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ ɔny low ŋuŋ kok ɛs a eci low ɛw ɔŋ! Low na ɛm a, yɛgmn eke ɔnymn low af ok kaka.
47007012	Sica m’awŋm ɔny lɛl ɛgŋ a eke kok low ŋuŋ a sosiɛm oglog ɛgŋ a eke wɛl kok low ɔbr a sosiɛm. Kɔ m’erur eke mi ki yɛgm ɔny Nyam ec’any af, ɛkan eke b’erurir ɛy owi tasi.
47007013	Na anake el low ek’atr ɛy sos es a. Ɛtŋ sos es atr na e low ek’igŋ af, ke obn ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn a el Tit eci sos ɛm iŋn a ek’ɛŋn a. Ɛɛ, ɔny fɛŋ ɛyar ir ɛrm es.
47007014	Nawrɛ, in ec’any af mi dad ɔny ec’odad nɛny ij ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔɔmn’m ɛ́s. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ si bi dad ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ kin ow e low ek’ow ism ab: m’ɔny low ij eke mi dad ɔny e lís owi nɛny ij ɛm Tit ec’any af.
47007015	N’am ɔkn elel a eke ɔny fɛŋ ɛlumn low lele ɔny ec’elel a eke ebr ir ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm lele sos ufŋ ɛm ab a. Ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm in ec’erur a e n’ɔny ɔny ec’a ɛmɛny agb obn.
47007016	Sos ɛm am iŋn’m eke m’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔmn ɔny low fɛŋ ɛm a.
47008001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yec’eke s’am erur eke k’uwr any: Nyam ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn a ɔkm bibm eke n’ɔŋ Maseduan e Sinyamel ab ɛm.
47008002	-L’ɔbr ses babur nɔnɔ ɛsɛ ɛbm ɛkn af, gbɛkɔ ɔmn ɛsɛl a sos ɛm iŋn iy ɛm gbɔŋ. -L’ij gbɔr nɔnɔ, gbɛkɔ -l’ɛlu ɛrm mamn ɔny nɔnɔ ɔkm ɛl ec’ob eke -l’apr ab ɛm.
47008003	-N’ɔŋ yec’a eke -l’ɔtur a, ɛtŋ -n’ɔŋ ow afŋ es yɛji, m’ij ow e daŋku. Ow elm lɛc ɛm wɛl ɔnym ɛl -n’ɔɔm; kɔ ɛl obi tasi ec’erur ɛm -li kok.
47008004	Tasi ɛm a, -l’ibrm ɛy atrm ɛm eke ɛl yɛji, ɛl ec’abu k’anŋ Jerusalɛm ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a ec’abu ɛlum owi ab ɛm.
47008005	-L’ikŋ anym -l’ocr ɛl sosi -n’ɔŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛtŋ ow e jam a, -l’ocr ɛl sosi -n’ɔŋ ɛy yɛji, ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af. Ɛtŋ na el low eke s’ɔmnm kaka.
47008006	Na sosiɛm anake s’atr Tit sos es eke li k’ɛwl l’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, ke l’úwar ɔny ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny e juma mamn a eke l’ɔb nuŋ a.
47008007	Ɔny ijr lɛc ów ów a fɛŋ ɛm: ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm, Nyam odad dad ɛm, uwr Nyam ec’ów ab any, sɛgŋ fɛŋ bɛbmn sos low kok eci, ɛtŋ ɔnyn ɛy ec’erur yɛji. Na sosiɛm, ow it eke ki yɛgmn ɔny e lɛc ij a, ɔny ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny ab ɛm yɛji.
47008008	Ow elm ol m’ɛwm m’ɔɔm ɔny, kɔ Nyamel bɛb a ec’elel eke gbragbra kok ɛm kokr low a cɛ m’am dad ɔny. Nɛnɛ ke m’ɔ́ŋ ɔny abusu yɛgmn eke ɔny ec’erur a el nawrɛ tasi.
47008009	Tasi ɛm a, ɔny uwr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e bibm a lele ɛrm mamn ab ab any. L’el gbreŋgbi, gbɛkɔ ɔny sosiɛm l’ɛgŋ gbɔr l’eb, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e gbɔr a ɔ́ŋ ɔny eel egbreŋgbi.
47008010	Ɛm ec’elel eke m’am ɛkan low a el, ke kókr low a ek’ɔbr nuŋ lakpo jam a yibar, aŋke ɔny eel agŋ krɛkrɛ eke is ob ap na e tutr a, ɛtŋ ɔny cɛ eel ɛmɛny agŋ krɛkrɛ ek’ɔb nuŋ kok ow e low.
47008011	Eke isr ow e low a, yɛgmn ɔny ec’erur ek’ɔnyn a. Ow sosiɛm erur nyam ab ɛm cɛ, ùcur low a ɔnyn es toŋ ke ígŋn nuŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ob ek’ɔny ab ɛm.
47008012	Eke wɛl b’ɔŋ ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm a, Nyam b’ɛkn ow e s’ɔny a ɛtŋ li b’eb ow eke si b’ap a. L’íbram eke si k’ap ow eke s’ɔnym a.
47008013	Ow elm ke wɛl ɔ́ŋ ɔny ijr gbɔr agŋ ɛjec’a ec’abu ɛlum a sosiɛm. Njaŋ, kpɛŋ kpɛŋ eke k’eel a wɛl am ɔl.
47008014	Lɛgŋ na ɛm a, ow a ek’ɔnyn bubu af a ɔtu eke k’ɛlum agŋ ɛjec’a ek’ɔnym a abu, yec’ɛtŋ eke lɛgŋ nyam ɔnyn es abur ɛtŋ ɛl -n’ɔny ob nɔnɔ a, ke ɛl yɛji -l’ɛlum ɔny abu. Nɛnɛ ke ɔny fɛŋ éel kpɛŋ kpɛŋ.
47008015	Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ɛgŋ a eke ot nɔnɔ a, ɔnym ob ij afŋnm es. Ɛgŋ a eke ot tɛl a, ɔpim ob ij lɛgŋ kaka.
47008016	M’am ɔŋ Nyam bia, aŋke n’ɔŋ Tit gbragbra kok nyam a cɛ eke li k’oc l’ɛlum ɔny abu, l’akm ɛm obi ec’a e m’ɔny a.
47008017	Tit ɛgŋ ɛy ec’ɛrm a ek’el ɔny ec’ow ɛkn a ɛmɛny eb, ɛtŋ n’am ogŋ es eke kpɛkŋ li k’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ.
47008018	S’am ɔŋ’n l’ow ɛgŋ lisijim nyam ab. Ɛgŋ lisijim a, Sinyamel a fɛŋ b’aw’r, in ec’Amani Mamn ec’ɔb e juma kok a sosiɛm.
47008019	Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ! Sinyamel a sɔsum oc’r, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ígŋ ɛy ab s’oc bibm na s’im. Ow el juma eke si ki kok, ke ám ɛlu Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in obi ec’anygbɛl ɔkm, ke ám yɛgm ɛy ec’abu ɛlum ec’erur e s’ɔny a.
47008020	Wɛl abul ɛy os nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ s’am erur eke wɛl kí cakm ɛy ec’elel eke s’am kokr ow e juma a.
47008021	S’am ɔl low yec’eke akpl ab es, ɛtŋ ow elm Nyam ec’any af cɛ, kɔ agŋ ec’any af yɛji.
47008022	S’ɔŋ ɛy lisijim nyam yɛji igŋ Tit lele ɛgŋ lisijim nyam a eke k’ɛwl’l ab ab af. Ɛgŋ lisijim na yɛgm ɛy sakp nɔnɔ in ec’elel eke li b’erur tasi l’ɛlum agŋ ɛjeci abu a. Caca ɛm a, li b’erur es ogŋ ɛm tasi l’ɛlum agŋ abu, aŋke n’ɔny ɔmn nɔnɔ ɔny ɛm.
47008023	M’am ɔŋ Tit ek’el ɛm lawl ke bi kok juma ɛm ab ɔny sosiɛm ec’a, lele agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjeci amua ek’el Sinyamel ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl a ow ɛkn ɔny. Ɛl fɛŋ Krist ec’anygbɛl a e juma -n’am kok.
47008024	Ow sosiɛm yɛ̀gmn ɛl eke b’erurir ɛl, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ Sinyamel a úw any nawrɛ, ke -l’ɛkn yɛj’eke ntotŋ ɔtu eke k’ok ɛy ɔny eci.
47009001	Jerusalɛm ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a ec’abu ɛlum eke wɛl k’oc im ɔŋ ec’a, ow ɛbam eke mi k’awŋ ɔny ow e lɛl.
47009002	M’uw ɔny e sow tutr amamn ab any. Maseduan ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a ec’any af, m’ij nɛny mi dad ɛl eke Akayi ogog ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a, lakpo jam ɛtŋ bɛbm sos abu ɛlum na ec’os a eci. Ɛtŋ ɔny e low na eke ogŋn es ɛgŋn ebr a, atr agŋ nɔnɔ sos es.
47009003	Ow sosiɛm m’ɛrm agŋ lisijimɛl amua, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɛkn tasi eke bɛbmn sos. Ow ɔ́ŋ ke wɛl ɛ́kn eke ɛy e nɛny a e s’ij ɔny ec’a elm ɔfr ɔfr.
47009004	Sica eke Maseduan ec’agŋ igŋ’m ab ow ɛtŋ ɛkn eke bɛbamn sos, ow b’ow ɔny ɛy ɛ́s nɔnɔ eke s’oc ɔmn s’ɛlu ɔny ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji ow b’ow el ɔny ec’ɛ́s.
47009005	Na sosiɛm m’ɔny tutr eke ow akpl ke m’íkŋ anym m’ɔŋ agŋ lisijimɛl amua ów ɔny ec’araŋn bɛ́bm ob ap mamn a eke dadr ow e low ɛwr es a, ba mi b’anŋ m’ow a, ke fɛŋ iy nɛny ŋ̂, ke wɛl ɛ́kn eke ow el ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm ɔŋn, kɔ ow elm atrm ɛm.
47009006	Kin yec’ek’it eke k’uwr any: ɛgŋ eke b’ewl tɛl a, b’ub tɛl, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ewl nɔnɔ a, b’ub nɔnɔ.
47009007	Ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔŋ ɛsɛ elel eke li tutr in ec’ɛrm ɛm ab af, ow k’elm sos es ɔw ɛm lele atrm ɛm ab. Tasi ɛm, Nyam b’erur ɛgŋ eke b’ɔŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a.
47009008	Nyam ɔny abusu eke k’ɔŋ ɔny ów amamn fɛŋ ow afŋn ɔny es. Ow ɔ́ŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔnyn ow ek’it a, ke ɔ́nyn ow bubu af, ócr kokr ów amamn.
47009009	Nyam Lɛl dad Nyam ec’ɛgŋ e lís ninɛ: Li b’ɔŋ ɔgbɔru ɛrm mamn ɔny ɛm, ɛtŋ li bi kok sɛgŋ fɛŋ yec’ek’el nyim nyim a.
47009010	Nyam anake b’ɔŋ egb ewl ɛs egb ey lele futufutu eke li k’ij ab ab a. Ɔny yɛji in cɛ li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɔny egb ey, li kok ow ɛny ke n’ɔ́ŋ ow agb. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɔny ec’ów nyim nyim e kok a b’ow ɔsu ey amamn nɔnɔ.
47009011	Kaka fɛŋ, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ɔnyn ob, ɛtŋ b’ow ɛlul ɔny ec’ɛrm mamn ɔny a ɔkm. Ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow ɔŋ Nyam bia sob ap amua eke si b’ow s’ɔŋ ɛl ɔny e nin ɛm a eci.
47009012	Ob ap na ɛm, am ɛlumn Nyam ec’agŋ lala a abu. Ɛtŋ ow elm ke ɔ́ŋn ɛl fɛŋ a eke -n’ɔnym a cɛ, kɔ ɛmɛny b’atar ɛl sos es eke -li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam nɔnɔ -l’ɛlu ow bia.
47009013	Ów amua fɛŋ sosiɛm, -li b’ow -l’ɛkn juma na e leg a ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li kɔklm Nyam, aŋke bi cɛcr ɛrm mamn ɔny ɛm yec’a eke ɔnyn a, Jerusalɛm ec’ɔmn ɛsɛl a lele ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab, ɛtŋ am yɛgmn eke b’ɛlumn Krist ec’Amani Mamn a.
47009014	Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ɔŋ ɔny in e bibm a ow bubu af. Ow sosiɛm, -li b’ow -li yɛgm ɔny ɛl ec’erur a, Nyam eke -li bi ŋɔŋn -n’ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm.
47009015	S’ɔ́ŋn Nyam bia in ec’ob ap mamn a eke wɛl k’ɔtum ocm bɛbmnm ab a eci.
47010001	Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm anake m’am ibrm ɔny low Krist ec’ɛrm frɔrɔ lel ɛrm mamn ab ab ɛm a. Wɛl am dad eke ɛm b’anŋ tiŋ eke ɛm b’anŋ ɔny ec’any af a, kɔ ɛm b’anŋ akpoj a, nɛny in b’ɔtu’m nɔnɔ.
47010002	M’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, k’ɔ̀ŋn mi k’ɛw gbagba lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ec’araŋn a! Agŋ bɛb bi tutr eke s’am kok low ɛsɛ wus ec’agŋ ɛs el af. Ɛɛ, agŋ nɛnɛ e lís a, m’am tutr eke mi b’ow m’ɛlu ɛm ec’ɛrm susu a ɔkm ɛtŋ ek’ow it yɛji mi b’ow m’ɛw gbagba.
47010003	Nawrɛ eke s’el agŋ gɔŋ, kɔ mum a eke s’am ogŋ a elm agŋ ɛm eci.
47010004	Mum a e mob a eke s’am ot s’ogŋn a elm agŋ ec’a. Ɛl e lɛc a, Nyam ogŋ a ow b’anŋ ow ŋuŋn ob fɛŋ eke b’atar in ab a. Si bi ŋuŋn sow tutr yadŋ ɛm a fɛŋ.
47010005	Si b’ɔny tutr fɛŋ e b’ɔl eke k’ɛdŋn agŋ Nyam ec’any uw a s’oc es. Tutr fɛŋ eke b’atar Nyam ab a, si b’ɔny’n lɛc ɛm eke li k’ɛlum Krist.
47010006	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, s’inym es eke low ɛluam fɛŋ ec’a, si k’ɛw low s’ɔŋ ɛgŋ, gbɛkɔ ow akpl eke k’ɔnyn abusu ɛ́lul ɔny ec’ɛlum a nimum ɔkm yɛ.
47010007	Lɛ̀ɛr ów a ec’elel ek’anŋn a sɛnyn sɛnyn! Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny tutr eke in sɔny cɛ l’el Krist eci, ow it ke ɛmɛny li tútr sɛnyn sɛnyn: ɛy yɛji s’el Krist eci ɛsɛ in af.
47010008	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ ɛy abusu eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny e Nyamel a agb ɔmn ɛm, kɔ ow elm in e ŋuŋn eci. Nawrɛ eke low na ɔŋ ntotŋ ok’m nɔnɔ, gbɛkɔ mi k’ow m’ururm ɛ́s na sosiɛm.
47010009	M’erurm eke k’ɛkan’m ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke b’ok agŋ erŋn lokm, in e silɛl e li b’awŋ ab ɛm af.
47010010	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bɛb bi dad ɛsɛ: "Pɔl e silɛl a b’ɛw kpaŋ kpaŋ lele lɛc ɛm ab. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’anŋ ɛy ec’araŋn a, li b’ɛw fuɛfuɛ ɛtŋ sodad eke li bi dad a élm low kaka."
47010011	Ke ɛgŋ a ek’am dad odad nɛnɛ a, úw low na gbɛ any: eke si b’anŋ kpekpe a, si b’awŋ silɛl kpaŋ kpaŋ. Lɛgŋ eke si b’ow s’anŋ ɔny ec’any af a, si b’ow si kok ɛbɛn kpɛŋ.
47010012	Agŋ bɛb b’awr ɛl sosi nɔnɔ, si k’ɔtum si bɛbmnm ɛl ab oglog s’otm ɛl es. -Li b’ocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛ ob bɛbmn ob af -li bɛbmn ɛl sosi, ke -n’ɔnyn ɛl sosi -l’igbl ogŋ -l’ɛkn. Na nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ!
47010013	Ɛy ec’a, si k’ow si yɛbm ɛy eci ntotŋ ok a iim nɔnɔ nɛnɛ. Eke Nyam nyimn ɛy s’ow s’ɛŋn ɔny a, li yɛgm ɛy yogŋ ek’ɛy e juma e l’abul ɛy a k’im ok a, ɛtŋ si b’ow s’oc ereb a ɛsɛ ɛy ec’ob bɛbmn ob af.
47010014	Blel s’owm toŋ s’okm ɔny ogŋ aŋa ana, wɛl ɔtu e k’ɔny tutr dad eke s’am afŋ ɛy ec’abusu a ec’ereb ab es. Kɔ ɛy tasi anake s’ikŋ anym s’oc Krist ec’Amani Mamn a s’ism ɔny ab a.
47010015	Ɛbɛn a, ɛy s’ɛwm sos ɛsɛ ɛbɛn agŋ ɛjeci e juma e kok a e low cɛ ɛs am ibrm af. Kɔ ɛy s’am ɔmn eke ɔny ec’ɔmn a b’ow obn ɛtŋ ɛmɛny s’ɔtu eke si ki kok juma nɔnɔ ɔny ogŋ yogŋ. Gbɛkɔ s’erurm eke si k’afŋ ereb a eke Nyam ɛw ɔŋ ɛy ab es.
47010016	Ow e jam a, si b’ow s’im s’ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba susu eke ibn akm ɔny ogŋ aŋa. S’erurm eke si ki kok juma agŋ ɛjeci e juma kok usu a, ke s’ɛw sos ów a eke -l’ikŋn anym -li kokr a eci.
47010017	Eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’ɛw sos, ke l’ɛ́w sos Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sosiɛm.
47010018	Tasi ɛm a, ow elm ɛgŋ a eke b’awr in sosi a wɛl áwm, kɔ ɛgŋ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’aw a.
47011001	Oy! Blel k’ɛ́gŋn ebr ke ɛm yɛji mi dád ów ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af! Ɛɛ, na ec’a ɛ̀gŋn ebr’m ɛbɛn!
47011002	Erur eke m’ɔny ɔny ec’a b’ogŋ uwerŋ, ɛtŋ el uwerŋ eke b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow. Tasi ɛm a, igŋ ɛbiu nyam cɛ m’ɛwar ɔny in e low m’ɛw es: in l’el Krist. Ɛɛ, mi b’ow m’oc ɔny mi yɛgm’n ɛsɛ dedyɔwli ek’itam ɛm kaka af.
47011003	Gbɛkɔ ɔ̀kan low na: lorŋn oc yadŋ ɛm ɛju Ɛv. Ow ɔŋ erŋn am ɔny’m ek’ɔny yɛji, wɛl ki dad ɔny sow tutr yadŋ, ke ow ɔ́ny kpab ɔny es ów cɛcɛ a lele lala ab ab eke ɛŋan Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm a e lís.
47011004	S’ɔb ɔny Jesu ec’amani, ɛŋan Abŋ Lala ɛtŋ ubr Amani Mamn a nawrɛ. Kɔ sica b’ow ɛgŋn ebr fafa nɛnɛ eke ɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam k’ow dad ɔny Jesu ɛjeci nyam ec’odad, abŋ ɛjeci nyam ec’odad, ke ɔb ɔny amani ɛjeci nyam eke irimn ow e low lɛgŋ kaka ab ee?
47011005	Kɔ ɛm e tutr ɛm a gbɛ, mi k’ɛknm eke ɔny eci ' ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl' a k’ɔny any akm im.
47011006	Nawrɛ eke nɛnym okm im es odad dad ɛm ɛsɛ ɛl af, gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’any uw ec’a, in yɛji low ɛjeci! Ɛtŋ na, lɛgŋ fɛŋ si yɛgm ɔny kpata low fɛŋ eke si kok ab ɛm.
47011007	Eke m’ɔb ɔny Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a, ɛm m’is es aŋke m’ibram ɔny os kaka. Gbɛkɔ ow el sos eke mi k’usr ɔny eci. Kɔ na low ɛyr e mi kok ana ee?
47011008	Eke m’am kok juma ɔny ogŋ a, Sinyamel ɛjeci anake ɔŋ’m os a, ɛtŋ m’oc ɛl ec’os a m’ɛlum ɔny abu.
47011009	Ke ɔny ec’araŋn eke m’anŋ a, m’ɔny os ec’es abur cɛ, gbɛkɔ m’ibram ɔny low kaka. Maseduan ec’agŋ lisijimɛl ek’anŋ ow a ism’m fɛŋ a eke m’ɔny ow ec’es abur ab ab. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ mi kok elel eke mi ki legm ɔny ɛtŋ m’erur eke lɛgŋ kaka mi ki legm ɔny.
47011010	Ntotŋ am ok’m ow eci ɛtŋ Akayi wus ogog a ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɔbm im yadŋ ɔnym ɛm eci ntotŋ na ocm es. Low nawrɛ tasi m’am dad aŋke m’ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ek’anŋ Krist ɛm a.
47011011	Bla sosiɛm m’am dad odad nɛnɛ ee? Eke m’erurm ɔny a sosiɛm ec’ee? Njaŋ, Nyam uw any eke mi b’erur ɔny.
47011012	Ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ucu m’ɔny es m’am kok ɛbɛn, ow ɔ́ŋ agŋ ek’am ɔl abusu eke k’ɛru es ke ij nɛny eke ɛl ɛrŋ ɛm si bɛbmn a, k’ɛ́ŋnm abusu na kaka!
47011013	Agŋ amua el ɛrm ɛsɛl ayadŋu lele juma kok ɛsɛl ek’ɔny ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ab. -Li bi kok nyandrɛ ɛsɛ Krist ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl cɛ wɛ’n el af.
47011014	Nawrɛ, low kaka ɔnym any iti aŋa, aŋke Satan in obi yɛji bi kok nyandrɛ ɛsɛ usuayl ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs cɛ ow’n el af.
47011015	Ɛtŋ in e juma kok ɛsɛl ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn cɛ. Ow ɛwm any iti eke -n’am kok nyandrɛ -l’el juma kok ɛsɛl ek’am kok yec’ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ec’owr anŋ a b’ow uwr ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it eke k’ɛbm ɛl ab af, ɛl ec’elel eke -li kokr ab ɛm.
47011016	M’am ebr ɛm m’ɛsɛ: kì tutar eke nuŋ ɛm uŋ’m! Oglog ɛ̀gŋn ebr eke nuŋ ɛm uŋ’m, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛm yɛji m’ɔ́tu m’ij nɛny tɛl.
47011017	Sica odad na eke m’am ow mi dad a, mi dadm ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af, kɔ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af. Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny ów tasi e m’ɔtu eke mi k’eb ow af m’am ij nɛny.
47011018	Agŋ nɔnɔ b’ij nɛny agŋ ɛm ec’ów sosiɛm, ow sosiɛm ɛm yɛji mi b’ow m’ij nɛny.
47011019	Ɔny eke b’ocar ɔny sosi ɛsɛwru a, ɔny obi ɛm b’ɛgŋn eŋ ɛm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl ebr!
47011020	B’ɛgŋn ebr wɛl kok ɔny ɛsɛ madu af, wɛl eb ɔny ob fɛŋ ek’ɔnyn a, wɛl iy ɔny mil! B’ɛgŋn ebr wɛl itar ɔny any, wɛl dɛdŋ ɔny any af!
47011021	Ɛ́s am ɔny’m eke mi ki dad, eke s’ɔnym sos si kokm ɛbɛn a! Eke ɛgŋ nyam am ɛgŋ eb ij nɛny low nyam eci, aŋa m’am dad odad ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ ɛs af, ɛm yɛji mi b’ow m’ɛgŋ m’eb mi kok ɛbɛn.
47011022	-L’el Ebre eyŋ, ɛm yɛji m’el! -L’el Israɛl eyŋ, ɛm yɛji m’el! -L’el Abraham ec’alaw, ɛm yɛji m’el!
47011023	-L’el Krist e juma kok ɛsɛl, ɛm m’el m’akm ɛl fɛŋ! Ɛtŋ low na eke aŋa m’am m’ow mi dad m’usr af a yɛji, anŋ ɛsɛ nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi af: mi kok juma m’akm ɛl fɛŋ, m’ɛy sobel ɛm sakp nɔnɔ m’akm ɛl. Ɔr yɛji, ɛm wɛl ɔr’m sakp nɔnɔ akm ɛl, ɛtŋ sakp nɔnɔ ar okr’m es akm ɛl.
47011024	Sakp yen eke Jwifɛl iyr’m ŋgbre likŋ lele lɛw libarm ab.
47011025	Sakp nyahan eke Rom eyŋ ɔr’m lɛc ɛm lɛc ɛm, akp nyam eke wɛl wɔwl’m mebn ɛm ec’ibi eci. Sakp nyahan eke mij blel oc’m, ɛtŋ akp nyam ec’a, m’anŋ lɛgŋ owr nyam lele ncok nyam ab mij ɛm.
47011026	Ɛm eci usu im nɔnɔ ab ɛm, ar okr’m es sakp nɔnɔ: simij ec’any af, agŋ ibiu ec’any af, ɛm lisijimɛl Jwifɛl ɛm oglog ɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl ɛm. M’ɔbr ar ɛb ɛb ɛm, loj ɛm, okij af lele agŋ lisijimɛl ayadŋu ab e lís.
47011027	Mi kok juma eke kikn’m sos es ɛtŋ sakp oglog m’ɔtum m’ɛrum mɛmn. Namn lele mij amn ab ɔny’m ɛtŋ sakp oglog m’ɔtum m’ɛŋnm ob m’ijm. Lɛfr ɔny’m ɛtŋ m’ɔnym mob mi susm.
47011028	Ɛtŋ mi dadm low a tasi ek’ɔny any a ec’odad: sɛgŋ fɛŋ mi b’ebr ɛm e Sinyamel a fɛŋ e low ec’ɛrm mij.
47011029	Eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ ɛw fuɛfuɛ, ɛm yɛji kpɛkŋ m’ɛ́w fuɛfuɛ. Eke ɛgŋ nyam cɛ ɛy sikpl owi ɛm, ow e low ám ɛy’m sos ɛm nɔnɔ.
47011030	Ek’ow it nɛny ij, mi b’ow m’ij nɛny eke m’el fuɛfuɛ.
47011031	M’ɔ́nym yadŋ, Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’Ɛs uw any. Si kɔ́klm’n akpo akpo fɛŋ!
47011032	Eke m’anŋ Damas ɛb ɛm a, ɛb ɔsu ɛs ek’am kok es ɛw ɛs Aretas e juma a, ɔŋ wɛl am ɔsu ɛb a e masany a fɛŋ ɛm ec’ɛdŋn eci.
47011033	Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl a ɔŋ wɛl ɔny ɛlu’m ulu ligbɛl nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ usm’m es finɛtr ɛm, ɛb a e lakp ogog kpakp a e jam a, ɛtŋ m’ɔtu m’akm’n.
47012001	Kɔ ow it eke mi k’ij nɛny ee? Ow k’ow elm im low kaka. Gbɛkɔ m’am m’ow mi dad ów eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛgm’m m’ɛkn lele ow eke n’ɔny l’ok ɔkm ab ab e low.
47012002	M’uw Krist e jam us ɛs nyam any, ɛtŋ ow ij akpo lɛw yar ŋ̂, Nyam ɔny ɛgŋ na uyum afr kpekpe. Kɔ in e sos megl ab ab ee? M’uwm any. Kɔ ow elm in e sos megl ab ab ee? M’uwm any, kɔ Nyam gbɛ uw any.
47012003	-
47012004	M’uw any gbɛ eke Nyam oc ɛgŋ a im afr ec’usu mamn a. Kɔ in e sos megl ab ab oglog ow elm ow ab ee? M’uwm any, kɔ Nyam gbɛ uw any. Yogŋ, l’iri sodad eke ɛgŋ e nɛny k’ɔtum dadm. Ow el sodad eke ɛgŋ kaka ɔnym abusu eke ki dad.
47012005	Ɛgŋ nɛnɛ na eci gbɛ mi b’ow m’ij nɛny. Gbɛkɔ ɛm ec’a, elel eke m’anŋn a sosiɛm mi b’ow m’ij nɛny ɛm e fuɛfuɛ el a eci.
47012006	Eke batŋ m’erur nɛny eke mi k’ij a, mi k’ow m’ijm nyamb, low eke el nawrɛ a cɛ mi b’ow mi dad. Gbɛkɔ m’ijm nɛny, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl dád ɛm e lís owi, ow a cɛ eke wɛl am ɛkn’m mi kok lele ow a cɛ eke wɛl am iri mi dad ab ab af, ke low ɛjeci kaka k’ígŋm af.
47012007	Ów a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ yɛgm’m m’ɛkn a agb nɔnɔ. Gbɛkɔ l’erurm eke mi k’ij nɛny na eci. Ow sosiɛm l’oc ɛbm ɛkn nyam l’ɛlu’m sos ɛm, b’ijr’m gbre ɛsɛ mirŋ eke b’ub es anŋ ɛgŋ sos ɛm ab af. Ɛtŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ Satan ec’ɛrm ɛs nyam eke wɛl ɔŋ eke k’ɔr’m ke ɛ́dŋn’m nɛny ij af.
47012008	Sakp nyahan eke mi ŋɔŋn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke k’ɔny oc’m es gbre ij na ɛm,
47012009	kɔ li dad’m ninɛ: "Ɛm ec’ɛrm mamn a cɛ ɔdŋ’ŋ. Eke b’anŋ fuɛfuɛ a, yogŋ ɛm tasi anake ɛm e lɛc a b’ɛy ɔkm a." Ow sosiɛm, ɛm e nɛny ij a tasi b’ow el ɛm e fuɛfuɛ el a, yec’ɛtŋ ke Krist e lɛc a ánŋ’m af.
47012010	Na sosiɛm m’am ɛgŋ fɛŋ m’eb sos ɛm iŋn ɛm: lɛc ɔnym, wɛwr, ses babur, ɛm ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm e gbre ijr lele ɛrm mij ebr fɛŋ ab. M’am ɛgŋ fɛŋ m’eb Krist sosiɛm eci, aŋke eke mi b’anŋ fuɛfuɛ a, yogŋ ɛm anake mi b’ij lɛc a.
47012011	Sica am ɛkan eke m’am kok nuŋ ɛm ŋuŋ owi a! Ɔny anake ɔŋn ke m’am kok ɛbɛn a. Ɔny anake blel dadr ɛm ec’ów amamn ek’anŋ’m ɛm a, aŋke eke m’elm low kaka yɛji, low kaka anm eke ɔny eci ' ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl' a ɔny akm’m!
47012012	Ɔny ogŋ yogŋ ɛkan ɛm ec’ɛrm susu ligbɛl a, simɛny ɛwr a, ów any iti owi a lele sakrowa ab ab. Ów amua fɛŋ am yɛgm eke m’el ɛrm ɛs wɛwɛ tasi.
47012013	Bla obi Sinyamel ɛjec’a ɔny eke ɔny ɔnymn ee? Ɛɛ, nawrɛ gbɛ, m’ɔɔm ɔny labm kaka! Kɔ na anake el low ŋuŋ ab ee? Ɛbɛn ke òc apr’m ɔ!
47012014	Mi bɛbm ɔny ogŋ yogŋ e sakp nyahan ɛm ec’ow e sos ɛtŋ mi k’ow m’ɔɔm ɔny labm kaka. Ɛm, ow elm ɔny ec’os a m’ɔlm es, kɔ ɔny obi ɔny obi. Nawrɛ ɛm a, ow elm etuey am kokm os ɔɔm ɛl ɛsɛl, kɔ ey ɛsɛl anake it eke ki kok os ɔŋ ɛl ec’ey a.
47012015	Ɛm gbɛ, sos ɛm b’ow iŋn’m eke mi kí ŋuŋn os ɔny eci, ke m’óc ɛm obi e sel a nimum yɛji m’igŋ af. Kɔ eke m’erur ɔny nɔnɔ nɛnɛ a sosiɛm anake ɔny k’ow erurmn’m nɔnɔ ab ee?
47012016	Nawrɛ eke m’ɔɔm ɔny labm kaka, gbɛkɔ agŋ bɛb dad eke yadŋ ɛm am ɔny ɛtŋ ɛm e kprakpr ab ɛm, ɛm ɛju ɔny.
47012017	Kɔ eke b’ɛwr nyamn ɛkan agŋ a fɛŋ eke m’ɔŋ ow ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ eke m’ɛcr in ɛm m’ij ɔny os ee?
47012018	Mi dad toŋ Tit ɛgŋ eb eke k’ow ɛkn ɔny, ɛtŋ m’ɔŋ ɛgŋ lisijim nyam igŋ’n ab ow. Kɔ Tit ij ɔny os ee? Kɔ in lel ɛm ab, s’ɔnym tutr nyam coco ejagb nyam a eke s’ɔkŋ any ab ɛm ee?
47012019	Ow ibn ek’am tutar eke s’am dogŋn sos ɔny ec’any af. Njaŋ! Nyam ec’any af s’am dogŋn sos ɛsɛ Krist e jam us ɛsɛl af. Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am kok ɛbɛn eke si k’ɛlum ɔny abu agbr ɔmn ɛm.
47012020	Lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ a, ow am ɔny’m erŋn eke mi k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny ɛsɛ elel eke m’am erur eke k’anŋn ab af. Ke oglog ɛm yɛji, k’érurmn ɛm eci elel eke mi b’ow mi kokr a. Erŋn am ɔny’m eke yogŋ mi k’uyum ów ɛsu, nyamnɛyr, ɛrm bebl, agŋ ec’ów ɔnyanin, agŋ wɛwr owi, agŋ cacak owi, mɛgŋel lele suksuk owi ab.
47012021	Ɛmɛny low nyam ec’erŋn yɛji am ɔnym: ɛm ec’ow ab ɛm, oglog ke Nyam kók’m ɛ́s ɔny ec’any af. M’am uru eke mi k’ikŋ ɔŋn ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nɔnɔ eke abu anŋ ɛm am kok lɛgŋ sig ɛm e sikpl a eci. Tasi ɛm a, yɛfɛnyna yɛji -li k’ɛwlm -li ki lɛrm Nyam. -N’am ir ɛb eke ɔ́ɔm ɛl -l’ aylmn, -n’am ij nfaci ɛtŋ -n’am ɛbirir marɛm marɛm.
47013001	M’am bɛbm sos eke mi k’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ sakp nyahan ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af: Gbuŋ ke wɛl jɛ́j odad fɛŋ ok a, ow it eke wɛl k’iri adaŋku yony oglog nyahan nɛnym.
47013002	Sica lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’agŋ a eke kok sikpl a lele agŋ ɛjec’ab ab anake m’am dad odad a. Yɛfɛnyna m’anm ɔny araŋn, gbɛkɔ ɛmɛny m’am ebr low a eke mi dad eke m’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ sakp yony ɛm a m’ɛsɛ: lɛgŋ a eke mi b’ow m’ɛwl m’ow a, mi b’ow mi kok lɛc owi ɔny fɛŋ ab,
47013003	aŋke am erurir eke k’ɛkan low ek’am yɛgm eke Krist b’ɛcr ɛm ɛm dad odad a. Eke li bi kok low n’ɔŋ ɔny a, l’elm sos ɔnymu, kɔ nana, li b’ɛlu in ec’abusu ɔny a ɔkm ɔny ec’araŋn.
47013004	Nawrɛ, wɛl ɛw Krist olikŋ af, eke n’ɔnym sos a sosiɛm, gbɛkɔ n’anŋ owr Nyam ec’abusu ab ɛm. Ɛy yɛji, in ab eke s’okr af a anake s’ɔnym sos a; gbɛkɔ si b’ow si yɛgm ɔny eke s’anŋ owr in ab Nyam ec’abusu ab ɛm.
47013005	Sica ìbrmn ɔny sosi low eke am iir ɛb ɛsɛ ɔmn ɛsɛl af, ìgbal ɔny sosi ogŋ ɛkan. Kɔ k’ɛknmn eke Krist anŋ ɔny ab ee? Eke ow ɛcrm ɛbɛn, ke es ɔwal okr a.
47013006	Gbɛkɔ ɛy ec’a, m’am ɔny ɔmn eke b’ow ɛgŋn uwr any eke ɛy s’ɔwlm s’okm es.
47013007	Ɛy s’am ŋɔŋn Nyam eke kí kokmn low ŋuŋ kaka. Ɛtŋ ow elm ke si yɛ́gm ɔny eke s’ɔny low ij. Njaŋ, low mamn cɛ s’erur eke ki kokr. Ɛtŋ ɔfr ɔfr eke low a am yɛgm eke s’ɔny lɔbr.
47013008	Tasi ɛm a, si k’ɔtum si kokm low kaka low nawrɛ ec’any af, in e juma cɛ s’ɔtu eke si ki kok.
47013009	Ɛɛ, sos ɛm b’iŋn ɛy sakp sakp fɛŋ eke si b’anŋ sos ɔnym ɛm ke ɔny b’ɔnyn lɛc a. Ow sosiɛm yec’eke s’am ibrm ɛy e ŋɔŋn ɛm a el: ke ɛmɛny ɛ́wal ijr lɛc ɔmn ɛm.
47013010	Low na sosiɛm anake m’am awŋ ɔny lɛl eke m’anŋ kpekpe a. M’erurm eke mi k’ɛlu lɛc ɔkm lɛgŋ eke mi b’ow m’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a. Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’ɛlum Nyamel a abu agb ɔmn ɛm, kɔ ow elm in e ŋuŋn eci.
47013011	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɔ̀ɔl ɔmn ɛm e lɛc eke k’ɔnyn es, àtarir sos es ke nɛny ókr ɔny af ɔny ɔfr ɛm. Ìir ɛb ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɛtŋ erur lele ɛrm es ɛy ab e Nyam a b’ow anŋ ɔny ab.
47013012	Ɛ̀sŋninin ɔny ɔfr, ke ɛ́yarir af ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl lele agŋ lisijɔwɛl ab af. Agŋ lala a fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ɔny.
47013013	Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ, Nyam ec’erur lel Abŋ Lala ec’af okr a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
48001001	-
48001002	Ɛm Pɔl, lel ɛm lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ek’anŋ aŋa ab ab e nin ɛm, m’am awŋ Galat e Sinyamel a lɛl na. M’el ɛrm ɛs, gbɛkɔ ow elm agŋ mum oglog ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛwm’m ɛrm ɛs. Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist in obi lel Ɛs Nyam ek’igbm’n luw ɛm ab ab, ɛw’m ɛrm ɛs.
48001003	Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lel Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɛ́ŋan ɛrm es ɛy.
48001004	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛwr in sosi awoba, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’éb l’ɛlu ɛy es ɛy e sikpl ab ɛm. Li sɔg ɛy wus na e suŋ ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛy Ɛs erur ab af.
48001005	Anygbɛl él Nyam eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
48001006	Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny bibm a ek’ɛŋan Krist sosiɛm a eci; sica ow am ɛw’m any iti eke k’upŋn in ij fafa nɛnɛ, ke ɛ́wal am lɛɛr 'Amani Mamn' ɛjeci nyam.
48001007	Nawrɛ ɛm a, Amani Mamn tasi ɛjeci anm; agŋ gbɛ anŋ ek’am wuwal ɔny nuŋ ɛm, ke am erur ek’itŋn Amani Mamn a eke bi dad Krist ec’odad a.
48001008	Na sosiɛm, ek’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am dad ɔny Amani Mamn ɛjeci ek’elm ow a eke si dad ɔny a ec’odad, ke Nyam ógŋ ɔwl’l, ek’ow el ɛy oglog ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’anŋ afr ow bɔbɔ yɛji.
48001009	M’ikŋ anym mi dad ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’am dadr ɛm: ek’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am dad ɔny Amani Mamn ɛjeci ec’odad ek’ótarm es yec’a eke s’ɔŋ ɔny ab ab, ke Nyam ógŋ ɔwl’l.
48001010	Sica kɔ agŋ ec’aw eke k’aw’m a m’am ɔl es, kɔ Nyam ec’ab ee? Kɔ agŋ m’am ɔl eke k’erur’m ee? Njaŋ! Blel m’am ɔl ek’agŋ k’ɔny ɛm ec’erur ana, mi k’ɔtum m’elm Krist e libɔwi.
48001011	Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am dad ɔny eke k’uwr any ek’Amani Mamn a eke m’ɔb m’ok ɔny a, elm ɛgŋ e low eke ɔkn.
48001012	Ow elm ɛgŋ ogŋ m’ebm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ yɛji yɛgam im ow e low, kɔ Jesu Krist in obi ɛlu ow e low ɔkm yɛgm’m.
48001013	Ɛtŋ irir wɛl dad ɔny elel eke mi kokr lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke m’anŋ Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr ab ɛm a e low. Uwr elel eke m’ijr agŋ a fɛŋ ek’el Nyamel ec’agŋ a gbre, ke m’ɛw lɛc ɛm eke mi ki ŋuŋn ɛl ab any.
48001014	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, wɛl b’ɛkn tasi, eke m’afŋ ɛm lawlɛl a fɛŋ ek’el ɛm ec’ɔwɔrŋ ab es, Jwifɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr a ec’ów fɛŋ e kok ɛm. M’ɔny lɛc m’akm ɛl fɛŋ ɛy lagŋɛl e Nyam nuŋ igŋ ebr ab ɛm e sol esig e dogŋn owi ɛm.
48001015	Gbɛkɔ, gbuŋ ke wɛl éw’m a ɛtŋ Nyam sɔsum oc’m in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛsŋ’m eke mi ki kok in e juma.
48001016	Ɛtŋ eke l’ɛgŋ l’eb eke li k’ɛlu Jim ɔkm li yɛgm’m, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɔ́tu m’im m’ɔb in ec’Amani Mamn a e kokoba m’ok agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a, m’iim m’ibram ɛgŋ kaka eke ki yɛgm’m low.
48001017	Ɛtŋ m’ɛwlm m’iim Jerusalɛm m’ɛknm agŋ a ek’ikŋ anym el ɛrm ɛsɛl gbuŋ ke ɛm yɛji m’el a; kɔ kpɛkŋ m’ɔkŋ any m’im Arabi wus af, yogŋ anake m’anŋ m’ɛwl m’ow Damas ɛb ɛm a.
48001018	Akpo nyahan ɛc gbuŋ ɛtŋ m’im m’ɛy Jerusalɛm; yogŋ anake m’uw Piɛr any, ke m’anŋ in ab toŋ sɛgŋ lɛw yen a.
48001019	M’ɛknm ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci kaka, ek’ow elm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lisijim Jak cɛ.
48001020	Low na eke m’am awŋ ɔny ow e lɛl a, el low nawrɛ tasi; m’am eb Nyam daŋku ek’ow elm yadŋ m’ɔnym.
48001021	Ow e jam a, m’im Siri lele Silisi ab eci wus ab af.
48001022	Gbɛkɔ Jude ec’agŋ a ek’ub Krist nawrɛ a, k’ɛknm im any af lɛgŋ kaka.
48001023	Low cɛ eke -l’irir wɛl dad ɛm e lís a el: "Ɛgŋ a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, b’ijr ɛy gbre a, lɛgŋ na ɛm am dad Amani Mamn a eke s’ub nawrɛ ke l’erur eke li ki ŋuŋn a e low."
48001024	Ɛtŋ -n’am kɔklm Nyam ɛm sosiɛm.
48002001	Sica ek’akpo lɛw yar ɛc a, m’ɛwl mɛny m’im Jerusalɛm Barnabas ab; m’oc Tit yɛj’ab m’im.
48002002	M’ɛwl mɛny m’im aŋke Nyam ɛlu ow e low ɔkm yɛgm’m eke mi ki kok ɛbɛn. Jerusalɛm yogŋ, luku eke m’as saw ɛm Nyamel ec’idr ɛsɛl ab a, m’otar Amani Mamn a eke m’am ɔb m’ok agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a e low akr m’ok ɛl. Tasi ɛm a, m’erurm ek’ɛm e juma eke m’am kok lel ow eke mi kok lɛgŋ sig ɛm ab ab a, e low k’él ɔfr ɔfr.
48002003	Ɛtŋ Tit ek’anŋ ɛm ab, ke el Grɛk iy, ke wɛl ubrm likr es a, wɛl ɔnym’n lɛc ɛm eke li k’ubr likr es.
48002004	Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl ayadŋu ek’anŋ ɛy ec’araŋn a erur eke wɛl k’ubr’r likr es. Agŋ amua ow anŋ ɛy ɛm es lɔl ɛm, eke k’otar ɛy akr úw ɛy ec’ewi e s’el Jesu Krist ɛm a e low any. -N’am erur eke si k’el ol e madu.
48002005	Ɛtŋ s’ɛlum ɛl abusu es wanci kaka, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’úcu Amani Mamn a e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a s’ɔny es ɔny eci.
48002006	Gbɛkɔ, Nyamel ec’idr ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl a ɔɔm im low owr kaka eke mi ki kok. Ɛtŋ ɛm ec’a, ow elm ɛl ec’idr ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl eke -l’eel a elm low tasi ɛm ec’any af, aŋke Nyam ec’any af a, agŋ a fɛŋ el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ.
48002007	Kɔ tasi ɛm a, -l’ɛkn nana eke Nyam abul’m agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba eke mi k’ɔb, ɛsɛ elel eke l’abul Piɛr eke k’ɔb ok Jwifɛl ab af.
48002008	Ɛtŋ -l’iri yɛj’eke Nyam ɛw’m agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’ɛrm ɛs, ɛsɛ elel eke l’ɛw Piɛr Jwifɛl ec’ɛrm ɛs ab af.
48002009	Jak, Piɛr lel Jan ab, eke wɛl b’oc ɛsɛ Nyamel ec’es ɛwɛl af a, uw any ɛkn eke Nyam anake bibm ɛm abul’m juma na a; -l’eb ɛy abu, ɛm lele Barnabas ab, -li yɛgm eke -l’erur. Sica si dad s’okarir ɛy fɛŋ eke, ɛy si b’ow s’im si kok juma agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a ec’araŋn, ke ɛl -n’imn Jwifɛl ɛm eci.
48002010	Low cɛ eke -l’ibrmn ɛy a el, ke s’ɔ́kn Jerusalɛm e Nyamel ab ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru a e low. Ɛtŋ ɛm obi mi kok ow e low ɛrm nyam ɛm.
48002011	Gbɛkɔ eke Piɛr ow Antiɔs ek’anŋ Siri wus af a, m’atar in ab agŋ fɛŋ ec’any af, aŋke n’ɔny low ɔbr.
48002012	Tasi ɛm a, gbuŋ ke agŋ nyam nyam eke Jak ɛrm a ow a, Piɛr am us abu agŋ lisijimɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab. Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ ek’agŋ a eke bi dogŋn likr es ubr owi es a ow a, Piɛr ocr sos es ɛtŋ ɛgŋm eke k’ij ob agŋ lisijimɛl ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab ij, aŋke n’ɔny agŋ a eke bi dogŋn likr es ubr owi es a e muru.
48002013	Jwifɛl ab ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl bɛb yɛji am kok ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi na ɛsɛ Piɛr af, ɛtŋ Barnabas in obi yɛji igb ɛy ɛl ec’ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi na ɛm.
48002014	Ɛtŋ eke m’ɛkn eke ɛl ec’es an a k’elm nyim nyim ke k’otarm es Amani Mamn e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab ab a, agŋ a fɛŋ ec’any af mi dad Piɛr m’ɛsɛ: "Ŋ ek’el Jwif a, ir ɛb aŋa ɛsɛ agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab af ɛtŋ kokm yec’a eke Jwifɛl ec’ol a dad a. Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ am erur eke k’ɔny agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a lɛc ɛm ir ɛb ɛsɛ Jwifɛl af ee?"
48002015	Ɛy s’el Jwifɛl ɛy e mew ɛm, kɔ s’elm bieku ɛjeci ec’agŋ ek’uwm Nyam ec’ol ab any a.
48002016	Gbɛkɔ s’uw any ek’ɛgŋ ec’elel eke Nyam b’oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af a, anŋ ɛgŋ a ec’ɔmn eke b’ɔny Jesu Krist ɛm a, kɔ ow elm Mois ec’ol a eke li b’ɛlum a sosiɛm. Na sosiɛm anake ɛy yɛj’eke s’el Jwifɛl a, s’ub Jesu Krist nawrɛ, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’úw ɛy any ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af, ɛy ec’ɔmn eke s’ɔny Krist ɛm a eci, ke ow k’élm eke si kok ol a ec’ów a fɛŋ iy nɛny a eci. Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ow elm nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af eke li kok ol a ec’ów fɛŋ ek’am dad a iy nɛny yɛji.
48002017	Ɛy, s’am ɔl eke Nyam k’oc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af Krist sosiɛm. Sica, eke wɛl b’ɛkn ɛy ɛsɛ sikpl ɛsɛl af a, ke ayaf wɛl ki dadr ab ee? Ke Krist sikpl e juma n’am kok ee? Njaŋ, ow elm ɛbɛn!
48002018	Tasi ɛm a, eke m’ɛwl mɛny m’im ol a eke m’igŋ m’ɛlu es ab ɛm, ke ɛm sosi m’am ɔbr low a.
48002019	Ɛm, ol sosiɛm anake m’erurm eke mi k’ir ɛb ol ec’ij a. Ɛtŋ ów amua fɛŋ ɛcr ɛbɛn, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ír ɛb Nyam eci. Ɛm m’uw olikŋ af Krist ab,
48002020	ɛtŋ m’anŋ owr, gbɛkɔ ow elm ɛm m’anm owr ij, kɔ Krist anake anŋ owr ɛm ɛm a. Jam aŋa, ɛm ec’owr anŋ a, mi bi kok ow e low Nyam Jim e nawrɛ e m’ub ab ɛm, in eke l’erur’m toŋ ke l’oc in e sel a l’irmn ɛm sosiɛm a.
48002021	Mi k’ɔtum m’ocm Nyam e bibm na m’ɔwlm. Tasi ɛm a, ek’ow el ol ɛm ɛgŋ b’ɛcr el nyim nyim ɛs Nyam ec’any af, ke Krist e luw a, ɔfr ɔfr ana!
48003001	Ɔny Galat eyŋ, kɔ nuŋ ɛm am uŋ ɔny! Ɔny bwo ec’ɛgŋ kokr ɔny agn ee? Ke, ɔny ec’any af kpata wɛl otar Jesu Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a e low akr.
48003002	M’am erur eke ki kpabr low ibrm na es: kɔ ɔny ec’Abŋ Lala a ek’ɛŋan a, ol ec’ów a fɛŋ eke kokr iy nɛny a sosiɛm oglog Amani Mamn a ek’irir ke ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm a sosiɛm ee?
48003003	Bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ k’ɔtumn ɔnymn nuŋ ɛm ee? Ɔny, ɔbr nuŋ Abŋ Lala ɛm, sica ɔny obi e lɛc ɛm am erurir eke k’uwarir ab ee?
48003004	Ów amua fɛŋ ek’ɛŋn ɔny a, ɔfr ɔfr cɛ ow k’el ee? Ow itm ek’ow k’el ɔfr ɔfr.
48003005	Nyam b’ɔŋ ɔny in ec’Abŋ a, ɛtŋ li bi kok sakrowa ɔny ec’araŋn. Kɔ ol ec’ów a fɛŋ eke bi kokr iy nɛny a sosiɛm li bi kok ów amua n’ɔŋ ɔny oglog Amani Mamn a ek’irir ke ɔnyn ɔmn ow ɛm a sosiɛm ec’ee?
48003006	Kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad Abraham e lís: n’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
48003007	Sica ow it eke k’uwr any ek’agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ir ɛb ɔmn ɛm a, el Abraham ec’alaw tasi.
48003008	Nyam Lɛl ɛwar eke Nyam b’ow oc agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a, ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af, ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm. Na sosiɛm anake Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym ɔb Amani Mamn na ok Abraham eke: Nyam b’ow ɛcr ŋ ɛm, ɛdŋ wus na nimum ec’agŋ a ɔwrɔ.
48003009	Eke Abraham ub nawrɛ a, wɛl ɛdŋ’n ɔwrɔ; ɛbɛn nɛny nyam, wɛl b’ɛdŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a ɔwrɔ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl ɛdŋn Abraham ab af.
48003010	Sica agŋ eke bi tutr eke, eke b’ɛlum ol ke Nyam óc’ŋ ɛsɛ nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs af a, musue el ɛl eci. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Gbre él ɛgŋ yec’eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ow ɛluam ów a fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔn anŋ ol e lɛl ab ɛm a eci.
48003011	Ɛtŋ ow ayl yɛj’eke, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum elm nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af ol ec’ɛlum a sosiɛm, aŋke Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: ɛgŋ yeci ek’el nyim nyim Nyam ec’any af a, b’ow anŋ owr in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu ow ɛm a sosiɛm.
48003012	Gbɛkɔ ol ɔnym low kaka ɔmn ab. Ow eke Nyam Lɛl nana dad a el: ɛgŋ yec’eke bi kok ol ec’ów a fɛŋ ek’anŋ’n ɛm a, b’ow anŋ owr in ɛm.
48003013	Gbɛkɔ Krist sɔg ɛy an ligbɛl ɛm ol e musue a e lís. In anake ɛy e musue a eke k’ɛŋn ɛy a, ɛy’r af a. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl dad: Gbre él ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’uw ke wɛl pag es likŋ af a eci.
48003014	Na sosiɛm anake ɔwrɔ a eke Nyam ɛwar eke k’ɛdŋ Abraham a, b’ow ɛbm agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a yɛji Krist sosiɛm, ke ɛy fɛŋ si b’ɛŋn ɔmn ɛm Abŋ Lala a eke Nyam ɛwar a.
48003015	Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’ocr ɛy ec’ɛb ir ɛm e low nyam s’ɔbar any: ek’ɛgŋ nyam kok aja e lɛl ɛw es ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɔnym aja e lɛl na tɛtŋm es oglog nɔnm low ɛjeci ɛlum ɛm.
48003016	Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ɛwar Abraham lele iy a eke k’anŋ in ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab ab e low ana. Wɛl dadm ɛsmɛ: lele alaw a eke k’anŋ in ɛm ok ɔkm a, ɛsɛ agŋ nɔnɔ owi af. Njaŋ, ɛgŋ nyam cɛ e low. Tasi ɛm a, ow eke wɛl b’awl a el: lele iy a eke b’ow anŋ ŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a, in l’el Krist.
48003017	Kin low a e m’erur eke mi ki dad a: Nyam kok aja e lɛl nyam ɛw es, ɛtŋ ɛwar eke b’ow ucu ow e low ɔny es. Ol a eke akpo duw akpo likŋ lele lɛw ab ɛc, gbuŋ ke ɛy ɔkm a, k’ɔtum ɔnym abusu tɛtŋm low a eke Nyam ɛwar ow e low ɛw es ab es.
48003018	Sica, ek’ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛsɛ aja af a, el ol sosiɛm, ke ow elm ɛwar a sosiɛm ij. Ke, tasi ɛm a, ɛwar a sosiɛm Nyam ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔkm Abraham e lís.
48003019	Ɛtŋ ek’ow el ɛbɛn, ke bla sosiɛm Nyam ɔŋ agŋ ol ee? Ol el ob eke Nyam igŋ af, yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɔ́ŋ agŋ uw ɛl ec’ów ek’akplm in ec’any af ab any, ɛtŋ ow it eke li k’anŋ toŋ ke ɛgŋ a eke k’anŋ Abraham ɛm ɛy ɔkm a ów; aŋke in sosiɛm wɛl ɛwar low a ɛw es. Ol a, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛlu ow e low ɔkm, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ow ec’araŋn a.
48003020	Gbɛkɔ ow ibram ek’ɛgŋ nyam k’anŋ ow ec’araŋn ij, eke ow el ɛgŋ nyam cɛ eke low a ot es a, ɛtŋ Nyam cɛ anake low a ot es a.
48003021	Sica low na e nyandrɛ el bogŋ ec’ee? Ol lele Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ɛw es ab ab okrm af ee? Ow elm ɛbɛn! Blel ol nyam ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel, ɛtŋ blel agŋ ɛŋn ol ikŋ na ana, ke blel nimamn ana, blel ol a ɔ́ŋ ɛl -l’el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛl Nyam ec’any af.
48003022	Gbɛkɔ, Nyam Lɛl dad eke wus nimum in anŋ sikpl ec’abusu a ec’ew. Na sosiɛm anake ow it eke Nyam e low a ek’ɛwar ɛw es a, k’el tasi agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a eci, ɛl ec’ɔmn eke -n’ɔnyn Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm.
48003023	Gbuŋ ke ɔmn e lɛgŋ a ów a, ol ɔnym ɛy ab ɛsɛ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl af, ɛtŋ s’am eku lɛgŋ a ek’ɔmn k’ɛlu sos ɔkm a.
48003024	Ow ɔŋ, ol el ɛy e nyimn ɛs toŋ Krist ow; yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam óc ɛy ɛsɛ agŋ nyim nyim af in ec’any af ɛy ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm.
48003025	Sica eke ɔmn e lɛgŋ ow a, si k’ɔtum s’anm nyimn ɛs na ec’abu ɛm ij.
48003026	Ɔny fɛŋ, eel Nyam ec’ey ɔmn a ek’ɔny okr ɔny af Jesu Krist ab a sosiɛm.
48003027	Tasi ɛm a, ɔny fɛŋ okar af Krist ab mij nuŋ a eke wɛl ok ɔny ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛwal anŋn ɛsɛ Krist in obi af.
48003028	Sica ereb anm agŋ ek’el Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm ab ec’araŋn, madu lel ewi ab ec’araŋn, ɔyɔw lel egŋ ab ec’araŋn; ɔny fɛŋ, eel nyam coco Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
48003029	Ɛtŋ ek’eel Krist eci, ke ɔny eel Abraham ec’ey ɛtŋ eel aja ij ɛsɛl ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es ab af.
48004001	Kin ɛm e tutr e m’ɔny a: ek’iy a ek’el aja ij ɛs a anŋ gɔŋni a, li b’ɛw ɛsɛ adu af. Ke tasi ɛm a, ob a fɛŋ in eci cɛ.
48004002	Gbɛkɔ, ow it ke n’ám ɛlum agŋ a ek’am ɛkn in e lís e low, ke am ɔsu in ec’ob a fɛŋ a, toŋ ke lɛgŋ a ek’ɛs ɛw a ów.
48004003	Ɛy yɛji ɛbɛn nɛny nyam. Eke s’anŋ ɛsɛ etuey af a, s’el wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc a e madu.
48004004	Gbɛkɔ, eke lɛgŋ a e Nyam b’ɛbm ɛw es a ow a, l’ɛrm Jim ow. Wɛl ew’r yɔw ɛm ɛtŋ l’ir ɛb ol ɛm,
48004005	yec’ɛtŋ ke li sɔ́g agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ol ec’abusu ab ɛm a, ke s’ɔ́tu s’el Nyam ec’ey.
48004006	Gbɛkɔ, ke wɛl úw any eke eel in ec’ey a, Nyam ɔŋ Jim ec’Abŋ a ow ɛy ɛy ec’ɛrm ab ɛm; ɛtŋ Abŋ na anake b’ɔŋ ɛy si dad "Aba!" ow e nyandrɛ el, "ɛm Ɛs!"
48004007	Ow sosiɛm a, ŋ elm adu ij, kɔ iy; ɛtŋ ek’el iy a sosiɛm, Nyam b’ow ɔŋ aja eke li bɛbm l’ɛw in ec’ey ab es a.
48004008	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, uwmn Nyam any ɛtŋ eel sabusu ek’elm sinyam tasi yɛj’a e madu.
48004009	Sica yɛfɛnyna ɛm ek’uwr Nyam any, oglog yɛfɛnyna ɛm eke Nyam uw ɔny any a, ayaf ow it eke k’ɛwal ɛlumn wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc ek’elm low kaka ab ee? Ayaf ɛmɛny ɔtur eke k’ɛwal eel ɛl e madu ee?
48004010	B’ucur sɛgŋ bɛb, awl bɛb, akpo e sɛgŋ bɛb lel akpo bɛb ab e low ɔnyn es.
48004011	M’am ɔny ɛrmij ɔny eci: eke juma e mi kok ɔny ec’araŋn a k’élm ɔfr ɔfr sosiɛm.
48004012	Agŋ lisijimɛl m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af, aŋke ɛm yɛji mi kok ɛsɛ ɔny af. Kokmn’m low ŋuŋ kaka.
48004013	Ɔny, am ɔkan low ɛm eke m’ɔg es m’ɔb ɔny Amani Mamn e kokoba a, ow el ɛm ec’ɔl ɛm.
48004014	Ɛtŋ ɛm e sos megl a eke ɛm ec’ɔl ab ɛm itm eke wɛl ki lɛr a, ɔnym ɔny nɛnŋn walmn ɛlumn’m es. Kɔ ɔny kɔtɔkɔ, ebr’m ɛsɛ Nyam ec’ɛrm ɛs nyam af, oglog ɛsɛ Jesu Krist af.
48004015	Lɛgŋ a, anŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Ɛtŋ sica bla lowi ɛŋn ɔny ee? M’ɔtu eke mi dad m’ɛsɛ: lɛgŋ a, blel ɔnyn abusu eke ki sɔsmn ɔny ec’anyamn ab es ɔŋn’m, blel kokr.
48004016	Kɔ sica ɔny ec’ifnu m’ɛwl m’el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e m’am dad ɔny a sosiɛm ee?
48004017	Agŋ amua ek’am kok ɛsɛ ɔny e lís e low cɛ wɛ’n am ɛw any af a, ɛl e sow tutr a akplm ɔny eci. Ɛl e low eke -n’am ɔl a cɛ el: ke -n’ɔny -li kpab ɔny es ɛm e lís, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur lɛɛr ɛl.
48004018	Tasi, ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ k’ɔny ɔny e lís ec’erur, gbɛkɔ ke ow el low nimamn eci, ow it ek’ow k’el sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kɔ ke ow k’élm lɛgŋ eke mi b’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a cɛ.
