48004019	Ɛm ec’ey, ɛmɛny m’am ij ɔny e gbre, gbre ek’otarir es ɛsɛ yɔw ek’am ew iy ec’ab af, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’anŋ ɛm ɛbɛn toŋ ow áyl’m sos ɛm ek’ɔny fɛŋ Krist ir ɔny ɛm.
48004020	M’erur eke blel m’anŋ ɔny saw wanci na af, ke m’ɔ́tu mi dad ɔny odad akunda ɛjec’ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, mi k’uwm elel eke mi ki kokr ɔny e lís ab any.
48004021	Dàdr’m, ɔny ek’am erurir ek’ol k’ɛw ɔny es a: irimn yec’a ek’ol a am dad ab ee?
48004022	Nyam Lɛl dad eke Abraham in ew ey yony, Agar ek’el adyɔw ab ab ow’n ew nyam ɛtŋ Sara ek’el yɔw lewi ab ab yɛji ow’n ew nyam.
48004023	Adyɔw iyŋ a, wɛl ew’r igŋ nyam lele yɔw nyam ab ec’erur ɛm, kɔ yɔw lewi a ec’iy a, wɛl ew’r Nyam e low a eke ɛwar ab ɛm.
48004024	Odad na ɔny akr otar ɛjeci. Ɔyɔw yony a anŋ ɛsɛ sinm yony af. Krɛkrɛ e sinm a, el Sinayi lafɛny af ec’a, ɛtŋ li b’ew ey eke b’el madu: ke Agar ana,
48004025	ɛtŋ Agar anake el Sinayi lafɛny a ek’anŋ Arabi wus af a. Ɛtŋ in cɛ anake yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, n’anŋ ɛsɛ Jerusalɛm ec’ɛb a ek’in ec’ey ab ab el madu a.
48004026	Kɔ Jerusalɛm ek’anŋ afr a el lewi, ɛtŋ in anake l’el ɛy lis a.
48004027	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Sos ɛm íŋn’ŋ itr yɔw! Ɛ̀lu sos ɛm iŋn e lebl, ŋ ek’uwm iy ew e dudu any a; aŋke yɔw a eke wɛl igŋ ɛlu es a, b’ow ew ey akm yɔw a ek’ɔny igŋ a.
48004028	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl ɔny ec’a, ɛsɛ Isak af, eel ey eke wɛl ew ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ɛwar ab af.
48004029	Gbɛkɔ ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’a eke Abraham ec’iy a eke wɛl ew igŋ lele yɔw ab ec’erur ɛm a, ijr iy a eke wɛl ew Nyam ec’Abŋ ec’erur ɛm a gbre a, yɛfɛnyna ɛm yɛji, ɛbɛn cɛ ow anŋ.
48004030	Kɔ Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, ayaf wɛl dadr ee? Wɛl dad ninɛ: ògŋ adyɔw a lel in ec’iy ab ab, aŋke adyɔw iyŋ a k’ɔtum ijm aja yɔw lewi a ec’iy ab ab.
48004031	Na sosiɛm a, agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy s’elm adyɔw a ec’ey, kɔ ɛy yɔw lewi a ec’ey.
48005001	Krist sɔg ɛy, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’él ewi tasi. Na sosiɛm ìnymn es kikri lewi el na ɛm, ke ɔ́nyn sos ɔsu, ke k’ɛ́wlmn elmn madu ij.
48005002	Ɛm Pɔl, m’am dad ɔny: eke yɛbr wɛl ubr ɔny likr es, ke Krist elm low kaka ɔny ec’ij.
48005003	Ɛmɛny m’am usr lebl af mi dad ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɛgŋ likr es ubr owi eb a, ow it eke li k’ɛlum ol a nimum.
48005004	Ɔny ek’am ɔɔl eke k’eel nɛny nyam ɛsɛl Nyam ec’any af ol ec’ɛlum ɛm a, ɔny obi ɛm anake kpabr es Krist e lís a; ɛtŋ ɔny irmnin Nyam e bibm a ek’ɛŋan a.
48005005	Sica ɛy ec’a, s’oc ɛy e nawrɛ ub a s’ɛlu Nyam ɛm. In li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy s’el nɛny nyam ɛsɛl in ec’any af; low na anake s’am eku Abŋ Lala ec’abusu a eke b’ɛcr ɛy ec’ɔmn ab ɛm kok juma a.
48005006	M’am dad tasi ɛm m’ɛsɛ, eke s’okr af Jesu Krist ab a, ke wɛl úbr ɛy likr es oglog ke wɛl k’úbrm ɛy likr es, ow elm low kaka. Kɔ low tasi a cɛ el: úb nawrɛ, ke yɛ́gm ŋ ec’ɔmn a erur owi ɛm.
48005007	Ɔny ɔbr nuŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn! Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɛdŋn ɔny eke k’ɛ́luamn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ee?
48005008	Low yec’a eke wɛl dad ɔny ke ok ɔny es sos ɛm a, anm Nyam ek’ɛsŋ ɔny a ogŋ owm.
48005009	Ow anŋ ɛsɛ: "Lijru tɛɛli cɛ eke b’anŋ ma ɛm, ke b’ɔŋ ma a nimum inŋ ab af."
48005010	Gbɛkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ obn’m ɔmn ɔny e lís: k’ow ɔnymn tutr ɛjeci eke k’ow otarm es ɛm ec’ab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’am mumu ɔny a, ke ow el in ec’elel eke n’anŋn a, Nyam b’ow ɔb’r low gbre ij eci.
48005011	Agŋ lisijimɛl, kɔ ɛm, likr eke wɛl k’ubr ɔny es e kokoba ɛmɛny m’am ɔb ɔny ee? Ek’ow el nawrɛ, bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl am ijr’m gbre ee? Tasi ɛm a, eke m’am ɔb likr es ubr owi e kokoba ke Krist ec’olikŋ a elm ɛgŋ kaka e wus ɛlu owi ij.
48005012	M’am erur ek’agŋ amua ek’am mumu ɔny likr es ubr sosiɛm a, blel -li kok ow afŋ na es; -li kok -l’el egŋ agbru.
48005013	Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny in e lewi ij ab ɛm, gbɛkɔ lewi ij ikŋ na itm eke k’ɔŋ ɔny abusu kokr ɔny e sos af ec’ów eke b’aw ɔny a. Ow tasi eke ki kokr a el, ke erur ɛm, kókr ów ɔŋanin ɔny ɔfr.
48005014	Ol na nimum anŋ ol nyam na ɛm: Ow it eke k’erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af.
48005015	Sica eke bi kokr ɛsɛ akp ɛm ndey af, ám gugŋnin ke ám ɔnyn ijarir ɔny ɔfr, ke ɛ̀wr ɛrm, b’ow ŋuŋanin ɔny ɔfr.
48005016	Na sosiɛm mi dad m’ɛsɛ: yɛ̀br Abŋ Lala nyimn ɔny ec’ɛb ir a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ki kókmn ɔny e sos af ec’ów eke b’aw ɔny a.
48005017	Sos af ec’ów amua eke b’aw ɔny a, ɛ́gŋm Abŋ Lala e low ebm ɛtŋ Abŋ Lala yɛji ɛ́gŋm sos af ec’ów amua eke b’aw ɔny a e low ebm. Ɛl yony mum ec’araŋn a atarir, ɛtŋ ow e liy eke b’anŋ ɛm ɛy ɔkm a el, ke k’ɔtumn kokmn yec’a ek’am erurir a.
48005018	Gbɛkɔ eke Abŋ Lala bi nyimn ɔny, ke ɔny anmn ol ec’es ɛw ɛm ij.
48005019	Ów a eke ɛy e sos af ec’ów aw b’ɔsu, ke wɛl b’ɛkn a el: agŋ e lɔsŋn e b’agbr ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab, ɛb eke -li b’ir sikpl ɛm, ów ɔbr ɔbr eke -li bi kok ɛl ec’erur ɛm;
48005020	sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ, agn kok owi; agŋ ec’ifn owi, ów ɛsu, nyamnɛyr ɔnyanin; ɛrm bebl, agŋ fɛŋ ec’es ɛw owi, ɛm bubr owi lel ɛl ɔfr ɛm ec’ijarm owi ab.
48005021	-N’am erur eke ɛl lawlɛl ec’ob ek’ɔny a ɛl yɛji -n’ɔny, -l’el mar ɛgŋu, ob iju, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -li bi kok ów ɛjeci nɔnɔ ek’otarir es amua eke wɛl dad ab ab. M’am ɛwar ɔny ɛtŋ m’ikŋ anym mi dad yɛji: agŋ a eke bi kok ów amua a, k’ow ɛŋnm usu Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a.
48005022	Sica kin ey yec’eke Abŋ Lala b’ɔsu ɛy ɛm: erur, sos ɛm iŋn, ɛrm es ɛy, low eku, ɛrm mamn, low kok ɔŋ ɛgŋ, cɛcɛ el,
48005023	ɛrm frɔrɔ, sos es ɔnyn. Mi k’ɔnym ɔmn eke ol k’ifn ów amua.
48005024	Agŋ a ek’el Jesu Krist ec’a, oc ɛl e sos af ec’ów aw a eke b’irmn ɛl a ɛw olikŋ af.
48005025	Sica, ek’ow el Abŋ Lala ɛm s’am ir ɛb a, ke si yɛ́b Abŋ ikŋ na nyimn ɛy.
48005026	Si k’éel és ɛfuu, ów ɛsu k’ánŋ ɛy ec’araŋn, nyamnɛyr ɔnyanin yɛji k’ánŋ ɛy ec’araŋn.
48006001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, eke b’ɛkan ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ek’am kok low ek’akplm a, ɔny eke Nyam ec’Abŋ a am nyimn ɔny a, ɛ̀lumn in abu l’ɛ́wl l’eb ejagb mamn a; gbɛkɔ ke ow él ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm. Ɛtŋ m’am dad eke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ k’ɛ́w sos ɛrm, ke kí yɛbmn mɛju owrm ɔny.
48006002	Òkmnin sel es ɔny e sɛrɛkp leg leg ec’uyu ɛm: ow ɛm anake b’ow ɛlumn Krist ec’ol a.
48006003	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam bi tutr ɛsɛ in el any ɛs ɛtŋ l’elm ob kaka a, ke in sosi n’am ɛjur.
48006004	Ow akpl ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ k’ɔny in ec’es an a igbl ogŋ ɛkn; ek’ow akpl’l sos ɛm, ke ow él in sɔny eci, kɔ ke li k’ócm l’ɔbarm lawlɛl ec’ab ab,
48006005	aŋke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ b’ow uyu in obi ec’ɛrɛkp.
48006006	Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ɛŋn Nyam ec’odad a e low yɛgm a, it eke ki cɛc in ec’ob e n’ɔny a, ɛgŋ a eke bi yɛgm’n low ab ab.
48006007	K’ɛ̀jurir ɔny sosi: ow itm eke wɛl ki kokr Nyam miyɛr. Ɛgŋ, ow a cɛ eke li b’ewl a, li b’ub.
48006008	Eke ɛgŋ ewl ów eŋuŋ eke b’aw’r a in ec’ɔgm a, li b’ow l’ub luw; kɔ eke l’ewl yec’a ek’Abŋ Lala b’erur a, li b’ow l’ub sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
48006009	Sos k’ám ɛy low nimamn e kok ɛm, aŋke e s’amnm sos, ow e wanci b’ow a, si b’ow s’ub.
48006010	Na sosiɛm, eke s’ɔny abusu a, si kók ɛgŋ fɛŋ low nimamn, ab brobro ɔmn ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a.
48006011	Sica ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm anake m’am nɔn lɛl a, ɛsɛ elel eke lɛl mɔni a e sagb a am yɛgm ab af.
48006012	Agŋ a ek’am erur ek’ɔny ɔny lɛc ɛm ubar likr es a, el agŋ ek’am erur eke k’ij any agŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ -n’am kok ɛbɛn, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl k’íjrm ɛl gbre Krist ec’olikŋ a sosiɛm.
48006013	Agŋ amua ek’ɛgŋ likr es ubr owi eb a, ɛl obi a -l’ɛluamn ol a; -l’erur eke k’ubar likr es, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɔny abusu -l’ɔpr ów, eke lɛc ɛm ɛgŋn mɛny ɛwr ikŋ na e low ebr.
48006014	Ɛm ec’a, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a ec’ów cɛ m’erur eke mi k’ɔpr, aŋke Krist ec’olikŋ af e luw a, ɛm ec’a, ow ɛw ɛsɛ wus ec’ob a fɛŋ eke wɛ’n uw af, ɛtŋ ɛm yɛji m’ɛw ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uw wus ec’ob a fɛŋ ec’any af af.
48006015	Na sosiɛm, eke wɛl ubr’ŋ likr es oglog wɛl ubrm’ŋ es yɛji, low kaka anm ɛm, kɔ yeci tasi ek’el low a el: ke él ɛgŋ owr.
48006016	Sica agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛlum ɛm e low yɛgm a ɛl ec’ɛb ir ɛm a, m’am dad eke: Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a lel ɛrm mamn ab ab k’ánŋ ɛl af, ɛl, lel agŋ a fɛŋ ek’el Nyam ec’ Israɛl ab ab.
48006017	Yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, ɛmɛny ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ k’ow k’ijr’m gbre ij, aŋke ɛm e sos af e mɛny ɛwr amua, el Jesu e gbre e m’ij a e mɛny ɛwr.
48006018	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a, ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab. Amɛn.
49001001	Ɛm Pɔl, Jesu Krist ec’ɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur, m’am awŋ Nyam ec’agŋ lala ek’anŋ Efɛs baŋn, ke b’us Jesu Krist jam nɛny nyam ɛm a, lɛl na.
49001002	Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lel ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
49001003	Si kɔ́klmn Nyam eke el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs a! N’ɔŋ ɛy Abŋ Lala ec’ɔwrɔ fɛŋ eke anŋ afr a, ɛy lele Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
49001004	Gbuŋ ke wɛl kok wus a, Nyam ɛcr Krist ɛm sɔsum ot ɛy s’el in eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’él lala ke si k’ítam ɛm kaka in ec’any af. Nyam erur ɛy ɛtŋ l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm
49001005	eke li b’ow l’ɛcr Jesu Krist ɛm l’eb ɛy ɛsɛ in ec’ey af. In ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm l’erur low na,
49001006	yec’ɛtŋ ke si kɔ́klm Nyam, in ec’anygbɛl ec’ów amamn e sagb a eci. Ów amamn fɛŋ, in ec’Iy e l’erur ab ɛm li b’ɛcr n’ɔŋ ɛy.
49001007	S’anŋ Krist ɛm ɛtŋ in e mebl ab ɛm li sɔg ɛy, l’oc ɛy e sikpl a l’ap ɛy; ɛtŋ ow ɛlu Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ligbɛl a eke ɔny a e low ɔkm.
49001008	Ɛɛ, Nyam ɔnyn ɛy ɛrm mamn afŋn es. N’ɔŋ ɛy sɛwr fɛŋ lele low any uw ab.
49001009	N’ɔŋ ɛy s’uw in e low a eke lɔl es ab any, low a eke in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm l’ɛw es eke li k’ɛcr Krist ɛm li kok a.
49001010	Low ikŋ a eke Nyam ki kok uwar lɛgŋ a eke li sɔsum l’ɛw es ab ɛm a, el ke l’ás ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr lele wus ab a luku es ɛw nyam coco eke el Krist ab ɛm.
49001011	Ɛtŋ ɛy eci Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, Nyam ɔŋ ɛy aja a eke k’ɛbm ɛy, ke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm ow e low l’ɛw es a. Li kok low na fɛŋ aŋke l’ɛgŋ l’eb ɛtŋ l’erur,
49001012	yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e s’el agŋ krɛkrɛ ek’oc ɛl ec’ɔmn ɛlu Krist ɛm a, si kɔ́klm Nyam, in ec’anygbɛl a eci!
49001013	Ɔny yɛji, anŋn Krist ɛm aŋke irir odad tasi a ek’el Amani Mamn a eke bi sɔg ɔny a. Eke ocr ɔny ec’ɛrm a ɔŋn Krist a sosiɛm, Nyam ɛw ɔny mɛny ɛwr nyam af. Mɛny ɛwr a, ow ow el Abŋ Lala a eke l’ɛwar eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a.
49001014	Abŋ Lala na, el aja a eke si b’ow s’ɛŋn Nyam ec’abu ɛm a eci krɛkrɛ. Ɛtŋ li bi yɛgm ɛy tasi eke si b’ow s’ɛŋn aja na lɛgŋ a eke Nyam b’ow sɔg ɛy low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ɛm a. Ow sosiɛm si kɔ́klmn Nyam, in ec’anygbɛl a eci!
49001015	Ow sosiɛm, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke m’iri wɛl dad eke ɔny ɔnyn ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ɛm ɛtŋ ɔny b’erurir agŋ a ek’in el Nyam ec’agŋ lala a,
49001016	m’ɔ́pim eke mi k’ɛlu Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔny eci ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn fɛŋ ɛm.
49001017	M’am ibrm ek’ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e Nyam a, anygbɛl ec’Ɛs a k’ɔŋ ɔny sɛwr, ke l’ɛ́lu sos ɔkm li yɛgm ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr ir any tasi.
49001018	M’am ibrm’n eke li k’ɛkan ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm e tutr ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr low ɔmn a eke n’ɔŋ ɔny lɛgŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ ɔny a, ke úwr in ec’aja ec’ob ɔny ligbɛl sɔbɔ a eke l’ɛw es agŋ lala a ec’ab any.
49001019	Ɛtŋ ɔny b’ow uwr lɛc liplemu a eke Nyam ɛlu ɔkm ɛy eke si b’ub’r nawrɛ ec’a. In ec’abusu a lel in e lɛc ab ab,
49001020	l’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm Krist ɛm, lɛgŋ eke l’igbm ow luw ɛm, ke n’ɔŋ ow ow sig’r es lidr abu af afr a.
49001021	Yogŋ, Krist anŋ es ɛw fɛŋ, abusu fɛŋ, lɛc fɛŋ, es akm fɛŋ lele nin ɛjeci fɛŋ eke wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɛsŋ a e nuŋ af. Tasi, n’anŋ ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ a e nuŋ af, ɛtŋ ow elm yɛfɛnyna e lɛgŋ na ɛm cɛ, kɔ lɛgŋ eke b’ow ow ab ɛm yɛji.
49001022	Ɛɛ, Nyam oc mob mob a pupukpaŋ ɛw es Krist ec’akr ew a, ɛtŋ l’ɛw ow ɛsɛ Nyamel nimum eci nuŋ af,
49001023	ɛtŋ Nyamel el Krist eci sos megl a. In ɛm wɛl b’ɛkn Krist nimum, ɛtŋ Krist, in iy afr lele wus ab nimum.
49002001	Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, uwr ɔny ec’ów ɔbr lel ɔny e sikpl ab ab sosiɛm.
49002002	Ɔny iir ɛb ɛsɛ elel eke wus ec’agŋ b’ir ɛb ab af; ɛlumn sabusu eŋuŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs a ek’in ec’es ɛw anŋ lɛf ɛm a. Es ɛw ɛs a, in l’el low ŋuŋ ec’abŋ a eke caca ɛm a am kok juma agŋ a ek’ɛ́luam Nyam ab ɛm a.
49002003	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji s’anŋ ɛsɛ agŋ amua af, ow a eke s’am ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛy ec’ów aw eŋuŋ b’ɔŋn ɛy ab af a. S’ɛlum ɛy ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a lel ɛy e sow tutr eŋuŋ ab ab. Ɛtŋ ɛy ec’elel tasi a eke s’anŋn a sosiɛm, s’it eke Nyam eci jɛj ok a k’ɔŋ ɛy s’abur es ɛsɛ agŋ likpr ab af.
49002004	Gbɛkɔ Nyam eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a agb nɔnɔ ɛtŋ in ec’erur eke n’ɔny ɛy ec’a ɔnym any ɔkŋnin;
49002005	na sosiɛm anake ɛy eke s’anŋ ɛsɛ agŋ ek’uw abŋ ɛm ɛy ec’ów eŋuŋ a sosiɛm a, n’ɔŋ ɛy s’anŋ owr Krist ab a. Ɛɛ, Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ a anake sɔg ɛy a.
49002006	Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm Nyam igbm ɛy luw ɛm, ɛtŋ Krist ab cɛ n’ɔŋ ɛy si sig es afr.
49002007	Nyam ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn eke n’ɔnyn ɛy a ɔkm Jesu Krist ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm ɛy sɛgŋ fɛŋ in e sɔrŋ ikŋ ligbɛl ab ɛm eci gbreŋgbi eke l’ij a.
49002008	Tasi ɛm a, in eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm anake li sɔg ɔny a, aŋke ɔny ubr nawrɛ. Ow elm ɔny ɛm ow anm owm, kɔ Nyam in obi eci bibm eke ɔŋ ɔny.
49002009	Sel ɛŋn na, ɛŋnmn in ɔny ec’ów kok ɛm; ow sosiɛm a ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́w sos.
49002010	Tasi ɛm a, Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm anake Nyam kok ɛy a. Li kok ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ír ɛb ów amamn kok ɛm. Ɛtŋ ów amamn amua, Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw es eke si ki kok.
49002011	Ɔny uwr any eke Jwifɛl el agŋ eke wɛl ubr likr es, ke b’erur ɛsŋn ɛl sosi 'agŋ ek’ubr likr es'. Ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl mew ɛm ɛtŋ a, wɛl ubrm ɔny likr es ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ -li b’ɛsŋ ɔny 'agŋ ek’ubrm likr es.' Ow sosiɛm, ɔny ɔ̀kan lɛgŋ ab ɛm ec’ob eke eel a:
49002012	ɔny eel agŋ ek’uwm Krist any, agŋ eke wɛl awlm Nyam ec’agŋ ab ɛm, ke anm sinm a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛwar a e low ɛm, ɔnym low ɔmn kaka, ke uwm Nyam any ɛl ec’ɛb ir ɛm wus af aŋa.
49002013	Gbɛkɔ sica, Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm, ɔny eke lɛgŋ ab ɛm kpabr es a, lɛgŋ na ɛm a, Krist eci mebl a ɔŋ ɔny okar af.
49002014	Ɛɛ, in l’el ɛy ec’ɛrm es ɛy. Li kok Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab el agŋ nyam coco. Li bubm sifn e lakp a eke cɛc ɛl ab es, in eci sos megl a eke li wawr egb olikŋ af ab ɛm.
49002015	N’ɔny Mois ec’ol a ec’es ɛw a lel ow ec’ów kpɛti kpɛti ab ab l’ɔwr es. Ɛtŋ Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab, li kok wɛl el agŋ nyam coco ek’okr af in ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a ow el ɛrm es ɛy.
49002016	In ec’olikŋ af e luw ab ɛm, n’ɔny Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab l’okr af el sos megl nyam coco ɛtŋ n’ɔny l’okr wɛl ɛm Nyam ab, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a l’ibi ifanin.
49002017	Ow am yɛgm eke Krist, ɛrm es ɛy ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba l’ow l’ɔb l’ok ɔny ek’elm Jwifɛl ke kpabr es Nyam e lís a, lele Jwifɛl eke titm Nyam ab ab.
49002018	Tasi ɛm a, Krist ɛm anake si k’ɛcr ɛy fɛŋ, Jwifɛl lel agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl ab ab, ke s’ɔ́tu si titm Nyam ɛy Ɛs, Abŋ Lala nyam a cɛ ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
49002019	Ow sosiɛm a, ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl a, elmn etu agŋ ij oglog gbeŋ ec’agŋ. Kɔ ɔny anŋn Nyam ec’agŋ lala ab ɛm, ɔnyn ów a fɛŋ ec’abusu ɛtŋ eel Nyam e bosu ab ɛm ec’agŋ.
49002020	Sica ɔny eel êl a ek’in eci misigrer a el Krist ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ab a. Ɛtŋ lɔy ɛm eci lebn tasi a, el Jesu Krist in obi.
49002021	Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm anake êl a eci mebn a fɛŋ b’okr af inym es kikri a. Ɛtŋ in cɛ li b’ɔŋ êl a agb el Nyamel lala eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ oc ɛw saw.
49002022	Eke okar af Krist ab a sosiɛm anake ɔny yɛji anŋn êl a eke wɛl us ab ɛm a. Ɛtŋ agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ab, okar af eel êl eke Nyam ɛcr in ec’Abŋ ab ɛm ir ɛm.
49003001	Ɛm Pɔl, m’el Jesu Krist e sobel ɛm ɛs, ɔny ek’elmn Jwifɛl a sosiɛm eci.
49003002	Ɔny, m’ɔny ɔmn eke irir juma eke Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm abul’m eke mi ki kok ɔny ec’a e low.
49003003	L’ɛlu low a eke lɔl es a ɔkm m’ɛkn, low a eke mi nɔn ow e low tɛl cɛ afr ɛm a.
49003004	Ɛm e lɛl a ec’awl ɛm, b’ow ɛkan elel eke m’uw Krist e lís e low eke lɔl es ab any a.
49003005	Low ikŋ a, lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, Nyam ɛlum’n ɔkm yɛgam ɛy lagŋɛl. Kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a, l’ɛcr in ec’Abŋ ab ɛm l’ɛlu ow ɔkm, li yɛgm in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lala ab ab eke li sɔsum l’ot l’ok saw a.
49003006	Kin low a eke lɔl es a: agŋ a eke elm Jwifɛl ke okr af Jesu Krist ab Amani Mamn ab ɛm a, b’ow ɛŋn aja nyam a cɛ ɛsɛ Jwifɛl ab af. -Li b’ow -l’el sos megl nyam ec’agŋ, ɛtŋ low a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛw es a -li b’ow -n’anŋ ɛm.
49003007	Nyam, in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm, ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’el Amani Mamn na e juma kok ɛs, in e lɛc a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
49003008	Ɛm, m’el nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl ab ɛm ec’ɛgŋ saka sakali. Gbɛkɔ m’ɛŋn bibm na eke mi k’ɔb Krist ec’ob ɔny a ek’ɔnym nuŋ a ec’amani, m’ok agŋ a ek’elm Jwifɛl a.
49003009	Tasi ɛm a, god’ɛtŋ, Nyam eke el mob mob fɛŋ eci kok ɛs a, lɔl low a eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es ab es in ɛm. Ɛtŋ elel eke Nyam b’ow kokr low na eke lɔl es a e low iy nɛny a, m’ɛŋn bibm eke mi ki yɛgm kpata.
49003010	Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɛcr Nyamel a eke l’ɛsŋ ab ɛm, n’ɔ́ŋ mob a fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr ke ɔny es ɛw lel abusu ɔny ab a úw in e sɛwr ab any. Nuŋ ɛm ɔny na Nyam b’ɛlu’l ɔkm sakunda ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm,
49003011	low a eke l’ikŋ anym li bɛbm l’ɛw es god’ɛtŋ a sosiɛm eci. Low ikŋ na, l’ɛcr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm, li kok ow iy nɛny.
49003012	Ɛy eke s’okr af Krist ab ke s’ub’r nawrɛ a, sica abusu ɛru ɛy es eke si k’ɔwl abu s’im Nyam ec’any af ɔmn ɛm.
49003013	Na sosiɛm anake m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny ek’ɛm e gbre e m’am ɛgŋ m’eb ɔny sosiɛm a, k’ɔ́wrm ɔny sos es a. Tasi ɛm a, ow b’ow el ɔny ec’anygbeŋ ligbɛl.
49003014	Ow sosiɛm m’am ok ɔwrɔkp wus Nyam ɛy Ɛs ec’any af,
49003015	in ɛm eke bosu fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr lele wus ab anŋ a.
49003016	M’am ŋɔŋn’n ek’in ec’anygbɛl e gbreŋgbi eke l’ij ab ɛm, li k’ɛcr in ec’Abŋ ab ɛm n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny lɛc inymn es kikri ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm.
49003017	Ke Krist ír ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm ɔny ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ókr min erur ɛm, ke ɔny nimum a sígr es erur ab ɛm.
49003018	Ɛtŋ b’ow ɔnyn abusu, ɔny lele Nyam ec’agŋ lala a fɛŋ ab, írir mɛwl ɛm tasi Krist ec’erur a ec’es ar, sɔfu, sigb lel ow e sibn ab ab.
49003019	Ɛɛ, m’am erur eke k’uwr Krist ec’erur ab any, eke l’agb l’akm low fɛŋ ek’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke k’uw any a yɛji, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛ́ŋan Nyam ec’owr anŋ a, ke l’ír ɔny ɛm nimum.
49003020	Nyam e lɛc a am kok juma ɛy ɛm ɛtŋ eke si b’ibrm’n low a, l’ɔtu eke li ki kok ow afŋ es! In e lɛc a agb akm yec’a e s’ɔtu eke si ki tutr a.
49003021	Anygbɛl él in eci, in e Nyamel ab ɛm lele Jesu Krist ɛm ab akpo akpo fɛŋ lele sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab! Amɛn.
49004001	Ɛm eke m’el sobel ɛm ɛs Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sosiɛm a, kin yec’eke m’am ok ɔny mɛrm sabu af mi dad ɔny: ɔny eke Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny a, ɔ̀nyn es an ek’ot ɔny ec’ɛsŋ ab es.
49004002	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ìsr es, èel frɔrɔ, ɔ̀nyan sos es low ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’elel eke anŋn a ebr erur ɛm.
49004003	Àtar sos es ucur af okr a eke Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɔny a ɔnyn es, ɛrm es ɛy a eke b’ɔny okr ɔny af ɔny ɔfr ɛm a;
49004004	aŋke Nyam kok sos megl nyam, n’ɔŋ ɔny Abŋ Lala nyam, ɛtŋ low ɔmn nyam ɛm cɛ l’ɛsŋ ɔny.
49004005	Ɛtŋ ɔnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyam, ɔmn nyam lele mij ok nuŋ nyam ab,
49004006	Nyam nyam cɛ eke el agŋ fɛŋ ec’Ɛs eke ɛw fɛŋ es, bi kok low fɛŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛm, ke ir agŋ fɛŋ ɛm a.
49004007	Gbɛkɔ ɛy ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam ɛŋn in ec’ob ap ek’it a, ob ap ab ɛm eci yec’a eke Krist ɔnyn’n ɛrm mamn ɔŋ’n a.
49004008	Kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Eke l’uyu afr kpoŋ ɛm a, l’ot sobel ɛm ɛsɛl ab n’im; ɛtŋ li cɛc agŋ sob ap.
49004009	Kɔ l’uyu afr a, in ec’iri tasi a el bogŋ ec’ee? Ow am yɛgm eke l’ikŋ anym l’us es n’im esr ɛm a, ek’el wus af aŋa a.
49004010	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a ek’us es a, in cɛ l’el ɛgŋ a ek’uyu afr kpoŋ ɛm a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li fáf es l’eb wus na nimum.
49004011	In anake li cɛc ob ap ek’it a n’ɔŋ agŋ, ke ow ɔŋ agŋ bɛb el Krist ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl, bɛb el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, bɛb el Amani Mamn a ec’es ɔmun ɛsɛl, bɛb el pastɛrɛl oglog low yɛgm ɛsɛl a.
49004012	Li cɛc agŋ amua sob ap amua, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl ɔ́ŋ agŋ lala a ek’el Nyam ec’a úw juma e ki kok, ke ɔ́ŋ Krist e sos megl a imn anym ec’ab any.
49004013	Nɛnɛ anake ɛy fɛŋ si b’ow s’ɔny ɔmn lele Nyam ec’Iy a ec’any uw nyam coco ab a. Ɛtŋ si b’ow s’el agŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ek’usu ɛtŋ si b’ow s’agb s’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Krist anŋn ab af.
49004014	Sica si k’ow s’elm ey abu ɛm ij. Si k’ow s’anm ɛsɛ mijɛtŋ gɔŋni eke okij e mra am ɔny wɔwl usu fɛŋ eke l’erur ab af ij. Ɛtŋ si k’ow si yɛbm sow tutr yadŋ eci lɛf a ɛlulm ɛy, ocm ɛcm ɛy usu fɛŋ ij. Agŋ k’ow ɔtum irmnm ɛy ɛl eci mɛju ab ɛm ij.
49004015	Ɛtŋ eke si bi dad low nɛnyɛmbri nyam erur ɛm, si b’ow s’agb fɛŋ ɛm s’imn Krist ek’el nuŋ a ogŋ.
49004016	In ɛm anake sos ogog ogog a fɛŋ b’inym es kikri, ke b’okr af a. Sos ŋgigŋnel usu nɔnɔ b’ɔŋ sos megl a nimum ókr af, ɛtŋ eke sos ogog nyam nyam fɛŋ bi kok in e juma ek’it a, sos megl a nimum b’agb ɛtŋ b’ɔny lɛc erur ɛm.
49004017	Kin low yec’a eke m’am dad, ke nɛny am at’m es mi dad Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a: ow itm eke k’aan es ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke b’us ɛl e sow tutr eke low kaka anm ɛm a jam a.
49004018	Tasi ɛm a, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a anŋ ncebn ɛm ɛtŋ sel ɛŋn a eke Nyam b’ɔŋ agŋ a, -n’ɔnym ɛl eci kaka anm ɛm, aŋke -l’uwm ow e low kaka any ɛtŋ -n’ɔny ɛrm tuɔtuɔ yɛji.
49004019	-L’irmn agŋ ɛm ec’ɛb ir a e mɛwl a fɛŋ, -l’ocr ɛl sosi -l’ɛlu es an keskes ɛm ɛtŋ -n’am kok sikpl owi fɛŋ eke b’aw ɛl a.
49004020	Ɔny, ow elm nɛnɛ wewrmn Krist eci any uw a!
49004021	Ɔny, nawrɛ tasi ɛm irir in e lís e low fɛŋ ɛtŋ wɛl yɛgm ɔny low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ek’anŋ Jesu ɛm a.
49004022	Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ìgŋn ɔny ec’ɛb ir sig a ɛlul es. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, eel agŋ eke mɛju ec’ów aw iy ɛm ke am ŋuŋn. Ow sosiɛm, elel a eke anŋnin lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, ow it eke k’igŋn ɛlul es ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
49004023	ke yɛ́br wɛl itŋn ɔny nimum ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm lel tutr ɛm ab,
49004024	ke ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm owr eke wɛl bi sus af, éel agŋ owr. Ɛgŋ owr ikŋ na wɛl kok’r ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af. Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam b’ɔŋ’n l’el nyim nyim lele lala ab.
49004025	Na sosiɛm, ìgŋn yadŋ ɔny ɛlul es, ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ fɛŋ dád lawl low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, aŋke ɛy fɛŋ s’el sos megl nyam ec’agŋ.
49004026	Eke batŋ ɛrm am ebl ɔny, kì kokr sikpl; kì yɛbr toŋ lɛgŋ es ew k’ɛ́ŋan ɔny ec’ɛrm bebl a.
49004027	K’ɛ̀gbr agn usu kaka fɛŋ es ɔny ɛm.
49004028	Ke ɛgŋ eke b’iy mil a, ɛ́lu mil iy ab es; ke kók juma nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm in obi e sabu ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɛ́ŋn ob l’ɛlum es abur ɛsɛl abu.
49004029	Odad ŋuŋ kaka k’ánŋ ɔny nɛnym k’ɛy ɔkm; kɔ dàdr low akpal e sodad eke b’ɛlum low abu, ke b’atr ɔny lawlɛl sos es ɔ́ŋ ɛl lɛc a, yec’ɛtŋ ke sodad eke b’ow dadr a él low mamn agŋ eke b’ow iri a eci.
49004030	K’ɔ̀war Nyam ec’Abŋ Lala a ek’ɔŋ ɔny a sos es, aŋke in anake Nyam oc’r ɔŋ ɔny ɛsɛ mɛny ɛwr af a. Ɛtŋ mɛny ɛwr na b’ɔŋ ɔny ɔ́nyn ɔmn eke lɛgŋ nyam, Nyam b’ow sɔg ɔny nimum ɔny e sikpl ab ɛm.
49004031	Low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ek’ɛgŋ kok ɔny a, k’èbr k’ɛwr es ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm. K’ùcur lokm es, k’èbal ɛrm; ke likekr owi, wɛwr owi lel ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ ab óc es ɔny ec’araŋn.
49004032	Ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ákpl lawl eci, ke sɔrŋ ikŋ íy ɔny ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ. Ke áparir low ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ap ɔny low Jesu Krist sosiɛm ab af.
49005001	Sica eke eel ey eke Nyam b’erur a, àtar sos es kokr ɛsɛ in af.
49005002	Ke ɔny ec’ɛb ir a él erur ɛm, ót Krist ec’erur ek’ɔny ɛy eci ke oc in e sel irmn ɛy sosiɛm, ɛsɛ ob ap lel egb waw ab ek’ow eci sɔsŋ mamn a akpl Nyam sos ɛm ab af.
49005003	Ɔny eel Nyam ec’agŋ lala a, ow sosiɛm ɔny ogŋ a, ów anŋ ek’itm eke k’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn, ɛsɛ: yɔw kaka fɛŋ ab ec’ɛrum ab, low fɛŋ ek’áyalm ɛgŋ eci kok, érur eke ŋ sɔny cɛ k’ɔny ob fɛŋ.
49005004	Ow akplm yɛj’eke kí dadr ɛ́s odad, nyamb odad lele sodad eŋuŋ ab. Kɔ ow tasi eke ki kokr a el ke dádr odad ɛlul Nyam bia.
49005005	Kin yec’ek’it eke k’uwr any: agŋ a eke b’ɛrum yɔw kaka fɛŋ ab oglog bi kok low fɛŋ ek’ayalm ɛgŋ a, k’ow ɛŋnm aja kakali Nyam lele Krist ab eci gbreŋgbi usu yogŋ. Ɛbɛn nɛny nyam ow b’ow el agŋ a eke b’erur eke k’ɔny ob fɛŋ ɛl sɔny cɛ ec’a, aŋke érur eke k’ɔny ob fɛŋ ŋ sɔny cɛ a, anŋ ɛsɛ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ af.
49005006	Ke ɛgŋ kaka k’írmnm ɔny mɛju e sodad ebl ɔfr ɔfr ɛm. Ów amua sosiɛm anake Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a b’ow ok agŋ a ek’ɛ́gŋm eke k’ɛlum’n ab af a.
49005007	Kì kokr ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ab af!
49005008	Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, anŋn ncebn ɛm, kɔ jam aŋa ek’okar af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a, anŋn usuayl ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, àan es ɛsɛ agŋ ek’el usuayl ec’ey af gɔŋ,
49005009	aŋke usuayl b’ɔsu ey ek’el ów amamn kok, ów nyim nyim lel nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ec’ów ab.
49005010	Àtar sos es uwr low eke b’akpl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sos ɛm ab any.
49005011	Ów a ek’el ncebn ec’a ɔ́sum ey amamn kaka. Ow sosiɛm k’ànŋn ow e low ɛm, kɔ kòkr ɛl ec’ów a ók ɔkm.
49005012	Tasi ɛm a, ów a ek’agŋ amua bi kok es lɔl ɛm a eci dad b’ɔny ɛ́s.
49005013	Gbɛkɔ low yec’eke wɛl ɛlu ɔkm a, sos b’ɛru es usuayl ɛm tasi;
49005014	ɛtŋ sica low yec’a ek’anŋ usuayl ɛm a, b’ɛwl el usuayl. Na sosiɛm anake wɛl dad ninɛ: "Ŋ ek’am ɛru mɛmn a, ùfŋm es. Ànŋ agŋ ek’uw a ec’araŋn igb, ke Krist ɛ́jn in ec’usuayl a ok’ŋ af."
49005015	Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ɔny ec’es an ab ɛm. K’ìir ɛb nyamb ɛm, kɔ ìir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛsɛwru
49005016	eke b’uw any kok low wanci fɛŋ ɛm eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ɛl ab af, aŋke sɛgŋ a eke s’anŋ ɛm a akplm.
49005017	Na sosiɛm k’èel anyambu, kɔ òkr nuŋ ɛm es sɛnyn sɛnyn irir yec’ek’el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’erur a.
49005018	K’ɛ̀gŋn mar k’ɔny ɔny: mar ɛgŋ nɔnɔ bi ŋuŋn ɛgŋ; kɔ yɛ̀br Abŋ Lala iy ɔny ɛm gbɔŋ.
49005019	Ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, àtarir sos es selu ebl ɛm, Nyam ɛj ɛm lel ɛj ek’Abŋ b’ɔŋ ɔny ab ab ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn kɔklm ec’ɛj ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci.
49005020	Ɔ̀ŋn ɔny Ɛs Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ low fɛŋ eci, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm.
49005021	Ɔ̀nyn es is ɔny ɔfr ɛm Krist ec’ɛlum ek’ɔnyn a sosiɛm.
49005022	Egŋ ɛyɛl, ɔ̀nyn es is ɔny ɛcɛl eci ɛsɛ elel ek’ɔnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ab af,
49005023	aŋke igŋ el in e yɔw a ec’es ɛw, ɛsɛ elel eke Krist el Nyamel ec’es ɛw ab af. Krist in obi el Nyamel ek’el in e sos megl a eci sɔg ɛs.
49005024	Na sosiɛm ow it eke egŋ ɛyɛl k’ɔny es is low fɛŋ ɛm ɛl ɛcɛl eci, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyamel b’ɔny es is Krist ec’ab af.
49005025	Ɔyɔw ɛcɛl, èrurir ɔny ɛyɛl ɛsɛ elel eke Krist erur Nyamel toŋ ke l’oc in e sel a l’irmn ow ec’ab af.
49005026	L’erur eke ɛbɛn a, li k’ɔŋ Nyamel el ob ek’it eke k’el Nyam eci, eke l’ayal ow mij ɛm lel odad ebl ɛm ab a,
49005027	aŋke l’erur eke li k’ɛlu Nyamel ɔkm in obi in obi ec’any af, ow e sakpl a fɛŋ ɛm, ow él ob lala ek’ob kaka itam ɛm, ɛwm duɔduɔ ke ɔnym abr ɛnym kaka fɛŋ.
49005028	Nɛnɛ anake ow it ek’ɔyɔw ɛcɛl k’erur ɛl ɛyɛl ɛsɛ elel eke -li b’erur ɛl obi e sos megl ab af a. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’erur in e yɔw a, b’erur in obi in obi.
49005029	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ífnm in obi e sos megl a, kɔ ob ij li b’ɔŋ ow, li kok ow e lís e low fɛŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ sɛj ɛm, ɛs’elel eke Krist bi kok Nyamel ec’ab af,
49005030	aŋke ow el in e sos megl ek’ɛy fɛŋ s’anŋ ɛm.
49005031	Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, wɛl b’awl eke: Na sosiɛm anake igŋ b’ow ŋgboŋ ɛs lele lis ab ec’akŋ, ke l’ókr af in e yɔw ab ab -l’el sos megl nyam a.
49005032	Low na eke lɔl es a agb nɔnɔ ɛtŋ ɛm, m’am dad ɔny ek’ow el Krist lele Nyamel ab e low.
49005033	Gbɛkɔ ow el low ek’ɔny yɛji ɔn ɔny es: ke yɔw ɛc fɛŋ érur in e yɔw ɛsɛ in obi af, ke igŋ ɛy fɛŋ yɛji ɛ́lum in ec’igŋ a.
49006001	Ey, ɛ̀lumn ɔny ec’agŋ ek’ew ɔny a ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af; na ɔny e low eke ki kokr.
49006002	Ɛ̀lum asŋ lel esŋ ab anake el ol ab ɛm e krɛkrɛ eke Nyam ɔŋ agŋ ke low ɛwar anŋ af a.
49006003	Ɛtŋ kin low ɛwar a: yec’ɛtŋ ke ánŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm ke íj usu wus af aŋa.
49006004	Ey ɛsɛl, k’ɔ̀ŋn ɔny ec’ey a k’ɔny ɛrm bebl. Kɔ gbàgbal ɛl, yɛ̀gmn ɛl low ke ɔ́mn ɛl ów ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ab af.
49006005	Madu, ɛ̀lumn ɔny e wus af aŋa ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a, muru ɛm, ɛlum ɛm lel ɛrm nyam ɛm ab ɛsɛ elel eke b’ɛlumn Krist ab af.
49006006	Ow elm eke -li b’ɛw ɔny nyamn af a cɛ, kí kokmn ɛl e lís e low mɛwl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’aw ɔny, kɔ ɛ̀lumn ɛsɛ Krist eci madu eke bi kok ɛrm nyam ɛm juma fɛŋ eke Nyam b’erur ab af.
49006007	Ɛɛ! Ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm ki kokr ɔny ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a eci juma, ɛsɛ ɛbɛn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma ɔny am kokr af, kɔ ke ow k’élm ɛsɛ agŋ ec’af.
49006008	Sica yec’eke k’ɔkan a el: ke él adu oglog lewi, low nimamn a eke kok a ec’ob ap a eke k’ɛbm’ŋ a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɔŋ.
49006009	Ɔny es ɛw ɛsɛl ek’ɔnymn madu ab a, ɔ̀nyn es an nɛny nyam a ɔny eci madu a e lís; ɔny k’ɔ̀ɔrir ɛl abr. Sica ɔ̀kan ek’ɔny lel ɔny e madu ab ab, Es Ɛw Ɛs nyam cɛ ɔnyn, in eke n’anŋ afr ke l’íjm ŋgoprɛ low eke li bi kok n’ɔŋ in ec’agŋ ab ɛm a.
49006010	Sica uwar ɛm ec’eke m’am dad a el, ke ébr lɛc Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ec’af okr ɛm, in ec’abusu ligbɛl ab ɛm.
49006011	Ɛ̀wr Nyam ec’ar ogŋn e mob a fɛŋ eke ɔŋ ɔny a sos, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur akmn agn eci mɛju a fɛŋ es,
49006012	aŋke ow elm agŋ eke si b’ɛkn any af ab ab si k’ow s’ogŋm ar a, kɔ ow el mob fɛŋ ek’ɔny lɛc eŋuŋ ke ɔny es ɛw lel abusu ab a. Ɛy ec’ar ogŋ a b’ow el lɛc fɛŋ ek’el ncebn ɛm ec’ab ab, lele abŋ eŋuŋ ek’ɔny abusu ke anŋ lɛf ɛm ab ab.
49006013	Ow sosiɛm a, ɛ̀wr Nyam ec’ar mob fɛŋ sos, yec’ɛtŋ ke wanci ŋuŋ fɛŋ af, ɔ́tur inymn es kikri ifnu ec’any af, ke b’ogŋn ar a ba ow b’uwr a, ke ɛmɛny ínymn es lɛc ab.
49006014	Kin elel eke ki bɛbmn sos ar ogŋ a eci: ke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny eci meb er ɛm eke k’ɛgŋn af, ke es an nyim nyim él ɔny ec’ar mob sus ɛm eke k’ocr ɛwr ɛr af;
49006015	ke ɔny eci gbragbra kok ɛrm es ɛy ec’Amani Mamn ɔb ɛm a, él ɔny eci cɔkrukpɔ eke k’anŋ ɔny akr ɛm.
49006016	Ke ɔny ec’ɔmn a ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny ec’erkpo af, ɛ́lum ɔny abu irmnin agn low ŋuŋ ɛs eci sibin a, ek’al b’anŋ nɛny af ke b’ɔwl im igŋ ob ab es.
49006017	Òcr sel ɛŋn ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny eci kpokpo tufɛ af, ke Nyam odad ánŋ ɛsɛ ɔny eci lab any yony ek’Abŋ Lala ɔŋ ɔny af.
49006018	Ów amua fɛŋ ìbrmn Nyam, Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm. Ɛɛ, ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam low fɛŋ ɛm Abŋ ec’abu ɛlum ɛm. Ke low na nuŋ af, any ók ɔny es ke ánŋn cɛcɛ kok ɛm. Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam in ec’agŋ lala a fɛŋ yɛj’eci;
49006019	ɛm yɛji ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam ɛm eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ɛ́lu’m in ec’odad ebl a nɛnym, ke m’ɔ́ny lokm susu mi dad low a eke lɔl es Amani Mamn ab ɛm a.
49006020	Eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm yɛji, m’el Amani Mamn a eci lebl ɛlu ɛs. Ow sosiɛm ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam ke m’ɔ́ny lokm susu mi dad ɛs’elel ek’ow it ab af.
49006021	M’erur ek’ɔny yɛji k’uwr ɛm e lís e low any, ke úwr low yec’eke m’am kok a yɛj’any. Tisik ek’el ɛgŋ lisijim lel ɛgŋ lawl mamn ab, ke am kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma cɛcɛ ɛm a, b’ow ɔŋ ɔny amani a fɛŋ.
49006022	M’am ɛrm’n l’ow cɛ eke li ki dad ɔny ɛy e lís e low, ke l’átr ɔny sos es.
49006023	Ke Nyam lel ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɔ́ŋ agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ɛrm es ɛy, erur lel ɔmn ab!
49006024	Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’erur ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ab, erur a ek’ɔnym itŋn ab ɛm.
50001001	Pɔl lele Timote ab, ek’el Jesu Krist ec’ɔbɔwi a, e lɛl ek’am awŋ Filip baŋn e Nyam ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Jesu Krist ab, Nyamel ec’idr ɛsɛl lele diakrɛl ab.
50001002	Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
50001003	Mi b’ɔŋ Nyam bia sakp sakp fɛŋ eke mi b’ɔkn ɔny e low a.
50001004	Sɛgŋ a fɛŋ e Nyam eke mi bi ŋɔŋn m’ɔŋ ɔny a, sos ɛm iŋn ɛm mi bi ŋɔŋn,
50001005	Amani Mamn a ec’elel ek’ɛlumn’m abu mi mɔmun es lɛgŋ krɛkrɛ ɛm ɛtŋ toŋ igŋ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a sosiɛm eci.
50001006	M’uw any tasi eke Nyam ek’ɔb nuŋ am kok juma mamn na ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm a, b’ow ucu ɔny es toŋ ígŋ nuŋ, toŋ ow ók lɛgŋ eke Jesu Krist b’ow ow a.
50001007	M’ɔny low ij, eke m’ɔny tutr nɛnɛ ɔny fɛŋ e lís. M’oc ɔny ɛm ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ke ow el ŋgbraka ɛm eke m’anŋ, ke ow el lɛgŋ a eke m’ɔny abusu eke mi ki dogŋn, ke m’ɔmun Amani Mamn ab es a yɛji, ɔny a fɛŋ ɛŋan Nyam eci bibm a ɛsɛ ɛm af.
50001008	Ɛtŋ Nyam ij ɛm e daŋku eke ɔny fɛŋ m’erur ɔny tasi, ɛs’elel eke Jesu Krist ɔny erur ligbɛl ɔny ec’ab af.
50001009	Ɛtŋ ow eke m’am ibrm ɛm e ŋɔŋn ɛm a el: ke erur na ek’ɔnyn a ágb afŋn es, ke ow ɔ́ŋ ɔnyn low any uw lele nuŋ ɛm ɔny ab,
50001010	yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr ów tasi eke el nawrɛ ab any. Ow b’ow ɔŋ ayal, abr ɛnym k’ánm ɔny lís, lɛgŋ a eke Jesu Krist b’ow ow a,
50001011	ɛtŋ ów amamn eci ey eke wɛl b’ɛŋn Jesu Krist ɛm a, b’ow ok ɔkm ɔny ɛm; ke ow él Nyam ec’anygbɛl lele kɔklm ab.
50001012	Sica lisijimɛl, m’erur eke k’uwr any eke es abur na ek’ɛŋn’m a, tasi ɛm a, ɔŋ Amani Mamn a imn anym eci,
50001013	aŋke sica agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ es ɛw ɛs a e gbugŋ a lele susu ɛjec’ab a uw any eke Krist sosiɛm m’anŋ ŋgbraka ɛm.
50001014	Ɛtŋ agŋ lisijimɛl nɔnɔ ec’ɔmn ek’ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm a obn, ŋgbraka na ɛm eke m’anŋ a; ow ɔŋ erŋn ɔnym ɛl ɛtŋ lokm susu ɛm -n’am dad Nyam ec’odad.
50001015	Nawrɛ tasi ek’ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam, ɛm sosiɛm, b’ɔb Krist ec’Amani a ŋkre ɛm, ów es atar ɛm, ɛbɛn yɛji, likpr b’ɔb Krist ec’Amani a erur ɛm tasi.
50001016	Ɛl akpasu a, -li b’ɔb Krist ec’Amani a erur ɛm, aŋke -l’uw any eke ɛm eci sobel ɛm aŋa eke m’anŋ a, el Amani Mamn a e dogŋn eci.
50001017	Ɛtŋ ɛl a eke b’ɔb Krist ec’amani a sow tutr eŋuŋ ɛm, ɛm eci ŋkre ogŋ ɛm a, ɛl e tutr a el, ke -l’obn ɛm e gbre ij a sobel ɛm aŋa eke m’anŋ a.
50001018	Yɛji ɔfr ɔfr! Ek’ɛl eci sow tutr a el eŋuŋ oglog amamn yɛji, ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn a el: Krist ec’amani a ec’a, wɛl am ɔb ɛtŋ ow b’ow iŋn’m sos ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ,
50001019	aŋke m’uw any eke ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn lele Jesu Krist ec’Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ab ab, b’ow el ɛm eci sɔg.
50001020	Sica ɛsɛ elel eke m’am eku ke m’am ɔmn tasi a, mi k’ɛknm low yec’eke k’ɔny’m ɛ́s. Kɔ ke ow el sicaca oglog ke ow el sɛgŋ fɛŋ, m’ɔny ɔmn tasi ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛlu Krist eci sagb a ɔkm ɛm ec’ɛgŋ el fɛŋ ɛm, ɛm ec’owr anŋ ɛm oglog ɛm e luw ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
50001021	Ɛm ec’a, tasi ɛm a Krist anake el ɛm e sel a, ɛtŋ luw el ɛm eci ŋgrusiɛ.
50001022	Gbɛkɔ ek’ow it eke mi k’anŋ owr ke mi kok juma mamn, ke mi k’úwm low yec’eke mi ki sɔsum m’oc ab any.
50001023	M’anŋ sow tutr yony ec’araŋn: m’am erur eke mi k’uw ke m’ím m’anŋ Krist ab, na anake akpl afŋn es a.
50001024	Gbɛkɔ ow it ke m’ánŋ owr sos megl ɛm ɔny e nimamn eci.
50001025	Ca m’uw any tasi ŋ̂! M’ow m’anŋ owr, mi b’ow m’ir ɔny fɛŋ ab yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɛ́lum ɔny abu iman anym eci, ke ɔ́nyn sos ɛm iŋn ɔmn ɛm.
50001026	Ke lɛgŋ eke ɛmɛny mi b’ɛwl m’ow m’ɛŋn ɔny a, ɔny e sos ɛm iŋn a eke ɔnyn Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, ágb nɔnɔ.
50001027	Gbɛkɔ ow e tasi a cɛ el: ke áan es nyim nyim Krist ec’Amani Mamn ab af, yec’ɛtŋ ke, eke m’ow m’ɛkn ɔny ɛtŋ m’owm yɛji, m’íri ek’inymn es kikri ɛtŋ okar af ow tutr nyam ɛm, ɛtŋ am dogŋnin low abŋ nyam ɛm, ɔmn ek’Amani Mamn ɔŋ ɔny a eci.
50001028	Kì yɛbr ɔny ec’efnu a akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm k’ɔ́ŋ erŋn k’ɔny ɔny; low na b’ow yɛgm ɛl eke -l’irm ŋ̂, ke ɔny ec’a, ow yɛgm ɔny ek’anŋn ɔny e sɔg ec’ebr af; ɛtŋ ow el low ek’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow,
50001029	aŋke Nyam ɔŋ ɔny bibm eke k’ubr Krist nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ kɔ ke ɛmɛny íjr in e gbre yɛji.
50001030	Sicaca ɛm a, ɔny lel ɛm ab anake s’okr af s’am dogŋn low a. Low dogŋn nyam a cɛ eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm mi dogŋn, ke ɛmɛny m’am dogŋn ɛsɛ elel ek’uwr any ab af a.
50002001	Ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn Krist ɛm a b’ɔŋ ɔny lɛc ee? In ec’erur a b’atr ɔny sos es ee? B’okar af in ec’Abŋ Lala ab ab ee? B’ɔnyn sɔrŋ ikŋ lel ɛrm mamn ab ɔny ɔfr ɛm ee?
50002002	Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke m’am ibrm eke k’ɔŋn’m sos ɛm iŋn tasi ɔny e nɛny af okr ɛm, ke ɔ́nyn erur nyam, ke ókar af ɛrm ɛm lel ow tutr ɛm ab.
50002003	Kì kokr low kaka ɛm bubr ec’abŋ ɛm oglog eke agŋ k’ɛkn ɔny eci, kɔ es is ɛm, òcr ɔny lawlɛl ɛsɛ agŋ eke igbl ogŋ akm ɔny af.
50002004	Ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔ́lm in sɔny coco e nimamn es, kɔ ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ɔ́l lawlɛl yɛj’ec’a es.
50002005	Ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, ɔ̀nyn es an ɛsɛ elel eke agŋ eke b’uw Krist any a bi kok ab af.
50002006	In, n’anŋ ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam anŋn ab af, aŋke god’ɛtŋ l’el Nyam. Gbɛkɔ l’ɛgŋm l’atm bɛbmn ikŋ na e low any.
50002007	Kɔ in obi ɛm, li wal low fɛŋ eke n’ɔny a l’ɛlu es, l’ocr in sosi libɔwi, l’el ɛgŋ ɔfr ɔfrli agŋ ec’araŋn, ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ ɛkn’n ɛsɛ ɛgŋ cɛ af.
50002008	L’ɛgŋ in obi ɛm l’eb eke li k’ir ɛb es is ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ɛlum Nyam toŋ l’igŋ luw ɛm, olikŋ af e luw ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
50002009	Es is na sosiɛm, Nyam ɔny igbl’l ogŋ, ɛw’r low fɛŋ e nuŋ af ɛtŋ ɔŋ’n nin ek’agb akm nin fɛŋ.
50002010	Ow b’ow ɔŋ ob ob fɛŋ eke anŋ afr, wus af aŋa lele ɔŋnes ab a, ok ɔwrɔkp wus eke -li b’iri Jesu e nin a.
50002011	Ke nɛny nɛny fɛŋ kɔ́klm eke Jesu Krist el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Ɛs Nyam ec’anygbɛl eci.
50002012	Na sosiɛm, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl, ɛsɛ elel eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ b’ɛlumn Nyam ab af, ùcur ɔnyn es ɛbɛn ke kókr juma ɔny e sel a eke ɛŋan a eci, muru ɛm lel ɛlum ɛm ab, ke ow k’élm ɛm ec’any af cɛ, kɔ ɛm e jam jam yɛji,
50002013	aŋke Nyam in obi li b’ɔŋ ɔny low ɛgŋ eb lele ow e kok ab ec’abusu ɛsɛ elel eke li bɛbm ab af.
50002014	Low fɛŋ eke b’ow kokr a, k’élm abr ɛny ɛm lele ów es kpakpab ɛm ab,
50002015	yec’ɛtŋ ke éel agŋ eke abr ɛnym anm lís ke ayl, Nyam ec’ey eke ɔnym wɛwr, ke ir agŋ eke ɔny ɛnyɛmbri yony yony lele ów eŋuŋ ab ec’araŋn. Ow it ke ám jɛjan ɛl ec’araŋn ɛsɛ mrabri af,
50002016	aŋke ɔnymn sel ɛŋn ec’odad ab ab. Eke bi kokr ɛbɛn, m’b’ow m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ɔny eci, lɛgŋ eke Krist b’ow ow a, aŋke ow b’ow yɛgm’m eke ow elm ɔfr ɔfr m’urum es, m’ijm gbre mi kokm juma.
50002017	Ow k’ɔdm ke ɛm e mebl a ók es, él egb waw eke wɛl kok am igŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn eke ɔnyn Nyam ɛm ab af. Eke ow el ɛbɛn ow k’ɛcr a, sos ɛm am iŋn’m ɛtŋ m’am cɛc sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na ɔny fɛŋ ab.
50002018	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ɔny yɛji ow it eke sos ɛm k’iŋn ɔny ke cɛ́cr sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na ɛm ab.
50002019	M’am ɔny tutr eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm, lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm mi k’ɔŋ Timote ow ɛkn ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’íri ɔny e lís e low, ke ow átr’m sos es ɛm obi ɛm.
50002020	Tasi ɛm a, Timote cɛ anake el ɛgŋ eke ɛsɛ ɛm af, ɔny e low b’okr ɛrmij, ke bi tutr ɔny e low tasi a.
50002021	Agŋ likpr a fɛŋ ec’a, ɛl obi e lís ec’ów ec’ɛrmij cɛ -li b’ebr, kɔ ow elm Jesu Krist ec’ów a gbɛ.
50002022	Timote ec’a, uwr any yɛj’eke l’ɛlu in e nawrɛ ij a ɔkm, elel eke li kokr juma ɛm ab ɛsɛ iy lele ɛs ab af, Amani Mamn sosiɛm ec’a.
50002023	In anake m’am tutr eke mi k’ɛrm’n l’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ kpɛkŋ eke ɛm e lís owi a b’ow ayl’m sos ɛm a;
50002024	ɛtŋ m’ɔny ɔmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm, eke lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm, mi b’ow m’ow m’ɛkn ɔny ɛm obi yɛji.
50002025	Gbɛkɔ mi tutr yɛj’eke ow akpl e mi k’ɔŋ ɛy lisijim Epafrodit eke el ɛm lawl juma kok ɛm lele low dogŋn ɛm ab a, ów ɛkn ɔny, in eke ɛrmn in l’ow l’is’m abu ɛlum a eke m’am eku a.
50002026	N’am erur tasi eke ɛmɛny li k’ɛkn ɔny fɛŋ ɛtŋ n’am ɔny ɛrmij yɛji, aŋke irir in ec’ɔl a e low.
50002027	Nawrɛ, ɔl ɔny’n tasi toŋ ow anŋ tɛl cɛ ke blel l’úw, kɔ Nyam ikŋ’n sɔrŋ; ɛtŋ ow elm in sosiɛm s’ɔny cɛ, kɔ ɛm sosiɛm yɛj’eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke sos k’ɔ́wm im es ɛmɛny obnm na eke ɔw’m es a.
50002028	Ow sosiɛm a, m’am ogŋ es eke mi k’ɔŋ’n l’ow n’ɛŋn ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛmɛny b’ɛkan in a, ow ɔ́ŋ ɔny sos ɛm iŋn, ke ɛm eci sos es ɔw a óc es.
50002029	Ow akpl eke k’ebr ir sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, ɛsɛ ɛgŋ lisijim af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛm. Ow it ke ɔ́nyn agŋ akpasu nɛnɛ a eci sos usr,
50002030	aŋke Krist e juma sosiɛm anake blel l’úw a. Ɛtŋ blel l’írmn in ec’owr anŋ a, abu ɛlum a eke ɔtumn eke ɔny obi k’ocr isr’m, ke in l’oc l’is’m ab ɛm.
50003001	Sica ɛm lisijimɛl, sos ɛm iŋn ɔny eke okar af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a. Ɛtŋ ow ɛym’m sos ɛm eke m’am ebr low yec’a eke m’ikŋ anym m’awŋ ɔny ow e lɛl ab ɛm; ɔny ec’a ow akpl ɛbɛn.
50003002	Ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm juma eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl amua, mɔwr amua, eke am ucu yadŋ ɛm e likr es ubr owi ɔny es a e lís!
50003003	Agŋ eke ɛl eci likr es ubr el tasi a, ow ow el ɛy, aŋke ɛy si b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ in ec’Abŋ a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm, si b’ɛlu ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn ɔkm Jesu Krist sosiɛm ɛtŋ s’ocm ɛy ec’ɔmn a s’ɛlum ów amua eke el agŋ ɛm ec’ów ab ɛm.
50003004	Ke m’ɔtu cɛ eke ɛm yɛji, m’óc ɛm ec’ɔmn a m’ɛlu ów amua e kok ɛm. Ɛtŋ eke ɛgŋ nyam ɔny tutr eke ów amua e kok b’ism ɛgŋ bibm ab, ke ɛm tasi anake m’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔny tutr akpasu na a.
50003005	Ɛm, wɛl ubr’m likr es eke wɛl ew’m bake ow ij sɛgŋ niwn a. Ɛm, Israɛl iyli tasi mew ɛm ɛtŋ, Bɛnjamɛ ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, Ebre e liy mebl ɛm ɛtŋ. Yec’eke el Jwifɛl ec’ol ec’ɛlum ec’a, ke ɛm Farisiɛl ec’ogog m’anŋ;
50003006	ɛtŋ ɛm ec’ol ec’ɛlum ligbɛl eke m’ɔny a, ɔŋ’m m’ijr agŋ ek’el Krist ec’a gbre. Sica yec’eke el ol e jɛj ok nɛny nyam ɛm a, m’ɔnym abr ɛnym kaka.
50003007	Gbɛkɔ, ów amua fɛŋ eke mi lɛr ɛsɛ ob ɔny tasi af a, Krist sosiɛm a, sica m’am lɛr ɛl ɛsɛ ów ɔfr ɔfr ek’ɔnym any af.
50003008	-
50003009	Jesu Krist ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any eke mi k’uw a, anake el low tasi eke ɔny any a. Ɛm e tutr ɛm a, low fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ɛŋn a, elm low kaka Krist ec’any uw a ec’any af. Krist sosiɛm, m’igŋ fɛŋ m’ɛlu es. M’ɔ́ny Krist anŋ ɛm ab, ke m’ókr af in ab a sosiɛm, m’am lɛr ów amua fɛŋ ɛsɛ lirŋ af e suw af. Ow elm ol e m’am ɛlum a sosiɛm m’elm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs, kɔ ɔmn eke m’ɔny Krist ɛm a sosiɛm. Nyam anake b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛs a, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’ɔny ɔmn in ɛm a, li b’ɔŋ ow ow el nɛny nyam ɛs.
50003010	Low a cɛ eke m’am erur a el: ke m’úw Krist any, ke m’úw abusu a yɛji ek’ɔŋ’n l’igb luw ɛm ab any. Ɛtŋ ow eke ɛmɛny m’am erur a el: ke m’íj gbre in ab, ke m’úw ɛsɛ in ec’ab af.
50003011	Ɛbɛn eke m’am ɔny ɔmn eke batŋ m’uw, ke ɛm yɛji m’ánŋ agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm m’igb ana.
50003012	Mi dadm m’ɛsmɛ m’ɛŋn ow e m’am ɔl ab ŋ̂, oglog ke mi kok ow iy nɛny ŋ̂! Gbɛkɔ m’am uru es m’im cɛ eke mi k’ɛŋn es uru a eci labm sɔg a, aŋke Jesu Krist jɛj ɔny’m lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ.
50003013	Njaŋ, agŋ lisijimɛl, mi dadm eke m’ɛŋn labm sɔg a ŋ̂; gbɛkɔ low nyam cɛ m’am kok: m’íjl low sig fɛŋ es, ke m’átr sos es m’im m’ɛŋn ow a ek’anŋ’m anym a.
50003014	M’am uru es m’im eke mi k’igŋ ow e nuŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɛ́ŋn labm sɔg a eke Nyam, Jesu Krist ɛm, am ɛsŋ ɛy eke si k’ɛŋn afr a.
50003015	Ɛy fɛŋ eke s’ɔny ɔmn eke usu a, s’ɔ́nyn tutr nyam coco na. Ow e jam a, ek’ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam am ɔny tutr ɛjeci, Nyam b’ow ayal ow e low ɔŋ ɔny.
50003016	Kɔ ca, aŋa eke s’ow bake s’igŋ a, s’ébr ebr nyam a cɛ eke s’eb toŋ ke s’igŋ aŋa a.
50003017	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny fɛŋ kòkr ɛsɛ ɛm af. Si yɛgm ɔny sɛwl; ow sosiɛm lɛ̀ɛr agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’an es sɛwl ikŋ na af a.
50003018	Mi dad ɔny sakp nɔnɔ yɛji ɛtŋ m’am ebr ɛm mi dad ɔny ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm yɛfɛnyna yɛj’eke: agŋ nɔnɔ anŋ eke ɛl ec’es an a bi yɛgm eke -l’el Krist ec’olikŋ a ec’efnu.
50003019	Ɛl akpasu na, irm cɛ -li b’ow -l’irm, aŋke ɛl e Nyam el ɛl eci lok a, ɛtŋ low eke k’el ɛ́s ɔny ɛl a, b’iŋn ɛl sos ɛm. Ɛl, wus ec’ów cɛ b’anŋ ɛl nuŋ ɛm.
50003020	Ɛy ec’a gbɛ, ɛy ec’ɛb ir usu anŋ afr, ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke s’am eku ɛsɛ ɛy e sɔg ɛs af, eke el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist a, b’ow anŋ afr yogŋ ow.
50003021	Ɛtŋ li b’ow l’itŋn ɛy e sos megl a eke b’ugŋ es a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ in ec’anygbɛl e sos megl ab af, in ec’abusu a eke ow ɛm li b’ɔŋ mob fɛŋ is es in ec’es ɛw a ec’any af a.
50004001	Na sosiɛm, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am erur tasi eke ɛmɛny mi k’ɛkn ɔny, ɔny eke eel ɛm e sos ɛm iŋn lel ɛm ec’any eb tufɛ ab a; kin elel eke k’inymn es kikri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɔny ec’ɛb ir ɛm.
50004002	Evodi lele Sɛntis ab, m’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, m’ok ɔny m’ɛrm sabu af, òkar af ɔny ec’ɛb ir ɛm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm.
50004003	Ɛtŋ ŋ, ɛm lawl tasi juma kok ɛm, m’am dad’ŋ eke k’ɛlum ɔyɔw yony na abu, aŋke ɛm ab -li dogŋn Amani Mamn a ec’ɔb e low, Klema yɛji, lele ɛm e juma kok ɛm ec’agŋ lawlɛl ɛjec’a fɛŋ eke ɛl ec’en anŋ sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a.
50004004	Sos ɛm íŋn ɔny sɛgŋ fɛŋ eke okar af Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a. M’am dadr ɛm, sos ɛm íŋn ɔny!
50004005	Ɛ̀lul ɔny ec’ɛrm frɔrɔ ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ e lís, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’ow a ibnm ij.
50004006	K’èbar low kaka ec’ɛrmij, kɔ low low fɛŋ ɛm, ìbrmn Nyam ɔny e ŋɔŋn ɛm, low yec’a eke ɔnyn ow ec’es abur a, ìbrmn in ɛrm eke b’ɔkn in e low ab ɛm.
50004007	Ɛtŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm es ɛy a eke agb akm nuŋ ɛm ɔny fɛŋ a, b’ow ɔsu ɔny e mɛrm a lele ɔny e sow tutr ab ab Jesu Krist ɛm.
50004008	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, kin yec’ek’it eke k’ɛwr ɛrm af: low fɛŋ eke el nawrɛ ke it eke wɛl k’ɛlum, low fɛŋ eke el low nɛnyɛmbri nyam lele lala ab, low fɛŋ eke wɛl ɔtu eke wɛl k’erur ke wɛl ɛ́gŋ eb, low nimamn fɛŋ lele low fɛŋ ek’it eke wɛl k’aw ab.
50004009	Kòkr yec’a eke wewar ke ebr lele ow eke irir mi dad, ke ɛkan’m mi kok ab ab. Ɛtŋ Nyam a eke b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛrm es ɛy a, b’ow anŋ ɔny ab.
50004010	M’ɛŋn sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ɛm lel Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm, aŋke ɛwal mɛny ɔnyn ɛm ec’abu ɛlum ec’erur. Abu ɛlum ec’erur ikŋ na ɔnyn, kɔ abusu anake ɔtumn ɔnymn eke k’ɛlul il ɔkm a.
50004011	Ow elm es abur ɛm eke m’anŋ a sosiɛm mi dadm nɛnɛ. Tasi ɛm a, ɛm m’uw any eke ow a cɛ eke m’ɔny a ɔdŋ’m ŋ̂.
50004012	Ɛm m’uw gbre ɛm ec’ɛb ir any ɛtŋ m’uw ehe ɛm ec’ɛb ir yɛj’any. Mi wewr elel eke low fɛŋ ɛm lele susu fɛŋ ab, mi k’ɛgŋ elel eke m’anŋn a m’eb; ke m’ɔ́ny m’ij oglog ke m’ánŋ namn, ke m’ɔ́ny nɔnɔ oglog ke m’ɔ́ny tɛl.
50004013	M’ɔtu eke mi k’ɔbr ses babur amua fɛŋ, Krist e lɛc a eke b’ɔŋ’m ab ɛm.
50004014	Gbɛkɔ, uwr kok eke ɛlumn’m abu ɛm e gbre na ɛm a.
50004015	Ɔny Filip eyŋ, uwr any tasi eke lɛgŋ a eke m’ŋgboŋ Maseduan a, lakpo ab af eke wɛl ɔb nuŋ am ɔmun Amani Mamn ab es a, ɔny cɛ eel Nyamel eke ɛlum im abu, ɔŋ’m os m’ɔtu mi kok ɛm e lís e low a.
50004016	Ow a eke m’anŋ Tesaloni baŋn a ɛtŋ, sakp nɔnɔ isr’m abu ɛlum ek’it a.
50004017	Ow elm ke m’ám ɔl ob eke wɛl k’ap’m es; kɔ ow eke m’am ɔl es a el, ke ɛ́ŋan ɔny eci ŋgrusiɛ.
50004018	M’ɛŋn mob a fɛŋ ek’it a; ow ɛny afŋn es yɛji. M’ɛŋn mob a fɛŋ eke ɔŋn Epafrodit eke k’oc is’m a, ɛtŋ sica m’ɔny fɛŋ iy’m nɛny. Ɔny ec’abu ɛlum a anŋ ɛsɛ ob ap sŋɔsŋɔ af, ɛsɛ egb waw eke Nyam ɛgŋ eb, ke akpl’l sos ɛm af.
50004019	Ɛm e Nyam a b’ow kok ɔny e lís e low fɛŋ, in e gbreŋgbi ij a ek’ɛy ɔkm Jesu Krist ɛm a sosiɛm.
50004020	Anygbɛl él Nyam ɛy Ɛs eci, akpo akpo fɛŋ. Amɛn!
50004021	Ɛ̀sŋnin Jesu Krist ɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ eke el Nyam ec’a. Agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ eke anŋ ɛm ab a yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny.
50004022	Nyam ɛm ec’agŋ a fɛŋ eke anŋ aŋa a, ab brobro agŋ a eke bi kok Sesar e juma a, am ɛsŋn ɔny.
50004023	Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab!
51001001	Pɔl, eke Nyam ec’erur ɛm, el Jesu Krist ec’ɛrm ɛs lel ɛy lisijim Timote ab, am awŋ
51001002	Nyam ec’agŋ ek’ir Kolɔs baŋn, ke el nɛny nyam ɛm ec’ɛy lisijimɛl eke okr af Krist ɛm a lɛl. Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
51001003	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ si b’ɛlu Nyam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs bia eke si bi ŋɔŋn’n ɔny ec’a,
51001004	aŋke wɛl dad ɛy s’iri ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn Jesu Krist ɛm lel ɔny ec’erur ek’ɔnyn agŋ fɛŋ ek’el Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’ab ab e low.
51001005	Eke low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’amani ek’el Amani Mamn, ɔg es ow ɔny ogŋ a, ɔny, irir low yec’a eke Nyam bɛbm ɛw ɔny es afr a; ɛtŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn lel ɔny ec’erur ab ucu low eku ikŋ na ɔny es.
51001006	Amani Mamn a am eb es ɛtŋ am ɔsu ey wus nimum af, ɛs’elel eke n’am kokr ɔny ec’araŋn lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke ɔgr es irir Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a e low, ke uwr ob tasi eke l’el ab any a.
51001007	Epafras ek’el ɛy e juma kok ɛm e lawl eke s’erur sɛnyn sɛnyn a anake yɛgm ɔny low ikŋ na a; n’am usr ɛy usu li kok juma ɛsɛ Krist e juma kok ɛs nimamn tasi af;
51001008	n’ɔŋ ɛy ɔny ec’Abŋ Lala ec’erur ek’ɔŋ ɔny a ec’amani.
51001009	Na sosiɛm anake ɛy yɛji, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke s’iri wɛl dad ɛy ɔny e lís e low a, sɛgŋ fɛŋ s’am ŋɔŋn Nyam s’ɔŋ ɔny a. S’am ibrm Nyam eke li k’ɔŋ ɔny uwr in ec’erur tasi ab any, nuŋ ɛm ɔny fɛŋ lel sɛwr fɛŋ ek’in ec’Abŋ a b’ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm.
51001010	Ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ b’ow ɔnyn es an eke b’usr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sos ɛtŋ b’ow kokr sɛgŋ fɛŋ yec’eke b’akpl’l sos ɛm a. B’ow kokr ów amamn fɛŋ ɛtŋ b’ow iman anym eci, ɔny eci Nyam ec’any uw ab ɛm.
51001011	S’am ibrm Nyam eke k’ucu ɔny ɔny es low low fɛŋ ɛm in ec’anygbɛl ec’abusu ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ k’ɔ́tur inymn es kikri, ke ɔ́nyn ɛrm susu low eku ɛm.
51001012	Ɛ̀lul Ɛs Nyam bia sos ɛm iŋn ɛm: in eke n’ɔŋ ɔny abusu eke k’ɛŋan ów a fɛŋ eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es afr ec’usuayl ab ɛm, agŋ a ek’el in ec’a ec’a.
51001013	N’ɔny l’oc ɛy es ncebn ec’abusu ab ɛm ɛtŋ l’oc l’ɛlu ɛy in ec’Iy e l’erur a ec’es ɛw ab ɛm.
51001014	Jim ɛm anake li sɔg ɛy low ŋuŋ ɛm, ke l’oc ɛy e sikpl a yɛji l’ap ɛy a.
51001015	Krist el Nyam eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e mɛny ɛwr. L’el Liy krɛkrɛ ek’anŋ mob mob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a e ŋuŋ af,
51001016	aŋke in ɛm Nyam ɛcr kok ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ afr lele wus af aŋa ab a: mob e wɛl b’ɛkn lele yec’eke wɛl ɛ́knm ab, lɛc fɛŋ, es akm fɛŋ, es ɛw fɛŋ lele abusu fɛŋ ab. Nyam ɛcr in ɛm kok fɛŋ in eci.
51001017	Krist ikŋ anym anŋ gbuŋ ɛtŋ ob fɛŋ anŋ, ɛtŋ in ɛm ob fɛŋ ɔtu inym es ɛl e susu a.
51001018	Krist eci sos megl el Nyamel ɛtŋ in obi l’el ow e nuŋ. Krist el nuŋ ɔb, l’el Liy krɛkrɛ eke wɛl ew, ɛtŋ l’el krɛkrɛ ec’ɛgŋ ek’igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’él krɛkrɛ n’anŋ mob fɛŋ e nuŋ af,
51001019	aŋke Nyam erur eke k’ir Jim ɛm nimum,
51001020	ɛtŋ l’erur yɛj’eke li k’ɛcr Jim ɛm l’okr wus nimum ec’agŋ ɛm Jim eci. Jim eci mebl a ek’ok es olikŋ af ab ɛm, Nyam ɛw ɛrm es ɛy es wus af aŋa lel afr ab.
51001021	Ɔny Kolɔs eyŋ, ɔny yɛji lɛgŋ eke ɛc ab ɛm a, kpabr es Nyam e lís, eel in ec’efnu ów eŋuŋ a eke b’ɔnyn ow e tutr ke bi kokr a sosiɛm eci.
51001022	Gbɛkɔ lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam ɔny okr ɔny ɛm in ab, Jim e sos megl ɛm e luw a ek’uw olikŋ af ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ówr in ec’any af ɛsɛ agŋ lala, agŋ ek’ɔnym low ɔbr, ke abr ɛnym anm lís af.
51001023	Gbɛkɔ ow it eke k’inymn es kikri ke íjr lɛc ɔmn ɛm. Ke kí kpabmn es Amani Mamn a e lís, aŋke l’el low eke s’am ɔmn. Ɔny, irir in e low, aŋke wɛl ɔb amani a ok agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ wus af aŋa a, ɛtŋ ɛm Pɔl, m’el ow e juma kok ɛs.
51001024	Sica sos ɛm am iŋn’m eke m’am m’ij ɔny e gbre. Tasi ɛm a, ɛm obi ɛm a, ɛbɛn m’anŋ ɛm m’am m’ij Krist e gbre ek’ij in e sos megl a ek’el Nyamel ec’a.
51001025	M’el Nyamel e juma kok ɛs, aŋke ow el juma eke Nyam abul’m eke mi ki kok ɔny eci: l’abul’m eke mi k’ɔb in ec’amani a ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af.
51001026	Odad a eke el low eke lɔl es god’ɛtŋ sɔwɔrŋ ec’any af, ke lɛgŋ na ɛm, Nyam ɛlu ɔkm kpata yɛgm agŋ a eke el in ec’a.
51001027	Nyam erur eke ki yɛgm ɛl -l’uw low na eke lɔl es ab any, ke el ob ɔny lele low sɔbɔ ab, eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es agŋ fɛŋ ec’a. Ɛtŋ kin low a eke lɔl es a: Krist anŋ ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɔny ɔnyn ɔmn eke ɔny yɛji b’ow ɛŋan Nyam ec’anygbɛl a.
51001028	Ow sosiɛm, s’am ɔb Krist ec’amani s’ok ɛgŋ fɛŋ. S’am ɛwar ɛtŋ s’am yɛgm ɛgŋ ɛgŋ low sɛwr fɛŋ ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɛ́y ɔkm Nyam ec’any af ɛsɛ ɛgŋ eke uw low fɛŋ any Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
51001029	Na sosiɛm m’am kok juma, ɛtŋ m’am dogŋn low Krist e lɛc a ec’abusu a ek’anŋ’m ɛm ab ɛm.
51002001	M’erur eke k’uwr gbre e m’am ij ab any low na eke m’am dogŋn ɔny ec’ab ɛm, ɔny lele Laodise ec’agŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a lele agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ ek’uwm im any nyamn ɛm ab ab.
51002002	Tasi ɛm a, m’am erur eke -li k’ɔny ɛrm susu iy ɛl ɛrm ɛm gbɔŋ ke -l’okr af erur ɛm, ke nuŋ ɛm ɔny íy ɛl ɛm gbɔŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -l’uw Nyam e low eke lɔl es ab any. Low a eke lɔl es a el: Krist,
51002003	eke in ɛm ob ɔny ɛsɛ sɛwr af lele low any uw ab lɔl es a.
51002004	M’am dad ɔny low na yec’ɛtŋ ke kí yɛbmn ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛjum ɔny sodad ebl amamn e dad ɛm.
51002005	Eke m’anm ɔny ab sos megl ɛm yɛji, m’anŋ ɔny ab ow tutr ɛm, ɛtŋ m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn ek’ɔnyn ɛrm susu inymn es kikri usu nyam Krist ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn ab ɛm.
51002006	Ow sosiɛm, eke ɛgŋn Jesu Krist ebr ɛsɛ ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ af a, ìir ɛb af okr ɛm in ab.
51002007	Òkr min in ɛm, ùsr ɔny ec’owr anŋ a in af. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ìnymn es kikri ɔny ec’ɔmn ab ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl yɛgmn ɔny ab af, ke ɛ́lul Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
51002008	Ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum eke k’ɔny ɔgŋm ɔny meb agŋ e sow tutr yadŋ ab ɛm. Ow el yadŋ ɔny eke low kaka anm ɛm, ke b’ɛŋn lɛc agŋ ɛm ec’ow kok ɛm, wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc ogŋ, ke elm Krist ec’a.
51002009	Nyam in nimum a, l’ir Krist e sos megl ab ɛm.
51002010	Ɛtŋ ɔny nimum a ɛŋan Krist ec’owr anŋ e low fɛŋ, in eke l’el es ɛw eke anŋ es ɛw fɛŋ lel abusu fɛŋ eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e nuŋ af a.
51002011	Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm anake wɛl ubr ɔny likr es a, ɛtŋ likr es ubr ikŋ na elm ɛgŋ ec’abu ɛm ec’eke kok. Kɔ likr es ubr ek’anŋ Krist ɛm ow, ke ɔny low a eke b’itr ɛlu ɛy low ŋuŋ ɛm a oc es.
51002012	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke wɛl ok ɔny mij nuŋ a, yogŋ ɛtŋ uwr Krist ab ɛtŋ anŋn luw ɛm igbr in ab, aŋke ubr Nyam ec’abusu a ek’igbm Krist luw ɛm a nawrɛ.
51002013	Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, ɔny eel agŋ ek’uw abŋ ɛm ɔny e sikpl a nuŋ af lele likr eke wɛl ubrm ɔny es, ke eel Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl ab ab sosiɛm. Kɔ lɛgŋ na ɛm a, Nyam ɔŋ ɔny anŋn owr Krist ab ɛtŋ l’ap ɛy, ɛy ec’ów ɔbr a fɛŋ.
51002014	Ɛy e labm e s’ɔny e lɛl a ek’am ok ɛy ow af, ke in ɛm e sol ek’anŋ a am ɔb ɛy low a, n’ɔny li tɛtŋ es. Ɛtŋ ni ŋuŋn ow l’ɔb ow ecigbrɔ olikŋ af yogŋ.
51002015	Ɛbɛn eke Nyam ɔny es ɛw fɛŋ lele abusu fɛŋ eke wɛl ɛ́knm a e lɛc oc es ana; ɛtŋ li kok wɛl sos keskes dedeku ɛm, l’ot wɛl ɛsɛ sobel ɛm ɛsɛl af, Jim ec’any eb ec’agŋ ek’am us jam ab ɛm.
51002016	Ow sosiɛm, kì yɛbr ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ki cak ɔny, ɔny ec’ob eke b’ijr oglog b’ɛgŋn ab ɛm, ses gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ec’ɔsu sosiɛm, awl owr e b’ɛli ɛy ɔkm ec’es gbɛgbl lele nɛnɛgŋ e lɛgŋ ec’ɔsu owi ɛm ab.
51002017	Ów amua am yɛgm low tasi a eke b’ow ow a, kɔ ɛl -l’elm low tasi a. Low tasi a el Krist.
51002018	Ɛgŋ kaka itm eke k’ɛdŋn ɔny any eb. M’am tutr agŋ a eke b’is es ɛw ekekey afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af igŋ ɛl nuŋ a e low, -li b’ucu mɛmn ɛm ec’ów eke -li b’ɛkn a e low -n’ɔny es. -L’el agŋ ek’ɛl e sow tutr a el agŋ ɛm e sow tutr tasi, ow b’ɔŋ ɛl -l’ɛfu es,
51002019	ɛtŋ -l’akŋamn Krist ab. Ke Krist anake el sos megl e nuŋ a, in ɛm sos megl nimum b’ɛŋn in ec’ob ij. In ɛm sos ŋgigŋnel a lele mifn ab b’okr af inym es kikri, ɛtŋ sos megl ikŋ na b’agb ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam b’erur ab af.
51002020	Sica ɔny uwr Krist ab, ɛtŋ wus aŋa e sabusu e lɛc elm low kaka ɔny eci. Ɛtŋ bla sosiɛm ɔny am íir ɛb ɛsɛ ɛmɛny wus ec’agŋ cɛ ɔny eel af ee? Bla sosiɛm am ɛgŋn ebr ek’ɛmɛny wɛl k’ɔŋ ɔny sol akpasu amua ɛsɛ:
51002021	k’òc ob na, k’ìj ob na, k’ìtŋn ob na abu ee?
51002022	Eke wɛl b’ɔb nuŋ am kok ɛl e low a, ów amua b’irm. Ow el sol lele low yɛgm ab eke agŋ ɛl obi eci nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛm ɔkn.
51002023	Tasi ɛm a, ígŋ ob nuŋ, ís es ɛw likekli afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’any af, íjr ŋ e sos megl gbre, wɛl b’ɛkn ów amua fɛŋ ɛsɛ sɛwr ec’ów af. Gbɛkɔ -l’el ów ɔfr ɔfr, sos megl owi cɛ ow b’ɛlum abu.
51003001	Sica Krist ab anake anŋn luw ɛm igbr a. Ow sosiɛm a, ɔ̀ɔl afr ec’ów es, yogŋ a eke Krist anŋ, ke ow el Nyam e lidr abu af a.
51003002	Ow akpl eke k’ebar afr ec’ów ec’ɛrmij, ow a eke k’ebar wus af aŋa ec’a ec’ɛrmij a.
51003003	Tasi, ɔny ɛcar luw ɛm, ɛtŋ ɔny ec’owr anŋ a lɔl es Krist eke anŋ Nyam ogŋ ab ɛm.
51003004	Krist anake el ɔny ec’owr anŋ tasi a, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ɛy ɔkm a, ɔny yɛji b’ow okr ɔkm in ab ɛtŋ in ec’anygbɛl a, ɔny yɛji b’ow ɛŋan.
51003005	Na sosiɛm a, ìbir ɔny ɛm low fɛŋ ek’el wus ec’ów ɛsɛ: nfaci ij af, sikpl owi af, ów aw eke ɛw fɛfɛdi lele ów aw eŋuŋ ab lele lokm suŋ ek’in ɛw ɛsɛ sinyam yadŋ e nuŋ igŋ ab af.
51003006	Ɛtŋ ów ɔbr ɔbr amua na sosiɛm anake Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a, [b’ow ok agŋ a ek’ɛgŋm eke k’ɔny in ec’ɛlum ab af a].
51003007	Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, ɔny yɛji ow a ek’am iir ɛb sikpl ɛm a, ɛbɛn eke kokr ana.
51003008	Kɔ jam aŋa, ìgŋn ów amua fɛŋ ek’el: ɛrm bebl, ɛrm wewe lele ɛrm suŋ ab a okr es. Ke wɛwr lel odad ebl kpɔm kpɔm ab k’ánm ɔny nɛnym ɛym ɔkm.
51003009	K’ɔ̀nyn yadŋ k’ɔŋanin ɔny ɔfr ɛm ij, aŋke ɔny ec’elel eke aan es lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, waal ɛlul es ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
51003010	ɛtŋ ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm owr af, ɛwal mɛny anŋn ɛsɛ ɛgŋ owr af. Ɔny eci ɛb ir owr ab ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ am otr Nyam ek’el ɔny e kok Ɛs ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur uwr ir any ok ɔny es sos ɛm.
51003011	Jam aŋa agŋ a fɛŋ el kpɛŋ kpɛŋ, ow ɔnym Jwif lel ɛgŋ ek’elm Jwif ab, ɛgŋ eke wɛl ubrm likr es lel ɛgŋ eke wɛl ubr likr es ab, ɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ lele mɛbɛy ab, madu lel ewi ab. Gbɛkɔ low tasi a: el Krist ek’el low fɛŋ, ke anŋ agŋ fɛŋ ek’ub’r nawrɛ ab ɛm a.
51003012	Nyam sɔsum ot ɔny eke k’eel in ec’agŋ ɛtŋ li b’erur ɔny. Ow sosiɛm a, ow akpl eke k’ɔnyn ɛrm ek’erur lele sɔrŋ ikŋ ab iy ɛm gbɔŋ, ɛrm mamn, es is ec’ɛrm, ɛrm frɔrɔ lele low eku ec’ɛrm ab.
51003013	Ɛ̀gŋn ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’elel eke anŋn a ebr ke áparir low yɛji, sakp sakp fɛŋ ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam b’ow ɔny low lawl ab a. Ow it eke k’aparir low ɛsɛ elel eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ap ɔny ab af.
51003014	Ɛtŋ low eke ki kokr tasi a el erur eke k’ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, aŋke erur el low eke b’ɔny agŋ okr af.
51003015	Ke Krist ec’ɛrm es ɛy a nyímn ɔny ec’ɛrm a; tasi ɛm a, ɛrm es ɛy ikŋ na ɛm anake Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’okar af éel nyam ɛsɛ sos megl nyam coco af a. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ̀ŋan in bia.
51003016	Ke Krist ec’odad ebl a, ɛ́ŋn usu ɔny ec’ɛrm ab ɛm in ec’ob ɔny a fɛŋ ab. Yɛ̀gmnin low ke ɔ́manin ów ɔny ɔfr ɛm sɛwr fɛŋ ɛm. Ɛ̀lul Nyam bia ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, ɛ̀gŋn selu, ɛ̀gŋn Nyam e sɛj ɛjeci lele sɛj eke Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɔny ab ab.
51003017	Low fɛŋ eke bi kokr oglog bi dadr ab ɛm, kòkr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm, ke in ɛm ɛ̀lul Ɛs Nyam bia.
51003018	Ɔyɔw, ɔny, ìsr es ɔny ɛcɛl ec’any af, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it eke ki kokr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af ab af.
51003019	Ɔyɔw ɛcɛl, èrurir ɔny ɛyɛl ke k’ɔ́nymn ɛl lokm yony ɛm.
51003020	Ey, ɔ̀nyn agŋ ek’ew ɔny a ec’ɛlum low low fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ow el low eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’erur.
51003021	Ey ɛsɛl, k’ìjar ɔny ec’ey a gbre, yec’ɛtŋ ke sos k’ɔ́wm ɛl es.
51003022	Madu, low low fɛŋ ɛm ɛ̀lumn ɔny e wus af aŋa eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a. Ow elm eke -li b’ɛw ɔny nyamn af cɛ ki kokmn ɛl e lís e low mɛwl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’aw ɔny. Kɔ ɛ̀lumn ɛl ɛrm nyam ɛm tasi, ɛlum ek’ɔnyn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a sosiɛm.
51003023	Juma fɛŋ eke bi kokr a, kòkr ɛrm nyam ɛm, ɛsɛ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci juma ɔny am kokr af, ke ow k’élm ɛsɛ agŋ ec’af.
51003024	Ow sosiɛm a, madu, ɔ̀kan eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ow ec’ob ap, ob ap a eke l’ɛdŋn l’ɛw in ec’agŋ es a. Tasi ɛm a, Es Ɛw Ɛs a ek’am kokr in eci juma a, in l’el Krist.
51003025	Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ yec’eke am kok low ŋuŋ a, b’ow ɛŋn yec’ek’el in ec’a, ɛsɛ elel eke li kokr low ŋuŋ ab af, aŋke Nyam eci low eke b’ow kok ab ɛm, li k’ow li jɛjm agŋ es.
51004001	Agŋ eke el madu eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a, kòkr ɔny e madu a e low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ke ŋkoprɛ k’ánm ɛm. Ke ɔ̀kan ek’ɔny yɛji ɔnyn Es ɛw ɛs nyam ek’anŋ afr.
51004002	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ànŋn Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, ke ɔny e Nyam e bia eke b’ɔŋn Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm a él ɛrm ɛw ɛm.
51004003	Nyam ŋɔŋn ab ɛm, ɛy yɛji ŋɔ̀ŋan ɛy eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam kók s’ɛŋn abusu s’ɔmun in ec’odad ab es, ke si dád Krist eci lís e low eke lɔl es a. Tasi ɛm a, low na eke lɔl es a sosiɛm anake m’anŋ sobel ɛm a.
51004004	Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke m’ɔ́tu m’otar odad a akr ayl, ok agŋ es sos ɛm, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it eke mi ki kok ab af.
51004005	Àan es nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛm agŋ ek’uwm Krist any a e lís, ke abusu fɛŋ eke b’ɛru ɔny es a k’írmnmn.
51004006	Ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔny ec’odad ebl él amamn, ke mok ánŋ ɛm, ke uwr any dádr ɛgŋ fɛŋ odad ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ab af.
51004007	Erur ɛm ec’ɛy lisijim Tisik, abu ɛlum ɛs nimamn ek’el ɛm lawl Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm, b’ow ɔŋ ɔny ɛm e lís ec’amani fɛŋ.
51004008	M’am ɛrm’n tasi eke li k’ow li dad ɔny ɛy e lís ec’amani, ke l’átr ɔny sos es yɛji.
51004009	Onesim ek’el ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, ke el erur ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim a anake am ɛwl’l a. -Li b’ow -l’ɔb ɔny ów a fɛŋ ek’am ɛy aŋa a ec’amani.
51004010	Aritak ek’anŋ sobel ɛm ɛm ab a, am ɛsŋn ɔny, ɛbɛn nɛny nyam Mark ek’anŋ ɛsɛ Barnabas e lisijim af a, in yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny. (Mark ec’a, ikŋn anym irir in e lís e low. Eke l’ow ɔny ogŋ yogŋ, èbr ir sɛnyn sɛnyn.)
51004011	Igŋ a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Jesu ke wɛl b’ok en es Justus a yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny. Jwifɛl ek’ɛgŋ Krist e low eb a, ɛl ɛm a, agŋ nyahan na cɛ anake am kok juma ɛm ab Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’a. Ɛtŋ -l’atr’m sos es nɔnɔ ligbɛl.
51004012	Epafras, ek’in yɛji el ɔny ɛm e nyam a, am ɛsŋn ɔny; Krist e libɔwi na sɛgŋ fɛŋ b’atr sos es ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔny eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur inymn es kikri, ánŋn ɛsɛ agŋ ek’agb ɔmn ɛm, ke bɛbm sos eke ki kok low fɛŋ eke Nyam b’erur ab af.
51004013	M’ɔtu eke mi k’ij in e nuŋ af e daŋku low na eci: li b’ij gbre nɔnɔ ɔny lele Laodise ec’agŋ lele Iyerapolis ec’agŋ a ec’ab.
51004014	Luk ek’el erur ɛm ec’ɛy lawl ke el sɛkp kok ɛs lele Demas ab am ɛsŋn ɔny.
51004015	Ɛ̀sŋnin ɛy lisijimɛl ek’anŋ Laodise a, lele ɛy lisijɔw Nɛnfa lele Nyam ec’agŋ eke b’as luku in ec’akŋ ab ab ɔŋn ɛy.
51004016	Sica lɛgŋ eke b’awal lɛl na ba ow b’uwr a, kókr elel eke ki kokr ke wɛl ɔ́tu awl Laodise eci Nyamel ab ɛm yɛji. Ke ɔny yɛji áwal yec’a eke b’ow anŋ ɛl ogŋ a ow a.
51004017	Ow ec’uwr ɛm a, dàdr Arkip kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma ek’abul il a sɛnyn sɛnyn.
51004018	Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm mi nɔn ɛsŋn na lɛl na ec’uwr ɛm. Sica k’ìjal es eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny af.
52001001	Pɔl, Silas lele Timote ab e lɛl ek’am awŋ Nyamel ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Tesaloni baŋn, k’el Nyam Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’agŋ. Ke ɔwrɔ lel ɛrm es ɛy ab ánŋ ɔny ab.
52001002	Si b’ɔŋ Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔny fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ si b’ɔkn ɔny sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛy e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm.
52001003	Nyam ɛy Ɛs ec’any af si b’ɔkn ɔny e nawrɛ ek’ubr e juma e kokr, ɔny ec’erur ek’ɔnyn e low e kokr, lel ɛrm ek’usurir ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn ab ab e low.
52001004	Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam erur ɔny, ɛtŋ s’uw any eke li sɔsum l’ot ɔny eel in eci.
52001005	Tasi ɛm a, Amani Mamn ec’odad eke si dad ɔny a, ow elm odad ebl nɛnym ɛm cɛ, kɔ Abŋ Lala ec’abusu lele in ec’abu ɛlum ɛm ab, ɛtŋ s’uw any tasi ek’ow el low nawrɛ. Ɛtŋ uwr any eke, ɛy ec’es an ɔny ec’araŋn a, ɔny e nimamn eci.
52001006	Ɔny obi yɛji wewrmn ɛy lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ów. Gbre ijr nɔnɔ ec’araŋn yɛji, ɛgŋn Nyam ec’odad a ebr, sos ɛm iŋn ek’Abŋ Lala ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm.
52001007	Ow ɔŋ ɔny eel Maseduan lele Akayi wus ab ec’agŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a e sɛwl mamn.
52001008	Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad a anŋ ɔny ogŋ Maseduan wus af a ɛtŋ ɔmun es im toŋ ok Akayi wus af. Ɛtŋ ow elm na cɛ, kɔ ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn Nyam ɛm a yɛji e low eb es susu a fɛŋ; ɛmɛny ow ɛbam eke si k’ɔb ow ec’amani ij.
52001009	Agŋ a fɛŋ am dad elel ek’ebr ɛy ɔny ogŋ a, ɛrm ɛm ek’itŋnin eel Nyam eci, sɛkp e nuŋ igŋ ek’igŋn ɛlul es, ke ɛgŋn Nyam ek’anŋ owr ke el Nyam nawrɛ a eci low kok a e low ebr a.
52001010	Ca am ekur in ec’Iy Jesu eke b’ow anŋ afr ow a. In eke Nyam igbm’n luw ɛm n’anŋ owr a, in anake l’eb l’ɛlu ɛy es Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ek’am ow a e lís a.
52002001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny obi yɛji uwr any ek’ɔny ogŋ a eke s’ow a ɔsu ey.
52002002	Uwr any yɛj’eke lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, wɛl ijr ɛy gbre, wɛwr ɛy Filip baŋn a. Gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam ec’ɛrm susu ek’ɔŋ ɛy ab ɛm, si dad ɔny in ec’Amani Mamn a ec’odad, gbre ij nɔnɔ ec’araŋn.
52002003	Tasi ɛm a, ɛy ec’ów ɔm a elm yadŋ ɛm, ow elm ów tutr eŋuŋ ɛm, ow elm kprakpr ɛm.
52002004	Kɔ ɛy, Nyam ɛkn eke s’ɔtu ɛtŋ l’abul ɛy in ec’Amani Mamn a e dad. Sica s’am dad Nyam ec’odad, ɛtŋ s’ɔlm agŋ ɛm ec’erur es, kɔ Nyam eke b’ɛkn ɛy e mɛrm ɛm a ec’erur s’am ɔl es.
52002005	Ɔny obi uwr any eke lɛgŋ kaka si dadm mɛju ec’odad; lɛgŋ kaka si kokm os ɛŋn e low. Nyam ij ow e daŋku.
52002006	S’ɔlm ek’ɛgŋ k’aw ɛy, ke ow el ɔny oglog ke ow el agŋ ɛjeci.
52002007	Ke s’ɔtu cɛ eke si k’ɔŋ ɔny low ebr, eke s’el Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl a sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ s’el agŋ frɔrɔ ɔny ec’araŋn ɛsɛ elel eke ey lis, frɔrɔ ɛm bi kok in ec’ey e lís e low ab af.
52002008	Ɔny ec’erur eke s’ɔny a sosiɛm, s’ɔɔm ɔny Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a sɔny cɛ, kɔ ɛy obi ɛy obi e sel a yɛji, aŋke ɔny iil an nɔnɔ ɛy eci.
52002009	Agŋ lisijimɛl, am ɔkan elel eke si kokr juma lɛc ɛm a: ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab abu anŋ ɛy juma kok ɛm, nɛnɛ anake si dad ɔny Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a ec’odad a, yec’ɛtŋ ke si k’ócm ɛy e lís e low s’abulm ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka.
52002010	Ɔny ek’ubr nawrɛ a, ɛy ec’es an ɔny ec’araŋn a ayl, el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm eci ek’abr ɛnym kaka anm ɛm. Ɔny obi yɛji ijr daŋku, ɛtŋ Nyam yɛji ij daŋku.
52002011	Ɛmɛny uwr any eke si kok ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam e lís low ɛsɛ elel ek’ey ɛs bi kok in ec’ey ab af.
52002012	S’ɔm ɔny ów, s’atr ɔny sos es, s’ibrm ɔny sakp nɔnɔ eke k’aan es ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af. In anake l’ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’okr in ec’es ɛw ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm a.
52002013	Na sosiɛm s’am ɔŋ Nyam bia sɛgŋ fɛŋ, eke ebmn odad eke si dad ɔny a ɛsɛ agŋ ɛm ec’odad af, kɔ ke ebr ɛsɛ Nyam ec’odad af a. Ɛɛ, nawrɛ Nyam ec’odad ab ana! Ɛtŋ li bi kok juma ɔny ɛm l’itŋn ɔny ek’ubr nawrɛ a.
52002014	Agŋ lisijimɛl, sica ɔny yɛji ɛkan ów a ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Jude e Sinyamel ɛm ke ub Jesu Krist nawrɛ a ɛkn ab af. Ɔny yɛji, ɔny e baŋn eyŋ ijr ɔny gbre ɛsɛ gbre ijr nyam a cɛ eke Jwifɛl ijr Sinyamel amua ec’agŋ ab af.
52002015	Jwifɛl amua anake ibi Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ab, ke ɛy yɛji ijr ɛy gbre a. -N’am kokmn Nyam ec’erur, ɛtŋ -l’el agŋ fɛŋ ec’efnu.
52002016	-N’am ɛdŋn ɛy eke si ki dad sel ɛŋn ec’odad s’ok agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl a bake -n’ɛŋn sel. Ow ɔŋ sikpl a eke god’ɛtŋ -li kokr a obn afŋn es. Na sosiɛm anake ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ɛŋn ɛl a.
52002017	Agŋ lisijimɛl, nawrɛ si kpab ɔny es lís sos megl ɛm ow ibn tɛl, kɔ ɛrm ɛm a s’anŋ ɔny ab. S’erur tasi ɛtŋ s’atr sos es eke ɛmɛny si k’ow s’ɛkn ɔny.
52002018	S’erur eke si k’ow ɛy fɛŋ s’ɛkn ɔny, ɛtŋ ɛm Pɔl, ɛm sɔny ɛm a, m’atr sos es sakp nɔnɔ eke mi k’ow, kɔ Satan ɔ́ɔm ɛy ow ec’abusu.
52002019	Ɔny kɔtɔkɔ eel ɛy e low ɔmn, ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn, ɛy ec’anygbɛl tufɛ, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’any af, in e mowrer e lɛgŋ a.
52002020	Ɛɛ! ɔny anake eel ɔny e low kok ɛm, ɛy ec’anygbeŋ lele ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn ab a.
52003001	-
52003002	Na sosiɛm, eke si k’ɔtum s’ekum ij a, si bɛbm eke si k’anŋ Atɛn ɛy sɔny, ɛtŋ s’ɛrm ɛy lisijim Timote eke bi kok Nyam juma ɛy ab, ke bi dad Krist ec’Amani Mamn ec’odad a. S’ɛrm’n eke li k’ow l’usur ɔny ɛrm ke l’átr ɔny sos es ɔny ec’ɔmn ab ɛm,
52003003	yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́ym wus gbre ijr na ek’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn ab ɛm, aŋke ɔny obi yɛji uwr any eke gbre ijr na, el low ek’ɔn ɛy es.
52003004	Ow a eke s’anŋ ɔny ogŋ a, s’ikŋ anym si dad ɔny eke wɛl b’ow ijr ɛy gbre. Ca ow anake ow ɛy a, ɔny uwr any.
52003005	Na sosiɛm, eke mi k’ɔtum m’ekum a, m’ɛrm Timote eke k’ow otar ɔny ec’ɔmn a e low akr ók’m, aŋke m’am ebr ɛrmij, ek’oglog ɛgŋ ɛju Ɛs a ɛju ɔny okr wus, ke juma eke si kok a el low ɔfr ɔfr ŋ̂.
52003006	Sica Timote anŋ ɔny ogŋ a ow ɛtŋ ɔb ɛy ɔny ec’ɔmn lel erur ab ec’amani, eke b’ɔkan ɛy e low sɛgŋ fɛŋ sɛnyn sɛnyn ɛtŋ am erurir eke k’ɛkan ɛy, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy yɛji s’am erur eke si k’ɛkn ɔny ab af.
52003007	Ow sosiɛm a, lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’ɔmn ec’amani e s’iri ɛy e sos es ɔw na ɛm lel ɛy e gbre ijr na ɛm ab a, ɛyr ɛy ɛrm es, atr ɛy sos es.
52003008	Sica sel ow ɛy ŋ̂, aŋke inymn es kikri Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ec’af okr ab ɛm.
52003009	Kɔ ayaf tasi si k’ɔŋn Nyam bia sos ɛm iŋn na eke s’ɔny, ɔny sosiɛm Nyam ec’any af ab ec’ee?
52003010	Ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab si b’at lebl es si ŋɔŋn Nyam eke li k’ɔŋ ɛy abusu bake ɛmɛny blel s’ɛ́kanin, ke si yíbr low yec’ek’anm ɔny ec’ɔmn ab ɛm a.
52003011	Ke blel ɛy Ɛs Nyam in obi lele ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ab kók ɛy ejagb bake s’ow s’ɛkn ɔny.
52003012	Ke blel Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔ́ŋ erur ek’ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm lel agŋ ec’ɛjeci e lís ab a, ágb bubu af ɛsɛ elel ek’ɔny ec’erur eke s’ɔny a agb ab af.
52003013	Ke blel l’úsur ɔny e mɛrm a, eel lala ke abr ɛnym kaka k’ánm ɔny ɛm Nyam ɛy Ɛs ec’any af, lɛgŋ ek’ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu b’ow ow lele in eci afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala a fɛŋ ab a.
52004001	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ow ek’ɛmɛny mi ki dad a el, ɛsɛ elel eke wewar ɛy e lís es an mamn ek’akpl Nyam sos ɛm, ke am kokr ɛbɛn a, s’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, s’ibrm ɔny atrm ɛm, ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm a, k’úcur ɔnyn es ɛbɛn iman anym eci akm na e kokr a.
52004002	Ɔny obi yɛji uwr low yec’eke si yɛgm ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin ɛm ab any.
52004003	Kin, ow eke Nyam am erur a: ke ɔny ec’es an a él lala in ec’any af; ke ɔ́sur sos nfaci ij e lís.
52004004	Ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam úw any ɔnyn sos es nfaci ij e lís, án es lala ɛm lele sos us ɛm ab,
52004005	ke kí yɛbm ów eŋuŋ ec’aw akam’n es ɛsɛ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl af.
52004006	Low na ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́ju lawl ki kok’r low ɔbr, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow jɛj agŋ e bi kok ów amua a eci low ok, ɛs’elel eke s’ikŋ anym si dad s’ayal s’ok ɔny ab af.
52004007	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam ɛsŋm ɛy eke si k’anŋ sikpl owi ɛm, kɔ ów lala kok ɛm.
52004008	Na sosiɛm ɛgŋ ek’ɛgŋm low yɛgm na ebm a, ow elm ɛgŋ eci low yɛgm li digŋm l’ɛlum es, kɔ Nyam ek’ɔŋ ɔny in ec’Abŋ Lala a eci low yɛgm li digŋ l’ɛlu es.
52004009	Sica yec’ek’el agŋ lisijimɛl ɔfr ec’erur e low a, ow ɛbam eke wɛl ki nɔn lɛl awŋ ɔny, aŋke ɔny obi ɛm wewar Nyam ogŋ elel eke k’erurir ɔny ɔfr a.
52004010	Ɛtŋ erur ikŋ na e low anake am kokr Maseduan wus nimum af ec’agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ e lís a. Gbɛkɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛmɛny s’am ibrm eke ki kokr ow akpl obn.
52004011	Àtar sos es ke ánŋn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ke k’ɛ́ymn ɛgŋ e low ɛm, ke kókr juma ɔny obi ec’abu ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke si dad ɔny ab af,
52004012	yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ ek’elm Krist e jam us ɛsɛl a, ɔ́ny ɔny ec’ɛlum. Ke ɔny ec’es abur a k’élm agŋ eci.
52004013	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, s’erur eke k’uwr Krist e jam us ɛsɛl ek’uw a e lís e low any, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ánmn sɔrŋ ɛm ɛs’agŋ likpr a ek’ɔnym ɔmn ec’ab af.
52004014	Eke s’ub nawrɛ eke Jesu uw ɛtŋ l’ɛwl n’anŋ owr a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam s’ub nawrɛ eke Nyam b’ow ɔŋ agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ ke uw a ɛ́wl ow in ab.
52004015	Sica kin yec’eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in e low yɛgm ɛm dad ɛy, ke s’am ɛlu ɔkm: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mowrer e lɛgŋ a, ɛy eke si b’ow s’anŋ owr a, si k’ow s’ikŋm agŋ ek’uw a ec’anym.
52004016	Lɛgŋ a, wɛl b’ow iri lebl nyam ikŋ ek’el Nyam ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs a e lebl lele Nyam e kɔkr e lebl ab ab, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow anŋ afr us es. Agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ ke uw a b’ow igb anŋ owr krɛkrɛ.
52004017	Ke sica, ow e jam a, ɛy eke lɛgŋ a si b’ow s’anŋ owr a, Nyam ɔ́ŋ ɛy s’igb ɛl ab jru ɛm s’ím s’ɔbr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ afr. Nɛnɛ anake si b’ow s’anŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
52004018	Ow sosiɛm, àtarir sos es ɔny ɔfr sodad amua ɛm.
52005001	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, yec’ek’el sɛgŋ lele wanci ab ec’a, ow ibram eke wɛl ki nɔn lɛl awŋ ɔny,
52005002	aŋke ɔny obi yɛji uwr any tasi eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e mowrer e lɛgŋ a b’ow okr ɛy es ɛsɛ elel eke ulu b’ow ncok ɛm ab af.
52005003	Lɛgŋ ab ɛm ek’agŋ b’ow dad ɛsɛ: "Low kaka anm, fɛŋ el ɛrm es ɛy a!" yogŋ anake lɛgŋ a b’ow okr ɛl es kpru ɛm ŋuŋn ɛl a. Ow b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ iy ɔnyn eke b’okr lok ab lis es ab af; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɛcm saw.
52005004	Kɔ agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny ec’a anmn ncebn ɛm eke lɛgŋ na k’okr ɔny es ɛsɛ ulu ec’ab af,
52005005	aŋke ɔny fɛŋ eel lɛgŋ owr lele usu ayl ab ec’ey. Ɛy s’elm lɛgŋ uk lele ncebn ab ec’ey.
52005006	Na sosiɛm ow itm eke si k’ɛru mɛmn ɛs’agŋ amua na ec’ab af, kɔ s’ánŋ any owr, ke low fɛŋ ɛm any ók ɛy es.
52005007	Mɛmn ɛru ɛsɛl a, lɛgŋ uk ɛm -li b’ɛru mɛmn; ɛtŋ mar ɛgŋ ɛsɛl a, lɛgŋ uk ɛm b’ɛgŋ mar am ɔny.
52005008	Kɔ ɛy eke s’el usu ayl ec’a, ow akpl eke si k’ók any es, ke s’óc ɛy ec’ɔmn lel erur ab ɛsɛ ar mob eke s’ok sos af, ke ɛy e sel ɛŋn ec’eku ánŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo tufɛ eke s’us af,
52005009	aŋke Nyam ɔɔm ɛy eke si k’im s’ɛy in ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm, kɔ ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɔ́ŋ ɛy sel ɛŋn.
52005010	In l’uw ɛy sosiɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɔŋ ɛy s’anŋ owr in ab, eke s’anŋ owr ɛtŋ s’uw yɛji.
52005011	Na sosiɛm, ɔ̀manin ów ke átarir sos es ɔmn ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke am kokr god’ɛtŋ ab af.
52005012	Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am dad ɔny eke k’ɔ́nyn agŋ ek’am kok juma ɔny ec’araŋn, yɛgm ɔny low, ke nyimn ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a ec’ɛlum.
52005013	Ɔ̀nyn ɛl e sos usr nɔnɔ lele erur ab, juma eke -n’am kok a sosiɛm. Ànŋn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm ɔny ɔfr.
52005014	Agŋ lisijimɛl, s’am ŋɔŋn ɔny, ɛ̀nymn ɔkpɔrŋu abr; àtar agŋ eke sos ɔw es a sos es, ɛ̀lumn abŋ ɛm ec’ɔgbɔru a abu, ke ɔ́nyn low eku ɛgŋ fɛŋ e lís.
52005015	Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ócm low ŋuŋ ɔbarm low ŋuŋ any. Kɔ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ̀ɔl low nimamn e kok es ɔny ɔfr ɛm lel agŋ fɛŋ eci lís ab.
52005016	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm.
52005017	Sakp sakp fɛŋ k’ɔ̀pir Nyam ŋɔŋn.
52005018	Ɔ̀ŋn Nyam bia low low fɛŋ ɛm. Na el low eke Nyam am ibrm eke ki kokr, ɔny ek’okar af Jesu Krist ab a.
52005019	K’ìrmnin Abŋ Lala ec’al ek’anŋ ɔny ɛm ab es.
52005020	K’ìfan odad eke Nyam b’ɔŋ ɔny ec’araŋn e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad ɔny a,
52005021	kɔ ìgbal low fɛŋ ogŋ ɛkan, ke úcur yec’ek’akpl a ɔnyn es.
52005022	Ke ɔ́nyan sos es low ŋuŋ fɛŋ e kok ɛm.
52005023	Ke Nyam ek’el ɛrm es ɛy e nuŋ a in obi áyal ɔny nimum; ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny ec’ɛgŋ el a nimum ek’el abŋ, liy, lele sos megl ab a él lala, ek’abr ɛnym kaka anm ɛm toŋ bake ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e mowrer e lɛgŋ a ów.
52005024	In eke n’am ɛsŋ ɔny a, li b’ow li kok ów amua fɛŋ iy nɛny, aŋke l’el cɛcɛ.
52005025	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛy yɛji ŋɔ́ŋan ɔŋn ɛy.
52005026	Bìbrmnin ɔny ɔfr ɛs’agŋ lisijimɛl af Krist ɛm.
52005027	M’am ŋɔŋn ɔny m’ok ɔny mɛrm sabu af, ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a, k’áwal lɛl na ókr agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ.
52005028	Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab!
53001001	Pɔl, Silas lele Timote ab e lɛl ek’am awŋ Nyamel ec’agŋ ek’anŋ Tesaloni baŋn, ke el Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’agŋ:
53001002	Ke Nyam Ɛs lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ, ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
53001003	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow akpl eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ, si k’ɛlu Nyam bia ɔny sosiɛm. Ow it eke si ki kok ɛbɛn, aŋke ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn a am bobn ɛtŋ ɔny ec’erur eke ɔnyn ɔny ɔfr ɛm a, am agb imn anym eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
53001004	Na sosiɛm, si bi dad ɔny e lís e low, s’aw ɔny Sinyamel ec’agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’as luku igŋ Nyam nuŋ a ec’any af, aŋke ɔny b’inymn es kikri ɔmn ɛm, gbre ijr lele sos es ɔw fɛŋ eke b’ɔbar ab ab ɛm.
53001005	Gbre ijr amua am yɛgm eke Nyam e jɛj ok a el nyim nyim. Tasi ɛm a, gbre ijr amua sosiɛm anake b’ow eel Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ek’am ijr ow e gbre a ec’agŋ tasi a.
53001006	Nyam el nɛnyɛmbri nyam Ɛs: ow sosiɛm agŋ ek’am ijr ɔny gbre a, ɛl yɛji li b’ow l’ijr wɛl gbre.
53001007	Ɛtŋ ɔny ek’am ijr gbre a, li b’ow l’ɛyr ɔny ɛrm es, ɔny lele ɛy ab, lɛgŋ eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu b’ow anŋ afr ow in lele ɛrm ɛsɛl abusu ɛsɛl ab ab a.
53001008	Lɛgŋ a, li b’ow n’anŋ al ek’am iri ec’araŋn l’ɛy ɔkm, yec’ɛtŋ ke li kók agŋ eke uwm Nyam any, ke ɛ́luam ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’Amani Mamn a low ŋuŋ.
53001009	-Li b’ow -n’ɛŋn gbre eke k’ow ɔnym uwr, ɛtŋ gbre ij akpasu na, b’ow ɔny kpab ɛl es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lís lele in ec’anygbɛl e lɛc ab ab e lís.
53001010	Low a b’ow ɛy lɛgŋ a ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ow a. Li b’ow l’ow yec’ɛtŋ k’agŋ a ek’el in eci ke ub’r nawrɛ a, úsr’r sos, kɔ́klm’n. Ɔny yɛji b’ow anŋn ɛl ɛm, aŋke ubr amani a eke s’ɔŋ ɔny a nawrɛ.
53001011	Na sosiɛm, sɛgŋ fɛŋ s’am ŋɔŋn Nyam s’ɔŋ ɔny yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e Nyam a ɛ́kn ɔny ɛsɛ agŋ eke it af, in ec’ɛsŋ a eke l’ɛsŋ ɔny ab ɛm. Ke in ec’abusu ab ɛm, l’ɛ́lum ɔny abu kokr low nimamn fɛŋ ek’am erurir a, ke n’ɔ́ŋ ɔny ec’ɔmn a ɛw gbagba!
53001012	Na ɛm a wɛl b’ow dad ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu e nin mamn, ɛtŋ ɔny yɛji -li b’ow -l’aw ɔny. Ow b’ow el ɛy e Nyam lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ec’ɔwrɔ ek’ɛŋan.
53002001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, yec’ek’el ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e mowrer eke b’ow ɔny as ɛy luku in ab a ec’a, s’am ŋɔŋn ɔny,
53002002	kì yɛbr agŋ k’irmn ɔny nuŋ ɛm fafa, erŋn k’ɔ́ny ɔny. Eke batŋ ɛgŋ dad ɔny ow e low ɛsɛ odad eke Nyam ɔŋ kokoba ɔb ɛs nyam dad af, oglog ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ɛjeci ec’odad af, oglog ɛsɛ lɛl eke s’awŋ ɔny ec’odad af yɛji, k’ùbr nawrɛ.
53002003	Kì yɛbr ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛju ɔny akunda kaka fɛŋ ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, agŋ b’ow igŋ Nyam ec’any uw a ɛlu es gbuŋ ke lɛgŋ a ów. Lɛgŋ ab ɛm anake Low ŋuŋ ɛs a, in a ek’it eke k’irm a b’ow ɛy ɔkm a.
53002004	Low ŋuŋ ɛs na b’ow ɛdŋn ob fɛŋ ek’el Nyam eci ke agŋ b’igŋ nuŋ a. Li b’ow l’igb ów amua fɛŋ e nuŋ af, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’im toŋ l’ɛy Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm li sig es, ke l’ócr in sosi ɛsɛ Nyam af.
53002005	Kɔ k’ɔknmn eke mi dad ɔny ów amua, ow a eke m’anŋ ɔny ab a ee?
53002006	Gbɛkɔ, uwr any eke low nyam anŋ eke caca ɛm a, am ɛdŋn Low ŋuŋ ɛs na eke k’ɛy ɔkm, toŋ bake lɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm a ów.
53002007	Low ŋuŋ ɛs a ec’abusu a ɔb nuŋ es lɔl ɛm am kok juma, ɛtŋ ek’ɛgŋ a ek’ucu ɔny’n es a k’ow anm ij a, li k’ow li kokm juma es lɔl ɛm ij.
53002008	Sica Low ŋuŋ ɛs a b’ow ɛy ɔkm, ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ŋúŋn’n trɛ trɛ trɛ, in e nɛnym e sel fuf ɛm, ke li kíkn ow es in e mowrer ec’usuayl eci jɛjn ab ɛm.
53002009	Low ŋuŋ ɛs a b’ow ow Satan e lɛc ab ab ɛtŋ li b’ow li kok mɛny ɛwr owi lele sakrowa yadŋ ɛm ab;
53002010	li b’ow l’oc low ŋuŋ fɛŋ l’ɛlu ɔkm l’ɛjur agŋ ek’am irm a, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ok wus. -Li b’ow -l’ok wus aŋke -l’ɛgŋm -l’ebm ɛtŋ -l’erurm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke blel sɔg ɛl a.
53002011	Na sosiɛm anake Nyam b’ow awŋ ɛl abusu ek’el irm ec’a yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ub yec’ek’el yadŋ a nawrɛ.
53002012	Na sosiɛm, agŋ a fɛŋ eke k’ow ubm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam nawrɛ, ke b’ow erur anŋ low ŋuŋ kok ɛm a, Nyam b’ow ɔb ɛl low luw eci.
53002013	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ erur ɔny a, ow it eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ si k’ɛlu Nyam bia ɔny eci, aŋke li sɔsum l’ot ɔny nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ eke li ki sɔg ɔny Abŋ Lala eke b’ɔŋ ɔny éel Nyam eci lele ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn low nawrɛ ɛm a ec’ab.
53002014	Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny in ec’Amani Mamn ec’odad eke si dad ɔny ab ɛm. L’ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’ɛŋan yec’a eke k’ɛbm ɔny ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’anygbɛl ab ɛm a.
53002015	Na sosiɛm, agŋ lisijimɛl, ìnymn es kikri ke úcur low yɛgm a eke s’ɔŋ ɔny odad ebl ɛm oglog lɛl ɛm ec’eke s’awŋ ɔny ab a ɔnyn es.
53002016	Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist in obi, lele Nyam ɛy Ɛs ab, ek’ɔny ɛy ec’erur ke ɔŋ ɛy bibm ɛm, sos es atr ek’ɔnym uwr lele low ɔmn tasi ab a,
53002017	yíbr ɔny ec’ɛrm a lokm susu, ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny lɛc kokr ów amamn ów kok ɛm lele odad ebl ɛm ab.
53003001	Sica lisijimɛl, ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam ɔŋn ɛy, yec’ɛtŋ ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad ebl a ɔ́mun es fafa, ke wɛl úsr’r sos ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɛcr ɔny ogŋ ab af.
53003002	Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam yec’ɛtŋ ke l’éb l’ɛlu ɛy es agŋ eŋuŋ lele lokm ŋuŋ ɛsɛl ab ec’abu ɛm, aŋke ow elm agŋ a fɛŋ ɛgŋm ubm nawrɛ.
53003003	Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ el cɛcɛ, li b’ow l’usur ɔny ɛrm, ke l’ɔ́su ɔny agn e lís.
53003004	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔŋ ɛy s’ɔny ɔmn ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ s’uw any tasi ek’am kokr ów a eke si dad ɔny a ɛtŋ ucur ɔnyn es am kokr.
53003005	Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ nyímn ɔny ec’ɛrm a Nyam ec’erur a lele Krist eci low eku ab ab e lís.
53003006	Agŋ lisijimɛl, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm s’am ibrm eke ki kpabr es agŋ lisijimɛl a fɛŋ ek’am ir ɛb kpɔrŋ ɛm, ke ɛ́gŋm low yɛgm a eke s’ɔŋ ɛl a ebm a e lís.
53003007	Ɔny obi yɛji uwr elel eke ki kokr ke ébr ɛy e lakr ab any, aŋke lɛgŋ eke s’anŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a, s’elm ɔ́rŋu.
53003008	Si yɛbm agŋ ɔɔm ɛy ob s’ijm ɔfr ɛm; kɔ ɛy obi s’ij gbre, s’ok law, si kok juma lɛc ɛm, ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e gbagbl e low k’élm ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eci.
53003009	Si kok ɛbɛn, ow elm ke si k’ɔ́nym abusu eke si k’ibrm ɔny ec’abu ɛlum a eci, kɔ sɛwl mum eke si yɛgm ɔny eke k’ebr.
53003010	Ɛtŋ ow a eke s’anŋ ɔny ab a, si dad ɔny: ek’ɛgŋ erurm eke ki kok juma a, ow itm eke li k’ij ob.
53003011	Sica s’am dad ɔny low na, aŋke s’am iri ek’ɔny ɛm a, ɔ́rŋu anŋ ek’erurm eke ki kok low kaka, eke ow elm agŋ e low cɛ eke -li k’igb -l’ok ɛm.
53003012	Agŋ amua na, s’am dad ɛtŋ s’am ɔm ɛl ów ek’Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e nin ɛm, -li ki kok juma sɛgŋ fɛŋ ke -li gbagbal ɛl sosi.
53003013	Agŋ lisijimɛl ɔny ec’a, low mamn e kok k’am ɔny sos.
53003014	Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam ɛluam odad na ek’anŋ lɛl na eke s’ɔŋ ɔny ab ɛm, ke ɛ̀bmnin in nyamn, ke k’ɛ́wmn mɛcrer in ab ij, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛ́s ɔ́ny’n.
53003015	Gbɛkɔ k’òcr ir ɛsɛ ifnu af, kɔ ɔ̀mn in ów ɛsɛ ɛgŋ lisijim af.
53003016	Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’el ɛrm es ɛy e nuŋ a, in obi ɔ́ŋ ɔny in ec’ɛrm es ɛy a sɛgŋ fɛŋ, low low fɛŋ ɛm. Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab!
53003017	Ɛm Pɔl, ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm mi nɔn ɛsŋn na lɛl na ec’uwr ɛm. Ɛbɛn eke mi b’ɛwr ɛm e silɛl fɛŋ eke mi bi nɔn a mɛny ana.
53003018	Ke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
54001001	Ɛm Pɔl, Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs, Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy ec’ɔmn ob ab ec’abusu ɛm, m’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl na.
54001002	Ŋ Timote eke anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm ec’iy lokm tasi af ɔmn ɛm, ke Nyam Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy e Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɛ́dŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ, ɔ́ny ŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ ke ɔ́ŋ’ŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
54001003	Eke m’aam Maseduan a, m’ijl’ŋ nɛny eke k’anŋ Efɛs, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’am yɛgm agŋ ów yadŋ a, ɛ́dŋn ɛl ke -li ki kokmn ij.
54001004	Dàd ɛl -li wal ów a ek’agŋ ɛl obi ɔkn dad lel ɛl lagŋɛl e mew ec’es ɔsŋm owi e low a -l’ɛlu es, ow es atar cɛ ow b’is, ow ɛluam Nyam ec’es eb ɛlu e low a eke bɛbm ɛw es, ke wɛl uw any ɔmn ɛm a abu.
54001005	Low na eke b’ow dad a, b’ow ɔŋ ɛl ec’erur a agb: erur eke b’anŋ ɛrm lala ɛm ow, tutr mamn ɛm lel ɔmn tasi ɛm ab a.
54001006	Agŋ bɛb igŋ ejagb na ɛlu es ɛtŋ irm sodad ek’ɔnym any e dad ɛm.
54001007	-Li b’ocr ɛl sosi ɛsɛ Nyam ec’ol a ec’any uw ɛsɛl tasi af, gbɛkɔ -l’irimn ɛl obi e sodad eke -n’am dad a, ɛtŋ ów a ek’ow sosiɛm -li b’atar ów es a yɛji -l’irimn.
54001008	S’uw any eke Nyam ec’ol a el ob mamn, eke wɛl uw any kok ow e low ek’it a.
54001009	Wɛl ɔ́kn eke wɛl ɛwm ol agŋ eke bi kok ów amamn a eci; kɔ ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl lel agŋ ek’ɛ́luam ol ab ab sosiɛm wɛl b’ɛw ol, ɛsɛ: molokm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl, sikpl ɛsɛl, agŋ ek’ɛ́luam Nyam lel ob ek’el lala ab ab, agŋ eke b’ibi ɛl ɛsɛl oglog ɛl lisɛl lel agŋ ibiu fɛŋ ab.
54001010	Ɛmɛny wɛl b’ɛw ol agŋ eke b’ij nfaci a eci, egŋ eke b’ɛrum ɛl lawlɛl egŋ ab, agŋ eke b’ɔl madu ij, ayadŋu, agŋ eke b’ij daŋku yadŋ ɛm lel agŋ fɛŋ eke bi kok ów ek’elm low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ab eci.
54001011	Low yɛgm ikŋ na anŋ Amani Mamn a eke b’ɔŋ ɛy s’uw Nyam ec’anygbɛl ab any ab ɛm. Ɛɛ, Nyam eke el ehe fɛŋ eci nuŋ a anake abul’m Amani Mamn na a.
54001012	M’am ɛlu Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke ɔŋ’m lɛc, ɛm e juma kok ec’a bia. M’am ɛlu’l bia eke n’ɔny ɔmn ɛm ɛm, ke l’ɛsŋ’m in e juma ab ɛm,
54001013	eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, mi dad in e lís ec’ów eŋuŋ, m’ijr’r gbre ɛtŋ mi wɛwr’r yɛji. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɔny ɛm e sɔrŋ ikŋ, aŋke m’ɔnym ɔmn in ɛm ɛtŋ m’uwm low eke m’am kok ab any.
54001014	Ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛdŋ’m ɔwrɔ nɔnɔ, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ’m ɔmn lel erur eke b’anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow ab ab.
54001015	Kin odad nawrɛ tasi ek’it ek’agŋ a fɛŋ k’eb: Jesu Krist ow wus na af sikpl ɛsɛl fɛŋ e sɔg eci. M’el ɛl ɛm e ligbɛl tasi,
54001016	gbɛkɔ ow sosiɛm anake Nyam ɔny ɛm e sɔrŋ ikŋ a: l’erur eke Jesu Krist k’ɛcr ɛm eke m’el sikpl ɛsɛl ab ɛm e ligbɛl tasi a yɛgm in e low eku eke n’ɔny, ke ow él sɛwl agŋ a eke lɛgŋ anym ɛm b’ow ub’r nawrɛ, ke b’ow ɛŋn sel ek’ɔnym nuŋ a eci.
54001017	Sos usr lele anygbɛl ab él Ɛb ebu a ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɔnym uw, wɛl ɛ́knm ke el Nyam nyam coco a eci! Amɛn.
54001018	Ɛm jim Timote m’am abul’ŋ low yɛgm na, ɛsɛ elel eke ŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ikŋ anym dad ɛw es ŋ e lís ab af. Ke sodad amua átr’ŋ sos es ɔŋ ogŋ mum mamn a,
54001019	ŋ ec’ɔmn a lele ŋ e tutr mamn ab ab ɛm. Agŋ nyam nyam ɛgŋm ɔsum ɛl e tutr mamn a, ow ɔŋ -l’irmn ɛl ec’ɔmn a.
54001020	Agŋ ab ɛm Imene lele Alesandr ab yɛji anŋ; m’ot m’ok ɛl Satan abu ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ ɛjeci -li k’ɔbrmn Nyam any.
54002001	Low krɛkrɛ eke m’am dad eke wɛl ki kok agŋ fɛŋ ec’a el: ke wɛl ŋɔ́ŋn Nyam íbrm’n low, kók sɔrŋ ke ɛ́lu’l bia.
54002002	Ow it eke wɛl ki ŋɔŋn Nyam ɔŋ ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ lel agŋ fɛŋ ek’ɔnym es ɛw ab a, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́tu s’ir ɛb ek’ɛrm mij anm ɛm, ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, sos us ɛm, Nyam ec’es ucu ɔny tasi ɛm.
54002003	Na anake akpl ke el sɔbɔ Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs,
54002004	eke b’erur ek’agŋ fɛŋ k’ɛŋn sel, ke ɔ́tu uw low nɛnyɛmbri nyam any a.
