54002005	Tasi ɛm a Nyam nyam cɛ anŋ, ɛtŋ in lel agŋ ab ec’araŋn a yɛji ɛgŋ nyam cɛ anŋ, ɛgŋ a in l’el Jesu Krist
54002006	ek’ocr in sosi ɛw awoba agŋ a fɛŋ e sɔg eci. Ek’ow e lɛgŋ a ow a, l’ɛlu ɔkm li yɛgm eke Nyam erur ek’agŋ fɛŋ k’ɛŋn sel.
54002007	Na sosiɛm anake Nyam ɛw’m lebl ɛlu ɛs lel ɛrm ɛs ab, ke mi yɛ́gm agŋ ek’elm Jwifɛl yec’eke el ɔmn lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab a. M’ɔnym yadŋ, low nɛnyɛmbri nyam m’am dad.
54002008	M’erur ek’usu fɛŋ, egŋ ki gbigbl sabu ogŋ afr ŋɔŋn Nyam, gbɛkɔ Nyam ŋɔŋn a él ɛrm lala ɛm, ɛrm ek’ɛrm bebl lel ów es atar ab anm ɛm.
54002009	M’erur yɛj’eke ɔyɔw ki s’us mob ek’it, mob frafra cɛ, ke ow k’elm low agbr ɛm; ke -li ki kokmn sin ek’agŋ k’ɛkn ɛl, -li k’okmn sika ɛm miyob, miyob ac lele mob sus ɛm eke b’il an nɔnɔ ab,
54002010	kɔ ke ɛl e sakpl a él ów amamn e kok, ɛsɛ elel ek’ow it ek’ɔyɔw eke bi dad ɛsɛ ɛl b’ɛlum Nyam a, ki kok ab af.
54002011	Ow it ek’ɔyɔw k’ok es tiŋ iri low yɛgm a, ɛlum ligbɛl ɛm.
54002012	M’ɛlum abusu es eke yɔw ki yɛgm igŋ low oglog ɛw igŋ es; ow it eke li ki yewal tiŋ.
54002013	Tasi ɛm a, Adam anake Nyam ikŋ anym kok a, ɛtŋ ow e jam a li kok Ɛv.
54002014	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ow elm Adam yɛbm wɛl ɛjum’n, kɔ yɔw yɛb wɛl ɛju’r ɛtŋ ɛluam Nyam ec’odad ebl a.
54002015	Ɛbɛn yɛji, Nyam b’ow sɔg’r in ec’ey eke li b’ow l’ew ab ɛm, gbɛkɔ ow it eke li k’ɔny ɔmn, erur, ke l’ír ɛb eke elm low agbr ɛm ke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm.
54003001	Kin odad nawrɛ tasi: eke ɛgŋ nyam erur eke k’el Nyamel ec’idr ɛs, ke juma sɛnyn l’erur a.
54003002	Ow akpl eke Nyamel ec’idr ɛs k’el ɛgŋ ek’abr ɛnym anm lís; yɔw nyam ec’igŋ, ɛgŋ eke b’ok sos es low ɛm, ke b’ɔny any es ok. Ke n’ɔ́ny es an mamn, l’él ɛgŋ eke b’eb etu, ke ɔtu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low.
54003003	Li k’élm mar ɛgŋu, li k’ɔ́nym gaŋgaŋ, kɔ l’él frɔrɔ lel ɛrm es ɛyr ɛs ab. Li k’élm ɛgŋ e b’erur os owi,
54003004	kɔ l’él ɛgŋ ek’ɔtu eke ki nyimn in obi ec’akŋ a, ɛgŋ ek’in ec’ey a b’ɔny in ec’ɛlum.
54003005	Tasi ɛm a, ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɔ́tum nyimnm in obi ec’akŋ a, ayaf l’ɔtu eke li ki nyimn Nyamel ee?
54003006	Li k’él ɛgŋ ek’itŋn ɛrm ɛm owr owr; ek’ow el ɛgŋ ɛbɛn, li b’ow l’eb sos ɛw abu ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔny es abur ɛsɛ agn ec’ab af.
54003007	Ow it yɛji ek’agŋ ek’ubm Krist nawrɛ a k’ɛlum’n, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’ɔ́nym cak, ke li k’ɛ́ym agn e simeb e b’uk ab ɛm.
54003008	Diakrɛl yɛji it ek’el agŋ eke k’us sos, ke ɔ́ny nɛnyɛmbri nyam yɛji; ow itm eke -li k’ɛgŋ mar nɔnɔ, -l’ɔl yadŋ ɛm eci os ɔny es;
54003009	ke -l’ucu low nawrɛ ek’ɛy ɔkm Krist ec’ɔmn e -n’ɔnyn ab ɛm a -n’ɔny es tutr lala ɛm.
54003010	Ow it ke wɛl íkŋ anym ɛbm ɛl ɛkn; ek’ow e jam a wɛl ɛknm low ɔbr ɛl e lís a, ke sica -li kok juma ɛsɛ diakrɛl af gɔŋ.
54003011	Ɔyɔw eke el diakrɛl a yɛji it eke k’el agŋ eke k’us sos. Ow itm eke -li ki dad ɛl lawlɛl e lís ec’odad eŋuŋ; ow it ke -n’ɔny any es ok, ke -li kok cɛcɛ low low fɛŋ ɛm.
54003012	Ow it eke diakr k’el yɔw nyam ec’igŋ, ke n’ɔ́ny abusu eke li ki nyimn in ec’ey a, lel in ec’akŋ a nimum ab mɛwl ɛm.
54003013	Diakrɛl eke bi kok ɛl e juma mɛwl ɛm a, agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow usr ɛl sos ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’ɔny lokm susu ligbɛl ɔmn a ek’ɔny okr ɛy af Krist ab ab ɛm.
54003014	M’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl na, kɔ m’am tutr eke mi k’ow m’ɛkn’ŋ lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm.
54003015	Gbɛkɔ eke mi k’owm, b’ow ɛkn elel eke k’aan es Nyam e bosu ab ɛm lɛl na e m’am awŋ’ŋ ab ɛm. Nyam e bosu a el Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’agŋ a, ek’ucu low nawrɛ ɔny es a.
54003016	Tasi, low a e lɔl es ke ɛy ɔkm ɛy ec’ɔmn ab ɛm a agb nɔnɔ! Low a el: Krist ɛy ɔkm ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af, Abŋ Lala ɛlu’l ɔkm ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛkn’n. Wɛl ɔb in ec’amani ok sɛbr ɛjeci ec’agŋ a, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ ub’r nawrɛ wus af aŋa, ɛtŋ n’im afr anygbɛl ɛm.
54004001	Abŋ Lala dad ɛrum mar ninɛ: sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, agŋ bɛb b’ow igŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɛlu es, ke ús sow tutr yadŋ lele low yɛgm eke b’anŋ abŋ eŋuŋ ɛm ow a jam.
54004002	Agŋ ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl lel ayadŋu ab b’ow irmn ɛl. Agŋ amua, el agŋ eke Nyam owi am dadm low kaka, ke ɛl e sow tutr a anŋ ɛsɛ ob eke wɛl oc lowi gbagba ɛwr mɛny af.
54004003	Agŋ amua ɛl eci low yɛgm ab ɛm b’ow dad ek’ow itm ek’agŋ k’ɛbirir, -li b’ow -l’ɛdŋn mob bɛb eke wɛl b’ij a. Kɔ Nyam kok ob ij amua yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ, ke uw low nawrɛ any a, ɔ́ŋ’n bia ke íj.
54004004	Ob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a akpl; kaka anm ɛm eke wɛl k’igŋ ɛlu es, gbɛkɔ b’eb a k’ɔ́pim eke k’ɛlu Nyam bia,
54004005	aŋke Nyam odad lele Nyam ŋɔŋn ab b’ɔŋ ob fɛŋ el nimamn Nyam ec’any af.
54004006	Eke b’oc low yɛgm na ɛlu ɔkm agŋ lisijimɛl ɛm, b’ow el Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs mamn, ɛtŋ b’ow yɛgm ek’ɔmn e sodad ebl a lele low yɛgm tasi a ek’ɛŋn Abŋ ɛm a, b’iyr’ŋ lok.
54004007	Gbɛkɔ ìgŋ sawl odad eke low kaka anm ɛm ke ókrm af ɔmn ab a ɛ̀lu es, ke ɔ́tur sos akŋm Nyam ab ŋ ec’ɛb ir ɛm.
54004008	Sos ɔtur sos megl af ec’a el low akplu, kɔ low tɛl ɛm cɛ. Kɔ Nyam ec’akŋm ab a el low ek’akpl low fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke ow b’ɔŋ ɛy s’ir ɛb Nyam ab yɛfɛnyna ɛm ɛtŋ ow b’ɛwar ɛy lɛgŋ anym ɛm ec’ɛb ir a.
54004009	Na el odad ebl tasi ek’it eke agŋ fɛŋ k’ɛgŋ eb.
54004010	Tasi ɛm a, s’am ij gbre si kok juma ɛtŋ s’am atr sos es, aŋke s’oc ɛy e low ɔmn s’ɛlu Nyam ek’anŋ owr ke el agŋ fɛŋ e Sɔg Ɛs ab ɛm, ab brobro agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a.
54004011	Kin ów eke kí dad ke yɛ́gm agŋ.
54004012	Kì yɛb ɛgŋ kaka k’iir’ŋ es aŋke el ŋgbafrɛli sosiɛm; kɔ èl agŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a e sɛwl: ŋ e sodad ebl ɛm, es an ɛm, erur ɛm, ɔmn ɛm lele ŋ e lala el tasi ɛm ab.
54004013	Gbuŋ ke m’ów a, àt any awl Nyam e Silɛl a dedeku ec’any af, ɔ̀m ɛl ów ke yɛ́gm ɛl low.
54004014	K’ìjl Nyam ec’ob ap a ek’ɔny anŋ’ŋ ɛm ab es, yec’a ek’ɛŋn lɛgŋ a eke ŋ e Nyamel ab ɛm e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl dad ow e low, ke agŋ ekpekp a at’ŋ abu nuŋ a.
54004015	Àt any kok ów amua fɛŋ, òcr ŋ sosi nimum ɛlu juma eke wɛl abul’ŋ ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a fɛŋ ɛ́kn ŋ ec’anym imn a.
54004016	Ɔ̀sur ŋ sosi lele ŋ e low yɛgm ab ab. Ìnym es kikri ow af. Tasi ɛm a, eke bi kok ɛbɛn, b’ow ebr ŋ sosi ɛlu es ɛtŋ b’ow eb agŋ a eke b’iri ŋ e sodad a yɛji.
54005001	Eke anŋ ɛgŋ likpekp ab, kì dad’r odad lɛc ɛm, kɔ ɔ̀m’n ów lebl es ok ɛm ɛsɛ asŋ cɛ ow’n el af. Òc ŋgbafrɛ oto ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl af,
54005002	ɔyɔw ekpekp ɛsɛ esŋɛl af, ededyɔw oto ɛsɛ esŋ jɔwɛl af ɛrm lala tasi ɛm.
54005003	Ɛ̀w eŋnyɔw ek’ɔnym agŋ a e low any.
54005004	Gbɛkɔ eke iŋnyɔw nyam ɔny ey oglog alaw ek’ɔtu eke ki kok in e lís e low a, ke -li wewr -l’ɛlu ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɔkm ɛl obi ec’akŋ a e lís, ke ow ɔ́ŋ -l’ɔwr ɛl ec’agŋ a ec’ów eke kok ɔŋ ɛl a, aŋke ow el low eke Nyam erur.
54005005	Iŋnyɔw ek’ɔnym ɛgŋ kaka eke ki kok in e lís e low a, oc in ec’ɔmn a ɛw Nyam af, ɛtŋ li bi ŋɔŋn Nyam ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab l’ibrm ow abu ɛlum.
54005006	Gbɛkɔ iŋnyɔw eke b’us in ec’ów aw owi jam a, abŋ ɛm a l’uw ŋ̂, eke n’anŋ owr sos megl ɛm bɔbɔ yɛji.
54005007	Low na anake it eke k’ɔkn ɛl a, yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl k’ɛ́ŋnm abr ɛnym owi ɛl e lís.
54005008	Eke ɛgŋ nyam ɛ́wm in ec’agŋ e lís e low any, ab brobro in obi ec’akŋ ec’agŋ a, l’ɛgbr in ec’ɔmn a ɛtŋ n’uŋ l’akm ɛgŋ ek’ubm Krist nawrɛ a.
54005009	Gbuŋ ke nɔ́n iŋnyɔw nyam e nin eŋnyɔw e lɛl ab ɛm a, ow it eke li k’ɔny akpo ekŋ nyahan. Ke l’él yɔw ek’ɔny igŋ akp nyam cɛ,
54005010	ke wɛl úw’r any in ec’ów amamn kok ɛm, ke l’él yɔw eke gbagbl in ec’ey a mɛwl ɛm, ɔny ɛrm mamn etu ec’eb ɛm, ɔŋ agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ a mij yɔyɔg akr es, atm gbre ɛsɛl abu ke kok ów amamn nɔnɔ gbɛl.
54005011	Eŋnyɔw ek’anŋ ŋgbafrɛ a, k’ɛ̀lu ɛl nin lɛl ab ɛm, aŋke igŋ ɛbi owi b’ow ɛl nuŋ ɛm a, -li b’igŋ Krist -l’ɛlu es,
54005012	ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ ɛl -n’ɔny jɛj ok aŋke -l’irmn ɛl e krɛkrɛ e nɛny ij a ow e lís.
54005013	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, eke -n’ɔnym low kaka eke -li ki kok a, -li b’eb akŋ akŋ ec’ɛc abu ɛm; ɛtŋ yec’eke akplm tasi a el ke -n’am cacak agŋ, -n’am dad ów ek’otm ɛl es, -n’am bebar nɛnym low fɛŋ ɛm.
54005014	Na sosiɛm m’erur ek’eŋnyɔw ŋgbafrɛ a k’ɛwl ɛbi egŋ, ew ey, ke nyímn ɛl ec’akŋ a mɛwl ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ɔɔmn ɛy ec’efnu a abusu dadm ɛy ów eŋuŋ.
54005015	Tasi ɛm a, eŋnyɔw ab ɛm nyam nyam ŋgboŋ ejagb nyim nyim ab af, am us Satan jam.
54005016	Eke nawrɛ ub lis nyam ec’agŋ ab ɛm eŋnyɔw anŋ, ow it eke li k’ɛlum wɛl abu, ke li k’ígŋm l’ɛlum wɛl es eke Nyamel k’ɛkn ɛl e lís owi. Ke ow ɔ́ŋ Nyamel ɔtu ɛlum eŋnyɔw ek’anŋ ɛl sɔny a abu.
54005017	Agŋ ekpekp a eke bi nyimn Nyamel mɛwl ɛm a it eke k’ɛŋn labm sɔg yony, ab brobro ɛl a eke b’ij gbre dad Nyam odad, ke bi yɛgm agŋ low a.
54005018	Low tasi eke Nyam Lɛl dad a el: K’ow ocmn meb ɔnynmn id eke wɛl ucu meb am kikn may es a nɛny es, ɛtŋ: Juma kok ɛs it eke k’ɛŋn in e labm sɔg.
54005019	Eke wɛl oc ɛgŋ likpekp nyam eke wɛl am ok ów af ow ŋ ec’any af, k’ɛ̀gŋ ow e low k’eb, eke irim adaŋku yony oglog nyahan e nɛnym.
54005020	Agŋ yec’eke kok sikpl owi a, ɛ̀nym ɛl abr dedeku a nimum ec’any af, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ likpr a úru low.
54005021	Kin low yec’eke m’am ibrm’ŋ tasi ɛm Nyam ec’any af, Jesu Krist ec’any af lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eke Nyam sɔsum ot ab ab ec’any af: ɛ̀lum ów amua ke ow k’elm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛm, ke k’ánm ɛgŋ kaka jam.
54005022	K’ògŋ es k’at ɛgŋ abu nuŋ k’abul il juma Nyamel ɛm. K’ɛ̀lu abu awlŋɛl e sikpl owi ɛm; ŋ obi a ànŋ lala.
54005023	K’ɛ̀gŋ mij sɔny coco cɛ, kɔ ɛ̀gŋ mar tɛl ŋ eci lokm a sosiɛm, aŋke ɔl ɔ́wm’ŋ ɔny.
54005024	Agŋ bɛb e sikpl a b’ɛru es kpata wɛl ɛkn gbuŋ eke wɛl ki jɛj ɛl e low ok a, kɔ agŋ likpr ec’a, jɛj ok a b’uwr gbuŋ ɛtŋ wɛl b’ɛkn ɛl e sikpl a.
54005025	Ów amamn yɛji wɛl b’ɛkn ɛl kpata, ɛtŋ ɛl a eke wɛl ɛ́knm kpɛkŋ a yɛji ánm es lɔl ɛm ibnm.
54006001	Agŋ a fɛŋ eke el madu a it eke k’ɔny ɛlum nɔnɔ ligbɛl ɛl eci es ɛw ɛsɛl a e lís, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka kí dadm low ŋuŋ okm Nyam e nin a lel ɛy e low yɛgm ab ab af.
54006002	Madu a eke ɔny es ɛw ɛsɛl eke el nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a, wɛl el ɛl lisijimɛl. Ɛɛ nawrɛ! Gbɛkɔ ow elm na sosiɛm -li k’ɔbrmn wɛl any. Tasi ɛm a, wɛl e lís owi anake it eke -li ki kok tasi a, aŋke agŋ a eke -n’am kok juma -n’ɔŋ a, el ɔmn ɛsɛl eke Nyam erur. Kin low ek’it eke ki yɛgm agŋ ke ɔ́ŋ ɛl -li kok a.
54006003	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am yɛgm agŋ low ɛjeci ɛtŋ n’am igŋ ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist e sodad tasi a lele low yɛgm a eke el ɛy ec’ɔmn ec’ab ab l’ɛlu es,
54006004	ke l’el ɛgŋ eke es ɛfu iy ɛm gbɔŋ ɛtŋ l’uwm low kaka any. L’el ɛgŋ e b’erur ów es atar owi ke b’ogŋ mum odad ebl sosiɛm. Yogŋ ɛm ec’ów eke b’anŋ ow a el: nyamn ɛyr, ów ɛsu, ɛgŋ wɛwr, sow tutr yadŋ ɛgŋ e lís,
54006005	lel ów es atar eke úwrm, ke b’anŋ agŋ eke nuŋ ɛm okm es, ke irmn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam e dad a ec’araŋn. -Li bi tutr ek’ɔmn eke wɛl b’ɔny Nyam ɛm a el ebr eke wɛl b’eb ɔnyn ob af.
54006006	Tasi, ɔmn eke wɛl b’ɔny Nyam ɛm a el ob ɔny ligbɛl, eke wɛl b’ɛgŋ yec’a cɛ eke wɛl ɔny a eb.
54006007	Tasi ɛm a, s’isam ob kaka ab wus na af ɛtŋ si k’ow s’ɔtum s’ɛwlam ob kaka ab.
54006008	Na sosiɛm eke s’ɔny ob ij lele mob sus ɛm ab cɛ, ke ow ɔdŋ ɛy ŋ̂.
54006009	Agŋ eke b’erur eke k’ɔny ob a, b’ɛy mɛju owi ɛm ɛtŋ low aw nɔnɔ lele low ŋuŋ ab b’ɔgŋm ɛl meb ɛtŋ b’ɔny ok ɛl wus ŋuŋn ɛl.
54006010	Tasi ɛm a os ec’erur anake el ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ e min a. Agŋ bɛb ec’a, os a ec’ɔny e low aw afŋn ɛl es toŋ ɛtŋ -li kpab es ɔmn e lís ɛtŋ -l’ijr ɛl ec’ɛrm a gbre ow sosiɛm.
54006011	Gbɛkɔ ŋ eke el Nyam ec’ɛgŋ a, àru ów amua fɛŋ ɛgb es. Ɔ̀l nɛny nyam ij es, ùcu Nyam ɔny es, ìr ɛb ɔmn ɛm, erur ɛm, low eku ɛm lele frɔrɔ el ɛm ab.
54006012	Ògŋ ɔmn ɛm e mum mamn a, ùcu sel ek’ɔnym uwr a ɔny es aŋke Nyam ɛsŋ’ŋ eke k’uw sel ɛŋn ikŋ na any, lɛgŋ a ek’agŋ nɔnɔ ec’any af ij ŋ ec’ɔmn tasi ek’ɔny e daŋku a.
54006013	M’am ijl’ŋ nɛny Nyam eke b’ɔŋ ob fɛŋ sel ec’any af lele Jesu Krist ek’ij ɔmn tasi e n’ɔny a e daŋku Pɔns Pilat ec’any af a e nin ɛm.
54006014	Ɛ̀lum ów a eke mi dad’ŋ a, ɔ̀su ów a lala ɛm ek’abr ɛnym k’ánm ɛm toŋ bake igŋ lɛgŋ a ek’ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist b’ow ɛwl ow a.
54006015	Ɛgŋ a eke b’ow ɔŋ Krist ɛwl ow lɛgŋ a eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es a el Nyam. L’el ehe e nuŋ lel ob fɛŋ ec’es ɛw ɛs ab, ɛ́b ebu ɛm ec’Ɛb ebu lele kɔtɔkɔɛl ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ ab.
54006016	In cɛ li k’ɔtum l’uwm. L’ir usuayl usu ek’ɛgŋ k’ɔtum titam. Ɛgŋ kaka ɛknm’n ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛknm’n. Sos usr lele abusu ab él in eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
54006017	Dàd wus na af ec’egbreŋgbi a, -li k’ɛwr sos, -li k’ocr ɛl ec’ɔmn a -li k’ɛwr ob ɔny na eke b’uwr ab af, kɔ -l’oc ɛl ec’ɔmn a -l’ɛlu Nyam ɛm, in eke li b’ɔŋ ɛy ob fɛŋ ɛrm mamn ɛm ɛy e low kok ec’a.
54006018	Dàd ɛl -li kok ów amamn, -l’ij gbreŋgbi ów amamn kok ɛm, -l’el ɛ́rm mamnu ke -l’el agŋ eke bi cɛc ob ɛl lawlɛl ab.
54006019	Eke -li bi kok ɛbɛn, -li b’ow -l’as ob ɔny mamn ek’ɔnym uwr a luku lɛgŋ anym ɛm eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɛŋn owr anŋ nawrɛ tasi a.
54006020	Libɔwi Timote, ɔ̀su mɛwl ɛm yec’a eke Nyam abul’ŋ a. Àru nɛnym ot eke low kaka anm ɛm, ke ókrm af ɔmn ab a lele sodad ek’agŋ b’ub nuŋ ɛm ɔny e sodad a ɛgb es.
54006021	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ bɛb ij nɛny dad eke ɛl ɔny nuŋ ɛm ɔny ikŋ na ɛtŋ -li kpab es ɔmn e lís. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny ab.
55001001	Ɛm Pɔl, m’el Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs aŋke Nyam erur. Wɛl abul’m eke mi k’ɔb sel ɛŋn a eke wɛl ɛwar ow e low ɛw es, ke anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm a ec’amani.
55001002	Timote ɛm ec’iy e m’erur, ŋ anake m’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl na a. Ke Nyam Ɛs lel Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ɛ́dŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ, ɔ́ny ŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ ke ɔ́ŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
55001003	Nyam a eke mi bi kok in e lís e low tutr tasi ɛm ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛm lagŋɛl kok ab af a, m’am ɛlu’l bia. Ncok lel lɛgŋ owr ab mi b’ɔkn ŋ e low ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm ɛtŋ mi b’ɛlu Nyam bia sakp sakp fɛŋ ŋ eci.
55001004	M’am ɔkn ŋ e mikŋ a e low ɛtŋ m’am erur tasi eke mi k’ɛkn’ŋ bake m’ɔny sos ɛm iŋn.
55001005	Ŋ ec’ɔmn nawrɛ tasi a ek’ɔny Jesu Krist ɛm a e low anŋ’m sos ɛm, ɔmn a ek’alaŋ Lois lel esŋ Enis ab ikŋ anym ɔny gbuŋ ke ɔny a. M’ub nawrɛ tasi eke ŋ yɛji ɔny.
55001006	Ow sosiɛm m’am ɔkn’ŋ: ob ap a eke Nyam ɔŋ’ŋ lɛgŋ a eke m’at’ŋ abu nuŋ a, òkr’r meb ɛm,
55001007	aŋke Abŋ a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛy a, ɔɔm ɛy s’ɛwm dra dra. Tasi ɛm a, in ec’Abŋ a b’ɔŋ ɛy lɛc, erur lele low ɛm eci sos es ok ab.
55001008	Ɛ́s k’ɔ́ny’ŋ ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci daŋku ij ɛm; ɛ́s k’ɔ́ny’ŋ ɛm e lís eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm in sosiɛm a eci. Kɔ ìj gbre ɛm ab Amani Mamn a sosiɛm, lɛc a eke Nyam b’ɔŋ’ŋ ab ɛm.
55001009	Nyam anake eb ɛlu ɛy es ke ɛsŋ ɛy eke si k’el in ec’a; ow elm ɛy ec’ów amamn eke si kok a sosiɛm, kɔ ow el in obi e low eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es, ɛtŋ ow el bibm ɔfr ɛm eke n’ɔŋ ɛy Jesu Krist ɛm gbuŋ eke wus k’ɔb nuŋ a.
55001010	Gbɛkɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm, l’ɛlu ow e low ɔkm ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs Jesu Krist ec’ow na ɛm, aŋke Jesu Krist ɔny luw ec’abusu a oc es ɛtŋ Amani Mamn ab ɛm li yɛgm owr anŋ a eke úwrm a.
55001011	Nyam oc’m eke mi k’ɔb Amani Mamn na eci kokoba ɛsɛ ɛrm ɛs lele low yɛgm ɛs ab af,
55001012	ɛtŋ ow sosiɛm anake m’am ij gbre amua a. Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny ɛrm susu ligbɛl aŋke m’uw ɛgŋ a eke m’oc ɛm ec’ɔmn a m’ɛlu ɛm ab any ɛtŋ m’ub nawrɛ tasi eke n’ɔny abusu eke Jesu Krist e lís ec’Amani a eke n’ɔŋ’m a, li k’ɔsu toŋ ke ow ít jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a.
55001013	Òc ɛsɛ sɛwl af sodad nawrɛ a eke mi dad’ŋ a dadr odad, ke ɔmn a lel erur ab ab a eke s’ɔny Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, íj lɛc ow ɛm.
55001014	Ɔ̀su Amani Mamn a eke wɛl abul’ŋ a Abŋ Lala a ek’ir ɛy ɛm a e nin ɛm.
55001015	Ɛsɛ elel ek’uw any ab af, Azi ogog ec’ɛm lawlɛl a fɛŋ wal ɛlu’m es. Fijɛl lel Ɛrmojɛn ab anŋ ɛm.
55001016	Ow akpl eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ k’ɛ́lu in ec’ɛrm mamn a ɔkm Onesifɔr e bosu a e lís, aŋke sakp nɔnɔ li b’atr’m sos es ɛtŋ sobel ɛm eke m’anŋ a, ɛm owi ec’ɛ́s ɔnym’n;
55001017	Ow ɔŋ, eke l’ow Rom a, l’igŋ nuŋ es l’ɔl’m es toŋ n’ɛŋn’m.
55001018	Ow akpl eke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ k’ɔŋ abusu n’ɛ́ŋn Nyam ogŋ eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a. Efɛs yogŋ ec’abu ɛlum eke m’ɛŋn in ɛm a, uw any sɛnyn sɛnyn.
55002001	Ŋ, ɛm jim, ɛ̀ŋn ŋ e lɛc a bibm eke b’anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow ɛŋn ɛy ab ɛm.
55002002	Low yec’a ek’iri mi dad adaŋku nɔnɔ ec’any af a, òc abul agŋ ek’ɔny ɔmn ɛl ɛm eke b’ow ɔtu ɔny lɛc, ɛl yɛji oc im yɛgm agŋ ɛjec’a.
55002003	Ŋ yɛji gbre ek’it eke k’ɛbm’ŋ ɛsɛ Jesu Krist ec’ar ogŋ ɛs mamn af a, ɛ̀gŋ eb.
55002004	Ar ogŋ ɛs mamn ek’ɛgŋ ar ogŋ e low eb, ke am erur ek’in ec’ɛgŋ ligbɛl a k’aw’r a, li kókm agŋ ɛm ec’ów a eke agŋ ek’elm ar ogŋ ɛsɛl a bi kok a ij.
55002005	Mum ogŋ ɛs ek’am ogŋ mum a, ke n’ɛ́ŋn ow ec’ob ap ek’anŋ ɛm a, ow it eke li k’ɛlum mum ogŋ a e sol a.
55002006	Wus juma kok ɛs it eke k’ij gbre kok juma, gbuŋ ke n’ɛ́ŋn ow ec’egb ey a l’ij.
55002007	Tùtr ów amua eke m’am dad a sɛnyn sɛnyn, ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɛlum’ŋ abu iri fɛŋ ow ok’ŋ es sos ɛm.
55002008	Ɔ̀kn Jesu Krist ek’el David e bosu ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ke anŋ luw ɛm igb ɛsɛ elel eke Amani Mamn a eke m’am ɔb ow e kokoba a dad ab af a.
55002009	Amani Mamn na sosiɛm anake m’am ij gbre, ke wɛl okm ŋgbraka ɛsɛ low ŋuŋ kok ɛs af a. Gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’odad a in wɛl okm’n ŋgbraka.
55002010	Na sosiɛm m’am ɛgŋ low fɛŋ m’eb agŋ a eke Nyam sɔsum ot a e nimamn eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl yɛji -n’ɛŋn sel ɛŋn a eke b’ow anŋ Jesu Krist ɛm ow a, lel anygbɛl a ek’ɔnym uwr ab ab.
55002011	Kin odad nawrɛ tasi: Eke s’uw Krist ab, si b’ow s’anŋ owr in ab;
55002012	eke si b’inym es kikri, si b’ow s’el es ɛw ɛsɛl in ab; eke si b’igŋ s’ɛlu’l es, in yɛji li b’ow l’igŋ l’ɛlu ɛy es;
55002013	ek’ɛy s’elm cɛcɛ, ke in gbɛ l’el cɛcɛ, aŋke li k’ɔtum l’ɛgbram in sosi.
55002014	Ɔ̀kn agŋ a fɛŋ ów a ek’iri a, ke íbrm tasi Nyam ec’any af eke -li k’ɛsumn ów sodad ebl sosiɛm. Ów ɛsu amua elm low kaka, ow el agŋ a eke b’iri a ec’irmn cɛ.
55002015	Ŋ ec’a, àtr sos es ke Nyam ec’any af a él gbawru, ɛsɛ juma kok ɛs ek’itm ek’ɛ́s k’ɔny in e juma e li kok a eci, ke am ɔb nɛny nyam ɛm low nawrɛ ec’amani a.
55002016	Ów es atar ɔfr ɔfr a, ek’elm ɔmn ec’a, àru ɛgb es, aŋke agŋ a eke b’anŋ ow ec’ów ɛm a, ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛl -n’am kpab es Nyam e lís.
55002017	Ɛl eci sodad ebl a b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ lɛbi ek’ugŋ es ke am ij sos megl a lokm ɛm ab af. Agŋ amua ɛm anake Imene lele Filɛt ab anŋ a.
55002018	-Li digŋ low nawrɛ a -l’ɛlu es. -N’am dad eke Nyam in ɔny agŋ in igbm luw ɛm lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ, ow ɔŋ -n’am ŋuŋn agŋ nɔnɔ ec’ɔmn a.
55002019	Gbɛkɔ Nyam ec’odad ebl nawrɛ tasi a eke sigm es ɛsɛ êl eci lebn eke wɛl ɛlu nɔmu ɛm af a, itŋnm. Kin sodad eke wɛl nɔn af yogŋ a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ uw agŋ ek’el in ec’ab any. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny wɛl igŋ af eke: Ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke bi dad ɛsɛ in el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a, ɔtu eke ki kpab es low ŋuŋ e lís.
55002020	Êl ligbɛl nyam ɛm, ow elm sikpokpo eke wɛl kok sika ɛm lele jɛtɛ ufu ɛm ab cɛ ánm, kɔ kpokpo eke wɛl aku ekŋ ɛm lele yec’eke wɛl kok kpeŋ ɛm ab yɛji b’anŋ. Ek’es gbɛgbl b’anŋ a, jɛtɛ ufu ɛm lele sika ɛm e sikpokpo a wɛl b’ot, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ ɔfr ɔfr ɛm ec’a, wɛl b’ot ekŋ ɛm lele kpeŋ ɛm ab ec’a.
55002021	Ow sosiɛm ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ocr sos es ów yadŋ na fɛŋ ɛm a, b’ow anŋ ɛsɛ kpokpo amamn a eke wɛl b’ijr ob es gbɛgbl e lɛgŋ ab af. Wɛl b’ow oc ɛw’r es in ec’Es Ɛw a eci. Li b’ow n’anŋ ow e juma eci ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow oc kokr’r juma nimamn fɛŋ.
55002022	Àru ŋgbafrɛ ɛm e low aw fɛŋ ɛgb es; ɔ̀l ɛb ir nyim nyim, ɔmn, erur lele ɛrm es ɛy ab es, agŋ a ek’ɛrm lala ɛm b’ɛsŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ab.
55002023	Ów es atar ɔfr ɔfr eke low kaka anm ɛm a, àru ɛgb es, aŋke uw any ek’ow b’ɛdŋ nuŋ ów ɛsu ɛm.
55002024	Ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma kok ɛs itm eke k’ɛsu ów. Ow it ek’in e low k’akpl agŋ fɛŋ e lís, ɛgŋ ek’ɔtu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low, ke ɛ́gŋ agŋ eci cak eke bi cak’r a e low eb.
55002025	Ow it ek’ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm, li ki yɛgm agŋ a eke b’oc’r odad es nɛnym a low, aŋke Nyam ɔtu eke k’ɔŋ ɛl abusu -l’itŋn ɛl ec’es an a, ke -l’uw low nawrɛ any.
55002026	-Li b’ow -n’ŋgboŋ agn eci meb a ek’ucu ɔny ɛl es ab ɛm, -li k’ow -li kokmn agn ec’erur ij, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɔg es -n’am ɔny sow tutr amamn.
55003001	Kin low ek’it eke k’uw any: sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, sɛgŋ a b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ.
55003002	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ b’ow ɔny ɛl obi cɛ ec’erur, el os e lawlɛl, safri ɔwl ɛsɛl lel es ɛfuu ab; -li b’ow -l’el Nyam any ɔbr ɛsɛl ɛtŋ -li k’ow -n’ɔnymn ɛl ɛsɛl ec’ɛlum. -Li k’ow -l’uwmn bia ɔŋ any; -li k’ow -n’ɔnymn Nyam ec’ów a ec’ɛlum.
55003003	-Li b’ow -l’el agŋ ek’ɔny ɛrm tuɔtuɔ, ɔnym sɔrŋ ikŋ, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li dad ów yadŋ ɛm ɛl lawlɛl e lís. -Li b’ow -l’el agŋ ek’ɔnynm sos es, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’erur agŋ eci gbre ijr, ke -l’el low nimamn ec’efnu.
55003004	-Li b’ow -l’el agŋ ɛju, agŋ ek’am jɛjm ów es, agŋ ek’es ɛfu iy ɛm gbɔŋ. -Li b’ow -l’erur ɛl obi ɛm ec’ów eke b’aw ɛl a, -l’akm Nyam ec’erur eke -li k’ɔny a.
55003005	-Li b’ow -li kok nyandrɛ -l’el Nyam ec’éruru; kɔ tasi ɛm a, -li b’ow -l’igŋ ɔmn e lɛc a -l’ɛlu es. Agŋ amua, àru ɛgb ɛl es.
55003006	Ɛl ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam b’ok mel akŋ ɛtŋ ɔyɔw fuɛfuɛ a ek’ɔny sikpl nɔnɔ, ke ɔmn ijm lɛc a, -li b’ɛŋn wɛl meb a eke -li b’uk wɛl ab ɛm; ɔyɔw amua bi kok ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ eke b’aw ɛl a.
55003007	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔyɔw amua b’anŋ low wewr ɛm, kɔ -l’ɔtumn lɛgŋ kaka -l’uwmn low nawrɛ any.
55003008	Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a Janɛs lele Jambrɛs ab atarir Mois ab a, agŋ amua yɛji b’atar low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab. -L’el agŋ ek’ɛl e sow tutr a inyam, ke ɛl ec’ɔmn a yɛji elm low kaka.
55003009	Gbɛkɔ -li k’ow -n’iimn kpekpe yɛji, aŋke agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow ɛkn ɛl eci yadŋ a ɛsɛ elel ek’ow ɛcr Janɛs lele Jambrɛs ab ec’ab af.
55003010	Gbɛkɔ ŋ, us’m jam ɛm e low yɛgm ab ɛm, es an ab ɛm, lel ów eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ab ɛm. Us’m jam ɛm ec’ɔmn ab ɛm, ɛm e low eku ab ɛm, ɛm ec’erur ab ɛm, ɛm e low es ucu ɔny kikri ab ɛm,
55003011	ɛtŋ gbre eke wɛl ijr’m lele low eke mi dɔgr ab ab yɛji uw any. Low fɛŋ ek’ɛŋn’m sɛb amua ek’el: Pisidi ec’Antiɔs Ikoniɔm lele Lisr ab ɛm a, uw any ɛtŋ uw gbre yec’eke wɛl ijr’m a yɛj’any. Gbɛkɔ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eb ɛlu’m es ów amua fɛŋ ɛm.
55003012	Ɛtŋ agŋ fɛŋ ek’erur eke k’ir ɛb cɛcɛ ɛm Nyam eci, Jesu Krist ab ec’af okr ɛm a, wɛl b’ow ijr ɛl gbre.
55003013	Gbɛkɔ, molokm eŋuŋ ɛsɛl a lele mɛju ɛsɛl ab ab b’ow im kpekpe ɛl eci low ŋuŋ kok ab ɛm; -li b’ow -l’ɛju agŋ bɛb ke ɛl obi yɛji wɛl ɛju ɛl.
55003014	Sica ŋ ec’a, ùcu yec’a eke wɛl yɛgm’ŋ ke ɛgŋ eb ɔmn ɛm tasi a ɔny es. Uw low yɛgm ɛsɛl eke yɛgm’ŋ low ab any.
55003015	Tasi ɛm a, ŋ e likekli ɛm ɛtŋ uw Nyam e Silɛl Lala ab any, -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɔŋ’ŋ sɛwr a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm, eke wɛl b’ɔny ɔmn Jesu Krist ɛm a.
55003016	Nyam Lɛl fɛŋ el Nyam ec’abu ɛlum ɛm ec’ów eke wɛl nɔn, ɛtŋ ow b’ɛlum agŋ abu eke ki yɛgm agŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ogŋ low yec’ek’elm ow a, akpal low ŋuŋ, yɛgm agŋ es an nyim nyim ɛm ec’ɛb ir,
55003017	yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam ec’ɛgŋ ɔ́ny sos bɛbm nawrɛ tasi, ke l’ɔ́tu n’ɔny abusu li kok low nimamn fɛŋ.
55004001	Sica m’am dad’ŋ Nyam ec’any af lele Jesu Krist eke b’ow jɛj agŋ ek’anŋ owr lel agŋ ek’uw ab ec’ów ok a ec’any af, m’am dad’ŋ Jesu Krist e mowrer a lel in ec’ es ɛw ab ab sosiɛm m’ɛsɛ:
55004002	nɛny át’ŋ es dad Nyam ec’odad a, ek’ow el lɛgŋ mamn ɛm oglog lɛgŋ ŋuŋ ɛm yɛji, dád eb agŋ, ɛ́nym agŋ abr oglog átr agŋ sos es, ke ɔ́ny low eku nɔnɔ agŋ e low yɛgm ɛm.
55004003	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ b’ow ow ek’agŋ k’ow erurm eke k’iri low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi a, ke b’ow erur us ɛl obi ec’ów eke b’aw ɛl a jam, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɛsŋ low yɛgm ɛsɛl nɔnɔ eke b’ow dad ɛl ów a eke -li b’erur eke -li k’iri a.
55004004	-Li b’ow -li b’abl ɔru low nawrɛ ec’iri e lís, ke -l’ɛwl -n’am iri agŋ ec’ów eke bi kɔkn dad a.
55004005	Ŋ ec’a, òk sos es low low fɛŋ ɛm, ɛ̀gŋ gbre ij eb, kòk ŋ ec’Amani Mamn e kokoba ɔb e juma a, kòk ŋ e Nyam juma a íy nɛny.
55004006	Ɛm ec’a, wanci ow eke wɛl k’oc wawr’m egb; wanci eke mi k’ɛlu wus na es a ow.
55004007	M’ogŋ mum mamn a, m’im toŋ m’igŋ ɛm ec’es uru a e nuŋ, m’ucu ɛm ec’ɔmn a m’ɔny es.
55004008	Sica any eke m’eb eci labm sɔg a, am eku’m. Ow ow el nɛny nyam ij e tufɛ a eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, jɛj ok ɛs nɛny nyam ɛs a b’ow ɔŋ’m jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a. Ɛtŋ ow elm ɛm cɛ li k’ow n’ɔɔm im, kɔ agŋ a fɛŋ ek’am eku erur ɛm wanci a eke li b’ow l’ɛlu sos ɔkm a.
55004009	Àtr sos es ow fafa ɛŋn’m,
55004010	aŋke Demas igŋ ɛlu’m es wus ec’ów ec’erur eke n’ɔny nɔnɔ a sosiɛm eci; l’eb ejagb n’im Tesaloni. Kresan eb ejagb im Galasi ɛtŋ Tit im Dalmasi.
55004011	Luk sɔny cɛ anŋ ɛm ab. Òc Mark ke ów in ab, aŋke l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛlum im abu ɛm e juma ab ɛm.
55004012	M’ɛrm Tisik Efɛs.
55004013	Lɛgŋ eke b’ow ow a, ìsm’m ɛm e mob af ɛw a eke m’ɛw es Troas Karpɔs ogŋ a, ke ísm’m silɛl a yɛji, ab brobro ɛl a eke wɛl nɔn ndey lɛl af a.
55004014	Alesandr lôw ofŋ ɛs a kok low ek’akplm ɛm e lís; Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow sɔg’r low ŋuŋ a e li kok’m a e labm.
55004015	Ŋ yɛji ɔ̀su sos in e lís, aŋke ɛy e sodad a e dad ɛm l’atar ɛy ab lɛc ɛm.
55004016	Lɛgŋ eke m’ɔg es m’im odad jɛj ok ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka anm ɛm ab, ɛl fɛŋ -l’igŋ -l’ɛlu’m es. Ke blel Nyam k’ɔ́bm ɛl low ow eci.
55004017	Gbɛkɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, in anŋ ɛm ab ɛtŋ l’atr’m sos es, ow ɔŋ m’ɔny abusu mi dad in ec’odad a m’ok Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl amua fɛŋ. Ɛtŋ li sɔg’m kukuma amua e nɛnym.
55004018	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛmɛny b’ow eb ɛlu’m es low ŋuŋ fɛŋ e lís, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’anŋ kpoŋ kpoŋ m’ɛy in ec’Afr eci gbreŋgbi usu a. In ec’él anygbɛl sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
55004019	Ɛ̀sŋn Prisil, Akilas lele Onesifɔr e bosu ab ab ɔŋ’m.
55004020	Eras anŋ Korɛnt ɛtŋ m’ɛw Trofim es Mile, aŋke ɔl am ɔny’n.
55004021	Àtr sos es ow gbuŋ ke lɛfr e lɛgŋ a ów. Ebul, Pudɛs, Linus, Klodia lel agŋ lisijimɛl ɛjec’a fɛŋ ab am ɛsŋn’ŋ.
55004022	Ke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ánŋ ŋ ab. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny ab.
56001001	Ɛm bɔwri Tit, ɛm Pɔl, Nyam e juma kok ɛs lele Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs ab, ɛm m’am awŋ lɛl na. Nyam abul’m eke mi k’ɛsŋ agŋ a eke li sɔsum l’ot a ɔny ɔmn, ke mi yɛ́gm ɛl -l’uw low nawrɛ any, ke -l’ir ɛb ek’okr af ɛy ec’ɔmn eke s’ɔny ab ab,
56001002	yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɔny low eku sel ek’ɔnym uwr a eci. Nyam ek’ɔ́nym yadŋ a, ɛwar ɛy ɛb ir ikŋ na gbuŋ eke low fɛŋ k’anŋ a.
56001003	Lɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm ɛw es a, Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ɛlu in ec’odad a ɔkm. Odad a anake el amani a eke n’ɔŋ’m, ke n’ɔŋ’m abusu eke mi k’ɔb a.
56001004	Tit, m’am nɔn lɛl na m’awŋ’ŋ, ŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛm ec’iy tasi af, ɔmn a ek’okr ɛy af ab ɛm. Ke Nyam Ɛs lele Jesu Krist ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ab ɛ́dŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ, ke ɔ́ŋ’ŋ ɛrm es ɛy.
56001005	M’ɛw’ŋ es Krɛt eke k’uwar ów sisigm ek’anŋ a, ke ɛb ɛb a e Sinyamel ab ɛm sɔ́sum agŋ ekpekp ot ɛsɛ idr ɛsɛl af, ɛs’elel eke m’ɔŋ’ŋ ow ec’abusu ab af.
56001006	Ɛgŋ likpekp a it eke k’el ɛgŋ ek’abr ɛnym anm lís; yɔw nyam cɛ ec’igŋ, ke in ec’ey a él Nyam e nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl eke wɛl k’ɔtum okm ów af ɛl ec’es an keskes eci, oglog ɛl ec’ɛgŋ ɛluam eci.
56001007	Tasi ɛm a, Nyamel ec’idr ɛs eke b’ɛkn Nyam ec’ów a, it eke k’ir ɛb mɛwl ɛm. Li k’élm es ɛfuu, ɛrm beblu, mar ɛgŋu, l’élm ɛgŋ ek’ɔny gaŋgaŋ, l’élm ɛgŋ e b’ɔl os ɔny es yadŋ ɛm.
56001008	Ow it eke li k’eb agŋ eke b’ow in ogŋ a mɛwl ɛm, ke l’él low nimamn e lawl. Ke l’él ɛgŋ e b’iri ɛgŋ owi, ɛgŋ nyim nyim, eke b’eb Nyam ec’ebr a, ke l’él ɛgŋ e b’ɔnyn sos es.
56001009	Ow it eke li k’ucu odad tasi a ek’it a n’ɔny es nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, odad a ek’okr af yec’a eke wɛl yɛgm ab ab a. Ɛbɛn ke l’ɔ́tu l’atr agŋ likpr a sos es low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ɛm, ke li yɛ́gm agŋ a ek’ɛgŋm low yɛgm a ebm a ɛl ec’irm a.
56001010	Mi dad sodad amua aŋke agŋ nɔnɔ ɔ́nym ɛlum, ab brobro Jwifɛl eke b’us Jesu jam, ke am erur ek’agŋ k’ubr likr es ab ɛm; -li b’irmn agŋ ɛl e nɛnym ɔb e sodad ebl ab ɛm.
56001011	Ow it eke k’abl ɛl nɛny es, aŋke -li bi ŋuŋn sibosu nimum ɛtŋ -li bi yɛgm low ek’itm a, yec’ɛtŋ ke -n’ɛŋn os yadŋ ɛm.
56001012	Krɛt iy nyam in obi, ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs nyam anake dad ninɛ: "God’ɛtŋ Krɛt eyŋ el ayadŋu, mindey eŋuŋ, ɔkpɔrŋu e bi tutr ɛl e lok iy owi cɛ."
56001013	Ɛtŋ ow eke li dad a el low nawrɛ tasi. Na sosiɛm anake ki dad ɛl odad lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm, ke -l’ub nawrɛ tasi,
56001014	yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ucumn Jwifɛl e kpɔkpɔ ɛm ec’ów yadŋ a e dad a -n’ɔnymn es; -l’ɛluamn agŋ a eke b’igŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛlu es e sol a.
56001015	Fɛŋ el lala agŋ a eke b’ɛlum Nyam e sol a eci; kɔ agŋ a ek’ɛluam, ke ɛ́gŋm ubm nawrɛ ec’a, kaka elm lala, aŋke ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a lel ɛl sow tutr ab ab yɛji ikpi.
56001016	-Li b’ij nɛny -l’ɛsɛ ɛl uw Nyam any, kɔ ɛl ec’ów eke -li bi kok a b’anŋ ɛjeci. -L’el agŋ ɔbr tasi, -l’ɛluamn ɛgŋ kaka ɛtŋ -l’ɔtumn -li kokmn low nimamn kaka.
56002001	Gbɛkɔ ŋ, yɛ̀gm yec’a ek’otarir es low yɛgm nawrɛ tasi ab ab a.
56002002	Dàd agŋ ekpekp a él agŋ eke k’ɔny sos es ok low kok ɛm, ɔ́ny sos us, any es ok, íj lɛc ɔmn ɛm, erur ɛm lele low eku ɛm ab.
56002003	Dàd ɔyɔw ekpekp a yɛji ɔ́ny ɛb ir mamn eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm. Ke -li ki dadmn ɛl lawlɛl a e lís ec’ów eŋuŋ, -l’elmn mar eci madyɔw. Ke -li yɛgm low yeci ek’akpl a,
56002004	yec’ɛtŋ ke -li yɛgm ɔyɔw oto a ɔ́ny ɛl ɛcɛl lel ɛl ec’ey ab ec’erur.
56002005	-L’el any es ok lisɛl ek’ɔnym wiawia, akŋ juma kok lisɛl amamn, ek’ɔny ɛl ɛcɛl ec’ɛlum, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔ́nym low ŋuŋ dadm Nyam ec’odad a e lís.
56002006	Ìbrm ŋgbafrɛ oto a yɛji él agŋ ány es oku low fɛŋ ɛm.
56002007	Ŋ obi yɛji, ow it eke k’el sɛwl ów amamn kok ɛm. Ŋ e low yɛgm a él nawrɛ tasi, ɔ́ny sos usr.
56002008	Ke ŋ e sodad ebl a él nyim nyim eke wɛl k’ɔ́nym low dadm ow e lís, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy ec’efnu a k’ɔ́nym low dadm okm ɛy af, ke ɛ́s ók ɛl any.
56002009	Ow it eke madu k’ɔny ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a ec’ɛlum, ke -n’ɔŋ wɛl áw ɛl low fɛŋ ɛm, ke -li k’ɔnymn odad wɛl ab.
56002010	Ɛtŋ ow itm eke -li k’iy wɛl ob kaka fɛŋ. Kɔ ow tasi eke -li ki kok a el, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ -l’ɛlu ɛl ec’agŋ amamn eke -l’eel lele ɛl e cɛcɛ el ab ab ɔkm, yec’ɛtŋ ke low fɛŋ ɛm Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs eci low yɛgm a ɛ́ŋn any.
56002011	Mi dad ów amua fɛŋ aŋke Nyam ɛlu in e bibm eke bi sɔg agŋ fɛŋ a ɔkm.
56002012	Bibm a bi yɛgm ɛy eke si k’igŋ ɛy ec’ɛb ir ŋuŋ lele wus ec’ów aw ab ab s’ɛlu es, ke s’ɔ́tu wus af aŋa s’ir ɛb nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛm, nɛny nyam ɛm lele Nyam ec’es ucu ɔny ɛm ab.
56002013	Nɛnɛ anake si b’ow s’eku sos ɛm iŋn e lɛgŋ a eke s’am ɔmn a, lɛgŋ a ek’ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs Jesu Krist ek’el ɛy e Nyam ligbɛl a b’ow ɛy ɔkm in ec’anygbɛl ɛm a.
56002014	L’irmn in e sel a ɛy sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke li sɔ́g ɛy low ŋuŋ fɛŋ ɛm. L’erur eke li ki kok ɛy s’el bieku ek’in obi l’ayal, agŋ ek’el in sɔny eci, ke sɛgŋ fɛŋ ów amamn kok b’anŋ sos ɛm.
56002015	Low yɛgm na anake k’ɛlu ɔkm ŋ ec’abusu a ek’ɛŋn ab ɛm, átr agŋ sos es oglog ɛ́nym agŋ abr a. Kì yɛb ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’iir’ŋ es.
56003001	Ɔ̀kn nawrɛ ub ɛsɛl a fɛŋ, ow it eke -li k’is es es ɛw ɛsɛl lele abusu ɛsɛl ab ec’any af, -n’ɔny wɛl ec’ɛlum, ke -n’ɔny sos bɛbm low mamn fɛŋ e kok eci.
56003002	-Li ki dadmn low ŋuŋ ɛl lawl e lís, kɔ -l’el ɛrm es ɛy ec’agŋ, -l’el agŋ amamn, ke -l’ɛlu ɛl e frɔrɔ el ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ e lís.
56003003	Gbuŋ ke s’úb Jesu nawrɛ a, s’el agŋ ek’uwm low kaka any, ɔnym ɛlum kaka, irm itm es, el low aw lele low e b’iŋn sos ɛm ab eci madu ɛtŋ s’ir ɛb low ŋuŋ ɛm lele nyamnɛyr ɛm ab. Wɛl b’ɔny ɛy e sifn ɛtŋ ɛy ɔfr ɛm yɛji si b’ifanin.
56003004	Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ɛlu in e sɔrŋ ikŋ lel in ec’erur ab ab ɔkm agŋ fɛŋ eci,
56003005	ɛtŋ li sɔg ɛy, ow elm ɛy ec’ów amamn eke si kok a sosiɛm, kɔ eke n’ɔny ɛy e sɔrŋ ikŋ a sosiɛm. Li sɔg ɛy mij a eke b’ayal ɛy s’el agŋ owr ab ɛm; ɛtŋ ow ec’iri tasi a el: ɛb ir owr a ek’Abŋ Lala b’ɔŋ ɛy a.
56003006	Abŋ Lala na, Nyam in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ɔmun in es ɛy af, Jesu Krist ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ab ec’af okr a sosiɛm.
56003007	Ɛbɛn anake in e sɔrŋ ikŋ ab ɛm, li b’ɔŋ ɛy s’el nyim nyim in ec’any af, ke ow b’ɛlu ɛy abusu es s’ɛŋn sel a ek’ɔnym uwr ke s’am ɔmn a.
56003008	Odad na el odad nawrɛ tasi, ɛtŋ m’am erur eke nɛny k’at’ŋ es nɔnɔ ow e dad ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’ub Nyam nawrɛ a, át any kok ów amamn mɛwl ɛm. Na el low akplu ɛtŋ el agŋ fɛŋ ec’abu ɛlum.
56003009	Gbɛkɔ àru ów ek’ɔnym low yɛgm a ɛgb es ɛsɛ: agŋ lagŋɛl e mew ec’es ɔsŋm, ów ɛsu lele Mois ec’ol a ec’ów es atar owi ab ab. Amua fɛŋ el ów ɔfr ɔfr eke low kaka anm ɛm.
56003010	Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’is ɛm bubr owi a, ɛ̀war ir akp nyam, sakp yony gbuŋ ke ɛgŋ ikŋ na, kpáb’r es Nyamel e lís.
56003011	Ɔtu eke k’uw any ek’ɛgŋ ikŋ na ejagb ŋuŋ n’am eb. Ɛtŋ sikpl a eke n’am kok n’im ab ɛm, ow el in sosi eke n’am ɔbr low.
56003012	Ba mi b’ɛrm Artemas oglog Tisik ow a, àtr sos es ow ɛŋn’m Nikopolis, aŋke mi bɛbm eke mi k’anŋ yogŋ lɛfr lɛgŋ iy a.
56003013	Ɛ̀gŋ eb ɛlum Zenas eke jɛj ok owi ɛm el ɛgŋ dogŋn ɛs a lel Apolɔs ab abu ɛl ec’ejagb us ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke -li k’ɔnymn ob kaka ec’es abur.
56003014	Ow akpl eke ɛy ec’agŋ ek’ub Krist nawrɛ a yɛji, ki wewr ɛrm mamn ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -li kok es abur fɛŋ eke b’owr ɛl a, ke ɛl ec’ɛb ir a k’élm ɔfr ɔfr.
56003015	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ ɛm ab a am ɛsŋn’ŋ. Ɛ̀sŋn ɛy lawlɛl a ek’ɔny ɔmn nyam coco ɛy ab a. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
57001001	Ɛm Pɔl, eke wɛl ɛlu sobel ɛm Jesu Krist sosiɛm lele ɛy lisijim Timote ab e nin ɛm, m’am awŋ Filemɔ ɛy lawl sɛnyn juma kok ɛm lɛl na.
57001002	Lɛl na el ɛy lisijɔw Apia lel ɛy e low dogŋn ɛm e lawl Arkip lele Nyamel eke b’as luku ŋ ec’akŋ ab ab yɛj’eci.
57001003	Ke Nyam ɛy Ɛs lele ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ, ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy.
57001004	Sakp sakp fɛŋ, ɛm e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, mi b’ɔkn Filemɔ ŋ e low ɛtŋ mi b’ɔŋ ɛm e Nyam a bia;
57001005	aŋke m’am iri agŋ am dad ŋ ec’erur ek’ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ a eci, lele ŋ ec’ɔmn ek’ɔny Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ab ab e low.
57001006	M’am ibrm Nyam eke ɔmn a ek’ɔny ɛsɛ ɛy af a, k’ij lɛc ŋ ɛm, ke ow ɔ́ŋ uw ów amamn fɛŋ eke s’ɔny Krist ɛm, ɛy ec’owr anŋ na ɛm ab any.
57001007	Lisijim ŋ ec’erur ek’ɔny a, ɔŋ’m sos ɛm iŋn nɔnɔ lele sos es atr ab, aŋke agŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ a, usur ɛl ɛrm.
57001008	Na sosiɛm, ek’abusu ɛru’m es Krist ɛm eke mi ki dad’ŋ low ke kók yɛji,
57001009	m’am erur ek’erur ɛm a, m’ɛw ibrm ɛm. Ɛm Pɔl, ɛ̀kn elel eke m’anŋn, ɛgŋ ligbɛlgbɛl ek’ɛmɛny anŋ sobel ɛm Jesu Krist sosiɛm,
57001010	m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ eke k’eb Onesim. L’el ɛm ec’iy Jesu Krist ɛm sobel ɛm aŋa.
57001011	Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, l’akplm ŋ eci, kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a l’akpl ŋ lel ɛm ab eci.
57001012	M’am ɛwlm’n mɛny sica l’ow n’ɛŋn’ŋ, in eke l’ɛw ɛsɛ ɛm obi e sos ogog af a.
57001013	M’erur tasi eke blel m’ɔnym’n ab n’anŋ’m saw eke m’anŋ sobel ɛm Amani Mamn sosiɛm a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ŋ usuiy a li kók ɛm e lís e low.
57001014	Gbɛkɔ m’erurm eke mi ki kok low ek’ɛlum nɛny es, yec’ɛtŋ ke low mamn a eke ki kok a, k’élm atrm ɛm, kɔ ɛrm frɔrɔ ɛm.
57001015	Onesim kpab’ŋ e lís, ow k’ɔdm ke ow el lɛgŋ tɛl eci, yec’ɛtŋ ke b’ɛŋn’n ke ow él sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci,
57001016	aŋke caca ɛm a, l’elm adu ij, kɔ n’ɔny any l’akm adu: l’el erur ɛm ec’ɛgŋ lisijim. L’il’m an nɔnɔ, kɔ ŋ ec’a ow b’ow afŋn es, ɛgŋ e l’el a lele nawrɛ ub ɛs eke l’el ab ab sosiɛm eci.
57001017	Sica eke b’oc’m ɛsɛ awlŋ af, ke èb’r ɛsɛ ɛm obi ɛm obi af.
57001018	Eke li kok ŋ low ŋuŋ oglog n’ɔnym’ŋ ob ab, ùb ɛw’m af.
57001019	Ɛm obi ec’abu ɛm anake m’am nɔn ów amua a: Ɛm Pɔl, mi b’ow m’ɔwr m’ɔŋ’ŋ. (Ow itm eke mi k’ɔkn’ŋ eke ŋ obi yɛji ɔnym’m ob ab, kɔ yadŋ ee? ŋ ec’owr anŋ tasi a.)
57001020	Lisijim, m’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, kok low na eke m’am ibrm a ɔŋ’m Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’erur a sosiɛm: ɛ̀yr’m ɛrm es Krist ab ec’af okr a sosiɛm.
57001021	Wanci na af eke m’am awŋ’ŋ lɛl a, m’ɔny ɔmn tasi eke b’ow kok low a eke m’am ibrm’ŋ a ɛtŋ m’uw any yɛj’eke b’ow kok ow afŋ es.
57001022	Kòk’m es ɛru usu yɛji kpɛkŋ, aŋke ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm, m’am ɔny ɔmn eke wɛl b’ow ɛlu’m es ɔŋ ɔny.
57001023	Epafras ek’anŋ sobel ɛm ɛm ab Jesu Krist sosiɛm a, am ɛsŋn’ŋ,
57001024	ɛtŋ Mark, Aritak, Demas lele Luk ab ek’el ɛm lawlɛl juma kok nyam ɛm a yɛji, am ɛsŋn’ŋ.
57001025	Ke sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
58001001	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Nyam ɛcr kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɛm dad ɛy lagŋɛl odad, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl odad a sakp nɔnɔ lel akunda ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm ab.
58001002	Kɔ sica, sɛgŋ na ek’el sɛgŋ es abal el ab ɛm, Nyam ɛcr Jim ɛm dad ɛy odad. Jim na ɛm l’ɛcr li kok afr lele wus ab, ɛtŋ in cɛ anake Nyam sɔsum oc’r eke li k’el ob a fɛŋ ec’aja ij ɛs a.
58001003	Iy na b’ɛlu in ec’anygbɛl e jɛjn a ɔkm, ɛtŋ l’el ow ec’es otarir kpɛŋ, ɛtŋ in ec’odad ebl ec’abusu a ucu wus lel ob fɛŋ ab ɔny es. Li yɔyɔg agŋ e sikpl ab es, ɛtŋ n’im li sig es afr Nyam ek’ɔny abusu ob fɛŋ af a e lidr abu af.
58001004	Iy na ɔny any nɔnɔ akm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl. Ɛɛ, ow ɛru es kpata, aŋke Nyam ɔŋ’n aja nin ek’ɔny any nɔnɔ akm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’a.
58001005	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka Nyam dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka ɛsmɛ: Ŋ el ɛm ec’ Iy, yɛfɛnyna, ɛm m’ew’ŋ. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, li dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka yɛji l’ɛsmɛ: Ɛm, mi b’ow m’el Ɛs, ɛtŋ in, li b’ow l’el ɛm ec’Iy.
58001006	Gbɛkɔ, lɛgŋ a eke n’ɔŋ in e yɛfl Iy a ow wus na af a, li dad ninɛ: Nyam ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a pupukpaŋ it eke k’igŋ’n nuŋ.
58001007	Kin low yec’eke li dad afr ɛrm ɛsɛl e lís: ŋ el ɛgŋ a ek’ɔŋ ke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl itŋn anŋ ɛsɛ lɛf af, ke ŋ e juma kok ɛsɛl bi kok ŋ e low ɛsɛ al e b’iri ab af a.
58001008	Kɔ Nyam dad Jim e lís ninɛ: ŋ el Nyam ɛtŋ ŋ ec’ɛb ebu ec’atufu lɛkpn a anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Ŋ e kpama ab ab, am nyimn ŋ ec’agŋ a low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm,
58001009	b’erur low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛtŋ b’ifn low ŋuŋ. Na sosiɛm Nyam, ŋ e Nyam sɔsum oc’ŋ awlŋɛl ab ɛm eke k’el in eci, ɛtŋ l’ɛtm sos ɛm iŋn e mun l’ok’ŋ nuŋ.
58001010	Ɛmɛny Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, nuŋ ɔb ɛm a, ŋ anake kok wus a, ɛtŋ afr el ob eke ŋ e sabu a ol.
58001011	Ów amua fɛŋ b’ow irm, kɔ ŋ, b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Afr lele wus ab b’ow ɛni ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm sig af,
58001012	b’ow ɔny ar ɛl es ɛsɛ gbad af, ɛɛ, -li b’ow -l’itŋn any ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af. Gbɛkɔ ŋ, b’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ŋ ec’elel a cɛ, ɛtŋ ŋ ec’owr anŋ a úwrm.
58001013	Lɛgŋ kaka Nyam dadm afr ɛrm ɛs kaka ɛsmɛ: Òw sig es ɛm e lidr abu af, toŋ bake m’ót ŋ ec’efnu m’ok ŋ ec’akr ew a.
58001014	Tasi ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl bla -l’el ee? -L’el abŋ ek’ɔny juma ɛrŋ ɛrŋ, ke Nyam b’ɛrm im ɛlum agŋ a eke k’ij sel ek’ɔnym uwr ec’aja a abu.
58002001	Low na sosiɛm a, ow it eke si k’oc ɛrm s’ɛw sodad eke s’iri ab af; eke ow elm ɛbɛn, si b’ow s’itir ejagb any.
58002002	Nyam ɛcr afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛm ɔŋ agŋ in ec’odad a, ɛtŋ l’ɛlu odad a e nawrɛ ek’el a ɔkm tasi. Agŋ bɛb ɛgŋm usrm’n sos, ɛgŋm ɛluam’n, ɛtŋ ɛl fɛŋ -n’ɛŋn gbre a ek’it eke k’ɛŋn ɛl a.
58002003	Sica ɛy, ayaf si b’ow s’aru gbre na s’ɛgb es, eke si b’igŋ sel ɛŋn ligbɛl na s’ɛlu es ee? Sel ɛŋn na, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anake ikŋ anym ɔb in ec’amani a. Ɛtŋ agŋ a eke iri wɛl dad sel ɛŋn na e low a, ɛlu in e low nawrɛ e l’el a ɔkm.
58002004	Nyam in obi yɛgm eke ɛl e sodad a el nawrɛ, mɛny ɛwr, ów ɛgbɛl, lele sakrowa ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke b’iti any ab ɛm. Ɛmɛny Nyam yɛgm eke ow el nawrɛ Abŋ Lala ec’ob ap ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a eke li cɛc agŋ ɛsɛ elel eke l’erur ab af ab ɛm.
58002005	S’am dad wus eke k’ow a e low. Ow elm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl Nyam ɔɔm abusu eke k’ɛw wus na es.
58002006	Tasi ɛm a, ow eke wɛl b’ɛŋn Nyam Lɛl ɛm a el: Kɔ agŋ bla -l’el eke k’ɛw ɛl e low ɛrm ee? Bla -l’el eke ki kok ɛl e lís owi ee?
58002007	Ɛw ɛl afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ew lɛgŋ tɛl eci, ɔŋ ɛl anygbɛl lele sos usr ab ɛsɛ es ɛw tufɛ af,
58002008	ot ów a fɛŋ ɛw es ɛl ec’akr ew, ɛl ec’es ɛw ew. Nyam ɔŋ agŋ abusu ob ob fɛŋ af. L’ɛgbm ob kaka es eke anm wɛl ec’abusu ab ɛm. Gbɛkɔ yɛfɛnyna, s’am ɛkn tasi, agŋ k’ɔnym abusu ob ob fɛŋ af.
58002009	Kɔ bla anake ɛy yɛji s’am ɛkn ab ee? Jesu anŋ sɛgŋ bɛb afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’ew, kɔ sica, Nyam ɔŋ’n anygbɛl lele sos usr ab ɛsɛ es ɛw e tufɛ af. Bla ec’ee? Aŋke l’ij gbre ɛtŋ l’uw yɛji. Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ɛm, Jesu uw agŋ fɛŋ eci.
58002010	Nyam anake kok wus a ɛtŋ wus anŋ in eci. Kɔ l’erur ek’in ec’ey ab ɛm e nɔnɔ ligbɛl k’anŋ in ec’anygbɛl a e low ɛm. Ɛtŋ ek’ow el Jesu ek’am ot im ɛl sel ɛŋn a ogŋ a, ow it eke Nyam k’oc gbre ijr ɛm ɔŋ’n l’iy nɛny l’igŋ nuŋ.
58002011	Jesu b’ɔny agŋ fɛŋ e sikpl a oc ɛl es lís. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ eke b’ ayal agŋ a lele agŋ a eke wɛl ayal ab ab ɛl fɛŋ b’ɔny ɛgŋ Ɛs nyam. Na sosiɛm ow ɔnym’n ɛ́s eke li k’ɛsŋ wɛl lisijimɛl.
58002012	Tasi ɛm a, Jesu dad Nyam ninɛ: Mi b’ow m’ɔb ŋ e nin a ec’amani m’ok ɛm lisijimɛl. Dedeku ec’araŋn, mi b’ow mi kɔklm’ŋ.
58002013	Ɛmɛny Jesu cɛ, li dad ninɛ: Ɛm, mi b’ow m’oc ɛm ec’ɔmn a nimum nimum m’ɛlu Nyam ɛm. Ɛmɛny ninɛ: Kin ɛm lele ey a eke Nyam ɔŋ’m ab ab.
58002014	Ey amua ɔny low nyam eke okr ɛl af: -l’el agŋ ek’ɔny sos megl lele mebl ab. Agn ɔny abusu eke k’ibi ɛl. Na sosiɛm, Jesu, in yɛji itŋn el ɛgŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke n’ɔny agn eci lɛc a l’oc es in obi eci luw ab ɛm.
58002015	Agŋ ek’anŋ ɛsɛ madu af ɛl ec’owr anŋ a nimum ɛm, luw eci muru eke -n’ɔnyn a sosiɛm a, Jesu sɔg ɛl in e luw ab ɛm.
58002016	Tasi ɛm a, l’owm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eci abu ɛlum eci, kɔ l’ow agŋ ek’el Abraham ec’alaw a ec’abu ɛlum eci.
58002017	Na sosiɛm anake ow it eke li k’itŋn nimum nimum l’ot lisijimɛl lele lisijɔwɛl ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’él wɛl ec’ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl, eke ɛrm mamn iy ɛm gbɔŋ ke el cɛcɛ Nyam e juma kok ab ɛm, ke b’ɛŋn agŋ e sikpl oc ap ec’abusu a.
58002018	Ɛtŋ eke Jesu in obi ij gbre ɛbm ɛkn ɛm a, l’ɔtu eke li k’atm agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛl yɛji wɛl b’ɛbm ɛkn a abu.
58003001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, Nyam ek’anŋ afr a ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’eel in ec’agŋ lala; ow sosiɛm, lɛ̀ɛr Jesu eke s’am ɛgŋ s’eb ɛsɛ ɛgŋ a eke Nyam ɛrm lele egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ab a.
58003002	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, eke Mois nyimn Nyam ec’agŋ a, l’el cɛcɛ ow ec’any af ow e juma e kok ab ɛm. Ɛbɛn cɛ, ɛsɛ Mois af, Jesu el cɛcɛ Nyam eke abul il in e juma a ec’any af.
58003003	Gbɛkɔ Jesu ɛbm eke k’ɛŋn anygbeŋ akm Mois, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛgŋ eke b’us êl a b’ɔny sos usr akm êl ab af.
58003004	Tasi ɛm a, êl nyam nyam fɛŋ ɛgŋ b’us gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ a eke b’us fɛŋ a el Nyam.
58003005	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Mois el cɛcɛ Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’araŋn. L’el juma kok ɛs eke wɛl abul Nyam e lɛgŋ anym ɛm ec’ów a eke b’ow dad a e daŋku ij.
58003006	Gbɛkɔ Krist el cɛcɛ, l’el Iy tasi a ɛtŋ n’anŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a e nuŋ af. In ec’agŋ a, ow ow el ɛy, gbɛkɔ ow it eke si k’ucu ɛy ec’ɔmn a, lele ntotŋ a ek’ɛy e low ɔmn a b’ɔŋ ɛy ab ab s’ɔny es.
58003007	Na sosiɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala am dad ab af: Yɛfɛnyna, eke b’irir Nyam e lebl a,
58003008	k’ɔ̀turir ɔny ec’ɛrm a, ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’elel eke ɔny lagŋɛl kokr loj ab ɛm ab af. -L’ɔbr’m any ɛtŋ -l’ɛbm’m -l’ɛkn.
58003009	Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ a, ɔny lagŋɛl ijr’m gbre eke k’ɛkn yec’a eke mi b’ow mi kok a. Ɛtŋ -l’ɛkn yec’a eke mi kok a toŋ akpo ekŋ yony.
58003010	Na sosiɛm, m’ɔny ɛrm bebl agŋ na e lís ɛtŋ mi dad m’ɛsɛ: ɛl ec’ɛrm a sɛgŋ fɛŋ bi kpab es ɛm e lís, ɛtŋ -l’ɔtum -l’uwm ɛm ec’ejagb ab any.
58003011	Ɛm ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm, m’ofn m’ɛsɛ: -li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm!
58003012	Agŋ lisijimɛl ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ɔny ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka itm eke k’ɔny ɛrm ŋuŋ, ɛrm ek’úbm nawrɛ, ɛrm eke b’itr’r l’igŋ Nyam ek’anŋ owr a l’ɛlu es.
58003013	Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: 'Yɛfɛnyna'. Ow sosiɛm, eke yɛfɛnyna na k’uwrm a, àtarir sos es ɛgŋ ɛgŋ lɛgŋ fɛŋ. Ɛbɛn a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ow ɔnym ɛrm tuɔtuɔ, ɛtŋ sikpl k’ow ɛlum ɛgŋ kaka wus.
58003014	Sica, s’el Krist e lawlɛl, gbɛkɔ ow it eke si k’ucu ɛy ec’ɔmn a eke s’ɔny lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke s’ub’r nawrɛ a s’ɔny es.
58003015	Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Yɛfɛnyna, eke b’irir Nyam e lebl a, k’ɔ̀turir ɔny ec’ɛrm a ɛsɛ lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’elel eke ɔny lagŋɛl ɔbr’m any ab af.
58003016	Bwo ec’ɛgŋ iri Nyam e lebl ab ee? Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔbr’r any ee? Ɛl -l’el agŋ a fɛŋ eke Mois ɔny ok ɔkm Ejipt a.
58003017	Nyam ebl ɛrm toŋ ow ij akpo ekŋ yony. Bwo ec’ɛgŋ e lís ee? Agŋ a eke kok sikpl a e lís, ɛtŋ ɛl nɛny nyam a cɛ anake -l’uwr loj ab ɛm a.
58003018	Nyam ofn dad ninɛ: Li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm. Bwo sosiɛm l’ofn akpasu na ee? Agŋ a ek’ɔnym ɛlum a sosiɛm.
58003019	Tasi ɛm a, kin yec’eke s’am ɛkn a: -l’ɔtum -l’okm Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm, aŋke -n’ɔnym ɔmn.
58004001	Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɛwar ɛy low ɛw es eke si b’ow s’ok in e sel eb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ low na eke l’ɛwar ɛy l’ɛw es a ɛcm okm es. Ow sosiɛm ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ke ɛgŋ kaka ɔny ɛm a k’ánm jam!
58004002	Wɛl ɔb Amani Mamn a e kokoba ok ɛy ɛsɛ ɛy lagŋɛl ab af, gbɛkɔ odad a eke -l’irir a elm ɛl low kaka. Eke -l’irir ow e low a, -l’ebm ow ɔmn ɛm.
58004003	Ɛy, s’ub nawrɛ, s’ɔtu eke si k’ok Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm. Nyam in obi dad ninɛ: Ɛm ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm, m’ofn eke: -Li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm. Ke, Nyam uwar in e juma lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke li kok wus na nimum a.
58004004	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl ɛm, kin yec’eke wɛl dad sɛgŋ lɔbŋ ɛm a e lís: Ɛtŋ eke li kok in e juma fɛŋ uwr a, l’eb sel sɛgŋ lɔbŋ ɛm a.
58004005	Nyam yɛji dad ow ec’odad eke li bi dad l’ɛsɛ: -Li k’ow -l’okmn lɛgŋ kaka ɛm e sel eb a eke mi bɛbm m’ɛw es ab ɛm a.
58004006	Agŋ a ek’ikŋ anym ɛŋn Amani Mamn a ɛgŋm ɔnym in ec’ɛlum. Ow sosiɛm, -l’ɔtum -l’okm Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm. Agŋ ɛjeci gbɛ ɔtu eke ɛmɛny k’ok ɛm.
58004007	Na sosiɛm Nyam ɛw lɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ɛtŋ l’ɛsŋ ow yɛfɛnyna. Eke ow ibn a, Nyam dad David e nɛny ɛm lɛgŋ ikŋ na e low, odad a eke wɛl ikŋ anym dad lɛl na ec’afr ɛm a: Yɛfɛnyna, eke b’irir Nyam e lebl a, k’ɔturir ɔny ec’ɛrm a!
58004008	Sica am ɛkan eke, blel Joswe nawrɛ tasi ɔtu ɛŋn sel eb na ɔŋ Nyam ec’agŋ ab ana, Nyam blel dadm ow e jam a, lɛgŋ ɛjeci nyam ec’odad.
58004009	Ow am yɛgm eke sel eb ɛmɛny anŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a eci. Ɛtŋ sel eb a ot sɛgŋ lɔbŋ ɛm ec’ab es.
58004010	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ a eke b’ɛy Nyam e sel eb ab ɛm a, in yɛji am eb in obi e juma a e sel, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam eb in ec’a e sel ab af.
58004011	Na sosiɛm s’ɔ́ɔl ɛy ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm sel eb na ɛm ec’ɛy es, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ébm ɛy lagŋɛl a ek’ɛgŋm ɛluam low a eci sɛwl a, ke ow ɔ́ŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́ym wus.
58004012	Ow it e si k’uw any eke Nyam ec’odad ebl a b’ism sel ab, lɛc iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ. Li b’ɛdŋ lakm ler ɛm lab ek’in ec’any a yony mum b’ufu a. Nyam ec’odad ebl a b’ɛy ɛgŋ ɛm im igŋ es. Li b’ɛy ow ɛm n’im toŋ n’ɛŋn ow ec’abŋ a lele liy ab ab, li b’im toŋ n’ɛŋn ow e sos ŋgigŋnel a lele ew ab ab. Li b’uw ɛgŋ e nuŋ ɛm ec’ów tutr lele ɛrm ɛm ec’ab ab any.
58004013	Tasi ɛm a, low kaka lɔlm es Nyam ec’any af. Ob fɛŋ eke li kok a ɛru’r es any af kpata. In e nyamn a b’ɛkn fɛŋ, ɛtŋ in anake si k’awl ɛy e lís ec’ów fɛŋ s’ok’r a.
58004014	S’ɔny egb waw ɛs abusu ɛs ligbɛl nyam eke ubr afr ɛm im toŋ ok Nyam ogŋ yogŋ. In l’el Jesu, Nyam ec’Iy a. Ow sosiɛm, s’úcur ɔmn a eke s’ɛgŋn s’ebr a s’ɔnyn es.
58004015	Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl na eke s’ɔny a, ɔtu eke k’ɔny ɛy e sos ɔnym a e sɔrŋ ikŋ, aŋke ɛsɛ ɛy af, in yɛji wɛl ɛbm’n low low fɛŋ ɛm, gbɛkɔ in li kokm sikpl.
58004016	S’ímn si titmn ɔmn ɛm tasi ɛy e Nyam ɛrm mamnu ec’es ɛw ec’atufu lɛkpn a. In e lís si b’ow s’ɛŋn sɔrŋ ikŋ a eke b’anŋ in ec’ɛrm mamn ab ɛm ow a, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, li b’ow l’ɛlum ɛy abu wanci ek’it a.
58005001	Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl fɛŋ, agŋ ec’araŋn wɛl bi sɔsum’n oc’r. In e juma el ke l’ɛ́lum agŋ abu ir ɛb Nyam ab, li kok ob ap lele egb waw ab agŋ e sikpl a ec’oc ap eci.
58005002	Egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a, in obi yɛji l’el ɛgŋ ek’ɔny sikpl. Ow sosiɛm, l’ɔtu eke li k’iri agŋ a ek’uwm low any lel ɛl a ek’am irm ab ab e ses babur a.
58005003	In e sikpl e n’ɔny a sosiɛm, ow it eke li ki waw egb dedeku a e sikpl a eci, ɛtŋ ow elm dedeku a e sikpl a cɛ eci, kɔ in obi in obi ec’a yɛj’eci.
58005004	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ɛgŋ kaka áwm egb waw ɛs ligbɛl e juma a ebm in obi ɛm. Kɔ Nyam anake b’ɛsŋ ɛgŋ ow ec’el ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke l’ɛsŋ Arɔn el ab af a.
58005005	Krist ec’a yɛji, ɛbɛn ow ɛcr. Ow elm in obi l’awm egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ec’el a l’ebm. Nyam eke dad’r odad a ogŋ ow anŋ ow. Kin odad a: Ŋ el ɛm ec’ Iy, yɛfɛnyna, ɛm m’ew’ŋ.
58005006	Ɛmɛny Nyam dad ninɛ: Ŋ el egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af.
58005007	Krist, in e wus af aŋa ec’ɛb ir ab ɛm, ŋɔŋn Nyam ɛtŋ kok sɔrŋ ɔŋ Nyam, babarm ɛm lele ɔŋn ikŋ ɛm ab. Ni ŋɔŋn Nyam ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔny oc’r es luw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ Nyam iri’r lebl, aŋke l’ɛlum ow es is ɛm.
58005008	Krist el Nyam ec’Iy, na low nawrɛ! Gbɛkɔ gbre ijr amua fɛŋ ɛm eke l’ɛcr a, li wewr ɛlum nawrɛ tasi.
58005009	Ɛtŋ sica eke l’iy nɛny l’igŋ nuŋ a, l’el sel ɛŋn e nuŋ agŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɛlum’n a eci.
58005010	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, Nyam ɛw’r egb waw ɛs ligbɛl ɛsɛ Mɛlkisedɛk ec’ab af.
58005011	Low na af a, s’ɔny ów nɔnɔ eke si ki dad, kɔ ɛl e dad a ɔtu nɔnɔ, aŋke ɔny e low iri a ɛwl am ɔtu.
58005012	Ɔny, ɔtur eke wanci na af a k’eel low yɛgm ɛsɛl tasi gɔŋ! Kɔ kin eke ow am ibrm eke wɛl ki yɛgmn ɔny nuŋ ɔb ɛm e Nyam odad ec’ów ab ɛm. Ɔny, ɔnymn tɛri eke k’ijr ob ij leg leg, mɛny mij ow it eke wɛl k’ɔŋ ɔny.
58005013	Ɛgŋ a eke b’anŋ am ɛgŋ mɛny mij a, el iyli ɔmn ɛm. Li k’ɔtum l’uwm yec’a ek’el low nyim nyim ab any.
58005014	Gbɛkɔ ob ij leg leg el agŋ ɛgbɛl ɔmn ɛm eci. Ɛl e low es ɛkn ɛw a, ɔŋ ɛl e nuŋ ɛm ɔny a, b’uw any ok ereb low mamn lele low ŋuŋ ab ec’araŋn.
58006001	Na sosiɛm si k’ow s’ɛwlm s’owm nuŋ ɔb ɛm ec’ów a eke s’uw any Krist e lís ab af ij, kɔ s’íman anym eci low yɛgm ek’ot agŋ ɛgbɛl ɔmn ɛm ec’ab es. Ɛmɛny ow itm yɛj’eke wɛl k’ɛwl ow ów a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm a ec’es igŋ ɛlu owi af lele ɛy ec’ɔmn a eke si k’oc s’ɛlu Nyam ɛm a yɛji e low af ij.
58006002	Ow ibram yɛj’eke ɛmɛny wɛl ki yɛgm ɔny low sos es yɔyɔg ɛrŋ ɛrŋ e low af, ɛgŋ abu nuŋ at owi af, luw ɛm anŋ igb owi af, lele jɛj ok kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ ab e low af.
58006003	Ow sosiɛm a, eke Nyam ɛlu ɛy abusu es, si b’ow s’imn anym eci ów a ek’el Nyam e lís ec’a ec’any uw tasi ɛm.
58006004	Sica, bla wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad agŋ a ek’igŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɛlu es a e lís ee? Nyam ec’usuayl a ɛkan ɛl es, -li tat afr ec’ob ap a anm ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn Abŋ Lala.
58006005	-Li tat Nyam ec’odad ebl mamn a lele sɛgŋ ek’am ow e lɛc ab ab yɛji anm.
58006006	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji -l’igŋ ɛl ec’ɔmn a -l’ɛlu es. Agŋ amua, k’ɔtum sakp yony ɛm itŋnm es an ij. Tasi ɛm a, ow anŋ ɛsɛ ɛbɛn Nyam ec’Iy a cɛ ɛmɛny wɛ’n am ɛw olikŋ af wɛl obi ɛm af ɛtŋ -li b’ɔŋ agŋ ɛjec’a ow eci wɛwr ec’abusu.
58006007	S’ócr ɔgm nyam e low s’ɔbar any: in e wus a b’ɔdu mij a fɛŋ eke nyàm b’an ke b’ok’r af a eb. Li b’ɔsu egb iju agŋ a eke kok’r juma af a ec’abu ɛlum eci. Ow b’ɔŋ Nyam b’ɛdŋ wus a ɔwrɔ.
58006008	Kɔ eke li b’ɔsu kati lele njoj ab, l’elm ob kaka. Ow k’ow ibnm Nyam b’ow digŋ ɛlu’l es ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow tɛtul il.
58006009	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl s’am dad nɛnɛ, gbɛkɔ ɛbɛn yɛji, s’uw any tasi eke ɔny anŋn ejagb mamn a eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ sel ɛŋn ɛm ab af.
58006010	Nyam elm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs. Li k’ɔtum l’ijlm ów amamn a eke kokr ab es, l’ijlm erur a eke ɛlul ɔkm in e lís ab es. Lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, ɛlul erur ikŋ na ɔkm agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a ec’abu ɛlum ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny sicaca ɛm yɛji ɔnyn es am kokr.
58006011	S’am erur cɛ ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ k’anŋ gbragbra kok ab ɛm toŋ ok nuŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke fɛŋ a eke am ɔman a ɛ́ŋan.
58006012	K’èel ɔ́rŋu, kɔ ìir ɛb ɛsɛ agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn ke ɔny ɛrm susu ab af. Agŋ amua, -li b’ɛŋn aja a eke Nyam ɛwar ow e low ɛw es a.
58006013	Eke Nyam ɛwar Abraham ob a, nɛny ij ab l’ɛwar. Gbɛkɔ ɛgŋ kaka agbm akam’n eke k’el nɛny ij na e daŋku, ow ɔŋ Nyam ofn in obi e nin ɛm.
58006014	Li dad Abraham ninɛ: M’ow m’ɛdŋ’ŋ ɔwrɔ ke m’ɔ́ŋ ŋ ec’alaw ɛny bobn.
58006015	Abraham usur ɛrm toŋ ɛtŋ n’ɛŋn yec’a eke Nyam ɛwar ir ow e low ɛw es a.
58006016	Eke agŋ b’ij nɛny a, daŋku nyam eke agb akm ɛl a e nin ɛm li b’ij nɛny. Nɛny ij a b’ɔŋ ɛl e sodad a el tasi, ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, wɛl ɔ́tum dadm low ɛjec’ij.
58006017	Ɛtŋ Nyam yɛji kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a: l’erur e li k’ɛlu ɔkm kpata eke low a e l’ɛwar in ec’agŋ a, k’ɔtum itŋnm lɛgŋ kaka. Ow sosiɛm anake l’ij nɛny l’igŋ in e low ɛwar ab af a.
58006018	Low ɛwar lele nɛny ij ab, el ów yony eke wɛl k’ɔtum ɔnym itŋnm, aŋke Nyam k’ɔtum ɔnym yadŋ. Ów yony na sosiɛm, ɛy eke s’igŋ fɛŋ s’ɛlu es a, si b’ow s’ɛŋn sos es atr ligbɛl, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’úcu low ɔmn a eke wɛl ɛw ɛy es a s’ɔny es.
58006019	Low ɔmn na, ɛy ec’a ow anŋ ɛsɛ ob leg leg nyam ek’ɔɔm ɛy e liy a abusu eke ki mumu af. Low ɔmn na el nawrɛ tasi ɛtŋ li b’ɛpir Nyamel a ek’anŋ afr a eci gbad ab ɛm, l’ɛy usu lala tasi a.
58006020	Yogŋ anake Jesu ikŋ anym ɛy, ɛy ec’a. Ɛtŋ l’el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ɛsɛ Mɛlkisedɛk ec’ab af.
58007001	Mɛlkisedɛk na, Salɛm ec’ɛb ebu lele Nyam Afr Kpekpe ec’ egb waw ɛs ab. Lɛgŋ a eke Abraham anŋ ar ɔkr ɛm am ow yogŋ a eke l’akm sɛb ebu ab es a, Mɛlkisedɛk im ɔbr’r ɛtŋ ɛdŋ’n ɔwrɔ.
58007002	Ɛtŋ Abraham ɔŋ’n ob fɛŋ eke l’ot a e lɛw ɛm a. Mɛlkisedɛk e nin a e nyandrɛ el 'ɛb ebu eke bi nyimn agŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm'. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, l’el Salɛm ec’ɛb ebu, ow e nyandrɛ el 'ɛb ebu eke b’ism ɛrm es ɛy ab'.
58007003	Wɛl uwm ɛs, lis lele lagŋɛl ab any. Wɛl am dadm in e mew a lele luw ab ab ec’odad. Gbɛkɔ li b’ot Nyam Jim es, aŋke l’el egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
58007004	Ɛ̀kan elel eke Mɛlkisedɛk ɔny any a! Ɛy lagŋ ligbɛl Abraham bɔbɔ yɛji ɔŋ’n ob a fɛŋ eke n’ɛŋn ar ab ɛm a eci lɛw ɛm a.
58007005	Mois ec’ ol a ɔŋ egb waw ɛsɛl ek’el Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’a abusu eke -li k’ibrm Israɛl ec’agŋ a ɛl ec’ob fɛŋ eke -n’ɔnyn a e lɛw ɛm. -Li bibrm Israɛl ec’agŋ a ec’ob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm, ke agŋ amua, ɛl lisijimɛl ek’ɛl yɛji el Abraham ec’eb ɛm ec’agŋ cɛ.
58007006	Ke Mɛlkisedɛk, in, l’elm Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ɛgŋ. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji, n’ɛŋn Abraham ec’ob fɛŋ ek’ɛŋn a e lɛw ɛm a. Ɛtŋ in, l’ɛdŋ ɛgŋ na eke Nyam ɛwar low ɛw es a ɔwrɔ.
58007007	Bɛbar kaka anm ɛm, ɛgŋ ligbɛl a b’ɛdŋ likek a ɔwrɔ.
58007008	Egb waw ɛsɛl a eke b’ɛŋn dedeku a e mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a, el agŋ eke b’uw. Mɛlkisedɛk yɛji ɛŋn mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a, kɔ in, n’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl am dad ab af.
58007009	Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ey a anake b’ɛŋn dedeku a e mob fɛŋ e lɛw ɛm a. Gbɛkɔ wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad eke Levi, in yɛji, Abraham ɛm a, n’ɛnm ob lɛw ɛm na.
58007010	Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke Abraham ɔbr Mɛlkisedɛk a eke wɛl k’ewm Levi yɛji, lɛgŋ ab ɛm a, l’ikŋ anym n’anŋ yogŋ lagŋ ɛm.
58007011	Israɛl eyŋ ec’ol ɛm a, Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’ey a anake wɛl ki sɔsum ot el egb waw ɛsɛl a. Ɛtŋ -li b’el egb waw ɛsɛl ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Arɔn ɛm ab af. Gbɛkɔ ɛl ec’elel eke -li b’eel egb waw ɛsɛl a okm ɛm iym nɛny, blel ow iy nɛny, ke bla sosiɛm -li k’ɔny egb waw ɛs ɛjeci ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af ee? Ow b’ow el low eke ɔnym any ij.
58007012	Sica, eke egb waw ɛs ec’el a itŋn a, ol a yɛji it eke k’itŋn.
58007013	Sodad amua, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ af wɛl dad ok. In, eke l’el eb ɛjec’ɛm ec’ɛgŋ, ke eb ab ɛm a, lɛgŋ kaka, ɛgŋ anm ɛym ɔkm kokm egb waw ɛs eci juma a.
58007014	Agŋ a fɛŋ uw any eke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, Juda ec’eb ab ɛm wɛl ew’r. Ɛtŋ Mois dadm eb na e low lɛgŋ a eke li dad egb waw ɛsɛl ec’odad a.
58007015	Ca gbɛ ów a fɛŋ am ayl, sica eke wɛl sigm egb waw ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke b’ot Mɛlkisedɛk es a.
58007016	L’elm egb waw ɛs agŋ e mew ec’ol ec’elel eke b’ɛkan ab ɛm. Tasi ɛm a, owr anŋ ek’ɔnym uwr a ec’abusu ab anake sigm’n es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs af a.
58007017	Nawrɛ tasi, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Ŋ el egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɔb nuŋ Mɛlkisedɛk ɛm ab af.
58007018	Ol sig a iym nɛny ɛtŋ elm low, ow ɔŋ wɛl ɔny fifn’n es.
58007019	Mois ec’ol a ɔsum liy sɔbɔ kaka. Gbɛkɔ wɛl ɔŋ ɛy low ɔmn nimamn tasi nyam, ɛtŋ si b’ɛcr in ɛm si titm Nyam.
58007020	Eke si b’ɛkn a ke Nyam ij nɛny sigm egb waw ɛs na es. Gbɛkɔ Levi ec’eb ɛm ec’a, -l’el egb waw ɛsɛl, eke nɛny ij anm ɛm.
58007021	Kɔ Jesu ec’a, Nyam ij nɛny lɛgŋ a eke li dad ninɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ij nɛny ɛtŋ li k’ow l’itŋnm ɛbr: El egb waw ɛs sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
58007022	Ow am yɛgm ɛy eke Jesu anake el ɛgŋ a eke am ɔŋ ɛy s’uw any tasi eke sinm a eke Nyam kok ɛy ab a, akpl akm lisig a.
58007023	Ɛmɛny low anŋ eke ok ereb: egb waw ɛsɛl ɛjec’a ɛny nɔnɔ, aŋke luw ɔ́ɔm ɛl abusu eke -li k’anŋ egb waw ɛs el ab ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
58007024	Kɔ Jesu gbɛ, in, n’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka ɛgŋ ɛjeci k’ow elm egb waw ɛs in usuiy a.
58007025	Na sosiɛm anake l’ɔtu eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ li k’eb agŋ a eke bi titm Nyam a l’ɛlu es in ec’abu ɛlum ɛm a. Eke sica Jesu anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’a, l’ɔtu eke li ki ŋɔŋn Nyam sɛgŋ fɛŋ wɛl eci.
58007026	Jesu el egb waw ɛs ligbɛl tasi a eke k’el ɛy ec’a. L’el lala, n’ɔnym low ɔbr, ɛtŋ l’itam ɛm kaka, n’anm ɛsɛ ɛy sikpl ɛsɛl af, ɛtŋ afr Nyam usr’r sos ligbɛl.
58007027	Jesu anm ɛsɛ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl ɛjec’ab af. Ow ibram eke lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ li ki waw egb in obi in obi e sikpl a eci, ke ɛmɛny li waw dedeku a eci. In sosi eke l’ocr li wawr egb a, ow el egb waw a eke li kok akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’a.
58007028	Mois ec’ol a bi sigm agŋ eke iym nɛny ab es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛsɛl ɛgbɛl af. Kɔ Nyam e nɛny ij a eke anŋ ol e jam ow a, sigm Iy ab es ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl af, in eke l’iy nɛny l’igŋ nuŋ akpo akpo fɛŋ ec’a.
58008001	Kin low a eke s’am erur eke si ki dad a e liy a tasi: ɛy s’ɔny egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam ɛsɛ na eke si dad in e low ab af. Li sig es afr, Nyam ek’ɔny abusu a e lidr abu af.
58008002	Li bi kok in e juma a usu lala a, afr eci nuŋ igŋ usu tasi a. Ɛɛ, afr eci gbad ɛm êl tasi a, ow elm Israɛl ec’agŋ a usm, kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in obi anake us’r a.
58008003	Egb waw ɛs fɛŋ eke wɛl sigm es a e juma eke bi kok a el ob ap lele egb waw ab. Ow it eke ɛy ec’a yɛji k’ɔny ob ap nyam ɔŋ Nyam.
58008004	Blel Krist anŋ wus af aŋa yɛji, li k’elm egb waw ɛs, aŋke egb waw ɛsɛl ikŋ anym anŋ eke am kok juma na ɛsɛ elel eke Mois ec’ol a ibrm ab af.
58008005	Egb waw ɛsɛl amua am kok juma usu lala ek’el afr ec’usu lala tasi a e sɛwl a lele ow ec’es otarir ab ab eci. Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ a eke Mois am ow us gbad ɛm êl a, Nyam dad’r ninɛ: Lɛ̀r, b’ow kok fɛŋ ɛsɛ sɛwl a eke mi yɛgm’ŋ ɛkn lafɛny af ab af.
58008006	Kɔ sica, ɛy ec’egb waw ɛs ligbɛl Jesu, wɛl abul il juma ek’agb nɔnɔ akm egb waw ɛsɛl ɛjec’a ec’a. Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, n’am ism sinm owr nyam ek’el Nyam eci, ke ɔny any nɔnɔ akm sinm sig a. Ɛtŋ Nyam ɛwar ów amamn nɔnɔ eke li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy a, l’ɛw es sinm owr na ɛm.
58008007	Blel krɛkrɛ e sinm a itam ɛm ana, blel ow ibram Nyam kokm yony ɛm eci usrm’n usu.
58008008	Gbɛkɔ, kin low a eke Nyam am ɛnym in ec’agŋ a, ow ec’abr a: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: Sɛgŋ am ow eke mi b’ow mi kok sinm owr Israɛl ec’agŋ a lele Juda ec’agŋ ab ab.
58008009	Sinm na k’ow anm ɛsɛ yec’a eke mi kok ɛl lagŋɛl ab, lɛgŋ a eke m’ɔny ɛl abu m’ot m’ok ɛl ɔkm Ejipt a. Ɛtŋ -l’ɛgŋm -l’ijm nɛny nyam ɛm e sinm a e lís; ow ɔŋ, ɛm yɛji, m’igŋ m’ɛlu ɛl es.
58008010	Gbɛkɔ kin sɛgŋ na ɛm a, sinm a eke m’am m’ow mi kok Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab a: Ɛm, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, mi b’ow m’oc ɛm e sol a m’ɛlu ɛl e tutr ab ɛm, mi b’ow mi nɔn sol a ɛl e mɛrm ab ɛm. Mi b’ow m’el ɛl e Nyam ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el ɛm ec’agŋ.
58008011	Ɛtŋ ow k’ow ibram eke ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ki yɛgm in ec’ɛb iy oglog lisijim ɛm ec’any uw e low ij, aŋke ɛl pupukpaŋ -li b’ow -l’uw’m any, ɛl kpaŋ, igŋ ey toŋ ok ɛgbɛl.
58008012	Low nawrɛ, aŋke mi b’ow m’ap ɛl e sikpl a ɛtŋ mi k’ow m’ɔknm ow e low mru mru mru.
58008013	Eke Nyam bi dad sinm owr e low, ke sinm krɛkrɛ a, lisig n’ɔŋ ow el a. Sica ob nyam ek’el lisig ke am usu a, el ob eke in ec’irm ibnm.
58009001	Krɛkrɛ eci sinm a ɔny in ec’ów ek’anŋ’n ɛm Nyam nuŋ igŋ a eci lele Nyam ec’ usu lala eke wɛl kok ab wus af aŋa.
58009002	Ow sosiɛm a, wɛl us gbad ɛm êl nyam eke wɛl bubr oj yony ɛm yogŋ. Krɛkrɛ ec’usu a wɛl ɛsŋ’n 'usu lala', yogŋ anake kɛniɛ nyam eke ok ál lɔbŋ lele tabl a eke futufutu a eke wɛl b’ap Nyam ab ab anŋ a.
58009003	Sica, gbad yony ɛm a e jam a, el gbad ɛm êl a ec’ogog yony ɛm a. Yogŋ wɛl ɛsŋ’n 'usu lala tasi'.
58009004	Yogŋ, ogŋ ofŋ usu sika ɛm anŋ; ɛtŋ sinm araka eke sos af a el sika ɛm yɛji anŋ. Sinm araka ab ɛm, sika ɛm kpokpo nyam anŋ eke afr eci futufutu iy gbɔŋ; ɛtŋ Arɔn e kpama a eke gigŋ suw ɔdɔdɔ a yɛji anŋ ɛm. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, mebn a eke af yogŋ wɛl nɔn sinm e sodad a yɛji anŋ ɛm.
58009005	Araka a e nuŋ af a, Serubɛnɛl eke wɛl aku am yɛgm eke Nyam ec’anygbɛl a anŋ aŋa. Ɛl ec’ɔw a e lɔw a am bubur araka a e nɛny ab es, yogŋ a eke wɛl b’ok sikpl oc ap e mebl ab es a. Gbɛkɔ aŋa si k’ow si dadm obli nyam nyam e lís ec’odad.
58009006	Gbad ɛm êl ab ɛm, nɛnɛ anake wɛl sisigm ów a. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, egb waw ɛsɛl a b’ok krɛkrɛ ec’usu a kok ɛl e juma a.
58009007	Kɔ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a sɔny cɛ b’ɛy êl a ec’ogog yony ɛm a, akp nyam cɛ lakpo nimum eci. Yogŋ li b’oc ndey e mebl ab n’im li wawr egb n’ɔŋ Nyam in obi in obi e sikpl a eci lele dedeku a nimum ec’ab.
58009008	Kin low yec’eke Abŋ Lala am erur eke ki yɛgm a: eke krɛkrɛ eci gbad ɛm êl na anŋ a, usu lala tasi a ec’ejagb a ki figm.
58009009	Ow el low ek’el yɛfɛnyna ɛm eci. Ɛtŋ kin ow e nyandrɛ a: ɛgŋ ek’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ ke am ibi mindey ap’r oglog am waw egb ɔŋ’n a, k’ow ɔtum ów amua e kok ɛm ɔnym ɛrm es ɛy Nyam ɛm in ec’ów tutr ɛm toŋ ow ok nuŋ.
58009010	Ow el sol ek’el sos megl af eci cɛ ɛsɛ: ob ij, mar lele sos ayal e mij ɛrŋ ɛrŋ eke wɛl b’ok ab ab. Sol amua fɛŋ ɔny any toŋ ow ok lɛgŋ a eke Nyam titŋn ɛl fɛŋ yec’a eke ɔny any nɔnɔ akm ɛl ab ab a.
58009011	Gbɛkɔ Krist ow ɛsɛ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl af ɔŋ ɛy ów amamn a eke anŋ a. L’ɛcr gbad ɛm êl nyam ek’agb el sɔbɔ akm wus af aŋa ec’ab ɛm. Êl a, el ob eke ow elm agŋ ec’abu usm, ow e nyandrɛ el; ow elm ɛy e wus na eke wɛl kok a ec’ob.
58009012	Krist ɛy usu lala tasi a ek’el Nyam e saw a, akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. L’ocm sican lele sed gɔŋ gɔŋ ey ab e mebl a li kokrm egb waw, kɔ in obi in obi e mebl a l’oc li kokr egb waw ɛtŋ li sɔg ɛy sikpl ec’abu ɛm sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
58009013	Tasi ɛm a, wɛl b’oc sican lele sed gɔŋ gɔŋ ey ab e mebl a lele id yɔw eke wɛl ofŋ e milakŋ a, ok agŋ a eke kok sikpl ab af. Ow b’ayal ɛl sos sikpl a e lís, ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ ɛl abusu owr eke -li k’igŋ Nyam nuŋ.
58009014	Eke na eke wɛl dad a el low nawrɛ, ke Krist eci mebl a, in ɔtu eke k’ɔny mbas nɔnɔ. Tasi ɛm a, Abŋ a ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a ec’abusu ɛm, Krist ocr in sosi ap Nyam, ɛsɛ ndey a eke ítam ɛm ke wɛl b’oc kokr egb waw ab af. Ɛbɛn a, li b’ow l’ayal ɛy e tutr a, eke ów eŋuŋ eke bi nyimn ɛgŋ luw ɛm a ibar a, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɔ́tu si kok Nyam ek’anŋ owr a e low.
58009015	Na sosiɛm anake Krist el ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ ɛy lele Nyam ab ec’araŋn, ke oc sinm owr a ism Nyam ec’agŋ a. L’uw, agŋ ec’es eb ɛlu sosiɛm, ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ a eke -li kokr ow a eke -n’anŋn krɛkrɛ e sinm a ec’es ɛw ɛm a. Ɛbɛn ke agŋ eke Nyam ɛsŋ a, ɔ́tu ɛŋn ów a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛl ow e low ɛw es ke anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a.
58009016	Eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam nɔn aja ij e lɛl ɛw es a, gbuŋ ke wɛl kók lɛl ab ɛm e low a, ow it ke wɛl yɛ́gm eke lɛl nɔn ɛs a uw.
58009017	Tasi ɛm a, aja ij eci lɛl nɛnɛ eke wɛl bi nɔn ɛw es a, ɛgŋ a eke nɔn a b’uw gbuŋ ɛtŋ wɛl bi kok ow e low. Sica ek’ɛgŋ a anŋ owr ke k’uwm a, lɛl a elm low kaka.
58009018	Ɛbɛn nyam coco, lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke Nyam am bɛbm Israɛl ec’agŋ ab ab sinm owi a, wɛl ikŋ anym ibi mindey ɛtŋ wɛl ok ɛl eci mebl ab es.
58009019	Sica dedeku a nimum ec’any af, Mois ikŋ anym awl sodad a pupukpaŋ, ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl b’ɛŋn ɛl ol ab ɛm ab af. Ɛtŋ ow e jam a, l’ot sed gɔŋ gɔŋ a lele sican ab ab e mebl a li wuwlm mij ab ɛtŋ l’oc isɔp ikŋ eci lal nyam eke wɛl ucu licɛb suw nɛny af a, ɛtŋ n’am usm mebl ab ɛm li fufŋ ol e lɛl ab af lele bieku a nimum ab.
58009020	Ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: Na el sinm eci mebl a eke Nyam am ibrm ɔny eke k’ɛlumn a.
58009021	Ɛbɛn cɛ Mois oc mebl ufŋ gbad ɛm êl a lele mob mob a fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ot kokr Nyam nuŋ igŋ e low ab ab.
58009022	Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ elel eke ol dadr ab af, mebl anake b’ayal ob fɛŋ a. Eke wɛl okm mebl es, ɛy e sikpl a ec’oc ap anm.
58009023	Sica eke ow el nɛnɛ wɛl k’ayal mob a eke el ɛl a ek’anŋ afr a eci any ɔkŋnin, ɛbɛn ke ɛl tasi a ek’anŋ afr a ibrm segb waw sɔbɔ tasi.
58009024	Tasi ɛm a, Krist ɛym usu lala nyam eke el agŋ ec’abu ec’eke us ab ɛm; usu lala a el afr ec’usu lala tasi a ek’anŋ a eci any ɔkŋnin cɛ. Kɔ afr nana anake Krist ɛy yogŋ a eke l’uw es inym ɛy e ŋɔŋn ɔŋ eci Nyam ec’any af a.
58009025	Lakpo fɛŋ, Jwifɛl ec’ egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a b’ɛy usu lala tasi a mebl eke elm in ec’ab ab. Gbɛkɔ Krist, in, l’uyum afr eke li ki wawr in sosi egb sakp nɔnɔ.
58009026	Blel ow el ɛbɛn ana, blel l’ij luw e gbre sakp nɔnɔ lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke wɛl kok wus nimum a. Nawrɛ ɛm a, ca sɛgŋ na ek’el sɛgŋ es abal el ab ɛm, Nyam ɛlu’l ɔkm akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, in sosi ec’egb a eke li wawr ab ɛm, ni ŋuŋn sikpl.
58009027	Ow akpl e k’uwr any eke Nyam bɛbm ɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’akp nyam a eke k’uw a e low ɛw es, ke sica ow e jam a li jɛ́j ow e low l’ok.
58009028	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn nɛny nyam cɛ, Nyam oc Krist kokr egb waw akp nyam coco, agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl e sikpl a ec’oc ap eci. Li b’ow l’ɛlu sos ɔkm sakp yony ɛm eci, ow elm sikpl oc ap ec’ij, kɔ agŋ a ek’am eku in e mɛny ɛwl ow a e sel ɛŋn ɔŋ eci.
58010001	Mois ec’ol a anŋ ɛsɛ ów amamn a eke b’ow ow a eci es otarir af. Gbɛkɔ ow elm na elm ów tasi a gbɛ. Ow b’ibrm eke lakpo fɛŋ abu k’anŋ ɛm, wɛl ám kok segb waw nɛnyɛmbri nyam a cɛ. Na sosiɛm anake li k’ɔtum n’ɔɔm agŋ a eke b’ow Nyam saw a e low iym nɛny igŋm nuŋ a.
58010002	Tasi ɛm a, blel segb waw a eke -li kokr a ɔtu ɔny ɛl e sikpl a tɛtŋ es akp nyam a cɛ ana, blel -l’ocrm ɛl sosi sikpl ɛsɛl ɛmɛny -n’anm segb waw a cɛ e kok ɛm.
58010003	Nawrɛ ɛm a, segb waw amua b’ɔkn lakpo fɛŋ ɛl e sikpl a e low,
58010004	aŋke sed a lele sican ab ab eci mebl a k’ɔtum ɔnym sikpl tɛtŋm es.
58010005	Ow sosiɛm, wanci ab af eke Krist am ow wus af aŋa a, li dad Nyam ninɛ: Ŋ ibram segb waw lele sob ap ab kɔ ŋ kok sos megl nyam ɔŋ’m.
58010006	Mindey eke wɛl b’ofŋ lele mob ɛjeci fɛŋ eke wɛl b’ot ow waw egb ɔŋ’ŋ sikpl oc ap ec’a, ákplm’ŋ sos ɛm.
58010007	Ɛtŋ mi dad’ŋ m’ɛsɛ: Ɛm e Nyam, ɛm obi m’am ow ŋ ogŋ mi kok ŋ ec’erur, ɛs’elel eke wɛl nɔn ɛm e lís ɛw es ol e lɛl ab ɛm ab af.
58010008	Krist ikŋ anym dad ninɛ: segb waw, sob ap, mindey eke wɛl b’ofŋ lele sikpl oc ap e segb waw ab a e low in ákplm’ŋ sos ɛm. Ke ol ibrm eke wɛl ki kok segb waw amua fɛŋ cɛ.
58010009	Ɛmɛny Krist usr af ninɛ: m’am ow ɛm obi ŋ ogŋ mi kok ŋ ec’erur. Odad na am yɛgm eke n’am ɔny segb waw esig a l’ot es, ke l’úsr in ec’a usu.
58010010	Nawrɛ ɛm a, Jesu Krist kok Nyam ec’erur; l’ocr in sosi li wawr egb akp nyam coco sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci, ɛtŋ ow ɛm, li yɔyɔg ɛy e sikpl ab es.
58010011	Sica, sɛgŋ fɛŋ egb waw ɛs fɛŋ b’ow Nyam ec’any af kok juma; ɛtŋ li bi kok segb waw nɛny nyam a cɛ, gbɛkɔ ow el segb waw eke k’ɔtum ɔnym sikpl ocm es.
58010012	Krist ec’a gbɛ ow elm ɛbɛn, egb waw akp nyam a cɛ eke li kok a, el egb waw eke bi tɛtŋ sikpl es sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci. Sica li sig es Nyam e lidr abu af a
58010013	ɛtŋ n’am eku eke Nyam k’ot in ec’efnu a ok’r es akr ew.
58010014	Ob ap nyam ɛm cɛ, Krist ɔŋ agŋ a eke wɛl yɔyɔg sikpl es a, iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci.
58010015	Abŋ Lala yɛji am ɛlu ɔkm yɛgm ɛy dad ɛsɛ:
58010016	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: Kin sinm a eke mi b’ow mi kok ɛl ab sɛgŋ amua e jam a: Mi b’ow m’oc ɛm e sol a m’ɛlu ɛl ɛrm ɛm, ɛtŋ mi b’ow mi nɔn ɛl e sow tutr ab ɛm.
58010017	Ɛmɛny l’igŋ af ninɛ: Mi k’ow m’ɔknm ɛl ec’ów ɔbr ɔbr a lel ɛl e sikpl ab ab e low ij.
58010018	Sica eke wɛl oc sikpl ap a, ow ibram eke wɛl k’im kok ow ec’oc ap ec’egb waw ij.
58010019	Agŋ lisijimɛl, Jesu e mebl a eke ok es ɛy ec’a usur ɛy ɛrm eke si k’ɔwl abu s’im s’ok Nyam ec’ usu lala tasi a.
58010020	Ɛɛ, li kikn in e sos megl ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke li fíg ɛy ebr owr ek’el sel ɛŋn ec’ebr a. Ɛtŋ low na eke li kok a, otarir es ɛs’elel eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm, Nyamel ab ɛm e gbad a ek’am ɛdŋn agŋ eke k’im Nyam ec’any af a, agbr ɛm oc es ab af.
58010021	Ɛy, s’ɔny egb waw ɛs ligbɛl nyam ek’anŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a e nuŋ af.
58010022	Sica wɛl yɔyɔg ɛy ec’ɛrm ab ɛm ec’ów fɛŋ eke k’ok ɛy ów af ab es, ɛtŋ wɛl ok ɛy e sos megl a mij, mij lala tasi ɛm. Ow sosiɛm, si títmn Nyam ɛrm ek’ij nɛny nyam ke inym es kikri ɛy ec’ɔmn ab ɛm.
58010023	S’úcur ɛy e low ɔmn a eke s’ɛgŋ ow e low s’eb a s’ɔnyn es kikri, aŋke Nyam ɛwar ɛy ów ɛw es ɛtŋ s’uw any eke l’el cɛcɛ.
58010024	S’ɛ́warir nyamn af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow átr ɛy sos es s’ɔ́ny erur tasi ke si kók ów amamn.
58010025	Si k’ígŋn ɛy e luku a eke si b’as usu nyam a si k’ɛlul es, ɛsɛ elel eke ow ɛcm agŋ bɛb ab am kok ab af. Ow tasi eke si ki kok a el, ke s’átarir sos es ɛy ɔfr, eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci lɛgŋ a ow titm a sosiɛm.
58010026	Sica eke s’uw low nawrɛ any a, eke abu anŋ ɛy ɛm s’am ɛkn piɔ si kok sikpl, ke egb waw ɛjeci kaka anm eke b’ow ɔny ɛy e sikpl a oc es ij.
58010027	Low cɛ eke si ki kok a el, ke erŋn ab s’anŋ s’am eku eke Nyam e jɛj ok a k’ow lele al gbɛl a eke b’ow ŋuŋn Nyam ec’any ɔbr ɛsɛl ab ab.
58010028	Ɔ̀kan eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke ɛluam Mois ec’ol a batŋ agŋ yony oglog nyahan ij daŋku dad eke nawrɛ ɛgŋ a in ɛluam ol a, wɛl ócm apm’n, eke wɛl b’ibi’r.
58010029	Sica ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow yayr Nyam ec’Iy a, kɔ li k’ow n’ɛŋnm low agbm akm na ee? Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ na ɛluam mebl a eke wɛl oc kokr sinm a eke yɔyɔg in e sikpl ab es a. Ɛtŋ li wɛwr Abŋ Lala a eke b’ɔŋ ɛy s’uw Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ab any a.
58010030	Ɛɛ, s’uw ɛgŋ a eke dad ninɛ: Ɛm, mi b’usr ɛgŋ usu mi kok low ŋuŋ eke wɛl kok’r a, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ek’it eke k’ɛbm a! Li dad yɛj’eke: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow jɛj in ec’agŋ a e low ok.
58010031	Odad na am yɛgm ɛgŋ a eke bi yayr Nyam ek’anŋ owr a, e gbre ligbɛl eke b’ow ɛŋn a.
58010032	Sica ɔ̀kan yec’a ek’ɛy lɛgŋ sig ɛm a eke ɛŋan Nyam ec’usuayl a. Kpɛkŋ cɛ ɔbar gbre ijr nɔnɔ ɛtŋ inymn es kikri ɔmn ɛm itarir lɛc ɛm.
58010033	Sakp oglog, wɛl ɔny ow ɔny agŋ ec’any af wɛwr ɔny, kokr ɔny akpoto. Sakp bɛb ec’a, ɛgŋn ebr anŋn agŋ eke wɛl am ijr gbre akpasu na a jam.
58010034	Tasi ɛm a, ijr gbre agŋ a ek’anŋ sobel ɛm ab ab. Ɛgŋn ebr sos ɛm iŋn ɛm eke wɛl ki dɔgr ɔny ec’ob ek’ɔnyn a eb ɔny abu ɛm, aŋke ɔny uwr any eke ɔnyn ob ɔny ligbɛl ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
58010035	Ow sosiɛm a, àtar sos es! Ɔmn ɛm, b’ow ɛŋan ob ap ligbɛl.
58010036	Ow am ibrm eke k’ɔnyn ɛrm susu yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur kokr yec’a eke Nyam am erur a, ke ɛ́ŋan yec’a eke l’ɛwar l’ɛw es a.
58010037	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: ɛmɛny ow anŋ lɛgŋ tɛl, lɛgŋ tɛɛli cɛ, ɛtŋ Ɛgŋ a eke k’ow a, b’ow ow; li k’ow n’inŋnm ów ij.
58010038	Nyam dad ninɛ: Ɛgŋ yec’ek’el nyim nyim ɛm ec’any af a b’ow anŋ owr in ec’ɔmn a eke l’oc l’ɛlu’m ɛm a sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ eke li b’ɛwl mɛny li lɛr jam, mi k’ow m’ocm ɛm ec’ɛrm a m’ɛwm’n af ij.
58010039	Ɛy ec’a gbɛ, s’anm agŋ a eke b’ɛwl mɛny lɛr jam ke b’irm ab ɛm. Njaŋ, ɛy obi s’oc ɛy ec’ɔmn a s’ɛlu Krist ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke li sɔ́g ɛy.
58011001	Ɔmn el elel nyam eke wɛl b’uw any tasi eke low a eke wɛl am ɔmn a, wɛl b’ow ɛŋn; elel nyam eke wɛl b’ɛkn ów tasi eke wɛl ɛ́knm a.
58011002	Eke Nyam aw lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’agŋ a, ke ɛl ec’ɔmn a eke -n’ɔnyn a sosiɛm cɛ eci.
58011003	Ɔmn ɛm, si b’uw any eke odad ebl ɛm Nyam kok wus. Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, mob a eke wɛl b’ɛkn a el mob eke wɛl ot mob a eke wɛl ɛ́knm a kokr.
58011004	Ɔmn ɛm, Abɛl kok egb waw ek’akpl akm lisijim Kayɛn ec’a, ɔŋ Nyam. Ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛgŋ nyim nyim in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, aŋke ow ɛgŋ in ec’egb waw a eb. Ɛtŋ ɔmn a sosiɛm cɛ anake eke Abɛl uw a yɛji, in e low anŋ cɛ a.
58011005	Ɔmn ɛm, Enɔk uwm agŋ e luw ɛtŋ ŋgboŋ wus af aŋa im afr. Ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum ɛknm’n, aŋke Nyam oc ɛw’r in e saw a. Nyam Lɛl dad eke gbuŋ ke Enɔk in ím afr a, Nyam in íkŋ anym in oc ow ɛgŋ mamn.
58011006	Tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum elm ɛgŋ mamn Nyam ec’any af eke n’ɔnym ɔmn. Ɛgŋ eke bi titm Nyam a, it eke k’ub nawrɛ eke Nyam anŋ ɛtŋ agŋ eke b’ɔl’l es a, li b’ap wɛl ob.
58011007	Ɔmn ɛm, Noe ɛgŋ ów a eke wɛl ɛ́knm ke Nyam ikŋ anym dad’r ow e low a eb. Ɛtŋ li kok mijɛtŋ ligbɛl in ec’agŋ a ec’es eb ɛlu eci. Ɛbɛn a eke li kok a, ow yɛgm elel eke wus nimum ec’agŋ a akplm, ɛtŋ in ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm, Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af.
58011008	Ɔmn ɛm, Abraham ɛlum Nyam ec’ɛsŋ a eke ɛsŋ’n a. Ɛtŋ n’im usu nyam eke ow k’ɔŋ’n, él in ec’a; l’igb n’aam eke l’uwm yogŋ a eke n’aam ab any.
58011009	Ɔmn ɛm, n’im l’ir wus a eke Nyam ɛwar ir ow e low ɛw es ab af, ɛsɛ utu ɛgŋ af. L’ir ndey lɛl ɛm mel ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Isak lele Jakɔb ab eke ɛl yɛji, Nyam ɛwar low nyam a cɛ ɛw es a ir ab af.
58011010	Abraham am eku ɛb a ek’in eci misigrer a inym es kikri a. Ɛb a, Nyam in obi bɛbm in e low ɛtŋ us’r.
58011011	Ɔmn ɛm, Sara ek’el itr yɔw ke in ec’akpo a im anym nɔnɔ a yɛji, ɔtu ew iy, aŋke l’ucu low nyam gbɛ n’ɔny es tasi: Nyam e nɛny e b’ij a, li bi kok ow e low.
58011012	Abraham el ɛgŋ nyam eke usu toŋ luw ab yɛji ibnm. Gbɛkɔ ɔmn sosiɛm ɛgŋ nyam na ɛm, alaw nɔnɔ ɔtu ok ɔkm. Ɛtŋ in ec’alaw a ɛny ɛsɛ mílɛ́l ek’anŋ afr ab af, oglog ɛsɛ okij any e mirici ab af, toŋ wɛl k’ɔtum awlm ɛl.
58011013	Agŋ amua fɛŋ ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm toŋ uw. -L’ɔtum -n’ɛŋnm ów a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛl ow e low ɛw es a, gbɛkɔ -l’ɛkn wɛl akpoj ɛm toŋ ow iŋn ɛl sos ɛm eke -l’ɛkan wɛl a. Ɛtŋ -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb tasi eke -l’el etu agŋ, usu im ɛsɛl wus af aŋa.
58011014	Low ɛgŋ eb na ɛm, -n’am yɛgm kpata eke -n’am ɔl ɛb ir usu tasi ab es.
58011015	-Li tutrm ɛl ec’ɛb a eke -l’igŋn -l’ɛlul es a e low. Blel -li tutar ow e low ana, ke -l’ɔtu eke -li k’ɛwl mɛny n’im ɛm.
58011016	Nawrɛ ɛm a, usu sɔbɔ tasi a -n’am ɔl es, afr ec’usu a ek’anŋ a. Na sosiɛm, Nyam ɛ́s ɔnym eke wɛl k’ɛsŋ’n ɛl e Nyam. Tasi ɛm a, li kok ɛb nyam l’ɛw wɛl es.
58011017	-
58011018	Ɔmn ɛm, Abraham oc Isak eke ki kokr egb waw ɔŋ Nyam, lɛgŋ a eke Nyam erur eke k’ɛkn in ec’ɔmn a. Ow ikŋ anym dad’r ninɛ: Isak ɛm anake b’ow ɛŋn alaw eke b’ow ɛlu ŋ e nin a ɔkm a. Ɛtŋ eke Nyam ɛwar ir low na ɛw es a yɛji, Abraham ɛgŋ eb eke k’oc in ec’iy ekpɔbi a kokr egb waw ɔŋ Nyam.
58011019	Tasi ɛm a, li tutr l’uw any eke Nyam ɔny abusu eke k’igbm ɛgŋ luw ɛm; na sosiɛm, Nyam ɔwr jim ɔŋ’n, ɛtŋ ow anŋ ɛsɛ luw ɛm cɛ ow’n igb af.
58011020	Ɔmn ɛm, Isak ɛdŋ Jakɔb lele Esayu ab ɔwrɔ, ów eke anŋ anym b’ow ow a eci.
58011021	Ɔmn ɛm, Jakɔb in e luw e wanci af, ɛdŋ Josɛf ec’ey yony a ɔwrɔ. Ɛtŋ l’ucu in e kpama a n’ɔny es, l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus l’igŋ Nyam nuŋ.
58011022	Ɔmn ɛm, Josɛf in e sel ec’uwr ɛm, ɛwar eke Israɛl ec’ey b’ow ok ɔkm Ejipt, ɛtŋ li dad wɛl low yec’eke wɛl ki kok in eci ew ab ab a.
58011023	Ɔmn ɛm, Mois ɛs lele lis ab, oc ɛl ec’iy a eke -l’ewr ke akpl nɔnɔ a, lɔl es toŋ ow ij awl nyahan. Erŋn ɔnym ɛl eke -li k’ɔb ɛb ebu ec’ol a ek’ɛw ab es.
58011024	Sica eke Mois agb a, ɔmn ɛm anake l’erurm eke wɛl k’oc’r ɛsɛ Faraɔn jɔw ec’iy af a.
58011025	L’ɔtu cɛ eke li k’ij sikpl e sos ɛm iŋn ec’ɛb a sɛgŋ bɛb, kɔ l’ɛgŋ l’eb eke li k’ij gbre Nyam ec’agŋ ab ab.
58011026	Mois uw any eke Ejipt ec’ob ɔny a agb nɔnɔ. Gbɛkɔ, ɛ́gŋ eb wɛl ifn’ŋ ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl b’ow ifn Mesi ab af a, el low eke agb nɔnɔ ligbɛl akm Ejipt ec’ob ɔny a. Tasi ɛm a, lɛgŋ anym ɛm eci ob ap tasi a eke li k’ɛŋn a, n’am lɛr.
58011027	Ɔmn ɛm, Mois ŋgboŋ Ejipt ɛb ɛm, ɛtŋ l’urum Ejipt ec’ɛb ebu a ec’ɛrm bebl a. N’inym es kikri ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ek’am ɛkn Nyam a eke wɛl ɛ́knm ab af.
58011028	In ec’ɔmn ab ɛm, n’ɔŋ wɛl kok Pak ec’es gbɛgbl a, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ wɛl ibi mɛcɛb eb ow eci mebl a udu masany. Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a ek’ow eke k’ibi agŋ a, itŋnm Israɛl eyŋ ec’ey egŋ krɛkrɛ a abu.
58011029	Ɔmn ɛm, Israɛl eyŋ ubr okij ebl a ɛsɛ wus wɛwɛ cɛ ow’n el af. Ɛtŋ eke Ejipt eyŋ a wewrm ɛl ów eke ɛl yɛji k’ubr a, mij a ɛman ɛl.
58011030	Ɔmn ab ɛm cɛ, eke -l’iwar Jeriko ɛb a -l’ɛlulil ɛm sakp lɔbŋ a, ɛb a e mebn ɛm lakp a ɛr ok.
58011031	Ɔmn ɛm, Rahab egŋ ot yɔw a uwm Nyam ec’efnu ab ab, aŋke l’eb agŋ a eke wɛl ɛrm im es lɔl ɛm eke k’uw ɛb ab any a.
58011032	Ɛmɛny bla lowi m’ɔtu eke mi ki dad ee? Abusu k’ow ɛrum im es eke mi k’awl kpɛ kpɛ kpɛ Jedeɔn, Barak, Samsɔn, Jɛfite, David, Samiɛl lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ab ec’ɛgŋni nyam nyam ec’a.
58011033	Agŋ amua ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm ɛtŋ ow ɛm, nɔnɔ ogŋ ar eb sɛb anŋ ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛm. Bɛb kok yec’eke el nyim nyim a ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn yec’a eke Nyam ɛwar ɛl ɛw es a, -li b’abl sikukuma nɛny es.
58011034	-Li rirmn sal gbagba es, ɛtŋ lab ler ɛm ɔtum ibim ɛl. -L’ok ɔl kɔ -n’ɛŋn lɛc. Ar ogŋ e lɛgŋ ɛm a, -l’ɛlu ɛl e gbawru ij a ɔkm, -l’itr áru ɛjec’a imn jam eci.
58011035	Ɔyɔw ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm. Ow ɔŋ -n’ɛŋn ɛl ec’agŋ a ek’uw a, aŋke agŋ amua igb luw ɛm. Wɛl ɔnyn agŋ ɛjeci bɛb milɔlu ɛl ec’ɔmn a sosiɛm kɔ -l’ɛgŋm eke wɛl k’ɛlu ɛl es. Tasi ɛm a, -l’erur eke -li k’uw, ke -n’anŋ luw ab ɛm, -l’igb -l’ɛy sel ɛŋn tasi ab ɛm.
58011036	Agŋ likpr ɛgŋ wɛwr lele ŋgbre ɛm ec’ɔr a eb. Wɛl awŋ bɛb ŋgbraka ɛm ɛtŋ wɛl ɔny ok ɛl sobel ɛm.
58011037	Bɛb ec’a, wɛl ibi ɛl mebn ɛm, oglog wɛl ubr ɛl ɛm ekpr yony suku ɛm, oglog wɛl ibi ɛl lab ler ɛm. Bɛb b’anŋ aŋa ewl im ok yogŋ a, sus mob eke wɛl gigŋ mɛcɛb lɛl ɛm oglog sican lɛl ɛm, -n’ɔnym ob kaka; wɛl ijr ɛl gbre nɔnɔ ɛtŋ wɛl kok ɛl ów eŋuŋ nɔnɔ.
58011038	Wus ec’agŋ akplm eke agŋ kpasu na k’ir ɛl ɛm. -Li b’anŋ aŋa -l’ewl -n’im -l’ok yogŋ a, loj ɛm, mafɛny ɛm, mób lokm lele wus ɔmu ɛm ab.
58011039	Agŋ amua fɛŋ ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm; ow sosiɛm anake ow ij ɛl e nuŋ af e daŋku nimamn a. Gbɛkɔ, low a eke ow ɛwar ɛl ow e low ɛw es a -n’ɛŋnm,
58011040	aŋke ow bɛbm low sɔbɔ mamn nyam eke agb nɔnɔ ɛy fɛŋ ec’a ɛw es. Ɛtŋ ow erurm eke -li k’im toŋ -l’ok ɛl ec’ɔmn a e nuŋ eke si k’anm ɛm.
58012001	Agŋ amua na fɛŋ eke m’am dad ɛl e low a am ɛlu ɛl ec’ɔmn e daŋku ij ɔkm yɛgm ɛy. Ow anŋ ɛsɛ dedeku ligbɛl nyam eke ow iwr ɛlul ɛy ɛm cɛ af. Ow sosiɛm a, ɛy yɛji s’ígŋ low fɛŋ eke am ɛdŋn ɛy eci anym imn a s’ɛlu es, s’ígŋ sikpl a eke wiwrm ɛy ab a s’ɔwl. S’úrur es ɛrm susu ɛm es uru a ek’anŋ ɛy anym a.
58012002	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ si lɛ́ɛr Jesu. In anake li b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɔny ɔmn a, ɛtŋ li b’ɔŋ ɔmn a iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ. L’ɛgŋ olikŋ af e luw a l’eb l’uw ɛtŋ li lɛrm ɛ́s a ek’anŋ luw nɛnɛ ɛm a, aŋke n’am lɛr sos ɛm iŋn a eke wɛl bɛbm ɛw’r es a; ɛtŋ sica li sig es Nyam e lidr abu af yogŋ.
58012003	Ɛɛ, tùtar Jesu ec’elel a eke ɛgŋ sikpl ɛsɛl e sifn a ek’ɔny in e lís a e low eb a. Ow b’ow ɔŋ abŋ ɛm a sos k’ow ɔwm ɔny es ɛtŋ sos k’ow aam ɔny.
58012004	Tasi ɛm a, ɔny lele sikpl ab eci itarir ab ɛm, k’iimn toŋ k’okmn luw ɛm!
58012005	Kɔ ów ɔm e sodad a eke Nyam dad ɔny ɛsɛ in ec’ey af a, es jijal ee? Kin odad a: Ɛm Jim, eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ɛnym’ŋ abr, k’òc ow e low a k’ɛ̀w ow ɔnyn! Sos k’ɔ́w’ŋ es eke li b’ɛnym’ŋ abr!
58012006	Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛgŋ eke li b’erur a li b’ɛnym abr, ɛtŋ li b’ɛnym agŋ a fɛŋ eke li b’oc ɛsɛ in ec’ey af a abr.
58012007	Eke am ijr gbre, ke ɔny e low yɛgm eci, aŋke Nyam b’ot ɔny ɛsɛ in ec’ey af. Bogŋ ec’iy anake ɛs ɛ́nyam abr ab ee?
58012008	Eke Nyam ɛ́nyam ɔny abr ɛsɛ in ec’ey a pupukpaŋ af, ke ow anŋ ɛsɛ ow’n elm ɔny Ɛs ɛtŋ ɔny elmn ow ec’ey lokm af.
58012009	Wus af aŋa s’ɔny ɛy ɛsɛl, -li b’ɛnym ɛy abr ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji si b’ɛlum ɛl. Sica ayaf si k’ɔtum s’ɛluam Nyam ɛy Ɛs ek’anŋ afr a nana, bake s’ɔ́tu s’ɛŋn sel ee?
58012010	Nawrɛ, ɛy ɛsɛl a eci abr ɛnym a el sɛgŋ tɛl eci ɛl ec’elel eke -li b’ɛkan ów ab ɛm. Kɔ Nyam ec’a, ɛy e low nimamn eci li b’ɛnym ɛy abr, n’ɔ́ŋ ɛy s’el lala s’anŋ ɛsɛ in af.
58012011	Eke wɛl b’ɔb nuŋ am ɛnym ɛy abr a, ow íŋnm ɛy sos ɛm, sos nana ow b’ɔwr ɛy es. Gbɛkɔ ow b’im lɛgŋ anym ɛm a, agŋ a eke wɛl ɛnym abr ɛbɛn a, b’anŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm ɛtŋ b’ir ɛb nyim nyim.
58012012	Ow sosiɛm a, sabu k’ám ɔny, ɛtŋ ɔny ec’akr a yɛji k’úfŋ ɔny; kɔ àtar sos es nana, ke íman anym eci cɛ.
58012013	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, kòkr ejagb a eke b’ow ebar a inym nyim nyim, yec’ɛtŋ ke lakr ɔbr fɛŋ k’úŋm, kɔ ke nana l’ɛ́wl n’inym.
58012014	Ɔ̀ɔl agŋ fɛŋ ab ec’ɛrm es ɛy ɛm ec’ɛb ir es, ke íir ɛb nyim nyim eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm. Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke k’ow kokm ɛbɛn a k’ow ɛknm Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ.
58012015	Ɛ̀wr ɛrm ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ígŋm bibm eke Nyam b’ɔŋ’n a. Ɔny ɛm a, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́w low es lokm k’ɛli ɛsɛ likŋ lolo af ki ŋuŋn agŋ nɔnɔ in e lol ab ab.
58012016	Ke ɛbirir marɛm marɛm owi k’ánm ɔny ec’araŋn! K’ìfan Nyam ec’ów a ɛsɛ elel eke Esayu kok ab af. In eke ob ij lɔfu nyam sosiɛm, l’ɔl in e sigbɛl a l’ij a!
58012017	Ɔ̀kan eke ow b’ibn a, l’erur eke li k’ɛŋn ɛs ec’ɔwrɔ a, kɔ ow itr ɔwl’l. Li kok sɔrŋ, l’ikŋ ɔŋn eke ɛs k’itŋn ɛbr, kɔ l’ɔtum n’ɔɔm ow ow itŋnm ɛbr.
58012018	Ɔny, lɛgŋ na ɛm a, owr titmn Nyam, gbɛkɔ ow anm ɛsɛ ɔny lagŋɛl e low any af a eke ɛkn lɛgŋ sig ɛm ab af. Eke -li titmn Sinayi lafɛny a, yogŋ -l’ɛkn al ligbɛl a, ncebn ibr a, nyamgbrany a,
58012019	-l’iri krɔkr nyam ikŋ ɛtŋ lebl nyam yɛji ikŋ. Eke Israɛl eyŋ iri lebl na a, -ni ŋɔŋn Nyam eke ow kí dadm ɛl odad ow obi ij.
58012020	Nawrɛ, Nyam ɛdŋn eke wɛl k’ítŋnm lafɛny a abu, ɛtŋ eke ɛgŋ nyam itŋn abu a, ke wɛl ɔ́r’r mebn ɛm ibi’r, eke ow el ndey kprɔɔ itŋn abu yɛji, wɛl kók’r low nyam coco a.
58012021	Low a ɔny erŋn toŋ Mois in obi yɛji dad ninɛ: "erŋn ɔny’m toŋ sos am ufŋ’m."
58012022	Gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’a ow elm ɛbɛn, ɔny imn titmn Siɔn e lafɛny a, Nyam ek’anŋ owr ec’ɛb a, Jerusalɛm a ek’el afr eci ke yogŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl bubutɛ aam kok es gbɛgbl a.
58012023	Ɔny, imn titmn Nyam ec’ey krɛkrɛ a eke as luku, ke el agŋ a eke wɛl nɔn ɛl ec’en afr a. Owr Nyam eke bi jɛj wus nimum e low ok a ec’any af. Imn titmn agŋ nyim nyim a ek’iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ a.
58012024	Ɔny, imn titmn Jesu eke ok in e mebl ab es ɛy e sayl ec’a. Nyam ɛcr in ɛm ɔŋ ɛy sinm owr nyam, ɛtŋ Jesu e mebl a ɔny mbas nɔnɔ akm Abɛl ec’a.
58012025	Sica ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ke írir Nyam eke am dad odad a e low! Eke wus af aŋa Mois ɛwar Israɛl eyŋ, ke -l’ɛgŋm -l’irim a, -n’ɛŋn ow e gbre ek’anŋ ɛm a. Ɛy ec’a, afr ɛtŋ Nyam anŋ am dad ɛy odad. Eke s’am dad s’ɛsɛ ɛy e low anm ɛm, s’úw any tasi eke li b’ow li kok ɛy ow e low!
58012026	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Nyam e lebl a ɔŋ wus ufŋ. Yɛfɛnyna ɛm ec’a, kin yec’eke n’am dad l’ɛw es eke li b’ow li kok: Ɛmɛny lɛgŋ ɛjeci, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ wus ufŋ, ɛtŋ ow k’ow elm wus cɛ, kɔ afr yɛji.
58012027	Odad na eke el: ɛmɛny lɛgŋ ɛjec’a, kin ow e nyandrɛ: mob a eke wɛl kok ke ɔtu eke k’uŋ a, b’ow irm. Ɛtŋ ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛl a cɛ eke k’ɔtum uŋm a abusu anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
58012028	Sica ɛy, s’am ɛŋn gbreŋgbi usu a eke k’ɔtum ufŋm a. Ow sosiɛm s’ɔ́ŋ Nyam bia, ke si kók in owi sɛwl a eke li b’erur ab ɛm, es is ɛm lele ɛlum ɛm ab.
58012029	Tasi ɛm a, ɛy e Nyam a el al eke bi ŋuŋn ob.
58013001	Sica ow akpl eke abu k’anŋ ɔny ɛm ám eruririr ɛsɛ Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl af.
58013002	K’ìjal etu eb e low es, aŋke agŋ bɛb eb etu toŋ batŋ eb afr ɛrm ɛsɛl any uwm ɛm.
58013003	Ɔ̀kan ɔny lisijimɛl ek’anŋ sobel ɛm a e low, ɛsɛ sobel ɛm cɛ ɔny yɛji ɔny anŋn wɛl ab af. Ɔ̀kan ɛl a eke wɛl am ɔnyn milɔlu a e low, ɛsɛ ɔny cɛ anake wɛ’n am ɔnyn ɔny milɔlu ab af.
58013004	Ke agŋ a fɛŋ ɔ́ny mɛbi ec’ɛlum. Ke igŋ lel yɔw ab ec’es ɛru usu a nfaci ij owi k’ɛ́ym. Nyam b’ow jɛj agŋ a eke b’ɛbirir marɛm marɛm a lele agŋ a eke ɛbirir ke b’ij nfaci ab ab e low ok.
58013005	K’òcr os owi k’ucur any, sos ɛm iŋn ɔny yec’a cɛ ek’ɔnyn a eci. Tasi ɛm a, Nyam in obi li dad ninɛ: Mi k’ow mi walm m’ɛlum’ŋ es lɛgŋ kaka, mi k’ow m’igŋm m’ɛlum’ŋ es lɛgŋ kaka.
58013006	Ow ɔŋ s’ɔtu eke si ki dad ɔmn ɛm tasi s’ɛsɛ: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ el ɛm ec’abu ɛlum ɛs, mi k’úrum erŋn kaka, ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum kokm im low ŋuŋ.
58013007	Ɔ̀kan ɔny ec’anym ɛm ec’idr ɛsɛl a eke ɔb ɔny Nyam ec’odad a e kokoba a. Ɛ̀kan elel a eke -l’iir ɛb toŋ ke -l’uwr a, ke ébr ɛl ec’ɔmn a e lakr a.
58013008	Ow akpl e k’uwr any eke Jesu Krist ítŋnm: lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm, yɛfɛnyna lele sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab, in ec’elel a cɛ li b’anŋ.
58013009	Ki yɛ̀br low yɛgm mramra k’irmn ɔny. Sol ek’el ob ij ec’a éelm agŋ a eke b’ɛlum a low lɛgŋ kaka. Eke ow el bibm e si b’ɛŋn Nyam ɛm a b’ɔŋ ɛy s’ij lɛc, ke yec’anake akpl a.
58013010	Ɛy, s’ɔny egb waw usu, ɛtŋ egb waw ɛsɛl a ɔ́nym abusu eke k’ij ob eke b’anŋ egb waw usu yogŋ ow a. Tasi ɛm a, ɛl, Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm -li bi kok juma.
