58013011	Yogŋ, Jwifɛl ec’egb waw ɛs ligbɛl a b’oc mindey a e mebl a im ɛy usu lala tasi a sikpl es ɔny oc eci, ɛtŋ wɛl b’ot mindey a ok ɔkm im gbeŋ ofŋ.
58013012	Na sosiɛm anake Jesu yɛji uwm Jerusalɛm, ke n’im l’uw ɛb a e saw a, yec’ɛtŋ ke in e mebl ab ɛm, li yɔ́yɔg agŋ e sikpl ab es a.
58013013	Ow sosiɛm a, s’ókr ɔkm s’imn s’ɛŋan in gbeŋ yogŋ, s’ɛ́gŋn wɛl ijr ɛy gbre nɛnyɛmbri nyam a ɛsɛ in ec’ab af.
58013014	Wus af aŋa, s’ir ɛb nyam eke k’ow anm sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab ɛm, gbɛkɔ ɛy, ɛb a eke b’ow anŋ lɛgŋ anym ɛm a s’am ɔl es.
58013015	Eke ow el ɛbɛn a, ow akpl eke lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ, si k’ɛcr Jesu ɛm s’ɔŋ ɛy e kɔklm fɛŋ uyu im Nyam ec’any af. Na anake el ɛy ec’egb eke s’am waw a. Ɛɛ, ke ɛy e nɛny ɛm e bia fɛŋ eke b’ow anŋ ɛy ɔkm a, ɔ́ŋ in e nin a agb.
58013016	Gbɛkɔ k’ìjal es eke ki kokr low mamn ke cɛ́cr yec’a eke ɔnyn a, aŋke amua anake el segb waw eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm a.
58013017	Ɛ̀lumn ɔny ec’idr ɛsɛl a ke ísr es ɛl ec’any af. -N’am ɛw ɔny nyamn af aŋke ow it eke -li k’awl ɔny ec’ów -l’ok Nyam. Ow sosiɛm a, eke b’ɛlumn ɛl, -li b’ow -li kok ɛl e juma a sos ɛm iŋn ɛm. Eke ow elm ɛbɛn, -li b’ow -li kok juma a abr ɛny ɛm ɛtŋ k’ow ɛŋnmn low kaka.
58013018	Ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam ɔŋn ɛy. Ɛy s’uw any tasi eke si k’ɛknm low eke k’ɔŋ s’okr ɛy sosi ów af. Tasi ɛm a, sɛgŋ fɛŋ si b’ɔl low sɛnyn sɛnyn e kok es.
58013019	M’am ibrm ɔny atrm ɛm, ŋɔ̀ŋan eke mi k’ɛwl fafa m’ow ɔny ec’araŋn.
58013020	Nyam anake b’ɔŋ ɛy ɛrm es ɛy a. L’igbm ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ek’el mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs ligbɛl a luw ɛm. Ɛtŋ in e mebl a ec’egb waw a ɔŋ ɛy sinm nyam ek’ɔnym uwr.
58013021	Ke Nyam na sɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɔtur kokr low mamn, kókr yec’a eke li b’erur a! Ke l’ɛ́cr Jesu Krist ɛm li kok ɛy ɛm, low yec’eke b’aw’r a! In ec’el anygbɛl sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
58013022	Agŋ lisijimɛl, m’am dad ɔny eke k’irir ɛrm ɛw ɛm, sos es atr e sodad amua. Tasi ɛm a, lɛl a eke mi nɔn a ɔfum nɔnɔ.
58013023	Sica kin amani nyam: ɛy lisijim Timote anŋ sobel ɛm ɛy ɔkm. Eke l’ow fafa, in yɔny si b’ow s’ow s’ɛkn ɔny.
58013024	Ɛ̀sŋnin ɔny ec’idr ɛsɛl a fɛŋ lele Nyam ec’agŋ lala ab ab. Itali ec’agŋ a ek’anŋ aŋa a yɛji am ɛsŋn ɔny.
58013025	Ke Nyam ɛ́dŋ ɔny fɛŋ ɔwrɔ!
59001001	Ɛm Jak, Nyam lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ab e juma kok ɛs, m’am ɛsŋn ɔny fɛŋ ek’eel eb lɛw yony a eke ɔmu es wus na nimum af a.
59001002	Krist ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, eke b’ɔbar gbre, es abur akpasu akpasu a, ke sos ɛm íŋn ɔny, ánŋn ehe ɛm,
59001003	aŋke ɛsɛ elel eke ɔny yɛji uwr any ab af, eke ɔny eci Nyam ec’ɔmn a eke ɔnyn a b’akm ɛbm ɛkn es a, ow b’ɔŋ ɔny ɛrm susu ínymn es kikri.
59001004	Ìnymn es kikri kpɛkŋ low low fɛŋ ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny e low kok fɛŋ ɛm íyr nɛny igŋn nuŋ, ke k’ɔ́nymn low kaka fɛŋ ec’es abur.
59001005	Kɔ eke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam ɔnym sɛwr eke k’uw elel eke li ki kokr ke n’ínym es kikri ɛbm ɛkn owi ɛm a, l’íbrm Nyam, ke ow yɛ́gm’n, aŋke Nyam el ɛrm mamnu ek’ɔ́ɔm ɛgŋ ob kaka ŋkpɛs ɛm.
59001006	Gbɛkɔ ow akpl ke l’íbrm ɔmn ɛm, ke bɛbar k’ánm ɛm. Ɛgŋ eke bi bɛbar a, anŋ ɛsɛ okij e mra eke lɛf b’ɔny didm es ab af.
59001007	-
59001008	Ɛgŋ ikŋ na kí tutr eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɔŋ’n yec’a eke n’am ibrm a, aŋke l’el ɛgŋ eke ucum low nyam ɔnym es ke bi cɛcm any in ec’es an ɛm.
59001009	Ke Krist eci jam us ɛs ek’ɔnym ob a ntotŋ ók eke Nyam ɔny igbl’l ogŋ a sosiɛm.
59001010	Ke Krist eci jam us ɛs ek’ɔny ob a, yɛji sos ɛm íŋn eke Nyam ɔny is’r es a sosiɛm. Ow it eke li k’uw any eke in ec’ob ɔny a elm low kaka wus af aŋa, ɛtŋ in obi b’ow ɛc ɛs’elel eke suw mamn b’uw es kpab ɛy wus ab af.
59001011	Ɛsɛ elel eke ligbn b’afŋ ɔnyn suw, ke bi wɛwr in e dɔdɔ ab es, ke suw eci sakpl a b’irm a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam gbreŋgbi yɛji b’ow uw digŋ in e sijuma ok es.
59001012	Ehe él ɛgŋ eke b’inym es kikri ɛbm ɛkn owi ɛm a eci. Eke n’inym es kikri a sosiɛm Nyam b’ow ɔŋ’n sel a eke l’ɛwar agŋ ek’erur ir a.
59001013	Eke mɛju ow ɛgŋ ɛm a, ke li kí dad li k’ɛsɛ: "Nyam anake ɛju’m a", aŋke Nyam mɛju owi anm in ɛm. Ow sosiɛm l’ɛ́jum ɛgŋ kaka.
59001014	Sica eke ɛgŋ ɛy mɛju owi ɛm, ke in obi in obi ec’ów tutr eŋuŋ anake ɔŋ’n l’ɔgŋ meb a.
59001015	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ów tutr eŋuŋ eke b’anŋ ɛgŋ ɛm ow a, b’is ɛgŋ sikpl. Ɛtŋ ca eke sikpl a b’agb afŋn es a, ow b’ism ɛgŋ luw ab.
59001016	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, k’ɛ̀jurir ɔny sosi:
59001017	sob ap amamn fɛŋ b’anŋ Nyam ogŋ ow; Nyam ek’el usuayl eci kok ɛs a ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow; in ɛm low itŋn kaka anm; n’am titŋnm ɛsɛ usuayl lele ncebn ab af.
59001018	In obi l’erur, ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɛy sel in ec’odad ebl nawrɛ ab ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’él mob mob fɛŋ eke li kok anŋ owr a e krɛkrɛ.
59001019	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, sica ɛgŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ ígŋ lɔru es iri low ok es sos ɛm, nɔ́fr odad ke k’éblm ɛrm fafa,
59001020	aŋke ɛrm bebl b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ am kokm low ek’el nɛnyɛmbri nyam Nyam ec’any af.
59001021	Na sosiɛm, ìgŋn low ŋuŋ fɛŋ eke bi ŋuŋn ɔny ec’es an a ɛlul es, ke ébr ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, Nyam ec’odad eke wɛl dad ɔny ek’ɔtu eke k’eb ɔny ec’abŋ ɛlu es a.
59001022	K’ɛ̀jurir ɔny sosi ki dadr k’ɛsrɛ: "S’írir Nyam ec’odad a cɛ"; kɔ kòkr ɛsɛ elel eke irir ab af.
59001023	Kɔ ɛgŋ ek’am iri odad a ke ɔ́sum a, anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ek’am ɛkan in sosi akrɔŋnɔ ɛm elel eke n’anŋn,
59001024	ke ca li b’ɔny any l’oc es ke kpɛkŋ li b’ijl elel eke n’anŋn ab es a.
59001025	Kɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ɛw ol sɔbɔ a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ el lewi a ɛrm, ke b’ucu ɔny es, ke ám dadm ɛsmɛ: "m’íri cɛ", ke b’ɛw ɛrm af kok a, b’ow ɛŋn Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ in ec’ów kok ɛm.
59001026	Eke ɛgŋ bi tutr eke l’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ ɛs, ɛtŋ l’ɛ́wm ɛrm in ec’odad dad ɛm a, n’am ɛjur in sosi, ɛtŋ in e Nyam nuŋ igŋ a el ɔfr ɔfr.
59001027	Kin yeci ek’el Nyam nuŋ igŋ nawrɛ tasi Nyam ɛy Ɛs ec’any af a: ke ɛ́w uwiyŋɛl lele eŋnyɔw ek’anŋ gbre ɛm a e low ɛrm, ke ɔ́su sos wus na e sikpl owi ɛm.
59002001	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny ek’ɔnyn ɔmn ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist anygbɛl Ɛs ɛm a, kì jɛjr agŋ es.
59002002	S’óc low nyam si bɛbmn: eke gbreŋgbi nyam ok gbad mamn, ɛlu sika kpatrowa, ɛtŋ ow ɛy ɔny e luku as ec’araŋn, ɛtŋ gbɔru nyam yɛji ɛw mob ɛsn sos ow ɛy ɔny ec’araŋn,
59002003	b’ow ɔnyn gbreŋgbi a ec’ɛlum ligbɛl ɛtŋ b’ow ɔŋn in li sig es any ɛsɛl ec’usu a. Ɛtŋ sica b’ow dadr gbɔru a ɛsrɛ: "Ŋ, ìnym es afr, oglog sìg es wus."
59002004	Eke ow el ɛbɛn, ke ow elm agŋ am jɛjr es ab ee? Ow elm ów tutr eŋuŋ ana ee?
59002005	Ìgŋn lɔru es, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl: Nyam sɔsum wus na ec’ɔgbɔru a ot yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’el ɔmn ɛm ec’egbreŋgbi, ke -l’ij gbreŋgbi usu a eke l’ɛwar agŋ ek’erur ir a ec’aja.
59002006	Bla sosiɛm, bi kokr gbɔru sos keskes ee? Kɔ ow elm egbreŋgbi anake b’ijr ɔny gbre ke b’ot im ɔny jɛj ok usu ab ee?
59002007	Kɔ ow elm ɛl anake -li b’ifn nin mamn na ek’ijr ab ee?
59002008	Kin Nyam Lɛl ec’odad eke am dad: B’ow erur ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ɛsɛ ŋ obi af. Na, Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’ol gbɛl ana. Eke b’ɛlumn ol na a, ke ek’ow akpl a.
59002009	Eke ɔny ec’ów kok ɛm bi jɛjr agŋ es, ke sikpl anake am kokr a, ɛtŋ ol b’ow ɔb ɔny low.
59002010	Eke ɛgŋ b’ɔsu ol a, ɛtŋ l’ɔb nyam es a, ke l’ɔb ol a fɛŋ es ŋ̂.
59002011	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke dad ninɛ: k’íjm nfaci a, in cɛ li dad eke: k’íbim ɛgŋ. Na sosiɛm a, eke íjm nfaci ɛtŋ ibi ɛgŋ a, ke ɛluam ol a ana.
59002012	Dàdr ke kókr ów amamn ɛsɛ agŋ eke ɛl yɛji wɛl b’ow jɛj ɛl ec’ów ok ol eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ el lewi ec’ab af.
59002013	Ɛgŋ eke ɔnym sɔrŋ ikŋ a, in yɛji Nyam k’ow ikŋm’n sɔrŋ aŋke sɔrŋ ikŋ akpl akm jɛj ok.
59002014	Lisijimɛl, eke ɛgŋ bi dad ɛsɛ: "M’ɔny ɔmn", ɛtŋ n’am kokm ow e low a, ke ɔmn na b’ow eb ɛlu’l es ee?
59002015	Ɛtŋ eke ɛgŋ lisijim oglog lisijɔw nyam ɔnym ob sos ɛw lele ob ij ab,
59002016	ɛtŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam dad ɛl ninɛ: "Ìmn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm, ɔ̀gbur al, lok íy ɔny!", eke ɔɔmn ɛl yec’eke akpl sos megl ec’a, ke na bla ow b’ow eel ɛl ee?
59002017	Ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ɔmn yɛji, eke l’ɛlum in e low kok ɔkm a, ke l’uw ŋ̂.
59002018	Kin ow eke wɛl ɔtu eke ki dad ɛgŋ na! "Ŋ ɔny ɔmn kɔ ɛm, wɛl b’ɛkn ɛm e juma kok a. Yɛ̀gm im ŋ ec’ɔmn a eke juma kok anm ɛm a; ɛtŋ ɛm, m’ow mi yɛgm’ŋ ɛm ec’ɔmn a juma kok ɛm.
59002019	Ŋ yɛji ub nawrɛ eke Nyam nyam coco anŋ. Ow akpl! Abŋ eŋuŋ yɛji b’ub’r nawrɛ ɛtŋ erŋn b’ɔny ɛl -l’ufŋ."
59002020	Nyamb ɛgŋ, kɔ uwm any eke ɔmn eke juma kok anm ɛm a el ɔfr ɔfr ee?
59002021	Kɔ Nyam ocm ɛy lagŋ Abraham ɛgŋ nyim nyim in e juma kok ɛm, eke l’oc in ec’iy Isak n’im eke li ki kok egb waw ab ee?
59002022	Ɛkn eke ɔmn lele juma ab b’okr af juma kok ɛm, aŋke Abraham, in e juma kok a anake ɔŋ in ec’ɔmn a el ɔmn tasi a.
59002023	Ɛbɛn Nyam Lɛl ec’odad eke dad a iy nɛny: Abraham ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm, ow ɔŋ Nyam oc’r ɛsɛ ɛgŋ nyim nyim af, ɛtŋ ɛsŋ’n Nyam e lawl.
59002024	Sica ɛkan eke Nyam b’oc ɛgŋ ɛgŋ nyim nyim in e juma kok ɛm, kɔ ow elm ɔmn sɔny coco eke n’ɔny a sosiɛm.
59002025	Ɛbɛn ow ɛcr Rahab facyɔw a ec’a yɛji. Nyam oc’r ɛgŋ nyim nyim, lɛgŋ eke l’eb Ebre eyŋ a eke wɛl ɛrm ow es lɔl ɛm eke k’ɛkn ɛb a, ke l’ɛlum wɛl abu wɛl eb ejagb ɛjeci im a. Low na el juma ek’in ec’ɔmn a ɔŋ’n li kok.
59002026	Tasi ɛm a, ɛsɛ elel eke sos megl eke sel anm ɛm a el ob ek’uw ab af a, ɛbɛn nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ɔmn yɛji, eke juma kok ánm ɛm a, l’el ob ek’uw.
59003001	Ɛm lisijimɛl, k’èrurir ek’agŋ nɔnɔ ɔny ɛm k’el low yɛgm ɛsɛl. Uwr any eke ɛy low yɛgm ɛsɛl, wɛl b’ow jɛj ɛy ec’ów ok tuɔtuɔ akm agŋ fɛŋ ec’a.
59003002	Ɛy, ów nɔnɔ ɛm a si b’irm. Ek’ɛgŋ iram in ec’odad ebl ɛm, ke l’el ɛgŋ tasi ek’ɔtu eke k’ɔsu in e sos.
59003003	Si b’oc lowili s’ucu meb s’ɛlu gbaŋkɔ nɛnym eke li k’ɛlum ɛy; ɛtŋ lowili ab ɛm cɛ, si bi nyimn gbaŋkɔ a nimum.
59003004	Ɛtŋ mijɛtŋ ek’agb bɔbɔ yɛji, lɛf e lɛc a b’ɔny didmn es; nyimn ob likekli a cɛ eke nyimn ɛs a b’ɔny es a, anake b’oc im’n yogŋ eke l’erur a.
59003005	Nɛny yɛji ɛbɛn. Anm el sos megl ec’ob likekli nyam eke bi dad ów ɛgbɛl. Al mbɛbl yɛji b’ɛtul akp ligbɛl.
59003006	Anm anŋ ɛsɛ al af. Anm ek’anŋ ɛy e sos megl ɛm a, el low ŋuŋ kok fɛŋ ec’ob eke bi ŋuŋn ɛgŋ ec’owr anŋ ec’ów fɛŋ. Ɛtŋ low ŋuŋ fɛŋ eke wɛl bi dad a b’anŋ gbre ij usu ow.
59003007	Ɛgŋ ɔtu eke ki yɛgm mindey fɛŋ low ɛlum’n: ɔr o, mindey eke b’ɛri es lok lok o, lele ɔcn ab; ɛgŋ ɔtu ek’akm ɛl es.
59003008	Kɔ ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum eke k’akm anm es; l’el ob ŋuŋ ek’ɛgŋ k’ɔtum ɔnym es inyam es tiŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ, l’el sɛkp ŋuŋ eke b’ibi ɛgŋ.
59003009	Si b’oc anm ɛm s’ɛlu ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam, ɛy Ɛs bia. Ɛtŋ anm ab ɛm cɛ, si b’ofn agŋ eke Nyam kok ot’r es a.
59003010	Low mamn eci sodad lele ofn ab b’anŋ nɛny nyam ab ɛm cɛ ok ɔkm. Lisijimɛl, ow k’él ɛbɛn!
59003011	Mij nuŋ kaka anm eke in ɛm mij mamn lele mij ŋuŋ ab b’anŋ am ok ɔkm.
59003012	Kɔ likŋ nyam ɔtu eke k’ɔsu likŋ ɛjeci ec’ey ee? Kɔ okij ɛm ɛgŋ b’ɛŋn mij mamn ɛgŋ ee?
59003013	Kɔ ɔny ɛm a ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ek’el sɛwru, nuŋ ɛm ɔny ɛs ee? Ke l’ɛ́lu in ec’es an mamn a ɔkm, sɛwr lele frɔrɔ el ab ec’ów kok ɛm.
59003014	Kɔ ek’ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm nyamnɛyr ŋuŋ lele ŋkre ec’abŋ ab anŋ a, k’ɛ̀wr sos eke ɔnyn sɛwr, k’ɔ̀nyn low nawrɛ k’itŋnin.
59003015	Sɛwr akpasu na ánm afr Nyam ogŋ ówm; ow el wus na eci, ek’el agŋ ɛm eci, ke el agn eci.
59003016	Tasi ɛm a, yogŋ eke nyamnɛyr lele ŋkre ec’abŋ ab anŋ a, nɛny af okr ánm, ɛtŋ ów eŋuŋ fɛŋ b’anŋ yogŋ.
59003017	Afr eci sɛwr a el sɛwr mamn eke b’is ɛrm es ɛy, ɔ́nym low lɛc ɛm, ke b’ɔny agŋ okr af ɛrm es ɛy ɛm. N’ɔny agŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ ɛtŋ li b’ɛlu low kok mamn ɔkm. In l’elm ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛs, n’ánm ogog nyam.
59003018	Agŋ eke bi kok low fɛŋ ɛrm es ɛy ɛm a, b’ewl ɛrm es ɛy ɛl ɛm, ɛtŋ ow ec’ey eke wɛl b’ɔw a el es an mamn.
59004001	Bogŋ ów ɛsu lele mum ogŋ ab b’anŋ ow ɔny ɛm ee? Kɔ ow elm ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm eci sow tutr eŋuŋ ec’erur ɛm ow b’anŋ ow ee?
59004002	B’ɛwr ob ek’elm ɔny ec’a nyamn af ɛtŋ ɛ́ŋnmn; ob ek’elm ɔny ec’a b’aw ɔny, ɛtŋ ɔ́tumn ɛŋnmn, ow b’ɔŋ ɔny eel agŋ ibiu. B’ɛsur ów ogŋn mum, ɛtŋ yec’ek’am ɛwr nyamn a, k’ow ɛŋnmn, aŋke íbramn Nyam.
59004003	Ɛtŋ eke b’ibrmn yɛji ɛ́ŋnmn aŋke úwmn ibrm. Ɔny e tutr a b’el tutr ŋuŋ; yec’eke b’ibrmn a, ɔny e lís ec’erur e kok eci.
59004004	Ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, kɔ uwmn any eke, eke eel wus na e lawl, ke eel Nyam ec’efnu ee? Ɛgŋ eke b’erur eke k’el wus na e lawl a, el Nyam ec’ifnu.
59004005	Kì tutar eke ow el ɔfr ɔfr cɛ Nyam Lɛl am dad eke Nyam b’ogŋ uwerŋ abŋ a eke l’ɛlu ɛy ɛm a eci.
59004006	Ɛbɛn yɛji ɛmɛny Nyam ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔkm ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɛy abusu ek’agb akm low fɛŋ, aŋke Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Nyam b’ɔɔr agŋ eke b’ɛw sos a abr, ɛtŋ li b’ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔkm agŋ eke b’is es a e lís.
59004007	Ca gbɛ òcar ɔny sosi ɔŋn Nyam, ògŋn agn ar; ɛtŋ li b’ow l’uru l’ɛgb ɔny es.
59004008	Ɛ̀rir owr titmn Nyam, ɛtŋ li b’ow l’ɛri l’ow li titm ɔny. Sikpl ɛsɛl, yɔ̀yɔgr sabu ŋgbroŋn sikpl ɛm; ɔny eke bi cɛcmn any a, àyalil ɔny e mɛrm a!
59004009	Low dúdu ɔny, ìkŋn ɔŋn, ànŋn sɔrŋ ɛm; ke ɔny e miyɛr ifi ítŋn el ɔŋn ikŋ, ke ɔny e sos ɛm iŋn él sos es ɔw.
59004010	Ìsr es Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’any af, ɛtŋ li b’ow n’ɔny l’igbl ɔny ogŋ.
59004011	Agŋ lisijimɛl, kì dadr ów eŋuŋ k’okarir af; ɛgŋ eke bi dad low ŋuŋ ok lisijim af, oglog b’ɔb’r low kpɛkŋ a, bi dad ol ec’ów eŋuŋ, ɛtŋ b’ɔb ol low. Ek’am jɛj ol e low ok ke elm ɛgŋ eke b’ɛlum ol, kɔ in e jɛj ok ɛs anake am el a.
59004012	Nyam sɔny cɛ eke b’ɔŋ ol a, in cɛ l’el Jɛj Ok Ɛs; in sɔny coco l’ɔtu eke li k’eb l’ɛlu es ke l’íbi yɛji. Ŋ eke am dad ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ e low ŋuŋ a, ayaf b’ocr ŋ sosi ee?
59004013	Sica ɛ̀wr ɛrm, ɔny eke bi dadr ɛsrɛ: "Yɛfɛnyna, ow k’ɔdm efi, si b’ow s’im ɛb na ɛm s’ij lakpo nyam, s’ɔ́l an s’ɛŋn os."
59004014	Uwmn ɔny ec’efi ec’owr anŋ a ec’elel eke b’ow ɛcr ab any! Ɔny anŋn ɛsɛ jru eke b’ɛy, ke kpɛkŋ b’oc es ab af.
59004015	Kin elel eke ɔtur eke ki dadr a: "Eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛgŋ ɛtŋ s’anŋ owr a, si b’ow si kok ów a eke s’am aw s’eb a."
59004016	Ow eke ki kokr a anŋ, ɛtŋ am ɛwr sos, ɔbr nɛnym. Sos ɛw akpasu na akplm.
59004017	Na sosiɛm a, ek’ɛgŋ uw low mamn any eke ki kok ɛtŋ li kokm a, li kok sikpl.
59005001	Sica egbreŋgbi, ìgŋn lɔru es. Low dúdu ɔny, ìkŋn ɔŋn gbre a eke b’ow owr ɔny a sosiɛm!
59005002	Ɔny ec’ob ɔny a ugŋ es, ɛtŋ sisŋ ij ɔny ec’ob sos ɛw a.
59005003	Ɔny e sika lele ɔny e jɛtɛ ab ab ok adagra; adagra ikŋ na b’ow ij ɔny e daŋku ɛtŋ b’ow ŋuŋn ɔny e sos megl a ɛsɛ al af. Kɔ uwmn any eke sɛgŋ uwr, ɛtŋ am asr ɔny ec’ob ɔny luku ee?
59005004	Ɛgŋmn eke ki sɔgr ɔny e sɔgm juma kok ɛsɛl a labm. Ìgŋn lɔru es irir dedeku eke -n’am ɔŋ ɔny a: juma ɛsɛl eke b’ub ɔny ec’egb a eci ɔŋn ikŋ a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’el afr lele wus ab ec’ar ɛs ligbɛl a iri.
59005005	Anŋn wus na ijr ɛb, kokr ów ek’erurir. Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ mindey af ijr mob agbr, iir sinɔn ɔny e luw e lɛgŋ eci.
59005006	Agŋ eke kokm low ŋuŋ kaka a, ɔbr ɛl low, -li dogŋnm sos ɛtŋ ibir ɛl.
59005007	Na sosiɛm agŋ lisijimɛl, ùsurir ɛrm toŋ bake Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ów. Ɛsɛ elel eke egb ewl ɛs b’eku toŋ nyam krɛkrɛ lele es abal el ab b’an, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’úb egbey amamn a, ɔny yɛji èkur ɛbɛn.
59005008	Ɔny yɛji ùsurir ɛrm, ìnymn es kikri aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci mowrer a titm.
59005009	Agŋ lisijimɛl, k’èbal ɛrm k’okarir af, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam kí jɛjm ɔny e low okm. Jɛj ok ɛs a ow inym es lisany.
59005010	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔ̀kan kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eke dad odad Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm a e gbre ek’ij ɛrm susu ɛm a, ke ɔny yɛji kókr ɛbɛn.
59005011	Si b’aw ɛl eke Nyam ɛdŋ ɛl ɔwrɔ, ɛl ec’ɛrm susu a sosiɛm. Irir elel eke Job ij gbre ɛrm susu ɛm, ke ow e nuŋ ɛdŋ ɛm a Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam ɛdŋ’n ɔwrɔ a. Nawrɛ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam ɔny agŋ e sɔrŋ ikŋ, ɛtŋ li bi kok wɛl low mamn.
59005012	Sica agŋ lisijimɛl, ów a fɛŋ e mi dad ɔny a e nyam ek’ɔny any el: ke ɔny eci 'ɛɛ' él 'ɛɛ' ke ɔny eci 'njaŋ' él 'njaŋ'; kɔ k’òcr afr lele wus ab e nin ɛm, oglog akunda ɛjec’ɛm k’ijal k’okr ɔny sosi af, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ɛ́ymn Nyam e jɛj ok ab ɛm.
59005013	Sica ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ gbre ɛm a, ni ŋɔ́ŋn Nyam. Ɛtŋ ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ sos ɛm iŋn ɛm a, l’ɛ́gŋ ɛj li kɔklm Nyam.
59005014	Ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam anŋ ɔl ɛm, l’ɛ́sŋ Nyamel ɛm ec’ agŋ ekpekp a, ke wɛl ŋɔ́ŋn Nyam ɔŋ’n, ók’r mun nuŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e nin ɛm.
59005015	Ɔmn ɛm eci ŋɔŋn ikŋ na b’ow eb ɔlu a ɛlu es ewlm’n; Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ b’ow ɔny igbl’l ogŋ, ɛtŋ eke li kok sikpl yɛji, ow b’ow oc ap’r.
59005016	Ɛ̀gŋn ɔny e sikpl ebr ɔny ɔfr ɛm, ke ŋɔ́ŋan Nyam ɔŋanin, yec’ɛtŋ ke éwal. Nɛny nyam ɛs e ŋɔŋn mamn a b’ɔny lɛc nɔnɔ.
59005017	Kokoba ɔb ɛs Eli yɛji, ɛgŋ ɛsɛ ɛy af. Ni ŋɔŋn Nyam tuɔtuɔ in ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm eke nyam k’ánm, ɛtŋ wus ab af nyam anm toŋ ow ij akpo nyahan lele likpr ab.
59005018	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ni ŋɔŋn Nyam, ɛtŋ nyam an ɔŋ egb ɔsu.
59005019	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ek’ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam irm low nawrɛ ec’ejagb af, ɛtŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam oc ow’r a,
59005020	ɔ̀kan low na: ɛgŋ eke b’ow ɔny sikpl ɛs nyam oc es ejagb ŋuŋ af a, b’ow eb sikpl ɛs a ec’abŋ a ɛlu es luw ɛm; ɛtŋ sikpl nɔnɔ a eke ɛgŋ a kok a b’ow ɔny oc ap.
60001001	Ɛm Piɛr, Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛs, ɛm anake m’am awŋ agŋ a eke Nyam sɔsum ot a lɛl na a, ɛl a eke ɔmu es, ke am ir ɛb ɛsɛ etu agŋ af, Pɔŋ, Galasi, Kapadɔs, Azi lele Bitini wus ab af a.
60001002	Nyam Ɛs, ikŋ anym sɔsum ot ɔny ɛsɛ elel eke li bɛbm l’ɛw es ab af. L’ɛcr in ec’Abŋ ab ɛm li kok ɔny eel agŋ lala, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛ́lumn Jesu Krist, ke in eci mebl a áyal ɔny. Ke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a lel ɛrm es ɛy ab ab ɛ́ny bobn ɔny.
60001003	Si kɔ́klmn Nyam, ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’Ɛs! In eci sɔrŋ ikŋ ligbɛl ab ɛm, n’ɔŋ wɛl ewr ɛy ɛm Jesu Krist eci luw ɛm ek’anŋ igb a sosiɛm. Nɛnɛ ɛm anake s’am ɔmn low a eke b’ɔŋ ɛy s’anŋ owr a,
60001004	ɛtŋ s’ɔtu eke sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, si k’eku aja a eke Nyam ɛw es in ec’agŋ ec’a. Aja a, l’oc l’ɛw ɔny es afr, yogŋ a eke ow k’ɔtum uŋm, ikpim, iram a.
60001005	Ɛtŋ ɔny obi a, eke ubr nawrɛ a sosiɛm, Nyam ek’ɔny abusu a b’ɔsu ɔny, ɔny e sɔg eci. Sel ɛŋn ikŋ na, wɛl b’ow uw’r any sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a.
60001006	Na sosiɛm sos ɛm iŋn iy ɔny ɛm gbɔŋ, ek’ow it eke yɛfɛnyna ɛm ses babur akpasu akpasu a k’ɔwr ɔny sos es sɛgŋ tɛl eci yɛji.
60001007	Ses babur amua b’ɛlum ɔny ec’ɔmn e sakpl a abu ɛy ɔkm. Sika ɔtu eke k’uŋ, ɛbɛn yɛji wɛl b’oc ɛlu’l alm, wɛl ɛ́kn eke l’el caŋ. Ɔny ec’ɔmn a ec’a yɛji ɛbɛn. L’il an l’akm sika, gbɛkɔ in yɛji li b’ɛcr ɛbm ɛkn ɛm. Na sosiɛm anake, lɛgŋ a eke Jesu Krist b’ow ɛy ɔkm a, b’ow ɛŋan es susm, kɔklm lel anygbɛl ab ɔny ec’ɔmn a e sakpl a sosiɛm a.
60001008	Ɔny, Jesu ɛknmn in ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji b’erurir ir. Ɔny, ɛknmn in caca ɛm a ɛtŋ ɛbɛn yɛji b’ɔnyn ɔmn in ɛm. Na sosiɛm anake sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛliy ɔny ɛm a, sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl eke wɛl k’ɔtum dadm ow e low.
60001009	Sos ɛm iŋn ikŋ na ɔnyn aŋke wɛl sɔg ɔny. Na el ob ap a eke b’ɛŋan eke ubr Jesu nawrɛ a sosiɛm.
60001010	Sel ɛŋn ikŋ na, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɔl es ɛtŋ tutr in e lís e low. -L’ikŋ anym -li dad ob ap a eke b’ow ɛŋan a e low.
60001011	Krist ec’Abŋ a anŋ ɛl ɛm, ɛtŋ ikŋ anym ɛwar Krist eci gbre fɛŋ eke b’ow ij a lel ow ec’anygbɛl eke b’ow igŋ ab ab. Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl a ɔl eke k’uw lɛgŋ ab af eke ów amua k’ɛy a, lel ow ec’elel eke ow k’owr ab ab any.
60001012	Ɛtŋ Nyam yɛgm ɛl eke: odad a eke wɛ’n am ɔb ow e kokoba a, ow’n elm wɛl eci, kɔ ɔny eci. Sica, agŋ a ek’am ɔb Amani Mamn a eci kokoba a, cɛc ɔny odad a Abŋ Lala a ek’anŋ afr ow a ec’abusu ɛm. Ɛtŋ odad na, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɛl obi yɛji erur eke k’ɛpi mɛny es ɛm.
60001013	Ow sosiɛm, bɛ̀bmn sos low kok eci ke ánŋn any owr. Òcr ɔny eci low ɔmn a nimum ɛlul bibm a eke b’ow ɛŋan ab ɛm, lɛgŋ a eke Jesu Krist b’ow ɛy ɔkm a.
60001014	Ɛ̀lumn Nyam ke kí kokmn lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’ɔny ec’ów aw a ek’anŋ ɔny ɛm, gbuŋ ke uwr Krist any a e low.
60001015	Èel lala ɔny ec’es an nimum ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam ek’ɛsŋ ɔny a el lala ab af,
60001016	aŋke Nyam Lɛl ɛm wɛl nɔn: Èel lala, aŋke m’el lala.
60001017	Ɔny eci Nyam ŋɔŋn ɛm a, ɔny b’ɛsŋn Nyam ɔny Ɛs, in eke li bi jɛj ɛgŋ fɛŋ e low l’ok nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’elel eke kokr ab ɛm a. Ow sosiɛm, ìir ɛb Nyam eci muru ɛm sɛgŋ a ek’anŋ ɔny eke k’anŋn wus af aŋa.
60001018	Ɔny lagŋɛl ec’elel eke b’iir ɛb ke ebr a, low kaka anm ɛm. Gbɛkɔ ɔny uwr any eke Nyam ɛnm ob ligbɛl ɛtŋ oc sɔgr ɔny ɛb ir akpasu na ɛm. Ɛtŋ ow elm ob eke b’uŋ ɛsɛ sika af oglog ɛsɛ jɛtɛ ɛm af li sɔgrm ɔny.
60001019	Kɔ Jesu Krist eci mebl ek’il an ab ɛm li sɔgr ɔny. In eke l’el egb waw ek’anŋ ɛsɛ licɛbli ek’ɔnym low ɔbr ke itam ɛm af a.
60001020	Nyam ikŋ anym bɛbm ɛw’r es gbuŋ ɛtŋ kok wus nimum ɛtŋ ɔny eci nimamn sosiɛm, l’ɛlu ow ɔkm sɛgŋ na ek’el sɛgŋ es abal el ab ɛm.
60001021	Krist ɛm anake b’ubr Nyam ek’igbm’n luw ɛm ke ɔŋ’n anygbɛl a nawrɛ a. Kin low a sosiɛm eke b’ocr ɔny eci nawrɛ ub a lel ɔny eci low ɔmn ab ab ɛlul Nyam ɛm a.
60001022	Ɔny eci low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’ɛlum a ayal ɔny eke k’eruririr nawrɛ ɛm tasi ɛsɛ ɔny lisijimɛl ɔfr cɛ af. Ow sosiɛm, èruririr tasi ɛm ɔny ɔfr ɛrm lala ɛm.
60001023	Ɔny wɛl ewr ɔny ɛm ɛtŋ ɛm ewr owr na anm ob eke b’uw ɛm owm, kɔ ob eke k’ɔtum uwm ɛm. Ɛɛ! Ɔny wɛl ewr ɔny ɛm, Nyam ec’odad ebl a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel ke anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab ɛm.
60001024	Nawrɛ, aŋke Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: agŋ fɛŋ anŋ ɛsɛ suw af, ɛtŋ low fɛŋ eke b’ɔŋ ɛl -n’ɔny any a, anŋ ɛsɛ ɔgm suw dɔdɔ af. Suw b’uw es ɛtŋ suw dɔdɔ bi kpab ɛy,
60001025	kɔ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’odad ebl a anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Odad ebl na el Amani Mamn a eke wɛl ɔb ok ɔny a.
60002001	Ògŋn low fɛŋ ek’el low ŋuŋ, yadŋ ɔny, ɛnyɛmbri yony yony, nyamnɛyr lel ɛgŋ cak cak ab.
60002002	Ɛsɛ ey abu ɛm eke wɛl ew af, èrurir Nyam odad ek’el mɛny mij mamn a, yec’ɛtŋ ke in ec’ɛgŋ ɛm a, ágbr ke ɛ́ŋan sel.
60002003	Tasi ɛm a, Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: ɔny, tatr Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ anm ɛkan in e sided a.
60002004	Òwr titmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ek’el lebn a ek’anŋ owr ke agŋ igŋ ɛlu es a, Nyam sɔsum oc’r, l’ɛkn eke ow el sɔbɔ in ec’any af.
60002005	Ɔny yɛji, ɛsɛ mebn ek’anŋ owr af, èbr usu Abŋ Lala ec’êl a ec’us ab ɛm. Ow b’ow ɔŋ okar af eel egb waw ɛsɛl ec’eb eke wɛl ot ok saw, Nyam e juma kok eci, ɛtŋ b’ow kokr segb waw Nyam ec’Abŋ a ec’erur ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow eb Jesu Krist sosiɛm.
60002006	Ɛtŋ kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Mi sɔsum lebn sɔbɔ ek’il an m’oc, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛw’r es Siɔn ɛb ɛm ɛsɛ lɔy ɛm eci lebn af; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yec’eke b’oc ɔmn ɛlu’l ɛm a, sos k’ow ɔwm es lɛgŋ kaka.
60002007	Ɔny ek’ubr nawrɛ ec’a, lebn na il an nɔnɔ ligbɛl; kɔ agŋ ek’ubm nawrɛ ec’a lebn ɔfr ɔfr cɛ ow el: lebn a eke êl us ɛsɛl igŋ ɛlu es a ɛwl mɛny el êl lɔy ɛm e lebn tasi,
60002008	ɛtŋ l’el lebn eke b’eb agŋ akr lob eke b’ɛlu ɛgŋ wus. -L’ok wus aŋke -l’ɛgŋm -l’ubm Nyam ec’odad a nawrɛ, ɛtŋ na el low a eke Nyam bɛbm ɛl ec’a.
60002009	Gbɛkɔ ɔny, eel agŋ a eke wɛl sɔsum ot a, Ɛb ebu a ec’egb waw ɛsɛl a, agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a. Ɔny eel agŋ a eke Nyam sɔsum ot eke k’ɔb ów ɛgbɛl a e li kok a ec’amani. In l’ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’okr ɔkm ncebn ɛm, ke li nyímn ɔny in ec’usuayl sɔbɔ ab ɛm.
60002010	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɔny elmn Nyam ec’agŋ, kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a eel in ec’agŋ ŋ̂. Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, Nyam ɔnym ɔny eci sɔrŋ ikŋ, kɔ yɛfɛnyna ɛm a n’ɔny ɔny eci sɔrŋ ikŋ.
60002011	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔny eel etu agŋ ek’ir wus af aŋa lɛgŋ tɛl eci. Ow sosiɛm m’am dad ɔny: k’ùsr ɔny ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a eke b’ogŋ ɔny eci liy mum a jam.
60002012	Agŋ ek’uwm Nyam any ec’araŋn a, ɔ̀nyn es an nyim nyim, yec’ɛtŋ ke eke -li cicr ɔny yadŋ ɛm ek’ɔny kokr ów eŋuŋ, ke -l’ɔtu -l’ɛgŋ -l’eb -l’ɛkn ɔny ec’ów amamn a, ke lɛgŋ a eke Nyam b’ow ow a, -li kɔklm ow ec’anygbɛl a.
60002013	Ɛ̀lumn abusu ɛsɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ sosiɛm, ke ɛ́lumn ɛb ebu a aŋke l’el agŋ a fɛŋ ec’es ɛw,
60002014	ke ɛ́lumn in eci kpama ɛsɛl eke l’abul ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl eci low ɔb, lel agŋ amamn ec’aw a yɛji.
60002015	Yec’ek’el Nyam ec’erur a el ke ɔny ec’ów amamn kok a ábl agŋ ek’uwm low any eci nyamb ij a nɛny es.
60002016	Àan es ɛsɛ ewi af gbɛkɔ, ke ɔny eci lewi ij a k’élm gbad eke b’ocr lɔɔl ów eŋuŋ es. Kɔ ɔ̀nyn es an ek’el Nyam ec’ɔbɔwi ec’es an.
60002017	Ɔ̀nyn ɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’ɛlum. Èrurir ɔmn ɛm ec’ɔny lisijimɛl a, ɔ̀nyn Nyam eci muru ke ɛ́lumn ɛb ebu a.
60002018	Ɔny, akŋ juma kok ɛsɛl a, ɛ̀lumn es ɛw ɛsɛl eke bi kokr ɛl e juma a es is ɛm. Ɛtŋ ow elm ɛl a ek’ɔny ɛrm mamn ke el frɔrɔ a cɛ k’ɛluamn, kɔ ɛl a ek’el agŋ tuɔtuɔ a yɛji.
60002019	K’aw ke ɔny am ijr gbre ek’itamn eke k’ijr a, aŋke erurir eke k’eel cɛcɛ Nyam eci. Eke ów el ɛbɛn ke low sɛnyn sɛnyn ana.
60002020	Tasi ɛm a, blel ow el low ŋuŋ kokr, ke bogŋ ec’any ij b’ow ɛŋan ek’ɛgŋn ebr am ijr gbre ee? Kɔ ek’am ijr gbre low eku ɛm, low mamn eke kokr a eci, ke ow el low sɛnyn Nyam ec’any af.
60002021	Tasi ɛm a, low na ec’anake Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny a, aŋke Krist in obi yɛji l’ij gbre ɔny eci, ɛtŋ l’ɛw ɔny sɛwl es, yec’ɛtŋ ke ébr in e lakr a.
60002022	In li kokm sikpl kaka ɛtŋ in e nɛnym mɛju owi anm ɛym ɔkm.
60002023	In, eke wɛl wɛwr’r a, li wɛwrm ɛgŋ; eke l’ij gbre a, l’ijm luw l’okm ɛgŋ kaka af, kɔ l’oc in ec’ɔmn a l’ɛlu Nyam eke bi jɛj low ok nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm ab ɛm.
60002024	Olikŋ ab af, Krist in obi oc ɛy e sikpl a ubu sos af, yec’ɛtŋ ke sikpl ec’a s’úw, ke s’ír ɛb nyim nyim eke b’akpl Nyam sos ɛm. In ec’abi a anake ewlm ɛy a.
60002025	Tasi ɛm a, ɔny anŋn ɛsɛ mɛcɛb ek’irm af, kɔ sica ɔny ɛwal mɛny owr mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛs a eke b’ɛw ɔny eci liy nyamn af a ogŋ.
60003001	Ɔyɔw, ɔny ec’a, ɔ̀nyn es is ɔny ɛcɛl e lís, yec’ɛtŋ ke ek’ɛl ɛm a agŋ nyam nyam anŋ ek’ubm Nyam ec’odad a nawrɛ, ke ɔny ec’es an mamn ɛm, -n’ɔny ɔmn, ow k’elm odad ebl ɛm,
60003002	aŋke -li b’ow -l’ɛkn elel ek’ɔny ec’es an a el lala lele ɛlum ɛm ab a.
60003003	Ɔny eci sakpl a itm eke k’el sos af eci cɛ: ɛsɛ sin ec’ɔtu mɛwl ɛm, sika ɛm miyob lele mob sus ɛm ewi eci sus ab;
60003004	kɔ ke ɔny eci sakpl a él yec’a eke lɔl es ɔny ɛm a. Ɛrm frɔrɔ lele bɛtɛ ab anake el sakpl a ek’il an nɔnɔ ligbɛl Nyam ec’any af, ke íram a.
60003005	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, ɔyɔw nawrɛ ub lisɛl ek’ɔny ɔmn Nyam ɛm a, ɔny sakpl ikŋ na aŋke -li b’ɛlum ɛl ɛcɛl.
60003006	Ɛtŋ ɛsɛ Sara af, li b’ɛlum Abraham ɛtŋ li b’ɛsŋ ow: "Ɛm ɛgŋ gbɛliy." Sica, ɔny eel in ec’ɔyɔw oto, eke bi kokr low mamn ɛtŋ ɛ́gbmn low kaka fɛŋ es ɔnym ɔny erŋn.
60003007	Ɔyɔw ɛcɛl, ɔny yɛji, ɔny ec’ɔyɔw ab ab ec’ɛb eke b’ow ir usu nyam a, ɛ̀wr ɛl e lís e low any. Ow it eke k’uwr any ek’ɔyɔw el ob fuɛfuɛ. Kòkr ɛl e low ɛlum ɛm aŋke ɛsɛ ɔny af, -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn sel ɛŋn a eke Nyam b’ow ap ɔny a. Eke bi kokr ɛbɛn a, low kaka k’ow ɛdŋnm ɔny e Nyam ŋɔŋn a fɛŋ.
60003008	Uwr ɛm ec’a, ɔny fɛŋ ɔ̀nyn nɛny af okr nyam, ìkŋnin sɔrŋ, èrurir ɔny ɔfr ɛsɛ agŋ lisijimɛl af, ɔ̀nyanin ɛrm mamn, ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ís es lawl ec’any af.
60003009	K’òcr low ŋuŋ k’ɔbarir low ŋuŋ any; k’òcr wɛwr k’ɔbarir wɛwr any. Ow eke ki kokr a el: ke íbrmn Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a ɛgŋ a eci, aŋke na sosiɛm eci Nyam ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’ɔŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ɛsɛ aja af.
60003010	Kin yec’eke Nyam Lɛl dad: Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am erur eke k’ɔny ɛb ir mamn, ke úw ehe e sɛgŋ any a, ow it eke li k’ɛdŋn in ec’anm a ów eŋuŋ e dad, ke l’ɛ́dŋn in e nɛny a yadŋ ec’ɔny.
60003011	Ow it eke li ki kpab es low ŋuŋ e lís, li kok low nimamn ke l’ɔ́l ɛrm es ɛy es low any at ɛm.
60003012	Li kók ɛbɛn, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’anyamn a anŋ in ec’ey a eke b’ɔny es an mamn ab af, ɛtŋ in ec’ɔru a b’iri ɛl eci ŋɔŋn ebl a; gbɛkɔ agŋ a eke bi kok ów eŋuŋ a li b’atar wɛl ab.
60003013	Ek’ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm am ɔɔl low nimamn eci kok es, ke bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow kok ɔny low ŋuŋ ee?
60003014	Ɛtŋ eke, lɛgŋ nyam low nimamn eci kok sosiɛm am ijr gbre, ke ehe él ɔny eci! K’ɔ̀nyn agŋ eci muru ɛtŋ kì yɛbr ɛrm mij kok ɔny!
60003015	Gbɛkɔ ɔny ec’ɛrm ɛm a, sùsmn Krist sɔny cɛ es, eke l’el ɔny eci Kɔtɔkɔ a. Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, bɛ̀bmn otarir ɔny e low ɔmn a ek’ɔnyn a e low akr ókr agŋ a eke b’ow ibrm ɔny a.
60003016	Gbɛkɔ, ke ow él bɛtɛ bɛtɛ lel ɛlum ɛm ab. Ke ɔny ec’ów tutr ɛm a abr ɛnym k’ánm, yec’ɛtŋ ke agŋ a ek’am ɔnyn ɔny yadŋ a, ɔny ec’es an mamn Krist e jam us ɛm a, ɛ́s ók any.
60003017	Ow akpl eke tasi ɛm a, k’ij gbre low nimamn e kok ɛm, eke ow el Nyam ec’erur, ow a eke k’ij gbre low ŋuŋ e kok ɛm a.
60003018	Tasi ɛm a, Krist in obi ij luw e gbre agŋ e sikpl a nuŋ af, akp nyam coco cɛ eci; in eke l’el nɛny nyam ɛs a, l’uw ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke l’ót n’im ɔny Nyam ogŋ. In, l’uw sos megl e luw, gbɛkɔ Abŋ Lala ɛwl mɛny ɔŋ’n owr anŋ.
60003019	Ow ɛm a, n’im n’ɔmun in ec’any eb ec’amani ab es l’ok abŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ sobel ɛm a.
60003020	Ow el ɛl a eke lɛgŋ sig ɛm a ɔbr Nyam any a. Nyam ɔŋ in e low eku a am ibn, lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke Noe am kok mijɛtŋ ligbɛl nyam a. Agŋ tɛl cɛ anake ok mijɛtŋ ab ɛm, ke ɛcr mij ɛm eci ɛŋn sel a; ɛl fɛŋ -l’ij agŋ niwn.
60003021	Ów amua el mij ok nuŋ a eke b’ɔŋ ɔny sel yɛfɛnyna ɛm a eci mɛny ɛwr. Mij ok nuŋ na elm ɛy e sos megl af e sikpl a ec’es yɔyɔg eci, kɔ ke ɛ́gŋ eb ocr ŋ nimum ɛlul Nyam ɛm, ów tutr ek’ɔnym abr ɛnym ɛm. Ɛtŋ mij ok nuŋ na ɔtu el, Jesu Krist e luw ɛm ek’igb a sosiɛm.
60003022	L’uyu afr, n’anŋ Nyam e lidr abu af. Sica n’ɔny lɛc l’akm afr ɛrm ɛsɛl fɛŋ, lele mob fɛŋ ek’ɔny es ɛw lel abusu ab a.
60004001	Eke Krist ij gbre in e sos megl ɛm a, ɔny yɛji bɛ̀bmn sos tutr nɛnyɛmbri nyam ab ɛm, aŋke ɛgŋ yec’ek’ij gbre in e sos megl ɛm a ɔnym low sikpl ab.
60004002	Sɛgŋ ek’anŋ ɔny eke k’iir ɛb wus af aŋa a, k’ùsr agŋ ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a jam, kɔ ùsr Nyam e low e b’erur a jam.
60004003	Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, kokr sakp nɔnɔ agŋ ek’uwm Nyam any a e low e b’erur a. Ɔny iir ɛb ɛsɛ elel ek’erurir ab af, ɔnyn ów aw eŋuŋ, eel mar ɛgŋu. Eel ob iju ɛtŋ b’igŋn sinyam yadŋ ek’el nɛnŋn e mob a nuŋ.
60004004	Jam aŋa, agŋ amua low am iti any. Úsmn ɛl jam ij, ánmn ɛl e ec’ɛb ir suksuk owi ab ɛm ij, ɛtŋ -li bi wɛwr ɔny.
60004005	Gbɛkɔ -li b’ow -l’ayal ɛl ec’ów amua fɛŋ -l’ok Nyam ek’inym es eke ki jɛj agŋ ek’anŋ owr lel agŋ ek’uw ab ab e low ok a.
60004006	Na sosiɛm anake wɛl ɔb Amani Mamn a ok agŋ a eke caca ɛm uw a yɛj’a. Ɛbɛn a, eke -l’uw ɛsɛ agŋ fɛŋ af sos megl e luw a yɛji, ke sica -l’ɔtu -l’ir ɛb, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam am erur ek’agŋ k’ir ɛb ab af, Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
60004007	Ow k’ow ibnm ɛtŋ ow b’ow el low fɛŋ e nuŋ. Ow sosiɛm íir ɛb sos es ok ɛm, ke any ok ɔny es, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔ́tur ŋɔŋan Nyam.
60004008	Low tasi eke k’ikŋn anym kokr a el, éruririr ɔny ɔfr ɔny ec’ɛrm fɛŋ ɛm, aŋke erur bi tɛtŋ sikpl nɔnɔ es.
60004009	Èbr agŋ eke b’ow ɔny akŋ a, ke ow kakl k’ánm ɛm.
60004010	Ke ɛgŋ ɛgŋ ec’ob ap ek’ɛŋn Nyam e lís a, l’óc li kokr lawlɛl a fɛŋ e low. Ànŋn ɛsɛ juma kok ɛsɛl amamn eke b’ɔsu Nyam ec’ob ap eŋ eŋ ab af.
60004011	Ke ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn ob ap ek’el Nyam odad ec’a, él Nyam e nɛny af odad ɛs. Ke ɛgŋ ek’ɛŋn ob ap ek’el abu ɛlum ec’a, kók abu ɛlum ɛs e juma lɛc a eke Nyam b’ɔŋ’n ab ab. Ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɛŋn anygbɛl low fɛŋ ɛm Jesu Krist sosiɛm. In ec’él anygbɛl lel abusu ɔny ab sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn.
60004012	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ow k’ɛ́w ɔny any iti, ɛsɛ low ek’okr ɔny es af! Ek’anŋn ɛbm ɛkn eke b’otarir es ɛsɛ al ɛm eci ɛcr ab af. Al na anake b’ow ɛlu ɔny ec’ob ek’eel a ɔkm a.
60004013	Eke tasi ɛm anŋn Krist eci gbre ij a e low ɛm, ke ànŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ a eke b’ow ɛkan in ec’anygbɛl a yɛji, ánŋn ehe lele sos ɛm iŋn ligbɛl ab ɛm.
60004014	Eke wɛl bi wɛwr ɔny eke eel Krist eci jam us ɛsɛl a sosiɛm, ke ɔny ec’a ehe ligbɛl ana! Aŋke Nyam ec’anygbɛl ec’Abŋ a anŋ ɔny af!
60004015	Ke ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ kaka k’íjm gbre ɛgŋ e l’ibi, mil e liy, low ŋuŋ e li kok oglog ɛgŋ ec’ów eke l’igb l’ɛy ɛm sosiɛm eci.
60004016	Kɔ ek’ɛgŋ nyam am ij gbre kretiɛn e l’el a sosiɛm eci, ow itm eke ɛ́s k’ɔny’n; kɔ ke nana n’ɔ́ŋ Nyam bia eke li k’ɔtu l’ij nin na.
60004017	Aŋa anake el jɛj ok a e nuŋ ɔb a, ɛtŋ ow ɔb nuŋ Nyam ec’agŋ ɛm. Sica eke l’ɔb nuŋ ɛy ɛm, ke agŋ a ek’ɛgŋm ubm Nyam ec’Amani Mamn a nawrɛ ec’a, ayaf ow b’ow ɛcr ab ee?
60004018	Ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl dad ab af: Ek’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ eke ɛgŋ nyim nyim k’ɛŋn sel, ke ayaf ow b’ow ɛcr ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl lele sikpl ɛsɛl ab ec’ab ee?
60004019	Ow sosiɛm agŋ a ek’am ij gbre Nyam ec’ɛlum sosiɛm a, it eke k’ocr ɛl sosi ɛlul Nyam ɛl e Kok Ɛs ek’el cɛcɛ a abu ɛm, ke -l’ucu low mamn kok -n’ɔny es.
60005001	Sica, agŋ ekpekp a ek’anŋ ɔny ab ke bi nyimn Nyamel a anake m’am dad odad a. Ɛm obi yɛji m’el ɛgŋ likpekp ɛsɛ ɔny af. M’el Krist e gbre ij a e daŋku, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’anŋ anygbɛl a eke b’ow ɛy ɔkm a e low ɛm.
60005002	Ɛtŋ kin yec’eke m’am dad a: ɛ̀wr mɛbob eke Nyam abul ɔny a e low any. K’ɛ̀wr ɛl e low any ɛsɛ atrm ɛm af, kɔ erur tasi ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af. K’ɛ̀wr ɛl e low any os ɛŋn sosiɛm eci, kɔ eke ɛgŋn ebr a sosiɛm.
60005003	Agŋ a eke Nyam abul ɔny a, k’ɛ̀wr es ɛw lɛc lɛc ɛl ab; kɔ èel mɛbob a e sɛwl,
60005004	yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ a eke mɛcɛb ɔsu ɛsɛl ec’Es Ɛw Ɛs a b’ow ow a, ɛ́ŋan ob ap ek’el anygbɛl e tufɛ eke írmnm in eci jɛjn a.
60005005	Ŋgbafrɛ, ɔny yɛji, ɛ̀lumn agŋ ekpekp a. Ɔny fɛŋ, ìsr es ɛwr ekekey ɔny lawlɛl ec’any af, aŋke Nyam Lɛl dad ninɛ: Nyam b’ɔɔr agŋ eke b’ɛw sos a abr, kɔ li b’ɛlu in ec’ɛrm mamn ɔkm agŋ eke b’is es a e lís.
60005006	Ow sosiɛm, ìsr es ɛwr ekekey Nyam e lɛc a ec’ew, yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ a eke l’ɛw ab af, n’ɔ́ny l’igbl ɔny ogŋ.
60005007	Òcr ɔny ec’ɛrm mij ebr fɛŋ ɛlulil Nyam abu ɛm, aŋke li b’ɛw ɔny e low ɛrm.
60005008	Ɔ̀sur sos, ke ánŋn any owr. Agn ek’el ɔny ec’ifnu a, ɛsɛ kukuma eke am awŋn af, am did ɔny ɛtŋ am ɛc ɔl ɛgŋ eke k’ɛmn es.
60005009	Ìnymn es kikri ɔmn ɛm ke ákmn in es. Ke úwr any ek’ɔny lisijimɛl ek’anŋ wus nimum af a, am ij gbre nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛsɛ ɔny af.
60005010	Ɔny e gbre ij a b’ow ibn sɛgŋ tɛl cɛ eci. Kɔ Nyam ek’in ɛm bibm fɛŋ anŋ a, ɛsŋ ɔny eke k’owr anŋn in ec’anygbɛl a ek’ɔnym uwr ab ɛm, Krist ab ec’af okr ab ɛm. Ɛtŋ li b’ow li kok ɔny eel sɔbɔ, eel leg leg ke ɔ́nyn lɛc, ke sica wɛl k’ɔtum ɔnym ɛlum ɔny wus ij.
60005011	In ec’él abusu ɔny sɛgŋ fɛŋ. Amɛn!
60005012	Silas el ɛgŋ lisijim ek’el cɛcɛ. M’ɛcr in ɛm mi nɔn lɛl ikprli na, eke mi k’atr ɔny sos es ke mi yɛ́gm ɔny tasi eke Nyam ec’ɔwrɔ a tasi anake ucur ɔnyn es a.
60005013	Agŋ a fɛŋ ek’anŋ Babilɔn aŋa, ke Nyam sɔsum ot ɛsɛ ɔny af a, ɛl fɛŋ am ɛsŋn ɔny, ɛm jim Mark yɛji.
60005014	Ɛ̀sŋninin ɔny ɔfr, af ɛyarir ɛm lel erur ɛm ab. Ɛrm es ɛy él ɔny fɛŋ ek’okar af Krist ɛm a eci!
61001001	Ɛm Simɔ Piɛr, m’el Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs lel ɛrm ɛs ab, m’am awŋ agŋ a ek’ɔny ɔmn ek’il an ɛsɛ ɛy ec’ab af a lɛl. S’ɔny ɔmn na aŋke Jesu Krist el nɛny nyam ɛs; in l’el ɛy e Nyam lel ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ab.
61001002	Ke ɔwrɔ lel ɛrm es ɛy nɔnɔ gbɛl ab ánŋ ɔny ab, Nyam lele Jesu ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab ec’any uw tasi ɛm.
61001003	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ in ec’abusu ab ɛm, ɔŋ ɛy ów amamn fɛŋ ek’it eke si k’iir ɛb ke s’úcu s’ɔny’n es a. Tasi ɛm a, li yɛgm ɛy s’uw Nyam ek’ɛsŋ ɛy eke si k’anŋ in ec’anygbɛl a lel ɛrm mamn ab ab e low ɛm a.
61001004	Anygbɛl na lel abusu na ɛm ab, Nyam ɔŋ ɛy ów ɛgbɛl lel ów ek’il an, ke l’ɛwar ab ab. Na sosiɛm, eke ɛŋan yec’a eke l’ɛwar a, ɔtur eke k’ŋgboŋn ów aw eŋuŋ amua eke ugŋn wus na es ab ɛm ɛtŋ ɔtur eke k’ɔnyn ɛrm nyam coco Nyam in obi ab.
61001005	Ow sosiɛm àtar sos es ebr ów amua igŋn ɔny ec’ɔmn ab af: ìir ɛb low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm, ke úwr low eke Nyam b’erur a yɛj’any.
61001006	Ɔ̀nyan sos es, ɔ̀nyn low eku, ke úcur Nyam ɔnyn es.
61001007	Ìjr lawl ɔny ɔfr ɛm, ke ɔ́nyn erur yɛji.
61001008	Ów amua anake el sɛwl mamn eke k’ɔnyn a. Ɛtŋ ek’ɔnyn ɛl -l’agb ɔny ɛm, b’ow ɔnyn ɔmn eke bi kok juma ɛtŋ b’ow ɔtur uwr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist any tasi.
61001009	Sica ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɔnym ów amua anm in ɛm a, l’ɛ́knm es ɛtŋ l’ot any eflu es. Li b’ijl es eke wɛl yɔyɔg in e lɛgŋ sig ɛm e sikpl ab es.
61001010	Ow sosiɛm, agŋ lisijimɛl ɛmɛny àtar sos es, ùcur Nyam ec’ɛsŋ a ek’ɛsŋ ɔny a lel ɔny e sɔsum eke li sɔsum l’ot ɔny ab ab e low ɔnyn es. Eke b’iir ɛb ɛbɛn, k’ow ɛymn low ŋuŋ ɛm ij.
61001011	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, Nyam b’ow fig ɔny, gbreŋgbi usu a ek’ɔnym nuŋ eci lisany a gbada, gbreŋgbi usu a ek’el Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lel ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ab ec’a.
61001012	Uwr ów amua any god’ɛtŋ ɛtŋ b’inymn es low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a ek’ebr ab af. Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke ɛbɛn yɛji mi k’ɔkn ɔny ɛl e low sɛgŋ fɛŋ.
61001013	M’ɛkn yɛj’eke ow it akpl, eke mi k’ɔkn ɔny ów amua, eke m’anŋ owr wus af aŋa a, ke ám ɛwr ɛrm.
61001014	Ɛm m’uw any eke ɛm e luw e lɛgŋ titm, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist yɛgm’m m’uw any ab af.
61001015	Gbɛkɔ mi b’ow mi kok yec’eke m’ɔtu eke mi ki kok a, ke ɛm e luw a e jam a, ɔ́tur am ɔkan low yɛgm amua fɛŋ e low.
61001016	Tasi ɛm a, ow elm ów yadŋ ɛm, odad ebl eke wɛl tutr mɛwl ɛm, s’ɛlum ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ow abusu ɛm a, e low ɔkm si yɛgam ɔny. Kɔ ɛy obi ec’anyamn ɛm s’ɛkn in e sagb a.
61001017	Ɛɛ, n’ɛŋn anygbeŋ lel anygbɛl ab Nyam Ɛs ec’abu ɛm, lɛgŋ a eke ow ec’anygbɛl liplemu ab ɛm, ow ɔŋ’n l’iri odad na a: "Ɛgŋ na el ɛm ec’Iy e m’erur, ɛtŋ m’oc ɛm eci sos ɛm iŋn fɛŋ m’ɛlu’l ɛm."
61001018	Lebl ikŋ na afr ow anŋ ow, ɛy obi yɛji s’iri, lɛgŋ a eke s’anŋ Jesu ab lafɛny lala ab af a.
61001019	Na sosiɛm, ow ɔŋ ɛy ec’ɔmn a obn nɔnɔ kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ec’amani ab ɛm. Ow akpl eke k’ɛwr ɛrm af, aŋke ow anŋ ɛsɛ kɛniɛ ek’anŋ ncebn ɛm am iri, toŋ ke lɛgŋ ɛny ec’usuayl ów, ke ɛnyn ɛnyn eci lɛ́l a ɛ́kan ɔny e mɛrm ab es.
61001020	Ɛtŋ kin low ek’it eke k’uwr any: ɛgŋ kaka ɔnym abusu ek’in obi ɛm, k’otar kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl e sodad ek’anŋ Nyam Lɛl ɛm a, e low akr.
61001021	Tasi ɛm a, kokoba ɔb ɛs kaka ɔbm in obi ec’erur ɛm ec’amani, kɔ Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm anake kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ɔtu dad Nyam ec’odad a.
61002001	Lɛgŋ sig ɛm a, kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu ok ɔkm Israɛl eyŋ ec’araŋn. Ɔny ec’araŋn a yɛji, low yɛgm ɛsɛl ayadŋu b’ow anŋ. -Li b’ow mɛwl ɛm -l’ok ɔny wus ów yadŋ eci yɛgm ɛm, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’im toŋ -l’ɛgbr Es Ɛw Ɛs a eke sɔg ɛl a yɛji. Nɛnɛ anake -li b’ow -l’ɛsŋ es abur ow kpru ŋuŋn ɛl a.
61002002	Agŋ nɔnɔ b’ow igŋ ɛl ugŋ kok ów mramra ɛtŋ ɛl sosiɛm, wɛl b’ow yayr Nyam e low nawrɛ ec’ejagb a.
61002003	Ɛtŋ eke os ɛŋn e low am okr ɛl ɛrmij nɔnɔ a sosiɛm, -li b’ow -l’ɛju ɔny sodad ek’ɛl obi -li tutar ab ɛm. Gbɛkɔ ow anŋ ibn, ek’ɛl eci jɛj ok a am eku ɛtŋ gbre b’ow ɛŋn ɛl fafa.
61002004	Tasi ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl eke kok sikpl a, Nyam ɛwm ɛl es nɛnɛ cɛ, kɔ n’ɔny l’ok wɛl gbre ij usu a. Yogŋ n’awŋ wɛl ŋgbraka ɛm ncebn ɛm ɛtŋ n’am ɛw wɛl es toŋ ke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a ów.
61002005	Ɛbɛn nɛny nyam, lɛgŋ sig ɛm e wus ab af ec’agŋ eke kok sikpl a yɛji, Nyam ɛwm ɛl es nɛnɛ cɛ. Gbɛkɔ eke n’ɔŋ mij gbɛl a an ok wus ɛman agŋ eŋuŋ a fɛŋ a, li sɔg Noe ek’am ɔb kokoba ɛlu es an nyim nyim e lebl a lele agŋ lɔbŋ ɛjec’ab.
61002006	Ɛbɛn eke Sodɔm lele Gomɔr ab yɛji ɛŋn es abur ana. Nyam ɔŋ al ow ŋuŋn ɛl ɛtŋ ow el low eke k’el sɛwl agŋ eŋuŋ eci, ke ow yɛ́gm ɛl low eke b’ow ɛŋn ɛl a.
61002007	-
61002008	Ɛtŋ kin, Lɔt ir ɛb ów mramra ɛsɛl ec’araŋn, kɔ in obi ɛm a l’el ɛgŋ nyim nyim. Sos b’ɔw’r es nɔnɔ wɛl ec’es an ŋuŋ a sosiɛm. Tasi ɛm a, n’am ɛkn ɛtŋ n’am iri wɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ a fɛŋ ɛtŋ lɛgŋni nyam nyam fɛŋ, in ec’ɛgŋ nyim nyim ec’ɛrm ab ɛm, ow am ijr’r gbre. Gbɛkɔ Nyam sɔg’r agŋ amua ec’araŋn.
61002009	Ow am yɛgm eke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɔtu e ki sɔg agŋ eke bi kok cɛcɛ a gbre ɛm. Ɛtŋ l’ɔtu eke li k’ɛdŋn agŋ eŋuŋ a l’ɛw es, toŋ ke jɛj ok e lɛgŋ a ów, ke n’ɔ́ŋ wɛl gbre.
61002010	Li b’ow n’ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’an es, ɛl e sos megl ec’ów aw eŋuŋ ɛm a gbre. Agŋ amua ɔny ów nɛnŋn e kok ec’ɛmn, ɛtŋ -li b’ifn Nyam ec’es ɛw a. Low yɛgm ɛsɛl ayadŋu amua ɔnyn ɛl sosi ɔmn nɔnɔ. -Li b’ɛfu es ɛtŋ -l’urumn eke -li ki wɛwr afr ec’abŋ any ɛsɛl a.
61002011	Ɛtŋ kin afr ɛrm ɛsɛl bɔbɔ yɛji ókm abŋ amua ów af ɛtŋ -li wɛwrmn wɛl Nyam ec’any af. Ke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ɔny lɛc ɛtŋ ɔny abusu nɔnɔ akm low yɛgm ɛsɛl ayadŋu amua.
61002012	Agŋ amua anŋ ɛsɛ mindey ek’ɔnym nuŋ ɛm ɔny, ke wɛl kok eke k’ɔgŋ meb ke wɛl ibi ab af. -Li bi wɛwr yec’a eke -l’uwm any a ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’uw ɛsɛ mindey amua af.
61002013	Na anake el gbre a eke -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ a sosiɛm a. -Li b’erur -li kok ɛl ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a e low lɛgŋ owr fitaŋ. Ɛtŋ eke -li bi kok es gbɛgbl ɔny ab a, ow b’iŋn ɛl sos ɛm eke -li k’ɔny yadŋ -l’ok ɔny, ɛtŋ yogŋ eke -li b’anŋ a b’el nɛnŋn lele ɛ́s ab.
61002014	-Li bi gɛgŋm anyamn es -l’ɔl ɔyɔw nfaci ij eci, sɛgŋ fɛŋ sikpl kok owi b’aw ɛl ɛtŋ -li b’ɔdu agŋ ek’ɛw fuɛfuɛ a -l’eb. -L’el agŋ eke sɛgŋ fɛŋ os ɛŋn owi b’okr ɛrmij. Nyam ec’ofn a anŋ ɛl af.
61002015	-L’igŋ ejagb mamn a -l’ɛlu es ɛtŋ -l’irm. -L’eb ebr a eke Balam, Bosɔr jim a eke wɛl ɔŋ os low ŋuŋ kok ec’a eb a. Ɛtŋ Balam yɛb os a ɛju’r,
61002016	gbɛkɔ l’iri in e low ɛluam a ec’abr ɛnym a e low: gbaŋkɔ yɔw kpɛtɛŋ nyam eke ám dadm odad, dad odad ɛgŋ owr e lebl ɛm ɛtŋ l’ɛdŋn kokoba ɔb ɛs Balam eci nyamb owi a eke blel kok a.
61002017	Low yɛgm ɛsɛl ayadŋu amua anŋ ɛsɛ simij ɔmu eke mij anm ɛm ab af, -n’anŋ ɛsɛ jru ek’as luku eke k’an mij ok wus, ke lɛf ɛlu ɔny oc es ab af. Nyam ɛw ɛl usu es ncebn ibr ab ɛm.
61002018	Ɛɛ, ɛl e nɛnym es igŋ eci sodad a eke low kaka anm ɛm ab ɛm, agŋ a eke ow k’ibnm yɛji ŋgboŋ agŋ ek’am ir ɛb eke elm Nyam ec’ebr a ec’araŋn a, -li b’ɔdu -l’eb wɛl. Ow sosiɛm, -li b’ɛcr sos megl af eci ɛ́s ɛm ec’ów aw ab ɛm,
61002019	ɛtŋ -li b’ɛwar wɛl lewi ij. Ke ɛl obi a -l’el ów aw a eke bi ŋuŋn ɛl a eci madu. Tasi ɛm a, eke ob nyam b’akm ɛy es, ke in e madu s’el a.
61002020	Agŋ ek’uw Jesu Krist ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lel ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs ab any a, igŋ wus ec’ów ɔbr ɔbr a ok es, sica eke -li yɛb batŋ ów ɔbr ɔbr a ɛwl ɔdu eb ɛl ɛtŋ akm ɛl es a, ow b’ow ɔŋ ɛl eci manŋn el owi a b’ow ɛw marɛm akm lisig a.
61002021	-L’uw low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’ejagb ab any, gbɛkɔ -li wal Nyam odad lala a eke wɛl yɛgm ɛl a -l’ɛlu es. Ek’ow el ɛbɛn a, yec’eke blel akpl ɛl ec’a el ke -li k’uwmn low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ec’ejagb ab any.
61002022	Sica low na ek’ɛŋn ɛl a, am ɔŋ nyandrɛ odad na low ij: Ɔwr b’ɛwl im ij yec’a eke l’ɛgbl a ɛtŋ "gbroko eke wɛl ok mij a, b’ɛwl im fefl es kɔdɔg ɛm".
61003001	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, lɛl yony ɛm eke m’am awŋ ɔny ana. Ɛtŋ silɛl a yony mum ɛm, m’ɔkn ɔny ów a fɛŋ ek’uwr any a, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɛ́lum ɔny abu tutar ów sɛnyn sɛnyn.
61003002	Ɔ̀kan sodad a eke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl lala dad lɛgŋ sig ɛm a lele Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs e low yɛgm a ek’ɔny ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl yɛgm ɔny ow e low ab ab.
61003003	Ɛtŋ kin low ek’it eke k’uwr any: sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, agŋ b’ow ow eke b’ow ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a b’ɔŋn ɛl ab af.
61003004	-Li b’ow -li kokr ɔny miyɛr -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Jesu ɛwar ɛw es eke li b’ow l’ɛwl l’ow, kɔ yadŋ ee? Ɛtŋ sica bogŋ n’anŋ ab ee? Tasi ɛm a, ɛy ɛsɛl uw god’ɛtŋ, gbɛkɔ ów a fɛŋ anŋ ow ec’elel a cɛ eke ow anŋn god’ɛtŋ, wus eci nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ a!"
61003005	Odad nɛnɛ eci dad ɛm a, -li b’ijl low nyam es: ow ibn eke Nyam kok afr lele wus ab. Nyam in ec’odad ebl ɛm ɔŋ mij as luku ɛtŋ wus ɔtu anŋ mij ɛm ɛy ɔkm.
61003006	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny mij a cɛ, mij gbɛl a ek’iy eb es a cɛ anake ŋuŋn lɛgŋ sig ɛm eci wus a.
61003007	Gbɛkɔ odad ebl nyam a cɛ oc lɛgŋ na ɛm ec’afr lele wus ab a ɛw es, am eku lɛgŋ eke Nyam ec’efnu eci jɛj ok b’ow ɛy ɔkm wus aŋa a. Lɛgŋ ab anake afr lele wus ab yɛji b’ow ɛtu al ɛm a.
61003008	Gbɛkɔ erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, low nyam anŋ ek’it eke k’íjlmn es: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a, lɛgŋ nyam anŋ ɛsɛ akpo fandi af, ɛtŋ akpo fandi anŋ ɛsɛ lɛgŋ nyam af.
61003009	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ec’a, ow k’ow ibnm ɛtŋ li b’ow li kok low a eke l’ɛwar a. Agŋ nyam nyam gbɛ am dad ɛsɛ ow’n am ibn o! Kɔ low eku cɛ n’am ɔny ɔny e lís, eke l’erurm ek’ɛgŋ kaka k’uw kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ, ke n’am erur ek’agŋ fɛŋ k’ɔny abusu itŋn ɛrm ɛm a sosiɛm.
61003010	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e lɛgŋ a b’ow ow ɛsɛ ulu af, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ a, likekr ligbɛl ɛm afr b’ow irm, ɛtŋ in ɛm ec’ów fɛŋ ek’anŋ a, al b’ow ŋuŋn. Wus lel in ɛm ec’ów fɛŋ ab yɛji b’ow irm.
61003011	Sica eke ow el nɛnɛ ów a fɛŋ b’ow uŋ a, ɔny, ám ɛkan elel eke k’iirir ɛb a! Ow it eke k’ɔnyn es an lala, ke Nyam ec’es ucu ɔny a ám ɛy ɔkm.
61003012	Tasi ɛm a, ɔny am ekur eke Nyam e lɛgŋ a k’ow ɛtŋ am erurir eke li k’ow fafa. Lɛgŋ a, al b’ow ɛtul afr lel in ɛm ec’ów fɛŋ ek’anŋ ab ab iri ok es nimum.
61003013	Gbɛkɔ Nyam ɛwar afr owr nyam lele wus owr nyam ab, eke yogŋ agŋ a fɛŋ b’ow kok ów nyim nyim eke li b’erur a. Ɛtŋ yeci anake s’am eku a.
61003014	Ow sosiɛm a, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, lɛgŋ na ec’eku ɛm a, àtar sos es eke k’ítamn ɛm, ɔ́nymn abr ɛnym kaka, ke ánŋn ɛrm es ɛy ɛm Nyam ab.
61003015	Òcr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci low eku a ɛsɛ abusu ek’ɛru ɔny es eke k’ɛŋan sel af, ɛsɛ elel eke erur ɛm ec’ɛy lisijim Pɔl awŋ ɔny lɛl, nuŋ ɛm ɔny a eke Nyam ɔŋ’n ab ɛm, ke li dad ab af.
61003016	Low na anake ni nɔn silɛl fɛŋ ɛm eke li bi dad ów amua ec’odad a. In e silɛl ab ɛm, susu anŋ eke ow ec’iri a b’ɔtu, ɛtŋ agŋ ek’ɔnym low any uw kaka ke bi cɛcm a, am wuwal ow ec’iri a, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam Lɛl ɛjeci e susu bɛb ab ɛm yɛji -li bi kok ab af. Ɛtŋ ow b’el ɛl obi ec’irmn eci.
61003017	Erur ɛm ec’ɛm lawlɛl, ɔny ec’a, sica m’ɛwar ɔny ŋ̂. Ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm gɔŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke kí yɛbmn agŋ ek’ɔnym low ɛlum kaka a, irmnm ɔny ɛl ec’irm ab ɛm, bake írmnin ɔny ec’es a ek’uwr sig a.
61003018	Gbɛkɔ ɔ̀nyn es iman anym eci, bibm ɛm lele ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ɛy e Sɔg Ɛs Jesu Krist ec’any uw ɛm ab. In ec’él anygbɛl yɛfɛnyna ɛm toŋ godo godo fɛŋ eci! Amɛn.
62001001	Ɛgŋ a ek’in sosiɛm s’am nɔn lɛl na a, lɛgŋ eke wɛl ki kokm wus na yɛj’a, ke in n’anŋ ŋ̂. Low yec’eke s’uw any in e lís a el: ɛy s’iri in ec’odad, s’ɛkn’n ɛy ec’anyamn ɛm, s’ɛpr mɛny es gbiy s’ɛkn’n, ɛtŋ s’itŋn in abu. In l’el Odad eke b’ɔŋ agŋ sel.
62001002	Odad a ek’el sel a ɛy ɔkm, s’ɛkn’n ɛtŋ s’ij in e daŋku, ɛtŋ s’am dad ɔny sel ɛŋn ek’anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ a ec’odad. God’ɛtŋ n’anŋ Nyam ab, ɛtŋ sica l’ɛy ɔkm s’ɛkn’n.
62001003	Yec’eke s’iri ke s’ɛkn a, s’am dad s’ok ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɔny yɛji ókar af ɛy ab, ke ɔny lel ɛy ab s’ókr af si lool s’el nyam, Ɛs lele Jim Jesu Krist ab ɛm.
62001004	S’am nɔn ów amua s’ɔŋ ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn a él sos ɛm iŋn tasi.
62001005	Amani e s’iri in ogŋ ke s’am dad ɔny a el: Nyam el usuayl, ncebn kaka anm in ɛm.
62001006	Eke si bi dad s’ɛsɛ s’okr af in ab, ɛtŋ si b’an es ncebn ɛm a, ke s’el ayadŋu ɛtŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam anm ɛy ɛm.
62001007	Kɔ eke si b’an es usuayl ɛm, ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam in obi el usuayl ab af a, ke ɛy fɛŋ s’okr af ŋ̂, ɛtŋ Jim Jesu Krist e mebl a am yɔyɔg ɛy e sikpl fɛŋ es.
62001008	Eke si bi dad s’ɛsɛ: s’am kokm sikpl, ke ɛy ɔfr s’am ɛjurir, ɛtŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam anm ɛy ɛm.
62001009	Eke si b’ɛgŋ ɛy e sikpl s’eb Nyam ec’any af a, li b’ow l’oc l’ap ɛy ke li yɔ́yɔg ɛy eci ŋgɛsi fɛŋ es, aŋke l’el cɛcɛ, l’el nɛny nyam ɛs.
62001010	Eke si bi dad s’ɛsɛ: s’am kokm sikpl, ke s’ɛw Nyam yadŋu, ɛtŋ in ec’odad ebl a anm ɛy ɛm.
62002001	Ɛm ec’ey, m’am nɔn ów amua e lɛl m’awŋ ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke kí kokmn sikpl. Kɔ eke batŋ ɛgŋ nyam kok sikpl, ke s’ɔny ɛy e dogŋn ɛs nyam, Jesu Krist, nɛny nyam Ɛs, ek’anŋ Ɛs ec’any af.
62002002	In obi l’ocr in sosi li wawr egb ɛy sosiɛm, yec’ɛtŋ ke Nyam óc ɛy e sikpl ap ɛy. Ɛtŋ ow elm ɛy sɔny cɛ eci, kɔ wus na ec’agŋ fɛŋ eci.
62002003	Eke si b’ɛlum Nyam ec’ol a, ke ow ɛm a, s’uw any eke s’uw’r any.
62002004	Ɛgŋ eke bi dad ɛsɛ: "M’uw Nyam any", ɛtŋ l’ɛ́luam ow ec’ol a, ke l’el yadŋu ɛtŋ low nɛnyɛmbri nyam anm in ɛm.
62002005	Kɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ɛlum Nyam ec’odad ebl a, ɛgŋ a l’erur Nyam iy nɛny. Eke s’ɛlum’n ɛbɛn a, s’uw any eke s’okr af in ab.
62002006	Ɛgŋ eke bi dad ɛsɛ: "M’anŋ Nyam ab", ke li kók ɛsɛ elel eke Jesu kok ab af.
62002007	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ow elm ol owr mi nɔnm m’awŋm ɔny, kɔ ol sig a ek’ɛŋan kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ a; ol sig a ek’el odad ek’irir a.
62002008	Gbɛkɔ ow anŋ ɛsɛ ol owr eke m’am nɔn m’awŋ ɔny af. Jesu ɛm a, s’uw any eke ol a el nawrɛ, ɛtŋ ɔny e low kok ɛm yɛji ow el ɛbɛn. Tasi ɛm a, ncebn am oc es aŋke usuayl nawrɛ ɛy ɔkm ŋ̂.
62002009	Ɛgŋ eke bi dad ɛsɛ: "M’anŋ usuayl ɛm", ɛtŋ n’am ifn lisijim a, ke n’anŋ ncebn ɛm cɛ.
62002010	Kɔ ɛgŋ eke b’erur lisijim a, n’anŋ usuayl ɛm, low kaka anm in ɛm eke b’ow ɔŋ’n l’ɛy wus.
62002011	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ek’ɛgŋ am ifn lisijim a, n’anŋ ncebn ɛm, n’am an es ncebn ɛm, l’uwm usu eke n’aam ab any, aŋke ncebn efal il any.
62002012	Ɛm ec’ey, m’am awŋ ɔny ów amua e lɛl mi dad ɔny eke Nyam oc ɔny e sikpl ap ɔny Jesu Krist e nin a sosiɛm.
62002013	Ɛsɛl, m’am awŋ ɔny lɛl na, aŋke uwr ɛgŋ ek’anŋ god’ɛtŋ ab any. Ŋgbafrɛ oto, m’am awŋ ɔny lɛl na, aŋke ɔny akmn agn Low ŋuŋ ɛs es.
62002014	Ɛm ec’etuey, m’am awŋ ɔny lɛl na, aŋke uwr Ɛs any. Ɛsɛl, m’awŋ ɔny lɛl na, aŋke uwr ɛgŋ ek’anŋ god’ɛtŋ ab any. Ŋgbafrɛ oto, m’awŋ ɔny lɛl na, aŋke ɔnyn lɛc, Nyam ec’odad anŋ ɔny ɛm, ɛtŋ akmn agn Low ŋuŋ ɛs es.
62002015	K’èrurir wus na, ob ek’anŋ wus af aŋa yɛji k’èrurir. Ek’ɛgŋ b’erur wus na, ke l’erurm Ɛs Nyam ana.
62002016	Tasi ɛm a, low fɛŋ ek’anŋ wus af aŋa ɛsɛ: sos megl ec’ɛrm es ɛyr owi, nyamn e low e b’ɛkn ec’erur lele ob ɔny ec’es ɛfu ab a; ów amua fɛŋ, kaka ánm Ɛs ogŋ owm, kɔ wus na af ow b’anŋ ow.
62002017	Ɔ̀kan eke wus na b’ow ɛc lel in ec’ów aw eŋuŋ ab ab. Kɔ ɛgŋ ek’am kok Nyam ec’erur a b’ow anŋ godo godo fɛŋ.
62002018	Ɛm ec’ey, sica wanci es abal el a ow ŋ̂. Irir eke Krist ec’ifnu nyam in am ow. Sica jam aŋa Krist ec’efnu a ɛny nɔnɔ; na ɛm anake s’uw any eke ow el wanci es abal el a.
62002019	Ɛy ec’araŋn cɛ -n’anŋ -l’ok ɔkm, gbɛkɔ -l’elm ɛy ec’agŋ. Blel -l’eel ɛy ec’agŋ ana, ke blel -n’anŋ ɛy ab. Kɔ low na ɛy yec’ɛtŋ ke wɛl úw any ek’ɛl fɛŋ -l’elm ɛy ec’agŋ.
62002020	Ɔny ec’a, Krist ɔŋ ɔny Abŋ Lala ek’el ɔwrɔ e mun ek’ɛŋan. Na sosiɛm, ɔny amua fɛŋ uwr low nawrɛ any.
62002021	M’am nɔn lɛl na m’awŋ ɔny, ow elm low nawrɛ eke k’uwmn any eci, kɔ ek’uwr low nawrɛ any a sosiɛm. Ɛtŋ uwr any eke yadŋ owi kaka ánm low nawrɛ ɛm owm.
62002022	Kɔ bwo el yadŋu ee? Yadŋu el ɛgŋ a eke b’ɛgbr dad ɛsɛ: "Jesu elm Krist!" Ɛgŋ na el Krist ec’ifnu eke b’ɛgbr Ɛs lele Jim ab.
62002023	Ɛgŋ eke b’ɛgbr Jim a, ɛgbr Ɛs yɛji; ɛgŋ ek’ɛgŋ Jim eb a, okr af Ɛs ab.
62002024	Ke yec’a eke irir kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ a, ánŋ ɔny ɛrm ɛm. Eke yec’a eke irir kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ a b’anŋ ɔny ɛrm ɛm a, ɔny yɛji b’ow okar af Ɛs lele Jim ab.
62002025	Ɛtŋ kin ob a eke Jim ɛwar ɛy a; sel ek’ɔnym uwr.
62002026	Mi nɔn ów amua ɔny eci, agŋ ek’am ɔl eke k’irmn ɔny a sosiɛm.
62002027	Ɔny ec’a, ɔ̀kan eke Abŋ Lala ek’el ɔwrɔ e mun eke Krist ɔŋ ɔny a, anŋ ɔny ɛm. Na sosiɛm, ow ibram eke k’ɔɔl low yɛgm ɛs ɛjec’es ij, aŋke Abŋ Lala am yɛgm ɔny ów a fɛŋ. Ɛtŋ ów a eke n’am yɛgm ɔny a el nawrɛ, yadŋ kaka anm ɛm. Ow sosiɛm a, ànŋn in ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke Abŋ Lala yɛgm ɔny ow e low ab af.
62002028	Sica, ɛm ec’ey, ànŋn Krist ab yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ɛwl l’ow a, s’ɔ́ny ɛrm susu, ke in ec’ow ɛm a ɛ́s k’ɔ́nym ɛy, si kpabm es in e lís.
62002029	Uwr any eke Jesu Krist el nɛny nyam ɛs. Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ eke bi kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a, úwr any eke l’el Nyam ec’iy.
62003001	Ɛ̀kan erur ligbɛl eke ɛy Ɛs Nyam ɛlu ɔkm ɛy e lís, bake ɛsŋ ɛy in ec’ey. Ɛtŋ nawrɛ tasi s’el. Eke wus uwm ɛy any, ke l’uwm ɛy Ɛs yɛji any ana.
62003002	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, sica s’el Nyam ec’ey, ɛtŋ elel eke si k’anŋn a, ow k’ɛym ɔkm; kɔ s’uw any eke lɛgŋ eke Krist b’ow ɛwl ow a, si b’ow s’ɛkn’n gbeŋ, ɛtŋ si b’ow s’anŋ ɛsɛ in af.
62003003	Ɛgŋ ek’am eku ɔmn ɛm low akpasu na Krist ɛm a, am ayal sos ɛsɛ elel eke Krist in obi ayl ab af.
62003004	Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bi kok sikpl a ɔb ol es, sikpl e kok el ol es ɔb.
62003005	Kɔ ɔny uwr any eke Jesu Krist ow ek’ɔny sikpl oc es, ɛtŋ in ɛm sikpl kaka anm.
62003006	Ow sosiɛm, ɛgŋ eke b’okr af in ab a, n’am kokm sikpl owi ij; ɛgŋ eke bi kok sikpl a, ɛknm’n ɛtŋ uwm’n any yɛji.
62003007	Ɛm ec’ey, ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɛ́jum ɔny. Ɛgŋ eke bi kok low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a, l’el nɛny nyam ɛs, ɛsɛ elel eke Jesu Krist in obi el nɛny nyam ɛs ab af.
62003008	Ɛgŋ eke bi kok sikpl a, l’el agn eci, aŋke god’ɛtŋ agn el sikpl ɛs. Na sosiɛm anake Nyam ec’Iy ow yec’ɛtŋ ke ni ŋúŋn agn e juma a.
62003009	Ɛgŋ ek’anŋ Nyam ab a, n’am kokm sikpl owi, aŋke Nyam ec’odad a anŋ in ɛm ɛsɛ egb eke wɛl ewl af. L’ɔtum eke li ki kok sikpl owi ij aŋke l’el Nyam ec’iy.
62003010	Kin low yec’ɛm eke wɛl b’uw Nyam ec’ey lele agn ec’ey ab any a: ɛgŋ ek’am kokm low nɛnyɛmbri nyam, ke ɛmɛny érurm lisijim yɛji a, l’elm Nyam ec’iy.
62003011	Tasi ɛm a, kin yec’eke wɛl dad ɔny irir kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ a: ke s’érurir ɛy ɔfr.
62003012	Si k’ót Kayɛn ek’agn Low ŋuŋ ɛs ɔŋ ibi lisijim ab es. Ɛtŋ kɔ bla sosiɛm l’ibi ow ee? Eke in ec’ów e li bi kok a ákplm ke lisijim ec’a b’akpl a sosiɛm.
62003013	Agŋ lisijimɛl, ow k’íti ɔny any eke wus b’ifn ɔny.
62003014	Ɛy s’uw any eke s’ubr luw ɛm s’ɛy owr anŋ ɛm, aŋke si b’erur ɛy lisijimɛl. Ɛgŋ ek’ɔnym erur a, n’anŋ luw ɛm.
62003015	Ɛgŋ eke b’ifn lisijim a, l’el ɛgŋ ibiu, ɛtŋ uwr any eke ɛgŋ ibiu, sel ek’ɔnym uwr a anm in ɛm.
62003016	Kin elel eke s’uw erur any: Jesu Krist oc in e sel a ɔŋ ɛy; ow it eke ɛy yɛji si k’oc ɛy e sel s’ɔŋ ɛy lisijimɛl.
62003017	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam ɔny ob, ɛtŋ l’ɛkn lisijim ek’anŋ es abur ɛm, ɛtŋ l’ikŋm ow sɔrŋ a, ke ayaf Nyam ec’erur a anŋ in ɛm ab ee?
62003018	Ɛm ec’ey, eke si b’erurir ɛy ɔfr a, ke s’ɔtu eke si k’ɛlumnin abu, ke ow k’élm anm af e dad ɛm sɔny.
62003019	Eke si b’erurir ɛy ɔfr, si b’ow s’uw any eke s’anŋ Nyam ek’el low nawrɛ ɛs ab, ɛtŋ si b’ow s’ɔny ɛrm es ɛy in ec’any af.
62003020	Ek’ɛy ec’ɛrm a b’ɔb ɛy low, ke Nyam agb akm ɛy ec’ɛrm a, ɛtŋ in l’uw low fɛŋ any.
62003021	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, eke sica ɛy ec’ɛrm a ɔbm ɛy low ij a, ke s’ɔny ɛrm es ɛy Nyam ec’any af.
62003022	Ob kaka fɛŋ eke si b’ibrm’n a, li b’ow n’ɔŋ ɛy, aŋke si b’ɔsu in e sol a, ɛtŋ si bi kok yeci ek’akpl’l sos ɛm a.
62003023	Ɛtŋ kin in ec’ol eke n’am ɔŋ ɛy: s’úb Jim Jesu Krist nawrɛ, ke s’érurir ɛy ɔfr.
62003024	Ɛgŋ eke b’ɔsu Nyam e sol a, okr af in ab ɛtŋ Nyam yɛji anŋ in ab. Ɛtŋ in ec’Abŋ eke n’ɔŋ ɛy ab ɛm, s’uw any eke n’anŋ ɛy ab.
62004001	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ek’ɛgŋ b’ow ɛŋn ɔny ɛtŋ bi dad eke abŋ ec’abusu ɛm in bi kok ów yɛji, k’ùbr ir nawrɛ kpɛkŋ. Kɔ òkr any es ɛkan eke nawrɛ ɛm ɛl ec’abŋ a el Nyam ec’Abŋ, aŋke kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu nɔnɔ gbɛl ok ɔkm wus af aŋa.
62004002	Kin elel eke k’uwar Nyam ec’Abŋ ab any: ek’ɛgŋ bi dad ɛsɛ: "Jesu Krist el ɛgŋ ow wus af aŋa", ke ɛgŋ na ɔny Nyam ec’Abŋ.
62004003	Kɔ ɛgŋ ek’ɛ́gŋm ebm eke Jesu Krist el ɛgŋ eke wɛl ew sos megl ɛm a, elm Nyam eci. L’el Krist ec’ifnu a eke irir in eci mowrer e low a. Sica gbɛ l’ow wus af aŋa ŋ̂.
62004004	Ɔny, ɛm ec’ey, eel Nyam eci, ɛtŋ akmn kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ayadŋu ab es, aŋke Abŋ a ek’anŋ ɔny ɛm a ɔny lɛc akm wus ec’agŋ ec’a.
62004005	Ɛl, -l’el wus na eci, na sosiɛm -li bi dad wus na ec’ów eke wɛl bi kok ec’odad, ɛtŋ wus ec’agŋ b’iri ɛl e low, ɛgŋ eb.
62004006	Ɛy, s’el Nyam ec’agŋ. Ɛgŋ ek’uw Nyam any a, b’iri ɛy e low. Ɛgŋ ek’uwm Nyam any a írim ɛy e low. Na ɛm si b’uw low nawrɛ ec’Abŋ lele yadŋ ec’abŋ ab any.
62004007	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, s’érurir ɛy ɔfr, aŋke Nyam ogŋ erur b’anŋ ow; ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ɔny erur a, el Nyam ec’iy ɛtŋ l’uw Nyam any.
62004008	Ɛgŋ ek’érurm a uwm Nyam any, aŋke Nyam el erur.
62004009	Kin elel eke Nyam ec’erur a ɛy ɔkm ɛy e lís: l’ɛrm in ec’Iy ekpɔbi a ow wus af aŋa, yec’ɛtŋ ke s’ɛ́ŋn sel in ɛm.
62004010	Ɛtŋ erur a el: ow elm ɛy eke s’erur Nyam a eci, kɔ Nyam in obi l’erur ɛy ɛtŋ l’ɛrm in ec’Iy a ow, ocr in sosi kokr egb waw uw ɛy e sikpl ec’oc ap sosiɛm.
62004011	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, eke Nyam erur ɛy ɛbɛn a, ɛy yɛji ow it ke s’érurir ɛy ɔfr.
62004012	Ɛgŋ kaka ɛknm Nyam; gbɛkɔ eke si b’erurir ɛy ɔfr a, Nyam anŋ ɛy ab, ɛtŋ in ec’erur a b’ɛy ɔkm tasi ɛy ɛm.
62004013	Kin elel eke s’uw any eke s’anŋ in ab, ɛtŋ in yɛji n’anŋ ɛy ab: n’ɔŋ ɛy in ec’Abŋ a.
62004014	Ɛtŋ ɛy s’ɛkn ɛtŋ s’am dad eke nawrɛ, Ɛs ɛrm Jim ow el wus na ec’agŋ ec’Eb Ɛs.
62004015	Ɛgŋ eke b’ɛgŋ eb eke Jesu el Nyam ec’Iy a, Nyam anŋ in ab ɛtŋ in yɛji n’anŋ Nyam ab.
62004016	Ɛtŋ ɛy s’uw erur eke Nyam ɔny ɛy ec’ab any, ɛtŋ s’ub erur a e low nawrɛ; Nyam el erur. Ɛgŋ ek’ɔny erur a anŋ Nyam ab, ɛtŋ in yɛji Nyam anŋ in ab.
62004017	Eke erur iy nɛny igŋ nuŋ ɛy ɛm a, si b’ow s’ɔny ɛrm susu lɛgŋ a eke si b’ow s’im Nyam ec’any af jɛj ok ɛm a. S’ɔtu eke si k’ɔny ɛrm susu ikŋ na, aŋke wus af aŋa, ɛy eci ɛb ir a otarir es Jesu Krist ec’ab ab.
62004018	Ek’ɛgŋ b’ɔny erur a, l’úrum erŋn ij. Erur tasi a b’ogŋ erŋn. Ek’am tutr eke wɛl b’ow ɔb’ŋ low jɛj ok ɛm a, ke ám uru erŋn. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ eke b’uru erŋn a, ɔnym erur tasi.
62004019	Kɔ ɛy s’ɔny erur aŋke Nyam ikŋ anym erur ɛy.
62004020	Ek’ɛgŋ bi dad ɛsɛ: "m’erur Nyam" ɛtŋ n’am ifn lisijim a, ke l’el yadŋu; tasi ɛm a, ɛgŋ ek’erurm lisijim eke n’am ɛkn a, ayaf li b’ow l’ɔtu l’erur Nyam eke l’ɛ́knm ab ee?
62004021	Ɛtŋ kin ol eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛy: ɛgŋ eke b’erur Nyam a, ke l’érur lisijim yɛji.
62005001	Ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’ub nawrɛ eke Jesu el Krist a, el Nyam ec’iy. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’am erur Ɛs Nyam a, am erur in ec’ey a yɛji.
62005002	Eke s’am erur Nyam ɛtŋ s’am ɔsu in e sol a, ke s’úw any eke s’am erur Nyam ec’ey a yɛji.
62005003	Nyam ec’erur a anŋ in e sol a ec’ɔsu ɛm. Ɛtŋ in e sol a ɔ́tum,
62005004	aŋke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’el Nyam ec’iy a akm wus es; ɛtŋ ɛy ec’ɔmn e s’ɔny Nyam ɛm a anake b’akm wus es a.
62005005	Bwo ec’ɛgŋ akm wus es, ek’ow elm ɛgŋ a ek’ub nawrɛ eke Jesu el Nyam ec’Iy ab ee?
62005006	Jesu Krist in obi ow wus af aŋa, wɛl ok’r mij nuŋ, ɛtŋ l’uw l’ok mebl es; l’ɛcr mij ok nuŋ ɛm, l’uw l’ok mebl es ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af; ów yony na ɛm, Abŋ Lala ij daŋku eke ów amua el nawrɛ, aŋke Abŋ Lala ɔ́nym yadŋ.
62005007	Ów nyahan anŋ eke okr af am ij daŋku nyam:
62005008	Abŋ Lala, mij lele mebl ab.
62005009	Si b’ɛgŋ agŋ e daŋku ij a s’eb, kɔ Nyam e daŋku ij a agb akm agŋ ec’a, aŋke Nyam in obi ij daŋku Jim e nuŋ af.
62005010	Ɛgŋ ek’ub Nyam Jim nawrɛ a, daŋku ij na anŋ in ɛm; ɛgŋ ek’ubm nawrɛ a b’ɔb Nyam yadŋ, aŋke l’ubm Nyam e daŋku ek’ij Jim e nuŋ af a nawrɛ.
62005011	Ɛtŋ daŋku ij a el: Nyam ɔŋ ɛy sel ek’ɔnym nuŋ, ɛtŋ sel a anŋ Jim ɛm.
62005012	Ɛgŋ ek’eb Jim a ɛŋn sel; ɛgŋ ek’ebm Jim a ɛŋnm sel.
62005013	M’am nɔn ów amua m’ɔŋ ɔny, yec’ɛtŋ ke úwr any eke, ek’am ubr Nyam ec’Iy a nawrɛ a, ke ɛŋan sel ek’ɔnym nuŋ.
62005014	Eke si b’im in ogŋ, ke s’ɔny lokm susu, aŋke low fɛŋ eke si b’ow s’ibrm in ec’erur ɛm a, li b’ow l’iri ɛy lebl.
62005015	Ɛtŋ eke s’uw any eke li b’iri ɛy lebl a, ke ob fɛŋ eke si b’ow s’ibrm’n a, s’úw any eke s’ɛŋn ŋ̂.
62005016	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am ɛkn lisijim ek’am kok sikpl ek’elm luw ec’a, ni ŋɔ́ŋn Nyam, ke Nyam ɔ́ŋ lisijim na sel. Na ow el agŋ eke bi kok sikpl ek’elm luw ec’a e lís e low. Gbɛkɔ sikpl nyam anŋ ek’el luw eci; ow elm sikpl ikŋ na eci Nyam m’ɛsmɛ ŋɔŋan.
62005017	Low ŋuŋ fɛŋ eke wɛl bi kok Nyam e lís a el sikpl. Gbɛkɔ ow elm sikpl fɛŋ ísam ɛgŋ luw ab.
62005018	S’uw any eke ɛgŋ fɛŋ ek’el Nyam ec’iy a, am kokm sikpl, aŋke Nyam Jim Jesu Krist b’ɔsu’r, ɛtŋ agn ɛ́ŋnm’n.
62005019	S’uw any eke s’el Nyam ec’ey, kɔ wus af aŋa ec’agŋ ɛjeci ek’elm Nyam ec’ey a anŋ agn ec’es ɛw ɛm.
62005020	Ɛmɛny s’uw any eke Nyam ec’Iy ow wus af aŋa ɛtŋ n’ɔŋ ɛy nuŋ ɛm ɔny eke si k’uw Nyam nawrɛ any. S’okr af Nyam nawrɛ ab, Jim Jesu Krist ɛm. Jim na anake el Nyam nawrɛ a, in l’el sel ek’ɔnym nuŋ.
62005021	Ɛm ec’ey, ɔ̀sur sos ke k’úsmn yec’eke elm Nyam a jam.
63001001	Ɛm Nyamel ec’Ɛgŋ Likpekp, m’am awŋ Yɔw gbɛl lele in ec’ey ab eke Nyam sɔsum ot, ke m’erur a lɛl. Ɛtŋ ow elm ɛm sɔny m’erur ɔny, kɔ ɛl a fɛŋ ek’uw low nawrɛ ab any a yɛji,
63001002	low nawrɛ ek’anŋ ɛy ɛm, ke b’ow anŋ ɛy ɛm godo godo fɛŋ a sosiɛm.
63001003	Ke Nyam Ɛs, lele Jesu Krist Ɛs Iyŋ ec’ɔwrɔ, sɔrŋ ikŋ lele ɛrm es ɛy ab, ánŋ ɛy ab nawrɛ ɛm lele erur ɛm ab.
63001004	Sos ɛm am iŋn’m nɔnɔ eke m’ɛkn ŋ ec’ey bɛb am an es low nawrɛ ɛm ɛsɛ ol eke s’eb Ɛs ogŋ ab af.
63001005	Sica Yɔw gbɛl eke Nyam sɔsum oc, low eke m’am ibrm’ŋ a el: s’érurir ɛy ɔfr. Ke na ow elm ol owr m’ɛnym m’ɔɔm’ŋ, kɔ ow eke s’eb kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ ab ana.
63001006	Ɛtŋ erur a el: ke s’án es Nyam e sol ab af. Ɛtŋ ol a el: ke kókr erur e low ɛsɛ elel eke irir kpɔkpɔ ɛm ɛtŋ ab af.
63001007	Ayadŋu nɔnɔ ow wus na af ek’ɛ́gŋm Jesu Krist ek’ow sos megl ɛm a e low ebm. Ɛgŋ eke bi kok ɛsɛ ɛl af a, l’el yadŋu, l’el Krist ec’ifnu.
63001008	Ɔ̀sur sos gɔŋ yec’ɛtŋ ke k’írmnmn ɔny e juma eke kokr a eci labm sɔg, kɔ ke ɛ́ŋan ow ec’ob ap ligbɛl a.
63001009	Ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke bi digŋ Krist eci low yɛgm a ɛlu es a, okrm af Nyam ab; kɔ ɛgŋ eke b’ucu low yɛgm na ɔny es a, l’okr af Ɛs lele Jim ab.
63001010	Ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ am ow ɔny ogŋ ɛtŋ l’isam low yɛgm na ab a, k’èbr ir k’ɛlul il akŋ, k’ɔ̀ŋan in akpa bɔbɔ yɛji;
63001011	ɛgŋ eke b’ɔŋ’n akpa a, ke ow e juma eŋuŋ a anake in yɛji n’am kok a.
63001012	M’ɔny ów nɔnɔ eke mi ki nɔn m’awŋ ɔny, kɔ m’erurm eke mi k’oc lɛl lele lɛl mij ab; gbɛkɔ m’am tutr eke mi k’ow m’ɛkn ɔny, ke si dád s’okarir yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛy e sos ɛm iŋn a él tasi.
63001013	Esŋ jɔw eke Nyam sɔsum oc a ec’ey a am ibrm’ŋ.
64001001	Ɛm Nyamel ec’Ɛgŋ Likpekp, ɛm lawl Gayus eke m’erur nawrɛ ɛm, m’am awŋ lɛl.
64001002	Erur ɛm e lawl mamn, m’am erur eke ów fɛŋ k’akpal’ŋ, ke sos írm’ŋ es, ɛsɛ elel eke abŋ ɛm yɛji ɔny lɛc ab af.
64001003	Sos ɛm am iŋn’m nɔnɔ, lɛgŋ a ek’agŋ lisijimɛl ow, ke ij daŋku eke ŋ bi kok cɛcɛ Nyam e low fɛŋ ɛm a.
64001004	Eke m’iri eke ɛm ec’ey am an es low nawrɛ ɛm a, sos ɛm am iŋn’m ligbɛl akm low ɛjeci fɛŋ.
64001005	Erur ɛm e lawl mamn, bi kok ów amamn ɔmn ɛm ɔŋ agŋ lisijimɛl ek’el etu a yɛji.
64001006	-N’am ij ŋ ec’ɛrm mamn e daŋku Nyamel ec’any af. M’am ŋɔŋn’ŋ, kòk ɛl ec’ejagb us e low ɛsɛ elel eke Nyam erur ab af,
64001007	aŋke Jesu Krist e nin a sosiɛm anake -n’imn, ke -l’ebm ob kaka Nyam e low any uwm ɛsɛl ec’abu ɛm a.
64001008	S’ɔtu eke si k’ɛlum agŋ amua abu, yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛl ɛrŋ ɛm s’ókr af s’el low nawrɛ e juma kok ɛsɛl.
64001009	Mi nɔn ów bɛb m’ɔŋ Nyamel; kɔ Diotrɛf eke b’erur e k’el ɛl ɛm e krɛkrɛ a ebm ɛy ec’odad a.
64001010	Na sosiɛm, eke m’am ow m’ɛkn ɔny a, m’ow mi dad ɔny ów eke n’am kok a. N’am dad ów eŋuŋ l’ok ɛy af. Na yɛji ow ɛ́yrm’n ɛrm es, l’ébm agŋ lisijimɛl, ɛtŋ agŋ eke b’erur eke k’eb ɛl a yɛji, li b’ɛdŋn wɛl, ɛtŋ li b’ogŋ wɛl Nyamel ɛm.
64001011	Erur ɛm e lawl mamn Gayus, kì wewrm ów eŋuŋ kok ɛsɛl ów, kɔ kòk ów amamn. Ɛgŋ eke bi kok low mamn a, el Nyam eci; ɛgŋ eke bi kok low ŋuŋ a, l’ɛ́knm Nyam.
64001012	Demetrius ec’a gbɛ, agŋ a fɛŋ am ij in e daŋku, in ec’es an mamn a sosiɛm. Ɛy obi yɛji s’am ij in e daŋku. Ɛtŋ ŋ obi yɛji uw any eke ɛy e daŋku ij a el nawrɛ.
64001013	M’ɔny ów nɔnɔ eke mi ki nɔn m’awŋ’ŋ, kɔ m’erurm eke mi k’oc lɛl mij lele lɛl likŋ ab mi nɔn.
64001014	M’am tutr eke mi k’ow m’ɛkn’ŋ lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm, ke si dád ów s’okarir.
64001015	Ke ɛrm es ɛy ánŋ ŋ ab! Awlŋɛl a fɛŋ am ibrm’ŋ. S’am ɛkn ɛy lawlɛl a fɛŋ ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam.
65001001	Ɛm Jud, m’el Jak lisijim lele Jesu Krist e juma kok ɛs ab; m’am ɛsŋn agŋ a fɛŋ eke Nyam ɛsŋ, ke el agŋ eke Ɛs Nyam erur, ke n’am ɔsu Jesu Krist ec’a.
65001002	Ke Nyam e sɔrŋ ikŋ, ɛrm es ɛy lel erur ab ɛ́ny bobn ɔny.
65001003	Erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, m’ɔny erur nɔnɔ eke mi k’awŋ ɔny lɛl sel ɛŋn a ek’el ɛy fɛŋ ec’a sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ sica, m’ɛkn eke ow it eke mi k’awŋ ɔny lɛl na, yec’ɛtŋ ke m’átr ɔny sos es. Dògŋnin sos ɔmn na eke Nyam ɔŋ ɔny kpɛkŋ kpɛkŋ a sosiɛm, ɔny eke eel in ec’agŋ a.
65001004	M’am awŋ ɔny lɛl aŋke agŋ eŋuŋ, es lɔl ɛm, ow anŋ ɔny araŋn. -Li b’ɔny Nyam ec’ɛrm mamn ec’odad a -li titŋn, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’ɔtu -li kok yec’eke -l’erurir a, ɛtŋ Jesu Krist ek’in sɔny coco el ɛy ec’Es Ɛw lel ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ ab a, -li b’igŋ -l’ɔwl ow. God’ɛtŋ Nyam Lɛl ikŋ anym dad ɛl eci gbre ek’am eku ɛl a e low ɛw es.
65001005	M’uw any eke uwr low na eke m’am m’ow mi dad ɔny ab any. Gbɛkɔ m’erur eke mi k’ɔkn ɔny ów amua: Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eb in ec’agŋ a ɛlu es Ejipt eyŋ ec’abu ɛm, ɛtŋ ow e jam a, l’ibi ɛl a fɛŋ ek’ɛgŋm ubm nawrɛ a.
65001006	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn cɛ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a ek’erurm anm ɛl ec’usu a eke -n’inymn es a, ke -n’ŋgbroŋn yogŋ a, Nyam ɔny ok ɛl ŋgbraka ɛtŋ -n’anŋ ncebn ibr ab ɛm godo godo fɛŋ eci, jɛj ok e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a eci.
65001007	Sica ɔ̀kan Sodɔm, Gomɔr lel ɛl ec’ɛb saw saw ab ab e low a: ɛl ec’ɛb eyŋ a ɔny es an ŋuŋ ek’akplm ɛsɛ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a ec’ab af. Ɛtŋ -l’ɔl ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ ab ec’ɛrum ab, toŋ agŋ eke ɛlim sos megl nyam ɛsɛ ɛl ec’ab af a yɛji. Ow ɔŋ -n’am ij gbre al ek’ɔnym es irm ab ɛm, ɛtŋ -l’el agŋ fɛŋ ec’ɛwar eci sɛwl.
65001008	Ɛtŋ ɔny ec’araŋn a, agŋ eŋuŋ amua am ɔny es an nɛnyɛmbri nyam a ɛsɛ agŋ amua fɛŋ ec’ab af. -Li bi tutr ów yadŋ ɛtŋ ow b’ɔŋ ɛl -l’us ɛl eci sos af ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a jam. -Li b’ifn Nyam ec’es ɛw a ɛtŋ -li bi wɛwr afr ec’abŋ any ɛsɛl a.
65001009	Ɛtŋ Mikaɛl in obi yɛji eke el afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ec’es ɛw a kokm low na. Lɛgŋ a eke agn ab -n’am dogŋn Mois eci sos megl a, Mikaɛl ism nɛny igŋm’n jɛjm okm’n, kɔ ow cɛ eke li dad ow a el: "Ke Nyam íjr’ŋ gbre!"
65001010	Gbɛkɔ agŋ amua am wɛwr yec’a eke -l’uwm any a. Ɛtŋ yec’a eke -l’uwr any nyamb ɛm ɛsɛ akp ɛm eci mindey ek’ɔnym tutr af a, yɛji anake b’irmn ɛl a.
65001011	Gbre él ɛl eci! -L’eb ebr a eke Kayɛn eb a, -n’ɔny yadŋ os sosiɛm ɛsɛ Balam af, -l’uw, aŋke -l’ɔbr Nyam any ɛsɛ Kore af.
65001012	Ɛɛ, ɛl anake -li bi ŋuŋn ɔny ɔfr ɛm ec’ob eke b’asr luku usu nyam ijr a. Yogŋ, -li b’ij ɛtŋ -li b’ɛgŋ lokɛyr ɛm, ɛ́s ɔ́nym ɛl ɛtŋ -li bi tutr ɛl sɔny cɛ e low. -N’anŋ ɛsɛ afr eke ibr es lɛf am oc im ke ánm mij okm wus ab af. -N’anŋ ɛsɛ ekŋ eke ɔ́sum ey iju egb ub e lɛgŋ ab af; ekŋ eke -l’iil ok wus ke uw nimum nimum.
65001013	-Li b’ɔmun ɛl ec’ɛ́s owi ab es ɛsɛ elel eke okij b’ɔmun in e sarɔd es ok ákpaf ab af. -N’anŋ ɛsɛ mílɛ́l ek’uwm yogŋ ogŋ eke k’imn ab af, ɛtŋ Nyam ɛw ɛl usu es sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ncok ibr ab ɛm.
65001014	Enɔk ek’el ɛy lagŋ lɔbŋ ɛm Adam eci jam a, ikŋ anym dad agŋ amua e low ninɛ: "Kin, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ am ow lel afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala nɔnɔ gbɛl ab,
65001015	wus nimum e jɛj ok eci. Li b’ow l’ɔb agŋ eŋuŋ a fɛŋ low, ów eŋuŋ a fɛŋ eke -li kokr -l’ɔbar ow a sosiɛm. Li b’ow l’ɔb sikpl ɛsɛl es ɛfuu amua low, low ɔbr any odad fɛŋ eke -li dadr ow e lís a nuŋ af."
65001016	Sɛgŋ fɛŋ agŋ amua b’ucu any es. -Li b’anŋ abr ɛny ɛm ɛtŋ -li b’ir ɛb ɛsɛ elel ek’ɛl ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a b’ɔŋn ɛl ab af. -Li bi dad low any ɔbr odad ɛtŋ -li bi pop agŋ ob ɛŋn ij eci.
65001017	-
65001018	Gbɛkɔ ɔny, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ɔ̀kan ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl a e sodad eke dad ɔny lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a: "Sɛgŋ es abal el ɛm a, agŋ b’ow kokr ɔny miyɛr ɛtŋ ɛl ec’ów aw eŋuŋ a b’ow ɔŋ ɛl -l’ir ɛb eke bi kpab ɛl es Nyam e lís."
65001019	Ɛl anake -li bi bubr Nyamel ec’agŋ ab ɛm a. Ɛl e sow tutr a el agŋ e sow tutr cɛ, ɛtŋ -n’ɔnym Nyam ec’Abŋ a.
65001020	Gbɛkɔ ɔny, erur ɛm ec’agŋ lisijimɛl, ùsr ɔny ec’ɛb ir a ɔny ec’ɔmn ek’ɔnyn Nyam ɛm ab af, ŋɔ̀ŋan Nyam Abŋ Lala ec’abu ɛlum ɛm.
65001021	Ànŋn Nyam ec’erur ab ɛm, ke ám ekur ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist eci sɔrŋ ikŋ a eke b’ow ɔŋ ɔny sel ek’ɔnym uwr a.
65001022	Agŋ a ek’ɛl ec’ɔmn a ɛwm leg leg a, ɔ̀nyn ɛl eci sɔrŋ ikŋ.
65001023	Ɔ̀nyn okr ɛl ɔkm al ab ɛm ke éb ɛlul ɛl es. Ɔ̀nyn agŋ bɛb a yɛji eci sɔrŋ ikŋ. Gbɛkɔ ɛ̀wr sos ɛrm, kì yɛbr -li k’ibar ɔny ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ kok ab ab.
65001024	-
65001025	Anygbɛl él Nyam nyam coco a eke b’ɛcr ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu Krist ɛm sɔg ɛy a eci! L’ɔtu eke li k’ɛdŋn ɔny abu any ke k’ɛ́ymn low ŋuŋ ɛm; l’ɔtu eke li k’ok ɔny ɔkm in ec’anygbɛl a ec’any af, eke low ɔbr kaka k’ánm ɔny ɛm, ke sos ɛm iŋn íy ɔny ɛm gbɔŋ. In ec’él anygbɛl, sagb, abusu lel es ɛw ab god’ɛtŋ, sicaca lel sɛgŋ fɛŋ ab! Amɛn.
66001001	Ów eke lɔl es ke Jesu Krist ɛlu ɔkm kpata a anŋ lɛl na ɛm. Nyam ɔŋ’n l’uw ów amua any, yec’ɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm in e juma kok ɛsɛl a low eke b’ow ɛy lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm a. Krist ɔŋ in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs im ɛlu low a ɔkm yɛgm in e juma kok ɛs Jan.
66001002	Jan am ij daŋku eke ów a fɛŋ eke in ɛkn a in el Nyam ec’odad lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ek’in ɛy ɔkm Jesu Krist ɛm ab.
66001003	Ehe él ɛgŋ eke b’awl sodad amua eke Nyam ɛlu ɔkm ɔŋ agŋ a eci! Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ehe él agŋ a eke b’iri, ke b’ɛlum ów a eke wɛl nɔn lɛl na ɛm a eci! Ɛɛ, lɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm ɛw es ów amua ec’a ibnm ij.
66001004	Ɛm Jan, m’am ɛsŋn Azi wus af eci Nyamel lɔbŋ a: ke Nyam ek’anŋ god’ɛtŋ, anŋ yɛfɛnyna, ke am ow a, ɛ́dŋ ɔny ɔwrɔ ke ɔ́ŋ ɔny ɛrm es ɛy. Ke abŋ lɔbŋ a ek’anŋ in ec’atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af a yɛji ɔ́ŋ ɔny ów nɛnyɛmbri nyam a.
66001005	Ke Jesu Krist ek’el daŋku ij ɛs nɛny nyam ɛs a yɛji ɔ́ŋ ɔny ów amua. L’el iy krɛkrɛ ek’igb agŋ ek’uw ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’el wus eci ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ɛm ec’ɛb ebu. Jesu Krist erur ɛy ɛtŋ in eci mebl ab ɛm li sɔg ɛy sikpl e lís.
66001006	Li kok ɛy s’el gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ, egb waw ɛsɛl eke ki kok juma Nyam ek’el Ɛs a eci any af. Anygbɛl lele abusu ab él Jesu Krist eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn!
66001007	Kin, n’anŋ jru ɛm n’am ow! Ɛtŋ nyamn nyamn fɛŋ b’ow ɛkn’n; agŋ a ek’igŋ’n mpragb a yɛji b’ow ɛkn’n. Wus ec’agŋ eb eb a fɛŋ b’ow anŋ sɔrŋ ɛm in sosiɛm. Ɛɛ, ɛbɛn ow b’ow anŋ! Amɛn!
66001008	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs dad ninɛ: "M’el Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab, m’el Nyam a ek’anŋ god’ɛtŋ, anŋ yɛfɛnyna, ke am ow a."
66001009	Ɛm, ɔny lisijim Jan, Jesu ab ec’af okr ɛm, m’am m’ij gbre ɔny ab. S’el Nyam e gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ, s’am usur ɛrm gbre ij ɛm. Wɛl oc im ɛw’m es Patmɔs lekr, aŋke mi dad Nyam ec’odad lele low nɛnyɛmbri nyam ek’ɛy ɔkm Jesu ɛm ab ab.
66001010	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eci lɛgŋ a, Abŋ Lala ow’m af ɛtŋ m’iri lebl tuɔtuɔ nyam ek’am ikŋ’m jam ɛsɛ krɔkr af
66001011	dad ɛsɛ: "Nɔ̀n low yec’a eke am ɛkn a lɛl nyam ɛm, ke óc awŋ Nyamel lɔbŋ a ek’anŋ ɛb amua ɛm a: Efɛs, Simirna, Pɛrgam, Tiatir, Sardɛs, Filadɛlfi lele Laodise ab".
66001012	M’ɛdŋ mɛny eke mi k’ɛkn ɛgŋ a eke am dad’m odad a, ɛtŋ m’ɛkn sika ɛm mun al ob lɔbŋ.
66001013	Mun al ob amua ec’araŋn a, m’ɛkn ob nyam ek’inym es ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af. Li sus mob kpakp ɛtŋ l’ucu ɔhɔny eke wɛl kok sika mij ɛm ɛr ɛm.
66001014	In eci sin nuŋ a ufu pum pum pum ɛsɛ licɛb ufu e suw af, ɛsɛ nyamok af, ɛtŋ in ec’anyamn a am jɛjn ɛsɛ al af.
66001015	In ec’akr a am jɛjn ɛsɛ jawie eke wɛl ɛtŋ ke al ayal af. Ɛtŋ in eci lebl a b’il ɛsɛ okij e mra eke b’ɛlu ab af.
66001016	In e lidr abu ab ɛm, l’ucu mílɛ́l lɔbŋ n’ɔny es, ɛtŋ lab ler ɛm ek’any yony a b’ufu a am ɛy’r ɔkm nɛnym. In ec’any a am jɛjn ɛsɛ lɛgŋ uyu nuŋ e ligbn af.
66001017	Eke m’ɛkn’n a, m’ɛy wus in ec’akr ew a ɛsɛ ek’ɛm m’uw cɛ af. L’oc in eci lidr abu a l’ɛw’m af ɛtŋ li dad ninɛ: "Erŋn k’ɔ́ny’ŋ! M’el Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab.
66001018	M’el ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ owr a. M’uw, gbɛkɔ ca m’anŋ owr godo godo fɛŋ eci; ɛtŋ m’ɔny abusu luw lele ɔŋnes baŋn ab af.
66001019	Sica nɔ̀n yec’a ek’ɛkn a, yec’a ek’am ɛy caca ɛm a lele yec’a eke b’ow ɛy ow eci jam ab ab.
66001020	Kin mílɛ́l lɔbŋ a ek’ɛkn ɛm e lidr abu ab ɛm a lele sika ɛm mun al ob lɔbŋ ab ab eci nyandrɛ: mílɛ́l lɔbŋ a el Nyamel lɔbŋ a eci afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a, ɛtŋ kɛniɛ lɔbŋ a el Nyamel lɔbŋ a".
66002001	"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Efɛs e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɔnym mílɛ́l lɔbŋ ab in e lidr abu ab ɛm, ke am an es sika ɛm mun al ob lɔbŋ a ec’araŋn a am dad:
66002002	M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any, m’uw ŋ eci sos es atr a lele ŋ eci ɛrm susu ab ab any. M’uw any eke k’ɔtum ɛgŋm ów eŋuŋ ɛsɛl e low ebm; ɛtŋ agŋ a eke bi dad eke ɛl ɛrm ɛsɛl ke elm a, ɔny igbl ɛl ogŋ ɛkn, ɛtŋ ɛkn eke -l’el ayadŋu.
66002003	Ŋ, ɔny ɛrm susu, ij gbre ɛm e nin a sosiɛm ɛtŋ sos ɔwm’ŋ es kaka.
66002004	Gbɛkɔ low a eke m’ɔny ŋ ab a cɛ el: ɔnym erur krɛkrɛ a ek’ɔny ɛm ec’a ij.
66002005	Sica ɔ̀kn lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm eci elel eke ɔnyn ɛm ec’erur a, ìtŋn ɛrm ɛm, ke kók ɛsɛ nuŋ ɔb ɛm ec’ab af. Eke itŋnm, mi b’ow m’ow m’ɛŋn’ŋ, ke m’ɔ́ny ŋ eci mun al ob a m’oc es yogŋ a eke ow anŋ a.
66002006	Gbɛkɔ yec’eke akpl ŋ ec’a el: ɛsɛ ɛm af, ifn Nikolayitɛl eci low kok a.
66002007	Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a. Ɛgŋ yec’eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a ek’anŋ Nyam ec’egb ɔgm a e liy a l’ij.' "
66002008	"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Simirna e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’el Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab, ɛgŋ a ek’uw ke ɛwl anŋ owr a am dad:
66002009	M’uw ŋ e gbre lele gbɔr ab any, gbɛkɔ tasi ɛm a, ŋ gbreŋgbi! M’uw sos keskes ek’agŋ a ek’el Jwifɛl ke b’ocr ɛl sosi Nyam ec’agŋ ke elm a bi kokr’ŋ ab any; -l’el Satan eci nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl.
66002010	B’ow ij gbre, gbɛkɔ k’ùru erŋn. Agn b’ow ot ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ bɛb ok sobel ɛm ɔny eci ɛbm ɛkn eci, ɛtŋ b’ow ijr gbre toŋ sɛgŋ lɛw. Ìj nɛny nyam toŋ luw ɛm, ke m’ɔ́ŋ’ŋ sel ɛŋn e tufɛ a.
66002011	Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a. Ɛgŋ eke b’ow eb any a, k’ow ɛknm luw yony ɛm a e low ij.' "
66002012	"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Pɛrgam e Nyamel ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɔnym lab ler ɛm ek’any yony a b’ufu a am dad:
66002013	M’uw usu a ek’ir ab any, yogŋ anake Satan ec’atufu lɛkpn a anŋ a. Ucu ɛm e nin a ɔny es, ɛtŋ walm ɔmn ek’ɔny ɛm ɛm a ɛlum es, toŋ lɛgŋ ab ɛm eke wɛl ibi Antipas a yɛji, ɛm eci daŋku ij ɛs cɛcɛ ɔny ogŋ a, yogŋ a eke Satan ir a.
66002014	Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny abr eke mi k’ɛnym’ŋ: ŋ ogŋ yogŋ, agŋ anŋ eke ucu Balam eci low yɛgm a ɔny es. Balam anake ɔŋ Balak nuŋ ɛm eke k’uk Israɛl ec’ey meb a. L’itr wɛl eke wɛl k’ij mindey eke agŋ ibi kokr egb waw ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ, ke wɛl íj nfaci yɛji.
66002015	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny, ŋ ogŋ a cɛ, agŋ anŋ eke ucu Nikolayitɛl eci low yɛgm a ɔny es.
66002016	Ow sosiɛm, ìtŋn ɛrm ɛm gɔŋ. Eke itŋnm, ow k’ow ibnm, mi b’ow m’ow ŋ ogŋ yogŋ ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ogŋ agŋ amua ar, ɛm e lab ler ɛm any yony a eke anŋ’m nɛnym am ɛy’m ɔkm ab ɛm.
66002017	Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a. Ɛgŋ yec’a eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n afr eci futufutu eke lɔl es a. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n lebn ufu nyam, ɛtŋ lebn ab af nin owr nyam eke wɛl nɔn a b’ow anŋ. Ɛgŋ kaka k’ow uwm nin na any, ek’ow elm ɛgŋ a cɛ ek’ɛŋn lebn a.' "
66002018	"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Tiatir e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a. 'Kin odad yec’eke Nyam Jim a ek’anyamn ɛm am jɛjn ɛsɛ al af, ke akr yɛji am jɛjn ɛsɛ jawie eke wɛl ɛtŋ af a, am dad:
66002019	M’uw ŋ e sijuma a, ŋ ec’erur a, ŋ ec’ɔmn a, ŋ e juma a eke bi kok ɔŋ agŋ a lele ŋ ec’ɛrm susu ab ab any. Ɛtŋ sica m’uw any eke jam aŋa, ŋ e juma a eke am kok a ɛny akm krɛkrɛ ec’a.
66002020	Gbɛkɔ m’ɔny abr nyam eke mi k’ɛnym’ŋ: am yɛb Jesabɛl, yɔw na eke am dad eke Nyam ec’odad in am dad, ke am irmn ɛm e juma kok ɛsɛl, yɛgm ɛl eke -li k’ij nfaci, ke -l’ij mindey eke wɛl wawr egb ɔŋ sinyam yadŋ a.
66002021	M’ok’r sɛgŋ es eke li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm, kɔ l’erurm eke li k’igŋ in eci nfaci ij na l’ɛlu es.
66002022	Ow sosiɛm a, mi b’ow m’ɛrum’n es gbre ij ec’ob ɛrur ob af, ɛtŋ eke agŋ a ek’ij nfaci in ab a itŋnm ɛrm ɛm a, -li b’ow -l’ij gbre nɔnɔ ɛsɛ ow af.
66002023	Mi b’ow m’ibi in ec’agŋ a yɛji, ɛtŋ Sinyamel a fɛŋ b’ow uw any eke m’el ɛgŋ a ek’uw agŋ e tutr lele ɛl ec’erur ab a any a. Ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɔny ɛm ec’ɛgŋ nyam nyam yec’a eke li kok a ec’ow ek’it a.
66002024	Sica ɔny Tiatir e Nyamel ab ɛm ec’agŋ likpr a, ɔny eke ɛgŋmn ucumn low yɛgm yadŋ na ɔnymn es, ɔlmn eke k’uwr yec’a eke -l’ɛsŋn Satan eci low any uw eke lɔl es ab any a, m’uyulm ɔny low ɛjeci kaka fɛŋ ij.
66002025	Gbɛkɔ yec’a ek’ɛŋan a, ùcur ɔnyn es toŋ ke m’ánŋ m’ow.
66002026	-
66002028	Agŋ a eke b’ow kok ɛm ec’erur a toŋ ók nuŋ a, ɛl anake -li b’ow -l’eb any a. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl abusu a eke m’eb ɛm Ɛs ogŋ a. Mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl -n’ɔny abusu ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ af. -Li b’ow -l’ɛw wɛl es lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ -li b’ow -li bɔbm wɛl es ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl bi bɔbm ereŋ es ab af. Ɛmɛny mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl ibribr eci lɛ́l a yɛji.
66002029	Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a ek’Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "
66003001	"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Sard e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’ɔnym Nyam ec’abŋ lɔbŋ a lele mílɛ́l lɔbŋ ab ab a am dad: M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any. Agŋ bi tutr eke anŋ owr, kɔ tasi ɛm a, uw!
66003002	Ùfŋm es! Ke yec’a eke anŋ’ŋ ke k’uwm a, ɔ́ŋ’n n’anŋ kikri gbuŋ ke l’úw nimum nimum. M’ɛkn eke ŋ ec’ów a bɛbmnm tasi, ɛm e Nyam a ec’a ek’am erur ab ab.
66003003	Ɔ̀kn yec’a eke iri ke eb a, ùcu ɔny es ke ítŋn ɛrm ɛm. Eke ufŋam es, mi b’ow m’ow kpru ɛm ɛsɛ ulu af m’oc’ŋ, ɛtŋ k’ow uwm wanci ab af eke mi b’ow m’ow ab any.
66003004	Gbɛkɔ Sard yogŋ, ɔny ɛm ec’agŋ nyam nyam ibarm ɛl eci mob sus ɛm a. Agŋ amua b’ow anŋ mob efu ɛm ɛc ɛm ab, aŋke -l’it.
66003005	Ɛbɛn eke agŋ a eke b’ow eb any a b’ow sus mob efu ana. Mi k’ow mi tɛtŋm ɛl ec’en ab es sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛm Ɛs lel in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ec’any af, mi b’ow mi dad eke agŋ amua el ɛm eci.
66003006	Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a eke Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "
66003007	"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Filadɛlfi e Nyamel a ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'Kin odad yec’eke ɛgŋ a ek’el lala lele low nawrɛ ab a, ɛgŋ a eke ɔnym ɛb ebu David eci safuɛ ab ab, bi fig ke ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́tum ablm, b’abl ke ɛgŋ kaka ɔ́tum figm a am dad:
66003008	M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any; mi fig lisany nyam m’ɛw’ŋ es any af eke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ablm. Lɛc tɛl cɛ ɔny, gbɛkɔ ucu ɛm ec’odad a ɔny es ɛtŋ dadm eke uwm im any.
66003009	Kin low eke mi b’ow mi kok Jwifɛl ek’el Satan ec’ogog ec’agŋ a eke b’ocr ɛl sosi Nyam ec’agŋ, ke ow b’el yadŋ a: mi b’ow m’ɔny ɛl lɛc ɛm -l’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ŋ ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’uw any eke mi b’erur’ŋ.
66003010	Eke ɔsu ol a eke m’ɔŋ’ŋ eke k’usur ɛrm a, ɛm yɛji mi b’ow m’ɔsu’ŋ gbre eci lɛgŋ a eke b’ow ow wus nimum af ɛbm wus ec’agŋ a fɛŋ a.
66003011	Ow k’ow ibnm eke mi b’ow m’ow. Ow sosiɛm, yec’a ek’ɔny a, ùcu ɔny es kikri yec’ɛtŋ ke ɛgŋ kaka k’ébm ŋ ec’any eb e tufɛ a.
66003012	Agŋ a eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔsŋm ɛl es ɛm Ɛs eci Nyamel ab ɛm ɛsɛ êl ec’akr ab af, ɛtŋ -li k’ow -l’okmn ɔkm ij. Mi b’ow mi nɔn ɛm e Nyam a eci nin a lele in ec’ɛb a eci nin ab ab agŋ amua eke ɛŋn any ab af. Ɛb a, in l’el Jerusalɛm owr a eke b’ow anŋ afr, ɛm e Nyam a ogŋ us es a. Mi b’ow mi nɔn nin owr a eke m’ɛŋn a yɛji ɛl af.
66003013	Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a ek’Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "
66003014	"Nɔ̀n lɛl awŋ Laodise ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a: 'M’el ɛgŋ a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Amɛn, ɛgŋ a ek’el daŋku ij ɛs cɛcɛ lele low nyim nyim ab a, ɛgŋ a eke anŋ ów fɛŋ eke Nyam kok a e nuŋ ɔb ɛm a. Kin ɛm eci odad a:
66003015	M’uw juma fɛŋ eke kok ab any, ɛtŋ m’ɛkn eke ɛwm dra ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛwm gbagba yɛji. Blel ɔtu el ów yony ab ɛm e nyam yɛji, ow ɛ́w afanma.
66003016	Kɔ sica ek’el dede, ke elm dra oglog gbagba a, mi b’ow m’ɛgbl m’ɛlu’ŋ es.
66003017	Ŋ bi dad ɛsɛ: m’ɔny os nɔnɔ, m’ɔnym low kaka ec’es abur. Kɔ tasi ɛm a, ŋ uwm any eke el gbre ɛs, ɔny sɔrŋ nɔnɔ, el gbɔru, el any eflu lele sos ɔfr ɛs ab.
66003018	Ow sosiɛm a, kin ów eke m’am ɔm’ŋ: òw ɛm ogŋ a, ɔ̀l sika eke al ɛlu ow eci sayl a ɔkm a, ke él gbreŋgbi. Òw ɔl mob sus ɛm efu sus, yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ánm sos ɔfr ɛ́s ɔnym’ŋ. Òw ɔl sɛkp ok ŋ ec’anyamn ab ɛm, ke ɛ́kn es.
66003019	Agŋ a fɛŋ eke mi b’erur a, mi b’ɛnym ɛl abr ɛtŋ mi b’ɛw low m’ɔŋ ɛl. Ɛ̀lu lɛc ij ɔkm ke ítŋn ɛrm ɛm.
66003020	Sica m’inym es lisany ɛtŋ m’am icm abu. Eke ɛgŋ nyam iri’m lebl ɛtŋ fig’m lisany a, mi b’ow m’ɛy’r akŋ, mi b’ow m’us abu in ab ɛtŋ in yɛji li b’ow l’us abu ɛm ab.
66003021	Agŋ a eke b’ow eb any a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛl abusu -li sig es ɛm ab, ɛm eci atufu lɛkpn ab af, ɛsɛ elel eke ɛm yɛji eke m’eb any a, ɛm Ɛs ɔŋ’m abusu mi sig es in ab, in eci atufu lɛkpn af ab af.
66003022	Ke ɛgŋ yec’ek’ɛli ɔru a, íri yec’a ek’Abŋ am dad ok Sinyamel a.' "
66004001	Ɛmɛny ow e jam a, m’ɛkn low ɛjeci. Afr, m’ɛkn lisany nyam eke fig, ɛtŋ lebl a ek’anŋ ɛsɛ krɔkr eci lebl af ke m’ikŋ anym m’iri a, dad’m ninɛ: "Ùyu af aŋa, ke mi yɛ́gm’ŋ ow e jam ec’ów eke b’ow ow a."
66004002	Kpɛkŋ Abŋ oc’m ɛtŋ afr yogŋ, m’ɛkn atufu lɛkpn nyam ek’ɛgŋ nyam sig es af.
66004003	Ɛgŋ a eke sig es af a eci jɛjn a am ot mebn sɔbɔ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ es ɛsɛ jasp lele sarduan ab af. Nyamgodi eke am jɛjn ɛsɛ lebn emerod af a iwr ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm.
66004004	Atufu lɛkpn likŋ lele yar ab did iwr ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ligbɛl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab sig es af. -Li sus mob efu ɛtŋ -l’us sika tufɛ.
66004005	Afr eci ŋɛŋn lele nyamgbrany ab ab am anŋ atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm ok ɔkm. Mrabri lɔbŋ eke wɛl gigŋ a am iri any af yogŋ. Mrabri lɔbŋ a el Nyam ec’abŋ lɔbŋ a.
66004006	Atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af a, okij ek’ayl toŋ am ɛkan es ke ot lebn ufu pum pum es anŋ. Araŋn yogŋ, mindey yar eke ɛl ec’anym lele jam ab a el anyamn ɔfr a, iwr did ɛlul atufu lɛkpn ab ɛm.
66004007	Krɛkrɛ eci ndey a anŋ ɛsɛ kukuma af, yony ɛm ec’a anŋ ɛsɛ id liy af, nyahan ɛm ec’a ɛli any ɛsɛ ɛgŋ ec’ab af, ɛtŋ yar ɛm ec’a anŋ ɛsɛ káká ek’igb nyɛnyn ɔw es af.
66004008	Mindey yar amua e nyam nyam ɛli ɔw nɔhɔn, ɛtŋ -l’ɛli anyamn eb ɛl ɔw a nimum, ew lele af ab. Ɛtŋ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab nɛny b’anŋ ɛl ɛm -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Lala, lala, lala el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs eci, in eke n’anŋ god’ɛtŋ, n’anŋ yɛfɛnyna ke n’am ow a eci."
66004009	-
66004010	Ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ eci ke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a, mindey yar a bi kɔklm’n, b’usr’r sos ɛtŋ b’ɔŋ’n bia. Ɛtŋ sakp sakp fɛŋ eke -li bi kɔklm ow a, agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab ab a b’ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a ec’any af. -Li b’igŋ ɛgŋ a ek’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ec’a nuŋ. -Li b’ot ɛl eci sika tufɛ a -li wɔwl atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af yogŋ ke -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ:
66004011	"O, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, ɛy e Nyam, it eke k’ɛŋn anygbɛl, es susm lel abusu ab, aŋke ŋ kok ob fɛŋ ɛtŋ ŋ ec’erur ɛm ob fɛŋ anŋ owr ɛtŋ b’ok sel."
66005001	Sica m’ɛkn lɛl nyam eke wɛl ar es ke anŋ ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a e lidr abu ab ɛm. Wɛl nɔn lɛl a any lele jam ab, ɛtŋ wɛl ɔnyn nɛnyɛmbri ab es, es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ ab.
66005002	Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ɛm e lɛc ɛs nyam eke am ɔg lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛsɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ it eke ki bɔbm es ɔnyan ob amua es ke fíg lɛl na ee?"
66005003	Ke ow el afr, wus af aŋa lele wus ew ab, ɛgŋ kaka anm eke k’ɔtu fig lɛl a bake lɛr ow e lokm a.
66005004	Ow ɔŋ m’ikŋ ɔŋn nɔnɔ eke ɛgŋ kaka k’anm itm eke ki fig lɛl a bake ɔtu lɛr ow e lokm a.
66005005	Gbɛkɔ agŋ ekpekp ab ɛm e nyam dad’m ninɛ: "K’ìkŋ ɔŋn! Kin Juda ec’eb ab ɛm e kukuma a, ɛb ebu David eci lilaw a eb any, li b’ow li bɔbm es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ ab es ke li fíg lɛl a."
66005006	Sica ɛmɛny m’ɛkn atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab, ɛtŋ m’ɛkn licɛbli nyam eke wɛl ibi egb waw eci, ke inym es ɛl eci araŋn. L’ɛli ɔcɔwr lɔbŋ lele anyamn lɔbŋ ab. Anyamn lɔbŋ a el abŋ lɔbŋ a eke Nyam ɛrm ow wus nimum af a.
66005007	Licɛbli a ɛri im ɛtŋ oc lɛl a ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a eci lidr abu ab ɛm.
66005008	Kpɛkŋ mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab ab ok ɔwrɔkp wus licɛbli a ec’any af. Ɛl ɛm ec’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ ɔnym saŋgo nyam ab lele sika ɛm kpɔk eke ogŋ iy ɛm gbɔŋ ab, ke el agŋ lala a eci nyam ŋɔŋn a.
66005009	-N’am ɛgŋ ɛj owr nyam: "Ŋ cɛ it eke k’oc lɛl a ke bɔ́bm es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ ab es, aŋke wɛl ibi’ŋ oc’ŋ wawr ŋ egb ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, eb eb fɛŋ ɛm, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ɛm, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ ɛm lele ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ɛm ab, ɛwl sɔg agŋ ɔŋ Nyam.
66005010	Kok ɛl -l’el gbreŋgbi usu a ec’agŋ, -l’el egb waw ɛsɛl eke ki kok juma ɛy e Nyam a ec’any af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’ɛw wus na nimum es."
66005011	Sica ɛmɛny mi lɛr ɛtŋ m’am iri afr ɛrm ɛsɛl nɔnɔ gbɛl e lebl. -N’ɛny nɔnɔ ligbɛl, -l’iwr atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp yar ab ab -l’ɛlul ɛm.
66005012	-N’am ɛgŋ ɛj lebl gege ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Licɛbli a eke wɛl wawr egb a cɛ it eke k’ɛŋn abusu, ob ɔny, sɛwr lele lɛc ab; es susm, anygbɛl lele kɔklm ab!"
