66005013	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’iri eke ob fɛŋ eke Nyam kok anŋ afr, wus af aŋa, wus ew lele okij ɛm ab a, ob fɛŋ eke anŋ owr a am ɛgŋ ɛj dad ɛsɛ: "Sɛgŋ fɛŋ, kɔklm, anygbɛl lele abusu ab él ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a lele licɛbli ab ab eci!"
66005014	Ɛtŋ mindey yar a am ɛlu 'Amɛn!' Ɛtŋ agŋ ekpekp a am ok ɔwrɔkp wus igŋ Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab nuŋ.
66006001	Ow e jam a, m’ɛkn licɛbli a ɔny es ɔnyan ob lɔbŋ a eci krɛkrɛ a ɔb es, ɛtŋ m’iri mindey yar ab ɛm e nyam barm lebl ek’anŋ ɛsɛ nyamgbrany ec’ikŋ ab af ninɛ: "Òw!"
66006002	Mi bi lɛr a, m’ɛkn gbaŋkɔ ufu nyam. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ɔnym bin ab, ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ’n any eb e tufɛ. L’ikŋ anym l’eb any ɛtŋ ɛmɛny n’aam any eb eci.
66006003	Eke licɛbli a bɔbm yony ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’iri mindey yar ab ɛm e yony ɛm ec’a eke am dad ɛsɛ: "Òw!"
66006004	Ɛtŋ gbaŋkɔ ɛjeci nyam ɛy ɔkm. L’ebl es ɛsɛ al af. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ɛŋn abusu eke k’ɔny ɛrm es ɛy oc es wus na af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow ɔ́ŋ agŋ ibirir ɛl ɔfr. Ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ’n lab ler ɛm ligbɛl nyam.
66006005	Eke licɛbli a bɔbm nyahan ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’iri mindey yar a e nyahan ɛm ec’a eke am dad ɛsɛ: "Òw!" Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn gbaŋkɔ ibr nyam. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a ɔnym toy ab.
66006006	M’iri ob nyam am ikŋ ɛsɛ lebl nyam ek’anŋ mindey yar a ec’araŋn af, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀wŋn ble kilo nyam lɛgŋ nyam e juma kok e labm sɔg eci; ke ɛ́wŋn ɔrj gbɛ kilo nyahan lɛgŋ nyam e juma kok e labm sɔg eci. Gbɛkɔ Lek, k’ìtŋn oliv e mun a lele viny e mar ab ab gbɛ abu."
66006007	Eke licɛbli a bɔbm yar ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’iri mindey yar ab ɛm e yar ɛm ec’a eke am dad ɛsɛ: "Òw!"
66006008	Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn gbaŋkɔ nyam ek’ɛw mufu mufu. Ɛgŋ a eke uyu af a, wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Luw, ɛtŋ ɔŋnes baŋn am us’r jam. Wɛl ɔŋ ɛl abusu wus ec’ɔy yar ab ɛm e nyam ɛm ec’agŋ ab af, eke -li k’ibi wɛl ar ogŋ ɛm, lek owi ɛm, ɔl ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ɛm lele mindey eŋuŋ ɛm ab.
66006009	Eke licɛbli a bɔbm yen ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, m’ɛkn egb waw usu a ec’ew a, agŋ agŋ eke wɛl ibi a eci liy a. Wɛl ibi ɛl nɛny nyam eke -l’ijr Nyam odad eci lele daŋku eke -l’ijr ow ec’ab ab sosiɛm.
66006010	-N’am ɔg lɛc ɛm -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Es Ɛw Ɛs Lala, Es Ɛw Ɛs Nawrɛ, kɔ toŋ ba bogŋ lɛgŋ iy b’ow jɛj wus ec’agŋ a e low ok, íbrm ɛl ɛy e luw a eci low ee?"
66006011	Sica wɛl ɔŋ ɛgŋ nyam nyam mob sus ɛm ufu, ɛtŋ wɛl dad ɛl eke ɛmɛny -li k’eku sɛgŋ tɛl, toŋ bake wɛl íbi ɛl lisijimɛl a eke am kok Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma a ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl ibi ɛl ab af a, ów yibr ɛl.
66006012	Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn licɛbli a eke am bɔbm nɔhɔn ɛm ec’es ɔnyan ob ab es a, ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wus umu lɛc ɛm; ligbn ibr pri pri pri ɛsɛ niŋn mob af, ɛtŋ awl ebl es kondoŋ ɛsɛ mebl af.
66006013	Mílɛ́l anŋ afr am ok wus ɛsɛ babm ikŋ ec’ey a eke k’eblm, ke lɛf tuɔtuɔ b’ɛlu ɔny ok wus ab af.
66006014	Afr am oc es ɛsɛ ajraŋka eke wɛl b’ɔny ar es ab af; ɛtŋ mafɛny a lele silekr ab ab fɛŋ am ŋgboŋ ɛl e susu susu a.
66006015	Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ wus ec’ɛ́b ebu, agŋ any ɛsɛl, ar ogŋ ɛsɛl ɛm ec’agŋ ɛgbɛl, egbreŋgbi, abusu ɔny ɛsɛl, agŋ ɛjec’a fɛŋ ek’el madu oglog agŋ ewi a, im lɔl es mafɛny ɔmu ɛm lele mób ɛm ab.
66006016	-N’am dad mafɛny a lele mób ab ab -l’ɛsɛ: "Òkr ɛy af ke lɔ́ɔl ɛy es ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a ec’any a e lís, ke ɔ́ny kpabr ɛy es licɛbli a ec’ɛrm bebl a e lís,
66006017	aŋke ɛl ec’ɛrm bebl a e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a ow ŋ̂. Sica bwo ec’ɛgŋ b’ow ɔtu anŋ owr ab ee?"
66007001	Sica ow e jam a, m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar ek’inym es wus eci ɔy yar ab ɛm. -N’ɔny ɔy yar a e lɛf a eke b’ɛlu wus na af ab es, yec’ɛtŋ ke lɛf kaka k’ɛ́lum wus na af, okij af lele ekŋ ɛm ab.
66007002	Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ɛy ɔkm yogŋ a eke ligbn b’igb a. N’ɔnym Nyam ek’anŋ owr eci ob a eke b’oc ɛwr ɛgŋ mɛny ab ab. Li barm lebl tuɔtuɔ l’ɛsŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar a eke ɛŋn abusu eke ki ŋuŋn wus lel okij ab a ninɛ:
66007003	"Èkur yɛ! Kì kokr wus, okij lele ekŋ ab low ŋuŋ kaka. Ow it eke si k’ikŋ anym s’ɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam ɛy e Nyam a eci juma kok ɛsɛl a ec’anyafr a."
66007004	Ɛtŋ m’iri agŋ a eke wɛl ɛwr mɛny anyafr a e nɛny a. -L’ij agŋ fandi ekŋ lɔbŋ, agŋ miy yar. Ow ow el Israɛl ec’eb eb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a:
66007005	Juda ec’eb ab ɛm agŋ fandi lɛw yony, Rubɛn ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Gad ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
66007006	Asɛr ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Nɛftali ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Manase ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
66007007	Simeɔn ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Levi ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Isakar ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony,
66007008	Zabulɔn ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Josɛf ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony, Bɛnjamɛ ec’ab ɛm fandi lɛw yony. Ɛl fɛŋ, -n’ɛŋn Nyam e mɛny ɛwr a.
66007009	Ow e jam a, mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn agŋ nɔnɔ gbɛl eke ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum awlm. Ow el ɛb ɛb fɛŋ, eb eb fɛŋ, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ lele ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ ab ec’agŋ. -N’inym es atufu lɛkpn a lele licɛbli ab ab ec’any af, -li sus mob efu ɛtŋ arakp anŋ ɛl abu ɛm.
66007010	-N’am ɔg lɛc ɛm -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛy e sel ɛŋn a, ɛy e Nyam a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn af a lele licɛbli ab ab ogŋ ow b’anŋ ow!"
66007011	Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl a fɛŋ iwr did ɛlul atufu lɛkpn a, agŋ ekpekp a lele mindey yar ab ab ɛm. -N’am ok ɔwrɔkp wus atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af ɛtŋ -n’am igŋ Nyam nuŋ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ:
66007012	"Nawrɛ! Kɔklm, anygbɛl, sɛwr, bia ɛlu lele sos usr ab, abusu ɔny lele lɛc ab él ɛy e Nyam a eci sɛgŋ fɛŋ! Amɛn."
66007013	Agŋ ekpekp ab ɛm e nyam ibrm im ninɛ: "Bwo ɛl el agŋ amua eke sus mob efu a, ɛtŋ bogŋ -n’anŋ l’ow ee?"
66007014	M’ɔdu m’eb mi dad’r m’ɛsɛ: "Ɛgŋ gbɛl, ŋ anake uw any a." Ɛtŋ l’ɔdu l’eb li dad’m ninɛ: "Amua, agŋ a eke ɛcr gbre ijr ligbɛl ab ɛm ab ana. -Li yɔyɔg ɛl e mob sus ɛm ab es licɛbli a e mebl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ mob sus ɛm a ufu pum pum pum.
66007015	Na sosiɛm anake -li b’inym es Nyam ec’atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af, ke ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab -li b’igŋ ow nuŋ ow eci nuŋ igŋ usu a. Ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a b’ow ot ok ɛl in eci gbad êl ab ɛm ke ɔ́su ɛl.
66007016	Namn lele mij amn ab k’ow ɔnym ɛl ij, ɛtŋ ligbn lele elubu ab yɛji k’ow ɔnynm ɛl ij.
66007017	Nawrɛ, aŋke licɛbli a ek’inym es atufu lɛkpn a e saw a, b’ow el ɛl e nyimn ɛs, ot im ɛl mij ewl mij eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a e saw, ke Nyam tɛ́tŋ ɛl e mikŋ ab es."
66008001	Eke licɛbli a bɔbm lɔbŋ ɛm eci es ɔnyan ob ab es a, afr, usu a irm es tiŋ toŋ ow ɔtu ek’ij wanci ikpr mum.
66008002	Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a eke b’anŋ Nyam ec’any af a; wɛl ɔŋ ɛl krɔkr lɔbŋ.
66008003	M’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’ow inym es egb waw usu a; n’ɔnym ogŋ ofŋn ob sika ɛm ab. Ɛtŋ wɛl ɔŋ’n ogŋ nɔnɔ eke li k’oc, ke Nyam ec’agŋ lala a e nyam ŋɔŋn ab ab li kokr egb waw sika ɛm egb waw usu a eke anŋ atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af a.
66008004	Afr ɛrm ɛs a ec’abu ɛm a, ogŋ a e mregbn a eke wuwlm Nyam ec’agŋ lala a e sinyam ŋɔŋn ab ab a am il Nyam ec’any af.
66008005	Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a oc ogŋ ofŋn ob a, eb egb waw usu a ec’al a ok ɛm ɛtŋ oc ɔwl wus. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ nyamgbrany am babarm, afr am ŋɛŋn ɛtŋ wus am umu.
66008006	Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a eke ɔnym krɔkr lɔbŋ ab ab a am bɛbm sos eke k’afl krɔkr a.
66008007	Krɛkrɛ ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Nyamok lele al eke wuwlm mebl ab a am ok wus. Wus ec’og nyahan e nyam, ekŋ eke wɛl ok sakp nyahan eci akp nyam lele suw owr fɛŋ ab eb al iri ok es.
66008008	Yony ɛm ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Ob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ lafɛny ligbɛl nyam ek’am iri al af ɛy okij ɛm; ɛtŋ okij ec’og nyahan a e nyam itŋn el mebl.
66008009	Mindey ek’anŋ okij ɛm a eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam uw, ɛtŋ simijɛtŋ eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam uŋ.
66008010	Nyahan ɛm ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Lɛ́l ligbɛl nyam ek’am iri al ɛsɛ mrabri af a anŋ afr ɛy wus. L’ɛy simij ewl mij a ec’ogog nyahan e nyam ɛm lele mij eŋ af ab.
66008011	Lɛ́l a e nin el 'Lolo'. Simij ogog nyahan e nyam itŋn am lol, ɛtŋ agŋ nɔnɔ a eke ɛgŋ mij a am uw, aŋke ow am lol nɔnɔ.
66008012	Sica yar ɛm ec’a afl in e krɔkr a. Wɛl iyr ligbn ec’ogog nyahan a e nyam a, awl yɛji ec’ogog nyahan a e nyam a lele mílɛ́l eci sakp nyahan eci akp nyam ab ab ob; ɛtŋ ow ɔŋ ɛl eci afŋ a e nyahan ɛm irm es. Lɛgŋ owr e nyahan ɛm a lele ncok eci nyahan ɛm ab ab irmn ɛl ec’usuayl a.
66008013	Ɛmɛny mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn káká nyam eke igb im afr kpoŋ ɛm a ke am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ dad ɛsɛ: "Musue! Musue! Musue b’ow el wus ec’agŋ eci, lɛgŋ a eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl nyahan a ek’anŋ a b’ow afl ɛl e krɔkr a!"
66009001	Sica yen ɛm ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krɔkr a, ɛtŋ m’ɛkn lɛ́l nyam ek’anŋ afr ɛy wus, ke wɛl oc nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a e safuɛ a ɛlu abu ɛm.
66009002	Lɛ́l a fig nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a ɛtŋ mregbn eke otarir es al gbɛl e mregbn ab am uyu ok ɔkm. Mregbn a ek’am ok ɔkm a ibar ligbn lele lɛf ab.
66009003	Ɛtŋ mregbn ab ɛm, tɛtɛ gbaŋgban anŋ ok ɔkm eb es wus na nimum af; ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋn abusu eke anŋ ɛsɛ sibɔban ec’ab af.
66009004	Wɛl ɛdŋn ɛl eke -li ki ŋuŋnmn suw, ekŋ lele ob ɛjeci eke ɛli wus af ab. Gbɛkɔ abusu ɛru ɛl es eke -li k’ijr agŋ a eke Nyam e mɛny ɛwr anm anyafr a gbɛ gbre.
66009005	Ɛtŋ agŋ amua e gbre ijr a eke -n’ɛŋan ow ec’abusu a yɛji elm wɛl ec’ibi eci, kɔ ke -l’ijr wɛl gbre nɔnɔ toŋ ow íj awl yen. Ke gbre ijr a e dudu a ánŋ ɛsɛ bɔban ec’ɛgŋ eke b’akŋ a e dudu ab af.
66009006	Ɛtŋ awl yen ab ɛm, agŋ b’ow ɔl luw es, kɔ -li k’ow -n’ɛŋnmn ow; -li b’ow -l’erur eke -li k’uw, kɔ luw k’ow owrm ɛl.
66009007	Tɛtɛ gbaŋgban amua anŋ ɛsɛ sigbaŋkɔ eke wɛl bɛbm sos ar ogŋ ec’af; ɛl e nuŋ ab af, wɛl b’ɛkn mob ek’anŋ ɛsɛ sika tufɛ af, ɛtŋ ɛl e many a anŋ ɛsɛ agŋ e many af.
66009008	Ɛl e sin nuŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ ɔyɔw ec’ab af, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’an nɛnym a anŋ ɛsɛ sikukuma ec’ab af.
66009009	Ɛl ec’ɛrmni a anŋ ɛsɛ erkpo lowi ɛm af, ɛtŋ ɛl ec’ɔw a ec’ikŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ ar ogŋn eci mɛtŋ a eke wɛl b’ot cucur sigbaŋkɔ nɔnɔ im ar ogŋ ɛm ab af.
66009010	Tɛtɛ gbaŋgban amua ɛli ewl eke mbe anŋ ɛm ɛsɛ sibɔban ec’ab af. Ɛtŋ ɛl ec’ewl amua ab anake -li b’ow -li kok agŋ ów eŋuŋ toŋ ke ow íj awl yen a.
66009011	Ɛl ec’es ɛw ɛs a el nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a. Ebre ɛm a wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n 'Abadɔn', ɛtŋ Grɛk ɛm a wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n 'Apoliɔn' (ek’el nyandrɛ ɛm 'Ŋuŋn Ɛs').
66009012	Sica krɛkrɛ ec’abu ɛyr na ɛc ŋ̂. Gbɛkɔ ow e jam a, ɛmɛny abu ɛyr yony anŋ eke b’ow ow.
66009013	Ɛtŋ nɔhɔn ɛm ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krɔkr a. Egb waw usu a ek’el sika ɛm ke anŋ Nyam ec’any af a ec’ɔy yar ab ɛm, m’iri lebl nyam ek’am ikŋ ow.
66009014	Lebl a dad nɔhɔn ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a eke ɔnym krɔkr ab ab a ninɛ: "Mɔ̀mu afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar a eke anŋ ŋgbraka ɛm, mij gbɛl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Efrat a e saw ab es."
66009015	Wɛl mɔmu afr ɛrm ɛsɛl yar ab es. Nawrɛ ɛm a, wanci na af, lɛgŋ na af, awl na af lele lakpo na af ab anake wɛl bɛbm ɛl sos wus nimum ec’agŋ sakp nyahan a ec’akp nyam ec’ibi ec’a.
66009016	M’iri ɛl ec’ar ɛsɛl eke b’uyu gbaŋkɔ af a eci nɛny a: -l’ij agŋ miliɔn ekŋ lɛw.
66009017	Ɛtŋ kin elel eke m’ɛkan sigbaŋkɔ a lele ɛl ec’af uyu ɛsɛl ab ab a: -l’ɛw erkpo lowi ɛm sos. Erkpo a ebl es ɛsɛ al af, ɛw ble eke iir ɛm ɛsɛ safir lebn af, ɛtŋ ow e mij a yɛji anŋ ɛsɛ sika e mij ab af. Sigbaŋkɔ a ec’eŋ a anŋ ɛsɛ sikukuma ec’ab af; ɛl e nɛnym a, al, mregbn lele mebn eke ler ab am ok ɔkm.
66009018	Ów eŋuŋ nyahan amua ek’el al, mregbn lele mebn eke ler ab ke anŋ sigbaŋkɔ a e nɛnym am ok ɔkm a anake ibi wus ec’agŋ sakp nyahan a ec’akp nyam a.
66009019	Tasi ɛm a, sigbaŋkɔ a e lɛc a anŋ ɛl e nɛny a lel ɛl ec’ewl ab ab ɛm. Ɛl ec’ewl a b’ot morŋn es: -n’ɔny eŋ eke -li b’ot -n’am kokr agŋ low ŋuŋ.
66009020	Sica agŋ a eke ów eŋuŋ amua ibim ke anŋ a, itŋnm es an ɛl ec’abu ɛm eci ekŋ ekpr eke -li kokr a e lís; -l’igŋm abŋ eŋuŋ, sika ɛm sinyam, jɛtɛ efu ɛm eci, jawie ɛm eci, mebn ɛm eci lele ekŋ ɛm ec’a e nuŋ igŋ a -l’ɛlum es; mob amua eke ɔ́tum ɛknm es, irim ów, anm es yɛj’a.
66009021	-Li walm ɛl ec’agŋ ibi owi, ɛl e cam kok owi, ɛl eci nfaci ij lele ɛl e mil iy ab ab bɔbɔ yɛji -l’ɛlum es.
66010001	Ow e jam a, m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs lɛc ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke anŋ afr am us es. Jru wiwrm’n ab ɛtŋ nyamgodi iwr’r nuŋ af; in ec’any a anŋ ɛsɛ ligbn af ɛtŋ in ec’akr a anŋ ɛsɛ al ek’am iri imn afr ec’af.
66010002	N’ɔnym lɛl likekli eke fig ab. L’oc in e lidr e lakr a l’ɛw okij af ɛtŋ l’ɛw nɛmn ec’a wus af.
66010003	Li barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke kukuma bi barm ab af. Ɛtŋ eke li barm l’ok es a, nyamgbrany lɔbŋ a ɔdu eb babarm.
66010004	M’erur eke mi ki nɔn ów a eke nyamgbrany a dad a, kɔ m’iri lebl nyam dad’m ninɛ: "Òc nyamgbrany lɔbŋ a ec’ów a eke dad a ɛw es sos ɛm; kì nɔn."
66010005	Sica afr ɛrm ɛs a eke m’ɛkn inym es okij af lele wus af ab a, igbl lidr abu ogŋ,
66010006	ɛtŋ ij nɛny Nyam ek’anŋ owr sɛgŋ fɛŋ ke kok afr, wus, okij lele ob fɛŋ ab a e nin ɛm. Li dad ninɛ: "Ɛmɛny Nyam k’ow ekum ij!
66010007	Kɔ wanci ab af eke lɔbŋ ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a b’ow ɔb nuŋ am afl in e krɔkr a, yogŋ anake Nyam e low a eke lɔl es a b’ow iy nɛny ɛsɛ elel eke li dad ow e low l’ok in eci juma kok ɛsɛl ek’el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab af a."
66010008	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny lebl a eke anŋ afr ikŋ m’iri a, am dad’m ɛsɛ: "Ìm oc lɛl likekli a eke fig anŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a ek’inym es okij af lele wus af ab a ec’abu ɛm a."
66010009	M’im mi titm afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛtŋ m’ibrm’n eke li k’oc lɛl likekli a n’ɔŋ’m. Li dad’m ninɛ: "Òc ij. Li b’ow li ded’ŋ nɛnym ɛsɛ mow mun af, kɔ li b’ow li lol’ŋ lokm."
66010010	M’oc lɛl a afr ɛrm ɛs a ec’abu ɛm ɛtŋ m’ij. Nawrɛ, l’ɛw mrɛmrɛ ɛm e nɛnym a ɛsɛ mow mun af, kɔ eke m’akŋ m’ɛmn a, l’ɛw’m lolo lokm.
66010011	Ɛtŋ sica wɛl dad’m ninɛ: "Ow it ke ɛmɛny ím ɔb Nyam e kokoba ok agŋ, ɛb ɛb, ɛbr ɛbr, lele ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ab."
66011001	Ow e jam a, wɛl ɔŋ’m likŋ sreŋ nyam eke wɛl b’oc bɛbmn ob, ɛtŋ wɛl dad’m ninɛ: "Ìm bɛbmn Nyamel gbɛl a lele egb waw usu ab ab, ke áwl agŋ a eke b’igŋ Nyam nuŋ ɛm yogŋ a yɛji.
66011002	Gbɛkɔ ɛ̀w Nyamel gbɛl a e gbugŋ ab es, kì bɛbmn, aŋke wɛl oc ɔŋ Nyam any uwm ɛsɛl eke b’ow uyu ob fɛŋ af ŋuŋn ɛb lala ab ɛm toŋ awl ekŋ yony miy yony.
66011003	Ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɛrm ɛm ec’adaŋku yony a sus niŋn mob ow. -Li b’ow -l’ɔb Nyam ec’amani a toŋ sɛgŋ fandi sɛgŋ ekŋ lɛw nyahan."
66011004	Adaŋku yony a el oliv ekŋ yony a lele mun al yony a ek’anŋ wus ec’Es Ɛw a ec’any af a.
66011005	Ek’ɛgŋ nyam am erur eke ki kok ɛl low ŋuŋ, al b’anŋ ɛl e nɛnym a am ok ɔkm tɛtul ɛl ec’efnu a trɛ trɛ trɛ. Ɛɛ, ɛbɛn ek’ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow ɔl ɛl e low ŋuŋ kok es a b’ow uw ana.
66011006	Adaŋku amua ɔny abusu eke k’ɛdŋn nyam eke k’an ɔpar wus es a, sɛgŋ a nimum eke -n’am ɔb agŋ Nyam ec’amani a. -N’ɔny abusu eke -li k’itŋn mij el mebl, ɛtŋ -n’ɔny abusu yɛj’eke -li k’ɔŋ abu ɛyr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ fɛŋ ów wus af, sakp abi a eke -li b’erur a.
66011007	Gbɛkɔ ba -li b’uwar ɛl ec’amani ɔb a, ndey a eke b’anŋ nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, b’ow ogŋ ɛl ar, akm ɛl es ke ibi ɛl.
66011008	Ɛl e sos megl ugŋn a b’ow anŋ ɛb gbɛl a ec’ɛjɛm araŋn a, yogŋ a eke wɛl ɛw ɛl Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ olikŋ af a. Nyandrɛ ɛm e nin eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ ɛb a el Sodɔm oglog Ejipt.
66011009	Agŋ agŋ a fɛŋ, eb eb a fɛŋ, ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ lele ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ab ec’agŋ a b’ow lɛr ɛl e sos megl ugŋn a toŋ sɛgŋ nyahan lele likpr ab, ɛtŋ k’ow erurm eke wɛl k’im ot ɛl es.
66011010	Wus ec’agŋ a sos ɛm b’ow iŋn, ɛl e luw a eci; -li b’ow -li kok sos ɛm iŋn ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’aparir ob, aŋke Nyam e kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl yony na ɔŋ ɛl -l’ɛkn gbre nɔnɔ.
66011011	Gbɛkɔ eke sɛgŋ nyahan lele likpr ab ab ɛc a, Nyam fuf kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl yony a in ec’owr anŋ e sel a, ɛtŋ ow igbm ɛl. Ow ɔŋ agŋ a fɛŋ eke am lɛr ɛl a erŋn ligbɛl ɔny.
66011012	Kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl yony a iri lebl tuɔtuɔ nyam ek’anŋ afr am ikŋ dad ɛl ɛsɛ: "Ùyur owr aŋa!" Ɛtŋ ɛl ec’efnu a fɛŋ ek’am lɛr ɛl a ec’any af, -l’uyu afr e jru ɛm.
66011013	Wanci ab af cɛ, wus umu lɛc ɛm. Ɛb a ec’ogog lɛw ɛm e nyam bubm ok ɛtŋ agŋ fandi lɔbŋ ɛŋn luw wus a ek’umu ab ɛm. Agŋ bɛb a ek’anŋ owr a erŋn afŋn es toŋ ɛtŋ -n’am ɔŋ Nyam ek’anŋ afr a anygbɛl.
66011014	Sica yony ɛm ec’abu ɛyr a ɛc ŋ̂. Gbɛkɔ, ɛ̀wr ɛrm! Ow k’ow ibnm ɛtŋ nyahan ɛm ec’a yɛji b’ow ow.
66011015	Lɔbŋ ɛm ec’ afr ɛrm ɛs a afl in e krɔkr a. Ebl nɔnɔ anŋ afr am ikŋ lɛc ɛm dad ɛsɛ: "Sica wus eci es ɛw a e low anŋ ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ lel in e Mesi ab ab ec’abu ɛm, ɛtŋ es ɛw na b’ow anŋ sɛgŋ fɛŋ!"
66011016	Agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab a ek’ɛgŋ ɛgŋ anŋ in e lɛkpn af Nyam ec’any af a, ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ am igŋ’n nuŋ dad ɛsɛ:
66011017	"Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ŋ eke anŋ yɛfɛnyna ke anŋ god’ɛtŋ a, s’am ɛlu’ŋ bia eke oc ŋ ec’abusu ligbɛl ab ɛm sigm ŋ ec’es ɛw ab es a.
66011018	Ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ebl ɛrm, kɔ sica ŋ ec’ɛrm bebl a anake am ɛy ɔkm a. Wanci a eke ki jɛj agŋ ek’uw a e low ok ab ana. Ŋ eci juma kok ɛsɛl ek’el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci wanci a eke k’ɛŋn ɛl ec’ob ap a anake ow a. Agŋ a fɛŋ, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab ek’el ŋ eci ke b’ɛlum’ŋ ɔmn ɛm a, yɛji b’ow ɛŋn ɛl eci. Wanci a eke b’ow ŋuŋn agŋ a eke bi ŋuŋn wus ab ana."
66011019	Sica Nyamel gbɛl a ek’anŋ afr a fig, ɛtŋ sinm araka a ɛy ɔkm. Afr am ŋɛŋn, nyamgbrany am babarm, wus am umu ɛtŋ nyamok am an ok wus.
66012001	Ca ɛmɛny mɛny ɛwr ligbɛl nyam ɛy ɔkm afr: ow el yɔw nyam eke ligbn iwr ɛlul ɛm ɛsɛ mob sus ɛm af, ke awl anŋ in ec’akr ew a. L’us es ɛw e tufɛ eke mílɛ́l lɛw yony anŋ af.
66012002	Lok usu’r bɛbmn iy ew ab, ɛtŋ iy a eke am ɔnyn’n a am ɔŋ’n li babarm.
66012003	Ɛmɛny mɛny ɛwr ɛjeci nyam ɛy ɔkm afr: ow el tamranji nyam eke ebl es kondoŋ ke ɛli eŋ lɔbŋ lele ɔcɔwr lɛw ab. Nuŋ nyam nyam fɛŋ af a, es ɛw e tufɛ anŋ.
66012004	In e luwl ab ɛm, li papl afr e mílɛ́l sakp nyahan eci akp nyam ɛm a es l’ok wus. Ɛtŋ l’igb l’ow n’inym es l’ɔbr yɔw a ek’iy am ɔnyn ab any, ba ow b’ew iy a ke kpɛkŋ n’ɔ́ny n’ɛmn.
66012005	Yɔw a ew iy igŋ nyam eke b’ow ɛw ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ es abusu ligbɛl ɛm. Ɛtŋ kpɛkŋ wɛl oc iy a im ɛw es Nyam lele in ec’atufu lɛkpn ab ab e saw.
66012006	Kɔ yɔw a gbɛ, l’uru es n’im loj, yogŋ a eke Nyam kok usu nyam ɛw’r es, eke wɛl k’ɔŋ’n ob l’ij toŋ sɛgŋ fandi sɛgŋ ekŋ lɛw nyahan a.
66012007	Ɛtŋ mum ɛy afr yogŋ; Mikaɛl lele in ec’ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab ogŋ mum tamranji a lele in ec’afr ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab.
66012008	Kɔ tamranji a eb ɛ́s; ow ɔŋ in lel in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab -n’ɔnym abusu eke -li k’anŋ afr yogŋ ij.
66012009	Wɛl ɔny tamranji a ɔwl gbeŋ. In anake lɛgŋ sig ab ɛm l’el lorŋn a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ agn oglog Satan, ke b’ɛju wus nimum ec’agŋ a. Wɛl ɔny ɔwl’l wus in lel in ec’ɛrm ɛsɛl ab ab.
66012010	Ɛtŋ afr m’iri lebl nyam barm tuɔtuɔ ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Sica es eb ɛlu eci lɛgŋ a ow ŋ̂! Ɛy e Nyam a ɛlu in ec’abusu a lele es ɛw ab ab ɔkm! Sica es ɛw a anŋ in e Mesi a abu ɛm, aŋke wɛl ɔny ɛy lisijimɛl a ec’ɛgŋ a eke b’ok ɛl ów af a ɔwl gbeŋ. Ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab li b’ok wɛl ów af ɛy e Nyam a ec’any af.
66012011	Gbɛkɔ ɛy lisijimɛl a akm’n es licɛbli a e mebl ab ɛm lel ow e daŋku a eke -l’ijr ab ɛm, aŋke -l’erurm ɛl ec’owr anŋ a toŋ -l’urum luw bɔbɔ yɛji.
66012012	Ow sosiɛm a, afr lele ɔny eke iir ɛm ab ab, kòkr sos ɛm iŋn! Gbɛkɔ wus lel okij ab, gbre él ɔny eci! Agn us es ow ɛŋn ɔny, ɛrm bebl iy’r ɛm gbɔŋ, aŋke l’uw any eke sɛgŋ tɛl cɛ anŋ’n."
66012013	Eke tamranji a b’ɛkn eke wɛl ɔny ɔwl’l wus a, l’igb n’am ogŋ yɔw a eke ew iy igŋ ab es.
66012014	Gbɛkɔ yɔw a ɛŋn káká ligbɛl nyam ec’ɔw yony eke li k’oc ke l’ígb toŋ l’ók usu a eke wɛl kok ɛw’r es loj a, yec’ɛtŋ ke li kpáb es lorŋn a e lís, ke yogŋ wɛl ɔ́ŋ’n ob l’ij toŋ akpo nyahan lele likpr ab.
66012015	Ɛtŋ lorŋn a am ɛgbl mij ok es ɛsɛ mij ewl mij gbɛl af, yec’ɛtŋ ke ow éb yɔw a.
66012016	Gbɛkɔ wus ow ɛlum yɔw a abu: l’ɔdu mij bubutɛ a eke tamranji a ɛgbl ok es a fɛŋ l’eb.
66012017	Sica tamranji a ɛrm am ebl nɔnɔ yɔw a e lís, ɛtŋ n’im n’am ogŋ mum yɔw a ec’ey likpr ab ab, ɛl a eke b’ɛlum Nyam e sol a ke b’ucu low nɛnyɛmbri nyam eke Jesu ɛlu ɔkm a ɔny es a.
66012018	Ɛtŋ tamranji a ɛc inym es okij nɛny e sɛc ab af.
66013001	Ow e jam a, m’ɛkn ndey nyam anŋ okij ɛm ɛy ɔkm. L’ɛli ɔcɔwr lɛw lele eŋ lɔbŋ ab; in e licɔwr fɛŋ af a, es ɛw e tufɛ anŋ; ɛtŋ in e nuŋ fɛŋ af a, nin eke bi wɛwr Nyam anŋ.
66013002	Ndey a eke m’ɛkn a ot fabn es, in ec’akr a ɛw ɛgbɛl ɛsɛ urs ec’ab af, ɛtŋ in e nɛny a anŋ ɛsɛ kukuma ec’ab af. Tamranji a afl in e lɛc a, in ec’es ɛw a lele in ec’abusu ɔny ab ab es ɔŋ’n.
66013003	Ndey a ec’eŋ a e nyam ob kok ɛsɛ ek’ow’n k’uw af, gbɛkɔ ob a eke kok’r luw ec’a as. Ow ɔŋ wus nimum erur ow e low ɛtŋ am us ndey a jam.
66013004	Ɛtŋ agŋ a fɛŋ am igŋ tamranji a nuŋ, aŋke ow afl abusu es ɔŋ ndey a. Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny ɛl a cɛ, -n’am igŋ ndey a yɛji nuŋ -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ot ndey ab es ɛtŋ bwo ɔtu eke k’akm’n es ee?"
66013005	Ɛtŋ ndey a ɛŋn abusu eke ki dad es ɛfu lele ɛgŋ wɛwr e sodad ab ok Nyam af; n’ɛŋn abusu eke li ki kok low toŋ awl ekŋ yony miy yony.
66013006	Ɛtŋ ndey a am wɛwr Nyam; n’am dad ow e nin, ow ec’ɛb ir usu a lele agŋ a ek’ir afr ab ab ec’odad ŋuŋ.
66013007	Abusu ɛru’r es eke li k’ogŋ Nyam ec’agŋ a ar ke l’ákm wɛl es; n’ɛŋn abusu a eb eb fɛŋ af, agŋ agŋ fɛŋ af, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ af lele ɛb ɛb fɛŋ af ab.
66013008	Wus nimum ec’agŋ a b’ow igŋ’n nuŋ, agŋ a eke wus e kok ɛm ɛtŋ ɛl ec’en a anm sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a. Sel ɛŋn e lɛl na, licɛbli a eke wɛl wawr egb a eci.
66013009	Ke ɛgŋ ek’ɛli ɔru a íri sɛnyn sɛnyn!
66013010	Ɛgŋ eke in ec’a ow el eke wɛl k’ɔny ɛlu’l sobel ɛm a, wɛl b’ow ɔny ɛlu’l sobel ɛm; ɛgŋ eke in ec’a ow el lab ler ɛm ɛm, li k’uw a, lab ler ɛm ɛm li b’ow luw. Na sosiɛm anake agŋ a ek’el Nyam ec’a it eke k’ɔny ɛrm susu lele ɔmn ab a.
66013011	Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn ndey ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm. L’ɛli ɔcɔwr yony ɛsɛ licɛb ec’ab af ɛtŋ n’am dad odad ɛsɛ tamranji af.
66013012	Ndey na ɔny abusu ɛsɛ krɛkrɛ ec’a ek’anŋ okij ɛm ɛy ɔkm ab af, ɛtŋ n’am kok juma ow e nin ɛm. N’am ɔny wus nimum lel in ec’agŋ a fɛŋ ab lɛc ɛm igŋ krɛkrɛ eci ndey a nuŋ, ndey a eke ob kok nuŋ ɛsɛ ek’ow’n k’uw af ke ow as a.
66013013	Ndey na ek’anŋ wus ɛm ɛy ɔkm a, am kok mɛny ɛwr ɛgbɛl; n’am ɔŋ al bɔbɔ yɛji anŋ afr ok wus agŋ a pupukpaŋ ec’any af.
66013014	Ɛtŋ n’am irmn wus ec’agŋ a, mɛny ɛwr a eke n’am ɔtu li kok krɛkrɛ eci ndey a eci nin ɛm a. N’am ɛju agŋ eke k’aku likŋ ɛgŋ nyam, krɛkrɛ eci ndey a e sos usr eci, ndey a eke lab kok ob nuŋ ɛsɛ ek’ow’n k’uw af, ke ɛwl mɛny anŋ owr a.
66013015	Ɛtŋ yony ɛm eci ndey a ɛŋn abusu eke k’ɔŋ ndey krɛkrɛ a eci likŋ ɛgŋ a sel, yec’ɛtŋ ke likŋ ɛgŋ a ɔ́tu dad odad ke ɔ́ŋ wɛl ibi agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɛ́gŋm igŋm’n nuŋ a.
66013016	N’ɔny agŋ a fɛŋ, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, egbreŋgbi lele ɔgbɔru ab, ewi lele madu ab lɛc ɛm eke k’ɛw mɛny ɛwr nyam lidr abu af oglog anyafr.
66013017	Ow ɔŋ ɛtŋ ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke mɛny ɛwr anm af a ɔtum eke k’ɔl ob oglog ɛw ob an; mɛny ɛwr a el ndey a e nin oglog ob awl e mɔni ek’el nin a ec’a.
66013018	Aŋa anake ow am ibrm eke ɛgŋ k’ɔny sɛwr a. Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ yec’eke ɔny nuŋ ɛm ɔny a ɔtu eke k’uw ndey a e mɔni a ec’abi a eke k’ij a e nyandrɛ ab any, aŋke ow el ɛgŋ e nin. Ob awl e mɔni a el ekŋ yen yen sakp nɔhɔn ekŋ nyahan miy nɔhɔn.
66014001	Mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn licɛbli a eke inym es Siɔn e lafɛny ab af, in lele agŋ fandi ekŋ lɔbŋ miy yar eke wɛl nɔn in e nin a lele Ɛs ec’ab ab ɛw anyafr a.
66014002	M’iri lebl nyam ek’anŋ afr am ow, ke am ikŋ ɛsɛ okij e mra af, oglog ɛsɛ nyamgbrany ligbɛl ec’ikŋ ab af. Lebl a eke m’iri a anŋ ɛsɛ saŋgo ɔny ɛsɛl e mob a eke b’ɔny ab af.
66014003	Agŋ amua fɛŋ am ɛgŋ ɛj owr nyam atufu lɛkpn a, mindey yar a lele agŋ ekpekp ab ab ec’any af. Ɛgŋ kaka ɔtum eke ki wewr ɛj a, eke ow elm agŋ fandi ekŋ lɔbŋ miy yar a eke el wus aŋa ec’agŋ a eke wɛl ɔl a cɛ.
66014004	Agŋ amua kokm sikpl owi ɔyɔw ab, -l’ayl. -Li b’us licɛbli a jam usu fɛŋ eke ow b’im a. Wɛl ɔl ɛl agŋ ec’araŋn eke -li k’el agŋ krɛkrɛ eke wɛl k’oc ap Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab.
66014005	Lɛgŋ kaka -n’ɔnym yadŋ; -li kokm sikpl kaka.
66014006	Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’am igb afr kpoŋ ɛm a ɛc. N’ɔnym Amani Mamn a ek’ɔnym uwr ab ab eke li k’ɔb l’ok wus nimum, ɛb ɛb fɛŋ ec’agŋ, eb eb fɛŋ, ɛbr ɛbr fɛŋ lele agŋ agŋ fɛŋ ab.
66014007	N’am dad lebl gege l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛ̀lumn Nyam ke ɔ́ŋn in anygbɛl! Aŋke wanci ow eke li b’ow li jɛj wus nimum e low l’ok. Ìgŋn ɛgŋ a eke kok afr, wus, okij lele mij ewl mij fɛŋ ab a nuŋ!"
66014008	Yony ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a anŋ krɛkrɛ ec’a e jam ow, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Babilɔn ɛb gbɛl a ɛy wus! L’el ɛb a eke ɛju ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ɛgŋ in e mar a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ij nfaci, ke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm a."
66014009	Nyahan ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a anŋ yony a e jam ow, ɛtŋ am dad lebl gege ɛsɛ: "Eke ɛgŋ nyam am igŋ ndey a lele in e likŋ ɛgŋ ab ab nuŋ, ɛtŋ n’ɛŋn ow eci mɛny ɛwr a anyafr lele abu af ab,
66014010	in yɛji, li b’ow l’ɛgŋ mar a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm a. Mar na b’ow ɛw tuɔtuɔ ɛtŋ Nyam b’ow ɛtm ok in ec’ɛrm bebl a e kpɔk ab ɛm. Agŋ amua b’ow ij gbre nɔnɔ al ɛm lele mebn eke ler ec’al ab ɛm, afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lala lele licɛbli ab ab ec’any af.
66014011	Al a eci mregbn a eke am ɔŋ ɛl -l’ij gbre nɔnɔ a, am uyu afr akpo akpo fɛŋ eci. Agŋ amua eke am igŋ ndey a lele in e likŋ ɛgŋ ab ab nuŋ, ke ɛŋn in e nin a e mɛny ɛwr a ɔnym sel eb ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab."
66014012	Na sosiɛm anake agŋ a ek’el Nyam eci, b’ɛlum in e sol a, ke ɔny ɔmn Jesu ɛm a k’ɔny ɛrm susu a.
66014013	Ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam ek’anŋ afr am dad’m ɛsɛ: "Nɔ̀n odad na: ehe él agŋ a eke caca ɛm am uw Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ e juma kok ɛm a eci! Ɛɛ, Abŋ am dad eke agŋ amua in anŋ ehe ɛm. Sica wɛ’n ɔtu eke wɛ’n k’eb sel juma a fɛŋ eke wɛ’n kok a eci, aŋke wɛl eci juma a e liy a in am us wɛl jam."
66014014	Ow e jam a, mi bi lɛr ɛtŋ m’ɛkn jru ufu nyam. Jru ab af, ob nyam ek’anŋ ɛsɛ ɛgŋ af sig es. In e nuŋ af a sika tufɛ anŋ ɛtŋ egb ubr lab fufu kɔnɔ nyam anŋ’n abu ɛm.
66014015	Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm ɛy ɔkm ke barm lebl tuɔtuɔ ɛm am dad in a eke sig es jru ab af a ɛsɛ: "Òc ŋ ec’egb ubr lab a ke úb gɔŋ, aŋke wus eci egb a ek’ebl ub ec’a e wanci ow."
66014016	Ɛtŋ ɛgŋ a eke sig es jru ab af a oc in ec’egb ubr lab a ɛtŋ l’ɛw abu l’ub wus nimum ec’egb a.
66014017	Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam anŋ afr e Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm ɛy ɔkm; in yɛji, n’ɔnym egb ubr lab fufu kɔnɔ nyam ab.
66014018	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam eke ɛw al es a anŋ egb waw usu a ɛy ɔkm. Li barm lɛc ɛm n’am dad yec’a ek’ɔnym egb ubr lab fufu ab ab a l’ɛsɛ: "Òc ŋ e lab fufu a ke úb wus e viny egbekl a, aŋke in ec’ey a ebl."
66014019	Afr ɛrm ɛs a oc in ec’egb ubr lab a ɛtŋ ɛw abu ub wus e viny egbekl a ɛtŋ ot ok ɛl es ifir ob gbɛl ab ɛm eke -li k’ɛkn Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a.
66014020	Wɛl ifi viny ey ab es es ifir ob ab ɛm baŋn a e jam a; ɛtŋ es ifir ob ab ɛm mebl nɔnɔ ewl ok ɔkm. Mebl a ewl toŋ im igŋ kilo ekŋ yen yen sakp nyahan, ɛtŋ uyu toŋ ok sigbaŋkɔ a e nɛnɛkp a e nɛny nɛny.
66015001	Ɛtŋ afr m’ɛkn mɛny ɛwr ligbɛl ɛjeci nyam eke in e low am iti’m any: afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ eke ɔnym es abal el ɛm ec’abu ɛyr lɔbŋ ab, eke ɛl ɛm Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a b’ow ɛdŋ nuŋ a.
66015002	Ɛtŋ m’ɛkn okij eke ayl toŋ am ɛkan es, ke al wuwlm ab. Agŋ a fɛŋ eke eb any ndey a, in e likŋ ɛgŋ a lele in e nin a e mɔni a ec’abi a eke k’ij ab af a, inym es afr okij na eke ayl toŋ am ɛkan es ab af. Ɛtŋ -n’ɔnym sisaŋgo a eke Nyam ɔŋ ɛl ab ab.
66015003	-N’am ɛgŋ Nyam e juma kok ɛs Mois lele licɛbli ab ab ec’ɛj a: "Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ɛbɛn eke ŋ e sijuma a agb ke akpl ana! Ɛb ɛb ec’Ɛb Ebu, ɛbɛn eke ŋ ec’ów a eke bɛbm ok es a el nyim nyim ke el nawrɛ ana!
66015004	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ, bwo ec’ɛgŋ tasi ɔtu eke k’ɛluam’ŋ ee? Bwo ec’ɛgŋ ɔtu eke ki kɔklam’ŋ ee? Ŋ sɔny coco el lala. Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ b’ow igŋ’ŋ nuŋ, aŋke ŋ ec’ów nyim nyim a ok ɔkm kpata -l’ɛkn."
66015005	Ow e jam a, afr, m’ɛkn Nyamel gbɛl a fig. Ɛm yogŋ Nyam eci sinm a eci gbad ɛm êl a anŋ.
66015006	Afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a ek’ɔnym abu ɛyr lɔbŋ ab ab a anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm ok ɔkm. -Li sus mob eke ufu pum pum pum ke am jɛjn, ɛtŋ -l’ucu ɔhɔny eke wɛl kok sika mij ɛm ɛr ɛm.
66015007	Mindey yar ab ɛm eci nyam ɔŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a sika ɛm kpɔk lɔbŋ. Ɛm yogŋ, Nyam ek’anŋ god’ɛtŋ a ec’ɛrm bebl a iy ɛm gbɔŋ.
66015008	Mregbn iy Nyamel ab ɛm gbɔŋ; ow el Nyam ec’anygbɛl a lele in ec’abusu ab ab. Ow ɔŋ ɛgŋ kaka k’ɔtum ɛym Nyamel ab ɛm, eke afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a eci abu ɛyr owi a eke ot ow a e low k’iym nɛny.
66016001	Ow e jam a, m’iri lebl ligbɛl nyam anŋ Nyamel gbɛl ab ɛm am ikŋ dad afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a ɛsɛ: "Ìmn wus ke ɛ́wal Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl a ek’anŋ kpɔk lɔbŋ ab ɛm a es!"
66016002	Krɛkrɛ ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok wus af, ɛtŋ abi ɛgbɛl eke bi dudu a ok agŋ a eke ndey a e mɛny ɛwr anŋ af, ke b’igŋ in e likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ a.
66016003	Yony ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok okij ɛm. Mij a itŋn anŋ ɛsɛ lɛgŋuw e mebl ab af, ɛtŋ ob fɛŋ ek’anŋ owr okij ɛm a uw.
66016004	Nyahan ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a im ɛtŋ ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok simij ewl mij lele mij eŋ ɛm ab, ɛtŋ simij a titŋn el mebl.
66016005	Ɛtŋ m’iri afr ɛrm ɛs a ek’ɛw mij es a am dad ɛsɛ: "Ŋ ek’anŋ yɛfɛnyna ke anŋ god’ɛtŋ, ŋ ek’el lala a, eke ow el nɛnɛ anake jɛj ok a, ke el jɛj ok ɛs nyim nyim.
66016006	Tasi ɛm a, agŋ amua ibi agŋ lala a ek’el ŋ ec’a lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab ab ok mebl es, ɛtŋ sica ɛl yɛji ɔŋ ɛl mebl -l’ɛgŋ. Ow ek’it ɛl ec’ab ana!"
66016007	Ɛtŋ m’iri lebl nyam anŋ egb waw usu a am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛɛ, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs, ŋ e jɛj ok fɛŋ el nawrɛ lele nyim nyim ab!"
66016008	Yar ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok ligbn af, ɛtŋ ligbn ɛŋn abusu eke ki kakŋ wus ec’agŋ a in ec’al ab ɛm.
66016009	Agŋ al am kakŋ sos, ɛtŋ -n’am wɛwr Nyam a ek’ɔny abusu abu ɛyr amua af a e nin a. Gbɛkɔ -l’ɛgŋm eke -li k’itŋn ɛrm ɛm bake -n’ɔŋ ow any.
66016010	Yen ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok ndey a ec’atufu lɛkpn ab af, ɛtŋ in ec’es ɛw a ɛy ncebn ɛm. Agŋ a fɛŋ am akŋn anm gbre eke -n’am ij a eci.
66016011	-N’am wɛwr afr e Nyam a ɛl e gbre e -n’am ij lele abi ab ab sosiɛm. Gbɛkɔ -l’igŋm ɛl ec’ów eŋuŋ a -l’okm es.
66016012	Nɔhɔn ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok mij ligbɛl a eke wɛl b’ɛsŋ Efrat ab ɛm. Mij a mam es ɛtŋ ɛw ɛ́b ebu a eke b’anŋ yogŋ a eke ligbn b’igb a ejagb es ow.
66016013	Tamranji a, ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu ab ab e nɛnym a, m’ɛkn abŋ eŋuŋ nyahan ek’anŋ ɛsɛ betibɔm af am ok ɔkm.
66016014	-L’el abŋ eŋuŋ eke bi kok simɛny ɛwr. -N’aam -n’ɛŋn wus ec’ɛ́b ebu a fɛŋ, yec’ɛtŋ ke -l’as wɛl luku Nyam Abusu Ɛs e lɛgŋ ligbɛl a e mum ogŋ a eci.
66016015	Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ dad ninɛ: "Kin, m’am ow ɛsɛ ulu af. Ehe él ɛgŋ yec’a eke anŋ any owr ke sus mob am eku, yec’ɛtŋ ke li k’íim sos ɔfr agŋ ɛknm in ec’ɛ́s a eci!"
66016016	Abŋ eŋuŋ a as ɛ́b ebu a luku usu nyam eke Ebre ɛm a wɛl b’ɛsŋ Armagedɔn.
66016017	Lɔbŋ ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ɛwl in e kpɔk ab ɛm ec’a es ok lɛf ɛm. Lebl nyam anŋ Nyamel ab ɛm barm tuɔtuɔ; ow el lebl ek’anŋ atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am ow. Ɛtŋ lebl a dad ninɛ: "Sica ow uwr ŋ̂!"
66016018	Ɛtŋ ɛbɛn a, afr am ŋɛŋn, nyamgbrany am babarm ɛtŋ wus am umu. Wus ec’umu ikŋ a, lɛgŋ a ɛtŋ eke agŋ anŋ wus a, -l’ɛknm ɛbɛn.
66016019	Baŋn gbɛl a ufŋ es ok sakp nyahan ɛtŋ ɛb ɛb a e baŋn baŋn a fɛŋ bubm ok. Nyam ijlm Babilɔn gbɛl ab es; n’ɔŋ eke ow k’ɛgŋ mar kpɔk gbɔŋ a ek’el in ec’ɛrm bebl ligbɛl a.
66016020	Lekr a fɛŋ irm ɛtŋ wɛl ɛ́knm mafɛny ij.
66016021	Ɛtŋ nyamok eku eku anŋ afr am an ok agŋ af; ɛtŋ agŋ am wɛwr Nyam, nyamok na sosiɛm, aŋke ow el ob eke ɔny lɛc nɔnɔ.
66017001	Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a ek’ɔnym kpɔk lɔbŋ ab a eci nyam ow dad’m ninɛ: "Òw, mi b’ow mi yɛgm’ŋ abu ɛyr a eke Nyam b’ow ɔŋ facyɔw gbɛl a eke inym es simij ewl mij nɔnɔ e nɛny a.
66017002	Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a ij nfaci in ab, ɛtŋ agŋ a eke ir wus na af a ɛgŋ in eci nfaci owi a e mar am ɔny."
66017003	Abŋ ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛs a oc’m im loj. Yogŋ, m’ɛkn yɔw nyam eke sig es ndey ebl kondoŋ af. Nyam eci wɛwr ec’en eb ndey a e sos a fɛŋ; ɛtŋ l’ɛli eŋ lɔbŋ lele ɔcɔwr lɛw ab.
66017004	Yɔw a ok gbad ebl mamn, l’ok sika ɛm miyob nɔnɔ, mebn amamn ɛm e miyob lele ayrɛ ɛm e miyob ab. N’ɔnym sika ɛm kpɔk ab. Ɛm yogŋ, in eci nfaci ij a eci kpɔtɔm owi a fɛŋ iy ɛm gbɔŋ.
66017005	In ec’anyafr a, wɛl nɔn nin eke ow eci nyandrɛ a lɔl es: 'Babilɔn gbɛl, afacyɔw lele wus na nimum ab eci musue owi fɛŋ ec’ɛl lis.'
66017006	M’ɛkn yɔw a eke Nyam ec’agŋ a lele agŋ a ek’ij Jesu eci daŋku ke wɛl ibi a eci mebl am ɛc any. Mi b’ɛkn’n a, low eb’m sos.
66017007	Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Kɔ bla sosiɛm ɛtŋ ow am iti’ŋ any ee? Mi b’ow m’ɛlu yɔw a eke sig es ndey ab af a lele ndey na eke ɛli eŋ lɔbŋ lele ɔcɔwr lɛw ab a e low eke lɔl es ɛm a ɔkm mi yɛgm’ŋ.
66017008	Ndey a eke ɛkn a, lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm a, wɛl ɛkn’n n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna n’anm owr ij. Gbɛkɔ li b’ow n’anŋ nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm l’ɛy ɔkm n’im in eci ŋuŋn eci. Ɛtŋ wus na ec’agŋ a eke wus eci nuŋ ɔb ɛm ɛtŋ wɛl nɔnm ɛl ec’en sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a, low b’ow iti any ndey a ec’ɛkn ɛm, aŋke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc a, n’anŋ owr, ɛtŋ yɛfɛnyna n’anm owr ij, kɔ li b’ow l’ɛwl l’ow.
66017009	Sica wɛl ɔ́ny nuŋ ɛm ɔny lele sɛwr ab gɔŋ! Eŋ lɔbŋ a el egigl lɔbŋ eke yɔw a sig es af a; ow el ɛ́b ebu lɔbŋ yɛji:
66017010	ɛl ɛm eci yen ok wus, nyam ɛw usu es, lɔbŋ ɛm ec’a k’owm. Lɛgŋ eke li b’ow l’ow a, ow b’ow el lɛgŋ tɛl cɛ eci.
66017011	Ndey ebl kondoŋ a eke lɛgŋ ek’ɛc ab ɛm anŋ owr, ke yɛfɛnyna anm owr ij a, in obi ɛm a, l’el niwn ɛm ec’ɛb ebu; ɛtŋ ɛsɛ lɔbŋ ab af, in yɛji n’aam in ec’ibi eci.
66017012	Ɔcɔwr lɛw a eke ɛkn a el ɛ́b ebu lɛw eke k’ɔbm nuŋ k’ɛwm usu es; gbɛkɔ ndey ab ab -li b’ow -n’ɛŋn abusu -l’ɛw usu es wanci nyam eci.
66017013	Ɛ́b ebu lɛw amua eci tutr a okr af; tutr a el ke -l’ot ɛl e lɛc a lele ɛl ec’abusu ab ab -l’ɛlu ndey a e lís e low kok ɛm.
66017014	-Li b’ow -l’ogŋ licɛbli a ar, gbɛkɔ licɛbli a b’ow akm ɛl es, aŋke l’el kɔtɔkɔ ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ lele ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ɛm ec’Ɛb Ebu ab; ɛtŋ in ec’agŋ nɛny nyam ɛsɛl a eke li sɔsum l’ot ke l’ɛsŋ ab ab, -li b’ow -l’akm wɛl es."
66017015	Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Simij a eke ɛkn yogŋ a eke facyɔw a sig es a el agŋ agŋ, bieku bieku, ɛb ɛb lele ɛbr ɛbr ab.
66017016	Ɔcɔwr lɛw a eke ɛkn a lele ndey ab ab b’ow ɔny facyɔw a eci sifn: -li b’ow -l’eb ow ec’ob fɛŋ eke ow ɔny a, -n’ɔŋ ow anŋ sos ɔfr. -Li b’ow -l’ot ow eci megl a fɛŋ -l’ij ke -l’ofŋ ow eci likpr a,
66017017	aŋke Nyam ɔŋ eke ɛl ec’ɛrm ab ɛm, -li ki kok low yec’a eke Nyam am erur a. Nɛny b’ow okr ɛl af -l’oc ɛl ec’es ɛw eci abusu a -li kok ndey a e lís e low toŋ ke Nyam eci sodad a fɛŋ íy nɛny.
66017018	Ca yɔw a eke ɛkn a el ɛb gbɛl a eke ɛw wus na nimum eci ɛ́b ebu a fɛŋ es a."
66018001	Na b’ɛc a, m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ afr am us es. N’ɔny abusu ligbɛl nyam, ɛtŋ in ec’anygbɛl a ayal wus na nimum.
66018002	L’ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ li dad ninɛ: "L’ɛy wus, Babilɔn gbɛl a ɛy wus! Sica ow el abŋ eŋuŋ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a ec’usu ek’ir, ɛl ec’es lɔl usu; aŋa anake ɔr ɛrŋ ɛrŋ lele mindey ek’ aylm ke wɛl b’ifn ab ir a.
66018003	Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a ɛgŋ in eci mar a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ij nfaci, ke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ im ɛy Nyam ec’ɛrm bebl ab ɛm a. Wus na eci ɛ́b ebu a igŋ’n af -l’ok nfaci ij owi ab ɛm, ɛtŋ wus na eci án ɔlu a el egbreŋgbi in ec’ob eke n’ɔny afŋn es a sosiɛm."
66018004	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’iri lebl ɛjeci nyam ek’anŋ afr am ikŋ ow dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛm ec’agŋ, òkr ɔkm ɛb ab ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke k’ánmn in e sikpl a e low ɛm, in eci abu ɛyr ɛgbɛl a eke b’ow ɛŋn’n a k’ɛ́ŋnm ɔny.
66018005	Tasi ɛm a, in eci sikpl a tatakŋ toŋ im ok afr, ɛtŋ Nyam ijlm in ec’ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony owi amua es.
66018006	Kòkr ɛb a low ɛsɛ elel eke li kokr agŋ ɛjec’ab af. Low yec’a eke li kok a, in yɛji kòkr ir ow eci sakp yony. Mij kpɔk a eke li bi wuwlm mar tuɔtuɔ ab n’ɔŋ agŋ ɛgŋ a, in yɛji mar eke ɛw tuɔtuɔ a, wùwlmn ow eci ɔtu sakp yony ab ɔŋn in l’ɛ́gŋ.
66018007	Anygbɛl owi a eke li kok lele ɛb sɛnyn a eke l’ij ab ab a, ɔ̀war ow eci dudu a lele ow eci gbre ab ab eke bɛbmn ab a ɔŋn in. Li bi dadr in ɛm l’ɛsɛ: 'M’ir aŋa ɛsɛ ɛb eb yɔw af, m’elm iŋnyɔw ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka mi k’ow m’ɛknm niŋn owi.'
66018008	Low na sosiɛm anake gbre owi a fɛŋ eke wɛl bɛbm ɛw’r es a b’ow ɛŋn’n a: ɔl ek’el luw eci, niŋn owi lele lek ab. Lɛgŋ nyam coco af fɛŋ b’ow ɛŋn’n ɛtŋ wɛl b’ow ɛtul il. Tasi ɛm a, Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ eke jɛj in e low a ok a ij lɛc nɔnɔ."
66018009	Eke wus eci ɛ́b ebu a eke in ab kok nfaci owi ke ir ɛb mɛwl ɛm a b’ow ɛkn ɛb a ek’ɛtu a eci mregbn a, -li b’ow -l’ikŋ ɔŋn -li kok sɔrŋ.
66018010	Ke in eci gbre owi a k’ɛ́ŋnm ɛl a, -li b’ow -li kpab ow es lís -n’im akpoj ke -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Bogŋ e gbre ana ee? Oy Babilɔn! Ɛb gbɛl ek’ij lɛc! Wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake wɛl ɔb’ŋ low a."
66018011	Wus na ec’án ɔlu a yɛji am ikŋ ɔŋn ɛtŋ am kok in eci sɔrŋ aŋke sica wɛl ɔ́lm ɛl ec’an ob a ij:
66018012	sika, jɛtɛ ufu, mebn amamn lele ayrɛ ab; gbad fuɛfuɛ, gbad ebl amamn, gbad frɛfrɛ; ekŋ sŋɔsŋɔ ɛrŋ ɛrŋ a fɛŋ, ɛyr nɛn ɛm ec’ob fɛŋ eke wɛl kok, ekŋ ek’il an, jawie, lowi oglog lebn mamn;
66018013	ekŋ sel sŋɔsŋɔ lele mob sɔsŋn mob ɛjec’ab, mijey, kpey lele ogŋ ab; mar, mun, ble mpupu lele miy ab; sed, mɛcɛb, sigbaŋkɔ lele ow eci mɛtŋ ab toŋ agŋ eci sos megl lele ow eci liy bɔbɔ yɛj’ab.
66018014	Wɛl am dad ɛsɛ: "Mob mob a fɛŋ ek’am erur a anm ŋ ogŋ a ij, ŋ ec’ob ɔny fɛŋ lele ŋ ec’ɛb ij sɛnyn ab ab irm; lɛgŋ kaka wɛl k’ow ɛŋnm ɛl ij!"
66018015	Án ɔlu a eke ɔl an ɛb ab ɛm ke ɔny ob a, -li b’ow -n’inym es akpoj, ɛb a eci gbre owi eke k’ɛŋn ɛl a sosiɛm. -Li b’ow -l’ikŋ ɔŋn -li kok sɔrŋ,
66018016	-li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ eci gbre anake ɛŋn ɛb gbɛl na ab ee? L’ɛw ob fuɛfuɛ sos, gbad ebl amamn, l’ok sika ɛm miyob, mebn amamn ɛm e miyob lele ayrɛ ɛm e miyob ab.
66018017	Ɛtŋ wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake mob amua fɛŋ irm a!" Simijɛtŋ a eci idr ɛsɛl a, agŋ a ek’us mij ɛl ab a, ɛm yogŋ eci juma kok ɛsɛl a, agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’ɛŋn ob ij mij af yogŋ a b’ow inym es akpoj.
66018018	Eke -l’ɛkan ɛb a ek’am ɛtu a eci mregbn a, -li b’ow -l’ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Ɛb kaka anm eke agb ot ɛb na es!"
66018019	-N’am ok siflefl nuŋ, -n’am ikŋ ɔŋn -li kok sɔrŋ ɛtŋ -n’am ɛlu lebl -li dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Kɔ bogŋ eci gbre anake ɛŋn ɛb gbɛl na ab ee? In ec’ob ɔny ab ɛm anake agŋ a fɛŋ eke ɔny simijɛtŋ okij na af a el egbreŋgbi a. Ɛtŋ wanci liy nyam af cɛ anake amua fɛŋ irm a!"
66018020	Afr, sos ɛm íŋn’ŋ Babilɔn eci wus eke ɛr ok a eci! Nyam ec’agŋ, ɛrm ɛsɛl lele kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab, sos ɛm íŋn ɔny aŋke Nyam jɛj ok’r low ŋuŋ a eke li kok ɔny a eci!
66018021	Ɛtŋ afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’ɔny lɛc a oc ma ɔlul lob legleg nyam ɔwl okij ɛm ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Ɛbɛn eke wɛl b’ow oc Babilɔn ɛb gbɛl a ɔwl lɛc ɛm ana, ɛtŋ lɛgŋ kaka wɛl k’ow ɛknm’n ij.
66018022	Lɛgŋ kaka ŋ ogŋ a wɛl k’ow irim saŋgo ɔny ɛsɛl ec’ɛj, ɛj ɛgŋ ɛsɛl, kete afl ɛsɛl, krɔkr afl ɛsɛl e lebl ij. Wɛl k’ow ɛŋnm mɛwl ɛs kaka fɛŋ ij; wɛl k’ow irim ob iny usu eci likekr ij.
66018023	Mun al a k’ow ayalm ŋ ogŋ a ij; wɛl k’ow irim ɔyɔw ɛcɛl owr owr eci sɔ́g ij. Ŋ eci án ɔlu a ɔny any akm wus na nimum ec’a, ɛtŋ ŋ eci cam owi ab ɛm, irmn ɛbr ɛbr a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a."
66018024	Babilɔn yogŋ anake kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl, Nyam ec’agŋ a lele wus na nimum ec’agŋ a fɛŋ eke wɛl ibi ab ab eci mebl a ok es a.
66019001	Low na b’oc es a, afr m’iri lebl tuɔtuɔ nyam ek’ot agŋ nɔnɔ eci likekr es, ke am dad ɛsɛ: "Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Aŋke es eb ɛlu, anygbɛl lele lɛc fɛŋ ab a el ɛy e Nyam a eci!
66019002	In eci jɛj ok owi a fɛŋ b’el nawrɛ lele nyim nyim ab! Ɛtŋ ow ɛm a, l’ɔb facyɔw gbɛl a eke b’ɔny wus ec’agŋ a ok in eci nfaci ij owi ɛm a low. Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a eke l’ibi a, Nyam kok li sɔg ow e labm."
66019003	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny -n’am dad -l’ɛsɛ: "Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Ɛb gbɛl a eke wɛl ɛtul a eci mregbn a am il godo godo fɛŋ eci!"
66019004	Agŋ ekpekp likŋ lele yar ab a lele mindey yar ab ab ok ɔwrɔkp wus ɛtŋ am igŋ Nyam eke sig es atufu lɛkpn af a nuŋ, ɛtŋ am dad ɛsɛ: "Amɛn! Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ!"
66019005	Lebl nyam anŋ atufu lɛkpn ab af am ikŋ dad ɛsɛ: "Ɔny a fɛŋ a eke eel Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, ɔny eke b’ɔnyn in ec’ɛlum a, kɔ̀klmn ɛy e Nyam a!"
66019006	Ɛmɛny m’iri lebl ek’ot agŋ nɔnɔ eci lebl es; ow am ikŋ ɛsɛ okij eci mra eke b’ɛlu ab af, ɛsɛ nyamgbrany af. Kin lebl a ec’odad eke am dad: "Lili! Lili! Kɔ̀klmn Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ! Aŋke ɛy Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs sigm in ec’es ɛw ab es!
66019007	S’ɛ́lul sos ɛm iŋn e lili, s’ánŋn sos ɛm iŋn ɛm, si kɔ́klmn in! Aŋke licɛbli a eci mɛbi a ec’es gbɛgbl a e lɛgŋ ow ŋ̂, in e yɔw a bɛbm sos inym es.
66019008	Nyam ɔŋ’n ob sos ɛw ufu fuɛfuɛ ek’am jɛjn eke li k’ɛw sos." (Ob sos ɛw ufu fuɛfuɛ a el Nyam ec’agŋ a ec’ów nyim nyim a.)
66019009	Afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Nɔ̀n dad ɛsɛ: Ehe él agŋ a eke wɛl ɛsŋ licɛbli a e mɛbi a ec’es gbɛgbl ab ɛm a eci." Ɛtŋ l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Amua, ow el Nyam ec’odad ebl tasi."
66019010	M’ok ɔwrɔkp wus in ec’akr esr a eke mi k’igŋ’n nuŋ, kɔ li dad’m ninɛ: "Kì kok! Ɛm yɛji, juma kok ɛs ɛsɛ ŋ af, ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl a eke ij Jesu eci low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke ɛlu ɔkm a eci daŋku ab af. Nyam anake it eke k’igŋ nuŋ a! Low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a eke Jesu ij ow eci daŋku a, el kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci odad a eke dad a eci liy tasi."
66019011	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ek’agbr ɛm, ke gbaŋkɔ ufu nyam ɛy ɔkm. Ɛgŋ a ek’uyu gbaŋkɔ ab af a, wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Nɛny Nyam Ij Ɛs lele Low Nawrɛ Ɛs ab; in e jɛj ok a lele ar ogŋ ab ab b’el nɛnyɛmbri nyam ɛm eci.
66019012	In ec’anyamn a am iri ɛsɛ al af, ɛtŋ es ɛw eci tufɛ nɔnɔ anŋ’n nuŋ. Wɛl nɔn nin nyam in af ek’ɛgŋ kaka uwm ow e low any, ek’ow elm in sɔny coco cɛ.
66019013	In eci mob af ɛw a eke li sus a el mebl ɔfr. Ɛgŋ a wɛl b’ɛsŋ’n Nyam Odad.
66019014	Afr eci ar ɛsɛl a sus mob efu fuɛfuɛ ek’ayl ɛtŋ uyu sigbaŋkɔ efu af am us’r jam.
66019015	Lab ler ɛm fufu nyam ɛy’r ɔkm nɛnym agŋ ec’ɔr eci. Li b’ow ni nyimn wɛl lɛc ɛm ɛtŋ li b’ow li yɛgm Nyam Abusu Ɛs ec’ɛrm bebl ligbɛl a. Li b’ow l’ifi wɛl es lɛc ɛm ɛsɛ elel eke wɛl b’ifi viny ey es es ifir ob ɛm ab af.
66019016	Kin nin a eke wɛl nɔn in e mob af ɛw ab af lele in eci im ab ab af a: 'Ɛ́b ebu fɛŋ ɛm ec’Ɛb Ebu lele kɔtɔkɔ ɛm e Kɔtɔkɔ ab.'
66019017	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’igb inym es ligbn ab ɛm. N’am ɛlu lebl tuɔtuɔ l’ɛsŋ ɔr a fɛŋ eke b’igb im afr kpoŋ ɛm a l’ɛsɛ: "Òwr, àsr luku Nyam eci ob ij gbɛl a eci!
66019018	Òwr ijr ɛ́b ebu a eci megl a, ìjr srɔda eyŋ ec’es ɛw ɛsɛl a lele ar ɛsɛl ab ab eci megl a, ìjr sigbaŋkɔ a lele ɛl ec’af uyu ɛsɛl ab eci megl a, ìjr agŋ fɛŋ eci megl a, ewi lele madu ab eci megl a, ìjr ey lele ɛgbɛl ab eci megl a."
66019019	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn ndey a, m’ɛkn wus eci ɛ́b ebu a lele ɛl eci ar ɛsɛl ab ab eke as luku, eke k’ogŋ ɛgŋ a eke uyu gbaŋkɔ af a lele in eci ar ɛsɛl ab ab ar.
66019020	Wɛl ɔny ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu a eke kok mɛny ɛwr owi eke k’irmn agŋ a eke ɔny ndey a eci mɛny ɛwr a, ke am igŋ likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ a. Wɛl ɔny ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu ab ab ow ɔwl mebn eke ler faf es am iri al ab ɛm.
66019021	Lab ler ɛm a eke anŋ ɛgŋ a eke uyu gbaŋkɔ ab af a e nɛnym am ɛy ɔkm a, ibi ɛl eci ar ogŋ ɛsɛl a fɛŋ, ɛtŋ ɔr a fɛŋ am ij ɛl e megl a.
66020001	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛs nyam ek’anŋ afr am us es. N’ɔnym nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a eci safuɛ a lele ŋgbraka ligbɛl nyam ab.
66020002	-
66020003	N’ɔny tamranji a, lorŋn sig a ek’el agn oglog Satan a, l’ok ow ŋgbraka ɛtŋ l’oc l’ɔwl ow nɔmu croŋ gbɛl ab ɛm akpo fandi eci. L’abl nɔmu croŋ gbɛl a safuɛ ɛm yec’ɛtŋ ke tamranji a k’írmnm ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ a toŋ ke akpo fandi a ɛc ok es. Ow b’ow uwr a, ow it ke wɛl ɛ́lu’l es lɛgŋ tɛl eci.
66020004	Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn atufu mɛkpn: agŋ a eke ok es af a ɛŋn abusu eke ki jɛj agŋ e low ok. M’ɛkn agŋ a eke wɛl ibi a yɛji eci abŋ a; wɛl ibi ɛl Jesu eci low nɛnyɛmbri nyam a ek’ɛlu ɔkm a lele Nyam odad ab ab eci daŋku eke -l’ijr a sosiɛm. -L’igŋm ndey a nuŋ, -l’igŋm ow eci likŋ ɛgŋ a nuŋ, ɛtŋ -n’ɛŋnm ndey a eci mɛny ɛwr a anyafr, -n’ɛŋnm ow anm ɛl abu af yɛji. -L’igb luw ɛm ɛtŋ Krist ab -l’ɛw usu es toŋ akpo fandi.
66020005	Na krɛkrɛ eci luw ɛm anŋ igb ab ana. Agŋ ɛjec’a eke uw a k’ow igbm luw ɛm eke akpo fandi a k’ɛcm k’okm es.
66020006	Ehe él agŋ a eke anŋ krɛkrɛ eci luw ɛm anŋ igb ab ɛm a! -L’el Nyam eci agŋ lala ɛtŋ yony ɛm eci luw a ɔnym abusu ɛl af; -li b’ow -l’el Nyam lele Krist ab eci egb waw ɛsɛl, ɛtŋ Krist ab -li b’ow -l’ɛw usu es toŋ akpo fandi a.
66020007	Lɛgŋ a eke akpo fandi a b’ow ɛc ok es a, wɛl b’ow ɛlu Satan es sobel ɛm,
66020008	ɛtŋ li b’ow n’im l’ɛju ɛb ɛb a ek’el Gɔg lele Magɔg ab ek’anŋ wus na eci susu kpekpe a. Li b’ow l’as wɛl luku ar ogŋ eci, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -n’ɛny ɛsɛ okij any eci mrici af.
66020009	-N’anŋ susu a fɛŋ -l’ow -l’iwr Nyam ec’ɛb lala a eke erur ke in ec’agŋ ir a -l’ɛlul ɛm eke -li k’eb. Gbɛkɔ al b’ow anŋ afr ow ŋuŋn ɛl.
66020010	Ɛtŋ agn eke b’ɛju ɛl a, wɛl b’ow oc ɔwl’l mebn eke ler faf es a eci al ab ɛm, yogŋ a eke ndey a lele kokoba ɔb ɛs yadŋu ab ab anŋ a. -Li b’ow -l’ij gbre nɔnɔ ncok lele lɛgŋ owr ab godo godo fɛŋ eci.
66020011	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn atufu lɛkpn ufu nyam lele ɛgŋ a eke sig es af ab ab. Wus lele afr ab kpab’r es lís im kpekpe ɛtŋ wɛl ɛwlm ɛknm ɛl ij.
66020012	Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn agŋ ek’uw a, ey lele ɛgbɛl ab, eke inym es atufu lɛkpn a ec’any af. Silɛl nɔnɔ fifig ok es, ɛtŋ lɛl ɛjeci nyam yɛji fig ɛru es, ke sel ɛŋn eci lɛl ab ana. Agŋ a ek’uw a, wɛl jɛj ɛl e lís e low ok low a eke -li kokr ab ɛm, yec’a eke wɛl nɔn anŋ silɛl ab ɛm a.
66020013	Okij ɛlu agŋ a ek’uw ke n’ɔnym ab a es. Luw lele ɔŋnes baŋn ab yɛji ok ɛl ec’agŋ a ek’uw ke -n’ɔnymn ab a es, ɛtŋ wɛl jɛj ɛgŋ ɛgŋ e lís e low ok in e juma a eke li kok ab ɛm.
66020014	Wɛl itr luw lele ɔŋnes baŋn ab ok al a eke faf es ab ɛm. Al na eke faf es a el luw sakp yony ɛm a.
66020015	Wɛl b’oc ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke wɛl nɔnm in e nin sel ɛŋn eci lɛl ab ɛm a ɔwl al a eke faf es ab ɛm.
66021001	Ɛmɛny m’ɛkn afr owr nyam lele wus owr nyam ab; krɛkrɛ ec’afr a lele krɛkrɛ eci wus ab ab irm ɛtŋ okij a yɛji anm ij.
66021002	Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny m’ɛkn Jerusalɛm owr a, ɛb lala a eke Nyam ɔŋ anŋ in ogŋ a am ow a. Li bɛbm sos ɛsɛ yɔw eke kpɛkp sos eke k’im ɔbr ɛc af.
66021003	M’iri lebl tuɔtuɔ nyam ek’anŋ atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am ikŋ ow dad ɛsɛ: "Sica Nyam ec’ɛb ir usu a ow agŋ ec’araŋn! Li b’ow l’ir wɛl ab ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el Nyam ec’agŋ. Nyam in obi b’ow anŋ ɛl ab ɛtŋ li b’ow l’el wɛl e Nyam.
66021004	Li b’ow li tɛtŋ wɛl e mikŋ a fɛŋ es; luw owi, niŋn owi, likekr owi lele gbre ij owi ab k’ow anm ij. Lɛgŋ sig ɛm ec’ów a fɛŋ ot es ŋ̂."
66021005	Ɛtŋ sica ɛgŋ a eke sig es atufu lɛkpn ab af a dad ninɛ: "Sica m’am ɔŋ ów a fɛŋ itŋn el owr." Ɛtŋ ɛmɛny l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Nɔ̀n low na aŋke ɛm eci sodad a el nawrɛ, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔny ɔmn ow ɛm."
66021006	Ɛmɛny l’igŋ af li dad ninɛ: "Sica fɛŋ uwr ŋ̂! M’el Krɛkrɛ lele Es Abal El ab, Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab. Ɛgŋ yec’eke mijamn am ɔny a, mi b’ow m’ɔŋ’n mij ewl mij a eke b’ɔŋ ɛgŋ sel a ɔfr ɛm l’ɛgŋ.
66021007	Ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ eke b’ow eb any a, b’ow ɛŋn aja ikŋ na; m’ow m’el in e Nyam ɛtŋ in li b’ow l’el ɛm ec’iy.
66021008	Érŋnu, ów ɛnyɛmbri yony yony ɛsɛl, agŋ eŋuŋ, agŋ ibiu, afacu, cam kok ɛsɛl, agŋ a eke b’igŋ sɛkp nuŋ lele ayadŋu fɛŋ ab ec’a, ɛl ec’usu b’ow anŋ mebn eke ler faf es a eci al ab ɛm. Ke luw sakp yony ɛm ab ana."
66021009	Sica m’ɛkn afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɔbŋ a, eke ɔnym kpɔk lɔbŋ a eke abu ɛyr es abal el lɔbŋ a anŋ ɛm a eci nyam. L’ow n’am dad’m l’ɛsɛ: "Òw, mi b’ow mi yɛgm’ŋ igŋ ɛya, licɛbli a eci yɔw a."
66021010	Abŋ ɛm a, afr ɛrm ɛs a oc’m im lafɛny gege ligbɛl nyam eci nuŋ af. Li yɛgm’m Jerusalɛm, ɛb lala a eke Nyam ɔŋ anŋ in ogŋ a am ow a.
66021011	Nyam ec’anygbɛl a am ɔŋ li jɛjn ɛsɛ lebn mamn af, ɛsɛ jasp eci lebn eke b’ɛkan es af.
66021012	N’ɔny lakp sisil gege nyam eke ɔny masany lɛw yony lele afr ɛrm ɛsɛl lɛw yony ek’am ɔsu ab. Masany ab af a, wɛl nɔn Israɛl ec’eb lɛw yony a ec’en a anŋ.
66021013	Baŋn ec’ogog nyam nyam fɛŋ b’ɔny masany nyahan: nyahan b’anŋ yogŋ eke ligbn b’igb a, nyahan b’anŋ yogŋ eke ligbn b’ɛru a, nyahan b’anŋ afr ogog a, ɛtŋ nyahan b’anŋ esr ɛm a.
66021014	Baŋn a eci lakp a sigr mób lɛw yony eke wɛl ok ɔmu ɛm, ɛtŋ af yogŋ, wɛl nɔn licɛbli a ec’ ɛrm ɛsɛl a ec’en a.
66021015	Afr ɛrm ɛs a eke am dad’m odad a ɔnym ob bɛbmn ob ab, sika ɛm eci likŋ soŋni eke ki bɛbmn baŋn a, in eci masany a lele in eci lakp ab ab.
66021016	Baŋn a eci ogog yar a bɛbmn; sɔfu a lele es ar ab ab bɛbmn. Afr ɛrm ɛs a oc in eci sika ɛm likŋ soŋni a bɛbmn baŋn a; ow ij sɔfu fandi lɛw yony, es ar a, sigb a lele sɔfu ab ab bɛbmn.
66021017	Li bɛbmn lakp a yɛji. Ob bɛbmn ob a eke l’oc li bɛbmn ab ɛm, n’ɛŋn sigb a eci sɔfu a ekŋ lɔbŋ miy yar,
66021018	wɛl awŋ lakp a jasp ɛm, ɛtŋ ɛb a in obi a wɛl us’r sika tasi ɛm ɛtŋ ow b’ayl ɛkan es ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ af.
66021019	Mób a eke wɛl ok ɔmu ɛm awŋ baŋn a eci lakp a, wɛl ot mebn amamn ek’ɔny mij ɛrŋ ɛrŋ ijr mɛwl: krɛkrɛ eci lob a jasp ɛm, yony ɛm ec’a safir ɛm, nyahan ɛm ec’a agat ɛm, yar ɛm ec’a emerod ɛm,
66021020	yen ɛm ec’a onis ɛm, nɔhɔn ɛm ec’a sarduan ɛm, lɔbŋ ɛm ec’a krisolit ɛm, niwn ɛm ec’a beril ɛm, libarm ɛm ec’a topas ɛm, lɛw ɛm ec’a krisopras ɛm, lɛw nyam ɛm ec’a turkuas ɛm, ɛtŋ lɛw yony ɛm ec’a ametis ɛm.
66021021	Masany lɛw yony a el ayrɛ lɛw yony; lisany nyam eci kok ɛm a, wɛl b’oc ayrɛ ligbɛl nyam coco. Ɛjɛm a el sika tasi ɔfr eke ayl am ɛkan es ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ af.
66021022	M’ɛknm Nyamel ɛb ab ɛm, aŋke ɛb a eci Nyamel a el Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam Abusu Ɛs lele licɛbli ab ab.
66021023	Ɛb a ɔlm ligbn es, ɔlm awl es eke k’ayal il, aŋke Nyam ec’anygbɛl a am ayal il ɛtŋ licɛbli a el in eci mun al.
66021024	Ɛb ɛb a fɛŋ ec’agŋ a b’ow an es in eci usuayl ab ɛm, ɛtŋ wus eci ɛ́b ebu a b’ow ot ɛl eci ob ɔny a ow yogŋ.
66021025	Lɛgŋ owr nimum a, baŋn a eci masany a b’ow fifig ok es; lɛgŋ kaka wɛl k’ow bablm, aŋke yogŋ lɛgŋ uk k’ow anm ij.
66021026	Wɛl b’ow ot ɛb ɛb a eci sagb a lele ob ɔny ab ab ow yogŋ.
66021027	Ob fɛŋ eke aylm Nyam ec’any af lele agŋ eke bi kok musue owi ke b’ɔny yadŋ a k’ow okm baŋn a. Agŋ a sɔny coco a eke b’ow ok ɛm a el, ɛl a eke wɛl nɔn ɛl ec’en licɛbli a eci sel ɛŋn e lɛl ab ɛm a.
66022001	-
66022002	Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a yɛgm’m sel ɛŋn eci mij ewl mij ek’am jɛjn ɛsɛ akrɔŋnɔ af, ke anŋ Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab ec’atufu lɛkpn a ogŋ am jɛjn ok ɔkm ewl im ɛb a ec’usu araŋn a. Mij a ec’ál yony a eke ok a ec’araŋn a, sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a anŋ. Lakpo nyam af a, li b’ɔsu ey sakp lɛw yony, awl nyam akp nyam. In eci suw a b’ewlm ɛb ɛb ec’agŋ a.
66022003	Ofn owi kaka k’ow anm ij. Nyam lele licɛbli ab ab eci atufu lɛkpn a b’ow anŋ ɛb ab ɛm, ɛtŋ Nyam eci juma kok ɛsɛl a b’ow igŋ’n nuŋ.
66022004	-Li b’ow -l’ɛkn ow ec’any a, ɛtŋ ow eci nin a b’ow nɔn ɛl ec’anyafr a.
66022005	Lɛgŋ uk k’ow anm ij, ɛtŋ -li k’ow -l’ibramn mun al ec’usuayl a lele ligbn ec’ab ab, aŋke Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam in obi li b’ow l’ok wɛl in ec’usuayl ab af, ɛtŋ -li b’ow -l’el es ɛw ɛsɛl godo godo fɛŋ eci.
66022006	Ɛmɛny afr ɛrm ɛs a dad’m ninɛ: "Sodad amua el nawrɛ, wɛl ɔtu eke k’ɔny ɔmn ow ɛm; ɛtŋ Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Nyam a eke bi nyimn kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl eci abŋ a, ɛrm in ec’afr ɛrm ɛs ow yec’ɛtŋ ke li yɛ́gm in e juma kok ɛsɛl a low eke b’ow ɛy lɛgŋ tɛl ɛm a."
66022007	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Ìri, ow k’ow ibnm m’ow m’ow! Ehe él agŋ a eke b’oc kokoba ɔb e sodad ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a sɛnyn sɛnyn a eci!"
66022008	Ɛm Jan, m’iri ɛtŋ m’ɛkn ów amua. Ɛtŋ eke m’iri ke m’ɛkn a, m’ok ɔwrɔkp wus afr ɛrm ɛs a eke yɛgm’m ów amua a ec’any af eke mi k’igŋ’n nuŋ.
66022009	Gbɛkɔ li dad’m ninɛ: "Kì kok ɛbɛn! Ɛm yɛji juma kok ɛs ɛsɛ ŋ af, ɛsɛ esŋ jimɛl kokoba ɔb ɛsɛl ab af, ɛsɛ agŋ a fɛŋ eke b’oc lɛl na ɛm eci sodad a sɛnyn sɛnyn ab af. Nyam anake it eke k’igŋ nuŋ a, kɔ ow elm ɛm!"
66022010	Ɛmɛny li dad’m ninɛ: "Kokoba ɔb e sodad ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a, k’òc ki lɔl es, aŋke ów amua fɛŋ eci sɛgŋ a eke wɛl bɛbm ok es a titm.
66022011	Ke ɛgŋ eke akplm a, n’ánŋ in ec’akplm ab ɛm; ɛgŋ eke aylm Nyam ec’any af a, n’ánŋ in ec’ aylm ab ɛm; ɛgŋ eke bi kok low mamn a, n’ánŋ low mamn kok ab ɛm; ɛgŋ ek’el lala a, n’ánŋ lala el ab ɛm."
66022012	Jesu dad ninɛ: "Kin, ɛm ec’ow ibnm ij! Mi b’ow m’ism ob ap ab, ɛtŋ mi b’ow m’ɔŋ ɛgŋ ɛgŋ, juma a eke li kok a eci.
66022013	M’el Nuŋ Ɔb lele Nuŋ Ɛdŋ ab, m’el Krɛkrɛ lele Es Abal El ab, Kpɔkpɔ lele Uwar ab."
66022014	Ehe él agŋ a eke am ɛfn ɛl ec’ob sos ɛw es eke k’ɛŋn abusu ij sel ɛŋn e likŋ a ec’ey a eci. -Li b’ow -n’ɛŋn abusu -l’ɛ́cr masany a eci -l’ok ɛb ab ɛm.
66022015	Sica baŋn a eci jam a, agŋ eŋuŋ a, cam kok ɛsɛl, afacu, agŋ ibiu, sɛkp nuŋ igŋ ɛsɛl lele ayadŋu ab ec’usu ek’anŋ ana!
66022016	"Ɛm Jesu, m’ɛrm ɛm ec’afr ɛrm ɛs a ow ij ów amua e daŋku Nyamel fɛŋ ec’any af. Ɛm, m’el David ec’eb ab ɛm eci lilaw, ibribr eci lɛ́l ek’am jɛjn.
66022017	Abŋ a lele yɔw a eke wɛl ɛbi ab ab am dad ɛsɛ: 'Òw!' Ke ɛgŋ yec’eke in yɛji am iri low na a dád ɛsɛ: 'Òw!' Ke ɛgŋ eke mijamn am ɔny a ów; ke ɛgŋ eke am erur sel ɛŋn eci mij a, éb ɔfr ɛm."
66022018	Ɛm, Jan, kin low eke m’am igbl ow eci lebl ogŋ mi dad ɛgŋ fɛŋ eke b’ow iri kokoba ɔb owi a ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a: eke batŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am oc low ɛjeci nyam ɛlu ɛm a, ke abu ɛyr owi a fɛŋ eke wɛl dad ow e low lɛl na ɛm a, Nyam b’ow ot ɔŋ’n.
66022019	Ɛtŋ eke batŋ ɛgŋ kaka fɛŋ am ɔny kokoba ɔb e sodad a ek’anŋ lɛl na ɛm a ec’ob nyam oc es, ke sel ɛŋn eci likŋ a ec’ey a lele ɛb lala a eke wɛl dad ow ec’odad lɛl na ɛm a, Nyam b’ow ɔny oc’r es abu ɛm.
66022020	Ɛgŋ a eke ij low nɛnyɛmbri nyam na ec’asmanu a dad ninɛ: "M’am ow caca!" Amɛn! Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu, òw gɔŋ!
66022021	Ke sica Ɛs Kɔtɔkɔ Jesu ec’ɔwrɔ a ánŋ ɔny fɛŋ ab.
